tika-vin01t1:25_0: Namāmi sirasā dhīraṃ, garuṃ me gaṇavācakaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:30_0: Porāṇehi kataṃ yaṃ tu, līnatthassa pakāsanaṃ;
tika-vin01t1:31_0: Na taṃ sabbattha bhikkhūnaṃ, atthaṃ sādheti sabbaso.
tika-vin01t1:43_0: Vinayasaṃvaṇṇanārambhe ratanattayaṃ namassitukāmo tassa visiṭṭhaguṇayogasandassanatthaṃ “yo kappakoṭīhipī”tiādimāha.
tika-vin01t1:43_2: vandanārahe ca katā vandanā yathādhippetamatthaṃ sādheti.
tika-vin01t1:43_3: Ettha ca saṃvaṇṇanārambhe ratanattayapaṇāmakaraṇappayojanaṃ tattha tattha bahudhā papañcenti ācariyā.
tika-vin01t1:44_2: taṃ sammadeva tesaṃ uggahaṇadhāraṇādikkamaladdhabbāya sammāpaṭipattiyā sabbahitasukhanipphādanatthaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:44_6: āyatiṃ paresaṃ diṭṭhānugatiāpajjanato ca saṃvaṇṇanāyaṃ ratanattayapaṇāmakiriyā”ti.
tika-vin01t1:45_1: Tasmā saṃvaṇṇanārambhe ratanattayapaṇāmakaraṇaṃ yathāpaṭiññātasaṃvaṇṇanāya anantarāyena parisamāpanatthanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:50_0: Ratanattayapaṇāmakaraṇena cettha yathāpaṭiññātasaṃvaṇṇanāya anantarāyena parisamāpanaṃ ratanattayapūjāya paññāpāṭavabhāvato,
tika-vin01t1:51_2: nevassa tasmiṃ samaye rāgapariyuṭṭhitaṃ cittaṃ hoti,
tika-vin01t1:55_0: Samādhissa ca paññāya padaṭṭhānabhāvo vuttoyeva “samāhito yathābhūtaṃ pajānātī”ti.
tika-vin01t1:55_1: Tato evaṃ paṭubhūtāya paññāya paṭiññāmahattakataṃ khedamabhibhuyya anantarāyena saṃvaṇṇanaṃ samāpayissati.
tika-vin01t1:56_0: Atha vā ratanattayapūjāya āyuvaṇṇasukhabalavaḍḍhanato anantarāyena parisamāpanaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:58_0: Cattāro dhammā vaḍḍhanti, āyu vaṇṇo sukhaṃ bala”nti. ;
tika-vin01t1:59_0: Tato āyuvaṇṇasukhabalavuḍḍhiyā hoteva kāriyaniṭṭhānamiti vuttaṃ “anantarāyena parisamāpanattha”nti.
tika-vin01t1:61_4: Satthugāravatā dhammagāravatā saṅghagāravatā sikkhāgāravatā samādhigāravatā kalyāṇamittatā sovacassatā”ti.
tika-vin01t1:63_0: Atha vā pasādavatthūsu pūjāya puññātisayabhāvato. Vuttañhi tassa puññātisayattaṃ –
tika-vin01t1:67_0: Na sakkā puññaṃ saṅkhātuṃ, imettamapi kenacī”ti. ;
tika-vin01t1:71_1: Ratanattayapūjā hi niratisayapuññakkhettasaṃbuddhiyā aparimeyyappabhavo puññātisayoti bahuvidhantarāyepi
tika-vin01t1:71_4: Tasmā suvuttaṃ “saṃvaṇṇanārambhe ratanattayapaṇāmakaraṇaṃ yathāpaṭiññātasaṃvaṇṇanāya anantarāyena parisamāpanatthanti veditabba”nti.
tika-vin01t1:72_0: Evaṃ pana sappayojanaṃ ratanattayavandanaṃ kattukāmo paṭhamaṃ tāva bhagavato vandanaṃ kātuṃ tammūlakattā sesaratanānaṃ “yo kappa…pe…
tika-vin01t1:72_2: Ettha pana yassā desanāya saṃvaṇṇanaṃ kattukāmo,
tika-vin01t1:72_12: paññā yassa mahesino”ti paññāppadhānañca thomanaṃ āraddhaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:72_13: Karuṇāpaññāppadhānā hi suttantadesanā tesaṃ tesaṃ sattānaṃ āsayānusayādhimutticariyādibhedaparicchindanasamatthāya
tika-vin01t1:72_14: paññāya sattesu ca mahākaruṇāya tattha sātisayappavattito.
tika-vin01t1:72_15: Suttantadesanāya hi mahākaruṇāsamāpattibahulo veneyyasantānesu tadajjhāsayānulomena gambhīramatthapadaṃ patiṭṭhāpesi.
tika-vin01t1:72_16: Abhidhammadesanā ca kevalaṃ paññāppadhānā paramatthadhammānaṃ yathāsabhāvapaṭivedhasamatthāya paññāya tattha sātisayappavattito.
tika-vin01t1:73_0: Vinayadesanā pana āsayādinirapekkhaṃ kevalaṃ karuṇāya pākatikasattenapi asotabbārahaṃ suṇanto apucchitabbārahaṃ
tika-vin01t1:73_1: pucchanto avattabbārahañca vadanto bhagavā sikkhāpadaṃ paññapesīti karuṇāppadhānā.
tika-vin01t1:73_2: Tathā hi ukkaṃsapariyantagatahirottappopi bhagavā lokiyasādhujanehipi pariharitabbāni “sikharaṇīsī”tiādīni
tika-vin01t1:73_3: vacanāni yathāparādhañca garahavacanāni vinayapiṭakadesanāya mahākaruṇāsañcoditamānaso mahāparisamajjhe abhāsi,
tika-vin01t1:73_5: Tasmā kiñcāpi bhūmantarapaccayākārasamayantarakathānaṃ viya vinayapaññattiyāpi samuṭṭhāpikā paññā anaññasādhāraṇatāya atisayakiccavatī,
tika-vin01t1:73_6: karuṇāya kiccaṃ pana tatopi adhikanti karuṇāppadhānā vinayadesanā.
tika-vin01t1:73_8: Tasmā ārambhānurūpaṃ karuṇāppadhānameva ettha thomanaṃ katanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:74_0: Karuṇāggahaṇena ca aparimeyyappabhāvā sabbepi buddhaguṇā saṅgahitāti daṭṭhabbā taṃmūlakattā sesabuddhaguṇānaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:74_1: Mahākaruṇāya vā chasu asādhāraṇañāṇesu aññatarattā taṃsahacaritasesāsādhāraṇañāṇānampi gahaṇasabbhāvato sabbepi buddhaguṇā nayato dassitāva honti.
tika-vin01t1:74_2: Esoyeva hi niravasesato buddhaguṇānaṃ dassanupāyo yadidaṃ nayaggāho.
tika-vin01t1:74_3: Aññathā ko nāma samattho bhagavato guṇe anupadaṃ niravasesato dassetuṃ.
tika-vin01t1:79_0: Teneva ca āyasmatā sāriputtattherenapi buddhaguṇaparicchedanaṃ patianuyuttena “no hetaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:79_3: Tasmā “yo kappakoṭīhipī”tiādinā karuṇāmukhena saṅkhepato sakalasabbaññuguṇehi bhagavantaṃ abhitthavīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:80_4: tassā vasena kappakoṭigaṇanāyapi appameyyaṃ kālaṃ lokahitatthāya atidukkaraṃ karontassa bhagavato dukkhānubhavanaṃ dasseti.
tika-vin01t1:80_5: Karuṇāya baleneva hi so bhagavā hatthagatampi nibbānaṃ pahāya saṃsārapaṅke nimuggaṃ sattanikāyaṃ tato
tika-vin01t1:80_7: Kappakoṭīhipi appameyyaṃ kālanti kappakoṭigaṇanāyapi “ettakā kappakoṭiyo”ti pametuṃ asakkuṇeyyaṃ kālaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:80_8: kappakoṭigaṇanavasenapi paricchinditumasakkuṇeyyattā aparicchinnāni kappasatasahassādhikāni cattāri asaṅkhyeyyānīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t1:80_11: “Kappakoṭīhipī”ti apisaddo kappakoṭivasenapi tāva pametuṃ na sakkā,
tika-vin01t1:80_22: Lokahitāyāti “anamatagge saṃsāre vaṭṭadukkhena accantapīḷitaṃ sattalokaṃ tamhā dukkhato mocetvā nibbānasukhabhāgiyaṃ
tika-vin01t1:80_25: Lokahitāya khedaṃ gatoti yojanāyapi natthi doso.
tika-vin01t1:81_0: Yaṃ pana evaṃ yojanaṃ asambhāventena kenaci vuttaṃ “na hi bhagavā lokahitāya saṃsāradukkhamanubhavati.
tika-vin01t1:81_1: Na hi kassaci dukkhānubhavanaṃ lokassa upakāraṃ āvahatī”ti,
tika-vin01t1:81_3: Evaṃ yojanāyapi atidukkarāni karontassa bhagavato dukkhānubhavanaṃ lokahitakaraṇatthāyāti ayamattho viññāyati,
tika-vin01t1:81_5: Paṭhamaṃ vuttayojanāyapi hi na dukkarakaraṇamattena lokahitasiddhi.
tika-vin01t1:81_6: Na hi dukkaraṃ karonto kañci sattaṃ maggaphalādīsu patiṭṭhāpeti,
tika-vin01t1:81_7: atha kho tādisaṃ atidukkaraṃ katvā sabbaññubhāvaṃ sacchikatvā niyyānikadhammadesanāya maggaphalādīsu satte patiṭṭhāpento lokassa hitaṃ sādheti.
tika-vin01t1:82_1: hitakaraṇassa pana adhippetattā taṃvisayasseva sattalokassa vasena attho gahetabbo.
tika-vin01t1:82_2: So hi lokīyanti ettha puññapāpāni taṃvipāko cāti “loko”ti vuccati.
tika-vin01t1:82_3: Katthaci pana “sanarāmaralokagaru”ntiādīsu samūhatthopi lokasaddo samudāyavasena lokīyati paññāpīyatīti.
tika-vin01t1:82_4: Yaṃ panettha kenaci vuttaṃ “iminā sattalokañca jātilokañca saṅgaṇhāti,
tika-vin01t1:82_6: atikkantaparalokānaṃ vā ucchinnalokasamudayānaṃ idha jātiloke okāsaloke vā diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārasaṅkhātañca hitaṃ sampiṇḍetvā lokassa, lokānaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:82_7: loke vā hitanti sarūpekasesaṃ katvā lokahitamiccevāhā”ti,
tika-vin01t1:82_8: na taṃ sārato paccetabbaṃ diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārasaṅkhaātahitassapi sattalokavisayattā,
tika-vin01t1:84_2: Tathā hi sabbānatthapaahārapubbaṅgamāya niravasesahitasukhavidhānatapparāya niratisayāya payogasampattiyā
tika-vin01t1:84_4: bhagavā aparimāṇāsu lokadhātūsu aparimāṇānaṃ sattānaṃ ekapaṭisaraṇo patiṭṭhā.
tika-vin01t1:84_6: veneyyānaṃ hitasukhaṃ mettāyanavasena āsīsati patthetīti attho.
tika-vin01t1:84_7: Atha vā nāthati veneyyagate kilese upatāpetīti attho,
tika-vin01t1:84_11: bhikkhu kālena kālaṃ attasampattiṃ paccavekkheyyā”tiādinā sattānaṃ taṃ taṃ hitapaṭipattiṃ yācitvāpi karuṇāya samussāhito te tattha niyojeti.
tika-vin01t1:84_12: Paramena vā cittissariyena samannāgato sabbasatte īsati abhibhavatīti paramissaro bhagavā “nātho”ti vuccati.
tika-vin01t1:85_0: Mahākāruṇikassāti yo karuṇāya kampitahadayattā lokahitatthaṃ atidukkarakiriyāya anekappakāraṃ tādisaṃ saṃsāradukkhamanubhavitvā āgato,
tika-vin01t1:85_8: Paradukkhe sati sādhūnaṃ kampanaṃ hadayakhedaṃ karotīti vā karuṇā.
tika-vin01t1:85_11: Esā hi paradukkhāpanayanakāmatālakkhaṇā attasukhanirapekkhatāya kāruṇikānaṃ sukhaṃ rundhati vibādhetīti.
tika-vin01t1:85_13: Yathā hi dvāraṭṭhānato aññattha vattamānopi dvārapaṭibaddhajīviko puriso dvārānativattavuttitāya dvāre niyuttoti “dovāriko”ti vuccati,
tika-vin01t1:85_14: evaṃ bhagavā mettādivasena karuṇāvihārato aññattha vattamānopi karuṇānativattavuttitāya karuṇāya niyuttoti “kāruṇiko”ti vuccati.
tika-vin01t1:85_15: Mahābhinīhārato paṭṭhāya hi yāva mahāparinibbānā lokahitatthameva lokanāthā tiṭṭhanti.
tika-vin01t1:85_17: Satipi bhagavato tadaññaguṇānampi vasena mahantabhāve kāruṇikasaddasannidhānena vuttattā karuṇāvasenettha
tika-vin01t1:85_19: Evañca katvā “mahākāruṇikassā”ti iminā padena puggalādhiṭṭhānena satthu mahākaruṇā vuttā hoti.
tika-vin01t1:86_0: Atha vā karuṇā karuṇāyanaṃ sīlaṃ pakati etassāti kāruṇiko,
tika-vin01t1:86_1: pathavīphassādayo viya kakkhaḷaphusanādisabhāvā karuṇāyanasabhāvo sabhāvabhūtakaruṇoti attho.
tika-vin01t1:86_3: Atha vā mahāvisayatāya mahānubhāvatāya mahābalatāya ca mahatī karuṇāti mahākaruṇā.
tika-vin01t1:86_4: Bhagavato hi karuṇā niravasesesu sattesu pavattati,
tika-vin01t1:86_6: diṭṭhadhammikādibhedañca mahantameva sattānaṃ hitasukhaṃ ekantato nipphādeti,
tika-vin01t1:86_7: mahākaruṇāya niyuttoti mahākāruṇikoti sabbaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:86_8: Atha vā mahatī pasatthā karuṇā assa atthīti mahākāruṇiko.
tika-vin01t1:86_10: Pasatthā ca bhagavato karuṇā mahākaruṇāsamāpattivasenapi pavattito anaññasādhāraṇattāti.
tika-vin01t1:87_0: Evaṃ karuṇāmukhena saṅkhepato sakalasabbaññuguṇehi bhagavantaṃ thometvā idāni saddhammaṃ thometuṃ “asambudha”ntiādimāha.
tika-vin01t1:87_8: bodhetā pajāyāti buddho”tiādinā niddesanayena attho veditabbo.
tika-vin01t1:87_10: buddhiyā vā vikasitabhāvato buddhavāti buddho jāgaraṇavikasanatthavasena.
tika-vin01t1:87_11: Atha vā kassacipi ñeyyadhammassa anavabuddhassa abhāvena ñeyyavisesassa kammabhāvena aggahaṇato kammavacanicchāya
tika-vin01t1:87_12: abhāvena avagamanatthavaseneva kattuniddeso labbhatīti buddhavāti buddho.
tika-vin01t1:87_13: Atthato pana pāramitāparibhāvito sayambhūñāṇena saha vāsanāya vihataviddhaṃsitaniravasesakileso mahākaruṇāsabbaññutaññāṇādiaparimeyyaguṇagaṇādhāro
tika-vin01t1:87_15: Yathāha “buddhoti yo so bhagavā sayambhū anācariyako pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu sāmaṃ saccāni abhisambujjhi,
tika-vin01t1:87_16: tattha ca sabbaññutaṃ patto balesu ca vasībhāva”nti.
tika-vin01t1:87_17: Tena evaṃ nirupamappabhāvena buddhena nisevitaṃ gocarāsevanābhāvanāsevanāhi yathārahaṃ nisevitaṃ anubhūtanti attho.
tika-vin01t1:88_1: maggo pana attanā bhāvito ca bhāvanāsevanāvasena sevito,
tika-vin01t1:88_2: parehi uppāditāni pana maggaphalāni cetopariyañāṇādinā yadā parijānāti,
tika-vin01t1:88_5: Ettha ca pariyattidhammassapi pariyāyato dhammaggahaṇena gahaṇe sati sopi desanāsammasanañāṇagocaratāya gocarāsevanāya sevitoti sakkā gahetuṃ.
tika-vin01t1:88_7: tīṇi piṭakāni sammasī”ti ca aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttattā pariyattidhammassapi sacchikiriyāya sammasanapariyāyo
tika-vin01t1:88_8: labbhatīti yaṃ asambudhaṃ asambujjhanto asacchikarontoti atthasambhavato sopi idha vutto evāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:88_10: pariññātadhammavinayo pana tadatthapaṭipattiyā sammāpaṭipanno na cirasseva dukkhassantaṃ karissati.
tika-vin01t1:91_0: Ettha ca kiñcāpi maggaphalanibbānāni paccekabuddhabuddhasāvakehipi gocarāsevanādinā sevitāni honti,
tika-vin01t1:91_2: Kenaci pana buddhasaddassa sāmaññato buddhānubuddhapaccekabuddhānampi ettheva saṅgaho vutto.
tika-vin01t1:92_2: Atha vā bhavābhavanti sugatiduggativasena hīnapaṇītavasena ca khuddakaṃ mahantañca bhavanti attho.
tika-vin01t1:92_10: Vuttappakāro bhavo ca abhavo ca bhavābhavo.
tika-vin01t1:92_14: Jīvaggahaṇena hi saṅkhārabhājanalokaṃ nivatteti tassa bhavābhavagamanāsambhavato.
tika-vin01t1:93_5: taṃ vindiyaṃ na vindatīti vā avijjā,
tika-vin01t1:93_10: saccānaṃ tathaṭṭhaṃ aviditaṃ karotīti vā avijjā,
tika-vin01t1:93_11: dukkhādīnaṃ pīḷanādivasena vuttaṃ catubbidhaṃ atthaṃ aviditaṃ karotītipi avijjā,
tika-vin01t1:93_12: antavirahite saṃsāre sabbayonigatibhavaviññāṇaṭṭhitisattāvāsesu satte javāpetīti vā avijjā,
tika-vin01t1:93_14: vijjamānesupi khandhādīsu na javatīti vā avijjā.
tika-vin01t1:93_15: Sā ādi yesaṃ taṇhādīnaṃ te avijjādayo,
tika-vin01t1:93_17: teyeva ca sattānaṃ bandhanaṭṭhena jālasadisāti jālaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:93_18: taṃ viddhaṃseti sabbaso vināseti sīlenāti avijjādikilesajālaviddhaṃsī.
tika-vin01t1:93_22: Maggassapi nibbānamāgamma kilesaviddhaṃsanato nibbānampi kilese viddhaṃseti nāma,
tika-vin01t1:93_23: maggassa kilesaviddhaṃsanakiccaṃ phalena nipphannanti phalampi “kilesaviddhaṃsī”ti vuccati.
tika-vin01t1:93_24: Pariyattidhammopi kilesaviddhaṃsanassa paccayattā “kilesaviddhaṃsī”ti vattumarahatīti na koci doso.
tika-vin01t1:94_1: Tattha yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjamāne catūsu apāyesu apatamāne dhāretīti dhammo.
tika-vin01t1:95_0: “Ye keci dhammaṃ saraṇaṃ gatāse, na te gamissanti apāyabhūmiṃ;
tika-vin01t1:97_1: Saṃsāradukkhe vā apatamāne katvā dhāretīti dhammo maggaphaluppattiyā sattakkhattuparamatādivasena saṃsārassa paricchinnattā.
tika-vin01t1:97_3: Evañca katvā ariyamaggo tassa tadatthasiddhihetutāya nibbānañcāti ubhayameva nippariyāyato dhāreti,
tika-vin01t1:97_5: pariyattidhammo tadadhigamahetutāyāti ubhayaṃ pariyāyato dhāretīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:97_6: Vuttappakāro dhammoyeva attano uttaritarābhāvena varo pavaro anuttaroti dhammavaro,
tika-vin01t1:97_13: Tasmā ito paṭṭhāya ettakampi avatvā sāratthameva dassayissāma.
tika-vin01t1:97_16: Ettha ca “avijjādikilesajālaviddhaṃsino”ti etena svākkhātatādīhi dhammaṃ thometi,
tika-vin01t1:98_0: Evaṃ saṅkhepeneva sabbadhammaguṇehi saddhammaṃ thometvā idāni ariyasaṅghaṃ thometuṃ “guṇehī”tiādimāha.
tika-vin01t1:98_8: Vimutti ca vimuttiñāṇañca vimuttivimuttiñāṇanti vattabbe ekadesasarūpekasesanayena “vimuttiñāṇa”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:98_13: Ettha ca sīlādayo guṇā lokiyā lokuttarā ca yathāsambhavaṃ niddiṭṭhāti veditabbā.
tika-vin01t1:98_14: Yaṃ panettha kenaci vuttaṃ “sīlādayo kiñcāpi lokiyalokuttarā yathāsambhavaṃ labbhanti,
tika-vin01t1:98_15: tathāpi ante ‘ariyasaṅgha’nti vacanato sīlādayo cattāro dhammakkhandhā lokuttarāvā”ti,
tika-vin01t1:98_17: Na hi ariyasaṅghassa lokiyaguṇehipi thomanāya koci doso dissati,
tika-vin01t1:99_0: Kusalatthikānaṃ janānaṃ puññassa vuddhiyā khettasadisattā khettanti āha “khettaṃ janānaṃ kusalatthikāna”nti.
tika-vin01t1:99_1: Khittaṃ bījaṃ mahapphalabhāvakaraṇena tāyatīti hi khettaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:99_10: Atha vā sadevakena lokena saraṇanti araṇīyato upagantabbato upagatānañca tadatthasiddhito ariyā.
tika-vin01t1:99_12: Atha vā ariyo ca so yathāvuttanayena saṅgho ca diṭṭhisīlasāmaññena saṃhatabhāvatoti ariyasaṅgho,
tika-vin01t1:99_15: Bhagavato aparabhāge buddhadhammaratanānampi samadhigamo saṅgharatanādhīnoti ariyasaṅghassa bahūpakārataṃ
tika-vin01t1:100_0: Evaṃ gāthāttayena saṅkhepato sakalaguṇasaṃkittanamukhena ratanattayassa paṇāmaṃ katvā idāni taṃ nipaccakāraṃ
tika-vin01t1:100_2: Iccevaṃ yathāvuttanayena accantaṃ ekantena namassaneyyaṃ namassitabbaṃ ratanattayaṃ namassamāno kāyavācācittehi
tika-vin01t1:100_3: vandamāno ahaṃ vipulaṃ yaṃ puññābhisandaṃ alatthanti sambandho.
tika-vin01t1:100_5: Tesañhi “itipi so bhagavā”tiādinā yathābhūtaguṇe āvajjentassa amatādhigamahetubhūtaṃ anappakaṃ pītipāmojjaṃ uppajjati. Yathāha –
tika-vin01t1:101_2: nevassa tasmiṃ samaye rāgapariyuṭṭhitaṃ cittaṃ hoti,
tika-vin01t1:106_1: Majjhimagaṇṭhipade pana cūḷagaṇṭhipade ca “puññābhisandanti puññābhinisaṃsa”ntipi attho vutto.
tika-vin01t1:107_5: ariyasāvako buddhe aveccappasādena samannāgato hoti ‘itipi so bhagavā…pe…
tika-vin01t1:108_0: Evamādikāya pāḷiyā atthaṃ dassento “puññābhisandā kusalābhisandāti puññanadiyo kusalanadiyo”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:108_3: Na hi ratanattayaṃ namassamāno tasmiṃ khaṇe puññaphalaṃ alattha,
tika-vin01t1:108_6: diṭṭhadhamme tu antarāyavighāto tassa ca puññassa ānisaṃsamattakaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:108_8: na ca puññaphale anuppanne tassānubhāvena hatantarāyabhāvo na sijjhati,
tika-vin01t1:108_9: na cetaṃ tasmiṃyeva khaṇe diṭṭhadhammavedanīyaṃ ahosi.
tika-vin01t1:108_10: Tasmā tassa mahato puññappavāhassa ānubhāvena hatantarāyoti ayameva attho yujjati.
tika-vin01t1:108_11: Athāpi paṇāmakiriyāya janitattā puññameva puññaphalanti tassādhippāyo siyā,
tika-vin01t1:109_0: Tassānubhāvenāti tassa yathāvuttassa puññappavāhassa ānubhāvena balena.
tika-vin01t1:109_1: Hatantarāyoti taṃtaṃsampattiyā vibandhanavasena sattasantānassa antare vemajjhe eti āgacchatīti antarāyo,
tika-vin01t1:109_3: Paṇāmapayojane vuttavidhinā hato viddhasto antarāyo upaddavo assāti hatantarāyo.
tika-vin01t1:109_5: hatantarāyo hutvā vinayaṃ vaṇṇayissanti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t1:109_6: Etena tassa puññappavāhassa attano pasādasampattiyā ratanattayassa ca khettabhāvasampattiyā atthasaṃvaṇṇanāya
tika-vin01t1:110_0: Evaṃ ratanattayassa nipaccakārakaraṇe payojanaṃ dassetvā idāni yassa vinayapiṭakassa atthaṃ saṃvaṇṇetukāmo,
tika-vin01t1:110_1: tassa tāva bhagavato sāsanassa mūlapatiṭṭhānabhāvaṃ dassetvā tampi thomento āha “yasmiṃ ṭhite”tiādi.
tika-vin01t1:110_2: Aṭṭhitassa susaṇṭhitassa bhagavato sāsanaṃ yasmiṃ ṭhite patiṭṭhitaṃ hotīti yojetabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:110_4: Ṭhiteti pāḷito ca atthato ca anūnaṃ hutvā lajjīpuggalesu pavattanaṭṭhena ṭhiteti attho.
tika-vin01t1:111_0: Patiṭṭhitaṃ hotīti tesuyeva lajjīpuggalesu pavattanaṭṭhena patiṭṭhitaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t1:111_1: Susaṇṭhitassāti ettha tāva tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu idaṃ vuttaṃ “dvattiṃsamahāpurisalakkhaṇaasītianubyañjanehi samannāgamanavasena susaṇṭhānassāti attho.
tika-vin01t1:111_3: Gaṇṭhipade pana “yathāṭhāne patiṭṭhitehi lakkhaṇehi samannāgatattā rūpakāyena susaṇṭhito,
tika-vin01t1:111_5: Kenaci pana “catubrahmavihāravasena sattesu suṭṭhu sammā ca ṭhitassāti atthavasena vā susaṇṭhitassa.
tika-vin01t1:111_6: Susaṇṭhitattā hesa kevalaṃ sattānaṃ dukkhaṃ apanetukāmo hitaṃ upasaṃharitukāmo sampattiyā ca pamudito apakkhapatito ca hutvā vinayaṃ deseti.
tika-vin01t1:111_7: Tasmā imasmiṃ vinayasaṃvaṇṇanādhikāre sāruppāya thutiyā thomento āha ‘susaṇṭhitassā”’ti vatvā “gaṇṭhipadesu
tika-vin01t1:111_10: yathāvuttakāmasukhallikādiantadvaye aṭṭhitattāyeva majjhimāya paṭipadāya sammā ṭhitattā susaṇṭhitassāti evamattho gahetabboti.
tika-vin01t1:111_11: Evañhi sati ārambhānurūpathomanā katā hoti yathāvuttaantadvayaṃ vivajjetvā majjhimāya paṭipadāya vinayapaññattiyāyeva yebhuyyena pakāsanato.
tika-vin01t1:112_3: nikāyantaraladdhīhi asammissaṃ katvā anākulaṃ katvā vaṇṇayissanti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t1:112_5: kevalaṃ buddhavisayaṃ vinayapiṭakaṃ attano balena vaṇṇayissāmīti vacanamattampi aññehi vattumasakkuṇeyyattā
tika-vin01t1:112_7: Pubbācariyānubhāvo nāma atthato pubbācariyehi saṃvaṇṇitā aṭṭhakathā,
tika-vin01t1:112_8: tatoyeva ca “pubbācariyānubhāvo aṭṭhakathā”ti sabbattha gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:112_9: Tasmā pubbācariyehi saṃvaṇṇitaṃ aṭṭhakathaṃ nissāya vaṇṇayissaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:112_10: na attanoyeva balaṃ nissāyāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t1:113_0: Atha “porāṇaṭṭhakathāsu vijjamānāsu puna vinayasaṃvaṇṇanāya kiṃ payojana”nti yo vadeyya,
tika-vin01t1:113_1: tassa porāṇaṭṭhakathāya anūnabhāvaṃ attano ca saṃvaṇṇanāya payojanaṃ dassento “kāmañcā”tiādimāha.
tika-vin01t1:113_8: Kehi pana so vinayo saṃvaṇṇitoti āha “pubbācariyāsabhehī”ti.
tika-vin01t1:113_9: Mahākassapattherādayo pubbācariyā eva akampiyaṭṭhena uttamaṭṭhena ca āsabhā,
tika-vin01t1:113_12: Aggamaggañāṇasaṅkhātena ambunā salilena niddhotāni nissesato āyatiṃ anuppattidhammatāpādanena dhotāni
tika-vin01t1:113_13: vikkhālitāni visodhitāni rāgādīni tīṇi malāni kāmāsavādayo ca cattāro āsavā yehi te ñāṇambuniddhātamalāsavā,
tika-vin01t1:113_15: Iminā ca na kevalaṃ etesu ācariyabhāvoyeva,
tika-vin01t1:113_16: atha kho rāgādimalarahitā khīṇāsavā visuddhasattā eteti dasseti.
tika-vin01t1:114_1: atha kho evarūpehipi ānubhāvehi samannāgatāti dassento āha “visuddhavijjāpaṭisambhidehī”ti.
tika-vin01t1:114_2: Visuddhā accantaparisuddhā vijjā catasso ca paṭisambhidā yesaṃ te visuddhavijjāpaṭisambhidā, tehi.
tika-vin01t1:114_3: Ekadesena paṭisambhidaṃ appattānaṃ ariyānameva abhāvato etehi adhigatapaṭisambhidā paṭutaraladdhappabhedāti dassetuṃ visuddhaggahaṇaṃ kataṃ.
tika-vin01t1:114_6: Tattha dibbacakkhuñāṇaṃ pubbenivāsañāṇaṃ āsavakkhayañāṇañcāti imā tisso vijjā.
tika-vin01t1:121_0: Evaṃ vipassanāñāṇamanomayiddhīhi saddhiṃ pariggahitā cha abhiññāyeva.
tika-vin01t1:121_1: Atthapaṭisambhidā dhammapaṭisambhidā niruttipaṭisambhidā paṭibhānapaṭisambhidāti catasso paṭisambhidā.
tika-vin01t1:121_5: idaṃ ñāṇaṃ imamatthaṃ jotayatīti iminā ākārena heṭṭhā vuttesu tīsu ñāṇesu pavattañāṇaṃ paṭibhānapaṭisambhidā.
tika-vin01t1:121_6: Etāsaṃ pana vitthārakathā atipapañcabhāvato idha na vuccati.
tika-vin01t1:121_8: “Paṭisambhidāppattānampi dhammesu abhiyogavasena viseso hotīti laddhapaṭisambhidāsu sātisayataṃ dassetuṃ āhā”tipi vadanti.
tika-vin01t1:121_9: Saddhammasaṃvaṇṇanakovidehīti piṭakattayasaṅkhātassa saddhammassa saṃvaṇṇane sabbaso atthappakāsane kovidehi chekehi,
tika-vin01t1:122_0: Kilesajālaṃ parikkhārabāhullaṃ vā saṃlikhati tanuṃ karotīti sallekho.
tika-vin01t1:122_1: Idha pana khīṇāsavādhikārattā parikkhārabāhullassa sallikhanavaseneva attho gahetabbo,
tika-vin01t1:122_2: tatoyeva ca gaṇṭhipade “sallekhiye parimitaparikkhāravuttiyā”ti attho vutto.
tika-vin01t1:122_6: Nosulabhūpamehīti asulabhūpamehi sallekhapaṭipattiyā asukasadisāti tesaṃ upamāya anucchavikapuggalānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:122_7: dullabhattā natthi sulabhā upamā etesanti nosulabhūpamā.
tika-vin01t1:122_9: Dhajūpamehīti rathassa sañjānanahetukaṃ rathe baddhadhajaṃ viya ajānantānaṃ “asukehi ca asukehi ca therehi
tika-vin01t1:122_10: nivāsito mahāvihāro nāmā”ti evaṃ mahāvihārassa sañjānanahetuttā mahāvihārassa dhajūpamehi.
tika-vin01t1:122_16: Atha vā buddhavaraṃ anugatehi pubbācariyāsabhehīti sambandho kātabbo.
tika-vin01t1:123_0: Evaṃ porāṇaṭṭhakathāya anūnabhāvaṃ dassetvā idāni attano saṃvaṇṇanāya payojanavisesaṃ dassetuṃ “saṃvaṇṇanā”tiādimāha.
tika-vin01t1:123_2: kiñcāpi pubbācariyāsabhehi yathāvuttaguṇavisiṭṭhehi ayaṃ vinayo sabbaso vaṇṇito,
tika-vin01t1:123_3: tathāpi tesaṃ esā saṃvaṇṇanā sīhaḷadīpavāsīnaṃ bhāsāya saṅkhatattā racitattā dīpantare bhikkhujanassa
tika-vin01t1:123_4: sīhaḷadīpato aññadīpavāsino bhikkhugaṇassa kiñci atthaṃ payojanaṃ yasmā nābhisambhuṇāti na sampādeti
tika-vin01t1:123_6: tasmā imaṃ saṃvaṇṇanaṃ pāḷinayānurūpaṃ katvā buddhasirittherena ajjhiṭṭho idāni samārabhissanti.
tika-vin01t1:123_9: Sā pana dhammasaṅgāhakattherehi paṭhamaṃ tīṇi piṭakāni saṅgāyitvā tassa atthavaṇṇanānurūpeneva vācanāmaggaṃ
tika-vin01t1:123_10: āropitattā tisso saṅgītiyo āruḷhoyeva buddhavacanassa atthasaṃvaṇṇanābhūto kathāmaggo.
tika-vin01t1:123_12: pacchā tambapaṇṇiyehi mahātherehi nikāyantaraladdhīhi saṅkarapariharaṇatthaṃ sīhaḷabhāsāya ṭhapito.
tika-vin01t1:123_16: Taṃvaṃsajātatāya tambapaṇṇidīpe khattiyānaṃ tesaṃ nivāsatāya tambapaṇṇidīpassapi sīhaḷabhāvo veditabbo,
tika-vin01t1:123_17: tasmiṃ sīhaḷadīpe bhūtattā sīhaḷadīpakena vākyena vacanena,
tika-vin01t1:124_2: Ajjhesananti garuṭṭhāniyaṃ payirupāsitvā garutaraṃ payojanaṃ uddissa abhipatthanā ajjhesanā,
tika-vin01t1:124_7: Buddhasirīti avhayo nāmaṃ yassa soyaṃ buddhasirivhayo, tassa,
tika-vin01t1:124_8: itthannāmassa therassa ajjhesanaṃ sammā ādarena samanussaranto hadaye ṭhapentoti attho.
tika-vin01t1:125_0: Idāni attano saṃvaṇṇanāya karaṇappakāraṃ dassento “saṃvaṇṇanaṃ tañcā”tiādimāha.
tika-vin01t1:125_1: Tattha tañca idāni vuccamānaṃ saṃvaṇṇanaṃ samārabhanto sakalāyapi mahāaṭṭhakathāya idha gahetabbato mahāaṭṭhakathaṃ
tika-vin01t1:125_2: tassā idāni vuccamānāya saṃvaṇṇanāya sarīraṃ katvā mahāpaccariyaṃ yo vinicchayo vutto,
tika-vin01t1:125_3: tatheva kurundīnāmādīsu vissutāsu aṭṭhakathāsu yo vinicchayo vutto,
tika-vin01t1:125_4: tatopi vinicchayato yuttamatthaṃ apariccajanto antogadhattheravādaṃ katvā saṃvaṇṇanaṃ samārabhissanti padatthasambandho veditabbo.
tika-vin01t1:125_5: Ettha ca attho kathiyati etāyāti atthakathā,
tika-vin01t1:125_6: sāyeva aṭṭhakathā tthakārassa ṭṭhakāraṃ katvā “dukkhassa pīḷanaṭṭho”tiādīsu viya.
tika-vin01t1:125_8: tasmiṃ nisīditvā katattā tameva nāmaṃ jātaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:125_10: tattha katattā kurundīti nāmaṃ jātanti vadanti.
tika-vin01t1:126_0: Yuttamatthanti ettha tāva majjhimagaṇṭhipade cūḷagaṇṭhipade ca idaṃ vuttaṃ “yuttamatthanti saṃvaṇṇetabbaṭṭhānassa yuttamatthaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:126_1: na pana tattha ayuttampi atthīti vuttaṃ hotī”ti.
tika-vin01t1:126_3: Kenaci pana “mahāaṭṭhakathānayena vinayayuttiyā vā yuttamattha”nti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:126_4: taṃ yuttaṃ viya dissati mahāpaccariādīsupi katthaci ayuttassāpi atthassa upari vibhāvanato.
tika-vin01t1:126_5: “Aṭṭhakathaṃyeva gahetvā saṃvaṇṇanaṃ karissāmī”ti vutte aṭṭhakathāsu vuttattheravādānaṃ bāhirabhāvo siyāti
tika-vin01t1:126_9: Pubbe vuttaṃ tu “saṃvaṇṇana”nti vacanaṃ tattheva “samārabhanto”ti pubbakālakiriyāya kammabhāvena yojetabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:126_10: Sammāti vattabbe gāthābandhavasena rassabhāvo katoti veditabbo.
tika-vin01t1:127_0: Evaṃ karaṇappakāraṃ dassetvā idāni sotūhi paṭipajjitabbavidhiṃ dassento “taṃ me”tiādimāha.
tika-vin01t1:127_2: idāni vuccamānaṃ taṃ mama saṃvaṇṇanaṃ dhammapadīpassa tathāgatassa dhammaṃ sāsanadhammaṃ pāḷidhammaṃ
tika-vin01t1:127_3: vā sakkaccaṃ paṭimānayantā pūjentā thirehi sīlakkhandhādīhi samannāgatattā therā,
tika-vin01t1:127_5: tesaṃ majjhe bhavattā majjhimā ca bhikkhū pasannacittā yathāvuttanayena sappayojanattā upari vakkhamānavidhinā
tika-vin01t1:127_6: pamāṇattā ca saddahitvā pītisomanassayuttacittā issāpakatā ahutvā nisāmentu suṇantūti.
tika-vin01t1:127_7: Tattha dhammappadīpassāti dhammoyeva sattasantānesu mohandhakāravidhamanato padīpasadisattā padīpo assāti dhammapadīpo, bhagavā.
tika-vin01t1:128_0: Idāni attano saṃvaṇṇanāya āgamavisuddhiṃ dassetvā pamāṇabhāvaṃ dassento “buddhenā”tiādimāha.
tika-vin01t1:128_1: Yatheva buddhena yo dhammo ca vinayo ca vutto,
tika-vin01t1:128_2: so tassa buddhassa yehi puttehi dhammasenāpatiādīhi tatheva ñāto,
tika-vin01t1:128_3: tesaṃ buddhaputtānaṃ matimaccajantā sīhaḷaṭṭhakathācariyā yasmā pure aṭṭhakathā akaṃsūti ayamettha sambandho.
tika-vin01t1:128_6: Ettāvatā ca sabbampi buddhavacanaṃ niddiṭṭhaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t1:128_8: Vuttoti pāḷito ca atthato ca buddhena bhagavatā vutto.
tika-vin01t1:128_9: Na hi bhagavatā abyākataṃ nāma tantipadaṃ atthi,
tika-vin01t1:128_11: tasmā sammāsambuddheneva tiṇṇaṃ piṭakānaṃ atthavaṇṇanākkamopi bhāsitoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:128_12: Tattha tattha bhagavatā pavattitā pakiṇṇakadesanāyeva hi aṭṭhakathā.
tika-vin01t1:128_14: tatheva ekapadampi ekakkharampi avināsetvā adhippāyañca avikopetvā ñāto viditoti attho.
tika-vin01t1:128_15: Tesaṃ matimaccajantāti tesaṃ buddhaputtānaṃ adhippāyaṃ apariccajantā.
tika-vin01t1:129_0: Tasmāti yasmā tesaṃ buddhaputtānaṃ adhippāyaṃ avikopetvā pure aṭṭhakathā akaṃsu,
tika-vin01t1:129_4: evaṃ sati tattha pamādalekhāpi pamāṇaṃ siyāti āha “vajjayitvāna pamādalekha”nti.
tika-vin01t1:129_5: Tattha pamādalekhanti aparabhāge potthakāruḷhakāle pamajjitvā likhanavasena pavattaṃ pamādapāṭhaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:129_7: pamādena satiṃ apaccupaṭṭhapetvā adinnādānassa pubbapayoge “saccepi alikepi dukkaṭa”nti vuttavacanasadisaṃ yaṃ likhitaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:130_2: Na hi adinnādānassa pubbapayoge pācittiyaṭṭhāne dukkaṭaṃ nāma atthī”ti.
tika-vin01t1:131_0: Kesaṃ pamāṇanti āha “sikkhāsu sagāravānaṃ idha paṇḍitāna”nti.
tika-vin01t1:131_3: Ettha tāva mahāgaṇṭhipade gaṇṭhipade ca na kiñci vuttaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:131_4: majjhimagaṇṭhipade pana cūḷagaṇṭhipade ca idaṃ vuttaṃ “yasmā pamāṇaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:131_8: tasmā idha vuttampi pamāṇamevāti pāṭhasesaṃ katvā vajirabuddhitthero vadati.
tika-vin01t1:131_9: Tattha idhāti imissā samantapāsādikāyāti attho gahetabbo.
tika-vin01t1:132_0: Tattha “yasmā”ti vacanassa paṭhamaṃ vuttasambandhavasena aṭṭhakathāsu vuttaṃ sabbampi pamāṇanti sādhitattā
tika-vin01t1:132_1: idāni vuccamānāpi saṃvaṇṇanā kevalaṃ vacanamatteneva bhinnā,
tika-vin01t1:132_2: atthato pana aṭṭhakathāyevāti dassetuṃ “tato ca bhāsantaramevā”tiādimāha.
tika-vin01t1:132_3: Pacchā vuttasambandhavasena pana idha vuttampi kasmā pamāṇanti ce?
tika-vin01t1:132_6: Evamākulaṃ dubbiññeyyasabhāvañca katvā gaṇṭhipadesu sambandho dassito,
tika-vin01t1:132_8: Na hi so evamākulaṃ katvā vattumarahati,
tika-vin01t1:132_9: tasmā yathādhippetamatthamanākulaṃ suviññeyyañca katvā yathāṭhitassa sambandhavaseneva dassayissāma. Kathaṃ?
tika-vin01t1:132_11: tasmā sakkaccaṃ anusikkhitabbāti evamettha sambandho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin01t1:132_13: ayaṃ pana idāni vuccamānā kasmā sakkaccaṃ anusikkhitabbāti āha “tato ca bhāsantarameva hitvā”tiādi.
tika-vin01t1:132_21: imissā ca saṃvaṇṇanāya bhāsantarapariccāgādimattavisiṭṭhāya atthato tato abhinnabhāvoti ubhayampetaṃ sakkaccaṃ anusikkhitabbabhāvahetūti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:132_22: Na hi kevalaṃ porāṇaṭṭhakathānaṃ satipi pamāṇabhāve ayaṃ saṃvaṇṇanā tato bhinnā atthato aññāyeva ca sakkaccaṃ anusikkhitabbāti vattumarahati,
tika-vin01t1:132_23: nāpi imissā saṃvaṇṇanāya tatoabhinnabhāvepi porāṇaṭṭhakathānaṃ asati pamāṇabhāve ayaṃ saṃvaṇṇanā sakkaccaṃ anusikkhitabbāti vattuṃ yuttarūpā hoti,
tika-vin01t1:132_24: tasmā yathāvuttanayena ubhayampetaṃ sakkaccaṃ anusikkhitabbabhāvahetūti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:133_2: Vitthāramaggañca samāsayitvāti porāṇaṭṭhakathāsu upari vuccamānampi ānetvā tattha tattha papañcitaṃ “ñatticatutthena
tika-vin01t1:133_3: kammena akuppena ṭhānārahena upasampannoti bhikkhū”ti ettha apalokanādīnaṃ catunnampi kammānaṃ vitthārakathā
tika-vin01t1:133_4: viya tādisaṃ vitthāramaggaṃ saṅkhipitvā vaṇṇayissāmāti adhippāyo.
tika-vin01t1:134_1: imasmiṃ pana ṭhāne ṭhatvā cattāri saṅghakammāni nīharitvā vitthārato kathetabbānīti sabbaaṭṭhakathāsu vuttaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:134_2: tāni ca ‘apalokanakammaṃ ñattikammaṃ ñattidutiyakammaṃ ñatticatutthakamma’nti paṭipāṭiyā ṭhapetvā vitthārena
tika-vin01t1:134_3: khandhakato parivārāvasāne kammavibhaṅgato ca pāḷiṃ āharitvā kathitāni.
tika-vin01t1:134_5: Evañhi sati paṭhamapārājikavaṇṇanā ca na bhāriyā bhavissati,
tika-vin01t1:134_6: yathāṭhitāya ca pāḷiyā vaṇṇanā suviññeyyā bhavissati,
tika-vin01t1:135_0: Vinicchayaṃ sabbamasesayitvāti taṃtaṃaṭṭhakathāsu vuttaṃ sabbampi vinicchayaṃ asesayitvā sesaṃ akatvā,
tika-vin01t1:135_2: Vaṇṇituṃ yuttarūpaṃ hutvā anukkamena āgataṃ pāḷiṃ apariccajitvā saṃvaṇṇanato sīhaḷaṭṭhakathāsu ayuttaṭṭhāne
tika-vin01t1:135_3: vaṇṇitaṃ yathāṭhāneyeva saṃvaṇṇanato ca vuttaṃ “tantikkamaṃ kiñci avokkamitvā”ti,
tika-vin01t1:135_4: kiñci pāḷikkamaṃ anatikkamitvā anukkameneva vaṇṇayissāmāti adhippāyo.
tika-vin01t1:136_1: Sīhaḷaṭṭhakathāsu “suttantikānaṃ bhāro”ti vatvā avuttānampi verañjakaṇḍādīsu jhānakathāānāpānassatisamaādhiādīnaṃ
tika-vin01t1:136_5: Ettha ca paṭhamasmiṃ atthavikappe bhāsantarapariccāgādikaṃ catubbidhaṃ kiccaṃ nipphādetvā suttantikānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:136_6: vacanānamatthaṃ paridīpayantī ayaṃ vaṇṇanā bhavissatīti vaṇṇanāya vasena samānakattukatā veditabbā.
tika-vin01t1:136_7: Pacchimasmiṃ atthavikappe pana heṭṭhāvuttabhāsantarapariccāgādiṃ katvā suttantikānaṃ vacanānamatthaṃ
tika-vin01t1:136_8: paridīpayantī ayaṃ vaṇṇanā amhehi kariyissatīti evaṃ ācariyavasena samānakattukatā veditabbā.
tika-vin01t1:136_9: Vaṇṇanāpīti ettha apisaddaṃ gahetvā “tasmāpi sakkaccaṃ anusikkhitabbāti yojetabba”nti cūḷagaṇṭhipade vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:136_10: Tattha pubbe vuttappayojanavisesaṃ pamāṇabhāvañca sampiṇḍetīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin01t1:136_11: Majjhimagaṇṭhipade pana “tasmā sakkaccaṃ anusikkhitabbāpī”ti sambandho vutto.
tika-vin01t1:136_12: Ettha pana na kevalaṃ ayaṃ vaṇṇanā hessati,
tika-vin01t1:136_13: atha kho anusikkhitabbāpīti imamatthaṃ sampiṇḍetīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin01t1:136_14: Etthāpi yathāṭhitavaseneva apisaddassa attho gahetabboti amhākaṃ khanti.
tika-vin01t1:136_17: yasmā ca ayaṃ vaṇṇanāpi tato abhinnattā pamāṇabhūtāyeva hessati,
tika-vin01t1:139_0: Idāni “taṃ vaṇṇayissaṃ vinaya”nti paṭiññātattā yathāpaṭiññātavinayasaṃvaṇṇanaṃ kattukāmo saṃvaravinayapahānavinayādivasena
tika-vin01t1:139_1: vinayassa bahuvidhattā idha saṃvaṇṇetabbabhāvena adhippeto tāva vinayo vavatthapetabboti dassento āha
tika-vin01t1:139_5: Tena paṭhamaṃ vinayaṃ vavatthapetvā pacchā tassa vaṇṇanaṃ karissāmīti dīpeti.
tika-vin01t1:139_8: tena hetunā etaṃ “vinayo nāmā”tiādikaṃ niyāmakavacanaṃ vuccatīti attho.
tika-vin01t1:139_11: So hi niddesapadānaṃ jananīṭhāne ṭhitattā mātā viyāti mātikāti vuccati.
tika-vin01t1:140_0: Idāni vaṇṇetabbamatthaṃ mātikaṃ ṭhapetvā dassento āha “vuttaṃ yenā”tiādi.
tika-vin01t1:140_2: etaṃ “tena samayena buddho bhagavā verañjāyaṃ viharatī”tiādinidānavacanapaṭimaṇḍitaṃ vinayapiṭakaṃ yena puggalena vuttaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:140_8: etaṃ yathāvuttavidhānaṃ vatvā tato “tena samayenā”tiādipāṭhassa atthaṃ anekappakārato dassayanto vinayassa atthavaṇṇanaṃ karissāmīti.
tika-vin01t1:140_9: Ettha ca “vuttaṃ yena yadā yasmā”ti idaṃ vacanaṃ “tena samayena buddho bhagavā”tiādinidānavacanamattaṃ
tika-vin01t1:140_11: ‘idamavocā’ti nigamanena pariyosānakalyāṇa”nti ca vacanato nidānanigamanānipi satthudesanāya anuvidhānattā
tika-vin01t1:140_12: tadantogadhānevāti nidānassapi vinayapāḷiyaṃyeva antogadhattā “vuttaṃ yena yadā yasmā”ti idampi vinayapiṭakasambandhaṃyeva
tika-vin01t1:140_14: Mātikāya hi “eta”nti vuttaṃ vinayapiṭakaṃyeva sāmaññato sabbattha sambandhamupagacchati.
tika-vin01t1:141_0: Idāni pana taṃ visuṃ nīharitvā dassento “tattha vuttaṃ yenā”tiādimāha.
tika-vin01t1:141_2: Atha kasmā idameva vacanaṃ sandhāya vuttanti āha “idañhī”tiādi.
tika-vin01t1:141_5: yasmā buddhassa bhagavato attapaccakkhavacanaṃ na hoti,
tika-vin01t1:141_7: Attapaccakkhavacanaṃ na hotīti attano paccakkhaṃ katvā vuttavacanaṃ na hoti,
tika-vin01t1:141_9: “Attapaccakkhavacanaṃ na hotīti āhacca bhāsitaṃ na hotīti adhippāyo”ti kenaci vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:141_10: Gaṇṭhipade pana “attapaccakkhavacanaṃ na hotīti attano dharamānakāle vuttavacanaṃ na hotī”ti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:141_12: Idāni pañhakaraṇaṃ vatvā anukkamena yathāvuttapañhavissajjanaṃ karonto “āyasmatā”tiādimāha.
tika-vin01t1:141_15: Tañca upālittherena vuttavacanaṃ kālato paṭhamamahāsaṅgītikāle vuttanti attho.
tika-vin01t1:143_0: Idāni taṃ paṭhamamahāsaṅgītiṃ dassetukāmo tassā tantiāruḷhāya idha vacane kāraṇaṃ dassento “paṭhamamahāsaṅgīti nāma cesā…pe…
tika-vin01t1:143_5: esā ca paṭhamamahāsaṅgīti evaṃ veditabbāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t1:143_9: yadidaṃ kiñci vatvā puna paraṃ vattumārabhantānaṃ casaddappayogo.
tika-vin01t1:143_10: Yaṃ pana kenaci vuttaṃ “paṭhamamahāsaṅgīti nāma cāti ettha ca-
tika-vin01t1:143_17: evaṃ sati na kattabboyeva paṭhamasaddeneva aññāsaṃ dutiyādisaṅgītīnampi atthibhāvassa dīpitattā.
tika-vin01t1:143_18: Dutiyādiṃ upādāya hi paṭhamasaddappayogo dīghādiṃ upādāya rassādisaddappayogo viya.
tika-vin01t1:143_19: Yathāpaccayaṃ tattha tattha desitattā paññattattā ca vippakiṇṇānaṃ dhammavinayānaṃ saṅgahetvā gāyanaṃ kathanaṃ saṅgīti.
tika-vin01t1:143_20: Etena taṃtaṃsikkhāpadānaṃ suttānañca ādipariyosānesu antarantarā ca sambandhavasena ṭhapitaṃ saṅgītikāravacanaṃ saṅgahitaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t1:143_21: Mahāvisayattā pūjanīyattā ca mahatī saṅgīti mahāsaṅgīti,
tika-vin01t1:143_23: Nidānakosallatthanti nidadāti desanaṃ desakālādivasena aviditaṃ viditaṃ katvā nidassetīti nidānaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:144_1: bodheyya”nti paṭiññāya anulomanato veneyyānaṃ maggaphaluppattihetubhūtā kiriyā nippariyāyena buddhakiccanti
tika-vin01t1:144_5: dhammato anapetattā dhammañca taṃ cakkañcāti dhammacakkaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:146_4: Nanu ca sāvakehi vinītāpi vineyyā bhagavatāyeva vinītā honti,
tika-vin01t1:146_5: tathā hi sāvakabhāsitaṃ suttaṃ buddhavacananti vuccati,
tika-vin01t1:146_7: Nāyaṃ doso tesaṃ vinayanūpāyassa sāvakesu ṭhapitattā.
tika-vin01t1:147_1: yāva na bhikkhū viyattā vinītā visāradā bahussutā āgatāgamā dhammadharā vinayadharā mātikādharā uppannaṃ
tika-vin01t1:147_2: parappavādaṃ sahadhammena suniggahitaṃ niggahetvā sappāṭihāriyaṃ dhammaṃ desessantī”tiādi.
tika-vin01t1:148_2: Tathā hi manussabhāvassa supākaṭakaraṇatthaṃ mahābodhisattā carimabhave dārapariggahādīnipi karontīti.
tika-vin01t1:148_5: Upavattane mallānaṃ sālavaneti tassa nagarassa upavattanabhūtaṃ mallarājūnaṃ sālavanuyyānaṃ dasseti.
tika-vin01t1:148_6: Tattha nagaraṃ pavisitukāmā uyyānato upecca vattanti gacchanti etenāti upavattananti sālavanaṃ vuccati.
tika-vin01t1:148_8: evaṃ taṃ uyyānaṃ kusinārāya dakkhiṇapacchimadisāya hoti.
tika-vin01t1:148_9: Yathā ca thūpārāmato dakkhiṇadvārena nagaraṃ pavisanamaggo pācīnamukho gantvā uttarena nivattati,
tika-vin01t1:148_10: evaṃ uyyānato sālapanti pācīnamukhā gantvā uttarena nivattā,
tika-vin01t1:148_13: Tattha kira bhagavato paññattassa parinibbānamañcassa ekā sālapanti sīsabhāge hoti,
tika-vin01t1:148_15: tatrāpi eko taruṇasālo sīsabhāgassa āsanno hoti,
tika-vin01t1:148_18: Api ca “yamakasālā nāma mūlakkhandhaviṭapapattehi aññamaññaṃ saṃsibbetvā ṭhitasālā”tipi mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:149_2: So pana upādi kilesābhisaṅkhāramāranimmathanena nibbānappattiyaṃ anossaṭṭho,
tika-vin01t1:149_3: idha khandhamaccumāranimmathanena ossaṭṭho nisesitoti ayaṃ anupādisesā nibbānadhātu natthi etissā upādisesoti katvā.
tika-vin01t1:149_10: So pana saṅgho kiṃparimāṇoti āha “sattannaṃ bhikkhusatasahassāna”nti.
tika-vin01t1:149_11: Niccasāpekkhattā hi īdisesu samāso hotiyeva yathā “devadattassa garukula”nti.
tika-vin01t1:149_12: Sattannaṃ bhikkhusatasahassānanti ca saṅghattherānaṃyeva sattannaṃ bhikkhusatasahassānaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:149_14: Tathā hi veḷuvagāme vedanāvikkhambhanato paṭṭhāya “na cirena bhagavā parinibbāyissatī”ti sutvā tato tato
tika-vin01t1:149_15: āgatesu bhikkhūsu ekabhikkhupi pakkanto nāma natthi,
tika-vin01t1:149_17: Āyasmā mahākassapo dhammavinayasaṅgāyanatthaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ ussāhaṃ janesīti sambandho.
tika-vin01t1:150_0: Tattha mahākassapoti mahantehi sīlakkhandhādīhi samannāgatattā mahanto kassapoti mahākassapo,
tika-vin01t1:150_1: apica kumārakassapattheraṃ upādāya ayaṃ mahāthero “mahākassapo”ti vuccati.
tika-vin01t1:150_2: Atha kimatthaṃ āyasmā mahākassapo dhammavinayasaṅgāyanatthaṃ ussāhaṃ janesīti āha “sattāhaparinibbute”tiādi.
tika-vin01t1:150_6: bhagavato parinibbānadivasato paṭṭhāya sattāhe vītivatteti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t1:150_11: So hi sattāhaparinibbute bhagavati āyasmatā mahākassapattherena saddhiṃ pāvāya kusināraṃ addhānamaggappaṭipannesu
tika-vin01t1:150_12: pañcamattesu bhikkhusatesu avītarāge bhikkhū antarāmagge diṭṭhaājīvakassa santikā bhagavato parinibbānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:150_13: sutvā pattacīvarāni chaḍḍetvā bāhā paggayha nānappakāraṃ paridevante disvā evamāha.
tika-vin01t1:151_2: Ayaṃ kira so khandhake āgate ātumāvatthusmiṃ nahāpitapubbako vuḍḍhapabbajito bhagavati kusinārato nikkhamitvā
tika-vin01t1:151_3: aḍḍhateḷasehi bhikkhusatehi saddhiṃ ātumaṃ gacchante “bhagavā āgacchatī”ti sutvā āgatakāle “yāgudānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:151_4: karissāmī”ti sāmaṇerabhūmiyaṃ ṭhite dve putte etadavoca “bhagavā kira tātā ātumaṃ āgacchati mahatā bhikkhusaṅghena
tika-vin01t1:151_6: gacchatha tumhe tātā khurabhaṇḍaṃ ādāya nāḷiyāvāpakena anugharakaṃ anugharakaṃ āhiṇḍatha,
tika-vin01t1:151_10: Atha bhagavati ātumaṃ āgantvā bhusāgārakaṃ paviṭṭhe subhaddo sāyanhasamayaṃ gāmadvāraṃ gantvā manusse
tika-vin01t1:151_11: āmantetvā “hatthakammamattaṃ me dethā”ti hatthakammaṃ yācitvā “kiṃ bhante karomā”ti vutte “idañcidañca
tika-vin01t1:151_12: gaṇhathā”ti sabbūpakaraṇāni gāhāpetvā vihāre uddhanāni kāretvā ekaṃ kāḷakaṃ kāsāvaṃ nivāsetvā tādisameva
tika-vin01t1:151_14: idaṃ karothā”ti sabbarattiṃ vicārento satasahassaṃ vissajjetvā bhojjayāguñca madhugoḷakañca paṭiyādāpesi.
tika-vin01t1:151_16: tattha sappimadhuphāṇitamacchamaṃsapupphaphalarasādi yaṃ kiñci khādanīyaṃ nāma atthi,
tika-vin01t1:152_0: Atha bhagavā kālasseva sarīrapaṭijagganaṃ katvā bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto piṇḍāya carituṃ ātumābhimukho pāyāsi.
tika-vin01t1:152_1: Manussā tassa ārocesuṃ “bhagavā piṇḍāya gāmaṃ pavisati,
tika-vin01t1:152_3: So yathānivatthapāruteheva tehi kāḷakakāsāvehi ekena hatthena dabbiñca kaṭacchuñca gahetvā brahmā viya
tika-vin01t1:152_4: dakkhiṇajāṇumaṇḍalaṃ bhūmiyaṃ patiṭṭhāpetvā vanditvā “paṭiggaṇhatu me bhante bhagavā yāgu”nti āha.
tika-vin01t1:152_5: Tato “jānantāpi tathāgatā pucchantī”ti khandhake āgatanayena bhagavā pucchitvā ca sutvā ca taṃ vuḍḍhapabbajitaṃ
tika-vin01t1:152_6: vigarahitvā tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ akappiyasamādāpanasikkhāpadaṃ khurabhaṇḍapariharaṇasikkhāpadañcāti dve
tika-vin01t1:152_7: sikkhāpadāni paññapetvā “bhikkhave anekakappakoṭiyo bhojanaṃ pariyesanteheva vītināmitā,
tika-vin01t1:152_9: adhammena uppannabhojanaṃ imaṃ paribhuñjitvā anekāni attabhāvasahassāni apāyesveva nibbattissanti,
tika-vin01t1:153_1: sace na gahetukāmo pesetvā ārocetabbaṃ assa,
tika-vin01t1:153_2: pakkāhāro nāma sabbaciraṃ tiṭṭhanto sattāhamattaṃ tiṭṭheyya,
tika-vin01t1:153_5: ahitakāmo ayaṃ mayha”nti bhagavati āghātaṃ bandhitvā dasabale dharamāne kiñci vattuṃ nāsakkhi.
tika-vin01t1:153_6: Evaṃ kirassa ahosi “ayaṃ uccakulā pabbajito mahāpuriso,
tika-vin01t1:153_9: Svāyaṃ ajja mahākassapattherena saddhiṃ āgacchanto “parinibbuto bhagavā”ti sutvā laddhassāso viya haṭṭhatuṭṭho evamāha.
tika-vin01t1:153_10: Thero pana taṃ sutvā hadaye pahāraṃ viya matthake patitasukkāsaniṃ viya maññi,
tika-vin01t1:153_13: dukkhena bhagavatā ārādhitasāsane nāma evaṃ lahuṃ mahantaṃ pāpakasaṭaṃ kaṇṭako uppanno,
tika-vin01t1:153_14: alaṃ kho panesa pāpo vaḍḍhamāno aññepi evarūpe sahāye labhitvā sāsanaṃ osakkāpetu”nti.
tika-vin01t1:154_0: Tato thero cintesi “sace kho panāhaṃ imaṃ mahallakaṃ idheva pilotikaṃ nivāsetvā chārikāya okirāpetvā nīharāpessāmi,
tika-vin01t1:154_1: manussā ‘samaṇassa gotamassa sarīre dharamāneyeva sāvakā vivadantī’ti amhākaṃ dosaṃ dassessanti,
tika-vin01t1:154_4: tattha yathā vātena pahaṭapupphāni yato vā tato vā gacchanti,
tika-vin01t1:154_5: evameva evarūpānaṃ vasena gacchante gacchante kāle vinaye ekaṃ dve sikkhāpadāni nassissanti vinassissanti,
tika-vin01t1:154_8: evaṃ anukkamena mūle naṭṭhe pisācasadisā bhavissāma,
tika-vin01t1:154_10: evaṃ sati daḷhasuttena saṅgahitapupphāni viya ayaṃ dhammavinayo niccalo bhavissati.
tika-vin01t1:154_11: Etadatthañhi bhagavā mayhaṃ tīṇi gāvutāni paccuggamanaṃ akāsi,
tika-vin01t1:154_14: ākāse pāṇiṃ cāletvā candopamapaṭipadaṃ kathento maññeva sakkhiṃ katvā kathesi,
tika-vin01t1:154_16: mādise bhikkhumhi tiṭṭhamāne ayaṃ pāpo sāsane vaḍḍhiṃ mā alatthu,
tika-vin01t1:154_26: tato bhikkhū attano attano pahonakaṃ gahetvā kappiyākappiye kathessanti,
tika-vin01t1:154_30: Cintetvā so “evaṃ nāma mayhaṃ cittaṃ uppanna”nti kassaci anārocetvā bhikkhusaṅghaṃ samassāsetvā atha
tika-vin01t1:154_31: pacchā dhātubhājanadivase dhammavinayasaṅgāyanatthaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ ussāhaṃ janesi.
tika-vin01t1:155_2: Mā socitthāti citte uppannabalavasokena mā socittha.
tika-vin01t1:155_3: Mā paridevitthāti vācāya mā paridevittha “paridevanaṃ vilāpo”ti vacanato.
tika-vin01t1:155_6: tato mahāsamaṇato suṭṭhu muttā mayanti attho,
tika-vin01t1:158_0: Ṭhānaṃ kho panetaṃ vijjatīti tiṭṭhati ettha phalaṃ tadāyattavuttitāyāti ṭhānaṃ, hetu.
tika-vin01t1:158_9: Pāpabhikkhūti pāpikāya lāmikāya icchāya samannāgatā bhikkhū.
tika-vin01t1:158_17: Yāva ca dhammavinayo tiṭṭhatīti yattakaṃ kālaṃ dhammo ca vinayo ca lajjīpuggalesu tiṭṭhati.
tika-vin01t1:159_0: Vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatāti parinibbānamañcake nipannena bhagavatā bhikkhū ovadantena etaṃ vuttanti attho.
tika-vin01t1:159_1: Desito paññattoti dhammopi desito ceva paññatto ca.
tika-vin01t1:159_2: Suttābhidhammasaṅgahitassa hi dhammassa abhisajjanaṃ pabodhanaṃ desanā,
tika-vin01t1:159_3: tasseva pakārato ñāpanaṃ vineyyasantāne ṭhapanaṃ paññāpanaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:159_4: tasmā dhammopi desito ceva paññatto cāti vutto.
tika-vin01t1:159_7: Vinayatantisaṅgahitassa hi atthassa kāyavācānaṃ vinayanato vinayoti laddhādhivacanassa atisajjanaṃ pabodhanaṃ desanā,
tika-vin01t1:159_8: tasseva pakārato ñāpanaṃ asaṅkarato ṭhapanaṃ paññāpanaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:159_9: tasmā vinayopi desito ceva paññatto cāti vuccati.
tika-vin01t1:160_0: So vo mamaccayenāti so dhammavinayo tumhākaṃ mamaccayena satthā.
tika-vin01t1:160_10: ayaṃ saṅghassa santike vuṭṭhātī”ti sattannaṃ āpattikkhandhānaṃ avītikkamanīyatāvasena otiṇṇavatthusmiṃ
tika-vin01t1:160_12: taṃ sakalampi vinayapiṭakaṃ mayi parinibbute tumhākaṃ satthukiccaṃ sādhessati “idaṃ vo kattabbaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:160_13: idaṃ vo na kattabba”nti kattabbākattabbassa vibhāgena anusāsanato.
tika-vin01t1:160_20: ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo”ti tena tena vineyyānaṃ ajjhāsayānurūpena pakārena ime sattatiṃsa bodhipakkhiyadhamme vibhajitvā suttantapiṭakaṃ desitaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:160_21: taṃ sakalampi suttantapiṭakaṃ mayi parinibbute tumhākaṃ satthukiccaṃ sādhessati taṃtaṃcariyānurūpaṃ sammāpaṭipattiyā anusāsanato.
tika-vin01t1:160_40: ettakā lokuttarā”ti ime dhamme vibhajitvā abhidhammapiṭakaṃ desitaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:160_41: taṃ sakalampi abhidhammapiṭakaṃ mayi parinibbute tumhākaṃ satthukiccaṃ sādhessati,
tika-vin01t1:160_42: khandhādivibhāgena ñāyamānaṃ catusaccasambodhāvahattā satthārā sammāsambuddhena kattabbakiccaṃ nipphādessati.
tika-vin01t1:160_43: Iti sabbampetaṃ abhisambodhito yāva parinibbānā pañcacattālīsa vassāni bhāsitaṃ lapitaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:160_51: mayi parinibbute imāni caturāsīti buddhasahassāni tumhe ovadissanti anusāsissanti ovādānusāsanīkiccassa nipphādanatoti.
tika-vin01t1:161_4: Ciraṭṭhitikanti ciraṃ ṭhiti etassāti ciraṭṭhitikaṃ, sāsanaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:161_7: yathā yena pakārena idaṃ sāsanaṃ dīghamaddhānaṃ pavattituṃ samatthaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:161_9: tathā tena pakārena dhammañca vinayañca saṅgāyeyyanti.
tika-vin01t1:162_0: Idāni sammāsambuddhena attano kataṃ anuggahavisesaṃ vibhāvento āha “yañcāhaṃ bhagavatā”tiādi.
tika-vin01t1:162_6: Dhāressasītiādikaṃ pana bhagavā aññatarasmiṃ rukkhamūle mahākassapattherena paññattasaṅghāṭiyaṃ nisinno
tika-vin01t1:162_7: taṃ cīvaraṃ vikasitapadumapupphavaṇṇena pāṇinā antare parāmasanto āha.
tika-vin01t1:162_8: Vuttañhetaṃ kassapasaṃyutte mahākassapatthereneva ānandattheraṃ āmantetvā kathentena –
tika-vin01t1:163_1: bhagavā maggā okkamma yena aññataraṃ rukkhamūlaṃ tenupasaṅkami,
tika-vin01t1:163_3: paṭapilotikānaṃ saṅghāṭiṃ catugguṇaṃ paññāpetvā bhagavantaṃ etadavocaṃ ‘idha, bhante,
tika-vin01t1:163_9: bhagavā etadavoca ‘mudukā kho tyāyaṃ kassapa paṭapilotikānaṃ saṅghāṭī’ti.
tika-vin01t1:163_12: ‘Dhāressasi pana me tvaṃ kassapa sāṇāni paṃsukūlāni nibbasanānī’ti.
tika-vin01t1:163_17: ahaṃ pana bhagavato sāṇāni paṃsukūlāni nibbasanāni paṭipajji”nti.
tika-vin01t1:164_0: Tattha mudukā kho tyāyanti mudukā kho te ayaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:164_6: evaṃ panassa ahosi “ime na ciraṃ ṭhassanti,
tika-vin01t1:164_8: ‘so mayi parinibbute sattapaṇṇiguhāyaṃ vasitvā dhammavinayasaṅgahaṃ katvā mama sāsanaṃ pañcavassasahassaparimāṇaṃ
tika-vin01t1:164_9: kālaṃ pavattanakaṃ karissatī’ti attano naṃ ṭhāne ṭhapemi,
tika-vin01t1:164_12: Thero pana yasmā cīvarassa vā pattassa vā vaṇṇe kathite “imaṃ tumhākaṃ gaṇhathā”ti cārittameva,
tika-vin01t1:164_14: Dhāressasi pana me tvaṃ kassapāti kassapa tvaṃ imāni paribhogajiṇṇāni paṃsukūlāni pārupituṃ sakkhissasīti vadati.
tika-vin01t1:164_18: ahaṃ imaṃ cīvaraṃ puṇṇaṃ nāma dāsiṃ pārupitvā āmakasusāne chaḍḍitaṃ tumbamattehi pāṇakehi samparikiṇṇaṃ
tika-vin01t1:164_19: te pāṇake vidhunitvā mahāariyavaṃse ṭhatvā aggahesiṃ,
tika-vin01t1:164_20: tassa me imaṃ cīvaraṃ gahitadivase dasasahassacakkavāḷe mahāpathavī mahāravaṃ viravamānā kampittha,
tika-vin01t1:164_22: cakkavāḷadevatā sādhukāraṃ adaṃsu “imaṃ cīvaraṃ gaṇhantena bhikkhunā jātipaṃsukūlikena jātiāraññikena
tika-vin01t1:164_24: tvaṃ imassa cīvarassa anucchavikaṃ kātuṃ sakkhissasī”ti.
tika-vin01t1:164_25: Theropi attanā pañcannaṃ hatthīnaṃ balaṃ dhāreti.
tika-vin01t1:164_26: So taṃ atakkayitvā “ahametaṃ paṭipattiṃ pūressāmī”ti ussāhena sugatacīvarassa anucchavikaṃ kātukāmo “dhāressāmahaṃ bhante”ti āha.
tika-vin01t1:164_28: Evaṃ pana cīvaraparivattanaṃ katvā therena pārutacīvaraṃ bhagavā pārupi,
tika-vin01t1:164_30: Tasmiṃ samaye mahāpathavī udakapariyantaṃ katvā unnadantī kampittha.
tika-vin01t1:165_0: Sāṇāni paṃsukūlānīti matakaḷevaraṃ pariveṭhetvā chaḍḍitāni tumbamatte kimī papphoṭetvā gahitāni sāṇavākamayāni paṃsukūlacīvarāni.
tika-vin01t1:165_1: Rathikasusānasaṅkārakūṭādīnaṃ yattha katthaci paṃsūnaṃ upari ṭhitattā abbhuggataṭṭhena tesu paṃsukūlamivāti paṃsukūlaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:165_2: Atha vā paṃsu viya kucchitabhāvaṃ ulati gacchatīti paṃsukūlanti paṃsukūlasaddassa attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin01t1:165_6: anekāvayavattā pana bahuvacanaṃ kata”nti majjhimagaṇṭhipade vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:165_7: Cīvare sādhāraṇaparibhogenāti ettha attanā sādhāraṇaparibhogenāti viññāyamānattā viññāyamānatthassa ca-
tika-vin01t1:165_10: sāṇāni paṃsukūlānī”ti hi vuttattā attanāva sādhāraṇaparibhogo viññāyati, nāññena.
tika-vin01t1:165_11: Na hi kevalaṃ saddatoyeva sabbattha atthanicchayo bhavissati atthapakaraṇādināpi yebhuyyena atthassa niyametabbattā.
tika-vin01t1:165_12: Ācariyadhammapālattherena panettha idaṃ vuttaṃ “cīvare sādhāraṇaparibhogenāti ettha attanā samasamaṭṭhapanenāti
tika-vin01t1:165_13: idha attanāsaddaṃ ānetvā cīvare attanā sādhāraṇaparibhogenā”ti yojetabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:166_0: “Yassa yena hi sambandho, dūraṭṭhampi ca tassa taṃ;
tika-vin01t1:168_0: Atha vā bhagavatā cīvare sādhāraṇaparibhogena bhagavatā anuggahitoti yojanīyaṃ ekassapi karaṇaniddesassa sahayogakattutthajotakattasambhavatoti.
tika-vin01t1:168_4: Sādhāraṇaparibhogena ceva samasamaṭṭhapanena ca anuggahitoti sambandho.
tika-vin01t1:170_2: yāvade ākaṅkhāmi vivicceva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ pītisukhaṃ paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharāmi.
tika-vin01t1:170_5: yāvade ākaṅkhati vivicceva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ pītisukhaṃ paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati.
tika-vin01t1:171_2: yāvade ākaṅkhāmi vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamā ajjhattaṃ sampasādanaṃ cetaso ekodibhāvaṃ avitakkaṃ avicāraṃ
tika-vin01t1:171_3: samādhijaṃ pītisukhaṃ dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharāmi.
tika-vin01t1:172_2: yāvade ākaṅkhāmi pītiyā ca virāgā upekkhako ca viharāmi,
tika-vin01t1:172_3: sato ca sampajāno sukhañca kāyena paṭisaṃvedemi,
tika-vin01t1:172_4: yaṃ taṃ ariyā ācikkhanti ‘upekkhako satimā sukhavihārī’ti,
tika-vin01t1:172_8: yāvade ākaṅkhati pītiyā ca virāgā upekkhako ca viharati…pe…
tika-vin01t1:173_2: yāvade ākaṅkhāmi sukhassa ca pahānā dukkhassa ca pahānā pubbeva somanassadomanassānaṃ atthaṅgamā adukkhamasukhaṃ
tika-vin01t1:173_6: yāvade ākaṅkhati sukhassa ca pahānā dukkhassa ca pahānā pubbeva…pe…
tika-vin01t1:174_2: yāvade ākaṅkhāmi sabbaso rūpasaññānaṃ samatikkamā paṭighasaññānaṃ atthaṅgamā nānattasaññānaṃ amanasikārā
tika-vin01t1:175_2: yāvade ākaṅkhāmi sabbaso ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ samatikkama ‘anantaṃ viññāṇa’nti viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ upasampajja viharāmi.
tika-vin01t1:176_2: yāvade ākaṅkhāmi sabbaso viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ samatikkamma ‘natthi kiñcī’ti ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ upasampajja viharāmi.
tika-vin01t1:177_2: yāvade ākaṅkhāmi sabbaso ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ samatikkamma nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ upasampajja viharāmi.
tika-vin01t1:178_2: yāvade ākaṅkhāmi sabbaso nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ samatikkamma saññāvedayitanirodhaṃ upasampajja viharāmi.
tika-vin01t1:179_5: āvibhāvaṃ tirobhāvaṃ tirokuṭṭaṃ tiropākāraṃ tiropabbataṃ asajjamāno gacchāmi seyyathāpi ākāse,
tika-vin01t1:179_8: ākāsepi pallaṅkena kamāmi seyyathāpi pakkhī sakuṇo,
tika-vin01t1:179_9: imepi candimasūriye evaṃmahiddhike evaṃmahānubhāve pāṇinā parimasāmi parimajjāmi,
tika-vin01t1:179_11: Kassapopi bhikkhave yāvade ākaṅkhati anekavihitaṃ iddhividhaṃ paccanubhoti…pe…
tika-vin01t1:180_2: yāvade ākaṅkhāmi dibbāya sotadhātuyā visuddhāya atikkantamānusikāya ubho sadde suṇāmi dibbe ca mānuse ca ye dūre santike ca.
tika-vin01t1:181_2: yāvade ākaṅkhāmi parasattānaṃ parapuggalānaṃ cetasā ceto paricca pajānāmi,
tika-vin01t1:181_21: yāvade ākaṅkhati parasattānaṃ parapuggalānaṃ cetasā ceto paricca pajānāti,
tika-vin01t1:182_4: ekampi jātiṃ dvepi jātiyo tissopi jātiyo catassopi jātiyo pañcapi jātiyo dasapi jātiyo vīsampi jātiyo
tika-vin01t1:182_5: tiṃsampi jātiyo cattālīsampi jātiyo paññāsampi jātiyo jātisatampi jātisahassampi jātisatasahassampi anekepi
tika-vin01t1:182_6: saṃvaṭṭakappe anekepi vivaṭṭakappe anekepi saṃvaṭṭavivaṭṭakappe ‘amutrāsiṃ evaṃnāmo evaṃgotto evaṃvaṇṇo
tika-vin01t1:182_9: tatrāpāsiṃ evaṃnāmo evaṃgotto evaṃvaṇṇo evamāhāro evaṃsukhadukkhappaṭisaṃvedī evamāyupariyanto,
tika-vin01t1:182_11: Iti sākāraṃ sauddesaṃ anekavihitaṃ pubbenivāsaṃ anussarāmi.
tika-vin01t1:182_17: iti sākāraṃ sauddesaṃ anekavihitaṃ pubbenivāsaṃ anussarati.
tika-vin01t1:183_2: yāvade ākaṅkhāmi dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena atikkantamānusakena satte passāmi cavamāne upapajjamāne hīne paṇīte suvaṇṇe dubbaṇṇe sugate duggate,
tika-vin01t1:183_3: yathākammūpage satte pajānāmi ‘ime vata bhonto sattā kāyaduccaritena samannāgatā vacīduccaritena samannāgatā
tika-vin01t1:183_4: manoduccaritena samannāgatā ariyānaṃ upavādakā micchādiṭṭhikā micchādiṭṭhikammasamādānā,
tika-vin01t1:183_5: te kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapannā.
tika-vin01t1:183_6: Ime vā pana bhonto sattā kāyasucaritena samannāgatā vacīsucaritena samannāgatā manosucaritena samannāgatā
tika-vin01t1:183_8: te kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapannā’ti.
tika-vin01t1:183_9: Iti dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena atikkantamānusakena satte passāmi cavamāne upapajjamāne hīne paṇīte suvaṇṇe dubbaṇṇe sugate duggate,
tika-vin01t1:183_13: yāvade ākaṅkhati dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena atikkantamānusakena satte passati cavamāne upapajjamāne hīne paṇīte suvaṇṇe dubbaṇṇe sugate duggate,
tika-vin01t1:184_2: āsavānaṃ khayā anāsavaṃ cetovimuttiṃ paññāvimuttiṃ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharāmi.
tika-vin01t1:184_5: āsavānaṃ khayā anāsavaṃ cetovimuttiṃ paññāvimuttiṃ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharatī”ti –
tika-vin01t1:185_0: Evaṃ navānupubbavihārachaḷabhiññāppabhede uttarimanussadhamme attanā samasamaṭṭhapanatthāya bhagavatā
tika-vin01t1:185_1: vuttaṃ kassapasaṃyutte āgataṃ pāḷimimaṃ peyyālamukhena ādiggahaṇena ca saṅkhipitvā dassento āha “ahaṃ
tika-vin01t1:186_0: Tattha yāvade ākaṅkhāmīti yāvadeva icchāmīti attho.
tika-vin01t1:186_1: Tatoyeva hi majjhimagaṇṭhipade cūḷagaṇṭhipade ca “yāvadeti yāvadevāti vuttaṃ hotī”ti likhitaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:186_2: Saṃyuttanikāyaṭṭhakathāyampi “yāvade ākaṅkhāmīti yāvadeva icchāmī”ti attho vutto.
tika-vin01t1:186_3: Tathā hi tattha līnatthapakāsaniyaṃ ācariyadhammapālatthereneva vuttaṃ “yāvadevāti iminā samānatthaṃ yāvadeti idaṃ pada”nti.
tika-vin01t1:186_4: Potthakesu pana katthaci “yāvadevā”ti ayameva pāṭho dissati.
tika-vin01t1:186_5: Yāni pana ito paraṃ “vivicceva kāmehī”tiādinā nayena cattāri rūpāvacarakiriyajhānāni,
tika-vin01t1:186_10: taṃ anupadavaṇṇanāya ceva bhāvanāvidhānena ca saddhiṃ visuddhimagge sabbaso vitthāritaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:186_11: Idhāpi ca verañjakaṇḍe cattāri rūpāvacarajhānāni tisso ca vijjā āvi bhavissanti,
tika-vin01t1:187_0: Navānupubbavihārachaḷabhiññāppabhedeti ettha navānupubbavihārā nāma anupaṭipāṭiyā samāpajjitabbabhāvato
tika-vin01t1:187_2: Chaḷabhiññā nāma āsavakkhayañāṇena saddhiṃ pañcābhiññāyoti evaṃ lokiyalokuttarabhedā sabbā abhiññāyo.
tika-vin01t1:187_3: Uttarimanussadhammeti uttarimanussānaṃ jhāyīnañceva ariyānañca dhammo uttarimanussadhammo.
tika-vin01t1:187_6: So hi vinā bhāvanāmanasikārena pakatiyāva manussehi nibbattetabbato manussattabhāvāvahato vā “manussadhammo”ti vuccati,
tika-vin01t1:187_8: Attanā samasamaṭṭhapanenāti ahaṃ yattakaṃ kālaṃ yattake vā samāpattivihāre abhiññāyo ca vaḷañjemi,
tika-vin01t1:187_9: tathā kassapopīti evaṃ yathāvuttauttarimanussadhamme attanā samasamaṃ katvā ṭhapanena.
tika-vin01t1:187_11: Na hi āyasmā mahākassapo bhagavā viya devasikaṃ catuvīsatikoṭisatasahassasaṅkhā samāpattiyo samāpajjati,
tika-vin01t1:187_13: Ettha ca “uttarimanussadhamme attanā samasamaṭṭhapanenā”ti idaṃ nidassanamattanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:188_2: ahaṃ vā kassapa bhikkhū ovadeyyaṃ tvaṃ vā,
tika-vin01t1:188_3: ahaṃ vā kassapa bhikkhūnaṃ dhammiṃ kathaṃ kareyyaṃ tvaṃ vā”ti.
tika-vin01t1:189_1: tassa kimaññaṃ āṇaṇyaṃ bhavissati aññatra dhammavinayasaṅgāyanāti adhippāyo.
tika-vin01t1:189_4: Potthakesu hi katthaci “tassa me”ti pāṭhoyeva dissati,
tika-vin01t1:189_5: dhammavinayasaṅgāyanaṃ ṭhapetvā aññaṃ kiṃ nāma tassa me āṇaṇyaṃ aṇaṇabhāvo bhavissatīti attho.
tika-vin01t1:189_7: Sakakavacaissariyānuppadānenāti ettha cīvarassa nidassanavasena kavacassa gahaṇaṃ kataṃ,
tika-vin01t1:189_11: me saddhammavaṃsassa patiṭṭhāpako pavattakoti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t1:189_12: Vuttavacanamanussaranto anuggahesīti cintayanto dhammavinayasaṅgāyanatthaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ ussāhaṃ janesīti sambandho,
tika-vin01t1:189_13: dhātubhājanadivase tattha sannipatitānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ ussāhaṃ janesīti attho.
tika-vin01t1:190_5: tattha piṇḍāya caritvā kusināraṃ gamissāmīti addhānamaggappaṭipannoti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t1:190_8: Mahatā bhikkhusaṅghena saddhinti guṇamahattenapi saṅkhyāmahattenapi mahatā.
tika-vin01t1:190_13: Sabbaṃ subhaddakaṇḍaṃ vitthārato veditabbanti sabbaṃ subhaddakaṇḍaṃ idha ānetvā vitthārato dassetabbanti adhippāyo.
tika-vin01t1:191_0: “Tato paranti tato bhikkhūnaṃ ussāhajananato para”nti ācariyadhammapālattherena vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:191_1: Mahāgaṇṭhipade pana “tato paranti subhaddakaṇḍato para”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:191_7: tasmā ussāhajananato paranti na vattabbaṃ heṭṭhā ussāhajananappakārassa pāḷiyaṃ avuttattā.
tika-vin01t1:192_2: samayaṃ pāvāya kusināraṃ addhānamaggappaṭipanno mahatā bhikkhusaṅghena saddhiṃ pañcamattehi bhikkhusatehi.
tika-vin01t1:193_0: “Tena kho pana samayena aññataro ājīvako kusinārāya mandāravapupphaṃ gahetvā pāvaṃ addhānamaggappaṭipanno hoti.
tika-vin01t1:194_2: mā socittha mā paridevittha, nanvetaṃ, āvuso,
tika-vin01t1:194_3: bhagavatā paṭikacceva akkhātaṃ ‘sabbeheva piyehi manāpehi nānābhāvo vinābhāvo aññathābhāvo.
tika-vin01t1:194_5: yaṃ taṃ jātaṃ bhūtaṃ saṅkhataṃ palokadhammaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:194_6: taṃ vata mā palujjī’ti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjatī”ti.
tika-vin01t1:195_1: subhaddo nāma vuḍḍhapabbajito tassaṃ parisāyaṃ nisinno hoti.
tika-vin01t1:195_2: Atha kho āvuso subhaddo vuḍḍhapabbajito te bhikkhū etadavoca ‘alaṃ, āvuso,
tika-vin01t1:195_5: upaddutā ca mayaṃ homa’ ‘idaṃ vo kappati,
tika-vin01t1:195_11: Handa mayaṃ āvuso dhammañca vinayañca saṅgāyeyyāma,
tika-vin01t1:196_2: Atha kho āyasmā mahākassapo ekenūnapañcaarahantasatāni uccini.
tika-vin01t1:196_5: abhabbo chandā dosā mohā bhayā agatiṃ gantuṃ,
tika-vin01t1:196_6: bahu cānena bhagavato santike dhammo ca vinayo ca pariyatto. Tena hi, bhante,
tika-vin01t1:197_0: Tasmā tato paranti ettha subhaddakaṇḍato paranti evamattho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin01t1:197_1: “Sabbaṃ subhaddakaṇḍaṃ vitthārato veditabba”nti hi iminā “yaṃ na icchissāma,
tika-vin01t1:197_2: na taṃ karissāmā”ti etaṃ pariyantaṃ subhaddakaṇḍapāḷiṃ dassetvā idāni avasesaṃ ussāhajananappakārappavattaṃ
tika-vin01t1:198_0: Tattha pure adhammo dippatīti ettha adhammo nāma dasakusalakammapathadhammapaṭipakkhabhūto adhammo.
tika-vin01t1:198_2: Atha vā yāva adhammo dhammaṃ paṭibāhituṃ samattho hoti,
tika-vin01t1:198_6: saddayogena hi anāgatatthe ayaṃ vattamānapayogo yathā “purā vassati devo”ti.
tika-vin01t1:198_7: Keci panettha evaṃ vaṇṇayanti “pureti pacchā anāgate yathā addhānaṃ gacchantassa gantabbamaggo ‘pure’ti vuccati,
tika-vin01t1:198_15: pāḷiyaṃ pana dīghanikāyaṭṭhakathāyañca attheva iti- saddo.
tika-vin01t1:199_1: Uccinane uyyojentā hi taṃ mahākassapattheraṃ evamāhaṃsu.
tika-vin01t1:199_2: Bhikkhū uccinatūti saṅgītiyā anurūpe bhikkhū uccinitvā gaṇhātūti attho.
tika-vin01t1:199_4: pariggahesī”ti etena sukkhavipassakakhīṇāsavapariyantānaṃ yathāvuttapuggalānaṃ satipi āgamādhigamasabbhāve
tika-vin01t1:199_5: saha paṭisambhidāhi tevijjādiguṇayuttānaṃ āgamādhigamasampattiyā ukkaṃsagatattā saṅgītiyā bahūpakārataṃ dasseti.
tika-vin01t1:199_6: Tattha sakalanavaṅgasatthusāsanapariyattidhareti sakalaṃ suttageyyādi navaṅgaṃ ettha,
tika-vin01t1:199_9: Atthakāmena pariyāpuṇitabbato diṭṭhadhammikādipurisattapariyattabhāvato ca pariyattīti tīṇi piṭakāni vuccanti,
tika-vin01t1:199_12: Bahūnaṃ nānappakārānaṃ kilesānaṃ sakkāyadiṭṭhiyā ca avihatattā tā janenti,
tika-vin01t1:199_20: Samathabhāvanāsinehābhāvena sukkhā lūkhā asiniddhā vipassanā etesanti sukkhavipassakā.
tika-vin01t1:200_1: tipiṭakasaṅkhātaṃ navaṅgādivasena anekadhā bhinnaṃ sabbapariyattippabhedaṃ dhārentīti tipiṭakasabbapariyattippabhedadharā,
tika-vin01t1:200_3: Anu anu taṃsamaṅgīnaṃ bhāveti vaḍḍhetīti anubhāvo,
tika-vin01t1:200_7: tā ādi yesaṃ chaḷabhiññādīnaṃ te tevijjādayo,
tika-vin01t1:200_8: te bhedā anekappakārā bhinnā etesanti tevijjādibhedā,
tika-vin01t1:200_11: Atha vā tisso vijjā etassa atthīti tevijjo,
tika-vin01t1:200_12: so ādi yesaṃ chaḷabhiññādīnaṃ te tevijjādayo,
tika-vin01t1:200_13: te bhedā yesaṃ khīṇāsavānaṃ te tevijjādibhedā,
tika-vin01t1:200_15: Ye sandhāya idaṃ vuttanti ye bhikkhū sandhāya idaṃ “atha kho āyasmā”tiādivacanaṃ saṅgītikkhandhake vuttanti attho.
tika-vin01t1:201_4: So hi apariyositasikkhattā ca tadadhimuttattā ca ekantena sikkhanasīlo na asekkho viya pariniṭṭhitasikkho tattha paṭipassaddhussāho,
tika-vin01t1:201_5: nāpi vissaṭṭhasikkho pacurajano viya tattha anadhimutto.
tika-vin01t1:201_6: Atha vā ariyāya jātiyā tīsu sikkhāsu jāto,
tika-vin01t1:201_13: Asammukhā paṭiggahitaṃ nāma natthīti nanu ca –
tika-vin01t1:203_0: Caturāsīti sahassāni, ye me dhammā pavattino”ti. –
tika-vin01t1:204_1: Dve sahassāni bhikkhutoti vuttampi bhagavato santike paṭiggahitamevāti katvā vuttanti nāyaṃ virodho.
tika-vin01t1:205_3: Ānandattherassa yebhuyyena navakāya parisāya vibbhamanena mahākassapatthero evamāha “na vāyaṃ kumārako mattamaññāsī”ti.
tika-vin01t1:205_4: Tathā hi parinibbute satthari mahākassapatthero satthuparinibbāne sannipatitassa bhikkhusaṅghassa majjhe
tika-vin01t1:205_7: tumhe pure vassūpanāyikāya attano attano palibodhaṃ pacchinditvā rājagahe sannipatathā”ti vatvā attanā rājagahaṃ gato.
tika-vin01t1:205_8: Ānandattheropi bhagavato pattacīvaramādāya mahājanaṃ saññāpento sāvatthiṃ gantvā tato nikkhamma rājagahaṃ gacchanto dakkhiṇagirismiṃ cārikaṃ cari.
tika-vin01t1:205_9: Tasmiṃ samaye ānandattherassa tiṃsamattā saddhivihārikā yebhuyyena kumārabhūtā ekavassikaduvassikabhikkhū ceva anupasampannā ca vibbhamiṃsu.
tika-vin01t1:205_12: Tesaṃ kira mātāpitaro cintesuṃ “ānandatthero satthuvissāsiko aṭṭha vare yācitvā upaṭṭhahati,
tika-vin01t1:205_16: tasmiṃ āgate mayaṃ mahāsakkāraṃ kātuṃ labhissāmā”ti iminā tāva kāraṇena nesaṃ ñātakā te pabbājesuṃ.
tika-vin01t1:205_17: Satthari pana parinibbute tesaṃ sā patthanā upacchinnā,
tika-vin01t1:206_0: Atha ānandattheraṃ dakkhiṇagirismiṃ cārikaṃ caritvā rājagahamāgataṃ disvā mahākassapatthero evamāha “na vāyaṃ kumārako mattamaññāsī”ti.
tika-vin01t1:207_2: imehi navehi bhikkhūhi indriyesu aguttadvārehi bhojane amattaññūhi jāgariyaṃ ananuyuttehi saddhiṃ cārikaṃ carasi,
tika-vin01t1:208_0: “Api me bhante kassapa sirasmiṃ palitāni jātāni,
tika-vin01t1:208_1: atha ca pana mayaṃ ajjāpi āyasmato mahākassapassa kumārakavādā na muccāmāti.
tika-vin01t1:208_4: imehi navehi bhikkhūhi indriyesu aguttadvārehi bhojane amattaññūhi jāgariyaṃ ananuyuttehi saddhiṃ cārikaṃ carasi,
tika-vin01t1:209_0: Tattha sassaghātaṃ maññecarasīti sassaṃ ghātento viya āhiṇḍasi.
tika-vin01t1:209_1: Kulūpaghātaṃ maññe carasīti kulāni upaghātento viya hananto viya āhananto viya āhiṇḍasi.
tika-vin01t1:209_3: Palujjanti kho te āvuso navappāyāti, āvuso,
tika-vin01t1:209_4: evaṃ ete tuyhaṃ pāyena yebhuyyena navakā ekavassikaduvassikadaharā ceva sāmaṇerā ca palujjanti.
tika-vin01t1:209_5: Na vāyaṃ kumārako mattamaññāsīti ayaṃ kumārako attano pamāṇaṃ na vata jānātīti theraṃ tajjento āha.
tika-vin01t1:209_6: Kumārakavādā na muccāmāti kumārakavādato na muccāma.
tika-vin01t1:209_7: Tathā hi pana tvanti idamassa evaṃ vattabbatāya kāraṇadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:209_9: yasmā tvaṃ imehi navakehi bhikkhūhi indriyasaṃvararahitehi saddhiṃ vicarasi,
tika-vin01t1:209_10: tasmā kumārakehi saddhiṃ caranto “kumārako”ti vattabbataṃ arahasīti.
tika-vin01t1:210_3: Tathā hesa “paṇḍito vāpi tena so”tiādīsu upamāne dissati,
tika-vin01t1:210_7: “Ayaṃ vā imesaṃ samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ sabbabālo sabbamūḷho”tiādīsu vavassagge.
tika-vin01t1:210_12: Teneva ca ācariyadhammapālattherena vuttaṃ “vāsaddassa atthuddhāraṃ karontena ‘na vāyaṃ kumārako mattamaññāsī’tiādīsu padapūraṇe”ti.
tika-vin01t1:210_13: Aṭṭhakathāyampi ettakameva vuttaṃ “na vāyaṃ kumārako mattamaññāsīti ayaṃ kumārako attano pamāṇaṃ na vata jānātīti theraṃ tajjento āhā”ti.
tika-vin01t1:210_15: Yaṃ panettha kenaci vuttaṃ “na vāyanti ettha vāti vibhāsā,
tika-vin01t1:210_19: tasmā attano pamāṇaṃ nāññāsīti evamattho veditabbo.
tika-vin01t1:210_21: Chandāgamanaṃ viyāti ettha chandā āgamanaṃ viyāti padacchedo kātabbo,
tika-vin01t1:210_28: chandena sinehena ananurūpaṃ gamanaṃ pavattanaṃ akattabbakaraṇaṃ viyāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t1:211_0: “Kiñcāpi sekkho”ti idaṃ na sekkhānaṃ agatigamanasabbhāvena vuttaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:211_4: tathāpi thero āyasmantampi ānandaṃ uccinatūti evamettha sambandho veditabbo.
tika-vin01t1:211_7: “Abhabbo”tiādinā pana dhammasaṅgītiyā tassa arahabhāvaṃ dassentā vijjamāne guṇe kathenti.
tika-vin01t1:211_12: Imāni pana cattāri agatigamanāni bhaṇḍabhājanīye ca vinicchayaṭṭhāne ca labbhanti.
tika-vin01t1:211_13: Tattha bhaṇḍabhājanīye tāva attano bhārabhūtānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ amanāpe bhaṇḍe sampatte taṃ parivattitvā manāpaṃ dento chandāgatiṃ gacchati nāma.
tika-vin01t1:211_14: Attano pana abhārabhūtānaṃ manāpe bhaṇḍe sampatte taṃ parivattitvā amanāpaṃ dento dosāgatiṃ gacchati nāma.
tika-vin01t1:211_15: Bhaṇḍesu bhājanīyavatthuñca ṭhitikañca ajānanto mohāgatiṃ gacchati nāma.
tika-vin01t1:211_16: Mukharānaṃ vā rājādinissitānaṃ vā “ime me amanāpe bhaṇḍe dinne anatthaṃ kareyyu”nti bhayena parivattitvā manāpaṃ dento bhayāgatiṃ gacchati nāma.
tika-vin01t1:211_18: sabbesaṃ tulābhūto pamāṇabhūto majjhattova hutvā yaṃ yassa pāpuṇāti,
tika-vin01t1:211_20: ayaṃ catubbidhampi agatiṃ na gacchati nāma.
tika-vin01t1:211_21: Vinicchayaṭṭhāne pana attano bhārabhūtassa garukāpattiṃ lahukāpattiṃ katvā kathento chandāgatiṃ gacchati nāma.
tika-vin01t1:211_22: Itarassa lahukāpattiṃ garukāpattiṃ katvā kathento dosāgatiṃ gacchati nāma.
tika-vin01t1:211_23: Āpattivuṭṭhānaṃ pana samuccayakkhandhakañca ajānanto mohāgatiṃ gacchati nāma.
tika-vin01t1:211_24: Mukharassa vā rājapūjitassa vā “ayaṃ me garukaṃ katvā āpattiṃ kathentassa anatthampi kareyyā”ti garukameva
tika-vin01t1:211_27: ayaṃ catubbidhampi agatigamanaṃ na gacchati nāma.
tika-vin01t1:211_28: Theropi tādiso catunnampi agatigamanānaṃ paṭhamamaggeneva pahīnattā,
tika-vin01t1:211_29: tasmā saṅgāyanavasena dhammavinayavinicchaye sampatte chandādivasena aññathā akathetvā yathābhūtameva kathetīti vuttaṃ “abhabbo…pe…
tika-vin01t1:212_2: Rājagahaṃ kho mahāgocaranti ettha “rājagahanti rājagahasāmantaṃ gahetvā vutta”nti cūḷagaṇṭhipade majjhimagaṇṭhipade ca vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:213_2: saṅgho imāni pañca bhikkhusatāni sammanneyya ‘rājagahe vassaṃ vasantāni dhammañca vinayañca saṅgāyituṃ,
tika-vin01t1:213_3: na aññehi bhikkhūhi rājagahe vassaṃ vasitabba’nti,
tika-vin01t1:214_1: saṅgho imāni pañca bhikkhusatāni sammannati ‘rājagahe vassaṃ vasantāni dhammañca vinayañca saṅgāyituṃ,
tika-vin01t1:214_2: na aññehi bhikkhūhi rājagahe vassaṃ vasitabba’nti,
tika-vin01t1:214_3: yassāyasmato khamati imesaṃ pañcannaṃ bhikkhusatānaṃ sammuti ‘rājagahe vassaṃ vasantānaṃ dhammañca vinayañca saṅgāyituṃ,
tika-vin01t1:214_4: na aññehi bhikkhūhi rājagahe vassaṃ vasitabba’nti,
tika-vin01t1:215_0: “Sammatāni saṅghena imāni pañca bhikkhusatāni ‘rājagahe vassaṃ vasantāni dhammañca vinayañca saṅgāyituṃ,
tika-vin01t1:215_1: na aññehi bhikkhūhi rājagahe vassaṃ vasitabba’nti,
tika-vin01t1:216_1: Idaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “taṃ saṅgītikkhandhake vuttanayeneva ñātabba”nti.
tika-vin01t1:217_0: Ayaṃ pana kammavācā tathāgatassa parinibbānato ekavīsatime divase katā.
tika-vin01t1:217_1: Vuttañhetaṃ dīghanikāyaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “ayaṃ pana kammavācā tathāgatassa parinibbānato ekavīsatime divase katā.
tika-vin01t1:217_3: athassa sattāhaṃ suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ sarīraṃ gandhamālādīhi pūjayiṃsu.
tika-vin01t1:217_6: sattāhaṃ sattipañjaraṃ katvā santhāgārasālāyaṃ dhātupūjaṃ kariṃsūti ekavīsati divasā gatā.
tika-vin01t1:217_8: Etasmiṃ dhātubhājanadivase sannipatitassa mahābhikkhusaṅghassa subhaddena vuḍḍhapabbajitena kataṃ anācāraṃ
tika-vin01t1:217_9: ārocetvā vuttanayeneva bhikkhū uccinitvā ayaṃ kammavācā katā.
tika-vin01t1:217_10: Imañca pana kammavācaṃ katvā thero bhikkhū āmantesi ‘āvuso idāni tumhākaṃ cattālīsadivasā okāso,
tika-vin01t1:217_11: tato paraṃ ayaṃ nāma no palibodho atthīti vattuṃ na labbhā,
tika-vin01t1:217_12: tasmā etthantare yassa rogapalibodho vā ācariyupajjhāyapalibodho vā mātāpitupalibodho vā atthi,
tika-vin01t1:217_13: pattaṃ vā pana pacitabbaṃ cīvaraṃ vā kātabbaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:217_14: so taṃ palibodhaṃ chinditvā karaṇīyaṃ karotū’ti.
tika-vin01t1:217_15: Evañca pana vatvā thero attano pañcasatāya parisāya parivuto rājagahaṃ gato,
tika-vin01t1:217_16: aññepi mahātherā attano attano parivāraṃ gahetvā sokasallasamappitaṃ mahājanaṃ assāsetukāmā taṃ taṃ disaṃ pakkantā.
tika-vin01t1:217_17: Puṇṇatthero pana sattasatabhikkhuparivāro ‘tathāgatassa parinibbānaṭṭhānaṃ āgatāgataṃ mahājanaṃ assāsessāmī’ti kusinārāyameva aṭṭhāsi.
tika-vin01t1:217_19: evaṃ parinibbutassapi bhagavato sayameva pattacīvaramādāya pañcahi bhikkhusatehi saddhiṃ yena sāvatthi tena cārikaṃ pakkāmi.
tika-vin01t1:217_20: Gacchato panassa parivārā bhikkhū gaṇanapathaṃ vītivattā”ti.
tika-vin01t1:217_21: Tasmā tathāgatassa parinibbānato tīsu sattāhesu atikkantesu ekavīsatime divase imaṃ kammavācaṃ sāvetvā thero rājagahaṃ pakkantoti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:218_0: Yadi evaṃ kasmā pana idha maṅgalasuttaṭṭhakathāyañca “sattasu sādhukīḷanadivasesu sattasu ca dhātupūjādivasesu vītivattesū”ti vuttaṃ?
tika-vin01t1:218_1: Sattasu dhātupūjādivasesu gahitesu tadavinābhāvato majjhe citakāya jhāpanasattāhampi gahitamevāti katvā visuṃ na vuttaṃ viya dissati.
tika-vin01t1:218_5: Appakañhi ūnamadhikaṃ vā gaṇanūpagaṃ na hoti,
tika-vin01t1:218_6: tasmā samudāyo appakena adhikopi anadhiko viya hotīti katvā aḍḍhamāsato adhikepi pañca divase “aḍḍhamāso
tika-vin01t1:218_7: atikkanto”ti vuttaṃ “dvāsītikhandhakavattānaṃ katthaci asītikhandhakavattānī”ti vacanaṃ viya.
tika-vin01t1:218_8: Tathā appakena ūnopi ca samudāyo anūno viya hotīti katvā “diyaḍḍhamāsato ūnepi pañca divase diyaḍḍhamāso seso”ti ca vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:218_9: Satipaṭṭhānavibhaṅgaṭṭhakathāyañhi chamāsato ūnepi aḍḍhamāse “cha māse sajjhāyo kātabbo”ti vuttavacanaṃ viya.
tika-vin01t1:218_10: Tattha hi tacapañcakādīsu catūsu pañcakesu dvīsu ca chakkesu ekekasmiṃ anulomato pañcāhaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:218_13: tathā purimapurimehi pañcakachakkehi saddhiṃ anulomato pañcāhaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:218_15: anulomapaṭilomato pañcāhanti evaṃ visuṃ tipañcāhaṃ ekato tipañcāhañca sajjhāyaṃ katvā chamāsaṃ sajjhāyo kātabboti vacanaṃ viya.
tika-vin01t1:218_16: Tattha hi vakkapañcakādīsu tīsu pañcakesu dvīsu ca chakkesu visuṃ heṭṭhimehi ekato ca sajjhāye pañcannaṃ
tika-vin01t1:218_18: tacapañcake pana visuṃ tipañcāhamevāti aḍḍhamāsoyeveko labbhatīti aḍḍhamāsādhikapañcamāsā labbhanti.
tika-vin01t1:219_0: Evaṃ sati yathā tattha aḍḍhamāse ūnepi māsaparicchedena paricchijjamāne sajjhāye cha māsā paricchedakā
tika-vin01t1:219_1: hontīti paricchijjamānassa sajjhāyassa sattamāsādimāsantaragamananivāraṇatthaṃ chamāsaggahaṇaṃ kataṃ,
tika-vin01t1:219_3: evamidhāpi māsavasena kāle paricchijjamāne ūnepi pañcadivase diyaḍḍhamāso paricchedako hotīti paricchijjamānassa
tika-vin01t1:219_4: kālassa dvimāsādimāsantaragamananivāraṇatthaṃ “diyaḍḍhamāso seso”ti diyaḍḍhamāsaggahaṇaṃ katanti evamettha
tika-vin01t1:219_7: Ekāhameva vā bhagavato sarīraṃ citakāya jhāyīti khuddakabhāṇakānaṃ adhippāyoti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:219_8: Evañhi sati parinibbānato sattasu sādhukīḷanadivasesu vītivattesu aṭṭhamiyaṃ citakāya bhagavato sarīraṃ
tika-vin01t1:219_9: jhāpetvā tato paraṃ sattasu divasesu dhātupūjaṃ akaṃsūti aḍḍhamāso atikkanto,
tika-vin01t1:219_10: gimhānaṃ diyaḍḍho ca māso seso hoti.
tika-vin01t1:219_11: Parinibbānasuttantapāḷiyampi hi citakāya jhāpanasattāhaṃ na āgataṃ,
tika-vin01t1:219_15: Ito aññena vā pakārena yathā na virujjhati,
tika-vin01t1:219_17: Yaṃ panettha kenaci vuttaṃ “aḍḍhamāso atikkantoti ettha eko divaso naṭṭho.
tika-vin01t1:219_20: Taṃ na sundaraṃ parinibbānasuttantapāḷiyaṃ pāṭipadadivasatoyeva paṭṭhāya sattāhassa vuttattā aṭṭhakathāyañca
tika-vin01t1:219_22: Tathā hi parinibbānadivasena saddhiṃ tiṇṇaṃ sattāhānaṃ gahitattā jeṭṭhamūlasukkapañcamī ekavīsatimo divaso hoti.
tika-vin01t1:220_0: Sattasu sādhukīḷanadivasesūti ettha sādhukīḷanaṃ nāma saṃvegavatthuṃ kittetvā kittetvā aniccatāpaṭisaṃyuttāni
tika-vin01t1:220_1: gītāni gāyitvā pūjāvasena kīḷanato sundaraṃ kīḷananti sādhukīḷanaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:220_3: tesaṃ saṃvegavatthuṃ kittetvā kittetvā kīḷanaṃ sādhukīḷanaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:220_5: Ettha ca purimasmiṃ sattāhe sādhukīḷāya ekadesena katattā sādhukīḷanadivasā nāma te jātā.
tika-vin01t1:221_0: “Atha kho kosinārakā mallā bhagavato sarīrāni sattāhaṃ santhāgāre sattipañjaraṃ karitvā dhanupākāraṃ
tika-vin01t1:221_1: parikkhipāpetvā naccehi gītehi vāditehi mālehi gandhehi sakkariṃsu garuṃ kariṃsu mānesuṃ pūjesu”nti.
tika-vin01t1:223_1: Ito purimesu dvīsu sattāhesu te bhikkhusaṅghassa ṭhānanisajjokāsaṃ karontā khādanīyabhojanīyādīni saṃvidahantā sādhukīḷikāya okāsaṃ na labhiṃsu.
tika-vin01t1:223_2: Tato nesaṃ ahosi ‘imaṃ sattāhaṃ sādhukīḷitaṃ kīḷissāma,
tika-vin01t1:223_4: yaṃ amhākaṃ pamattabhāvaṃ ñatvā kocideva āgantvā dhātuyo gaṇheyya,
tika-vin01t1:224_1: Te pana dhātupūjāya katattā “dhātupūjādivasā”ti pākaṭā jātāti āha “sattasu ca dhātupūjādivasesū”ti.
tika-vin01t1:224_4: Ekaṃ maggaṃ gatoti cārikaṃ caritvā mahājanaṃ assāsetuṃ ekena maggena gato.
tika-vin01t1:224_5: Evaṃ anuruddhattherādayopi tesu tesu janapadesu cārikaṃ caritvā mahājanaṃ assāsentā gatāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:224_9: yena vā disābhāgena sāvatthi pakkamitabbā hoti,
tika-vin01t1:225_11: Gandhakuṭiyā dvāraṃ vivaritvāti paribhogacetiyabhāvato gandhakuṭiṃ vanditvā gandhakuṭiyā dvāraṃ vivarīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:225_14: Yathāṭhāne ṭhapetvāti paṭhamaṭhitaṭṭhānaṃ anatikkamitvā yathāṭhitaṭṭhāneyeva ṭhapetvāti attho.
tika-vin01t1:225_15: Bhagavato ṭhitakāle karaṇīyaṃ vattaṃ sabbamakāsīti senāsane kattabbavattaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:225_16: Karonto ca nhānakoṭṭhake sammajjanaudakūpaṭṭhānādikālesu gandhakuṭiṃ gantvā “nanu bhagavā ayaṃ tumhākaṃ nhānakālo,
tika-vin01t1:225_22: tumhe evaṃ paridevamānā kathaṃ aññe assāsayissathā”ti saṃvejesi.
tika-vin01t1:225_23: So tassā vacanena saṃviggahadayo santhambhitvā tathāgatassa parinibbānato pabhuti ṭhānanisajjabahulatāya
tika-vin01t1:226_7: Aṅgasubhatāya subhoti evaṃ laddhanāmattā subhena māṇavena.
tika-vin01t1:226_8: Pahitaṃ māṇavakanti “satthā parinibbuto ānandatthero kirassa pattacīvaraṃ gahetvā āgato,
tika-vin01t1:226_9: mahājano ca taṃ dassanāya upasaṅkamatī”ti sutvā “vihāraṃ kho pana gantvā mahājanamajjhe na sakkā sukhena
tika-vin01t1:226_10: paṭisanthāraṃ vā kātuṃ dhammakathaṃ vā sotuṃ,
tika-vin01t1:226_11: gehaṃ āgataṃyeva naṃ disvā sukhena paṭisanthāraṃ karissāmi,
tika-vin01t1:226_13: tampi naṃ pucchissāmī”ti cintetvā subhena māṇavena pesitaṃ māṇavakaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:226_15: Akālo khoti ajja gantuṃ yuttakālo na hoti.
tika-vin01t1:226_18: Appattho hi ayaṃ mattāsaddo “mattā sukhapariccāgā”tiādīsu viya.
tika-vin01t1:227_2: Subhena māṇavena puṭṭhoti “yesu dhammesu bhavaṃ gotamo imaṃ lokaṃ patiṭṭhāpesi,
tika-vin01t1:227_3: te tassa accayena naṭṭhā nu kho, dharanti,
tika-vin01t1:227_6: handa naṃ pucchāmī”ti evaṃ cintetvā “yesaṃ so bhavaṃ gotamo dhammānaṃ vaṇṇavādī ahosi,
tika-vin01t1:227_7: yattha ca imaṃ janataṃ samādapesi nivesesi patiṭṭhāpesi,
tika-vin01t1:227_8: katamesānaṃ kho bho ānanda dhammānaṃ so bhavaṃ gotamo vaṇṇavādī ahosī”tiādinā subhena māṇavena puṭṭho.
tika-vin01t1:227_9: Athassa thero tīṇi piṭakāni sīlakkhandhādīhi tīhi khandhehi saṅgahetvā dassento “tiṇṇaṃ kho, māṇava,
tika-vin01t1:227_11: Taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “dīghanikāye subhasuttaṃ nāma dasamaṃ suttamabhāsī”ti.
tika-vin01t1:228_6: Chaḍḍitapatitauklāpāti chaḍḍitā ca patitā ca uklāpā ca ahesunti attho.
tika-vin01t1:228_8: bhagavato parinibbānaṭṭhānaṃ gacchantehi bhikkhūhi chaḍḍitā vissaṭṭhā,
tika-vin01t1:228_9: tatoyeva ca upacikādīhi khāditattā ito cito ca patitā,
tika-vin01t1:228_17: Senāsanavattānaṃ paññattattā senāsanakkhandhake ca senāsanapaṭibaddhānaṃ bahūnaṃ vacanato “bhagavatā…pe…
tika-vin01t1:229_2: Te hi therā āsāḷhīpuṇṇamāya uposathaṃ katvā pāṭipade sannipatitvā vassaṃ upagantvā evaṃ cintesuṃ.
tika-vin01t1:229_3: Ajātasattu rājāti ajāto hutvā pituno paccatthiko jātoti “ajātasattū”ti laddhavohāro rājā.
tika-vin01t1:229_4: Tasmiṃ kira kucchigate deviyā evarūpo dohaḷo uppajji “aho vatāhaṃ rañño dakkhiṇabāhuto lohitaṃ piveyya”nti.
tika-vin01t1:229_5: Atha tassā kathetuṃ asakkontiyā kisabhāvaṃ dubbaṇṇabhāvañca disvā rājā sayameva pucchitvā ñatvā ca vejje
tika-vin01t1:229_6: pakkosāpetvā suvaṇṇasatthakena bāhuṃ phāletvā suvaṇṇasarakena lohitaṃ gahetvā udakena sambhinditvā pāyesi.
tika-vin01t1:229_7: Nemittakā taṃ sutvā “esa gabbho rañño sattu bhavissati,
tika-vin01t1:229_9: tasmā “ajātoyeva rañño sattu bhavissatī”ti nemittakehi niddiṭṭhattā ajātasattu nāma jāto.
tika-vin01t1:229_15: Āṇācakkanti āṇāyeva appaṭihatavuttiyā pavattanaṭṭhena cakkanti āṇācakkaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:230_3: Ekanipātatitthamiva ca devamanussanayanavihaṅgānanti ekasmiṃ pānīyatitthe sannipatantā pakkhino viya
tika-vin01t1:230_4: sabbesaṃ janānaṃ cakkhūni maṇḍapeyeva nipatantīti devamanussānaṃ nayanasaṅkhātavihaṅgānaṃ ekanipātatitthamiva ca.
tika-vin01t1:230_5: Lokarāmaṇeyyakamiva sampiṇḍitanti ekattha sampiṇḍitaṃ rāsikataṃ loke ramaṇīyabhāvaṃ viya.
tika-vin01t1:230_6: Yadi loke vijjamānaṃ ramaṇīyattaṃ sabbameva ānetvā ekattha sampiṇḍitaṃ siyā,
tika-vin01t1:230_8: “Daṭṭhabbasāramaṇḍanti pheggurahitasāraṃ viya kasaṭavinimuttaṃ pasannabhūtaṃ viya ca daṭṭhabbesu daṭṭhuṃ
tika-vin01t1:230_9: araharūpesu sārabhūtaṃ pasannabhūtañcā”ti tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:230_10: Daṭṭhabbo dassanīyo sārabhūto visiṭṭhataro maṇḍo maṇḍanaṃ alaṅkāro etassāti daṭṭhabbasāramaṇḍo,
tika-vin01t1:230_11: maṇḍapoti evamettha attho gahetabboti amhākaṃ khanti,
tika-vin01t1:230_15: cāruvitānanti ettha kusumadāmāni ca tāni olambakāni cāti kusumadāmaolambakāni.
tika-vin01t1:230_18: Tāni vividhāni anekappakārāni viniggalantaṃ vamentaṃ nikkhāmentamiva cāru sobhanaṃ vitānaṃ etthāti vividhakusumadāmaolambakaviniggalantacāruvitāno, maṇḍapo,
tika-vin01t1:230_23: Maṇiyo koṭṭetvā katatalattā maṇikoṭṭanena nibbattatalanti maṇikoṭṭimatalaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:230_31: Niṭṭhitaṃ bhante mama kiccanti mayā kattabbakiccaṃ niṭṭhitanti attho.
tika-vin01t1:231_0: Tasmiṃ pana divase ekacce bhikkhū āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ sandhāya evamāhaṃsu “imasmiṃ bhikkhusaṅghe eko bhikkhu vissagandhaṃ vāyanto vicaratī”ti.
tika-vin01t1:231_1: Thero taṃ sutvā “imasmiṃ bhikkhusaṅghe añño vissagandhaṃ vāyanto vicaraṇakabhikkhu nāma natthi,
tika-vin01t1:231_2: addhā ete maṃ sandhāya vadantī”ti saṃvegaṃ āpajji.
tika-vin01t1:231_5: Idāni taṃ dassento āha “bhikkhū āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ āhaṃsū”tiādi.
tika-vin01t1:231_11: Āsavehīti bhavato ābhavaggaṃ dhammato vā āgotrabhuṃ savanato pavattanato āsavasaññitehi kilesehi.
tika-vin01t1:231_15: Cittaṃ vimuccīti cittaṃ arahattamaggakkhaṇe āsavehi vimuccamānaṃ katvā arahattaphalakkhaṇe vimuccīti attho.
tika-vin01t1:231_17: Vivaṭṭūpanissayabhūtaṃ kataṃ upacitaṃ puññaṃ etenāti katapuñño,
tika-vin01t1:231_21: Kathādoso nāma natthīti kathāya aparajjhaṃ nāma natthi.
tika-vin01t1:231_24: Vīriyasamataṃ yojemīti caṅkamanavīriyassa adhimattattā tassa pahānavasena samādhinā samarasatāpādanena vīriyasamataṃ yojemi.
tika-vin01t1:232_2: Attano arahattappattiṃ ñāpetukāmoti “sekkhatāya dhammasaṅgītiyā gahetuṃ ayuttampi bahussutattā gaṇhissāmā”ti
tika-vin01t1:232_3: cintetvā nisinnānaṃ therānaṃ “idāni arahattappatto”ti somanassuppādanatthaṃ “appamatto hohī”ti dinnaovādassa
tika-vin01t1:232_4: saphalatādīpanatthaṃ attupanāyikaṃ akatvā aññabyākaraṇassa bhagavatā saṃvaṇṇitattā ca thero attano arahattappattiṃ
tika-vin01t1:232_8: Pubbe vuttampi hi sabbaṃ majjhimabhāṇakā vadantiyevāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:233_0: “Atha kho āyasmā ānando arahā samāno sannipātaṃ agamāsi.
tika-vin01t1:233_2: ‘Idānimhi sannipātamajjhaṃ pavisanāraho’ti haṭṭhatuṭṭhacitto ekaṃsaṃ cīvaraṃ katvā bandhanā muttatālapakkaṃ
tika-vin01t1:233_3: viya paṇḍukambale nikkhittajātimaṇi viya vigatavalāhake nabhe samuggatapuṇṇacando viya bālātapasamphassavikasitareṇupiñjaragabbhaṃ
tika-vin01t1:233_4: padumaṃ viya ca parisuddhena pariyodātena sappabhena sassirikena mukhavarena attano arahattappattiṃ ārocayamāno
tika-vin01t1:233_6: Atha naṃ disvā āyasmato mahākassapassa etadahosi ‘sobhati vata bho arahattappatto ānando,
tika-vin01t1:233_9: handa imassāhaṃ idāni satthārā dātabbaṃ sādhukāraṃ dadāmī’ti tikkhattuṃ sādhukāramadāsī”ti.
tika-vin01t1:234_0: Ākāsena āgantvā nisīdītipi eketi ettha pana tesaṃ tesaṃ tathā tathā gahetvā āgatamattaṃ ṭhapetvā visuṃ
