tika-vin01t1:234_1: visuṃ vacane aññaṃ visesakāraṇaṃ natthīti vadanti.
tika-vin01t1:234_2: Upatissatthero panāha “sattamāsaṃ katāya dhammasaṅgītiyā kadāci pathaviyaṃ nimujjitvā āgatattā taṃ gahetvā eke vadanti.
tika-vin01t1:234_3: Kadāci ākāsena āgatattā taṃ gahetvā eke vadantī”ti.
tika-vin01t1:235_0: Bhikkhū āmantesīti bhikkhū ālapi abhāsi sambodhesīti ayamettha attho.
tika-vin01t1:235_10: Kaṃ dhuraṃ katvāti kaṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ katvā.
tika-vin01t1:235_18: Upāliṃ vinayaṃ puccheyyanti pucchadhātussa dvikammakattā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:235_19: Bījaniṃ gahetvāti ettha bījanīgahaṇaṃ dhammakathikānaṃ dhammatāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:235_20: Bhagavāpi hi dhammakathikānaṃ dhammatādassanatthameva vicittabījaniṃ gaṇhāti.
tika-vin01t1:235_21: Na hi aññathā sabbassapi lokassa alaṅkārabhūtaṃ paramukkaṃsagatasikkhāsaṃyamānaṃ buddhānaṃ mukhacandamaṇḍalaṃ paṭicchādetabbaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t1:235_25: nanu tassa saṅgītiyā purimakāle paṭhamabhāvo na yuttoti?
tika-vin01t1:235_26: No na yutto bhagavatā paññattānukkamena pātimokkhuddesānukkamena ca paṭhamabhāvassa siddhattā.
tika-vin01t1:235_27: Yebhuyyena hi tīṇi piṭakāni bhagavato dharamānakāle ṭhitānukkameneva saṅgītāni,
tika-vin01t1:235_29: Kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ methunadhammeti ca nimittatthe bhummavacanaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:236_0: Vatthumpi pucchītiādi “kattha paññatta”ntiādinā dassitena saha tato avasiṭṭhampi saṅgahetvā dassanavasena vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:236_1: Kiṃ panettha paṭhamapārājikapāḷiyaṃ kiñci apanetabbaṃ vā pakkhipitabbaṃ vā āsi nāsīti?
tika-vin01t1:236_2: Buddhassa bhagavato bhāsite apanetabbaṃ nāma natthi.
tika-vin01t1:236_3: Na hi tathāgatā ekabyañjanampi niratthakaṃ vadanti,
tika-vin01t1:236_4: sāvakānaṃ pana devatānaṃ vā bhāsite apanetabbampi hoti,
tika-vin01t1:236_10: “Tena samayenā”ti vā “tena kho pana samayenā”ti vā “atha kho”iti vā “evaṃ vutte”ti vā “etadavocā”ti vā evamādikaṃ sambandhavacanamattaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:236_11: Evaṃ pakkhipitabbayuttaṃ pakkhipitvā pana idaṃ paṭhamapārājikanti ṭhapesuṃ.
tika-vin01t1:236_12: Paṭhamapārājike saṅgahamāruḷhe pañca arahantasatāni saṅgahaṃ āropitanayeneva gaṇasajjhāyamakaṃsu.
tika-vin01t1:236_13: “Tena samayena buddho bhagavā verañjāyaṃ viharatī”ti ca nesaṃ sajjhāyārambhakāleyeva sādhukāraṃ dadamānā
tika-vin01t1:236_15: Te eteneva nayena sesapārājikānipi saṅgahaṃ āropetvā “idaṃ pārājikakaṇḍa”nti ṭhapesuṃ.
tika-vin01t1:236_16: Evaṃ terasa saṅghādisesāni “terasaka”ntiādīni vatvā vīsādhikāni dve sikkhāpadasatāni “mahāvibhaṅgo”ti kittetvā ṭhapesuṃ.
tika-vin01t1:236_18: Tato bhikkhunivibhaṅge aṭṭha sikkhāpadāni “pārājikakaṇḍaṃ nāmā”tiādīni vatvā tīṇi sikkhāpadasatāni cattāri
tika-vin01t1:236_19: ca sikkhāpadāni “bhikkhunivibhaṅgo”ti kittetvā “ayaṃ ubhatovibhaṅgo nāma catusaṭṭhibhāṇavāro”ti ṭhapesuṃ.
tika-vin01t1:236_21: Etenevupāyena asītibhāṇavāraparimāṇaṃ khandhakaṃ pañcavīsatibhāṇavāraparimāṇaṃ parivārañca saṅgahaṃ āropetvā “idaṃ vinayapiṭakaṃ nāmā”ti ṭhapesuṃ.
tika-vin01t1:236_24: idaṃ tuyhaṃ nissitake vācehī”ti evamettha avuttopi viseso veditabbo.
tika-vin01t1:237_2: Mahākassapatthero ānandattheraṃ dhammaṃ pucchīti ettha ayamanukkamo veditabbo –
tika-vin01t1:237_3: ānandatthere dantakhacitaṃ bījaniṃ gahetvā dhammāsane nisinne āyasmā mahākassapatthero bhikkhū pucchi “kataraṃ, āvuso,
tika-vin01t1:237_18: Atha kho āyasmā mahākassapo āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ etadavoca “brahmajālaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:238_0: Antarā ca bhante rājagahaṃ antarā ca nāḷandanti ettha antarā-
tika-vin01t1:238_2: Tathā hi “tadantaraṃ ko jāneyya aññatra tathāgatā”ti ca,
tika-vin01t1:238_4: mañca tañca kimantara”nti ca ādīsu kāraṇe antarāsaddo vattati.
tika-vin01t1:238_5: “Addasa maṃ bhante aññatarā itthī vijjantarikāya bhājanaṃ dhovantī”tiādīsu khaṇe.
tika-vin01t1:238_8: “Api cāyaṃ tapodā dvinnaṃ mahānirayānaṃ antarikāya āgacchatī”tiādīsu vivare.
tika-vin01t1:238_10: tasmā rājagahassa ca nāḷandāya ca vivareti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo,
tika-vin01t1:238_12: Īdisesu ca ṭhānesu akkharacintakā “antarā gāmañca nadiñca yātī”ti evaṃ ekameva antarāsaddaṃ payujjanti,
tika-vin01t1:238_14: Ayojiyamāne upayogavacanaṃ na pāpuṇāti sāmivacanappasaṅge antarāsaddayogena upayogavacanassa icchitattā.
tika-vin01t1:238_16: Rājāgāraketi tattha rañño kīḷanatthaṃ paṭibhānacittavicitraṃ agāraṃ akaṃsu,
tika-vin01t1:238_19: Tassa kira dvārasamīpe taruṇo ambarukkho atthi,
tika-vin01t1:238_21: Tassa avidūrabhavattā uyyānampi ambalaṭṭhikātveva saṅkhyaṃ gataṃ “varuṇānagara”ntiādīsu viya.
tika-vin01t1:239_0: Suppiyañca paribbājakanti ettha suppiyoti tassa nāmaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:239_2: Brahmadattañca māṇavakanti ettha brahmadattoti tassa nāmaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:242_4: Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti “brahmadattaṃ nāma taruṇapurisaṃ ārabbhā”ti.
tika-vin01t1:242_7: Na etaṃ suttaṃ bhagavatā eva vuttaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:242_8: raññāpi “yathā nu kho imāni puthusippāyatanānī”tiādinā kiñci kiñci vuttaṃ atthi,
tika-vin01t1:243_0: Etenevupāyena pañca nikāye pucchīti ettha ayamanukkamo veditabbo.
tika-vin01t1:243_1: Vuttanayena brahmajālassa pucchāvisajjanāvasāne pañca arahantasatāni sajjhāyamakaṃsu.
tika-vin01t1:243_3: Evaṃ brahmajālaṃ saṅgāyitvā tato paraṃ “sāmaññaphalaṃ panāvuso ānanda,
tika-vin01t1:243_4: kattha bhāsita”ntiādinā pucchāvisajjanānukkamena saddhiṃ brahmajālena terasasuttantaṃ saṅgāyitvā “ayaṃ sīlakkhandhavaggo nāmā”ti kittetvā ṭhapesuṃ.
tika-vin01t1:243_6: tadanantaraṃ pāthikavagganti evaṃ tivaggasaṅgahaṃ catuttiṃsasuttantapaṭimaṇḍitaṃ catusaṭṭhibhāṇavāraparimāṇaṃ
tika-vin01t1:243_7: tantiṃ saṅgāyitvā “ayaṃ dīghanikāyo nāmā”ti vatvā āyasmantaṃ ānandattheraṃ paṭicchāpesuṃ “āvuso,
tika-vin01t1:243_9: Tato anantaraṃ asītibhāṇavāraparimāṇaṃ majjhimanikāyaṃ saṅgāyitvā dhammasenāpatisāriputtattherassa nissitake paṭicchāpesuṃ “imaṃ tumhe pariharathā”ti.
tika-vin01t1:243_10: Tadanantaraṃ bhāṇavārasataparimāṇaṃ saṃyuttanikāyaṃ saṅgāyitvā mahākassapattheraṃ paṭicchāpesuṃ “bhante,
tika-vin01t1:243_12: Tadanantaraṃ vīsatibhāṇavārasatapaamāṇaṃ aṅguttaranikāyaṃ saṅgāyitvā anuruddhattheraṃ paṭicchāpesuṃ “imaṃ tumhākaṃ nissitake vācethā”ti.
tika-vin01t1:247_0: Evaṃ saṃvaṇṇitaṃ sukhumañāṇagocaraṃ tantiṃ saṅgāyitvā “idaṃ abhidhammapiṭakaṃ nāmā”ti vatvā pañca arahantasatāni sajjhāyamakaṃsu.
tika-vin01t1:247_2: Tato paraṃ jātakaṃ mahāniddeso paṭisambhidāmaggo apadānaṃ suttanipāto khuddakapāṭho dhammapadaṃ udānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:247_3: itivuttakaṃ vimānavatthu petavatthu theragāthā therīgāthāti imaṃ tantiṃ saṅgāyitvā “khuddakagantho nāma
tika-vin01t1:247_4: aya”nti ca vatvā abhidhammapiṭakasmiṃyeva saṅgahaṃ āropayiṃsūti dīghabhāṇakā vadanti.
tika-vin01t1:247_5: Majjhimabhāṇakā pana “cariyāpiṭakabuddhavaṃsehi saddhiṃ sabbampi taṃ khuddakaganthaṃ suttantapiṭake pariyāpanna”nti vadanti.
tika-vin01t1:247_7: jātakādike khuddakanikāyapariyāpanne yebhuyyena ca dhammaniddesabhūte tādise abhidhammapiṭake saṅgaṇhituṃ yuttaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:247_12: Majjhimabhāṇakā pana aṭṭhuppattivasena desitānaṃ jātakādīnaṃ yathānulomadesanābhāvato tādise suttantapiṭake saṅgaho yutto,
tika-vin01t1:247_13: na pana sabhāvadhammaniddesabhūte yathādhammasāsane abhidhammapiṭaketi jātakādīnaṃ suttapariyāpannataṃ vadanti.
tika-vin01t1:247_15: Khuddakanikāyassa sesanikāyānaṃ viya apākaṭattā sese ṭhapetvā khuddakanikāyaṃ pākaṭaṃ katvā dassento “tattha khuddakanikāyo nāmā”tiādimāha.
tika-vin01t1:248_0: Evaṃ nimittapayojanakāladesakārakakaraṇappakārehi paṭhamamahāsaṅgītiṃ dassetvā idāni tattha vavatthāpitesu
tika-vin01t1:248_2: Tattha anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhinti ettha anāvaraṇañāṇapadaṭṭhānaṃ maggañāṇaṃ maggañāṇapadaṭṭhānañca anāvaraṇañāṇaṃ “sammāsambodhī”ti vuccati.
tika-vin01t1:249_0: Kiñcāpi avisesena sabbampi buddhavacanaṃ kilesavinayanena vinayo,
tika-vin01t1:249_1: yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjamāne apāyapatanādito dhāraṇena dhammo ca hoti,
tika-vin01t1:249_4: Atha vā yadipi dhammoyeva vinayo pariyattiādibhāvato,
tika-vin01t1:249_5: tathāpi vinayasaddasannidhāno abhinnādhikaraṇabhāvena payutto dhammasaddo vinayatantiviparītaṃ tantiṃ dīpeti yathā “puññañāṇasambhāro,
tika-vin01t1:250_0: Anekajātisaṃsāranti ayaṃ gāthā bhagavatā attano sabbaññutaññāṇapadaṭṭhānaṃ arahattappattiṃ paccavekkhantena
tika-vin01t1:250_5: ahaṃ imassa attabhāvagehassa kārakaṃ taṇhāvaḍḍhakiṃ gavesanto yena ñāṇena taṃ daṭṭhuṃ sakkā,
tika-vin01t1:250_6: tassa bodhiñāṇassatthāya dīpaṅkarapādamūle katābhinīhāro ettakaṃ kālaṃ anekajātisaṃsāraṃ anekajātisatasahassasaṅkhyaṃ
tika-vin01t1:250_7: saṃsāravaṭṭaṃ anibbisaṃ anibbisanto taṃ ñāṇaṃ avindanto alabhantoyeva sandhāvissaṃ saṃsariṃ.
tika-vin01t1:250_8: Yasmā jarābyādhimaraṇamissatāya jāti nāmesā punappunaṃ upagantuṃ dukkhā,
tika-vin01t1:250_9: na ca sā tasmiṃ adiṭṭhe nivattati,
tika-vin01t1:251_0: Diṭṭhosīti idāni mayā sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ paṭivijjhantena diṭṭho asi.
tika-vin01t1:251_1: Puna gehanti puna imaṃ attabhāvasaṅkhātaṃ mama gehaṃ na kāhasi na karissasi.
tika-vin01t1:251_2: Tava sabbā anavasesā kilesaphāsukā mayā bhaggā.
tika-vin01t1:251_3: Imassa tayā katassa attabhāvagehassa kūṭaṃ avijjāsaṅkhātaṃ kaṇṇikamaṇḍalaṃ visaṅkhataṃ viddhaṃsitaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:251_4: Visaṅkhāraṃ nibbānaṃ ārammaṇakaraṇavasena gataṃ anupaviṭṭhaṃ idāni mama cittaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:251_5: ahañca taṇhānaṃ khayasaṅkhātaṃ arahattamaggaṃ arahattaphalaṃ vā ajjhagā adhigato pattosmīti attho.
tika-vin01t1:251_6: Gaṇṭhipadesu pana “visaṅkhāragatanti cittameva taṇhānaṃ khayasaṅkhātaṃ arahattamaggaṃ arahattaphalaṃ vā ajjhagā adhigato patto”ti evampi attho vutto.
tika-vin01t1:251_8: “Yadā have pātubhavanti dhammāti ayaṃ pana vācāya pavattitadhammānaṃ ādī”ti vadanti.
tika-vin01t1:252_1: Paṭhamaṃ vutto pana dhammapadabhāṇakānaṃ adhippāyoti veditabbo.
tika-vin01t1:252_2: Ettha ca khandhakabhāṇakā vadanti “dhammapadabhāṇakānaṃ gāthā manasā desitattā tadā mahato janassa upakārāya na hoti,
tika-vin01t1:252_3: amhākaṃ pana gāthā vacībhedaṃ katvā desitattā tadā suṇantānaṃ devabrahmānaṃ upakārāya ahosi,
tika-vin01t1:252_5: Dhammapadabhāṇakā pana “desanāya janassa upakārānupakārabhāvo lakkhaṇaṃ na hoti,
tika-vin01t1:252_6: bhagavatā manasā desitattāyeva idaṃ paṭhamabuddhavacana”nti vadanti,
tika-vin01t1:252_7: tasmā ubhayampi aññamaññaṃ viruddhaṃ na hotīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:252_9: atha kasmā dhammapadaaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “anekajātisaṃsāranti imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ satthā bodhirukkhamūle nisinno
tika-vin01t1:252_10: udānavasena udānetvā aparabhāge ānandattherena puṭṭho kathesī”ti vuttanti?
tika-vin01t1:252_12: Atha vā manasāva desitanti evaṃ gahaṇe kiṃ kāraṇanti ce?
tika-vin01t1:252_15: tasmā udānapāḷiyaṃ anāruḷhabhāvoyeva vacībhedaṃ akatvā manasā desitabhāve kāraṇanti vadanti.
tika-vin01t1:253_0: Yadā have pātubhavanti dhammāti ettha itisaddo ādiattho.
tika-vin01t1:253_5: tatthāpi paṭhamagāthaṃyeva vā gahetvā vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:253_10: Visākhapuṇṇamāyameva hi bhagavā paccūsasamaye sabbaññutaṃ pattoti.
tika-vin01t1:253_14: Vayadhammāti aniccalakkhaṇamukhena dukkhānattalakkhaṇampi saṅkhārānaṃ vibhāveti “yadaniccaṃ taṃ dukkhaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:253_16: Lakkhaṇattayavibhāvananayeneva tadārammaṇaṃ vipassanaṃ dassento sabbatitthiyānaṃ avisayabhūtaṃ buddhāveṇikaṃ
tika-vin01t1:253_17: catusaccakammaṭṭhānādhiṭṭhānaṃ aviparītaṃ nibbānagāminiṃ paṭipadaṃ pakāsetīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:253_19: Atha vā “vayadhammā saṅkhārā”ti etena saṅkhepena saṃvejetvā “appamādena sampādethā”ti saṅkhepeneva niravasesaṃ sammāpaṭipattiṃ dasseti.
tika-vin01t1:253_20: Appamādapadañhi sikkhattayasaṅgahitaṃ kevalaparipuṇṇaṃ sāsanaṃ pariyādiyitvā tiṭṭhatīti.
tika-vin01t1:254_5: “Paṭhamasaṅgītito puretarameva hi āyasmatā ānandattherena jetavane viharantena subhassa māṇavassa desita”nti ācariyadhammapālattherena vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:254_7: ekaṃ samayaṃ āyasmā ānando sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme aciraparinibbute bhagavatī”tiādinā āgataṃ.
tika-vin01t1:254_8: Tattha “evaṃ me suta”ntiādivacanaṃ paṭhamasaṅgītiyaṃ āyasmatā ānandatthereneva vattuṃ yuttarūpaṃ na hoti.
tika-vin01t1:254_9: Na hi ānandatthero sayameva subhasuttaṃ desetvā “evaṃ me suta”ntiādīni vadati.
tika-vin01t1:254_11: samayaṃ sāvatthiyaṃ viharāmi jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme”ti,
tika-vin01t1:254_12: tasmā dutiyatatiyasaṅgītikārakehi “evaṃ me suta”ntiādinā subhasuttaṃ saṅgītimāropitaṃ viya dissati.
tika-vin01t1:254_13: Atha ācariyadhammapālattherassa evamadhippāyo siyā “ānandatthereneva vuttampi subhasuttaṃ paṭhamasaṅgītiṃ
tika-vin01t1:254_14: āropetvā tantiṃ ṭhapetukāmehi mahākassapattherādīhi aññesu suttesu āgatanayeneva ‘evaṃ me suta’ntiādinā
tika-vin01t1:254_17: Atha vā āyasmā ānandatthero subhasuttaṃ sayaṃ desentopi sāmaññaphalādīsu bhagavatā desitanayeneva desesīti
tika-vin01t1:254_18: bhagavato sammukhā laddhanaye ṭhatvā desitattā bhagavatā desitaṃ dhammaṃ attani adahanto “evaṃ me suta”ntiādimāhāti
tika-vin01t1:255_2: Dvāvīsati khandhakānīti mahāvaggacūḷavaggesu āgatāni dvāvīsati khandhakāni.
tika-vin01t1:255_3: Soḷasaparivārāti soḷasahi parivārehi upalakkhitattā soḷasaparivārāti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:255_4: Tathā hi parivārapāḷiyaṃ “yaṃ tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena paṭhamaṃ pārājikaṃ kattha paññatta”ntiādinā paññattivāro,
tika-vin01t1:255_5: tato paraṃ “methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevanto kati āpattiyo āpajjatī”tiādinā katāpattivāro,
tika-vin01t1:255_6: “methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevantassa āpattiyo catunnaṃ vipattīnaṃ kati vipattiyo bhajantī”tiādippabhedo vipattivāro,
tika-vin01t1:255_7: “methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevantassa āpattiyo sattannaṃ āpattikkhandhānaṃ katihi āpattikkhandhehi saṅgahitā”tiādippabhedo saṅgahavāro,
tika-vin01t1:255_8: “methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevantassa āpattiyo channaṃ āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṃ katihi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhantī”tiādinā samuṭṭhānavāro,
tika-vin01t1:255_9: “methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevantassa āpattiyo catunnaṃ adhikaraṇānaṃ katamaṃ adhikaraṇa”ntiādinā adhikaraṇavāro,
tika-vin01t1:255_10: “methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevantassa āpattiyo sattannaṃ samathānaṃ katihi samathehi sammantī”tiādippabhedo samathavāro,
tika-vin01t1:255_11: tadanantaraṃ samuccayavāro cāti aṭṭha vārā vuttā.
tika-vin01t1:255_12: Tato paraṃ “methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevanapaccayā pārājikaṃ kattha paññatta”ntiādinā nayena puna paccayavasena eko paññattivāro,
tika-vin01t1:255_13: tassa vasena purimasadisā eva katāpattivārādayo satta vārāti evaṃ aparepi aṭṭha vārā vuttā.
tika-vin01t1:255_15: purimānipi aṭṭhāti mahāvibhaṅge soḷasa vārā dassitā.
tika-vin01t1:255_16: Tato paraṃ teneva nayena bhikkhunivibhaṅgepi soḷasa vārā āgatāti imehi soḷasahi vārehi upalakkhitattā soḷasaparivārāti vuccati.
tika-vin01t1:255_18: bahūsu pana potthakesu dīghanikāyaṭṭhakathāyaṃ abhidhammaṭṭhakathāyañca “soḷasaparivārā”ti evameva vuttattā
tika-vin01t1:255_19: ayampi pāṭho na sakkā paṭibāhitunti tassevattho vutto.
tika-vin01t1:256_0: Brahmajālādicatuttiṃsasuttasaṅgahoti brahmajālasuttādīni catuttiṃsa suttāni saṅgayhanti ettha,
tika-vin01t1:256_2: Vuttappamāṇānaṃ vā suttānaṃ saṅgaho etassāti brahmajālādicatuttiṃsasuttasaṅgahoti.
tika-vin01t1:257_0: Vividhavisesanayattāti imissā gāthāya atthaṃ vibhāvento āha “vividhā hī”tiādi.
tika-vin01t1:257_3: Ajjhācāranisedhanatoti saññamavelaṃ atibhavitvā pavatto ācāro ajjhācāro,
tika-vin01t1:258_0: Idāni atthānaṃ sūcanatotiādigāthāya atthaṃ pakāsento āha “tañhī”tiādi.
tika-vin01t1:258_1: Attatthaparatthādibhedeti yo taṃ suttaṃ sajjhāyati suṇāti vāceti cinteti deseti ca,
tika-vin01t1:258_3: tena parassa sādhetabbato parassapi hotīti tadubhayaṃ taṃ suttaṃ sūceti dīpeti.
tika-vin01t1:258_4: Tathā diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikatthe lokiyalokuttaratthe cāti evamādibhede atthe ādisaddena saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-vin01t1:258_8: suttaṃ attanopi bhāsitatthaṃ sūceti parassapīti ayamattho vutto siyā,
tika-vin01t1:258_12: Tena sūcetabbassa paratthassa nivattetabbassa abhāvā attaggahaṇañca na kattabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:258_13: Attatthaparatthavinimuttassa bhāsitatthassa abhāvā ādiggahaṇañca na kattabbaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:258_14: tasmā yathāvuttassa hitapariyāyassa atthassa sutte asambhavato suttādhārassa puggalassa vasena attatthaparatthā vuttā.
tika-vin01t1:259_0: Atha vā suttaṃ anapekkhitvā ye attatthādayo atthappabhedā “na haññadatthatthi pasaṃsalābhā”ti etassa padassa niddese vuttā attattho, parattho,
tika-vin01t1:259_14: te atthe suttaṃ sūcetīti attho gahetabbo.
tika-vin01t1:259_15: Tathā hi kiñcāpi suttanirapekkhaṃ attatthādayo vuttā suttatthabhāvena aniddiṭṭhattā,
tika-vin01t1:259_16: tesu pana ekopi atthappabhedo suttena dīpetabbataṃ nātikkamati,
tika-vin01t1:259_17: tasmā te atthe suttaṃ sūcetīti vuccati.
tika-vin01t1:259_20: Ettha hi purimakā pañca atthappabhedā hitapariyāyā,
tika-vin01t1:259_25: mūludakādayo viya paṃsunā akkharasannivesādinā tirohito paṭicchanno.
tika-vin01t1:260_0: Atha vā attanā ca appiccho hotīti attatthaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:260_1: appicchākathañca paresaṃ kattā hotīti paratthaṃ sūceti.
tika-vin01t1:260_2: Evaṃ “attanā ca pāṇātipātā paṭivirato hotī”tiādīni suttāni yojetabbāni.
tika-vin01t1:260_3: Vinayābhidhammehi ca visesetvā suttasaddassa attho vattabbo,
tika-vin01t1:260_4: tasmā veneyyajjhāsayavasappavattāya desanāya attahitaparahitādīni sātisayaṃ pakāsitāni honti tappadhānabhāvato,
tika-vin01t1:260_5: na āṇādhammasabhāvavasappavattāyāti idameva atthānaṃ sūcanato suttanti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:260_6: Evañca katvā “ettakaṃ tassa bhagavato suttāgataṃ suttapariyāpanna”nti ca “sakavāde pañca suttasatānī”ti ca evamādīsu suttasaddo upacaritoti gahetabbo.
tika-vin01t1:261_2: tasmā veneyyānaṃ ekantahitapaṭilābhasaṃvattanikā suttantadesanā hotīti “suvuttā cettha atthā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:261_3: “Ekantahitapaṭilābhasaṃvattanikā suttantadesanā”ti idampi veneyyānaṃ hitasampāpane suttantadesanāya tapparabhāvaṃyeva sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:261_6: Vinayadesanaṃ viya issarabhāvato āṇāpatiṭṭhāpanavasena adesetvā veneyyānaṃ ajjhāsayānulomena cariyānurūpaṃ vuttattā desitattāti attho.
tika-vin01t1:262_0: Anupubbasikkhādivasena kālantare abhinipphattiṃ dassento āha “sassamiva phala”nti.
tika-vin01t1:262_3: Upāyasamaṅgīnaṃyeva nipphajjanabhāvaṃ dassento “dhenu viya khīra”nti āha.
tika-vin01t1:262_5: Anupāyena hi akāle ajātavacchaṃ dhenuṃ dohanto kālepi vā visāṇaṃ gahetvā dohanto neva khīraṃ paṭilabhati.
tika-vin01t1:262_6: “Suttāṇā”ti etassa atthaṃ pakāsetuṃ “suṭṭhu ca ne tāyatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:263_4: Evametampi viññūnanti yathā kāḷasuttaṃ pasāretvā saññāṇe kate gahetabbaṃ vissajjetabbañca paññāyati,
tika-vin01t1:263_5: evaṃ vivādesu uppannesu sutte ānītamatte “idaṃ gahetabbaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:263_6: idaṃ vissajjetabba”nti viññūnaṃ pākaṭattā vivādo vūpasammatīti etampi suttaṃ viññūnaṃ pamāṇaṃ hotīti attho.
tika-vin01t1:263_7: Idāni aññathāpi suttasabhāgataṃ dassento āha “yathā cā”tiādi.
tika-vin01t1:263_8: Suttaṃ viya pamāṇattā saṅgāhakattā ca suttamiva suttanti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t1:263_9: Ettha ca attatthādividhāne suttassa pamāṇabhāvo attatthādīnaṃyeva ca saṅgāhakattaṃ yojetabbaṃ tadatthappakāsanapadhānattā suttassa.
tika-vin01t1:264_3: saddo kamanakiriyāya vuḍḍhibhāvaṃ atirekataṃ dīpetīti āha “abhikkamantītiādīsu vuḍḍhiyaṃ āgato”ti.
tika-vin01t1:264_4: Abhiññātāti aḍḍhacandādinā kenaci saññāṇena ñātā paññātā pākaṭāti attho.
tika-vin01t1:264_5: Aḍḍhacandādibhāvo hi rattiyā upalakkhaṇavasena saññāṇaṃ hoti,
tika-vin01t1:264_14: Ettha ca vācakasaddantarasannidhānena nipātānaṃ tadatthajotakamattattā lakkhitasaddatthajotako abhisaddo lakkhaṇe vattatīti vutto.
tika-vin01t1:265_0: Abhidhammeti “supinantena sukkavissaṭṭhiyā anāpattibhāvepi akusalacetanā upalabbhatī”tiādinā vinayapaññattiyā saṅkaravirahite dhamme.
tika-vin01t1:265_2: “Pāṇātipāto akusala”nti evamādīsu ca maraṇādhippāyassa jīvitindriyupacchedakapayogasamuṭṭhāpikā cetanā akusalaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:265_4: tathā adinnassa parasantakassa ādānasaṅkhātā viññatti abyākato dhammo,
tika-vin01t1:265_5: taṃviññattisamuṭṭhāpikā theyyacetanā akusalo dhammoti evamādināpi aññamaññasaṅkaravirahite dhammeti attho veditabbo.
tika-vin01t1:265_6: Abhivinayeti ettha “jātarūparajataṃ na paṭiggahetabba”nti vadanto vinaye vineti nāma.
tika-vin01t1:265_8: evaṃ dukkaṭanti vadanto ca abhivinaye vineti nāmā”ti vadanti.
tika-vin01t1:265_9: Tasmā jātarūparajataṃ theyyacittena parasantakaṃ gaṇhantassa yathāvatthu pārājikathullaccayadukkaṭesu aññataraṃ,
tika-vin01t1:265_13: rūpiyachaḍḍakassa sammatassa anāpattīti evaṃ aññamaññasaṅkaravirahite vinaye paṭibalo vinetunti attho veditabbo.
tika-vin01t1:265_14: Abhikkantenāti ettha kantiyā adhikattaṃ abhisaddo dīpetīti āha “adhike”ti.
tika-vin01t1:266_0: Nanu ca “abhikkamantī”ti ettha abhisaddo kamanakiriyāya vuḍḍhibhāvaṃ atirekataṃ dīpeti,
tika-vin01t1:266_2: “abhikkantenā”ti ettha kantiyā adhikattaṃ visiṭṭhataṃ dīpetīti idaṃ tāva yuttaṃ kiriyāvisesakattā upasaggassa,
tika-vin01t1:266_3: “abhirājā abhivinayo”ti pana pūjitaparicchinnesu rājavinayesu abhisaddo vattatīti kathametaṃ yujjeyyāti ce?
tika-vin01t1:266_6: tasmā ettha atimālādīsu atisaddo viya abhisaddo saha sādhanena kiriyaṃ vadatīti abhirājaabhivinayasaddā siddhā,
tika-vin01t1:266_7: evaṃ abhidhammasadde abhisaddo saha sādhanena vuḍḍhiyādikiriyaṃ dīpetīti ayamattho dassitoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:267_3: Vuḍḍhimantoti bhāvanāpharaṇavuḍḍhīhi vuḍḍhimantopi dhammā vuttāti attho.
tika-vin01t1:267_6: Ekantato lokuttaradhammānaṃyeva pūjārahattā “sekkhā dhammā”tiādinā lokuttarāyeva pūjitāti dassitā.
tika-vin01t1:267_8: Adhikāpi dhammā vuttāti ettha kāmāvacarehi mahantabhāvato mahaggatā dhammāpi adhikā nāma hontīti tehi saddhiṃ adhikā dhammā vuttā.
tika-vin01t1:268_0: Yaṃ panettha avisiṭṭhanti ettha vinayādīsu tīsu aññamaññavisiṭṭhesu yaṃ avisiṭṭhaṃ samānaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:268_2: Vinayādayo hi tayo saddā aññamaññaṃ asādhāraṇattā visiṭṭhā nāma,
tika-vin01t1:268_3: piṭakasaddo pana tehi tīhipi sādhāraṇattā avisiṭṭhoti vuccati.
tika-vin01t1:268_4: Mā piṭakasampadānenāti pāḷisampadānavasena mā gaṇhathāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t1:268_7: tassā dālanato vidālanato ayomayo upakaraṇaviseso kudālaṃ nāma,
tika-vin01t1:269_0: Desanāsāsanakathābhedanti ettha kathetabbānaṃ atthānaṃ desakāyattena āṇādividhinā abhisajjanaṃ pabodhanaṃ desanā.
tika-vin01t1:269_1: Sāsitabbapuggalagatena yathāparādhādinā sāsitabbabhāvena anusāsanaṃ vinayanaṃ sāsanaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:269_2: Kathetabbassa saṃvarāsaṃvarādino atthassa kathanaṃ vacanapaṭibaddhatākaraṇaṃ kathāti vuccati.
tika-vin01t1:269_5: kathetabbassa atthassa vasena kathāti evamettha desanādīnaṃ nānākaraṇaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:269_6: Ettha ca kiñcāpi desanādayo desetabbādinirapekkhā na honti,
tika-vin01t1:269_7: āṇādayo pana visesato desakādiadhīnāti taṃtaṃvisesayogavasena desanādīnaṃ bhedo vutto.
tika-vin01t1:269_8: Tathā hi āṇāvidhānaṃ visesato āṇārahādhīnaṃ tattha kosallayogato.
tika-vin01t1:269_9: Evaṃ vohāraparamatthavidhānāni ca vidhāyakādhīnānīti āṇādividhino desakāyattatā vuttā.
tika-vin01t1:269_12: Saṃvarāsaṃvaranāmarūpānaṃ viya viniveṭhetabbāya diṭṭhiyāpi kathanaṃ sati vācāvatthusmiṃ nāsatīti visesato
tika-vin01t1:269_13: tadadhīnanti kathetabbassa atthassa vasena kathā vuttā.
tika-vin01t1:269_14: Bhedasaddo visuṃ visuṃ yojetabbo “desanābhedaṃ sāsanabhedaṃ kathābhedañca yathārahaṃ paridīpaye”ti.
tika-vin01t1:269_16: Tesu piṭakesu sikkhā ca pahānāni ca gambhīrabhāvo ca sikkhāpahānagambhīrabhāvaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:270_4: Atha vā yaṃ pariyattibhedaṃ sampattiñca vipattiñcāpi yahiṃ yathā pāpuṇāti,
tika-vin01t1:270_7: suppaṭipatti duppaṭipattīti etehi pakārehīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t1:271_0: Paridīpanā vibhāvanā cāti heṭṭhā vuttassa anurūpato vuttaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:271_2: Āṇārahenāti āṇaṃ ṭhapetuṃ arahatīti āṇāraho, bhagavā.
tika-vin01t1:271_3: So hi sammāsambuddhatāya mahākāruṇikatāya ca aviparītahitopadesakabhāvena pamāṇavacanattā āṇaṃ paṇetuṃ arahati,
tika-vin01t1:272_3: Pacuro bahuko bahulo aparādho doso vītikkamo yesaṃ te pacurāparādhā.
tika-vin01t1:272_7: Tathā hi pubbacariyavasena āyatiṃ sati paccaye uppajjamānārahā sassatucchedasaṅkhātā micchādiṭṭhi saccānulomikañāṇakammassakataññāṇasaṅkhātā
tika-vin01t1:275_0: Idañca catubbidhaṃ āsayanti ettha sattā nivasantīti āsayoti vuccati.
tika-vin01t1:275_2: Mūsikavisaṃ viya kāraṇalābhe uppajjanārahā anāgatā kilesā,
tika-vin01t1:275_4: Na hi kālabhedena dhammānaṃ sabhāvabhedo atthīti.
tika-vin01t1:275_11: ajjeva arahattaṃ gaṇhissāmī’tiādinā tanninnabhāvena pavattamānaṃ sanniṭṭhāna”nti gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:275_15: Ahaṃ mamāti saññinoti diṭṭhimānataṇhāvasena ahaṃ mamāti evaṃ pavattasaññino.
tika-vin01t1:276_5: tasmā khuddako mahanto ca saṃvaroti attho.
tika-vin01t1:276_7: Adhisīlasikkhādīnaṃ vibhāgo parato paṭhamapārājikasaṃvaṇṇanāya āvi bhavissati.
tika-vin01t1:276_9: Vītikkamappahānaṃ kilesānanti saṃkilesadhammānaṃ kammakilesānaṃ vā yo kāyavacīdvārehi vītikkamo,
tika-vin01t1:276_11: Anusayavasena santāne anuvattantā kilesā kāraṇalābhe pariyuṭṭhitāpi sīlabhedavasena vītikkamituṃ na labhantīti āha “vītikkamapaṭipakkhattā sīlassā”ti.
tika-vin01t1:276_12: Pariyuṭṭhānappahānanti okāsadānavasena kilesānaṃ citte kusalappavattiṃ pariyādiyitvā uṭṭhānaṃ pariyuṭṭhānaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:276_13: tassa pahānaṃ cittasantānesu uppattivasena kilesānaṃ pariyuṭṭhānassa pahānanti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t1:276_14: Anusayappahānanti appahīnabhāvena santāne anu anu sayanakā kāraṇalābhe uppattiarahā anusayā.
tika-vin01t1:276_15: Te pana anurūpaṃ kāraṇaṃ laddhā uppajjanārahā thāmagatā kāmarāgādayo satta kilesā,
tika-vin01t1:276_17: Te ca sabbaso ariyamaggapaññāya pahīyantīti āha “anusayapaṭipakkhattā paññāyā”ti.
tika-vin01t1:277_0: Tadaṅgappahānanti dīpālokeneva tamassa dānādipuññakiriyavatthugatena tena tena kusalaṅgena tassa tassa
tika-vin01t1:277_2: Idha pana tena tena susīlyaṅgena tassa tassa dussīlyaṅgassa pahānaṃ “tadaṅgappahāna”nti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:277_3: Vikkhambhanasamaucchedappahānānīti ettha upacārappanābhedena samādhinā pavattinivāraṇena ghaṭappahāreneva
tika-vin01t1:277_4: jalatale sevālassa tesaṃ tesaṃ nīvaraṇānaṃ dhammānaṃ vikkhambhanavasena pahānaṃ vikkhambhanappahānaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:277_5: Catunnaṃ ariyamaggānaṃ bhāvitattā taṃtaṃmaggavato santāne samudayapakkhikassa kilesagaṇassa accantaṃ
tika-vin01t1:277_10: taṃ santānaṃ sammā kileseti bādhayati upatāpeti cāti saṃkileso,
tika-vin01t1:277_12: kāyavacīduccaritavasena pavattasaṃkilesassa tadaṅgavasena pahānanti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t1:277_13: Samādhissa kāmacchandapaṭipakkhattā suttantapiṭake taṇhāsaṃkilesassa pahānaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:278_0: Ekamekasmiñcetthāti etesu tīsu piṭakesu ekamekasmiṃ piṭaketi attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin01t1:278_1: Dhammoti pāḷīti ettha pakaṭṭhānaṃ ukkaṭṭhānaṃ sīlādiatthānaṃ bodhanato sabhāvaniruttibhāvato buddhādīhi
tika-vin01t1:278_2: bhāsitattā ca pakaṭṭhānaṃ vacanappabandhānaṃ āḷīti pāḷi,
tika-vin01t1:278_4: “Dhammoti pāḷīti ettha bhagavatā vuccamānassa atthassa vohārassa ca dīpano saddoyeva pāḷi nāmā”ti gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:278_5: Abhidhammaṭṭhakathāya likhite sīhaḷagaṇṭhipade pana idaṃ vuttaṃ –
tika-vin01t1:278_6: sabhāvatthassa sabhāvavohārassa ca anurūpavasena bhagavatā manasā vavatthāpitā paṇḍatti pāḷīti vuccati.
tika-vin01t1:278_9: Manasā vavatthāpitāya ca pāḷiyā vacībhedakaraṇamattaṃ ṭhapetvā desanāya nānattaṃ natthi.
tika-vin01t1:278_10: Tathā hi desanaṃ dassentena manasā vavatthāpitāya pāḷiyā desanāti vacībhedakaraṇamattaṃ vinā pāḷiyā saha desanāya anaññathā vuttā.
tika-vin01t1:278_11: Tathā ca upari “desanāti paññattī”ti vuttattā desanāya anaññabhāvena pāḷiyā paṇṇattibhāvo kathito hoti.
tika-vin01t1:278_12: Apica yadi pāḷiyā aññāyeva desanā siyā,
tika-vin01t1:278_13: “pāḷiyā ca pāḷiatthassa ca desanāya ca yathābhūtāvabodho”ti vattabbaṃ siyā,
tika-vin01t1:278_14: evaṃ pana avatvā “pāḷiyā ca pāḷiatthassa ca yathābhūtāvabodho”ti vuttattā pāḷiyā desanāya ca anaññabhāvo dassito hoti.
tika-vin01t1:278_15: Evañca katvā upari “desanā nāma paññattī”ti dassentena desanāya anaññabhāvato pāḷiyā paṇṇattibhāvo kathitova hotīti.
tika-vin01t1:279_0: Ettha ca “saddoyeva pāḷi nāmā”ti imasmiṃ pakkhe dhammassapi saddasabhāvattā dhammadesanānaṃ ko visesoti ce?
tika-vin01t1:279_1: Tesaṃ tesaṃ atthānaṃ bodhakabhāvena ñāto uggahaṇādivasena ca pubbe vavatthāpito saddappabandho dhammo,
tika-vin01t1:279_2: pacchā paresaṃ avabodhanatthaṃ pavattito tadatthappakāsako saddo desanāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:279_3: Atha vā yathāvuttasaddasamuṭṭhāpako cittuppādo desanā “desīyati samuṭṭhāpīyati saddo etenā”ti katvā musāvādādayo viya.
tika-vin01t1:279_4: Tatthāpi hi musāvādādisamuṭṭhāpikā cetanā musāvādādisaddena voharīyati.
tika-vin01t1:280_0: Tīsupi cetesu ete dhammatthadesanāpaṭivedhāti ettha pāḷiattho pāḷidesanā pāḷiatthapaṭivedho cāti ime
tika-vin01t1:280_1: tayo pāḷivisayā hontīti vinayapiṭakādīnaṃ atthassa desanāya paṭivedhassa ca ādhārabhāvo yutto,
tika-vin01t1:280_2: piṭakāni pana pāḷiyoyevāti tesaṃ dhammassa ādhārabhāvo kathaṃ yujjeyyāti ce?
tika-vin01t1:280_4: Avayavassa hi samudāyo ādhārabhāvena vuccati yathā “rukkhe sākhā”ti.
tika-vin01t1:280_5: Ettha ca dhammādīnaṃ dukkhogāhabhāvato tehi dhammādīhi vinayādayo gambhīrāti vinayādīnampi catubbidho gambhīrabhāvo vuttoyeva,
tika-vin01t1:280_7: na vinayādayoti na codetabbametaṃ sammukhena visayavisayīmukhena ca vinayādīnaṃyeva gambhīrabhāvassa vuttattā.
tika-vin01t1:280_12: desanāñāṇassa dukkarabhāvato desanāya ca dukkhogāhabhāvo veditabbo.
tika-vin01t1:280_13: Paṭivedhassa pana uppādetuṃ asakkuṇeyyattā taṃvisayañāṇuppattiyā ca dukkarabhāvato dukkhogāhatā veditabbā.
tika-vin01t1:280_15: Ekadesena ogāhantehipi mandabuddhīhi patiṭṭhā laddhuṃ na sakkāti āha “alabbhaneyyapatiṭṭhā cā”ti.
tika-vin01t1:281_0: Idāni hetuhetuphalādīnaṃ vasenapi gambhīrabhāvaṃ dassento āha “aparo nayo”tiādi.
tika-vin01t1:281_2: So hi attano phalaṃ dahati vidahatīti dhammoti vuccati.
tika-vin01t1:281_3: Dhammasaddassa cettha hetupariyāyatā kathaṃ viññāyatīti āha “vuttañheta”ntiādi.
tika-vin01t1:281_4: Nanu ca “hetumhi ñāṇaṃ dhammapaṭisambhidā”ti etena vacanena dhammassa hetubhāvo kathaṃ viññāyatīti ce?
tika-vin01t1:281_5: Dhammapaṭisambhidāti etassa samāsapadassa avayavapadatthaṃ dassentena “hetumhi ñāṇa”nti vuttattā.
tika-vin01t1:281_6: “Dhamme paṭisambhidā dhammapaṭisambhidā”ti ettha hi “dhamme”ti etassa atthaṃ dassentena “hetumhī”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:281_8: tasmā hetudhammasaddā ekatthā ñāṇapaṭisambhidāsaddā cāti imamatthaṃ vadantena sādhito dhammassa hetubhāvo.
tika-vin01t1:281_9: Hetuphale ñāṇaṃ atthapaṭisambhidāti etena vacanena sādhito atthassa hetuphalabhāvopi evameva daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin01t1:281_11: Tañca yasmā hetuanusārena arīyati adhigamīyati sampāpuṇīyati,
tika-vin01t1:282_0: Yathādhammanti ettha dhammasaddo hetuṃ hetuphalañca sabbaṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-vin01t1:282_6: Desanāpi hi paṭivedho viya aviparītavisayavibhāvanato dhammānurūpaṃ pavattati,
tika-vin01t1:282_9: Ettha ca abhilappatīti abhilāpoti saddo vuccati.
tika-vin01t1:282_10: Etena “tatra dhammaniruttābhilāpe ñāṇaṃ niruttipaṭisambhidā”ti ettha vuttaṃ dhammaniruttiṃ dasseti saddasabhāvattā desanāya.
tika-vin01t1:282_11: Tathā hi niruttipaṭisambhidāya parittārammaṇādibhāvo paṭisambhidāvibhaṅgapāḷiyaṃ vutto.
tika-vin01t1:282_12: Aṭṭhakathāyañca “taṃ sabhāvaniruttiṃ saddaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā”tiādinā saddārammaṇatā dassitā.
tika-vin01t1:282_13: Tathā hi imassa atthassa ayaṃ saddo vācakoti vacanavacanatthe vavatthapetvā taṃtaṃvacanatthavibhāvanavasena pavattito saddo desanāti vuccati.
tika-vin01t1:282_14: Adhippāyoti etena “desanāti paññattī”ti etaṃ vacanaṃ dhammaniruttābhilāpaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:282_15: na tato vinimuttaṃ paññattiṃ sandhāyāti adhippāyaṃ dasseti.
tika-vin01t1:282_18: pakārato ñāpetīti vā paññattīti dhammaniruttābhilāpo vuccati.
tika-vin01t1:282_19: Evaṃ “desanā nāma saddo”ti imasmiṃ pakkhe ayamattho veditabbo.
tika-vin01t1:282_20: “Desanāti paññattī”ti ettha paññattivādino pana evaṃ vadanti –
tika-vin01t1:282_21: kiñcāpi “dhammābhilāpo”ti ettha abhilappatīti abhilāpoti saddo vuccati,
tika-vin01t1:282_23: tathāpi sadde vuccamāne tadanurūpaṃ vohāraṃ gahetvā tena vohārena dīpitassa atthassa jānanato sadde kathite
tika-vin01t1:282_25: Atha vā “dhammābhilāpoti attho”ti avatvā “dhammābhilāpoti adhippāyo”ti vuttattā desanā nāma saddo na hotīti dīpitamevāti.
tika-vin01t1:283_5: Idāni abhisamayappabhedato abhisamayappakārato ārammaṇato sabhāvato ca pākaṭaṃ kātuṃ “so ca lokiyalokuttaro”tiādimāha.
tika-vin01t1:283_7: Tattha visayato atthādianurūpaṃ dhammādīsu avabodho nāma avijjādidhammārammaṇo saṅkhārādiatthārammaṇo tadubhayapaññāpanārammaṇo lokiyo avabodho.
tika-vin01t1:283_8: Asammohato atthādianurūpaṃ dhammādīsu avabodho pana nibbānārammaṇo maggayutto yathāvuttadhammatthapaññattīsu sammohaviddhaṃsano lokuttaro abhisamayo.
tika-vin01t1:283_11: ayaṃ tadubhayānurūpo vohāro”ti evaṃ ārammaṇakaraṇavasena lokiyañāṇaṃ visayato paṭivijjhati,
tika-vin01t1:283_12: lokuttarañāṇaṃ pana hetuhetuphalādīsu sammohassa maggañāṇena samucchinnattā asammohato paṭivijjhati.
tika-vin01t1:283_15: saṅkhāre uppādeti avijjāti evaṃ kāriyānurūpaṃ kāraṇesūti attho.
tika-vin01t1:283_16: Atha vā puññābhisaṅkhāraapuññābhisaṅkhāraāneñjābhisaṅkhāresu tīsu apuññābhisaṅkhārassa sampayuttaavijjā paccayo,
tika-vin01t1:283_17: itaresaṃ yathānurūpantiādinā kāriyānurūpaṃ kāraṇesu paṭivedhoti attho.
tika-vin01t1:283_18: Dhammānurūpaṃ atthesūti “avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā”tiādinā kāraṇānurūpaṃ kāriyesu avabodhoti attho.
tika-vin01t1:283_19: Paññattipathānurūpaṃ paññattīsūti paññattiyā vuccamānadhammānurūpaṃ paṇṇattīsu avabodhoti attho.
tika-vin01t1:284_0: Yathāvuttehi dhammādīhi piṭakānaṃ gambhīrabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “idāni yasmā etesu piṭakesū”tiādimāha.
tika-vin01t1:284_4: Yo cetthāti etāsu taṃtaṃpiṭakagatāsu dhammatthadesanāsu yo paṭivedhoti attho.
tika-vin01t1:284_5: Dukkhogāhanti ettha avijjāsaṅkhārādīnaṃ dhammatthānaṃ duppaṭivijjhatāya dukkhogāhatā.
tika-vin01t1:284_6: Tesaṃ paññāpanassa dukkarabhāvato desanāya paṭivedhanasaṅkhātassa paṭivedhassa ca uppādanavisayīkaraṇānaṃ asakkuṇeyyatāya dukkhogāhatā veditabbā.
tika-vin01t1:284_9: Vuttatthāti vutto saṃvaṇṇito attho assāti vuttatthā.
tika-vin01t1:285_0: Tīsu piṭakesūti ettha “ekekasmi”nti adhikārato pakaraṇato vā veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:285_4: tasmā evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo “tīsu piṭakesu ekekasmiṃ pariyāpuṇanappakāro daṭṭhabbo ñātabbo”ti.
tika-vin01t1:285_5: Tatoyeva ca “pariyattiyo pariyāpuṇanappakārā”ti tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:285_6: Atha vā tīhi pakārehi pariyāpuṇitabbā pāḷiyo eva pariyattīti vuccanti,
tika-vin01t1:285_7: tatoyeva ca “pariyattiyo pāḷikkamā”ti abhidhammaṭṭhakathāya likhite sīhaḷagaṇṭhipade vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:285_8: Evampi hi alagaddūpamāpariyāpuṇanayogato alagaddūpamā pariyattīti pāḷipi sakkā vattuṃ,
tika-vin01t1:285_9: evañca katvā “duggahitā upārambhādihetu pariyāpuṭā alagaddūpamā”ti parato niddesavacanampi upapannaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t1:285_10: Tattha hi pāḷiyeva duggahitā pariyāpuṭāti vattuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin01t1:285_11: Alagaddūpamāti alagaddo alagaddaggahaṇaṃ upamā etissāti alagaddūpamā.
tika-vin01t1:285_13: “Āpūpiko”ti ettha apūpasaddena apūpakhādanaṃ viya alagaddaggahaṇena gahitapariyatti upamīyati,
tika-vin01t1:285_15: “Alagaddaggahaṇūpamā”ti vā vattabbe majjhepadalopaṃ katvā “alagaddūpamā”ti vuttaṃ “oṭṭhamukho”tiādīsu viya.
tika-vin01t1:285_19: tasmā alaṃ pariyatto paripuṇṇo gado assāti anunāsikalopaṃ dakārāgamañca katvā “alagaddo”ti vuccati.
tika-vin01t1:285_20: Atha vā alaṃ jīvitaharaṇe samattho gado assāti alagaddo.
tika-vin01t1:285_21: Nissaraṇatthāti vaṭṭadukkhato nissaraṇaṃ attho payojanaṃ etissāti nissaraṇatthā.
tika-vin01t1:285_25: Aññaṃ atthaṃ anapekkhitvā bhaṇḍāgārikasseva sato pariyatti bhaṇḍāgārikapariyatti.
tika-vin01t1:287_1: catuparisamajjhe vā maṃ jānissantī’ti lābhasakkārādihetu pariyāpuṇāti,
tika-vin01t1:287_3: Evaṃ pariyāpuṇanato hi buddhavacanaṃ apariyāpuṇitvā niddokkamanaṃ varatara”nti.
tika-vin01t1:288_0: Nanu ca alagaddaggahaṇūpamā pariyatti alagaddūpamāti vuccati,
tika-vin01t1:288_1: evañca sati suggahitāpi pariyatti alagaddūpamāti vattuṃ vaṭṭati tatthāpi alagaddaggahaṇassa upamābhāvena pāḷiyaṃ vuttattā.
tika-vin01t1:289_5: ajapadena daṇḍena suniggahitaṃ niggahetvā gīvāya suggahitaṃ gaṇheyya.
tika-vin01t1:289_8: alagaddo tassa purisassa hatthaṃ vā bāhaṃ vā aññataraṃ vā aṅgapaccaṅgaṃ bhogehi paliveṭheyya,
tika-vin01t1:289_9: atha kho so neva tatonidānaṃ maraṇaṃ vā nigaccheyya maraṇattaṃ vā dukkhaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:289_16: idhekacce kulaputtā dhammaṃ pariyāpuṇanti suttaṃ geyya”ntiādi.
tika-vin01t1:290_0: Tasmā idha duggahitā eva pariyatti alagaddūpamāti ayaṃ viseso kuto viññāyati,
tika-vin01t1:290_1: yena duggahitā upārambhādihetu pariyāpuṭā alagaddūpamāti vuccatīti?
tika-vin01t1:290_4: Tathā hi nissaraṇatthabhaṇḍāgārikapariyattīnaṃ visuṃ gahitattā pārisesato alagaddassa duggahaṇūpamā pariyatti alagaddūpamāti viññāyati.
tika-vin01t1:290_5: Suggahaṇūpamā hi pariyatti nissaraṇatthā vā hoti bhaṇḍāgārikapariyatti vā,
tika-vin01t1:291_4: Hatthe vā bāhāya vāti ettha maṇibandhako yāva agganakhā “hattho”ti veditabbo,
tika-vin01t1:291_6: Katthaci pana “kapparato paṭṭhāyapi yāva agganakhā hattho”ti vuccati.
tika-vin01t1:291_7: Aññatarasmiṃ vā aṅgapaccaṅgeti vuttalakkhaṇaṃ hatthañca bāhañca ṭhapetvā avasesaṃ sarīraṃ “aṅgapaccaṅga”nti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:291_11: Taṃ hatthādīsu ḍaṃsanaṃ nidānaṃ kāraṇaṃ etassāti taṃnidānanti hi vattabbe “tatonidāna”nti purimapade
tika-vin01t1:291_12: paccatte nissakkavacanaṃ katvā tassa ca lopaṃ akatvā niddeso.
tika-vin01t1:291_13: Taṃ kissa hetūti yaṃ vuttaṃ hatthādīsu ḍaṃsanaṃ taṃnidānañca maraṇādiupagamanaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:291_14: taṃ kissa hetu kena kāraṇenāti ce.
tika-vin01t1:291_19: sajjhāyanti ceva vācuggatā karontā dhārenti cāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t1:291_21: Na upaparikkhantīti na pariggaṇhanti na vicārenti.
tika-vin01t1:291_26: mayañca taṃ pūressāmā”ti evaṃ bhāsitatthaṃ payojanatthañca “sīlaṃ samādhissa kāraṇaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:291_30: nijjhāyitvā paññāya disvā rocetvā gahetabbā na hontīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin01t1:291_31: Tena imamatthaṃ dīpeti “tesaṃ paññāya atthaṃ anupaparikkhantānaṃ te dhammā na upaṭṭhahanti,
tika-vin01t1:291_34: vivaṭṭaṃ kathita’nti evaṃ jānituṃ na sakkā hontī”ti.
tika-vin01t1:292_0: Te upārambhānisaṃsā cevāti te paresaṃ vāde dosāropanānisaṃsā hutvā pariyāpuṇantīti attho.
tika-vin01t1:292_1: Itivādappamokkhānisaṃsā cāti iti evaṃ etāya pariyattiyā vādappamokkhānisaṃsā,
tika-vin01t1:292_2: attano upari parehi āropitavādassa niggahassa pamokkhappayojanā hutvā dhammaṃ pariyāpuṇantīti attho.
tika-vin01t1:292_4: parehi sakavāde dose āropite taṃ dosaṃ evañca evañca mocessāmāti iminā ca kāraṇena pariyāpuṇantīti.
tika-vin01t1:292_5: Atha vā so so vādo itivādo,
tika-vin01t1:292_9: Yassa catthāya dhammaṃ pariyāpuṇantīti yassa ca sīlādipūraṇassa maggaphalanibbānassa vā atthāya imasmiṃ sāsane kulaputtā dhammaṃ pariyāpuṇanti.
tika-vin01t1:292_10: Tañcassa atthaṃ nānubhontīti tañca assa dhammassa sīlādiparipūraṇasaṅkhātaṃ atthaṃ ete duggahitagāhino nānubhonti na vindanti.
tika-vin01t1:293_0: Atha vā yassa upārambhassa itivādappamokkhassa vā atthāya ye moghapurisā dhammaṃ pariyāpuṇanti,
tika-vin01t1:293_1: te parehi “ayamattho na hotī”ti vutte duggahitattāyeva soyevatthoti paṭipādanakkhamā na hontīti parassa
tika-vin01t1:293_2: vāde upārambhaṃ āropetuṃ attano vādā taṃ mocetuñca asakkontāpi taṃ atthaṃ nānubhontiyevāti evamattho
tika-vin01t1:293_4: Dīgharattaṃ ahitāya dukkhāya saṃvattantīti tesaṃ te dhammā duggahitattā upārambhamānadappamakkhapalāsādihetubhāvena
tika-vin01t1:293_6: Ettha hi kāraṇe phalavohārena “te dhammā ahitāya dukkhāya saṃvattantī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:293_7: Tathā hi kiñcāpi na te dhammā ahitāya dukkhāya saṃvattanti,
tika-vin01t1:293_8: tathāpi vuttanayena pariyāpuṇantānaṃ sajjhāyakāle vivādasamaye ca taṃmūlakānaṃ upārambhādīnaṃ anekesaṃ
tika-vin01t1:293_9: akusalānaṃ uppattisabbhāvato “te dhammā ahitāya dukkhāya saṃvattantī”ti kāraṇe phalavohārena vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:293_10: Taṃ kissa hetūti ettha tanti yathāvuttassatthassa anabhisambhuṇanaṃ tesañca dhammānaṃ ahitāya dukkhāya saṃvattanaṃ parāmasati.
tika-vin01t1:294_0: Sīlakkhandhādipāripūriṃyevāti ettha ādisaddena samādhivipassanādīnaṃ saṅgaho veditabbo.
tika-vin01t1:294_1: Yo hi buddhavacanaṃ uggaṇhitvā sīlassa āgataṭṭhāne sīlaṃ pūretvā samādhino āgataṭṭhāne samādhigabbhaṃ
tika-vin01t1:294_2: gaṇhāpetvā vipassanāya āgataṭṭhāne vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā maggaphalānaṃ āgataṭṭhāne maggaṃ bhāvessāmi,
tika-vin01t1:294_4: tasseva sā pariyatti nissaraṇatthā nāma hoti.
tika-vin01t1:294_5: Yaṃ sandhāya vuttanti yaṃ pariyattisuggahaṇaṃ sandhāya alagaddasutte vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:294_6: Dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāya saṃvattantīti sīlādīnaṃ āgataṭṭhāne sīlādīni pūrentānampi arahattaṃ patvā
tika-vin01t1:294_7: parisamajjhe dhammaṃ desetvā dhammadesanāya pasannehi upanīte cattāro paccaye paribhuñjantānampi paresaṃ
tika-vin01t1:294_8: vāde sahadhammena upārambhaṃ āropentānampi sakavādato dosaṃ harantānampi dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāya saṃvattanti.
tika-vin01t1:294_9: Tathā hi na kevalaṃ suggahitapariyattiṃ nissāya maggabhāvanāphalasacchikiriyādīneva,
tika-vin01t1:294_11: Tathā ca vuttaṃ “uppannaṃ parappavādaṃ sahadhammena suniggahitaṃ niggahetvā”tiādi.
tika-vin01t1:295_3: Na kuppatīti akuppanti hi arahattaphalassetaṃ nāmaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:295_4: Satipi hi catunnaṃ maggānaṃ catunnañca phalānaṃ akuppasabhāve sattannaṃ sekkhānaṃ sakasakanāmapariccāgena
tika-vin01t1:295_5: uparūpari nāmantarappattito tesaṃ maggaphalāni “akuppānī”ti na vuccanti,
tika-vin01t1:295_6: arahā pana sabbadāpi arahāyeva nāmāti tasseva phalaṃ “akuppa”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:295_7: Iminā ca imamatthaṃ dasseti “khīṇāsavasseva pariyatti bhaṇḍāgārikapariyatti nāmā”ti.
tika-vin01t1:295_8: Tassa hi apariññātaṃ appahīnaṃ abhāvitaṃ asacchikataṃ vā natthi,
tika-vin01t1:295_9: tasmā buddhavacanaṃ pariyāpuṇanto tantidhārako paveṇīpālako vaṃsānurakkhako ca hutvā uggaṇhāti.
tika-vin01t1:296_0: Nanu ca yadi paveṇīpālanatthāya buddhavacanassa pariyāpuṇanaṃ bhaṇḍāgārikapariyatti,
tika-vin01t1:296_2: Ekaccassa puthujjanassapi hi ayaṃ nayo labbhati.
tika-vin01t1:296_3: Tathā hi ekacco bhikkhu chātakabhayādīsu ganthadharesu ekasmiṃ ṭhāne vasituṃ asakkontesu sayaṃ bhikkhācārena
tika-vin01t1:296_8: tasmā tassapi pariyatti bhaṇḍāgārikapariyatti nāma kasmā na hotīti? Vuccate –
tika-vin01t1:296_9: evaṃ santepi puthujjanassa pariyatti bhaṇḍāgārikapariyatti nāma na hoti.
tika-vin01t1:296_10: Kiñcāpi hi puthujjano “paveṇiṃ pālessāmī”ti ajjhāsayena pariyāpuṇāti,
tika-vin01t1:296_11: attano pana bhavakantārato anittiṇṇattā tassa pariyatti nissaraṇapariyatti nāma hoti,
tika-vin01t1:296_12: tasmā puthujjanassa pariyatti alagaddūpamā vā hoti nissaraṇatthā vā,
tika-vin01t1:296_16: Yathā hi bhaṇḍāgāriko alaṅkārabhaṇḍaṃ paṭisāmetvā pasādhanakāle tadupiyaṃ alaṅkārabhaṇḍaṃ rañño upanāmetvā alaṅkaroti,
tika-vin01t1:296_17: evaṃ khīṇāsavopi dhammaratanabhaṇḍaṃ sampaṭicchitvā mokkhādhigamassa bhabbarūpe sahetuke satte passitvā
tika-vin01t1:296_18: tadanurūpaṃ dhammadesanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā maggaṅgabojjhaṅgādisaṅkhātena lokuttarena alaṅkārena alaṅkarotīti
tika-vin01t1:297_0: Evaṃ tisso pariyattiyo vibhajitvā idāni tīsupi piṭakesu yathārahaṃ sampattivipattiyo vitthāretvā dassento āha “vinaye panā”tiādi.
tika-vin01t1:297_1: Sīlasampattiṃ nissāya tisso vijjā pāpuṇātītiādīsu yasmā sīlaṃ visujjhamānaṃ satisampajaññabalena kammassakataññāṇabalena
tika-vin01t1:297_4: tasmā sīlasampadā sijjhamānā upanissayasampattibhāvena satibalaṃ ñāṇabalañca paccupaṭṭhapetīti tassā
tika-vin01t1:297_7: sampajaññena sabbakiccesu sudiṭṭhakāritāparicayena cutūpapātañāṇānubaddhāya dutiyavijjāya siddhi,
tika-vin01t1:297_9: Puretarasiddhānaṃ samādhipaññānaṃ pāripūriṃ vinā sīlassa āsavakkhayañāṇūpanissayatā sukkhavipassakakhīṇāsavehi dīpetabbā.
tika-vin01t1:297_10: “Samāhito yathābhūtaṃ pajānātī”ti vacanato samādhisampadā chaḷabhiññatāya upanissayo.
tika-vin01t1:297_11: “Yogā ve jāyati bhūrī”ti vacanato pubbayogena garuvāsadesabhāsākosallauggahaṇaparipucchādīhi ca paribhāvitā
tika-vin01t1:297_13: Ettha ca “sīlasampattiṃ nissāyā”ti vuttattā yassa samādhivijambhanabhūtā anavasesā cha abhiññā na ijjhanti,
tika-vin01t1:297_14: tassa ukkaṭṭhaparicchedavasena na samādhisampadā atthīti satipi vijjānaṃ abhiññekadesabhāve sīlasampattisamudāgatā eva tisso vijjā gahitā.
tika-vin01t1:297_15: Yathā hi paññāsampattisamudāgatā catasso paṭisambhidā upanissayasampannassa maggeneva ijjhanti maggakkhaṇe eva tāsaṃ paṭilabhitabbato.
tika-vin01t1:297_16: Evaṃ sīlasampattisamudāgatā tisso vijjā samādhisampattisamudāgatā ca cha abhiññā upanissayasampannassa
tika-vin01t1:297_17: maggeneva ijjhantīti maggādhigameneva tāsaṃ adhigamo veditabbo.
tika-vin01t1:297_18: Paccekabuddhānaṃ sammāsambuddhānañca paccekabodhisammāsambodhidhammasamadhigamasadisā hi imesaṃ ariyānaṃ ime visesādhigamāti.
tika-vin01t1:298_0: Tāsaṃyeva ca tattha pabhedavacanatoti ettha tāsaṃyevāti avadhāraṇaṃ pāpuṇitabbānaṃ chaḷabhiññācatupaṭisambhidānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:298_3: Dutiye tāsaṃyevāti avadhāraṇaṃ catasso paṭisambhidā apekkhitvā kataṃ,
tika-vin01t1:298_5: Tā hi chasu abhiññāsu antogadhattā sutte vibhattāyevāti.
tika-vin01t1:298_8: Abhidhammapiṭake hi tisso vijjā cha abhiññā catasso ca paṭisambhidā vuttāyeva.
tika-vin01t1:298_9: Paṭisambhidānaṃ pana aññattha pabhedavacanābhāvaṃ tattheva ca sammā vibhattabhāvaṃ dīpetukāmo heṭṭhā
tika-vin01t1:298_10: vuttanayena avadhāraṇaṃ akatvā “tatthevā”ti parivattetvā avadhāraṇaṃ ṭhapesi.
tika-vin01t1:299_0: Idāni “vinaye duppaṭipanno ‘mudukānaṃ attharaṇādīnaṃ samphasso viya itthisamphassopi vaṭṭatī’ti methunavītikkame
tika-vin01t1:299_1: dosaṃ adisvā sīlavipattiṃ pāpuṇātī”ti dassento āha “vinaye pana duppaṭipanno”tiādi.
tika-vin01t1:299_7: So hi bahussuto dhammakathiko kammakilesavipākaupavādaāṇāvītikkamavasena pañcavidhesu antarāyikesu sesantarāyike jānāti,
tika-vin01t1:299_8: vinaye pana akovidattā paṇṇattivītikkamantarāyike na jānāti,
tika-vin01t1:299_9: tasmā rahogato evaṃ cintesi “ime agārikā pañca kāmaguṇe paribhuñjantā sotāpannāpi sakadāgāminopi anāgāminopi honti.
tika-vin01t1:299_15: etepi vaṭṭantī”ti anavajjena paccayaparibhuñjanarasena sāvajjakāmaguṇaparibhogarasaṃ saṃsanditvā sacchandarāgaparibhogañca
tika-vin01t1:299_16: nicchandarāgaparibhogañca ekaṃ katvā thūlavākehi saddhiṃ atisukhumasuttaṃ ghaṭento viya sāsapena saddhiṃ
tika-vin01t1:299_17: sineruno sadisataṃ upasaṃharanto viya pāpakaṃ diṭṭhigataṃ uppādetvā “kiṃ bhagavatā mahāsamuddaṃ bandhantena
tika-vin01t1:299_19: natthi ettha doso”ti sabbaññutaññāṇena saddhiṃ paṭivirujjhanto vesārajjañāṇaṃ paṭibāhanto ariyamagge
tika-vin01t1:299_20: khāṇukaṇṭakādīni pakkhipanto “methunadhamme doso natthī”ti jinassa āṇācakke pahāramadāsi.
tika-vin01t1:300_0: Tattha antarāyikāti taṃtaṃsampattiyā vibandhanavasena sattasantānassa antare vemajjhe eti āgacchatīti antarāyo,
tika-vin01t1:300_7: Tesaṃ vitthārakathā parato ariṭṭhasikkhāpade āvi bhavissati.
tika-vin01t1:300_9: ye ime dhammā antarāyikā antarāyakarāti bhagavatā vuttā desitā ceva paññattā ca,
tika-vin01t1:300_10: te dhamme paṭisevato paṭisevantassa yathā yena pakārena te dhammā antarāyāya saggamokkhānaṃ antarāyakaraṇatthaṃ nālaṃ samatthā na honti,
tika-vin01t1:300_11: tathā tena pakārenāhaṃ bhagavatā desitaṃ dhammaṃ ājānāmīti.
tika-vin01t1:300_12: Tato dussīlabhāvaṃ pāpuṇātīti tato anavajjasaññībhāvahetuto vītikkamitvā dussīlabhāvaṃ pāpuṇāti.
tika-vin01t1:302_8: neva attahitāya paṭipanno hoti no parahitāya,
tika-vin01t1:302_9: attahitāya ceva paṭipanno hoti parahitāya cā”ti –
tika-vin01t1:303_2: na paramatthato”ti evaṃ bhagavato adhippāyaṃ ajānanto.
tika-vin01t1:303_3: Buddhassa hi bhagavato duvidhā desanā sammutidesanā paramatthadesanā cāti.
tika-vin01t1:303_4: Tattha “puggalo satto itthī puriso khattiyo brāhmaṇo devo māro”ti evarūpā sammutidesanā.
tika-vin01t1:303_5: “Aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ anattā khandhā dhātuyo āyatanāni satipaṭṭhānā”ti evarūpā paramatthadesanā.
tika-vin01t1:303_6: Tattha bhagavā ye sammutivasena desanaṃ sutvā atthaṃ paṭivijjhitvā mohaṃ pahāya visesamadhigantuṃ samatthā,
tika-vin01t1:303_8: Ye pana paramatthavasena desanaṃ sutvā atthaṃ paṭivijjhitvā mohaṃ pahāya visesamadhigantuṃ samatthā,
tika-vin01t1:304_1: yathā hi desabhāsākusalo tiṇṇaṃ vedānaṃ atthasaṃvaṇṇako ācariyo ye damiḷabhāsāya vutte atthaṃ jānanti,
tika-vin01t1:304_5: evaṃ te māṇavā chekaṃ byattaṃ ācariyamāgamma khippameva sippaṃ uggaṇhanti.
tika-vin01t1:304_7: tayo vedā viya kathetabbabhāve ṭhitāni tīṇi piṭakāni,
tika-vin01t1:304_10: ācariyassa damiḷabhāsādiācikkhanaṃ viya bhagavato sammutiparamatthavasenapi desanā veditabbā.
tika-vin01t1:311_0: Apica aṭṭhahi kāraṇehi bhagavā puggalakathaṃ katheti –
tika-vin01t1:311_3: “Khandhā dhātuyo āyatanāni hiriyanti ottappantī”ti vutte mahājano na jānāti,
tika-vin01t1:311_5: paṭisattu hoti “kimidaṃ khandhā dhātuyo āyatanāni hiriyanti ottappanti nāmā”ti.
tika-vin01t1:311_7: puriso khattiyo brāhmaṇo devo māro”ti vutte mahājano jānāti,
tika-vin01t1:311_11: “Khandhā kammassakā dhātuyo āyatanānī”ti vuttepi eseva nayo.
tika-vin01t1:312_7: dhātuyo āyatanānī”ti vuttepi mahājano na jānāti,
tika-vin01t1:312_9: paṭisattu hoti “kimidaṃ khandhā dhātuyo āyatanāni paṭiggaṇhanti nāmā”ti.
tika-vin01t1:312_10: “Puggalā paṭiggaṇhanti sīlavanto kalyāṇadhammā”ti vutte pana jānāti,
tika-vin01t1:312_15: lokasamaññāya lokaniruttiyā lokābhilāpe ṭhitāyeva dhammaṃ desenti.
tika-vin01t1:312_16: Tasmā bhagavā lokasammutiyā appahānatthampi puggalakathaṃ katheti,
tika-vin01t1:312_17: tasmā iminā ca adhippāyena bhagavato puggaladesanā,
tika-vin01t1:312_18: na paramatthadesanāti evaṃ adhippāyaṃ ajānantoti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t1:313_0: Duggahitaṃ gaṇhātīti “tathāhaṃ bhagavatā dhammaṃ desitaṃ ājānāmi,
tika-vin01t1:313_9: tasmā attano duggahaṇena viparītagāhenāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t1:313_10: Amhe ceva abbhācikkhatīti amhākañca abbhācikkhanaṃ karoti.
tika-vin01t1:313_11: Attānañca khanatīti attano kusalamūlāni khananto attānaṃ khanati nāma.
tika-vin01t1:314_3: sabbaṃ cittaṃ asabhāvadhammārammaṇa”nti evamādinā atidhāvanto atikkamitvā pavattamāno.
tika-vin01t1:315_3: yāni cintento ummādassa vighātassa bhāgī assa.
tika-vin01t1:315_5: Buddhānaṃ bhikkhave buddhavisayo acinteyyo na cintetabbo,
tika-vin01t1:315_6: yaṃ cintento ummādassa vighātassa bhāgī assa. Jhāyissa,
tika-vin01t1:315_12: lokacintā bhikkhave acinteyyā na cintetabbā…pe… imāni,
tika-vin01t1:315_15: yāni cintento ummādassa vighātassa bhāgī assā”ti.
tika-vin01t1:316_5: kāmaṃ acinteyyānipi cha asādhāraṇādīni anussarantassa kusaluppattihetubhāvato tāni cintetabbāni,
tika-vin01t1:316_6: imāni pana evaṃ na hontīti aphalabhāvato na cintetabbānīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin01t1:316_7: Tenevāha “yāni cintento ummādassa vighātassa bhāgī assā”ti.
tika-vin01t1:317_1: Tivaggasaṅgahānīti sīlakkhandhavaggamahāvaggapāthikavaggasaṅkhātehi tīhi vaggehi saṅgaho etesanti tivaggasaṅgahāni.
tika-vin01t1:317_3: yassa nikāyassa suttagaṇanāto catuttiṃseva ca suttantā vaggasaṅgahavasena tayo vaggā assa saṅgahassāti tivaggo saṅgaho.
tika-vin01t1:317_4: Esa paṭhamo nikāyo dīghanikāyoti anulomiko apaccanīko,
tika-vin01t1:318_7: Evamādīni cettha sādhakāni sāsanato ca lokato cāti evamādīni udāharaṇāni ettha nikāyasaddassa samūhanivāsānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:318_8: vācakabhāve sāsanato ca vohārato ca sādhakāni pamāṇānīti attho.
tika-vin01t1:319_0: Pañcadasavaggasaṅgahānīti mūlapariyāyavaggādīhi pañcadasahi vaggehi saṅgaho etesanti pañcadasavaggasaṅgahāni.
tika-vin01t1:319_1: Diyaḍḍhasataṃ dve ca suttānīti aḍḍhena dutiyaṃ diyaḍḍhaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:319_2: ekaṃ sataṃ dve paññāsasuttāni cāti attho.
tika-vin01t1:319_4: Pañcadasavaggapariggahoti pañcadasahi vaggehi pariggahito saṅgahitoti attho.
tika-vin01t1:320_0: Suttantānaṃ sahassāni sattasuttasatāni cāti pāṭhe suttantānaṃ satta sahassāni satta satāni cāti yojetabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:320_1: Katthaci pana “satta suttasahassāni satta suttasatāni cā”tipi pāṭho.
tika-vin01t1:321_1: Vuttameva pakārantarena saṅkhipitvā dassetuṃ “ṭhapetvā cattāro nikāye avasesaṃ buddhavacana”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:321_2: Sakalaṃ vinayapiṭakantiādinā niddiṭṭhameva hi iminā pakārantarena saṅkhipitvā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:321_4: Tadaññanti tehi catūhi nikāyehi aññaṃ avasesanti attho.
tika-vin01t1:322_1: Navappabhedanti ettha kathaṃ panetaṃ navappabhedaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t1:322_2: Tathā hi navahi aṅgehi vavatthitehi aññamaññasaṅkararahitehi bhavitabbaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:322_3: tathā ca sati asuttasabhāvāneva geyyaṅgādīni siyuṃ,
tika-vin01t1:322_5: evaṃ sati suttanti visuṃ suttaṅgameva na siyā,
tika-vin01t1:322_9: Suttañca nāma sagāthakaṃ vā siyā niggāthakaṃ vāti aṅgadvayeneva tadubhayaṃ saṅgahitanti tadubhayavinimuttañca
tika-vin01t1:322_13: maṅgalasuttādīnaṃ suttaṅgasaṅgaho vā na siyā gāthābhāvato dhammapadādīnaṃ viya,
tika-vin01t1:322_14: geyyaṅgasaṅgaho vā siyā sagāthakattā sagāthakavaggassa viya,
tika-vin01t1:327_0: Sabbassapi hi buddhavacanassa suttanti ayaṃ sāmaññavidhi.
tika-vin01t1:327_1: Tathā hi “ettakaṃ tassa bhagavato suttāgataṃ suttapariyāpannaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:327_3: sakavāde pañca suttasatānī”tiādivacanato vinayābhidhammapariyattivisesesupi suttavohāro dissati.
tika-vin01t1:327_4: Teneva ca āyasmā mahākaccāno nettiyaṃ āha –
tika-vin01t1:327_6: Tattha hi suttādivasena navaṅgassa sāsanassa pariyeṭṭhi pariyesanā atthavicāraṇā “navavidhasuttantapariyeṭṭhī”ti vuttā.
tika-vin01t1:327_7: Tadekadesesu pana geyyādayo visesavidhayo tena tena nimittena patiṭṭhitā.
tika-vin01t1:327_9: Lokepi hi sasilokaṃ sagāthakaṃ vā cuṇṇiyaganthaṃ “geyya”nti vadanti.
tika-vin01t1:327_10: Gāthāvirahe pana sati pucchaṃ katvā visajjanabhāvo veyyākaraṇassa tabbhāvanimittaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:327_13: Evaṃ sante sagāthakādīnampi pucchaṃ katvā visajjanavasena pavattānaṃ veyyākaraṇabhāvo āpajjatīti?
tika-vin01t1:327_15: Geyyādisaññānaṃ anokāsabhāvato saokāsato anokāsavidhi balavāti “gāthāvirahe satī”ti visesitattā ca.
tika-vin01t1:327_16: Tathā hi dhammapadādīsu kevalaṃ gāthābandhesu sagāthakattepi somanassañāṇamayikagāthāyuttesu “vuttañheta”ntiādivacanasambandhesu
tika-vin01t1:327_17: abbhutadhammapaṭisaṃyuttesu ca suttavisesesu yathākkamaṃ gāthāudānaitivuttakaabbhutadhammasaññā patiṭṭhitā.
tika-vin01t1:327_18: Ettha hi satipi saññantaranimittayoge anokāsasaññānaṃ balavabhāveneva gāthādisaññā patiṭṭhitā,
tika-vin01t1:327_19: tathā satipi gāthābandhabhāve bhagavato atītāsu jātīsu cariyānubhāvappakāsakesu jātakasaññā patiṭṭhitā,
tika-vin01t1:327_20: satipi pañhāvisajjanabhāve sagāthakatte ca kesuci suttantesu vedassa labhāpanato vedallasaññā patiṭṭhitāti
tika-vin01t1:327_21: evaṃ tena tena sagāthakattādinā nimittena tesu tesu suttavisesesu geyyādisaññā patiṭṭhitāti visesavidhayo
tika-vin01t1:328_0: Nanu ca evaṃ santepi sagāthakaṃ suttaṃ geyyaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:328_1: niggāthakaṃ suttaṃ veyyākaraṇanti suttaṅgaṃ na sambhavatīti codanā tadavatthā evāti?
tika-vin01t1:328_4: Sodhitañhi pubbe gāthāvirahe sati pucchāvisajjanabhāvo veyyākaraṇassa tabbhāvanimittanti.
tika-vin01t1:328_5: Yañca vuttaṃ “gāthābhāvato maṅgalasuttādīnaṃ suttaṅgasaṅgaho na siyā”ti, taṃ na,
tika-vin01t1:328_8: Na hi tāni dhammapadabuddhavaṃsādayo viya gāthābhāvena paññātāni,
tika-vin01t1:328_10: Teneva hi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ suttanāmakanti nāmaggahaṇaṃ kataṃ.
tika-vin01t1:328_14: Sahabhāvo hi nāma atthato aññena hoti,
tika-vin01t1:328_16: Na ca maṅgalasuttādīsu gāthāvinimutto koci suttappadeso atthi,
tika-vin01t1:328_18: Nanu ca gāthāsamudāyo gāthāhi añño hoti,
tika-vin01t1:328_19: tathā ca tassa vasena saha gāthāhīti sagāthakanti sakkā vattunti? Taṃ na.
tika-vin01t1:328_20: Na hi avayavavinimutto samudāyo nāma koci atthi.
tika-vin01t1:328_24: Atho na tāhi ubhatovibhaṅgādīnaṃ geyyaṅgabhāvoti evaṃ suttādīnaṃ aṅgānaṃ aññamaññasaṅkarābhāvo veditabbo.
tika-vin01t1:329_0: Idāni suttādīni navaṅgāni vibhajitvā dassento āha “tattha ubhatovibhaṅganiddesakhandhakaparivārā”tiādi.
tika-vin01t1:331_0: Addhā pītimano hoti, laddhā macco yadicchatī”ti. –
tika-vin01t1:342_0: Ādinā āgatassa khaggavisāṇasuttassa ca tadatthavibhāgavasena satthukappena āyasmatā dhammasenāpatisāriputtattherena
tika-vin01t1:342_1: kato niddeso mahāniddeso cūḷaniddesoti ca vuccati.
tika-vin01t1:342_2: Evamidha niddesassa suttaṅgasaṅgaho bhadantabuddhaghosācariyena dassitoti veditabbo.
tika-vin01t1:342_3: Aññatthāpi ca dīghanikāyaṭṭhakathādīsu sabbattha ubhatovibhaṅganiddesakhandhakaparivārāti niddesassa suttaṅgasaṅgaho eva dassito.
tika-vin01t1:342_5: Keci pana niddesassa gāthāveyyākaraṇaṅgesu dvīsu saṅgahaṃ vadanti.
tika-vin01t1:343_0: “Tadetaṃ vinayapiṭakaṃ suttantapiṭakaṃ abhidhammapiṭakanti tīsu piṭakesu suttantapiṭakapariyāpannaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:343_1: dīghanikāyo majjhimanikāyo saṃyuttanikāyo aṅguttaranikāyo khuddakanikāyoti pañcasu mahānikāyesu khuddakamahānikāye pariyāpannaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:343_2: suttaṃ geyyaṃ veyyākaraṇaṃ gāthā udānaṃ itivuttakaṃ jātakaṃ abbhutadhammaṃ vedallanti navasu satthusāsanaṅgesu
tika-vin01t1:344_0: Ettha tāva katthaci pucchāvisajjanasabhāvato niddesekadesassa veyyākaraṇaṅgasaṅgaho yujjatu nāma,
tika-vin01t1:344_1: gāthaṅgasaṅgaho pana kathaṃ yujjeyyāti idamettha vīmaṃsitabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:344_2: Dhammapadādīnaṃ viya hi kevalaṃ gāthābandhabhāvo gāthaṅgassa tabbhāvanimittaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:344_3: Dhammapadādīsu hi kevalaṃ gāthābandhesu gāthāsamaññā patiṭṭhitā,
tika-vin01t1:344_4: niddese ca na koci kevalo gāthābandhappadeso upalabbhati.
tika-vin01t1:344_5: Sammāsambuddhena bhāsitānaṃyeva hi aṭṭhakavaggādisaṅgahitānaṃ gāthānaṃ niddesamattaṃ dhammasenāpatinā kataṃ.
tika-vin01t1:344_6: Atthavibhajanatthaṃ ānītāpi hi tā aṭṭhakavaggādisaṅgahitā niddisitabbā mūlagāthāyo suttanipātapariyāpannattā
tika-vin01t1:344_7: aññāyevāti na niddesasaṅkhyaṃ gacchanti ubhatovibhaṅgādīsu āgatabhāvepi taṃ vohāraṃ alabhamānā jātakādigāthāpariyāpannā
tika-vin01t1:345_0: Nālakasuttatuvaṭṭakasuttānīti ettha nālakasuttaṃ nāma padumuttarassa bhagavato sāvakaṃ moneyyapaṭipadaṃ
tika-vin01t1:345_1: paṭipannaṃ disvā tadatthaṃ abhikaṅkhamānena tato pabhuti kappasatasahassaṃ pāramiyo pūretvā āgatena asitassa
tika-vin01t1:345_2: isino bhāgineyyena nālakattherena dhammacakkappavattitadivasato sattame divase “aññātameta”ntiādīhi dvīhi
tika-vin01t1:345_3: gāthāhi moneyyapaṭipadaṃ puṭṭhena bhagavatā “moneyyaṃ te upaññissa”ntiādinā nālakattherassa bhāsitaṃ
tika-vin01t1:345_5: Tuvaṭṭakasuttaṃ pana mahāsamayasuttantadesanāya sannipatitesu devesu “kā nu kho arahattappattiyā paṭipattī”ti
tika-vin01t1:345_6: uppannacittānaṃ ekaccānaṃ devatānaṃ tamatthaṃ pakāsetuṃ “pucchāmi taṃ ādiccabandhū”tiādinā nimmitabuddhena
tika-vin01t1:345_9: tattheva āgatānaṃ asuttanāmikānaṃ suddhikagāthānaṃ gāthaṅgasaṅgahañca dassayissati,
tika-vin01t1:348_2: Kevalañhi tattha codakena sagāthakattaṃ katthaci pucchāvisajjanamattañca gahetvā codanāmattaṃ katanti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:348_3: Aññathā suttanipāte niggāthakassa suttasseva abhāvato veyyākaraṇaṅgasaṅgaho na codetabbo siyāti.
tika-vin01t1:348_5: “Aṭṭhahi aṅgehi asaṅgahitaṃ nāma paṭisambhidādī”ti tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:352_0: Ādinā pārāyanavaggassa nidānaṃ āropentena āyasmatā ānandattherena saṅgītikāle vuttā chappaññāsa ca gāthāyo,
tika-vin01t1:352_1: ānandatthereneva saṅgītikāle nālakasuttassa nidānaṃ āropentena vuttā –
tika-vin01t1:357_1: Tattha “nālakasuttassa vatthugāthāyo nālakasuttasaṅkhyaṃyeva gacchantī”ti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:358_0: “Parinibbute pana bhagavati saṅgītiṃ karontena āyasmatā mahākassapena āyasmā ānando tameva moneyyapaṭipadaṃ
tika-vin01t1:358_1: puṭṭho yena yadā ca samādapito nālako bhagavantaṃ pucchi,
tika-vin01t1:358_2: taṃ sabbaṃ pākaṭaṃ katvā dassetukāmo ‘ānandajāte’tiādikā vīsati vatthugāthāyo vatvā abhāsi.
tika-vin01t1:359_0: Tasmā nālakasuttassa vatthugāthāyo nālakasuttaggahaṇeneva saṅgahitāti pārāyanikavaggassa vatthugāthāyo idha suddhikagāthāti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:359_1: Tattheva panassa pārāyaniyavagge ajitamāṇavakādīnaṃ soḷasannaṃ brāhmaṇānaṃ pucchāgāthā bhagavato visajjanagāthā
tika-vin01t1:359_2: ca idha suddhikagāthāti evampi vattuṃ yujjati.
tika-vin01t1:359_3: Tāpi hi pāḷiyaṃ suttanāmena avatvā “ajitamāṇavakapucchā tissamettayyamāṇavakapucchā”tiādinā āgatattā
tika-vin01t1:359_4: cuṇṇiyaganthehi amissattā ca nosuttanāmikā suddhikagāthā nāmāti vattuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-vin01t1:360_5: Yathā hi yaṃ telādi minitabbavatthu mānaṃ gahetuṃ na sakkoti,
tika-vin01t1:360_8: yañca jalaṃ taḷākaṃ gahetuṃ na sakkoti,
tika-vin01t1:360_11: evameva yaṃ pītivegasamuṭṭhāpitaṃ vitakkavipphāraṃ hadayaṃ sandhāretuṃ na sakkoti,
tika-vin01t1:360_12: so adhiko hutvā anto asaṇṭhahitvā bahi vacīdvārena nikkhanto paṭiggāhakanirapekkho udāhāraviseso “udāna”nti vuccati.
tika-vin01t1:360_14: Tayidaṃ katthaci gāthābandhavasena katthaci vākyavasena pavattaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:361_0: “Tena kho pana samayena bhagavā bhikkhū nibbānapaṭisaṃyuttāya dhammiyā kathāya sandasseti samādapeti samuttejeti sampahaṃseti.
tika-vin01t1:361_1: Tedha bhikkhū aṭṭhiṃ katvā manasi katvā sabbaṃ cetasā samannāharitvā ohitasotā dhammaṃ suṇanti.
tika-vin01t1:361_2: Atha kho bhagavā etamatthaṃ viditvā tāyaṃ velāyaṃ imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi ‘atthi,
tika-vin01t1:363_0: Nanu ca udānaṃ nāma pītisomanassasamuṭṭhāpito dhammasaṃvegasamuṭṭhāpito vā dhammapaṭiggāhakanirapekkho udāhāro tathā ceva sabbattha āgataṃ,
tika-vin01t1:363_1: idha kasmā bhagavā udānento bhikkhū āmantesīti?
tika-vin01t1:363_3: Nibbānapaṭisaṃyuttañhi bhagavā tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ dhammaṃ desetvā nibbānaguṇānussaraṇena uppannapītisomanassena
tika-vin01t1:363_4: udānaṃ udānento “idha nibbānavajjo sabbo sabhāvadhammo paccayāyattavuttikova upalabbhati,
tika-vin01t1:363_6: ayaṃ pana nibbānadhammo kathamappaccayo upalabbhatī”ti tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ cetoparivitakkamaññāya tesaṃ ñāpetukāmo “atthi,
tika-vin01t1:363_9: Na ekantato te paṭiggāhake katvāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:365_0: Mākattha pāpakaṃ kammaṃ, āvi vā yadi vā raho”ti. –
tika-vin01t1:368_0: Attano sukhamesāno, pecca so na labhate sukha”nti. –
tika-vin01t1:369_1: Tathā hi ekasmiṃ samaye sambahulā gopālakā antarā ca sāvatthiṃ antarā ca jetavanaṃ ahiṃ daṇḍehi hananti.
tika-vin01t1:369_2: Tena ca samayena bhagavā sāvatthiṃ piṇḍāya gacchanto antarāmagge te dārake ahiṃ daṇḍena hanante disvā
tika-vin01t1:369_3: “kasmā kumārakā imaṃ ahiṃ daṇḍena hanathā”ti pucchitvā “ḍaṃsanabhayena bhante”ti ca vutte “ime ‘attano
tika-vin01t1:369_4: sukhaṃ karissāmā’ti imaṃ paharantā nibbattaṭṭhāne dukkhaṃ anubhavissanti,
tika-vin01t1:369_6: Teneva ca dhammasaṃvegena imaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.
tika-vin01t1:369_7: Evametaṃ katthaci gāthābandhavasena katthaci vākyavasena katthaci somanassavasena katthaci dhammasaṃvegavasena pavattanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:369_10: Yebhuyyena hi udānaṃ gāthābandhavasena bhāsitaṃ pītisomanassasamuṭṭhāpitañca.
tika-vin01t1:370_0: Tayidaṃ sabbaññubuddhabhāsitaṃ paccekabuddhabhāsitaṃ sāvakabhāsitanti tividhaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t1:374_0: “Sabbo rāgo pahīno me, sabbo doso samūhato;
tika-vin01t1:375_0: Sabbo me vihato moho, sītibhūtosmi nibbuto”ti. –
tika-vin01t1:379_1: Aññānipi sakkādīhi devehi bhāsitāni “aho dānaṃ paramadānaṃ kassape supatiṭṭhita”ntiādīni,
tika-vin01t1:379_2: soṇadaṇḍabrāhmaṇādīhi manussehi ca bhāsitāni “namo tassa bhagavato”tiādīni tisso saṅgītiyo āruḷhāni udānāni santi eva,
tika-vin01t1:379_4: Yāni pana sammāsambuddhena sāmaṃ āhaccabhāsitāni jinavacanabhūtāni,
tika-vin01t1:379_6: Etāniyeva ca sandhāya bhagavato pariyattidhammaṃ navavidhā vibhajitvā uddisantena udānanti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:380_0: Yā pana “anekajātisaṃsāra”ntiādigāthā bhagavatā bodhiyā mūle udānavasena pavattitā anekasatasahassānaṃ sammāsambuddhānaṃ udānabhūtā ca,
tika-vin01t1:380_1: tā aparabhāge dhammabhaṇḍāgārikassa bhagavatā desitattā dhammasaṅgāhakehi udānapāḷiyaṃ saṅgahaṃ anāropetvā dhammapade saṅgahitā.
tika-vin01t1:380_2: Yañca “aññāsi vata bho koṇḍañño”ti udānavacanaṃ dasasahassilokadhātuyā devamanussānaṃ pavedanasamatthanigghosavipphāraṃ bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:380_3: tadapi paṭhamabodhiyaṃ sabbesaṃ eva bhikkhūnaṃ sammāpaṭipattipaccavekkhaṇahetukaṃ “ārādhayiṃsu vata maṃ
tika-vin01t1:380_4: bhikkhū ekaṃ samaya”ntiādivacanaṃ viya dhammacakkappavattanasuttadesanāpariyosāne attanā adhigatadhammekadesassa
tika-vin01t1:380_5: yathādesitassa ariyamaggassa sāvakesu sabbapaṭhamaṃ therena adhigatattā attano parissamassa saphalabhāvapaccavekkhaṇahetukaṃ
tika-vin01t1:380_7: na “yadā have pātubhavanti dhammā”tiādivacanaṃ viya pavattiyā nivattiyā vā pakāsananti na dhammasaṅgāhakehi udānapāḷiyaṃ saṅgītanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:381_0: Udānapāḷiyañca bodhivaggādīsu aṭṭhasu vaggesu dasa dasa katvā asītiyeva suttantā saṅgītā,
tika-vin01t1:392_0: Tīṇi dvāsīti ca tathā, udānassa paveditā”ti.
tika-vin01t1:393_0: Idha pana “dvāsīti suttantā”ti vuttaṃ, taṃ na sameti, tasmā “asīti suttantā”ti pāṭhena bhavitabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:394_9: ahaṃ vo pāṭibhogo anāgāmitāyā”ti evamādinā ekakadukatikacatukkavasena itivuttakapāḷiyaṃ saṅgahamāropitāni
tika-vin01t1:394_12: Tathā hi ekakanipāte tāva sattavīsati suttāni,
tika-vin01t1:405_0: Evamādinā uddānagāthāhi dvādasuttarasatasuttāni gaṇetvā dassitāni. Teneva ca aṭṭhakathāyampi –
tika-vin01t1:407_1: Kāmañcettha appakaṃ ūnamadhikaṃ vā gaṇanūpagaṃ na hotīti katvā “dvāsīti khandhakavattānī”ti vattabbe
tika-vin01t1:407_4: tathāpi īdise ṭhāne pamāṇaṃ dassentena yāthāvatova niyametvā dassetabbanti “dvādasuttarasatasuttantā” icceva pāṭhena bhavitabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:408_0: Jātaṃ bhūtaṃ purāvutthaṃ bhagavato pubbacaritaṃ kāyati katheti pakāsetīti jātakaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:409_20: atha ānando tuṇhī bhavati. Ime kho,
tika-vin01t1:409_22: cattāro acchariyā abbhutā dhammā ānande”ti evamādinayappavattā sabbepi acchariyaabbhutadhammapaṭisaṃyuttā
tika-vin01t1:410_0: Cūḷavedallādīsu visākhena nāma upāsakena puṭṭhāya dhammadinnāya nāma bhikkhuniyā bhāsitaṃ suttaṃ cūḷavedallanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:410_1: Mahāvedallaṃ pana mahākoṭṭhikattherena pucchitena āyasmatā sāriputtattherena bhāsitaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:410_2: Sammādiṭṭhisuttampi bhikkhūhi puṭṭhena tenevāyasmatā sāriputtattherena bhāsitaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:410_4: Sakkapañhaṃ pana sakkena puṭṭho bhagavā abhāsi,
tika-vin01t1:410_6: Mahāpuṇṇamasuttampi tadahuposathe pannarase puṇṇamāya rattiyā aññatarena bhikkhunā puṭṭhena bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:411_0: Evaṃ aṅgavasena sakalampi buddhavacanaṃ vibhajitvā idāni dhammakkhandhavasena vibhajitvā kathetukāmo āha “kathaṃ dhammakkhandhavasenā”tiādi.
tika-vin01t1:411_5: dvesahassādhikāni asīti dhammakkhandhasahassāni satthu santikā adhigaṇhinti attho.
tika-vin01t1:411_6: Dve sahassāni bhikkhutoti dve dhammakkhandhasahassāni bhikkhuto uggaṇhiṃ,
tika-vin01t1:411_8: Sāriputtattherādīhi bhāsitānaṃ sammādiṭṭhisuttantādīnaṃ vasena hi “dve sahassāni bhikkhuto”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:411_9: Caturāsīti sahassānīti tadubhayaṃ samodhānetvā catusahassādhikāni asīti sahassāni.
tika-vin01t1:411_10: Ye me dhammā pavattinoti ye dhammā mama pavattino pavattamānā paguṇā vācuggatā jivhagge parivattanti,
tika-vin01t1:411_11: te dhammā caturāsīti dhammakkhandhasahassānīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t1:411_12: Keci pana “ye ime”ti padacchedaṃ katvā “ye ime dhammā buddhassa bhagavato bhikkhūnañca pavattino,
tika-vin01t1:411_15: dve sahassāni bhikkhutoti evaṃ caturāsīti dhammakkhandhasahassānī”ti evamettha sambandhaṃ vadanti.
tika-vin01t1:412_0: Ettha ca subhasuttaṃ gopakamoggallānasuttañca parinibbute bhagavati ānandattherena vuttattā caturāsītidhammakkhandhasahassesu antogadhaṃ hoti,
tika-vin01t1:412_2: Tattha paṭisambhidāgaṇṭhipade tāva idaṃ vuttaṃ “sayaṃ vuttadhammakkhandhānaṃ bhikkhuto gahiteyeva saṅgahetvā evamāhāti daṭṭhabba”nti.
tika-vin01t1:412_3: Bhagavatā pana dinnanaye ṭhatvā bhāsitattā sayaṃ vuttadhammakkhandhānampi “buddhato gaṇhi”nti ettha saṅgahaṃ
tika-vin01t1:412_4: katvā vuttanti evamettha vattuṃ yuttataraṃ viya dissati.
tika-vin01t1:412_5: Bhagavatāyeva hi dinnanaye ṭhatvā sāvakā dhammaṃ desenti.
tika-vin01t1:412_6: Teneva hi tatiyasaṅgītiyañca moggaliputtatissattherena bhāsitampi kathāvatthuppakaraṇaṃ buddhabhāsitaṃ nāma jātaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:412_7: tatoyeva ca attanā bhāsitampi subhasuttādi saṅgītiṃ āropentena āyasmatā ānandattherena “evaṃ me suta”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:413_0: Evaṃ paridīpitadhammakkhandhavasenāti gopakamoggallānena brāhmaṇena “tvaṃ bahussutoti buddhasāsane pākaṭo,
tika-vin01t1:413_2: tayā dhāritā”ti pucchite tassa paṭivacanaṃ dentena āyasmatā ānandattherena evaṃ “dvāsīti buddhato gaṇhi”ntiādinā paridīpitadhammakkhandhānaṃ vasena.
tika-vin01t1:413_6: maggo sattānaṃ visuddhiyā”tiādinā cattāro satipaṭṭhāne ārabhitvā tesaṃyeva vibhāgadassanavasena pavattattā “ekānusandhika”nti vuccati.
tika-vin01t1:413_8: Parinibbānasuttañhi nānāṭhānesu nānādhammadesanānaṃ vasena pavattattā “anekānusandhika”nti vuccati.
tika-vin01t1:414_0: “Kati chinde kati jahe, kati cuttari bhāvaye;
tika-vin01t1:417_0: “Pañca chinde pañca jahe, pañca cuttari bhāvaye;
tika-vin01t1:419_7: adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttā dhammā”ti evamādīsu tikesu kusalattikassa vibhajanavasena yaṃ vuttaṃ nikkhepakaṇḍe –
tika-vin01t1:422_1: Kusalākusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ vipākā kāmāvacarā rūpāvacarā arūpāvacarā apariyāpannā vedanākkhandho …pe…
tika-vin01t1:422_3: ye ca dhammā kiriyā neva kusalā nākusalā na ca kammavipākā sabbañca rūpaṃ asaṅkhatā ca dhātu.
tika-vin01t1:423_1: Evaṃ sesattikānampi ekekassa tikassa vibhajanaṃ ekeko dhammakkhandhoti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:424_0: Tathā “hetū dhammā”ti evamādikesu dukesu ekekassa dukassa vibhajanavasena yaṃ vuttaṃ –
tika-vin01t1:425_0: “Katame dhammā hetū? Tayo kusalā hetū, tayo akusalā hetū, tayo abyākatā hetū”ti –
tika-vin01t1:426_0: Ādi, tatthāpi ekekassa dukassa vibhajanaṃ ekeko dhammakkhandho. Puna aṭṭhakathākaṇḍe –
tika-vin01t1:427_7: Catūsu bhūmīsu vipāko tīsu bhūmīsu kiriyābyākataṃ rūpañca nibbānañca.
tika-vin01t1:428_0: Evamādinā kusalattikādivibhajanavasena pavattesu tikabhājanesu ekekassa tikassa bhājanaṃ ekeko dhammakkhandho. Tathā –
tika-vin01t1:429_0: “Katame dhammā hetū? Tayo kusalā hetū, tayo akusalā hetū, tayo abyākatā hetū”ti –
tika-vin01t1:430_0: Ādinayappavattesu dukabhājanesu ekamekaṃ dukabhājanaṃ ekeko dhammakkhandhoti evamettha tikadukabhājanavasena dhammakkhandhavibhāgo veditabbo.
tika-vin01t1:432_0: “Yasmiṃ samaye kāmāvacaraṃ kusalaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ hoti somanassasahagataṃ ñāṇasampayuttaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ vā…pe…
tika-vin01t1:433_0: Evamādinayappavatte cittuppādakaṇḍe ekamekaṃ cittavārabhājanaṃ ekeko dhammakkhandhoti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:433_1: Eko dhammakkhandhoti ettha “ekekatikadukabhājanaṃ ekamekaṃ cittavārabhājana”nti vuttattā ekeko dhammakkhandhoti attho veditabbo.
tika-vin01t1:433_2: “Ekeko”ti avuttepi hi ayamattho atthato viññāyamānova hotīti “eko dhammakkhandho”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:433_4: Mātikāti “yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhūnaṃ sikkhāsājīvasamāpanno”tiādinā tasmiṃ tasmiṃ ajjhācāre paññattasikkhāpadaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:433_5: Padabhājanīyanti tassa tassa sikkhāpadassa “yo panāti yo yādiso”tiādinayappavattaṃ vibhajanaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:433_7: āpatti dukkaṭassā”ti evamādinā sikkhāpadantaresu paññattā āpatti.
tika-vin01t1:433_8: Anāpattīti “anāpatti ajānantassa asādiyantassa ummattakassa khittacittassa vedanāṭṭassa ādikammikassā”tiādinayappavatto
tika-vin01t1:433_11: dasāhātikkante anatikkantasaññī nissaggiyaṃ pācittiya”nti evamādinayappavatto tikapācittiyatikadukkaṭādibhedo tikaparicchedo.
tika-vin01t1:434_0: Idāni evametaṃ abhedato rasavasena ekavidhantiādinā “ayaṃ dhammo,
tika-vin01t1:434_2: imāni caturāsīti dhammakkhandhasahassānī”ti buddhavacanaṃ dhammavinayādibhedena vavatthapetvā saṅgāyantena
tika-vin01t1:434_3: mahākassapapamukhena vasīgaṇena anekacchariyapātubhāvapaṭimaṇḍitāya saṅgītiyā imassa piṭakassa vinayabhāvo
tika-vin01t1:434_5: Na kevalaṃ imamevimassa yathāvuttappabhedaṃ vavatthapetvā saṅgītaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:434_6: atha kho aññampīti dassento āha “na kevalañca imamevā”tiādi.
tika-vin01t1:434_7: Tattha uddānasaṅgaho paṭhamapārājikādīsu āgatānaṃ vinītavatthuādīnaṃ saṅkhepato saṅgahadassanavasena dhammasaṅgāhakehi kathitā –
tika-vin01t1:435_0: “Makkaṭī vajjiputtā ca, gihī naggo ca titthiyā;
tika-vin01t1:438_0: Assa buddhavacanassa saṅgītipariyosāne sādhukāraṃ dadamānā viyāti sambandho.
tika-vin01t1:438_1: Saṅkampīti uddhaṃ uddhaṃ gacchantī suṭṭhu kampi.
tika-vin01t1:438_2: Sampakampīti uddhaṃ adho ca gacchantī sampakampi.
tika-vin01t1:438_3: Sampavedhīti catūsu disāsu gacchantī suṭṭhu pavedhi.
tika-vin01t1:438_6: Yā paṭhamamahāsaṅgīti dhammasaṅgāhakehi mahākassapādīhi pañcahi satehi yena katā saṅgītā,
tika-vin01t1:438_8: thereheva katattā therā mahākassapādayo etissā atthīti “therikā”ti ca loke vuccati,
tika-vin01t1:439_0: Evaṃ paṭhamamahāsaṅgītiṃ dassetvā yadatthaṃ sā idha nidassitā,
tika-vin01t1:439_2: Āyasmatā upālittherena vuttanti “tena samayenā”tiādi vakkhamānaṃ sabbaṃ nidānavacanaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:439_3: Kimatthaṃ panettha dhammavinayasaṅgahe kathiyamāne nidānavacanaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:439_4: nanu ca bhagavatā bhāsitavacanasseva saṅgaho kātabboti? Vuccate –
tika-vin01t1:439_6: Kāladesadesakaparisāpadesehi upanibandhitvā ṭhapitā hi desanā ciraṭṭhitikā hoti asammosadhammā saddheyyā ca,
tika-vin01t1:439_8: Teneva ca āyasmatā mahākassapena “paṭhamapārājikaṃ āvuso, upāli,
tika-vin01t1:439_9: kattha paññatta”ntiādinā desādipucchāsu katāsu tāsaṃ visajjanaṃ karontena āyasmatā upālittherena “tena
tika-vin01t1:440_1: Ñāṇakaruṇāpariggahitasabbakiriyassa hi bhagavato natthi niratthakā paṭipatti attahitatthā vā,
tika-vin01t1:440_2: tasmā paresaṃyevatthāya pavattasabbakiriyassa sammāsambuddhassa sakalampi kāyavacīmanokammaṃ yathāpavattaṃ
tika-vin01t1:440_3: vuccamānaṃ diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikaparamatthehi yathārahaṃ sattānaṃ anusāsanaṭṭhena sāsanaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:440_5: Tayidaṃ satthuracitaṃ kāladesadesakaparisāpadesehi saddhiṃ tattha tattha nidānavacanehi yathārahaṃ pakāsīyati.
tika-vin01t1:441_0: Apica satthuno pamāṇabhāvappakāsanena sāsanassa pamāṇabhāvadassanatthaṃ nidānavacanaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:441_1: tañcassa pamāṇabhāvadassanaṃ “buddho bhagavā”ti iminā padadvayena vibhāvitanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:441_4: tato eva ca sabbasattuttamabhāvadīpanena ayamattho sabbathā pakāsito hotīti idamettha nidānavacanappayojanassa mukhamattanidassanaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:442_0: Tatrāyaṃ ācariyaparamparāti tasmiṃ jambudīpe ayaṃ ācariyānaṃ paramparā paveṇī paṭipāṭi.
tika-vin01t1:442_3: Vesāliyaṃ kira eko dāsako nāma brāhmaṇamāṇavo tiṇṇaṃ antevāsikasatānaṃ jeṭṭhantevāsiko hutvā ācariyassa
tika-vin01t1:442_4: santike sippaṃ uggaṇhanto dvādasavassikoyeva tiṇṇaṃ vedānaṃ pāragū ahosi.
tika-vin01t1:442_5: So ekadivasaṃ antevāsikaparivuto dhammavinayaṃ saṅgāyitvā vālikārāme nivasantaṃ āyasmantaṃ upālittheraṃ
tika-vin01t1:442_6: upasaṅkamitvā attano vedesu sabbāni gaṇṭhiṭṭhānāni theraṃ pucchi.
tika-vin01t1:442_7: Theropi sabbaṃ byākaritvā sayampi ekaṃ pañhaṃ pucchanto nāmaṃ sandhāya imaṃ pañhaṃ pucchi “ekadhammo kho, māṇava,
tika-vin01t1:442_12: Sopi kho māṇavo pañhassa atthaṃ ajānanto “kimidaṃ bho pabbajitā”ti āha.
tika-vin01t1:442_14: Sakkā panāyaṃ bho mayhampi dātunti. Sakkā, māṇava,
tika-vin01t1:442_16: “Sādhu kho bho pabbajitā”ti māṇavo sampaṭicchitvā attano mātaraṃ pitaraṃ ācariyañca anujānāpetvā tīhi
tika-vin01t1:442_17: antevāsikasatehi saddhiṃ therassa santike pabbajitvā paripuṇṇavīsativasso upasampadaṃ labhitvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
tika-vin01t1:442_18: Thero taṃ dhuraṃ katvā khīṇāsavasahassassa piṭakattayaṃ vācesi.
tika-vin01t1:443_1: So kira kāsīsu ekassa vāṇijakassa putto hutvā pañcadasavassuddesiko ekaṃ samayaṃ mātāpitūhi saddhiṃ vāṇijjāya giribbajaṃ gato.
tika-vin01t1:443_2: Tato pañcapaññāsadārakehi saddhiṃ veḷuvanaṃ gantvā tattha dāsakattheraṃ saparisaṃ disvā ativiya pasanno
tika-vin01t1:443_3: pabbajjaṃ yācitvā therena mātāpitaro anujānāpetvā “pabbajāhī”ti vutto mātāpitusantikaṃ gantvā tamatthaṃ
tika-vin01t1:443_4: ārocetvā tesu anicchantesu chinnabhatto hutvā mātāpitaro anujānāpetvā pañcapaññāsāya dārakehi saddhiṃ
tika-vin01t1:443_5: therassa santike pabbajitvā laddhūpasampado arahattaṃ pāpuṇi.
tika-vin01t1:443_7: Sopi gaṇapāmokkho hutvā bahūnaṃ dhammavinayaṃ vācesi.
tika-vin01t1:444_1: So kira pāṭaliputte siggavo nāma amaccaputto hutvā tiṇṇaṃ utūnaṃ anucchavikesu tīsu pāsādesu sampattiṃ
tika-vin01t1:444_2: anubhavamāno ekadivasaṃ attano sahāyena caṇḍavajjinā seṭṭhiputtena saddhiṃ saparivāro kukkuṭārāmaṃ gantvā
tika-vin01t1:444_3: tattha soṇakattheraṃ nirodhasamāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā nisinnaṃ disvā vanditvā attanā saddhiṃ anālapantaṃ
tika-vin01t1:444_4: ñatvā gantvā taṃ kāraṇaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ pucchitvā bhikkhūhi “samāpattiṃ samāpannā nālapantī”ti vutto “kathaṃ, bhante,
tika-vin01t1:444_5: samāpattito vuṭṭhahantī”ti puna pucchitvā tehi ca bhikkhūhi “satthuno ceva saṅghassa ca pakkosanāya yathāparicchinnakālato
tika-vin01t1:444_6: āyusaṅkhayā ca vuṭṭhahantī”ti vatvā tassa saparivārassa upanissayaṃ disvā saṅghassa vacanena nirodhā
tika-vin01t1:444_8: mayā saddhiṃ nālapitthā”ti pucchitvā therena “bhuñjitabbakaṃ kumāra bhuñjimhā”ti vutte “sakkā nu kho, bhante,
tika-vin01t1:444_10: amhādise katvā bhojetu”nti vutte tamatthaṃ mātāpitūnaṃ ārocetvā tehi anuññāto attano sahāyena caṇḍavajjinā
tika-vin01t1:444_11: tehi ca pañcahi purisasatehi saddhiṃ soṇakattherassa santike pabbajitvā upasampanno ahosi.
tika-vin01t1:444_12: Tattha siggavo ca caṇḍavajjī ca dve upajjhāyasseva santike dhammavinayaṃ pariyāpuṇitvā aparabhāge chaḷabhiññā ahesuṃ.
tika-vin01t1:445_0: Tissassa pana moggaliputtassa anupubbakathā parato āvi bhavissati.
tika-vin01t1:445_6: Mahantena hi jamburukkhena abhilakkhitattā dīpopi “jambū”ti vuccati.
tika-vin01t1:446_4: sabbesaṃ pāmokkho hutvā gaṇhīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t1:450_1: Jotayitvā ca sabbadhīti tameva saddhammaṃ sabbattha pakāsayitvā.
tika-vin01t1:450_7: Pahīnasabbakilesattā natthi etesaṃ katthaci ālayo taṇhāti anālayā,
tika-vin01t1:451_0: Vassasataparinibbute bhagavatīti vassasataṃ parinibbutassa assāti vassasataparinibbuto, bhagavā,
tika-vin01t1:451_1: tasmiṃ parinibbānato vassasate atikkanteti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t1:451_4: Kappati siṅgīloṇakappoti siṅgena loṇaṃ pariharitvā pariharitvā aloṇakapiṇḍapātena saddhiṃ bhuñjituṃ kappati,
tika-vin01t1:451_6: Kappati dvaṅgulakappoti dvaṅgulaṃ atikkantāya chāyāya vikāle bhojanaṃ bhuñjituṃ kappatīti attho.
tika-vin01t1:451_7: Kappati gāmantarakappoti “gāmantaraṃ gamissāmī”ti pavāritena anatirittabhojanaṃ bhuñjituṃ kappatīti attho.
tika-vin01t1:451_8: Kappati āvāsakappoti ekasīmāyaṃ nānāsenāsanesu visuṃ visuṃ uposathādīni saṅghakammāni kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti attho.
tika-vin01t1:451_9: Kappati anumatikappoti “anāgatānaṃ āgatakāle anumatiṃ gahessāmī”ti tesu anāgatesuyeva vaggena saṅghena kammaṃ katvā pacchā anumatiṃ gahetuṃ kappati,
tika-vin01t1:451_11: Kappati āciṇṇakappoti ācariyupajjhāyehi āciṇṇo kappatīti attho.
tika-vin01t1:451_14: Kappati amathitakappoti yaṃ khīraṃ khīrabhāvaṃ vijahitaṃ dadhibhāvaṃ asampattaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:451_15: taṃ bhuttāvinā pavāritena anatirittaṃ bhuñjituṃ kappatīti attho.
tika-vin01t1:451_16: Kappati jalogiṃ pātunti ettha jalogīti taruṇasurā.
tika-vin01t1:451_19: Jātarūparajatanti sarasato vikāraṃ anāpajjitvā sabbadā jātaṃ rūpameva hotīti jātaṃ rūpametassāti jātarūpaṃ, suvaṇṇaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:452_2: Ekopi hi janapado ruḷhīsaddattā bahuvacanena vuccati.
tika-vin01t1:452_8: Mahāvane kūṭāgārasālāyanti ettha mahāvanaṃ nāma sayaṃjātamaropimaṃ saparicchedaṃ mahantaṃ vanaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:452_9: Kapilavatthusāmantā pana mahāvanaṃ himavantena saha ekābaddhaṃ aparicchedaṃ hutvā mahāsamuddaṃ āhacca ṭhitaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:452_10: idaṃ tādisaṃ na hotīti saparicchedaṃ mahantaṃ vananti mahāvanaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:452_11: Kūṭāgārasālā pana mahāvanaṃ nissāya kate ārāme kūṭāgāraṃ anto katvā haṃsavaṭṭakacchannena haṃsamaṇḍalākārena katā.
tika-vin01t1:453_4: Upavasantīti ca sīlena vā sabbaso āhārassa ca abhuñjanasaṅkhātena anasanena vā khīrapānamadhupānādimattena vā upetā hutvā vasantīti attho.
tika-vin01t1:453_6: Katthaci pana pātimokkhepi sīlepi upavāsepi paññattiyampi uposathasaddo āgato.
tika-vin01t1:453_9: “Evaṃ aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgato kho visākhe uposatho upavuttho”tiādīsu sīle.
tika-vin01t1:453_14: Upetena samannāgatena hutvā vasitabbato santāne vāsetabbato uposatho sīlaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:453_15: Asanādisaṃyamādiṃ vā upecca vasantīti uposatho upavāso.
tika-vin01t1:453_16: Tathārūpe hatthiassavisese uposathoti samaññāmattato uposatho paññatti.
tika-vin01t1:453_19: tadahuposathe sabhikkhukā āvāsā”tiādīsu viya uposathadivaso adhippeto,
tika-vin01t1:453_25: Sabbaṃ tāva vattabbanti iminā sattasatikakkhandhake āgatā sabbāpi pāḷi idha ānetvā vattabbāti dasseti.
tika-vin01t1:453_26: Sā kuto vattabbāti āha “yāva imāya pana vinayasaṅgītiyā”tiādi.
tika-vin01t1:454_0: Pubbe kataṃ upādāyāti pubbe kataṃ paṭhamasaṅgītimupādāya.
tika-vin01t1:454_4: Tasmiñhi sannipāte aṭṭheva gaṇapāmokkhā mahātherā ahesuṃ,
tika-vin01t1:454_5: tesu ca vāsabhagāmī sumanoti dve therā anuruddhattherassa saddhivihārikā,
tika-vin01t1:454_7: Ete pana sabbepi aṭṭha mahātherā bhagavantaṃ diṭṭhapubbā.
tika-vin01t1:454_8: Idāni te there sarūpato dassento āha “sabbakāmī cā”tiādi.
tika-vin01t1:454_13: Katakiccāti catūsu saccesu catūhi maggehi kattabbassa pariññāpahānasaachakiriyābhāvanāsaṅkhātassa soḷasavidhassapi kiccassa pariniṭṭhitattā katakiccā.
tika-vin01t1:455_0: Abbudanti upaddavaṃ vadanti corakammampi bhagavato vacanaṃ thenetvā attano vacanassa dīpanato.
tika-vin01t1:455_8: taṃ taṃ upapattiṃ maggati gavesati janeti nipphādetīti maggoti evaṃ veditabbo.
