tika-vin01t1:712_21: Na hi purimikāya vassūpagatā cātumāsiniyaṃ pavārenti.
tika-vin01t1:712_22: Ciradiṭṭho sammāsambuddhoti satthussa sarīrāvayavo ca sammāsambuddhoyevāti katvā avayave samudāyavohāravasena
tika-vin01t1:713_0: Therena vuttampi gamanakāraṇaṃ ṭhapetvā idha vāse payojanameva dassetvā gamanaṃ paṭisedhetukāmo āha “ahaṃ bhante tumhe”tiādi.
tika-vin01t1:713_1: Abhivādanādīsu ācariyaṃ disvā abhivādanakaraṇaṃ abhivādanaṃ nāma.
tika-vin01t1:713_2: Yasmiṃ vā disābhāge ācariyo vasati iriyāpathe kappento,
tika-vin01t1:713_8: Ācariyaṃ pana dūratova disvā paccuṭṭhāya paccuggamanakaraṇaṃ paccuṭṭhānaṃ nāma.
tika-vin01t1:713_9: Ācariyaṃ pana disvā añjaliṃ paggayha sīse ṭhapetvā ācariyaṃ namassati,
tika-vin01t1:713_12: gacchantopi ṭhitopi nisinnopi añjaliṃ paggayha namassatiyevāti idaṃ añjalikammaṃ nāma.
tika-vin01t1:713_14: Cīvarādīsu hi cīvaraṃ dento na yaṃ vā taṃ vā deti,
tika-vin01t1:713_22: Sumanena saddhiṃ mantehīti paṭhamameva sāmaṇerassa kathitattā vā “jānāti esa amhākamadhippāya”nti ñatvā vā evamāhāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:714_0: Appossukko tvaṃ mahārājāti mahārāja tvaṃ dhātūnaṃ paṭilābhe mā ussukkaṃ karohi,
tika-vin01t1:714_3: Idāni tadeva raññā kattabbakiccaṃ dassento “vīthiyo sodhāpetvā”tiādimāha.
tika-vin01t1:714_4: Sabbatāḷāvacare upaṭṭhāpetvāti kaṃsatāḷāditāḷaṃ avacarati etthāti tāḷāvacaraṃ vuccati ātatavitatādi sabbaṃ tūriyabhaṇḍaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:714_5: Teneva parinibbānasuttaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “sabbañca tāḷāvacaraṃ sannipātethāti ettha sabbañca tāḷāvacaranti sabbaṃ tūriyabhaṇḍa”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:714_6: Ettha pana sahacaraṇanayena sabbatūriyabhaṇḍānaṃ vādakāpi gahetuṃ vaṭṭantīti te sabbe upaṭṭhāpetvā sannipātetvāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t1:714_8: Therā cetiyagirimeva agamaṃsūti rājanivesanato nikkhamitvā puna cetiyagirimeva agamaṃsu.
tika-vin01t1:715_2: Kiṃ bhante sumana āhiṇḍasīti sumana tvaṃ samaṇadhammaṃ akatvā kasmā vicarasīti pucchati.
tika-vin01t1:715_3: Cetiyagirimhiyeva patiṭṭhāpetvāti pacchā tattha vihāratthāya ākaṅkhitabbabhāvato cetiyagirimhiyeva patiṭṭhāpetvā.
tika-vin01t1:715_6: Athassa etadahosīti dhātucaṅkoṭakaṃ disvā evaṃ cintesi.
tika-vin01t1:715_7: Chattaṃ apanamatūti idaṃ setacchattaṃ sayameva me sīsoparito dhātucaṅkoṭakābhimukhaṃ hutvā namatūti attho.
tika-vin01t1:715_8: Mayhaṃ matthake patiṭṭhātūti idaṃ dhātucaṅkoṭakaṃ therassa hatthato dhātuyā saha āgantvā sirasmiṃ me patiṭṭhātūti attho.
tika-vin01t1:715_9: Pokkharavassaṃ nāma pokkharapattappamāṇaṃ valāhakamajjhe uṭṭhahitvā kamena pharitvā temetukāmeyeva temayamānaṃ mahantaṃ hutvā vassati.
tika-vin01t1:715_11: Mahāvīrāvayavattā cettha satthuvohārena dhātuyo eva niddiṭṭhā.
tika-vin01t1:716_0: Pacchimadisābhimukhova hutvā apasakkantoti piṭṭhito piṭṭhitoyeva pacchimadisābhimukho hutvā osakkanto,
tika-vin01t1:716_4: Puratthimena dvārena nagaraṃ pavisitvāti ettha piṭṭhito piṭṭhitoyeva āgantvā dvāre sampatte parivattetvā ujukeneva nagaraṃ pāvisīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:716_5: Mahejavatthu nāmāti mahejanāmakena yakkhena pariggahitaṃ ekaṃ devaṭṭhānanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:716_6: Paribhogacetiyaṭṭhānanti ettha paribhuttūpakaraṇāni nidahitvā kataṃ cetiyaṃ paribhogacetiyanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:716_7: Tividhañhi cetiyaṃ vadanti paribhogacetiyaṃ dhātucetiyaṃ dhammacetiyanti.
tika-vin01t1:716_10: Paṭiccasamuppādādilikhitapotthakaṃ nidahitvā kataṃ pana dhammacetiyaṃ nāma.
tika-vin01t1:716_11: Sārīrikaṃ paribhogikaṃ uddissakanti evampi tippabhedaṃ cetiyaṃ vadanti.
tika-vin01t1:716_12: Ayaṃ pana pabhedo paṭimārūpassapi uddissakacetiyeneva saṅgahitattā suṭṭhutaraṃ yujjati.
tika-vin01t1:717_0: Kathaṃ pana idaṃ ṭhānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ buddhānaṃ paribhogacetiyaṭṭhānaṃ ahosīti āha “atīte kirā”tiādi.
tika-vin01t1:717_1: Pajjarakenāti ettha pajjarako nāma rogo vuccati.
tika-vin01t1:717_3: Tadā kira puṇṇakāḷo nāma yakkho attano ānubhāvena manussānampi sarīre pajjarakaṃ nāma rogaṃ samuṭṭhāpesi.
tika-vin01t1:720_0: “Rakkhasā ca bahū tattha, pajjarā ca samuṭṭhitā;
tika-vin01t1:722_1: Kāyikaṃ cetasikañca sukhaṃ byasati vikkhipati vināsetīti byasananti dukkhaṃ vuccati.
tika-vin01t1:722_3: tathāpi “te satte anayabyasanamāpajjante disvā”ti vacanato paṭhamaṃ buddhacakkhunā lokaṃ oloketvā pacchā
tika-vin01t1:722_4: sabbaññutaññāṇena lokaṃ olokento te satte anayabyasanamāpajjante disvāti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:722_5: Na hi āsayānusayādibuddhacakkhussa te sattā anayabyasanaṃ āpajjantā dissanti.
tika-vin01t1:722_6: Dubbuṭṭhikāti visamavassādivasena duṭṭhā asobhanā vuṭṭhiyeva dubbuṭṭhikā,
tika-vin01t1:722_7: sassuppattihetubhūtā kāyasukhuppattisappāyā sattupakārā sammā vuṭṭhi tattha na hotīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin01t1:722_11: sulabhā tattha bhikkhā na hotīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t1:723_0: Mahāvivādo hotīti tasmiṃ kira kāle jayantamahārājena ca tassa rañño kaniṭṭhabhātukena samiddhakumāranāmakena
tika-vin01t1:723_1: uparājena ca saddhiṃ imasmiṃ dīpe mahāyuddhaṃ upaṭṭhitaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:723_2: Tenetaṃ vuttaṃ “tena kho pana samayena maṇḍadīpe mahāvivādo hotī”ti.
tika-vin01t1:723_4: vivādassa pana atītakālikattaṃ “tena kho pana samayenā”ti imināva viññāyati.
tika-vin01t1:723_5: Saddantarasannidhānena hettha atītakālāvagamo yathā “bhāsate vaḍḍhate tadā”ti.
tika-vin01t1:723_6: Evaṃ sabbattha īdisesu ṭhānesu vattamānapayogo daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin01t1:723_7: Kalahaviggahajātāti ettha kalaho nāma matthakappatto kāyakalahopi vācākalahopi.
tika-vin01t1:723_8: Tattha hatthaparāmāsādivasena kāyena kātabbo kalaho kāyakalaho.
tika-vin01t1:723_13: Aññamaññaṃ hatthaparāmāsādivasena virūpaṃ viruddhaṃ vā gahaṇaṃ viggaho kāyakalaho.
tika-vin01t1:723_14: Yathāvutto kalaho ca viggaho ca jāto sañjāto etesanti kalahaviggahajātā,
tika-vin01t1:724_0: Tāni sāsanantaradhānena nassantīti pariyattipaṭivedhapaṭipattisaṅkhātassa tividhassapi sāsanassa antaradhānena
tika-vin01t1:724_2: Tīṇi hi parinibbānāni kilesaparinibbānaṃ khandhaparinibbānaṃ dhātuparinibbānanti,
tika-vin01t1:724_3: tāni pana amhākaṃ bhagavato vasena evaṃ veditabbāni.
tika-vin01t1:724_7: Sāsanassa kira osakkanakāle imasmiṃ tambapaṇṇidīpe dhātuyo sannipatitvā mahācetiyaṃ gamissanti,
tika-vin01t1:724_10: nāgabhavanatopi devalokatopi brahmalokatopi dhātuyo mahābodhipallaṅkameva gamissanti,
tika-vin01t1:724_12: Sabbā dhātuyo mahābodhipallaṅke rāsibhūtā suvaṇṇakkhandho viya ekagghanā hutvā chabbaṇṇarasmiyo vissajjessanti,
tika-vin01t1:724_14: Tato dasasahassacakkavāḷe devatā sannipatitvā “ajja satthā parinibbāti,
tika-vin01t1:724_16: pacchimadassanaṃ dāni idaṃ amhāka”nti dasabalassa parinibbutadivasato mahantataraṃ kāruññaṃ karissanti,
tika-vin01t1:724_17: ṭhapetvā anāgāmikhīṇāsave avasesā sakabhāvena saṇṭhātuṃ na sakkhissanti.
tika-vin01t1:724_18: Dhātūsu tejodhātu uṭṭhahitvā yāva brahmalokā uggacchissati,
tika-vin01t1:724_21: Evaṃ mahantaṃ ānubhāvaṃ dassetvā dhātūsu antarahitāsu sāsanaṃ antarahitaṃ nāma hoti.
tika-vin01t1:725_0: Divā bodhirukkhaṭṭhāne hatthisālāyaṃ tiṭṭhatīti divā vatthuvicinanāya okāsaṃ kurumāno tato dhātuṃ gahetvā
tika-vin01t1:725_1: kumbhe ṭhapetvā sadhātukova hutvā tiṭṭhatīti vadanti.
tika-vin01t1:728_0: Thūpapatiṭṭhānabhūmiṃ pariyāyatīti matthakato dhātuṃ tattha patiṭṭhāpetvā sadhātukaṃ thūpapatiṭṭhānabhūmiṃ rattibhāge pariyāyati,
tika-vin01t1:728_5: Sakalanagarañca janapado cāti nagaravāsino janapadavāsino ca abhedato nagarajanapadasaddehi vuttā “sabbo gāmo āgato,
tika-vin01t1:728_9: Ekekadhātuppadesato tejodakanikkhamanādivasena yamakayamakaṃ hutvā pavattaṃ pāṭihāriyaṃ yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:728_10: Channaṃ vaṇṇānaṃ rasmiyo cāti sambandho kātabbo.
tika-vin01t1:728_11: Channaṃ vaṇṇānaṃ udakadhārā cāti evampettha sambandhaṃ vadanti.
tika-vin01t1:728_12: Parinibbutepi bhagavati tassānubhāvena evarūpaṃ pāṭihāriyamahosiyevāti dassetuṃ “evaṃ acintiyā”tiādigāthamāha.
tika-vin01t1:729_0: Dharamānakālepi tikkhattuṃ āgamāsīti bhagavā kira abhisambodhito navame māse phussapuṇṇamadivase yakkhādhivāsaṃ
tika-vin01t1:729_1: laṅkādīpamupagantvā laṅkāmajjhe tiyojanāyate yojanavitthate mahānāgavanuyyāne mahāyakkhasamāgame upariākāse
tika-vin01t1:729_4: gaganamedanīninnādena ca yakkhānaṃ bhayaṃ santāsaṃ janetvā tehi yācitābhayo “detha me samaggā nisīdanaṭṭhāna”nti
tika-vin01t1:729_5: vatvā “dema te sakaladīpaṃ, dehi no, mārisa,
tika-vin01t1:729_6: abhaya”nti vutte sabbaṃ taṃ upaddavaṃ antaradhāpetvā yakkhadattabhūmiyā cammakhaṇḍaṃ pattharitvā tattha
tika-vin01t1:729_7: nisinno samantato jalamānaṃ cammakhaṇḍaṃ pasāretvā kappuṭṭhānaggisadisadahanābhibhūtānaṃ jaladhisalilabhītānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:729_8: samantā velante bhamantānaṃ yakkhānaṃ giridīpaṃ dassetvā tesu tattha patiṭṭhitesu taṃ yathāṭhāne patiṭṭhāpetvā
tika-vin01t1:729_9: cammakhaṇḍaṃ saṅkhipitvā nisinno tadā samāgate anekadevatāsannipāte dhammaṃ desetvā anekapāṇakoṭīnaṃ
tika-vin01t1:729_10: dhammābhisamayaṃ katvā sumanakūṭavāsinā mahāsumanadevarājena samadhigatasotāpattiphalena yācitapūjanīyo
tika-vin01t1:729_11: sīsaṃ parāmasitvā muṭṭhimattā nīlāmalakesadhātuyo tassa datvā jambudīpamagamāsi.
tika-vin01t1:730_0: Dutiyaṃ abhisambodhito pañcame saṃvacchare cūḷodaramahodarānaṃ jalathalanivāsīnaṃ mātulabhāgineyyānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:730_1: nāgarājūnaṃ maṇipallaṅkaṃ nissāya upaṭṭhitamahāsaṅgāme nāgānaṃ mahāvināsaṃ disvā cittamāsakāḷapakkhassa
tika-vin01t1:730_2: uposathadivase pātova samiddhasumanena nāma rukkhadevaputtena chattaṃ katvā dhāritarājāyatano nāgadīpaṃ
tika-vin01t1:730_3: samāgantvā saṅgāmamajjhe ākāse pallaṅkena nisinno ghorandhakārena nāge santāsetvā assāsento ālokaṃ dassetvā
tika-vin01t1:730_4: sañjātapītisomanassānaṃ upagatanāgānaṃ sāmaggikaraṇīyaṃ dhammaṃ desetvā mātulabhāgineyyehi dvīhi nāgarājūhi
tika-vin01t1:730_5: pūjite pathavītalagate maṇipallaṅke nisinno nāgehi dibbannapānehi santappito jalathalanivāsino asītikoṭināge
tika-vin01t1:730_6: saraṇesu ca sīlesu ca patiṭṭhāpetvā tehi namassituṃ pallaṅkañca rājāyatanapādapañca tattha patiṭṭhāpetvā
tika-vin01t1:731_0: Tatiyampi abhisambodhito aṭṭhame saṃvacchare mahodaramātulena maṇiakkhikanāgarājenābhiyācito visākhapuṇṇamadivase
tika-vin01t1:731_1: pañcabhikkhusataparivuto kalyāṇīpadese maṇiakkhikassa bhavanamupagantvā tattha māpitaruciraratanamaṇḍape
tika-vin01t1:731_2: manoharavarapallaṅke nisinno nāgarājena dibbannapānehi santappetvā nāgamāṇavikagaṇaparivutena dibbamālāgandhādīhi
tika-vin01t1:731_3: pūjito tattha dhammaṃ desetvā vuṭṭhāyāsanā sumanakūṭe padaṃ dassetvā pabbatapāde divāvihāraṃ katvā dīghavāpicetiyaṭṭhāne
tika-vin01t1:731_4: ca mubhiyaṅgaṇacetiyaṭṭhāne ca kalyāṇīcetiyaṭṭhāne ca mahābodhiṭṭhāne ca thūpārāmaṭṭhāne ca mahācetiyaṭṭhāne
tika-vin01t1:731_5: ca sasāvako nisīditvā nirodhasamāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā silācetiyaṭṭhāneyeva ṭhatvā devanāge samanusāsitvā
tika-vin01t1:731_7: Evaṃ bhagavā dharamānakālepi imaṃ dīpaṃ tikkhattuṃ āgamāsīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:732_0: Idāni tadeva tikkhattumāgamanaṃ saṅkhepato vibhāvento āha “paṭhamaṃ yakkhadamanattha”ntiādi.
tika-vin01t1:732_1: Rakkhaṃ karontoti yakkhānaṃ puna apavisanatthāya rakkhaṃ karonto.
tika-vin01t1:732_4: Ettha pana kiñcāpi bhagavā samiddhasumanena nāma devaputtena saddhiṃ āgato,
tika-vin01t1:732_5: tathāpi pacchāsamaṇena ekenapi bhikkhunā saddhiṃ anāgatattā “ekakova āgantvā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:733_0: Anuḷā devīti rañño jeṭṭhabhātujāyā anuḷā devī.
tika-vin01t1:733_1: Purimakānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ sammāsambuddhānaṃ bodhi patiṭṭhāsīti yadā hi so kakusandho nāma bhagavā imasmiṃ dīpe
tika-vin01t1:733_2: manusse pajjarakābhibhūte anayabyasanamāpajjante disvā karuṇāya sañcoditahadayo imaṃ dīpamāgato,
tika-vin01t1:733_3: tadā taṃ rogabhayaṃ vūpasametvā sannipatitānaṃ dhammaṃ desento caturāsītiyā pāṇasahassānaṃ dhammābhisamayaṃ
tika-vin01t1:733_4: katvā sāyanhasamaye bodhipatiṭṭhānārahaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā tattha samāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya “mama sirīsamahābodhito
tika-vin01t1:733_6: Sā satthu cittaṃ ñatvā taṅkhaṇaññeva khemavatīrājadhāniyā khemarājānamādāya mahābodhimupagantvā dakkhiṇamahāsākhāya
tika-vin01t1:733_7: manosilālekhaṃ khemarājena dāpetvā taṃ sayaṃ chijjitvā suvaṇṇakaṭāhe ṭhitaṃ bodhisākhamādāya pañcasatabhikkhunīhi
tika-vin01t1:733_8: ceva devatāhi ca parivāritā iddhiyā idhānetvā tathāgatena pasārite dakkhiṇahatthe sasuvaṇṇakaṭāhaṃ mahābodhiṃ ṭhapesi.
tika-vin01t1:733_9: Taṃ tathāgato abhayassa nāma rañño datvā tena tasmiṃ samaye “mahātitthavana”nti paññāte mahāmeghavanuyyāne patiṭṭhāpesi.
tika-vin01t1:734_0: Koṇāgamano ca bhagavā dubbuṭṭhipīḷite dīpavāsino disvā imaṃ dīpamāgato taṃ bhayaṃ vūpasametvā dhammaṃ
tika-vin01t1:734_1: desento caturāsīti pāṇasahassāni maggaphalesu patiṭṭhāpetvā pubbabodhiṭṭhānaṃ gantvā samāpattipariyosāne
tika-vin01t1:734_2: “mama udumbaramahābodhito dakkhiṇamahāsākhamādāya karakanattā bhikkhunī idhāgacchatū”ti cintesi.
tika-vin01t1:734_3: Sā bhagavato adhippāyaṃ viditvā taṅkhaṇaññeva sobharājadhāniyā sobharājānamādāya mahābodhimupagantvā
tika-vin01t1:734_4: dakkhiṇamahāsākhāya manosilālekhaṃ sobharājena dāpetvā taṃ sayaṃ chijjitvā hemakaṭāhe patiṭṭhitaṃ bodhisākhamādāya
tika-vin01t1:734_5: pañcasatabhikkhunīhi saddhiṃ suragaṇaparivutā iddhiyā idhāharitvā satthārā pasāritadakkhiṇapāṇitale sahemakaṭāhaṃ
tika-vin01t1:734_7: Taṃ tathāgato samiddhassa rañño datvā tena tasmiṃ samaye “mahānāgavana”nti saṅkhyaṃ gate mahāmeghavanuyyāne mahābodhiṃ patiṭṭhāpesi.
tika-vin01t1:735_0: Kassapopi ca bhagavā upaṭṭhitarājūparājayuddhena pāṇino vināsaṃ disvā karuṇāya codito imaṃ dīpamāgantvā
tika-vin01t1:735_1: taṃ kalahaṃ vūpasametvā dhammaṃ desento caturāsīti pāṇasahassāni maggaphalaṃ pāpetvā mahābodhiṭṭhānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:735_2: gantvā tattha samāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya “mama nigrodhamahābodhito dakkhiṇamahāsākhamādāya sudhammā
tika-vin01t1:735_4: Sā bhagavato cittaṃ viditvā taṅkhaṇaññeva bārāṇasīrājadhāniyā brahmadattarājānamādāya mahābodhimupagantvā
tika-vin01t1:735_5: dakkhiṇamahāsākhāya manosilālekhaṃ brahmadattena dāpetvā taṃ sayaṃ chijjitvā kanakakaṭāhe ṭhitaṃ bodhisākhamādāya
tika-vin01t1:735_6: pañcasatabhikkhunīparivārā devagaṇaparivutā iddhiyā ettha ānetvā munindena pasārite dakkhiṇakaratale
tika-vin01t1:735_8: Taṃ bhagavā jayantarañño datvā tena tasmiṃ samaye “mahāsālavana”nti saṅkhyaṃ gate mahāmeghavanuyyāne mahābodhiṃ patiṭṭhāpesi.
tika-vin01t1:735_9: Evaṃ imasmiṃ dīpe purimakānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ sammāsambuddhānaṃ bodhiṃ patiṭṭhāpesi.
tika-vin01t1:735_10: Taṃ sandhāya evamāha “imasmiñca mahārāja dīpe purimakānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ sammāsambuddhānaṃ bodhi patiṭṭhāsī”ti.
tika-vin01t1:736_0: Sarasaraṃsijālavissajjanakenāti siniddhatāya rasavantaṃ ojavantaṃ abhinavaraṃsijālaṃ vissajjentena.
tika-vin01t1:736_1: Atha vā ito cito ca saṃsaraṇato sarasaṃ sajīvaṃ jīvamānaṃ viya raṃsijālaṃ vissajjentena.
tika-vin01t1:736_2: Atha vā sarasakāle dharamānakāle buddhena viya raṃsijālaṃ muñcantenāti evamettha atthaṃ vaṇṇayanti.
tika-vin01t1:736_4: Pañcahi kaññāsatehīti attano paricārikehi pañcahi kaññāsatehi.
tika-vin01t1:736_7: Evañca avocāti rājasandesaṃ appetvā therassa mukhasāsanaṃ viññāpento evaṃ avoca.
tika-vin01t1:737_1: Chinnā hatthā etassāti chinnahatthoti aññapadatthasamāso daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin01t1:737_3: pabbajjāya sañjātābhilāsā “kadā nu kho pabbajissāmī”ti tattha ussukkamāpannāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t1:738_2: khāṇukaṇṭakādīni harāpetvā tattha bahalavipulavālukaṃ okirāpetvāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t1:738_11: Nānāvidhakusumasamākiṇṇanti upahāravasena upanītehi nānappakārehi vaṇṇagandhasampannehi jalathalapupphehi ākiṇṇaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:738_16: na mayaṃ tayā gahetabbā”ti vadantā viya avasesā sākhā satthu tejasā adassanamagamaṃsūti vadanti.
tika-vin01t1:738_19: Celukkhepasatasahassāni pavattiṃsūti tesaṃ tesaṃ janānaṃ sīsopari bhamantānaṃ uttarāsaṅgacelānaṃ ukkhepasatasahassāni pavattiṃsūti attho.
tika-vin01t1:738_20: Mūlasatenāti dasasu lekhāsu ekekāya dasa dasa hutvā nikkhantamūlasatena.
tika-vin01t1:739_1: Devadundubhīti ca na ettha kāci bherī adhippetā,
tika-vin01t1:739_4: Tassa hi acchabhāvena ākāsavaṇṇassa devassābhāvena sukkhagajjitasaññite sadde niccharante devadundubhīti samaññā,
tika-vin01t1:739_5: tasmā devadundubhiyo phaliṃsūti devo sukkhagajjitaṃ gajjīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t1:739_6: Pabbatānaṃ naccehīti pathavīkampena ito cito ca bhamantānaṃ pabbatānaṃ naccehi.
tika-vin01t1:739_7: Yakkhānaṃ hiṅkārehīti vimhayajātānaṃ yakkhānaṃ vimhayappakāsanavasena pavattehi hiṅkārasaddehi.
tika-vin01t1:739_8: Yakkhā hi vimhayajātā “hiṃ hi”nti saddaṃ nicchārenti.
tika-vin01t1:739_10: Brahmānaṃ apphoṭanehīti pītisomanassajātānaṃ brahmānaṃ bāhāyaṃ paharaṇasaṅkhātehi apphoṭanehi.
tika-vin01t1:739_11: Pītisomanassajātā hi brahmāno vāmahatthaṃ samiñjitvā dakkhiṇena hatthena bāhāyaṃ pahāraṃ denti.
tika-vin01t1:739_14: Phalato nikkhantā chabbaṇṇarasmiyo ujukaṃ uggantvā onamitvā cakkavāḷapabbatamukhavaṭṭiṃ āhacca tiṭṭhantīti
tika-vin01t1:739_16: Taṅkhaṇato ca pana pabhutīti vuttanayena suvaṇṇakaṭāhe patiṭṭhitassa mahābodhissa chabbaṇṇarasmīnaṃ vissajjitakālato pabhuti.
tika-vin01t1:739_17: Himavalāhakagabbhaṃ pavisitvā aṭṭhāsīti suvaṇṇakaṭāheneva saddhiṃ uggantvā himodakapuṇṇaṃ valāhakagabbhaṃ pavisitvā aṭṭhāsi.
tika-vin01t1:739_18: Paṭhamaṃ suvaṇṇakaṭāhe patiṭṭhitoyeva hi bodhi pacchā vuttappakāraacchariyapaṭimaṇḍito hutvā himavalāhakagabbhaṃ pavisitvā aṭṭhāsi.
tika-vin01t1:756_0: Tasmā suvaṇṇakaṭāhe patiṭṭhitoyeva bodhi kaṭāheneva saddhi uggantvā himavalāhakagabbhaṃ pavisitvā aṭṭhāsīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:757_0: Heṭṭhā pana bhagavato adhiṭṭhānakkamaṃ dassentena yaṃ vuttaṃ –
tika-vin01t1:758_0: “Bhagavā kira mahāparinibbānamañce nipanno laṅkādīpe mahābodhipatiṭṭhāpanatthāya asokamahārājā mahābodhiggahaṇatthaṃ gamissati,
tika-vin01t1:758_1: tadā mahābodhissa dakkhiṇasākhā sayameva chijjitvā suvaṇṇakaṭāhe patiṭṭhātūti adhiṭṭhāsi,
tika-vin01t1:759_0: “Tattha patiṭṭhānakāle ca ‘mahābodhi himavalāhakagabbhaṃ pavisitvā tiṭṭhatū’ti adhiṭṭhāsi,
tika-vin01t1:760_0: “Sattame divase himavalāhakagabbhato oruyha suvaṇṇakaṭāhe patiṭṭhahanto pattehi ca phalehi ca chabbaṇṇarasmiyo muñcatūti adhiṭṭhāsi,
tika-vin01t1:761_1: Tattha hi paṭhamaṃ himavalāhakagabbhaṃ pavisitvā pacchā sattame divase himavalāhakagabbhato oruyha chabbaṇṇaraṃsivissajjanaṃ
tika-vin01t1:761_4: Mahāvaṃse pana adhiṭṭhānepi paṭhamaṃ suvaṇṇakaṭāhe patiṭṭhahanaṃ pacchāyeva chabbaṇṇaraṃsivissajjanaṃ himavalāhakagabbhapavisanañca.
tika-vin01t1:770_1: tasmā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vutto adhiṭṭhānakkamo yathā pubbenāparaṃ na virujjhati,
tika-vin01t1:771_0: Himañca chabbaṇṇaraṃsiyo ca āvattitvā mahābodhimeva pavisiṃsūti mahābodhiṃ paṭicchādetvā ṭhitaṃ himañca
tika-vin01t1:771_1: bodhito nikkhantachabbaṇṇarasmiyo ca āvattitvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā bodhimeva pavisiṃsu,
tika-vin01t1:771_2: bodhipaviṭṭhā viya hutvā antarahitāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t1:771_3: Ettha pana “himañca raṃsiyo cā”ti ayameva pāṭho satasodhitasammate porāṇapotthake sesesu ca sabbapotthakesu dissati.
tika-vin01t1:773_0: Pavisiṃsu mahābodhiṃ, sabbā tā raṃsiyopi cā”ti.
tika-vin01t1:774_0: Kenaci pana “pañca raṃsiyo”ti pāṭhaṃ parikappetvā yaṃ vuttaṃ “sabbadisāhi pañca rasmiyo āvattitvāti pañcahi phalehi nikkhantattā pañca,
tika-vin01t1:774_3: Paripuṇṇakhandhasākhāpasākhapañcaphalapaṭimaṇḍitoti paripuṇṇakhandhasākhāpasākhāhi ceva pañcahi ca phalehi paṭimaṇḍito,
tika-vin01t1:775_1: Cātuddasīuposathattā dvisattāhe jāte uposatho sampattoti āha “kāḷapakkhassa uposathadivase”ti,
tika-vin01t1:775_3: Pācīnamahāsālamūle ṭhapesīti nagarassa pācīnadisābhāge jātassa mahāsālarukkhassa heṭṭhā maṇḍapaṃ kāretvā tattha ṭhapesi.
tika-vin01t1:775_5: Kattikachaṇapūjaṃ addasāti kattikachaṇavasena bodhissa kariyamānaṃ pūjaṃ sumanasāmaṇero addasa,
tika-vin01t1:775_6: disvā ca āgato sabbaṃ taṃ pavattiṃ ārocesi.
tika-vin01t1:775_7: Taṃ sandhāyeva ca thero bodhiāharaṇatthaṃ pesesi.
tika-vin01t1:776_0: Aṭṭhārasa devatākulānīti mahābodhiṃ parivāretvā ṭhitanāgayakkhādidevatākulāni datvāti sambandho.
tika-vin01t1:776_5: Gaṇṭhipade pana “gopakakulāni bodhisiñcanatthaṃ khīradhenupālanatthāya taracchakulāni kāliṅgakulāni vissāsikāni padhānamanussakulānī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:776_10: Viñjhāṭaviṃ samatikkammāti rājā sayampi mahābodhissa paccuggamanaṃ karonto senaṅgaparivuto thalapathena gacchanto viñjhāṭaviṃ nāma aṭaviṃ atikkamitvā.
tika-vin01t1:776_11: Tāmalittiṃ anuppattoti tāmalittiṃ nāma titthaṃ sampatto.
tika-vin01t1:776_12: Idamassa tatiyanti suvaṇṇakaṭāhe patiṭṭhitamahābodhissa rajjasampadānaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:776_13: Tato pubbe panesa ekavāraṃ saddhāya sakalajambudīparajjena mahābodhiṃ pūjesiyeva,
tika-vin01t1:776_15: Mahābodhiṃ pana yasmiṃ yasmiṃ divase rajjena pūjesi,
tika-vin01t1:776_16: tasmiṃ tasmiṃ divase sakalajambudīparajjato uppannaṃ āyaṃ gahetvā mahābodhipūjaṃ kāresi.
tika-vin01t1:777_3: Idañca imasmiṃ dīpe pavattamānavohāraṃ gahetvā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:777_4: Tattha pana puṇṇamito paṭṭhāya yāva aparā puṇṇamī,
tika-vin01t1:777_5: tāva eko māsoti vohārassa pavattattā tena vohārena “dutiyapāṭipadadivase”ti vattabbaṃ siyā.
tika-vin01t1:777_7: Ukkhipitvāti mahāsālamūle dinnehi soḷasahi jātisampannakulehi saddhiṃ ukkhipitvāti vadanti.
tika-vin01t1:777_10: bodhiyā adassanaṃ asahamāno roditvā paridevitvāti attho.
tika-vin01t1:777_11: Sarasaraṃsijālanti ettha pana heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva attho veditabbo.
tika-vin01t1:777_16: Samantā yojananti samantato ekekena passena yojanappamāṇe padese.
tika-vin01t1:778_1: Nāgakulāni santāsesīti mahābodhiggahaṇatthaṃ āgatāni nāgakulāni santāsesi,
tika-vin01t1:778_2: tesaṃ bhayaṃ uppādetvā palāpesīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t1:778_3: Tadā hi samuddavāsino nāgā mahābodhiṃ gahetuṃ vātavassandhakārādīhi mahantaṃ vikubbanaṃ akaṃsu.
tika-vin01t1:778_4: Tato saṅghamittattherī garuḷavaṇṇaṃ māpetvā tena garuḷarūpena ākāsaṃ pūrayamānā sikhāmarīcijālena gaganaṃ
tika-vin01t1:778_5: ekandhakāraṃ katvā pakkhappahāravātena mahāsamuddaṃ āloḷetvā saṃvaṭṭajaladhinādasadisena ravena nāgānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:778_6: hadayāni bhindantī viya tāsetvā nāge palāpesi.
tika-vin01t1:778_7: Te ca utrastarūpā nāgā āgantvāti te ca vuttanayena uttāsitā nāgā puna āgantvā.
tika-vin01t1:778_11: amhākaṃ bhagavā mucalindanāgarājassa bhogāvaliṃ attano gandhakuṭiṃ katvā sattāhaṃ tassa saṅgahaṃ akāsi.
tika-vin01t1:778_12: Abhisambujjhanadivase nerañjarānadītīre attano ucchiṭṭhapattaṃ mahākāḷanāgassa vissajjesi.
tika-vin01t1:778_13: Uruvelanāgena māpitaṃ visadhūmadahanaṃ agaṇetvā tassa saraṇasīlābharaṇamadāsi.
tika-vin01t1:778_14: Mahāmoggallānattheraṃ pesetvā nandopanandanāgarājānaṃ dametvā nibbisaṃ akāsi.
tika-vin01t1:778_16: tvampi no dosamassaritvā muhuttaṃ mahābodhiṃ vissajjetvā nāgalokassa saggamokkhamaggaṃ sampādehī”ti evaṃ yācitvā.
tika-vin01t1:779_1: Maggaṃ sodhāpetvāti khāṇukaṇṭakādīnaṃ uddharāpanavasena maggaṃ sodhāpetvā.
tika-vin01t1:779_4: Tasmiṃ kira padese ṭhitehi samuddassa diṭṭhattā taṃ acchariyaṃ pakāsetuṃ tattha ekā sālā katā.
tika-vin01t1:784_2: Maggassa kira ubhosu passesu antarantarā pupphehi kūṭāgārasadisasaṇṭhānāni pupphacetiyāni kārāpesi.
tika-vin01t1:784_6: Soḷasahi jātisampannakulehīti aṭṭhahi amaccakulehi aṭṭhahi ca brāhmaṇakulehīti evaṃ soḷasahi jātisampannakulehi.
tika-vin01t1:784_7: Samuddatīre mahābodhiṃ ṭhapetvāti samuddavelātale alaṅkatappaṭiyatte ramaṇīye maṇḍape mahābodhiṃ ṭhapetvā.
tika-vin01t1:784_8: Evaṃ pana katvā sakalatambapaṇṇirajjena mahābodhiṃ pūjetvā soḷasannaṃ kulānaṃ rajjaṃ niyyātetvā sayaṃ
tika-vin01t1:784_9: dovārikaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā tayo divase anekappakāraṃ pūjaṃ kārāpesi.
tika-vin01t1:784_12: soḷasahi vā jātisampannakulehi rajjaṃ vicārāpesīti attho.
tika-vin01t1:784_14: Anupubbena anurādhapuraṃ sampattoti dasamiyaṃ alaṅkatappaṭiyattarathe mahābodhiṃ ṭhapetvā uḷārapūjaṃ
tika-vin01t1:784_15: kurumāno pācīnapassavihārassa patiṭṭhātabbaṭṭhānamānetvā tattha saṅghassa pātarāsaṃ pavattetvā mahindattherena
tika-vin01t1:784_16: bhāsitaṃ nāgadīpe dasabalena kataṃ nāgadamanaṃ sutvā “sammāsambuddhena nisajjādinā paribhuttaṭṭhānesu
tika-vin01t1:784_17: thūpādīhi sakkāraṃ karissāmī”ti saññāṇaṃ kāretvā tato āharitvā tavakkabrāhmaṇassa gāmadvāre ṭhapetvā
tika-vin01t1:784_18: pūjetvā evaṃ tasmiṃ tasmiṃ ṭhāne pūjaṃ katvā iminā anukkamena anurādhapuraṃ sampatto.
tika-vin01t1:784_25: “Sakalarajjaṃ mahābodhissa dinnapubbattā upacāratthaṃ rājā dovārikavesaṃ gaṇhī”ti vadanti.
tika-vin01t1:785_3: “Saha bodhipatiṭṭhānenā”ti vattabbe vibhattivipariṇāmaṃ katvā “saha bodhipatiṭṭhānā”ti nissakkavacanaṃ kataṃ.
tika-vin01t1:785_7: Tathā hi saha bodhipatiṭṭhānena udakapariyantaṃ katvā mahāpathavī akampi,
tika-vin01t1:785_8: tāni mūlāni kaṭāhamukhavaṭṭito uggantvā taṃ kaṭāhaṃ vinandhantā pathavītalamotariṃsu,
tika-vin01t1:785_18: Evaṃ bodhi pathaviyaṃ patiṭṭhahitvā himagabbhe sannisīditvā sattāhaṃ lokassa adassanaṃ agamāsi.
tika-vin01t1:785_20: Vipphurantāti vipphurantā ito cito ca saṃsarantā.
tika-vin01t1:785_24: Uttarasākhato ekaṃ phalanti uttarasākhāya ṭhitaṃ ekaṃ phalaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:788_0: Yojaniyaārāmesūti anurādhapurassa samantā yojanassa anto kataārāmesu.
tika-vin01t1:788_2: Anurādhapurassa samantā evaṃ puttanattuparamparāya mahābodhimhi patiṭṭhiteti attho.
tika-vin01t1:788_5: tathāpi tasmiṃ samaye abhāvato ‘anāgate’ti vutta”nti tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:788_7: Mūlāni panassa na tāva otarantīti iminā, mahārāja,
tika-vin01t1:788_10: assa satthusāsanassa mūlāni pana na tāva otiṇṇānīti evamettha attho veditabbo.
tika-vin01t1:788_12: Tenevāha “kadā pana bhante mūlāni otiṇṇāni nāma bhavissantī”ti.
tika-vin01t1:788_13: Yo amacco catupaṇṇāsāya jeṭṭhakakaniṭṭhabhātukehi saddhiṃ cetiyagirimhi pabbajito,
tika-vin01t1:788_15: Meghavaṇṇābhayassa amaccassa pariveṇaṭṭhāneti meghavaṇṇābhayassa rañño amaccena kattabbassa pariveṇassa vatthubhūte ṭhāne.
tika-vin01t1:788_18: Sāsanassa mūlāni otarantāni passissāmīti iminā sāsanassa suṭṭhu patiṭṭhānākāraṃ passissāmīti dīpeti.
tika-vin01t1:789_0: Meghavirahitassa nimmalasseva ākāsassa viravitattā “ākāsaṃ mahāviravaṃ ravī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:789_3: Yathā vejjo gilānesu karuṇāya tikicchanameva purakkhatvā vigatacchandadoso jigucchanīyesu vaṇesu guyhaṭṭhānesu
tika-vin01t1:789_5: evaṃ bhagavāpi kilesabyādhipīḷitesu sattesu karuṇāya te satte kilesabyādhidukkhato mocetukāmo avattabbārahāni
tika-vin01t1:789_6: guyhaṭṭhānanissitānipi asappāyāni vadanto vinayapaññattiyā sattānaṃ kilesabyādhiṃ tikicchati.
tika-vin01t1:789_11: Kāyakammavacīkammavipphanditavinayananti kāyavacīdvāresu ajjhācāravasena pavattassa kilesavipphanditassa vinayanakaraṃ.
tika-vin01t1:790_3: Nibbāyiṃsu mahesayoti ettha mahāmahindatthero dvādasavassiko hutvā tambapaṇṇidīpaṃ sampatto,
tika-vin01t1:790_4: tattha dve vassāni vasitvā vinayaṃ patiṭṭhapesi.
tika-vin01t1:791_0: Tesaṃ therānaṃ antevāsikāti tesaṃ mahāmahindattherappamukhānaṃ therānaṃ antevāsikā.
tika-vin01t1:791_2: tasmā tissadattakāḷasumanadīghasumanādayo mahāariṭṭhattherassa antevāsikā cāti yojetabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:797_0: Tato ariṭṭho medhāvī, tissadatto ca paṇḍito.
tika-vin01t1:802_0: Ettāvatā ca “kenābhata”nti imaṃ pañhaṃ vitthārato vibhajitvā idāni “kattha patiṭṭhita”nti imaṃ pañhaṃ vissajjento āha “kattha patiṭṭhita”ntiādi.
tika-vin01t1:802_2: Adhimattasatigatidhītimantesūti ettha satīti buddhavacanaṃ uggahetvā dhāraṇakasati.
tika-vin01t1:802_8: Kukkuccakesūti aṇumattesupi vajjesu dosadassāvitāya kappiyākappiyaṃ nissāya kukkuccakārīsu.
tika-vin01t1:802_9: Sikkhākāmesūti adhisīlaaacittaadhipaññāvasena tisso sikkhā kāmayamānesu sampiyāyitvā sikkhantesu.
tika-vin01t1:803_0: Akattabbato nivāretvā kattabbesu patiṭṭhāpanato mātāpituṭṭhāniyoti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:803_1: Ācāragocarakusalatāti veḷudānādimicchājīvassa kāyapāgabbhiyādīnañca akaraṇena sabbaso anācāraṃ vajjetvā
tika-vin01t1:803_2: “kāyiko avītikkamo vācasiko avītikkamo”ti evaṃ vuttabhikkhusāruppaācārasampattiyā vesiyādiagocaraṃ vajjetvā
tika-vin01t1:803_3: piṇḍapātādiatthaṃ upasaṅkamituṃ yuttaṭṭhānasaṅkhātagocarena ca sampannattā samaṇācāresu ceva samaṇagocaresu
tika-vin01t1:803_5: Apica yo bhikkhu satthari sagāravo sappatisso sabrahmacārīsu sagāravo sappatisso hirottappasampanno sunivattho
tika-vin01t1:803_6: supāruto pāsādikena abhikkantena paṭikkantena ālokitena vilokitena samiñjitena pasāritena okkhittacakkhu
tika-vin01t1:803_7: iriyāpathasampanno indriyesu guttadvāro bhojane mattaññū jāgariyamanuyutto satisampajaññena samannāgato
tika-vin01t1:803_8: appiccho santuṭṭho āraddhavīriyo pavivitto asaṃsaṭṭho ābhisamācārikesu sakkaccakārī garucittīkārabahulo viharati,
tika-vin01t1:804_0: Gocaro pana upanissayagocaro ārakkhagocaro upanibandhagocaroti tividho.
tika-vin01t1:804_7: yassa vā pana anusikkhamāno saddhāya vaḍḍhati, sīlena, sutena, cāgena,
tika-vin01t1:804_10: Yo pana bhikkhu antaragharaṃ paviṭṭho vīthipaṭipanno okkhittacakkhu yugamattadassāvī saṃvuto gacchati,
tika-vin01t1:804_27: Iti iminā ca ācārena iminā ca gocarena samannāgatattā ācāragocarakusalatā.
tika-vin01t1:804_28: Evaṃ anācāraṃ agocarañca vajjetvā saddhāpabbajitānaṃ yathāvuttaācāragocaresu kusalabhāvo vinayadharāyattoti
tika-vin01t1:805_1: Attano sīlakkhandho sugutto hoti surakkhitoti kathamassa attano sīlakkhandho sugutto hoti surakkhito?
tika-vin01t1:805_2: Āpattiñhi āpajjanto chahākārehi āpajjati alajjitā, aññāṇatā,
tika-vin01t1:805_7: Vinayadharo pana imehi chahākārehi āpattiṃ nāpajjati.
tika-vin01t1:806_2: ayaṃ kappiyākappiyaṃ jānantoyeva paṇṇattivītikkamaṃ karotī”ti imaṃ parūpavādaṃ rakkhantopi akappiyabhāvaṃ jānantoyeva madditvā vītikkamaṃ na karoti.
tika-vin01t1:806_4: Sahasā āpannampi desanāgāminiṃ desetvā vuṭṭhānagāminiyā vuṭṭhahitvā suddhante patiṭṭhāti, tato –
tika-vin01t1:808_0: Agatigamanañca na gacchati, ediso vuccati lajjipuggalo”ti. –
tika-vin01t1:811_1: Kappiyākappiyaṃ nissāya kukkucce uppanne vatthuṃ oloketvā mātikaṃ padabhājanaṃ antarāpattiṃ anāpattiṃ oloketvā kappiyaṃ ce hoti, karoti,
tika-vin01t1:811_4: Uppannaṃ pana kukkuccaṃ avinicchinitvāva “vaṭṭatī”ti madditvā na vītikkamati.
tika-vin01t1:812_9: Evamassa attano sīlakkhandho sugutto hoti surakkhito.
tika-vin01t1:813_0: Kukkuccapakatānanti kappiyākappiyaṃ nissāya uppannena kukkuccena abhibhūtānaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:813_2: Tiroraṭṭhesu tirojanapadesu ca uppannakukkuccā bhikkhū “asukasmiṃ kira vihāre vinayadharo vasatī”ti dūratopi
tika-vin01t1:813_4: So tehi katakammassa vatthuṃ oloketvā āpattānāpattiṃ garukalahukādibhedaṃ sallakkhetvā desanāgāminiṃ
tika-vin01t1:814_0: Visārado saṅghamajjhe voharatīti vigato sārado bhayaṃ etassāti visārado,
tika-vin01t1:814_2: Avinayadharassa hi saṅghamajjhe kathentassa bhayaṃ sārajjaṃ okkamati,
tika-vin01t1:815_0: Paccatthike sahadhammena suniggahitaṃ niggaṇhātīti ettha dvidhā paccatthikā nāma attapaccatthikā ca sāsanapaccatthikā ca.
tika-vin01t1:815_1: Tattha mettiyabhummajakā ca bhikkhū vaḍḍho ca licchavī amūlakena antimavatthunā codesuṃ,
tika-vin01t1:815_7: Te sabbepi sahadhammena sahakāraṇena vacanena yathā taṃ asaddhammaṃ patiṭṭhāpetuṃ na sakkonti,
tika-vin01t1:816_0: Saddhammaṭṭhitiyā paṭipanno hotīti ettha pana tividho saddhammo pariyattipaṭipattiadhigamavasena.
tika-vin01t1:816_2: Terasa dhutaṅgaguṇā cuddasa khandhakavattāni dveasīti mahāvattānīti ayaṃ paṭipattisaddhammo nāma.
tika-vin01t1:816_3: Cattāro maggā ca cattāri phalāni ca,
tika-vin01t1:816_6: mayā dhammo ca vinayo ca desito paññatto,
tika-vin01t1:816_7: so vo mamaccayena satthā”ti iminā suttena “sāsanassa pariyatti mūla”nti vadanti.
tika-vin01t1:816_10: asuñño loko arahantehi assā”ti iminā suttena “sāsanassa paṭipatti mūla”nti vatvā “yāva pañca bhikkhū sammā paṭipannā saṃvijjanti,
tika-vin01t1:816_12: Itare pana therā “pariyattiyā antarahitāya suppaṭipannassapi dhammābhisamayo natthī”ti vatvā āhaṃsu.
tika-vin01t1:816_13: Sacepi pañca bhikkhū cattāri pārājikāni rakkhaṇakā honti,
tika-vin01t1:816_14: te saddhe kulaputte pabbājetvā paccantime janapade upasampādetvā dasavaggagaṇaṃ pūretvā majjhimajanapadepi upasampadaṃ karissanti.
tika-vin01t1:816_15: Etenupāyena vīsativaggasaṅghaṃ pūretvā attanopi abbhānakammaṃ katvā sāsanaṃ vuḍḍhiṃ viruḷhiṃ gamayissanti.
tika-vin01t1:816_16: Evamayaṃ vinayadharo tividhassapi saddhammassa ciraṭṭhitiyā paṭipanno hotīti.
tika-vin01t1:816_17: Evamayaṃ vinayadharo ime pañcānisaṃse paṭilabhatīti veditabbo.
tika-vin01t1:817_2: tasmā sakalāpi vinayapaññatti vinayapariyāpuṇanaṃ vā kāyavacīdvārasaṃvaratthāyāti attho,
tika-vin01t1:817_3: ājīvapārisuddhipariyosānassa sīlassa upanissayapaccayo hotīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t1:817_19: Catubbidhopi hi ariyamaggo arahattassa upanissayapaccayo hoti.
tika-vin01t1:817_21: Anupādāparinibbānatthāyāti kañci dhammaṃ aggahetvā anavasesetvā parinibbānatthāya,
tika-vin01t1:817_23: Appaccayaparinibbānassa hi vimuttiñāṇadassanaṃ paccayo hoti tasmiṃ anuppatte avassaṃ parinibbāyitabbato,
tika-vin01t1:817_24: na ca paccavekkhaṇañāṇe anuppanne antarā parinibbānaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t1:818_0: Etadatthā kathāti ayaṃ vinayakathā nāma etadatthāya,
tika-vin01t1:818_6: Etadatthā upanisāti upanisīdati ettha phalaṃ tappaṭibaddhavuttitāyāti upanisā vuccati kāraṇaṃ paccayoti.
tika-vin01t1:818_8: Etadatthaṃ sotāvadhānanti imissā paramparapaccayakathāya sotāvadhānaṃ imaṃ kathaṃ sutvā yaṃ uppajjati ñāṇaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:818_11: Sabbaliṅgavibhattivacanesu tādisova tattha tattha atthato pariṇāmetabbo,
tika-vin01t1:818_13: yo ayaṃ catūhi upādānehi anupādiyitvā cittassa arahattaphalasaṅkhāto vimokkho,
tika-vin01t1:818_14: sopi etadatthāya anupādāparinibbānatthāyāti evamettha sambandho veditabbo.
tika-vin01t1:818_17: Evañca sati iminā mahussāhato sādhitabbaṃ niyatappayojanaṃ dassitaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t1:818_19: nibbānatthāyā”ti iminā pana labbhamānānisaṃsaphalaṃ dassitanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:823_9: “Yenāti avatvā tenāti vuttattā aniyamaṃ katvā niddiṭṭhavacanaṃ aniyamaniddesavacana”ntipi vadanti.
tika-vin01t1:823_12: Sarūpena avuttenapīti “yenā”ti evaṃ sarūpato pāḷiyaṃ avuttenapi.
tika-vin01t1:823_13: Atthato siddhenāti parabhāge sāriputtattherassa uppajjanakaparivitakkasaṅkhātaatthato siddhena.
tika-vin01t1:823_14: Parivitakke hi siddhe yena samayena parivitakko udapādīti idaṃ atthato siddhameva hoti.
tika-vin01t1:823_15: Tenevāha “aparabhāge hi vinayapaññattiyācanahetubhūto āyasmato sāriputtassa parivitakko siddho”tiādi.
tika-vin01t1:823_16: “Tenā”ti vatvā tato tadatthameva “yenā”ti atthato vuccamānattā “yenā”ti ayaṃ “tenā”ti etassa paṭiniddeso nāma jāto.
tika-vin01t1:824_7: Yathayidaṃ brahmacariyaṃ addhaniyaṃ assa ciraṭṭhitika”nti evaṃ pavattassa vinayapaññattiyācanassa kāraṇabhūtoti attho.
tika-vin01t1:824_8: Parivitakkoti “katamesānaṃ kho buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ brahmacariyaṃ na ciraṭṭhitikaṃ ahosi,
tika-vin01t1:824_9: katamesānaṃ buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ brahmacariyaṃ ciraṭṭhitikaṃ ahosī”ti evaṃ pavatto parivitakko.
tika-vin01t1:824_11: Pubbe vā pacchā vā atthato siddhenāti pubbe vā pacchā vā uppannaatthato siddhena.
tika-vin01t1:824_15: Atha vā “paṭiniddeso kattabbo”ti yadidaṃ yā ayaṃ yutti,
tika-vin01t1:825_0: Tatridaṃ mukhamattanidassananti tassā yathāvuttayuttiyā paridīpane idaṃ mukhamattanidassanaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:825_2: Mukhaṃ dvāraṃ upāyoti hi atthato ekaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:825_3: “Tena hi bhikkhave bhikkhūnaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññapessāmī”ti pāḷiṃ dassetvā tattha paṭiniddesamāha “yena sudinno”tiādinā.
tika-vin01t1:825_4: Tenāti hetuatthe karaṇavacanattā tassa paṭiniddesopi tādisoyevāti āha “yasmā paṭisevī”ti.
tika-vin01t1:825_6: Pacchā atthato siddhenāti raññā adinnaṃ dārūnaṃ ādiyanasaṅkhātapacchāuppannaatthato siddhena.
tika-vin01t1:826_3: Assāti assa samayasaddassa samavāyo atthoti sambandho.
tika-vin01t1:826_4: Appeva nāma svepi upasaṅkameyyāma kālañca samayañca upādāyāti ettha kālo nāma upasaṅkamanassa yuttapayuttakālo.
tika-vin01t1:826_7: Upādānaṃ nāma ñāṇena tesaṃ gahaṇaṃ sallakkhaṇaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:826_8: tasmā kālañca samayañca paññāya gahetvā upadhāretvāti attho.
tika-vin01t1:826_10: sace amhākaṃ sve gamanassa yuttakālo bhavissati,
tika-vin01t1:826_12: gamanapaccayā ca añño aphāsuvihāro na bhavissati,
tika-vin01t1:826_13: athetaṃ kālañca gamanakāraṇasamavāyasaṅkhātaṃ samayañca upadhāretvā api eva nāma sve āgaccheyyāmāti.
tika-vin01t1:827_3: Yo khaṇoti ca samayoti ca vuccati,
tika-vin01t1:827_9: Samayopi kho te bhaddāli appaṭividdho ahosīti ettha samayoti sikkhāpadapūraṇassa hetu.
tika-vin01t1:827_12: bhaddāli tayā paṭivijjhitabbayuttakaṃ etaṃ kāraṇaṃ atthi,
tika-vin01t1:827_13: tampi te na paṭividdhaṃ na sallakkhitanti.
tika-vin01t1:828_0: Uggāhamāno tiādīsu mānoti tassa paribbājakassa pakatināmaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:828_1: kiñci kiñci pana uggahetuṃ samatthatāya “uggāhamāno”ti naṃ sañjānanti,
tika-vin01t1:828_8: Tasmiṃ kira ṭhāne caṅkītārukkhapokkharasātipabhutayo brāhmaṇā nigaṇṭhācelakaparibbājakādayo ca paribbājakā
tika-vin01t1:828_9: sannipatitvā attano attano samayaṃ diṭṭhiṃ pavadanti kathenti dīpenti,
tika-vin01t1:828_13: Yasmā panettha paṭhamaṃ ekā sālā katā ahosi,
tika-vin01t1:828_14: pacchā mahāpuññaṃ poṭṭhapādaparibbājakaṃ nissāya bahū sālā katā,
tika-vin01t1:828_15: tasmā tameva ekaṃ sālamupādāya laddhanāmavasena “ekasālako”ti vuccati.
tika-vin01t1:828_16: Mallikāya pana pasenadirañño deviyā uyyānabhūto so pupphaphalasañchanno ārāmoti katvā “mallikāya ārāmo”ti saṅkhyaṃ gato.
tika-vin01t1:828_17: Tasmiṃ samayappavādake tindukācīre ekasālake mallikāya ārāme.
tika-vin01t1:829_2: Samparāyikoti kammakilesavasena samparetabbato sampāpuṇitabbato samparāyo, paraloko.
tika-vin01t1:829_6: Samparāyikopi hi attho kāraṇassa nipphannattā paṭiladdho nāma hotīti tamatthadvayaṃ ekato katvā “atthābhisamayā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:829_8: Atha vā dhī paññā etassa atthīti dhīro.
tika-vin01t1:830_1: Sammāti iminā mānassa aggamaggañāṇena samucchedappahānaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:830_2: Dukkhassa pīḷanaṭṭhotiādīsu dukkhasaccassa pīḷanaṃ taṃsamaṅgino hiṃsanaṃ avipphārikatākaraṇaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:830_8: Vipariṇāmo jarāya maraṇena cāti dvidhā vipariṇāmetabbatā.
tika-vin01t1:830_12: Tāni hi abhisametabbabhāvena ekībhāvaṃ upanetvā “abhisamayaṭṭho”ti vuttāni,
tika-vin01t1:830_13: abhisamayassa vā paṭivedhassa visayabhūto attho abhisamayaṭṭhoti tāneva pīḷanādīni abhisamayassa visayabhāvūpagamanasāmaññato ekattena vuttāni.
tika-vin01t1:831_0: Ettha ca upasaggānaṃ jotakamattattā tassa tassa atthassa vācako samayasaddo evāti samayasaddassa atthuddhārepi saupasaggo abhisamayasaddo vutto.
tika-vin01t1:831_1: Tattha sahakārīkāraṇasannijjhaṃ sameti samavetīti samayo, samavāyo.
tika-vin01t1:831_2: Sameti samāgacchati maggabrahmacariyaṃ ettha tadādhārapuggalehīti samayo, khaṇo.
tika-vin01t1:831_4: etena vā saṃgacchanti dhammā sahajātadhammehi uppādādīhi vāti samayo, kālo.
tika-vin01t1:831_5: Dhammappavattimattatāya atthato abhūtopi hi kālo dhammappavattiyā adhikaraṇaṃ kāraṇaṃ viya ca parikappanāmattasiddhena rūpena voharīyati. Samaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:831_6: saha vā avayavānaṃ ayanaṃ pavatti avaṭṭhānanti samayo,
tika-vin01t1:831_9: Paccayantarasamāgame eti phalaṃ etasmā uppajjati pavattati cāti samayo,
tika-vin01t1:831_11: Sameti saṃyojanabhāvato sambandho eti attano visaye pavattati,
tika-vin01t1:831_12: daḷhaggahaṇabhāvato vā taṃsaṃyuttā ayanti pavattanti sattā yathābhinivesaṃ etenāti samayo, diṭṭhi.
tika-vin01t1:831_17: sammā vā yānaṃ apagamo appavattīti samayo, pahānaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:831_18: Ñāṇena abhimukhaṃ sammā etabbo adhigantabboti abhisamayo,
tika-vin01t1:831_20: Abhimukhabhāvena sammā eti gacchati bujjhatīti abhisamayo,
tika-vin01t1:831_22: Evaṃ tasmiṃ tasmiṃ atthe samayasaddassa pavatti veditabbā.
tika-vin01t1:832_0: Nanu ca atthamattaṃ paṭicca saddā abhinivisanti,
tika-vin01t1:832_1: na ekena saddena aneke atthā abhidhīyantīti?
tika-vin01t1:832_3: Saddavisese hi apekkhiyamāne ekena saddena anekatthābhidhānaṃ na sambhavati.
tika-vin01t1:832_6: Ettha pana tesaṃ tesaṃ atthānaṃ samayasaddavacanīyatāsāmaññamupādāya anekatthatā samayasaddassa vuttā.
tika-vin01t1:832_8: Idha panassa kālo atthoti assa samayasaddassa idha kālo attho samavāyādīnaṃ atthānaṃ idha asambhavato
tika-vin01t1:832_9: desadesakādīnaṃ viya nidānabhāvena kālassa apadisitabbato ca.
tika-vin01t1:833_0: Upayogavacanena bhummavacanena ca niddesamakatvā idha karaṇavacanena niddese payojanaṃ niddhāretukāmo
tika-vin01t1:833_2: Ettha “tena samayenā”ti imasmiṃ ṭhāne vitaṇḍavādī āhāti attho.
tika-vin01t1:833_16: Tathā hi karuṇānidānattā desanāya idha parahitapaṭipatti “karuṇāvihāro”ti vuttā,
tika-vin01t1:833_18: Na hi desanākāle desetabbadhammavisayassa desanāñāṇassa sattavisayāya mahākaruṇāya sahuppatti sambhavati bhinnavisayattā,
tika-vin01t1:833_19: tasmā karuṇāvasena pavatto parahitapaapattisaṅkhāto vihāro idha karuṇāvihāroti veditabbo.
tika-vin01t1:833_20: Tadatthajotanatthanti accantasaṃyogatthadīpanatthaṃ upayoganiddeso kato yathā “māsaṃ ajjhetī”ti.
tika-vin01t1:834_8: samūhasaddassa attho samūhattho. Ko so? Samayo.
tika-vin01t1:834_10: kālattho samūhattho ca samayo tattha abhidhamme vuttānaṃ phassādidhammānaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ ādhāroti yasmiṃ
tika-vin01t1:834_11: kāle dhammapuñje vā kāmāvacaraṃ kusalaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ hoti,
tika-vin01t1:834_12: tasmiṃyeva kāle puñje ca phassādayopi hontīti ayañhi tattha attho.
tika-vin01t1:835_0: Nanu cāyaṃ upādāya paññatto kālo samūho ca vohāramattako,
tika-vin01t1:835_3: Yathā hi kālo sabhāvadhammaparicchinno sayaṃ paramatthato avijjamānopi ādhārabhāvena paññatto taṅkhaṇappavattānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:835_4: tato pubbe parato ca abhāvato “pubbaṇhe jāto sāyanhe gacchatī”tiādīsu,
tika-vin01t1:835_5: samūho ca avayavavinimutto avijjamānopi kappanāmattasiddho avayavānaṃ ādhārabhāvena paññapīyati “rukkhe sākhā,
tika-vin01t1:836_0: Abhidhamme ādhāratthasambhavaṃ dassetvā idāni bhāvenabhāvalakkhaṇatthasambhavaṃ dassento āha “khaṇasamavāyahetusaṅkhātassā”tiādi.
tika-vin01t1:836_1: Tattha khaṇo nāma aṭṭhakkhaṇavinimutto navamo buddhuppādasaṅkhāto khaṇo,
tika-vin01t1:836_4: cakkāni yehi samannāgatānaṃ devamanussānaṃ catucakkaṃ pavattatī”ti ettha patirūpadesavāso,
tika-vin01t1:836_7: pubbe ca katapuññatāti cattāri cakkāni vuttāni,
tika-vin01t1:836_8: tāni ekajjhaṃ katvā okāsaṭṭhena khaṇoti veditabbo.
tika-vin01t1:836_10: Samavāyo nāma “cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe ca uppajjati cakkhuviññāṇa”nti evamādinā niddiṭṭhā cakkhuviññāṇādisaṅkhātasādhāraṇaphalanipphādakattena
tika-vin01t1:836_14: Yathāvuttakhaṇasaṅkhaātassa samavāyasaṅkhātassa hetusaṅkhātassa ca samayassa bhāvena sattāya tesaṃ phassādidhammānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:836_20: tasmiṃ samaye”ti ca vutte “satī”ti ayamattho viññāyamāno eva hoti aññakiriyāya sambandhābhāve padatthassa
tika-vin01t1:836_21: sattāvirahābhāvatoti samayassa sattākiriyāya cittassa uppādakiriyā phassādibhavanakiriyā ca lakkhīyatīti.
tika-vin01t1:836_22: Ayañhi tattha attho yasmiṃ yathāvutte khaṇe paccayasamavāye hetumhi ca sati kāmāvacaraṃ kusalaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ hoti,
tika-vin01t1:836_23: tasmiṃyeva khaṇe paccayasamavāye hetumhi ca sati phassādayopi hontīti.
tika-vin01t1:837_3: kudālena khaṇatī”tiādīsu viya karaṇattho ca sambhavati.
tika-vin01t1:837_5: Tena samayena hetubhūtena karaṇabhūtenāti ettha pana taṃtaṃvatthuvītikkamova sikkhāpadapaññattiyā hetu ceva karaṇañca.
tika-vin01t1:837_6: Tathā hi yadā bhagavā sikkhāpadapaññattiyā paṭhamameva tesaṃ tesaṃ tattha tattha taṃtaṃsikkhāpadapaññattihetubhūtaṃ vītikkamaṃ apekkhamāno viharati,
tika-vin01t1:837_7: tadā taṃ taṃ vītikkamaṃ apekkhitvā tadatthaṃ vasatīti siddho vatthuvītikkamassa hetubhāvo “annena vasati,
tika-vin01t1:837_9: Sikkhāpadapaññattikāle pana teneva pubbasiddhena vītikkamena sikkhāpadaṃ paññapetīti sikkhāpadapaññattiyā
tika-vin01t1:837_10: sādhakatamattā karaṇabhāvopi vītikkamasseva siddho “asinā chindatī”tiādīsu viya.
tika-vin01t1:837_11: Vītikkamaṃ pana apekkhamāno teneva saddhiṃ tannissayakālampi apekkhitvā viharatīti kālassapi idha hetubhāvo vutto,
tika-vin01t1:837_12: sikkhāpadaṃ paññapento ca taṃ taṃ vītikkamakālaṃ anatikkamitvā teneva kālena sikkhāpadaṃ paññapetīti vītikkamanissayassa kālassapi karaṇabhāvo vutto,
tika-vin01t1:837_13: tasmā iminā pariyāyena kālassapi hetubhāvo karaṇabhāvo ca labbhatīti vuttaṃ “tena samayena hetubhūtena karaṇabhūtenā”ti.
tika-vin01t1:837_14: Nippariyāyato pana vītikkamoyeva hetubhūto karaṇabhūto ca.
tika-vin01t1:837_15: So hi vītikkamakkhaṇe hetu hutvā pacchā sikkhāpadapaññāpane karaṇampi hotīti.
tika-vin01t1:838_0: Sikkhāpadāni paññāpayantoti vītikkamaṃ pucchitvā bhikkhusaṅghaṃ sannipātāpetvā otiṇṇavatthukaṃ puggalaṃ
tika-vin01t1:838_1: paṭipucchitvā vigarahitvā ca taṃ taṃ vatthuṃ otiṇṇakālaṃ anatikkamitvā teneva kālena karaṇabhūtena sikkhāpadāni
tika-vin01t1:838_3: Sikkhāpadapaññattihetuñca apekkhamānoti tatiyapārājikādīsu viya sikkhāpadapaññattiyā hetubhūtaṃ taṃ taṃ
tika-vin01t1:838_4: vatthuṃ vītikkamasamayaṃ apekkhamāno tena samayena hetubhūtena bhagavā tattha tattha vihāsīti attho.
tika-vin01t1:838_5: “Sikkhāpadāni paññāpayanto sikkhāpadapaññattihetuñca apekkhamāno”ti vacanato “tena samayena karaṇabhūtena
tika-vin01t1:838_6: hetubhūtenā”ti evaṃ vattabbepi paṭhamaṃ “hetubhūtenā”ti vacanaṃ idha hetuatthassa adhippetattā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:838_7: Bhagavā hi verañjāyaṃ viharanto therassa sikkhāpadapaññattiyācanahetubhūtaṃ parivitakkasamayaṃ apekkhamāno
tika-vin01t1:838_8: tena samayena hetubhūtena vihāsīti tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:838_10: ācariyassa idha kamavacanicchā natthīti evametaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:838_11: Teneva dīghanikāyaṭṭhakathāyampi “tena samayena hetubhūtena karaṇabhūtenā”tiādinā ayameva anukkamo vutto.
tika-vin01t1:838_12: Na hi tattha paṭhamaṃ “hetubhūtenā”ti vacanaṃ idha “tena samayena verañjāyaṃ viharatī”ti ettha hetuatthassa adhippetabhāvadīpanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:838_14: sikkhāpadapaññattihetuñca apekkhamāno hetubhūtena samayena vihāsīti evamettha sambandho kātabbo”tipi vadanti.
tika-vin01t1:838_17: Hoti cetthāti ettha imasmiṃ padese yathāvuttatthasaṅgahavasena ayaṃ gāthā hoti.
tika-vin01t1:839_3: Parato atthaṃ vaṇṇayissāmāti parato “itipi so bhagavā”tiādinā āgataṭṭhāne vaṇṇayissāma.
tika-vin01t1:839_4: Verañjāyanti ettha “balikaraggahaṇena janassa pīḷābhāvato niddosattā vigato rajo assāti verañjā,
tika-vin01t1:839_5: serivāṇijajātake devadattassa veruppannapadese katattā veraṃ ettha jātanti verañjā,
tika-vin01t1:839_6: paviṭṭhapaviṭṭhe naṭasamajjādīhi khādanīyabhojanīyālaṅkārādīhi ca vividhehi upakaraṇehi rañjanato vividhehi rañjayatīti verañjā,
tika-vin01t1:839_7: paṭipakkhe abhibhavitvā katabhāvato veraṃ abhibhavitvā jātāti verañjā,
tika-vin01t1:839_8: verañjassa nāma isino assamaṭṭhāne katattā verañjā”ti evamādinā keci vaṇṇayanti.
tika-vin01t1:839_10: nāmamattametaṃ tassa nagarassāti dassento āha “verañjāti aññatarassa nagarassetaṃ adhivacana”nti.
tika-vin01t1:839_15: Mettāsahagatena cetasā ekaṃ disaṃ pharitvā viharati.
tika-vin01t1:839_16: Sabbanimittānaṃ amanasikārā animittaṃ cetosamādhiṃ samāpajjitvā viharatī”tiādīsu viya saddantarasannidhānasiddhena visesaparāmasanena vinā.
tika-vin01t1:840_1: vihāresūti iriyāpathavihāro dibbavihāro brahmavihāro ariyavihāroti etesu catūsu vihāresu.
tika-vin01t1:840_6: Na hi ṭhānanisajjādīhi avatthāhi vinā kañci kāyikakiriyaṃ pavattetuṃ sakkā.
tika-vin01t1:840_7: Ṭhānasamaṅgī vā hi kāyena kiñci kareyya gamanādīsu aññatarasamaṅgī vāti.
tika-vin01t1:840_14: Tattha yo dibbānubhāvo tadatthāya saṃvattatīti vā dibbo,
tika-vin01t1:840_16: dibbo ca so vihāro cāti dibbavihāro,
tika-vin01t1:840_21: taṃ mettājhānādīnaṃ brahmavihāratā viya tāsaṃ bhāvanāvisesabhāvaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:840_25: hitūpasaṃharādivasena pavattiyā brahmabhūtā seṭṭhabhūtā vihārāti attho,
tika-vin01t1:840_30: Visesato pana rūpāvacaracatutthajjhānaṃ catasso appamaññāyo catutthajjhānikaphalasamāpatti ca bhagavato dibbabrahmaariyavihārā.
tika-vin01t1:841_1: Bhagavā hi lobhadosamohussannakāle loke tassa sakāya paṭipattiyā vinayanatthaṃ dibbabrahmaaayavihāre upasampajja viharati.
tika-vin01t1:841_2: Tathā hi yadā sattā kāmesu vippaṭipajjanti,
tika-vin01t1:841_3: tadā kira bhagavā dibbena vihārena viharati tesaṃ alobhakusalamūluppādanatthaṃ “appeva nāma imaṃ paṭipattiṃ
tika-vin01t1:841_4: disvā ettha ruciṃ uppādentā kāmesu virajjeyyu”nti.
tika-vin01t1:841_6: tadā pana brahmavihārena viharati tesaṃ adosakusalamūluppādanatthaṃ “appeva nāma imaṃ paṭipattiṃ disvā
tika-vin01t1:841_7: ettha ruciṃ uppādetvā adosena dosaṃ vūpasameyyu”nti.
tika-vin01t1:841_9: tadā ariyavihārena viharati tesaṃ amohakusalamūluppādanatthaṃ “appeva nāma imaṃ paṭipattiṃ disvā tattha ruciṃ uppādetvā amohena mohaṃ vūpasameyyu”nti.
tika-vin01t1:841_10: Evañca katvā imehi dibbabrahmaariyavihārehi sattānaṃ vividhaṃ hitasukhaṃ harati upaharati upaneti janeti uppādetīti “viharatī”ti vuccati.
tika-vin01t1:842_0: Iriyāpathavihārena pana na kadāci na viharati taṃ vinā attabhāvapariharaṇābhāvato,
tika-vin01t1:842_1: tatoyeva ca dibbavihārādīnampi sādhāraṇo iriyāpathavihāroti āha “idha panā”tiādi.
tika-vin01t1:842_2: Iriyāpathasamāyogaparidīpananti itaravihārasamāyogaparidīpanassa visesavacanassa abhāvato iriyāpathasamāyogaparidīpanassa ca atthasiddhattā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:842_3: Asmiṃ pana pakkhe viharatīti ettha vi-
tika-vin01t1:842_8: kathaṃ kassa pavattananti antolīnacodanaṃ sandhāyāha “so hī”tiādi.
tika-vin01t1:842_10: Yadipi bhagavā ekenapi iriyāpathena cirataraṃ kālaṃ attabhāvaṃ pavattetuṃ sakkoti,
tika-vin01t1:842_11: tathāpi upādinnakasarīrassa nāma ayaṃ sabhāvoti dassetuṃ “ekaṃ iriyāpathabādhana”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:842_13: Yasmā pana bhagavā yattha katthaci vasanto vineyyānaṃ dhammaṃ desento nānāsamāpattīhi ca kālaṃ vītināmento
tika-vin01t1:842_14: vasatīti sattānaṃ attano ca vividhaṃ hitasukhaṃ harati upaneti,
tika-vin01t1:842_15: tasmā vividhaṃ haratīti viharatīti evampettha attho veditabbo.
tika-vin01t1:843_2: tasmā tena adhivattho pucimando “naḷerussa pucimando naḷerupucimando”ti vuccati.
tika-vin01t1:843_3: Atha vā naḷe ruhattā jātattā naḷeru.
tika-vin01t1:843_5: tasmā rukkhasusire jātattā naḷeru ca so pucimando cāti naḷerupucimandoti vuccati.
tika-vin01t1:843_11: tasmā mahantena susirena samannāgato pucimando naḷerupucimandoti vuccatīti.
tika-vin01t1:843_12: Ācariyo pana kimettha bahubhāsitenāti ekamevatthaṃ dassento “naḷeru nāma yakkho”tiādimāha.
tika-vin01t1:844_2: na mūlamūlādīsu vattamānoti dassento āha “mūlanti samīpa”ntiādi.
tika-vin01t1:844_3: Nippariyāyena sākhādimato saṅghātassa suppatiṭṭhitabhāvasādhane avayavavisese pavattamāno mūlasaddo yasmā
tika-vin01t1:844_4: taṃsadisesu tannissaye padese ca ruḷhīvasena pariyāyato pavattati,
tika-vin01t1:844_5: tasmā “mūlāni uddhareyyā”ti ettha nippariyāyato mūlaṃ adhippetanti ekena mūlasaddena visesetvā āha “mūlamūle dissatī”ti yathā “dukkhadukkhaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:844_9: tasmā lobhasahagatacittuppādānameva āveṇike nesaṃ suppatiṭṭhitabhāvasādhanato mūlaṭṭhena upakārake paccayadhammaviseseti attho.
tika-vin01t1:844_11: lobhādayo pana tathā na honti akusalasseva sādhāraṇattāti asādhāraṇakāraṇaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:844_14: Tesupi hi alobhādikusalamūlaṃ akusalābyākatehi asādhāraṇattā asādhāraṇakāraṇaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:845_0: Tatthāti “tena samayena buddho bhagavā verañjāyaṃ viharati naḷerupucimandamūle”ti yaṃ vuttaṃ, tattha.
tika-vin01t1:845_4: “pāṭaliputte pāsāde vasatī”tiādīsu viya adhikaraṇādhikaraṇaṃ yadi bhaveyya,
tika-vin01t1:845_5: tadā “verañjāyaṃ viharati naḷerupucimandamūle”ti adhikaraṇadvayaniddeso yutto siyā,
tika-vin01t1:845_6: imesaṃ pana bhinnadesattā na yutto ubhayaniddesoti.
tika-vin01t1:845_7: Atha tattha viharatīti yadi naḷerupucimandamūle viharati.
tika-vin01t1:845_8: Na vattabbanti nānāṭhānabhūtattā verañjānaḷerupucimandamūlānaṃ “tena samayenā”ti ca vuttattāti adhippāyo.
tika-vin01t1:845_9: Idāni codako tameva attano adhippāyaṃ “na hi sakkā”tiādinā vivarati.
tika-vin01t1:845_10: Verañjānaḷerupucimandamūlānaṃ bhūmibhāgavasena bhinnattāyeva hi na sakkā ubhayattha teneva samayena viharituṃ,
tika-vin01t1:845_11: “ubhayattha teneva samayenā”ti ca vuttattā nānāsamaye vihāro avāritoti veditabbo.
tika-vin01t1:846_0: Itaro sabbametaṃ aviparītamatthaṃ ajānantena tayā vuttanti dassento “na kho panetaṃ evaṃ daṭṭhabba”ntiādimāha.
tika-vin01t1:846_1: Tattha etanti “verañjāyaṃ viharati naḷerupucimandamūle”ti etaṃ vacanaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:846_2: Evanti “yadi tāva bhagavā”tiādinā yaṃ taṃ bhavatā coditaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:846_3: taṃ atthato evaṃ na kho pana daṭṭhabbaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:846_4: na ubhayattha apubbaṃ acarimaṃ vihāradassanatthanti attho.
tika-vin01t1:846_5: Idāni attanā yathādhippetaṃ aviparītamatthaṃ tassa ca paṭikacceva vuttabhāvaṃ tena ca appaṭividdhataṃ
tika-vin01t1:846_10: tasmā samīpādhikaraṇatthavasena ubhayathā nidānakittane kiṃ payojananti codanaṃ manasi nidhāyāha “gocaragāmanidassanattha”ntiādi.
tika-vin01t1:847_3: Tattha gahaṭṭhānuggahakaraṇanti tesaṃ tattha paccayaggahaṇena upasaṅkamanapayirupāsanādīnaṃ okāsadānena
tika-vin01t1:847_4: dhammadesanāya saraṇesu sīlesu ca patiṭṭhāpanena yathūpanissayaṃ uparivisesādhigamāvahanena ca gahaṭṭhānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:847_6: Pabbajitānuggahakaraṇanti uggahaparipucchānaṃ kammaṭṭhānānuyogassa ca anurūpavasanaṭṭhānapariggahenettha pabbajitānaṃ anuggahakaraṇaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:848_13: Kilesakāmassa vatthubhūtattā rūpādayo pañca kāmaguṇā vatthukāmo,
tika-vin01t1:848_15: Kāmasukhallikānuyogavivajjanupāyadassananti vatthukāmesu kilesakāmasaṃyuttassa sukhassa yogo anuyogo anubhavo,
tika-vin01t1:849_0: Sayameva gocaragāmaṃ upasaṅkamitvā attano dhammassavanānurūpabhabbapuggalānaṃ dassanato dhammadesanāya
tika-vin01t1:849_1: kālo sampatto nāma hotīti dhammadesanāya abhiyogo viññāyatīti āha “purimena ca dhammadesanābhiyoga”nti.
tika-vin01t1:849_3: Bahigāme vivittokāse vasantassa ākiṇṇavihārābhāvato kāyavivekādīsu adhimutti tappoṇatā viññāyatīti āha “pacchimena vivekādhimutti”nti.
tika-vin01t1:850_0: Dhammadesanābhiyogavivekādhimuttīnaṃ hetubhūtā eva karuṇāpaññā dhammadesanāya upagamanassa tato apagamanassa
tika-vin01t1:850_3: Etena ca karuṇāya upagamanaṃ na lābhādinimittaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:850_4: paññāya apagamanaṃ na virodhādinimittanti upagamanāpagamanānaṃ nirupakkilesataṃ vibhāvibhanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:851_1: Tañhi dhammikaṃ lābhaṃ paṭicca uppannattā “dhammikasukha”nti vuccati.
tika-vin01t1:852_3: Buddhassa hi bhagavato duvidhā desanā sammutidesanā paramatthadesanā cāti.
tika-vin01t1:852_4: Ayamattho pana heṭṭhā vitthāritovāti idha na vuccati.
tika-vin01t1:852_5: Eko ca so puggalo cāti ekapuggalo.
tika-vin01t1:852_8: So hi dasannaṃ pāramīnaṃ paṭipāṭiyā āvajjanaṃ ādiṃ katvā bodhisambhāraguṇehi ceva buddhaguṇehi ca sesamahājanena asadisoti asadisaṭṭhenapi ekapuggalo.
tika-vin01t1:852_10: tepi aññasattānaṃ guṇehi visiṭṭhāti guṇavisiṭṭhaṭṭhenapi ekapuggalo.
tika-vin01t1:852_12: tehi saddhiṃ ayameva eko rūpakāyaguṇehi ceva nāmakāyaguṇehi ca samoti asamasamaṭṭhenapi ekapuggalo.
tika-vin01t1:853_0: Uppajjamāno uppajjatīti idaṃ pana ubhayampi vippakatavacanameva.
tika-vin01t1:853_2: na aññena kāraṇenāti evaṃ panettha attho veditabbo.
tika-vin01t1:853_3: Evarūpañcettha lakkhaṇaṃ na sakkā etaṃ aññena saddalakkhaṇena paṭibāhituṃ.
tika-vin01t1:853_7: Esa hi dīpaṅkarapādamūlato laddhabyākaraṇo buddhakārakadhamme pariyesanto dasa pāramiyo disvā “ime dhammā
tika-vin01t1:853_8: mayā pūretabbā”ti katasanniṭṭhāno dānapāramiṃ pūrentopi uppajjamāno nāma.
tika-vin01t1:853_14: Ñātatthacariyaṃ lokatthacariyaṃ buddhatthacariyaṃ pūrayamānopi uppajjamāno nāma.
tika-vin01t1:853_15: Kappasatasahassādhikāni cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni buddhakārake dhamme matthakaṃ pāpentopi uppajjamāno nāma.
tika-vin01t1:853_16: Vessantarattabhāvaṃ pahāya tusitapure paṭisandhiṃ gahetvā saṭṭhivassasatasahassādhikā sattapaṇṇāsa vassakoṭiyo tiṭṭhantopi uppajjamāno nāma.
tika-vin01t1:853_17: Devatāhi yācito pañca mahāvilokanāni viloketvā māyādeviyā kucchismiṃ paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhantopi,
tika-vin01t1:853_18: anūnādhike dasa māse gabbhavāsaṃ vasantopi uppajjamāno nāma.
tika-vin01t1:853_19: Ekūnatiṃsa vassāni agāramajjhe tiṭṭhantopi uppajjamāno nāma.
tika-vin01t1:853_20: Kāmesu ādīnavaṃ nekkhamme ca ānisaṃsaṃ disvā rāhulabhaddassa jātadivase channasahāyo kaṇḍakaṃ assavaramāruyha nikkhamantopi uppajjamāno nāma.
tika-vin01t1:853_21: Tīṇi rajjāni atikkamanto anomanaditīre pabbajantopi uppajjamāno nāma.
tika-vin01t1:853_23: Paripākagate ñāṇe oḷārikaṃ āhāraṃ āharantopi uppajjamāno nāma.
tika-vin01t1:853_24: Sāyanhasamaye visākhapuṇṇamāyaṃ mahābodhimaṇḍaṃ āruyha mārabalaṃ vidhametvā paṭhamayāme pubbenivāsaṃ
tika-vin01t1:853_25: anussaritvā majjhimayāme dibbacakkhuṃ parisodhetvā pacchimayāmasamanantare dvādasaṅgaṃ paṭiccasamuppādaṃ
tika-vin01t1:853_26: anulomapaṭilomato sammasitvā sotāpattimaggaṃ paṭivijjhantopi uppajjamāno nāma.
tika-vin01t1:853_30: Buddhānañhi sāvakānaṃ viya na paṭipāṭiyā iddhividhañāṇādīni uppajjanti,
tika-vin01t1:853_31: saheva pana arahattamaggena sakalopi sabbaññutaññāṇādi guṇarāsi āgatova nāma hoti,
tika-vin01t1:853_32: tasmā nibbattasabbakiccattā arahattaphalakkhaṇe uppanno nāma hoti.
tika-vin01t1:854_4: Yo tathāgatassa dhammadesanaṃ sutvā amatapānaṃ pivi,
tika-vin01t1:854_6: Bhagavatā hi mahābodhimaṇḍe sattasattāhaṃ vītināmetvā bodhimaṇḍā isipatanaṃ āgamma “dveme,
tika-vin01t1:854_8: antā pabbajitena na sevitabbā”ti dhammacakkappavattanasuttante desite āyasmatā aññāsikoṇḍaññattherena
tika-vin01t1:854_13: Tato yasadārakappamukhe pañcapaṇṇāsa purise arahatte patiṭṭhāpesi,
tika-vin01t1:854_14: tato kappāsikavanasaṇḍe tiṃsa bhaddavaggiye tayo magge ca phalāni ca sampāpesi,
tika-vin01t1:854_17: tato laṭṭhivane bimbisārappamukhā ekādasa nahutā brāhmaṇagahapatikā satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahiṃsu,
tika-vin01t1:854_25: Pāsāṇakacetiye pārāyanasuttakathādivase cuddasa koṭiyo amatapānaṃ piviṃsu.
tika-vin01t1:854_27: tāvatiṃsabhavane paṇḍukambalasilāyaṃ nisīditvā mātaraṃ kāyasakkhiṃ katvā sattappakaraṇaṃ abhidhammaṃ desentassa asīti pāṇakoṭiyo,
tika-vin01t1:854_30: Mahāsamayasuttante maṅgalasutte cūḷarāhulovāde samacittapaṭipadāyāti imesu catūsu ṭhānesu abhisamayappattasattānaṃ paricchedo natthi,
tika-vin01t1:854_32: Yāvajjadivasā ito parampi anāgate imaṃ sāsanaṃ nissāya saggamokkhamagge patiṭṭhahantānaṃ vasenapi ayamattho veditabbo.
tika-vin01t1:855_1: avasesānaṃ nāgasupaṇṇādīnampi atthāya hitāya sukhāyeva uppanno.
tika-vin01t1:855_2: Sahetukapaṭisandhike pana maggaphalasacchikiriyāya bhabbe puggale dassetuṃ evaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:855_3: Tasmā etesampi atthatthāya hitatthāya sukhatthāyeva uppannoti veditabbo.
tika-vin01t1:856_1: Idāni tāya pucchāya puṭṭhaṃ ekapuggalaṃ vibhāvento “tathāgato arahaṃ sammāsambuddho”ti āha.
tika-vin01t1:856_4: Paṭhamaṃ lumbinīvane dutiyaṃ bodhimaṇḍeti lumbinīvane rūpakāyena jāto,
tika-vin01t1:856_14: pacchimena paramāya upekkhāya samannāgamanti evamādiṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-vin01t1:857_3: Diṭṭhisīlasāmaññena saṃhatattā saṅghoti imamatthaṃ vibhāvento āha “diṭṭhisīlasāmaññasaṅkhātasaṅghātena samaṇagaṇenā”ti.
tika-vin01t1:857_4: Ettha pana “yāyaṃ diṭṭhi ariyā niyyānikā niyyāti takkarassa sammā dukkhakkhayāya,
tika-vin01t1:857_5: tathārūpāya diṭṭhiyā diṭṭhisāmaññagato viharatī”ti evaṃ vuttāya diṭṭhiyā,
tika-vin01t1:857_6: “yāni tāni sīlāni akhaṇḍāni acchiddāni asabalāni akammāsāni bhujissāni viññuppasatthāni aparāmaṭṭhāni samādhisaṃvattanikāni,
tika-vin01t1:857_7: tathārūpesu sīlesu sīlasāmaññagato viharatī”ti evaṃ vuttānañca sīlānaṃ sāmaññasaṅkhātena saṅghato saṅghaṭito
tika-vin01t1:857_14: yaṃ diṭṭhisampanno puggalo sañcicca pāṇaṃ jīvitā voropeyya,
tika-vin01t1:857_15: netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjatī”ti ādivacanato diṭṭhisīlānaṃ niyatasabhāvattā sotāpannāpi aññamaññaṃ diṭṭhisīlasāmaññena saṃhatā,
tika-vin01t1:857_17: Ariyapuggalā hi yattha katthaci dūre ṭhitāpi attano guṇasāmaggiyā saṃhatāyeva.
tika-vin01t1:857_19: tathārūpesu sīlesu sīlasāmaññagato viharatī”ti vacanato puthujjanānampi diṭṭhisīlasāmaññena saṃhatabhāvo labbhatiyeva,
tika-vin01t1:857_20: idha pana ariyasaṅghoyeva adhippeto “yo tattha pacchimako,
tika-vin01t1:857_24: Nirabbudotiādīnaṃ vacanattho parato eva āvi bhavissati.
tika-vin01t1:858_0: Assosīti ettha savanamupalabbhoti āha “assosīti suṇi upalabhī”ti,
tika-vin01t1:858_2: So cāyamupalabbho savanavasenevāti imamatthaṃ dassento āha “sotadvārasampattavacananigghosānusārena aññāsī”ti.
tika-vin01t1:858_3: Avadhāraṇaphalattā saddappayogassa sabbampi vākyaṃ antogadhāvadhāraṇanti āha “khoti padapūraṇamatte nipāto”ti.
tika-vin01t1:858_4: Avadhāraṇattheti pana iminā antogadhāvadhāraṇepi sabbasmiṃ vākye iṭṭhatovadhāraṇatthaṃ khosaddaggahaṇanti dasseti.
tika-vin01t1:858_6: Atha padapūraṇatthena khosaddena kiṃpayojananti āha “padapūraṇena pana byañjanasiliṭṭhatāmattamevā”ti.
tika-vin01t1:858_7: “Assosī”ti hi padaṃ khosadde gahite tena phullitamaṇḍitavibhūsitaṃ viya hontaṃ pūritaṃ nāma hoti,
tika-vin01t1:859_0: Verañjoti ettha saddalakkhaṇānusārena atthaṃ dassento āha “verañjāyaṃ jāto”tiādi.
tika-vin01t1:859_1: Brahmaṃ aṇatīti ettha brahmanti vedo vuccati,
tika-vin01t1:859_6: Mante sajjhāyatīti iruvedādike mantasatthe sajjhāyatīti attho.
tika-vin01t1:859_8: Idameva hīti avadhāraṇena brahmato jātotiādikaṃ niruttiṃ paṭikkhipati.
tika-vin01t1:859_9: Jātibrāhmaṇānanti iminā aññepi brāhmaṇā atthīti dasseti.
tika-vin01t1:859_10: Duvidhā hi brāhmaṇā jātibrāhmaṇā visuddhibrāhmaṇā cāti.
tika-vin01t1:859_11: Idāni tattha visuddhibrāhmaṇānaṃ niruttiṃ dassento āha “ariyā panā”tiādi.
tika-vin01t1:860_1: Evañhi bāhirakaavītarāgasekkhāsekkhapāpasamaṇato bhagavato pāpasamaṇaṃ visesitaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t1:860_4: samitapāpattā samaṇoti vuccatīti idaṃ bhinnagāthāsannissitapadadvayaṃ ekato gahetvā vutta”nti vadanti.
tika-vin01t1:860_6: samaṇoti pavuccatīti idaṃ vacanaṃ gahetvā ‘samitattā samaṇoti vuccatī’ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:860_7: Bāhitapāpoti brāhmaṇoti idaṃ pana aññasmiṃ gāthābandhe vuttavacana”nti.
tika-vin01t1:860_8: Anekatthattā nipātānaṃ idha anussavanatthe adhippetoti āha “khalūti anussavanatthe nipāto”ti.
tika-vin01t1:860_12: Piyasamudāhārā hete bhoti vā āvusoti vā devānampiyāti vā.
tika-vin01t1:860_13: Bhovādī nāma so hotīti yo āmantanādīsu “bho bho”ti vadanto vicarati,
tika-vin01t1:860_16: Rāgādayo hi satte kiñcenti maddanti palibundhantīti “kiñcanānī”ti vuccanti.
tika-vin01t1:860_17: Manussā kira goṇehi khalaṃ maddāpentā “kiñcehi kapila,
tika-vin01t1:861_1: Gosaddena cettha abhidhānaṃ buddhi ca vuccati,
tika-vin01t1:861_3: Gotamoti pavattamānaṃ abhidhānaṃ buddhiñca ekaṃsikavisayatāya tāyati rakkhatīti gottaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:861_4: Yathā hi buddhi ārammaṇabhūtena atthena vinā na vattati,
tika-vin01t1:861_6: tasmā so gottasaṅkhāto attho tāni buddhiabhidhānāni tāyati rakkhatīti vuccati.
tika-vin01t1:861_7: So pana aññakulaparamparāya asādhāraṇaṃ tassa kulassa ādipurisasamudāgataṃ taṃkulapariyāpannasādhāraṇaṃ sāmaññarūpanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:861_8: Ettha ca samaṇoti iminā sarikkhakajanehi bhagavato bahumatabhāvo dassito samitapāpatākittanato,
tika-vin01t1:861_11: Iminā ca uditoditavipulakhattiyakulavibhāvanato vuttaṃ “idaṃ pana bhagavato uccākulapaadīpana”nti.
tika-vin01t1:861_12: Sabbakhattiyānañhi ādibhūtamahāsammatamahārājato paṭṭhāya asambhinnaṃ uḷāratamaṃ sakyarājakulaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:861_13: Kenaci pārijuññena anabhibhūtoti ñātipārijuññabhogapārijuññādinā kenaci pārijuññena parihāniyā anabhibhūto anajjhotthaṭo.
tika-vin01t1:861_14: Tathā hi lokanāthassa abhijātiyaṃ tassa kulassa na kiñci pārijuññaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:861_16: Abhinikkhamane ca tato samiddhatamabhāvo loke pākaṭo paññāto.
tika-vin01t1:861_17: Tena “sakyakulā pabbajito”ti idaṃ vacanaṃ bhagavato saddhāpabbajitabhāvaparidīpanatthaṃ vuttaṃ mahantaṃ
tika-vin01t1:862_0: Itthambhūtākhyānatthe upayogavacananti itthaṃ imaṃ pakāraṃ bhūto āpannoti ittambhūto,
tika-vin01t1:862_3: Atha vā itthaṃ evaṃ pakāro bhūto jātoti evaṃ kathanattho itthambhūtākhyānattho,
tika-vin01t1:862_7: Tena yogato “taṃ kho pana bhavantaṃ gotama”nti idaṃ upayogavacanaṃ sāmiatthepi samānaṃ itthambhūtākhyānadīpanato “itthambhūtākhyānatthe”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:862_8: Tenevāha “tassa kho pana bhoto gotamassāti attho”ti.
tika-vin01t1:862_10: yathā “sādhu devadatto mātaramabhī”ti ettha abhisaddayogato itthambhūtākhyāne upayogavacanaṃ kataṃ,
tika-vin01t1:862_11: evamidhāpi taṃ kho pana bhavantaṃ gotamaṃ abhi evaṃ kalyāṇo kittisaddo uggatoti abhisaddayogato itthambhūtākhyāne upayogavacananti.
tika-vin01t1:862_12: “Sādhu devadatto mātaramabhī”ti ettha hi “devadatto mātaramabhi mātari visaye mātuyā vā sādhū”ti evaṃ
tika-vin01t1:862_13: adhikaraṇatthe sāmiatthe vā bhummavacanassa vā sāmivacanassa vā pasaṅge itthambhūtākhyānatthajotakena
tika-vin01t1:862_15: Yathā cettha “devadatto mātu visaye mātusambandhī vā sādhuttappakārappatto”ti ayamattho viññāyati,
tika-vin01t1:862_16: evamidhāpi “bhoto gotamassa sambandhī kittisaddo abbhuggato abhibhavitvā uggamanappakārappatto”ti ayamattho viññāyati.
tika-vin01t1:862_17: Tattha hi devadattaggahaṇaṃ viya idha kittisaddaggahaṇaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:862_18: tathā tattha “mātara”nti vacanaṃ viya idha “taṃ kho pana bhavantaṃ gotama”nti vacanaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:862_19: tattha sādhusaddaggahaṇaṃ viya idha uggatasaddaggahaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:863_2: kalyāṇehi guṇehi samannāgato taṃvisayatāya yuttoti attho.
tika-vin01t1:863_3: Taṃvisayatā hettha samannāgamo kalyāṇaguṇavisayatāya tannissitoti adhippāyo.
tika-vin01t1:863_5: Seṭṭhaguṇavisayatāya eva hi kittisaddassa seṭṭhatā “bhagavāti vacanaṃ seṭṭha”ntiādīsu viya.
tika-vin01t1:863_6: “Bhagavā araha”ntiādinā guṇānaṃ saṃkittanato saddanīyato ca kittisaddo vaṇṇoti āha “kittisaddoti kitti evā”ti.
tika-vin01t1:863_7: Vaṇṇoyeva hi kittetabbato kittisaddanīyato saddoti ca vuccati.
tika-vin01t1:864_0: “Abbhuggato”ti pana etassa attho aṭṭhakathāyaṃ na dassito,
tika-vin01t1:864_3: anaññasādhāraṇaguṇe ārabbha pavattattā sadevakaṃ lokaṃ ajjhottharitvā pavattoti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t1:864_4: Kinti saddo abbhuggatoti āha “itipi so bhagavā”tiādi.
tika-vin01t1:864_5: Ito paraṃ pana īdisesu ṭhānesu yattha yattha pāḷipāṭhassa attho vattabbo siyā,
tika-vin01t1:864_6: tattha tattha “pāḷiyaṃ panā”ti vatvā atthaṃ dassayissāma,
tika-vin01t1:864_7: idāni tattha padayojanāpubbakaṃ atthaṃ dassento āha “itipi so bhagavātiādīsu pana ayaṃ tāva yojanā”tiādi.
tika-vin01t1:864_8: So bhagavāti yo so samatiṃsa pāramiyo pūretvā sabbakilese bhañjitvā anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddho
tika-vin01t1:864_9: devānaṃ atidevo sakkānaṃ atisakko brahmānaṃ atibrahmā lokanātho bhāgyavantatādīhi kāraṇehi bhagavāti
tika-vin01t1:864_13: Tenāha āyasmā dhammasenāpati “bhagavāti netaṃ nāmaṃ mātarā kata”ntiādi.
tika-vin01t1:864_15: Yathā kammaṭṭhānikena “araha”ntiādīsu navasu ṭhānesu paccekaṃ itipisaddaṃ yojetvā buddhaguṇā anussarīyanti,
tika-vin01t1:864_16: evaṃ buddhaguṇasaṃkittakenapīti dassento “itipi arahaṃ itipi sammāsambuddho…pe…
tika-vin01t1:864_18: Evañhi sati “araha”ntiādīhi navahi padehi ye sadevake loke ativiya pākaṭā paññātā buddhaguṇā,
tika-vin01t1:864_21: itipetaṃ taccha”ntiādīsu viya hi idha iti-
tika-vin01t1:864_24: tena ca tesaṃ guṇānaṃ bahubhāvo dīpito,
tika-vin01t1:864_25: tāni ca guṇasallakkhaṇakāraṇāni saddhāsampannānaṃ viññujātikānaṃ paccakkhāni hontīti tāni saṃkittentena
tika-vin01t1:864_26: viññunā cittassa sammukhībhūtāneva katvā saṃkittetabbānīti dassento “iminā ca iminā ca kāraṇenāti vuttaṃ
tika-vin01t1:865_1: suttānurūpaṃ paridīpayantī”ti heṭṭhā vuttattā visuddhimagge sabbākārato saṃvaṇṇitampi atthaṃ idhāpi vitthāretvā
tika-vin01t1:866_0: Idāni yathāvuttamevatthaṃ vibhāvento āha “ārakā hi so”tiādi.
tika-vin01t1:866_1: Dūratā nāma āsannatā viya upādāyupādāya vuccatīti paramukkaṃsagataṃ dūrabhāvaṃ dassento “suvidūravidūre ṭhito”ti āha,
tika-vin01t1:866_5: atha kho tesaṃ sabbaso pahīnattāti dassento āha “maggena kilesānaṃ viddhaṃsitattā”ti.
tika-vin01t1:866_6: Nanu aññesampi khīṇāsavānaṃ te pahīnā evāti anuyogaṃ manasi katvā vuttaṃ “savāsanāna”nti.
tika-vin01t1:866_7: Na hi ṭhapetvā bhagavantaṃ aññe saha vāsanāya kilese pahātuṃ sakkonti.
tika-vin01t1:866_8: Etena aññehi asādhāraṇaṃ bhagavato arahattanti dassitaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t1:866_10: Pahīnakilesassapi appahīnakilesassa payogasadisapayogahetubhūto kilesanissito sāmatthiyaviseso āyasmato
tika-vin01t1:866_12: Kathaṃ pana “ārakā”ti vutte “kilesehī”ti ayamattho labbhatīti sāmaññacodanāya visese avaṭṭhānato visesatthinā
tika-vin01t1:866_13: ca visesassa anupayujjitabbato “ārakāssa honti pāpakā akusalā dhammā”tiādīni suttapadānettha udāharitabbāni.
tika-vin01t1:866_16: kārassa ca hakāraṃ sānusāraṃ katvā niruttinayena “araha”nti padasiddhi veditabbā.
tika-vin01t1:868_0: Asamaṅgī ca dosehi, nātho tenārahaṃ mato”ti. ;
tika-vin01t1:869_1: Arīnaṃ hatattā arihāti vattabbe niruttinayena “araha”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:872_1: Rathacakkassa nābhi viya mūlāvayavabhūtaṃ anto bahi ca samavaṭṭhitaṃ avijjābhavataṇhādvayanti vuttaṃ “avijjābhavataṇhāmayanābhī”ti.
tika-vin01t1:872_2: Nābhiyā nemiyā ca sambaddhaarasadisā paccayaphalabhūtehi avijjātaṇhājarāmaraṇehi sambaddhā puññābhisaṅkhāraapuññābhisaṅkhāraāneñjābhisaṅkhārāti
tika-vin01t1:872_4: Tattha tattha bhave pariyantabhāvena pākaṭaṃ jarāmaraṇanti taṃ nemiṭṭhāniyaṃ katvā āha “jarāmaraṇanemī”ti.
tika-vin01t1:872_6: evaṃ saṃsāracakkappavattiyā āsavasamudayoti āha “āsavasamudayamayena akkhena vijjhitvā”ti.
tika-vin01t1:872_12: sabbaso vā ādito paṭṭhāya yojitanti samāyojitaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:875_2: Bodhimaṇḍeti bodhisaṅkhātassa ñāṇassa maṇḍabhāvappatte ṭhāne kāle vā.
tika-vin01t1:875_4: sā ettha maṇḍā pasannā jātāti bodhimaṇḍo.
tika-vin01t1:875_5: Vīriyapādehīti saṃkilesavodānapakkhiyesu sannirumbhanasannikkhipanakiccatāya dvidhā pavatteti attano vīriyasaṅkhātehi pādehi.
tika-vin01t1:875_9: Kammakkhayakaranti kāyakammādibhedassa sabbassapi kammassa khayakaraṇato kammakkhayakaraṃ.
tika-vin01t1:876_0: Evaṃ “arānaṃ hatattā”ti ettha vuttaṃ arasaṅkhātaṃ saṃsāraṃ cakkaṃ viya cakkanti gahetvā atthayojanaṃ
tika-vin01t1:876_1: katvā idāni paṭiccasamuppādadesanākkamenapi taṃ dassetuṃ “atha vā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:876_2: Tattha anamataggasaṃsāravaṭṭanti anu anu amataggaṃ aviññātapubbakoṭikaṃ saṃsāramaṇḍalaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:876_3: Sesā dasa dhammāti saṅkhārādayo jātipariyosānā dasa dhammā.
tika-vin01t1:876_4: Kathaṃ tesaṃ saṅkhārādīnaṃ arabhāvoti āha “avijjāmūlakattā jarāmaraṇapariyantattā cā”ti.
tika-vin01t1:876_5: Tattha avijjā mūlaṃ padhānakāraṇaṃ yesaṃ saṅkhārādīnaṃ te avijjāmūlakā,
tika-vin01t1:876_10: Saṅkhārādijātipariyosānānaṃ dasadhammānaṃ avijjāmūlakattā jarāmaraṇapariyosānattā cāti attho,
tika-vin01t1:876_11: nābhibhūtāya avijjāya mūlato nemibhūtena jarāmaraṇena antato saṅkhārādīnaṃ sambandhattāti adhippāyo.
tika-vin01t1:877_5: Ettha hi kiñcāpi ṭhapetvā lokuttarasaccadvayaṃ sesaṭṭhānesu ārammaṇavasenapi avijjā uppajjati,
tika-vin01t1:877_7: Sā hi uppannā dukkhasaccaṃ paṭicchādetvā tiṭṭhati,
tika-vin01t1:878_0: Dukkhanti cettha dukkhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ adhippetanti taṃ kāmabhavādivasena tidhā bhinditvā tathā tappaṭicchādikañca
tika-vin01t1:878_1: avijjaṃ tidhā katvā avijjādipaccaye tīsu bhavesu saṅkhārādike paṭipāṭiyā dassento “kāmabhave ca avijjā”tiādimāha.
tika-vin01t1:878_2: Tattha kāmabhave ca avijjāti kāmabhave ādīnavapaṭicchādikā avijjā.
tika-vin01t1:878_3: Rūpabhave avijjā arūpabhave avijjāti etthāpi eseva nayo.
tika-vin01t1:878_8: Paccayo hotīti puññābhisaṅkhārānaṃ tāva ārammaṇapaccayena ceva upanissayapaccayena cāti dvidhā paccayo hoti,
tika-vin01t1:878_11: anānantarassa pana ārammaṇavasena ceva upanissayavasena ca paccayo hoti.
tika-vin01t1:878_14: Imasmiñca panatthe ettha vitthāriyamāne atippapañco hoti,
tika-vin01t1:879_0: Tiṇṇaṃ āyatanānanti cakkhusotamanāyatanānaṃ ghānādittayassa tattha asambhavato.
tika-vin01t1:879_2: Iminā nayena tiṇṇaṃ phassānantiādīsupi attho veditabbo.
tika-vin01t1:879_5: tathā sotasamphassajā ghānasamphassajā jivhāsamphassajā kāyasamphassajā manosamphassajā vedanāti imāsaṃ channaṃ vedanānaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:879_6: Channaṃ taṇhākāyānanti rūpataṇhā saddataṇhā gandhataṇhā rasataṇhā phoṭṭhabbataṇhā dhammataṇhāti imesaṃ channaṃ taṇhākāyānaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:879_7: Tattha tattha sā sā taṇhāti rūpataṇhādibhedā tattha tattha kāmabhavādīsu uppajjanakataṇhā.
tika-vin01t1:880_0: Sā taṇhādimūlikā kathā atisaṃkhittāti taṃ upādānabhave ca vibhajitvā vitthāretvā dassetuṃ “katha”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:880_3: Sā pana taṇhā yasmā bhusamādānavasena pavattamānā kāmupādānaṃ nāma hoti,
tika-vin01t1:880_7: “Sabbepi tebhūmakā dhammā kāmanīyaṭṭhena kāmā”ti vacanato bhavarāgopi kāmupādānamevāti katvā “kāmupādānapaccayā eva mettaṃ bhāvetī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:880_8: Tattha mettaṃ bhāvetīti mijjati siniyhatīti mettā,
tika-vin01t1:880_10: Atha vā mettā etassa atthīti mettaṃ, cittaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:880_12: taṃ bhāveti vaḍḍheti uppādeti vāti attho.
tika-vin01t1:880_13: Karuṇaṃ bhāvetītiādīsupi imināva nayena attho veditabbo.
tika-vin01t1:881_3: so diṭṭhupādānapaccayā kāyena duccaritaṃ caratītiādi vuttanayena yojetabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:881_4: Aparo “asukasmiṃ sampattibhave attā ucchijjatī”ti ucchedadiṭṭhiṃ gaṇhāti,
tika-vin01t1:881_5: so tatrūpapattiyā kāyena sucaritaṃ caratītiādi vuttanayeneva yojetabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:881_6: Aparo “rūpī manomayo hutvā attā ucchijjatī”ti rūpūpapattiyā maggaṃ bhāveti bhāvanāpāripūriyāti sabbaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:881_7: Aparopi “arūpabhave uppajjitvā attā ucchijjatī”ti arūpūpapattiyā maggaṃ bhāveti bhāvanāpāripūriyāti sabbaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:881_11: vatena suddhī”ti asuddhimaggaṃ “suddhimaggo”ti parāmasanto sīlabbatupādānapaccayā kāyena duccaritaṃ caratītiādi sabbaṃ vuttanayeneva yojetabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:882_0: Idāni yvāyaṃ saṃsāracakkaṃ dassentena “kāmabhave avijjā kāmabhave saṅkhārānaṃ paccayo hotī”tiādinā avijjādīnaṃ
tika-vin01t1:882_4: evaṃ avijjāpi kāmāsavādinā sahetukā evāti āha “ubhopete hetusamuppannā”ti.
tika-vin01t1:882_5: Paccayapariggaheti nāmarūpassa paccayānaṃ avijjādīnaṃ paricchijja gahaṇe.
tika-vin01t1:882_8: Dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇanti tiṭṭhanti ettha phaladhammā tadāyattavuttitāyāti ṭhiti, kāraṇaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:882_14: saṅkhāresu pana adiṭṭhesu avijjāya saṅkhārānaṃ paccayabhāvo na sakkā daṭṭhunti “saṅkhārā hetusamuppannā”ti
tika-vin01t1:882_16: Ubhopete hetusamuppannāti idaṃ pana ubhinnampi paccayuppannabhāvaṃ dassetukāmatāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:882_17: Idañca dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇaṃ yasmā addhattaye kaṅkhāmalavitaraṇavasena pavattati,
tika-vin01t1:882_19: Etena nayena sabbapadāni vitthāretabbānīti etena nayena “avijjā hetū”tiādinā avijjāyaṃ vuttanayena “saṅkhārā hetu,
tika-vin01t1:883_0: Saṃkhippanti ettha avijjādayo viññāṇādayo cāti saṅkhepo,
tika-vin01t1:883_8: āyatiṃ vipākoti evaṃ kālavibhāgena cattāro jātā,
tika-vin01t1:883_11: Taṇhupādānabhavā gahitāva hontīti ettha avijjāgahaṇena kilesabhāvasāmaññato taṇhupādānā gahitā,
tika-vin01t1:883_13: avijjāsaṅkhārānaṃ tehi vinā sakiccākaraṇato ca taṇhupādānabhavā gahitāva honti.
tika-vin01t1:884_5: iti ime pañca dhammā purimakammabhavasmiṃ idha paṭisandhiyā paccayā”ti.
tika-vin01t1:885_2: Moho avijjāti yo tadā dukkhādīsu moho yena mūḷho kammaṃ karoti,
tika-vin01t1:885_4: Āyūhanā saṅkhārāti taṃ kammaṃ karoto yā purimacetanāyo,
tika-vin01t1:885_5: yathā “dānaṃ dassāmī”ti cittaṃ uppādetvā māsampi saṃvaccharampi dānūpakaraṇāni sajjentassa uppannā purimacetanāyo,
tika-vin01t1:885_6: paṭiggāhakānaṃ pana hatthe dakkhiṇaṃ patiṭṭhāpayato cetanā bhavoti vuccati.
tika-vin01t1:885_7: Ekāvajjanesu vā chasu javanesu cetanā āyūhanasaṅkhārā nāma,
tika-vin01t1:885_9: Yā kāci vā pana cetanā bhavo,
tika-vin01t1:885_11: Nikanti taṇhāti yā kammaṃ karontassa tassa phale upapattibhave nikāmanā patthanā,
tika-vin01t1:885_13: Upagamanaṃ upādānanti yaṃ kammabhavassa paccayabhūtaṃ “idaṃ katvā asukasmiṃ nāma ṭhāne kāme sevissāmi
tika-vin01t1:885_14: ucchijjissāmī”tiādinā nayena pavattaṃ upagamanaṃ gahaṇaṃ parāmasanaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:885_16: Cetanā bhavoti “taṃ kammaṃ karoto yā purimā cetanāyo”tiādinā heṭṭhā vuttesu tīsu atthavikappesu yā cetanā bhavoti vuttā,
tika-vin01t1:886_0: Idāni sabbepete avijjādayo dhamme dvīhi vaṭṭehi saṅgahetvā dassetukāmo āha “ime pañca dhammā atīte kammavaṭṭa”nti.
tika-vin01t1:886_1: Ettha ca nippariyāyato saṅkhārā bhavo ca kammaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:886_2: avijjādayo pana kammasahāyatāya kammasarikkhakā tadupakārakā cāti kammanti vuttā.
tika-vin01t1:886_3: Avijjādayo hi vipākadhammadhammatāya kammasarikkhakā sahajātakoṭiyā upanissayakoṭiyā ca kammassa ca upakārakā.
tika-vin01t1:886_4: Kammameva ca aññamaññasambandhaṃ hutvā punappunaṃ parivattanaṭṭhena kammavaṭṭaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:886_5: Viññāṇādayo pañcāti viññāṇādayo vedanāpariyantā pañca etarahi idāni imasmiṃ attabhāveti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t1:886_6: Avijjāsaṅkhārā gahitāva hontīti etthāpi pubbe viya kilesakammabhāvasāmaññato taṇhupādānaggahaṇena avijjā gahitā,
tika-vin01t1:886_8: Atha vā bhave gahite tassa pubbabhāgā taṃsampayuttā vā saṅkhārā gahitāva honti,
tika-vin01t1:886_9: taṇhupādānaggahaṇena ca taṃsampayuttā yāya vā mūḷho kammaṃ karoti,
tika-vin01t1:886_10: sā avijjāva hotīti taṇhupādānabhavaggahaṇena avijjāsaṅkhārā gahitāva honti.
tika-vin01t1:887_5: iti ime pañca dhammā idha kammabhavasmiṃ āyatiṃ paṭisandhiyā paccayā”ti.
tika-vin01t1:888_0: Tattha idha paripakkattā āyatanānanti paripakkāyatanassa kammakaraṇakāle sammoho dassito.
tika-vin01t1:889_0: Viññāṇanāmarūpasaḷāyatanaphassavedanānaṃ jātijarābhaṅgāvatthā jātijarāmaraṇanti vuttāti avatthānaṃ gahaṇena
tika-vin01t1:889_1: avatthāvantā gahitāva honti tadavinābhāvatoti āha “jātijarāmaraṇāpadesena viññāṇādīnaṃ niddiṭṭhattā”ti.
tika-vin01t1:889_4: Āyatiṃ vipākavaṭṭanti paccuppannahetuto bhāvīnaṃ anāgatānaṃ gahitattā.
tika-vin01t1:889_6: Ākāratoti sarūpato avuttāpi tasmiṃ tasmiṃ saṅgahe ākirīyanti avijjāsaṅkhārādiggahaṇehi pakāsīyantīti ākārā,
tika-vin01t1:889_9: Vīsatividhā hontīti atīte hetupañcakādibhedato vīsatividhā honti.
tika-vin01t1:890_0: Saṅkhāraviññāṇānañcettha antarā eko sandhīti hetuto phalassa avicchedappavattibhāvato hetuphalassa sambandhabhūto eko sandhi,
tika-vin01t1:890_2: Vedanātaṇhānamantarā pana phalato hetuno avicchedappavattibhāvato phalahetusambandhabhūto eko sandhi.
tika-vin01t1:890_3: Phalabhūtopi hi dhammo aññassa hetusabhāvassa dhammassa paccayo hotīti.
tika-vin01t1:891_2: Sabbākāratoti idha vuttehi ca avuttehi ca paṭiccasamuppādavibhaṅge anantanayasamantapaṭṭhānādīsu ca āgatehi sabbehi ākārehi.
tika-vin01t1:892_2: Tattha te dhammeti te avijjādike dhamme.
tika-vin01t1:892_9: Tato paraṃ pana abhisambuddhakkhaṇaṃ gahetvā vuttaṃ “hani vihani viddhaṃsesī”ti.
tika-vin01t1:892_10: Evampi arānaṃ hatattā arahanti evaṃ imināpi pakārena yathāvuttasaṃsāracakkassa saṅkhārādiarānaṃ hatattā arahaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:895_1: Cakkavattino acetane cakkaratane uppanne tattheva loko pūjaṃ karoti,
tika-vin01t1:895_3: kimaṅgaṃ pana sammāsambuddhe uppanneti dassento “uppanne tathāgate”tiādimāha.
tika-vin01t1:895_4: “Ekekaṃ dhammakkhandhaṃ ekekavihārena pūjessāmī”ti vuttepi satthāraṃyeva uddissa katattā “bhagavantaṃ uddissā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:895_5: Ko pana vādo aññesaṃ pūjāvisesānanti yathāvuttato aññesaṃ amahesakkhehi devamanussehi kariyamānānaṃ nātiuḷārānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:895_7: Paccayādīnaṃ arahattāpi arahanti yathāvuttacīvarādipaccayānaṃ pūjāvisesassa ca aggadakkhiṇeyyabhāvena anucchavikattāpi arahaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:900_2: Raho pāpaṃ karontīti “mā naṃ koci jaññā”ti rahasi pāpaṃ karonti.
tika-vin01t1:900_3: Evamesa na kadāci karotīti esa bhagavā pāpahetūnaṃ bodhimaṇḍeyeva suppahīnattā kadācipi evaṃ na karoti.
tika-vin01t1:903_0: Idāni sukhaggahaṇatthaṃ yathāvuttamatthaṃ sabbampi saṅgahetvā dassento āha “hoti cetthā”tiādi.
tika-vin01t1:903_1: Kilesārīna so munīti ettha gāthābandhasukhatthaṃ niggahītalopo daṭṭhabbo,
tika-vin01t1:903_3: Paccayādīna cārahoti etthāpi niggahītalopo vuttanayeneva daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin01t1:904_5: tato eva appahīnarāgadosamohā ariyadhammassa akovidā ariyadhamme avinītā ariyadhammassa adassāvino appaṭipannā micchāpaṭipannā ca,
tika-vin01t1:905_2: bhikkhu gahetvā piṭṭhito piṭṭhito anubandho assa pāde pādaṃ nikkhipanto,
tika-vin01t1:905_3: so ca hoti abhijjhālu kāmesu tibbasārāgo byāpannacitto paduṭṭhamanasaṅkappo muṭṭhassati asampajāno asamāhito vibbhantacitto pākatindriyo,
tika-vin01t1:906_0: Yathāvuttapuggalā hi sacepi sāyaṃpātaṃ satthu santikāvacarāva siyuṃ,
tika-vin01t1:908_0: Ārakā tehi bhagavā, dūre tenārahaṃ mato”ti.
tika-vin01t1:909_4: tato eva pahīnarāgadosamohā ariyadhammassa kovidā ariyadhamme suvinītā ariyadhammassa dassāvino sammāpaṭipannā,
tika-vin01t1:910_3: so ca hoti anabhijjhālu kāmesu na tibbasārāgo abyāpannacitto apaduṭṭhamanasaṅkappo upaṭṭhitassati sampajāno samāhito ekaggacitto saṃvutindriyo,
tika-vin01t1:911_0: Tathārūpā hi puggalā satthu yojanasatantarikāpi honti,
tika-vin01t1:913_0: Ārakā tehi āsanne, tenāpi arahaṃ jino”ti.
tika-vin01t1:914_0: Ye ime rāgādayo pāpadhammā yasmiṃ santāne uppajjanti,
tika-vin01t1:914_3: te attahitaṃ parahitañca paripūretuṃ sammā paṭipajjantehi sādhūhi dūrato rahitabbā pariccajitabbā pahātabbāti rahā nāma,
tika-vin01t1:914_4: te ca yasmā bhagavato bodhimūleyeva ariyamaggena sabbaso pahīnā susamucchinnā. Yathāha –
tika-vin01t1:915_2: sabbepi pāpakā akusalā dhammā pahīnā ucchinnamūlā tālāvatthukatā anabhāvaṃkatā āyatiṃ anuppādadhammā”ti.
tika-vin01t1:916_0: Tasmā sabbaso na santi etassa rahāti arahoti vattabbe okārassa sānusāraṃ akārādesaṃ katvā “araha”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:918_0: Tesaṃ suṭṭhu pahīnattā, bhagavā arahaṃ mato”ti.
tika-vin01t1:919_0: Ye te sabbaso pariññātakkhandhā pahīnakilesā bhāvitamaggā sacchikatanirodhā arahanto khīṇāsavā,
tika-vin01t1:919_1: ye ca sekhā appattamānasā anuttaraṃ yogakkhemaṃ patthayamānā viharanti,
