tika-vin01t1:919_2: ye ca parisuddhappayogā kalyāṇajjhāsayā saddhāsīlasutādiguṇasampannā puggalā,
tika-vin01t1:919_5: Tathā hi ariyapuggalā satthārā diṭṭhadhammassa paccakkhakaraṇato satthu dhammasarīrena avirahitāva honti.
tika-vin01t1:924_0: “Saddhā ca pīti ca mano sati ca,
tika-vin01t1:928_0: Teneva ca te aññaṃ satthāraṃ na uddisanti. Yathāha –
tika-vin01t1:929_3: yaṃ diṭṭhisampanno puggalo aññaṃ satthāraṃ uddiseyya,
tika-vin01t1:930_0: Kalyāṇaputhujjanāpi yebhuyyena satthari niccalasaddhā eva honti.
tika-vin01t1:930_1: Iti suppaṭipannehi purisavisesehi avirahitabbato tesañca avirahanato na santi etassa rahā pariccajanakā,
tika-vin01t1:930_2: natthi vā etassa rahā sādhūhi pariccajitabbatāti arahaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:932_0: Na tehi rahito hoti, nātho tenārahaṃ mato”ti.
tika-vin01t1:933_1: bhagavato ca nānāgatīsu paribbhamanasaṅkhātaṃ saṃsāre gamanaṃ natthi kammakkhayakarena ariyamaggena bodhimūleyeva
tika-vin01t1:936_0: Te mayhaṃ āsavā khīṇā, viddhastā vinaḷīkatā”ti. ;
tika-vin01t1:937_0: Evaṃ natthi etassa raho gamanaṃ gatīsu paccājātītipi arahaṃ. Tenedaṃ vuccati –
tika-vin01t1:938_0: “Raho vā gamanaṃ yassa, saṃsāre natthi sabbaso;
tika-vin01t1:940_2: Pāsaṃsabhāvo ca bhagavato anaññasādhāraṇato yathābhuccaguṇādhigato sadevake loke suppatiṭṭhito.
tika-vin01t1:940_3: Tathā hesa anuttarena sīlena anuttarena samādhinā anuttarāya paññāya anuttarāya vimuttiyā asamo asamasamo
tika-vin01t1:940_4: appaṭimo appaṭibhāgo appaṭipuggaloti evaṃ tasmiṃ tasmiṃ guṇe vibhajitvā vuccamāne paṇḍitapurisehi devehi
tika-vin01t1:940_5: brahmehi bhagavatā vā pana pariyosāpetuṃ asakkuṇeyyarūpo.
tika-vin01t1:946_0: Bhavesu ca rahābhāvā, pāsaṃsā arahaṃ jinoti.
tika-vin01t1:947_0: Ettāvatā ca “araha”nti padassa sabbaso attho vibhatto hoti.
tika-vin01t1:948_0: Idāni sammāsambuddhoti imassa atthaṃ vibhajitvā dassento āha “sammā sāmañcā”tiādi.
tika-vin01t1:948_5: saddo sayanti etassa atthassa bodhakoti daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin01t1:948_7: Kathaṃ panettha sabbadhammānanti ayaṃ viseso labbhatīti?
tika-vin01t1:948_9: Padesaggahaṇe hi asati gahetabbassa nippadesatāva viññāyati yathā “dikkhito na dadātī”ti.
tika-vin01t1:948_10: Evañca katvā atthavisesanapekkhā kattari eva buddhasaddasiddhi veditabbā kammavacanicchāya abhāvato.
tika-vin01t1:948_11: “Sammā sāmañca buddhattā sammāsambuddho”ti ettakameva hi idha saddato labbhati,
tika-vin01t1:948_12: “sabbadhammāna”nti idaṃ pana atthato labbhamānaṃ gahetvā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:949_0: Idāni tassā visayaṃ “sabbadhamme”ti sāmaññato vuttaṃ vibhajitvā dassetuṃ “abhiññeyye dhamme”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:949_1: Tattha abhiññeyyeti aniccādito lakkhaṇarasādito ca abhivisiṭṭhena ñāṇena jānitabbe catusaccadhamme.
tika-vin01t1:949_3: pubbabhāge vipassanāpaññādīhi adhigamakkhaṇe maggapaññāya aparabhāge sabbaññutaññāṇādīhi aññāsīti attho.
tika-vin01t1:949_5: Pariññeyye dhammeti aniccādivasena parijānitabbaṃ dukkhaṃ ariyasaccamāha.
tika-vin01t1:949_8: Bahuvacananiddeso panettha sopādisesādikaṃ pariyāyasiddhaṃ bhedamapekkhitvā kato,
tika-vin01t1:949_11: Uddeso ca avinicchitatthaparicchedassa dhammassa vasena karīyati.
tika-vin01t1:949_13: na paricchedoti aparicchedena bahuvacanena vuttaṃ yathā “appaccayā dhammā,
tika-vin01t1:949_17: Evañca bhāvetabbeti ettha jhānānampi gahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:949_18: Teneva cāhāti selabrāhmaṇassa attano buddhabhāvaṃ sādhento evamāha.
tika-vin01t1:950_0: Kiṃ pana bhagavā sayameva attano sammāsambuddhabhāvaṃ sādhetīti?
tika-vin01t1:950_4: idameva ca “abhiññeyya”ntiādi suttapadaṃ etassa atthassa sādhakaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:950_9: Atha vā abhiññeyyanti imināva pārisesañāyena pariññeyyadhamme sacchikātabbadhamme ca dasseti.
tika-vin01t1:950_10: Tasmā buddhosmīti yasmā cattāri saccāni mayā buddhāni,
tika-vin01t1:951_3: Hetuvacanena pana phalasiddhito tesaṃ phalāni nirodhasaccadukkhasaccānipi vuttāneva honti.
tika-vin01t1:951_5: pariññātabbaṃ pariññātanti idampettha saṅgahitamevāti catusaccabhāvanaṃ catusaccabhāvanāphalañca vimuttiṃ
tika-vin01t1:951_6: dassento ‘bujjhitabbaṃ bujjhitvā buddho jātosmī’ti yuttahetunā buddhabhāvaṃ sādhetī”ti.
tika-vin01t1:952_3: sabbepi pana sabhāvadhammā abhiññeyyāti vijjāya abhiññeyyabhāvo vutto.
tika-vin01t1:952_4: Imināva nayena sabbesampi abhiññeyyabhāvo vutto evāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:952_5: Phalena vinā hetubhāvasseva abhāvato hetuvacanena phalasiddhi vuttāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:953_0: Evaṃ saccavasena sāmaññato vuttamatthaṃ dvārārammaṇehi saddhiṃ dvārappavattadhammehi ceva khandhādīhi
tika-vin01t1:953_2: Mūlakāraṇabhāvenāti santesupi avijjādīsu aññesu kāraṇesu tesampi mūlabhūtakāraṇabhāvena.
tika-vin01t1:953_3: Taṇhā hi kammassa vicittabhāvahetuto sahāyabhāvūpagamanato ca dukkhavicittatāya padhānakāraṇaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:953_10: Taṇhāyapi pariññeyyabhāvasabbhāvato upādānakkhandhogadhattā saṅkhāradukkhabhāvato ca dukkhasaccasaṅgahaṃ
tika-vin01t1:953_12: tasmā vattamānabhave taṇhā khandhapariyāpannattā saṅkhāradukkhabhāvato ca dukkhasaccaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:953_14: tassa attabhāvassa mūlakāraṇabhāvena samuṭṭhāpikā purimabhavasiddhā taṇhā samudayasaccanti gahetabbā.
tika-vin01t1:954_2: Nava bhavāti kāmabhavo rūpabhavo arūpabhavo saññībhavo asaññībhavo nevasaññīnāsaññībhavo ekavokārabhavo catuvokārabhavo pañcavokārabhavoti nava bhavā.
tika-vin01t1:954_7: Kāme pahāya rūparāgasaṅkhātena rūpena yutto bhavo,
tika-vin01t1:954_10: Kāmañca rūpañca pahāya arūparāgasaṅkhātena arūpena yutto bhavo,
tika-vin01t1:954_14: saññā vā ettha bhave atthīti saññībhavo,
tika-vin01t1:954_15: so kāmabhavo ca asaññībhavamutto rūpabhavo ca nevasaññīnāsaññībhavamutto arūpabhavo ca hoti.
tika-vin01t1:954_21: Atha vā oḷārikāya saññāya abhāvā sukhumāya ca bhāvā nevasaññā nāsaññā asmiṃ bhaveti nevasaññānāsaññābhavo,
tika-vin01t1:954_24: ekena vā vokāro assa bhavassāti ekavokārabhavo,
tika-vin01t1:954_27: catūhi vā vokāro assa bhavassāti catuvokārabhavo,
tika-vin01t1:954_30: pañcahi vā vokāro assa bhavassāti pañcavokārabhavo,
tika-vin01t1:954_31: so kāmabhavo ca rūpabhavekadeso ca hoti.
tika-vin01t1:954_33: tasmā eko vokāro assa bhavassāti ekavokārabhavoti evamādināpettha attho veditabbo.
tika-vin01t1:954_36: Ettha ca kusaladhammānaṃ upanissayabhūtā taṇhāsamuṭṭhāpikā purimataṇhāti veditabbā.
tika-vin01t1:954_37: Kiriyadhammānaṃ pana yattha te kiriyadhammā uppajjanti,
tika-vin01t1:955_1: Tenāti yasmā sāmaññato visesato ca ekekapaduddhārena sabbadhamme buddho,
tika-vin01t1:955_3: Kiṃ vuttanti āha “sammā sāmañca sabbadhammānaṃ buddhattā”ti,
tika-vin01t1:955_4: sabbassapi ñeyyassa sabbākārato aviparītaṃ sayameva abhisambuddhattāti attho.
tika-vin01t1:955_5: Imināssa paropadesarahitassa sabbākārena sabbadhammāvabodhanasamatthassa ākaṅkhappaṭibaddhavuttino anāvaraṇañāṇasaṅkhātassa
tika-vin01t1:956_2: Na virujjhati visayappavattibhedavasena aññehi asādhāraṇabhāvadassanatthaṃ ekasseva ñāṇassa dvidhā vuttattā.
tika-vin01t1:956_4: tattha ca āvaraṇābhāvato nissaṅgacāramupādāya anāvaraṇañāṇanti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:956_5: Yathāha paṭisambhidāyaṃ “sabbaṃ saṅkhatamasaṅkhataṃ anavasesaṃ jānātīti sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:956_9: Aññathā sabbaññutānāvaraṇañāṇānaṃ sādhāraṇatā asabbadhammārammaṇatā ca āpajjeyya.
tika-vin01t1:956_10: Na hi bhagavato ñāṇassa aṇumattampi āvaraṇaṃ atthi,
tika-vin01t1:956_11: anāvaraṇañāṇassa asabbadhammārammaṇabhāve yattha taṃ na pavattati,
tika-vin01t1:956_13: Atha vā pana hotu aññameva anāvaraṇañāṇaṃ sabbaññutaññāṇato,
tika-vin01t1:956_14: idha pana sabbattha appaṭihatavuttitāya anāvaraṇañāṇanti sabbaññutaññāṇameva adhippetaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:956_15: tassa cādhigamanena bhagavā sabbaññū sabbavidū sammāsambuddhoti ca vuccati na sakiṃyeva sabbadhammāvabodhanato.
tika-vin01t1:956_16: Tathā ca vuttaṃ paṭisambhidāyaṃ “vimokkhantikametaṃ buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ bodhiyā mūle saha sabbaññutaññāṇassa
tika-vin01t1:956_18: Sabbadhammāvabodhanasamatthañāṇasamadhigamena hi bhagavato santāne anavasesadhamme paṭivijjhituṃ samatthatā ahosīti.
tika-vin01t1:957_1: kiṃ panidaṃ ñāṇaṃ pavattamānaṃ sakiṃyeva sabbasmiṃ visaye pavattati,
tika-vin01t1:957_4: yadi tāva sakiṃyeva sabbasmiṃ visaye pavattati,
tika-vin01t1:957_6: ekajjhaṃ upaṭṭhāne dūrato cittapaṭaṃ pekkhantassa viya paṭivibhāgenāvabodho na siyā,
tika-vin01t1:957_7: tathā sati “sabbe dhammā anattā”ti vipassantānaṃ anattākārena viya sabbadhammā anirūpitarūpena bhagavato ñāṇassa visayā hontīti āpajjati.
tika-vin01t1:957_8: Yepi “sabbañeyyadhammānaṃ ṭhitalakkhaṇavisayaṃ vikapparahitaṃ sabbakālaṃ buddhānaṃ ñāṇaṃ pavattati,
tika-vin01t1:957_11: tiṭṭhantopi samāhito’ti idampi vacanaṃ suvuttaṃ hotī”ti vadanti,
tika-vin01t1:957_13: ṭhitalakkhaṇārammaṇatāya ca atītānāgatasammutidhammānaṃ tadabhāvato ekadesavisayameva bhagavato ñāṇaṃ siyā,
tika-vin01t1:957_14: tasmā sakiṃyeva ñāṇaṃ pavattatīti na yujjati.
tika-vin01t1:958_0: Atha kamena sabbasmiṃ visaye ñāṇaṃ pavattatīti.
tika-vin01t1:958_2: Na hi jātibhūmisabhāvādivasena disādesakālādivasena ca anekabhedabhinne ñeyye kamena gayhamāne tassa
tika-vin01t1:958_4: Ye pana “atthassa avisaṃvādanato ñeyyassa ekadesaṃ paccakkhaṃ katvā sesepi evanti adhimuccitvā vavatthāpanena sabbaññū bhagavā,
tika-vin01t1:958_8: Sabbassa hi appaccakkhabhāve atthāvisaṃvādanena ñeyyassa ekadesaṃ paccakkhaṃ katvā sesepi evanti adhimuccitvā vavatthāpanassa asambhavato.
tika-vin01t1:959_0: Atha tampi paccakkhaṃ tassa sesabhāvo eva na siyāti?
tika-vin01t1:959_10: yaṃ kiñci bhagavatā ñātuṃ icchitaṃ sakalaṃ ekadeso vā,
tika-vin01t1:959_11: tattha tattha appaṭihatavuttitāya paccakkhato ñāṇaṃ pavattati niccasamādhānañca vikkhepābhāvato.
tika-vin01t1:959_12: Ñātuṃ icchitassa ca sakalassa avisayabhāve tassa ākaṅkhappaṭibaddhavuttitā na siyā,
tika-vin01t1:959_13: ekantenevassā icchitabbā “sabbe dhammā buddhassa bhagavato āvajjanappaṭibaddhā ākaṅkhappaṭibaddhā manasikārappaṭibaddhā
tika-vin01t1:960_0: Nanu ca etasmimpi pakkhe yadā sakalaṃ ñātuṃ icchitaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:960_1: tadā sakiṃyeva sakalavisayatāya anirūpitarūpena bhagavato ñāṇaṃ pavatteyyāti vuttadosā nātivattiyevāti? Na,
tika-vin01t1:960_4: Aññathā pacurajanañāṇasamānavuttitāya buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ ñāṇassa acinteyyatā na siyā,
tika-vin01t1:960_5: tasmā sakaladhammārammaṇampi taṃ ekadhammārammaṇaṃ viya suvavatthāpiteyeva te dhamme katvā pavattatīti idamettha acinteyyaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:960_11: ñāṇapariyantikaṃ ñeyya”nti evamekajjhaṃ visuṃ sakiṃ kamena vā icchānurūpaṃ sammā sāmaṃ sabbadhammānaṃ buddhattā sammāsambuddho.
tika-vin01t1:961_4: Tato eva attano visayassa viditakaraṇaṭṭhenapi vijjā.
tika-vin01t1:961_8: Manomayiddhiyāti ettha “idha bhikkhu imamhā kāyā aññaṃ kāyaṃ abhinimmināti rūpiṃ manomayaṃ sabbaṅgapaccaṅgaṃ
tika-vin01t1:961_9: ahīnindriya”nti iminā nayena āgatā iddhi sarīrabbhantare aññasseva jhānamanena nibbattattā manomayassa
tika-vin01t1:961_11: Cha abhiññāti āsavakkhayañāṇena saddhiṃ iddhividhādikā pañcābhiññāyo.
tika-vin01t1:961_12: Tissannaṃ aṭṭhannañca vijjānaṃ tattha tattha sutte gahaṇaṃ veneyyajjhāsayavasenāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:961_13: Satta saddhammā nāma saddhā hirī ottappaṃ bāhusaccaṃ vīriyaṃ sati paññā ca.
tika-vin01t1:961_14: Ye sandhāya vuttaṃ “idha bhikkhu saddho hoti, hirimā, ottappī,
tika-vin01t1:961_19: Cattāri jhānānīti yāni kānici cattāri rūpāvacarajjhānāni.
tika-vin01t1:962_0: Kasmā panettha sīlādayoyeva pannarasa “caraṇa”nti vuttāti codanaṃ sandhāyāha “imeyeva hī”tiādi.
tika-vin01t1:962_1: Tena tesaṃ sikkhattayasaṅgahato nibbānupagamane ekaṃsato sādhanabhāvamāha.
tika-vin01t1:962_8: Āsavakkhayavijjāya sabbaññubhāvasiddhito āha “vijjāsampadā bhagavato sabbaññutaṃ pūretvā ṭhitā”ti.
tika-vin01t1:962_9: Catūsu jhānesu antogadhabhāvena caraṇadhammapariyāpannattā karuṇābrahmavihārassa yathārahaṃ tassa ca
tika-vin01t1:962_10: mahākaruṇāsamāpattivasena asādhāraṇasabhāvassa bhagavati upalabbhanato āha “caraṇasampadā mahākāruṇikataṃ
tika-vin01t1:962_12: Yathā sattānaṃ anatthaṃ parivajjetvā atthe niyojanaṃ paññāya vinā na hoti,
tika-vin01t1:962_13: evaṃ nesaṃ atthānatthajānanaṃ satthu karuṇāya vinā na hotīti ubhayampi ubhayattha sakiccakameva siyā.
tika-vin01t1:962_16: Yathā taṃ vijjācaraṇasampannoti ettha tanti nipātamattaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:962_20: Sā panāyaṃ satthu vijjācaraṇasampadā sāsanassa niyyānikatāya sāvakānaṃ sammāpaṭipattiyā ekantakāraṇanti dassetuṃ “tenassā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:963_0: Ettha ca vijjāsampadāya satthu paññāmahattaṃ pakāsitaṃ hoti,
tika-vin01t1:963_22: tena attahitāya paṭipannādīsu catūsu puggalesu catutthapuggalabhāvo siddho hoti.
tika-vin01t1:963_28: paññānugatattā na ca na sabbattha virattacitto,
tika-vin01t1:963_30: karuṇānugatattā na ca na sabbasattānuggahāya pavatto.
tika-vin01t1:963_32: evaṃ paññā ahaṃkāramamaṃkāravinimuttāti aññamaññavisodhitā paramavisuddhā guṇavisesā vijjācaraṇasampadāhi pakāsitāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:964_0: Idāni sugatoti imassa atthaṃ dassento āha “sobhanagamanattā”tiādi.
tika-vin01t1:964_1: “Gate ṭhite”tiādīsu gamanampi gatanti vuccatīti āha “gamanampi hi gatanti vuccatī”ti.
tika-vin01t1:964_5: Gamanañca nāma bahuvidhanti idhādhippetaṃ gamanaṃ dassento “ariyamaggo”ti āha.
tika-vin01t1:964_6: So hi nibbānassa gati adhigamoti ca katvā gataṃ gamananti ca vuccati.
tika-vin01t1:964_7: Idāni tasseva gamane kāraṇaṃ dassetuṃ “tena hesā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:964_9: Asajjamānoti paripanthābhāvena sugatigamanepi asajjanto saṅgaṃ akaronto,
tika-vin01t1:964_11: Atha vā ekāsane nisīditvā khippābhiññāvaseneva catunnampi maggānaṃ paṭiladdhabhāvato asajjamāno abajjhanto gato.
tika-vin01t1:964_15: tena ca bhagavā gatoti āha “iti sobhanagamanattā sugato”ti sobhanattho susaddoti katvā.
tika-vin01t1:965_0: Asundarānaṃ dukkhānaṃ saṅkhārappavattīnaṃ abhāvato accantasukhattā ekantato sundaraṃ nāma asaṅkhatā dhātūti
tika-vin01t1:965_4: Suṭṭhu gamanañca nāma paṭipakkhena anabhibhūtassa gamananti āha “pahīne kilese puna apaccāgacchanto”ti,
tika-vin01t1:965_7: Etanti tena tena maggena pahīnakilesānaṃ puna apaccāgamanaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:965_10: sāpi sammāgamanamevāti evampi bhagavā sugatoti dassetuṃ “sammā vā āgato”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:965_12: Sabbalokassa hitasukhameva karontāti etena mahābodhiyā paṭipadā avibhāgena sabbasattānaṃ sabbadā hitasukhāvahabhāveneva pavattatīti dasseti.
tika-vin01t1:965_13: Sassataṃ ucchedanti ime ante anupagacchanto gatoti etena paṭiccasamuppādagatiṃ dasseti.
tika-vin01t1:965_14: Kāmasukhaṃ attakilamathanti ime anupagacchanto gatoti etena ariyamaggagatiṃ dasseti.
tika-vin01t1:966_3: Atthamukhena hi vācāya abhūtatā bhūtatā vā.
tika-vin01t1:966_5: Anatthasaṃhitanti diṭṭhadhammikena samparāyikena vā anatthena saṃhitaṃ anatthasaṃhitaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:966_16: Tatiyā nerayikādikassa nerayikādibhāvavibhāvanīkathā yathā “āpāyiko devadatto nerayiko”tiādikā.
tika-vin01t1:966_17: Catutthī “vedavihitena yaññavidhinā pāṇātipātādikataṃ sugatiṃ āvahatī”ti lokassa byāmohanakathā.
tika-vin01t1:966_20: Evaṃ sammā gadattāti yathāvuttaṃ abhūtādiṃ vajjetvā bhūtaṃ tacchaṃ atthasaṃhitaṃ piyaṃ manāpaṃ tato eva sammā suṭṭhu gadanato sugato.
tika-vin01t1:966_21: Āpāthagamanamattena kassaci appiyampi hi bhagavato vacanaṃ piyaṃ manāpameva atthasiddhiyā lokassa hitasukhāvahattā.
tika-vin01t1:967_2: Bhagavato hi veneyyajanupasaṅkamanaṃ ekantena tesaṃ hitasukhanipphādanato sobhanaṃ bhaddakaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:967_5: yāva mahābodhi anavajjatāya sattānaṃ hitasukhāvahatāya ca sobhanameva.
tika-vin01t1:967_6: Atha vā sayambhūñāṇena sakalampi lokaṃ pariññābhisamayavasena parijānanto sammā gato avagatoti sugato.
tika-vin01t1:967_7: Tathā lokasamudayaṃ pahānābhisamayavasena pajahanto anuppattidhammataṃ āpādento sammā gato atītoti sugato.
tika-vin01t1:967_8: Lokanirodhaṃ nibbānaṃ sacchikiriyābhisamayavasena sammā gato adhigatoti sugato.
tika-vin01t1:967_9: Lokanirodhagāminiṃ paṭipadaṃ bhāvanābhisamayavasena sammā gato paṭipannoti sugato.
tika-vin01t1:967_10: Tathā yaṃ imassa sadevakassa lokassa diṭṭhaṃ sutaṃ mutaṃ viññātaṃ pattaṃ pariyesitaṃ ñātaṃ anuvicaritaṃ manasā,
tika-vin01t1:967_11: sabbaṃ taṃ hatthatale āmalakaṃ viya sammā paccakkhato gato abbhaññāsīti sugato.
tika-vin01t1:968_0: Idāni lokavidūti imassa atthaṃ pakāsento āha “sabbathā viditalokattā”tiādi.
tika-vin01t1:968_2: yo yo loko yena yena pakārena veditabbo,
tika-vin01t1:968_12: Nirodhūpāyatoti yena vidhinā so nirodho pattabbo,
tika-vin01t1:968_13: tato ariyamaggato ito aññassa pakārassa abhāvā.
tika-vin01t1:968_14: Iti “sabbathā lokaṃ avedī”ti vatvā tadatthasādhakaṃ suttaṃ dassento “yattha kho,
tika-vin01t1:968_20: gamanena lokassa anto ñātuṃ vā daṭṭhuṃ vā pāpuṇituṃ vā”ti okāsalokassa gatiṃ sandhāya rohitadevaputtena puṭṭho bhagavā abhāsi.
tika-vin01t1:968_21: Tattha na jāyatītiādinā ujukaṃ jātiādīni paṭikkhipitvā na cavati na upapajjatīti padadvayena aparāparaṃ cavanupapatanāni paṭikkhipati.
tika-vin01t1:968_31: tattha gamanena lokassantaṃ ñātā ayaṃ diṭṭhā ayaṃ pattā ayanti na vadāmīti attho.
tika-vin01t1:969_0: Kāmaṃ padasā gamanena gantvā lokassantaṃ ñātuṃ daṭṭhuṃ pattuṃ vā na sakkā,
tika-vin01t1:969_1: api ca parimitaparicchinnaṭṭhāne taṃ paññāpetvā dassemīti dassento “api cā”tiādimāha.
tika-vin01t1:969_5: Iminā saññāsīsena vedanādayo tayo khandhe dasseti saññāsahitattā eva.
tika-vin01t1:969_8: aviññāṇake pana utusamuṭṭhānarūpasamudāyamatte paññāpetuṃ na sakkāti adhippāyo.
tika-vin01t1:969_10: Lokanirodhanti tassa lokassa nirujjhanaṃ nibbānameva vā.
tika-vin01t1:969_11: Nibbānampi hi khandhe paṭicca paññāpanato sarīrasmiṃyeva paññāpeti.
tika-vin01t1:969_13: tesaṃ vasena desatopi upacāravasena niddisīyati yathā “cakkhuṃ loke piyarūpaṃ sātarūpaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:970_1: Lokassantoti saṅkhāralokassa anto antakiriyāya hetubhūtaṃ nibbānaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:970_5: Tasmāti yasmā lokantaṃ appatvā vaṭṭadukkhato mutti natthi, tasmā.
tika-vin01t1:970_9: Lokantagūti pariññābhisamayena lokaṃ viditvā pahānābhisamayena lokantagū.
tika-vin01t1:970_11: Sabbesaṃ kilesānaṃ samitattā catusaccadhammānaṃ vā abhisamitattā samitāvī.
tika-vin01t1:971_0: Evaṃ yadipi lokavidutā anavasesato dassitā sabhāvādito dassitattā,
tika-vin01t1:971_1: loko pana ekadeseneva vuttoti taṃ anavasesato dassetuṃ “api ca tayo lokā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:971_2: Tattha indriyabaddhānaṃ khandhānaṃ samūho santāno ca sattaloko.
tika-vin01t1:971_4: lokīyati ettha kusalākusalaṃ tabbipāko cāti loko.
tika-vin01t1:971_5: Anindriyabaddhānaṃ rūpādīnaṃ samūho santāno ca okāsaloko lokīyanti ettha jaṅgamā thāvarā ca tesañca okāsabhūtoti katvā.
tika-vin01t1:971_7: Ubhayepi khandhā saṅkhāraloko paccayehi saṅkharīyanti lujjanti palujjanti cāti.
tika-vin01t1:971_10: Paccayattho hettha āhārasaddo “ayamāhāro anuppannassa vā kāmacchandassa uppādāyā”tiādīsu viya.
tika-vin01t1:971_11: Evañhi “sabbe sattā”ti iminā asaññasattāpi pariggahitā honti.
tika-vin01t1:971_13: na sattadhammoti āha “āhāraṭṭhitikāti āgataṭṭhāne saṅkhāraloko veditabbo”ti.
tika-vin01t1:972_2: Kasmā pana bhagavā katthaci puggalādhiṭṭhānaṃ katvā dhammaṃ deseti,
tika-vin01t1:972_6: te yathāruci katthaci puggalādhiṭṭhānaṃ katvā katthaci dhammādhiṭṭhānaṃ katvā dhammaṃ desenti.
tika-vin01t1:972_7: Ye vā pana veneyyā sāsanakkamaṃ anotiṇṇā,
tika-vin01t1:972_22: Iti bhagavā taṃ taṃ visesaṃ apekkhitvā tattha tattha duvidhaṃ desanaṃ desetīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:973_0: Diṭṭhigatikānaṃ sassatādivasena “attā loko”ti parikappanā yebhuyyena sattavisayā,
tika-vin01t1:973_1: na saṅkhāravisayāti āha “sassato lokoti vā asassato lokoti vāti āgataṭṭhāne sattaloko veditabbo”ti.
tika-vin01t1:973_2: Yāvatā candimasūriyā pariharantīti yattake ṭhāne candimasūriyā parivattanti paribbhamanti.
tika-vin01t1:973_3: Disā bhanti virocamānāti tesaṃ paribbhamaneneva tā tā disā pabhassarā hutvā virocanti.
tika-vin01t1:973_5: tasmā sayaṃ virocamānā candimasūriyā yattakā disā bhanti sobhenti obhāsayantīti attho.
tika-vin01t1:973_6: Tāva sahassadhā lokoti tattakena pamāṇena sahassappakāro okāsaloko,
tika-vin01t1:973_9: tāva tattakaṃ sahassaṃ assa atthīti tāvasahassavā.
tika-vin01t1:974_3: Tathā hissāti imassa “sabbathā vidito”ti etena sambandho.
tika-vin01t1:974_5: Eko loko sabbe sattā āhāraṭṭhitikāti yāya puggalādhiṭṭhānāya kathāya sabbesaṃ saṅkhārānaṃ paccayāyattavuttitā vuttā,
tika-vin01t1:974_6: tāya sabbo saṅkhāraloko ekavidho pakārantarassa abhāvato.
tika-vin01t1:974_7: Dve lokātiādīsupi imināva nayena attho veditabbo.
tika-vin01t1:974_8: Nāmaggahaṇena cettha nibbānassa aggahaṇaṃ tassa alokasabhāvattā.
tika-vin01t1:974_9: Nanu ca “āhāraṭṭhitikā”ti ettha paccayāyattavuttitāya maggaphaladhammānampi lokatā āpajjatīti?
tika-vin01t1:974_10: Nāpajjati pariññeyyānaṃ dukkhasaccadhammānaṃ idha lokoti adhippetattā.
tika-vin01t1:974_11: Atha vā na lujjati na palujjatīti yo gahito tathā na hoti,
tika-vin01t1:974_12: so lokoti taṃgahaṇarahitānaṃ lokuttarānaṃ natthi lokatā.
tika-vin01t1:975_1: Cattāro āhārāti kabaḷīkārāhāro phassāhāro manosañcetanāhāro viññāṇāhāroti cattāro āhārā.
tika-vin01t1:975_2: Tattha kabaḷīkārāhāro ojaṭṭhamakaṃ rūpaṃ āharatīti āhāro.
tika-vin01t1:975_4: Manosañcetanā tīsu bhavesu paṭisandhiṃ āharatīti āhāro.
tika-vin01t1:975_12: heṭṭhimā ca tayo āruppāti imā satta “viññāṇaṃ tiṭṭhati etthāti viññāṇaṭṭhitiyo”ti vuccanti.
tika-vin01t1:976_0: Sabbe manussā chakāmāvacarā ca devā ekacce ca vinipātikā “nānattakāyā nānattasaññino”ti vuccanti.
tika-vin01t1:976_1: Aparimāṇesu hi cakkavāḷesu aparimāṇānaṃ manussānaṃ vaṇṇasaṇṭhānādivasena dvepi ekasadisā natthi.
tika-vin01t1:976_2: Yepi katthaci yamakabhātaro vaṇṇena vā saṇṭhānena vā ekasadisā honti,
tika-vin01t1:976_4: paṭisandhisaññā ca nesaṃ tihetukāpi duhetukāpi ahetukāpi hoti,
tika-vin01t1:976_6: Chakāmāvacaradevesu ca kesañci kāyo nīlo hoti,
tika-vin01t1:976_8: paṭisandhisaññā ca nesaṃ duhetukāpi tihetukāpi hoti,
tika-vin01t1:976_10: Ekacce vinipātikā pana catuapāyavinimuttakā uttaramātā yakkhinī,
tika-vin01t1:976_13: Etesañhi odātakaāḷamaṅguracchavisāmavaṇṇādivasena ceva kisathūlarassadīghādivasena ca kāyo nānā hoti,
tika-vin01t1:976_15: te pana devā viya na mahesakkhā,
tika-vin01t1:976_16: kapaṇamanussā viya appesakkhā dullabhaghāsacchādanā dukkhapīḷitā viharanti,
tika-vin01t1:976_17: ekacce kāḷapakkhe dukkhitā juṇhapakkhe sukhitā honti,
tika-vin01t1:976_18: tasmā sukhasamussayato vinipatitattā sukhasamussayato vinipāto etesaṃ atthīti vinipātikāti vuttā satipi devabhāve dibbasampattiyā abhāvato.
tika-vin01t1:976_21: Piyaṅkaramātā hi yakkhinī paccūsasamaye anuruddhattherassa dhammaṃ sajjhāyato sutvā –
tika-vin01t1:977_0: “Mā saddaṃ kari piyaṅkara, bhikkhu dhammapadāni bhāsati;
tika-vin01t1:978_0: Apica dhammapadaṃ vijāniya, paṭipajjema hitāya no siyā.
tika-vin01t1:981_0: Evaṃ puttakaṃ saññāpetvā taṃ divasaṃ sotāpattiphalaṃ pattā.
tika-vin01t1:981_1: Uttaramātā pana bhagavato dhammaṃ sutvāva sotāpannā jātā.
tika-vin01t1:981_2: Evamimepi kāyassa ceva paṭisandhisaññāya ca nānattā “nānattakāyā nānattasaññino”tveva saṅkhyaṃ gacchanti.
tika-vin01t1:982_1: nibbattā brahmakāyikā ceva catūsu apāyesu sattā ca “nānattakāyā ekattasaññino”ti vuccanti.
tika-vin01t1:982_2: Etesu hi brahmakāyikesu brahmapurohitānaṃ kāyo brahmapārisajjehi pamāṇato vipulataro hoti,
tika-vin01t1:982_3: mahābrahmānaṃ kāyo pana brahmapurohitehipi pamāṇato vipulataro hoti.
tika-vin01t1:982_4: Kāmañca nesaṃ pabhāvasenapi kāyo heṭṭhimaheṭṭhimehi uḷārataro hoti,
tika-vin01t1:982_6: Tathā hi parittābhādīnaṃ parittasubhādīnañca kāye satipi pabhāvematte ekattavaseneva vavatthapīyatīti “ekattakāyā”tveva te vuccanti.
tika-vin01t1:982_7: Evamime brahmakāyikā kāyassa nānattā paṭhamajjhānavipākavasena pana paṭisandhisaññāya ca ekattā nānattakāyā ekattasaññino.
tika-vin01t1:982_21: Api cettha dīghapiṭṭhikapetā nāma saṭṭhiyojanikāpi honti,
tika-vin01t1:983_0: Dutiyajjhānabhūmikā pana parittābhā appamāṇābhā ābhassarā “ekattakāyā nānattasaññino”ti vuccanti.
tika-vin01t1:984_0: Parittasubhā appamāṇasubhā subhakiṇhā pana tatiyajjhānabhūmikā ekattakāyā ekattasaññino.
tika-vin01t1:984_1: Tesaṃ vuttanayena kāyassa ceva catutthajjhānavipākavasena paṭisandhisaññāya ca ekattā.
tika-vin01t1:984_2: “Vehapphalāpi imaṃyeva catutthaviññāṇaṭṭhitiṃ bhajanti kāyassa ceva pañcamajjhānavipākavasena paṭisandhisaññāya ca ekarūpattā.
tika-vin01t1:984_10: Mahāsīvatthero pana “na kho pana so sāriputta āvāso sulabharūpo,
tika-vin01t1:984_11: yo mayā anāvuṭṭhapubbo iminā dīghena addhunā aññatra suddhāvāsehi devehī”ti iminā suttena “suddhāvāsāpi
tika-vin01t1:984_14: Tasmā asaññasattaṃ apanetvā parittasubhādīsu akaniṭṭhapariyosānāsu navasu bhūmīsu sattā “ekattakāyā ekattasaññino”ti gahetabbā.
tika-vin01t1:985_0: Asaññasattā pana viññāṇābhāvā ettha saṅgahaṃ na gacchanti.
tika-vin01t1:985_1: Tathā hi anuppanne buddhe titthāyatane pabbajitā vāyokasiṇe parikammaṃ katvā catutthajjhānaṃ nibbattetvā tato vuṭṭhāya “dhī cittaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:985_5: citte asati nattheta”nti khantiṃ ruciṃ uppādetvā aparihīnajjhānā kālaṃ katvā rūpapaṭisandhivasena asaññabhave nibbattanti.
tika-vin01t1:985_6: Yo yassa iriyāpatho manussaloke paṇihito ahosi,
tika-vin01t1:985_7: so tena iriyāpathena nibbattitvā pañca kappasatāni ṭhito vā nisinno vā nipanno vā hoti.
tika-vin01t1:985_8: Evaṃ cittavirāgabhāvanāvasena tesaṃ tattha viññāṇuppatti na hotīti viññāṇābhāvato viññāṇaṭṭhitiṃ te na bhajanti.
tika-vin01t1:985_10: evaṃ viññāṇassapi sukhumattā viññāṇaṭṭhitīsu saṅgahaṃ na gacchati.
tika-vin01t1:985_11: Tañhi saññāya viya viññāṇassapi saṅkhārāvasesasukhumabhāvappattattā paribyattaviññāṇakiccābhāvato neva viññāṇaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:985_12: na ca sabbaso aviññāṇaṃ hotīti nevaviññāṇā nāviññāṇaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:985_13: tasmā paripphuṭaviññāṇakiccavantīsu viññāṇaṭṭhitīsu saṅgahaṃ na gacchati.
tika-vin01t1:985_14: Tasmā vinipātikehi saddhiṃ chakāmāvacaradevā manussā ca nānattakāyā nānattasaññino,
tika-vin01t1:985_17: tatiyajjhānabhūmikā asaññasattaṃ vajjetvā sesā catutthajjhānabhūmikā ca ekattakāyā ekattasaññinoti imā
tika-vin01t1:985_18: catasso viññāṇaṭṭhitiyo nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ vajjetvā ākāsānañcāyatanādiheṭṭhimāruppattayena saddhiṃ
tika-vin01t1:986_0: Aṭṭha lokadhammāti lābho alābho yaso ayaso nindā pasaṃsā sukhaṃ dukkhanti ime aṭṭha lokassa dhammattā lokadhammā.
tika-vin01t1:986_2: tasmā etehi vinimutto nāma koci satto natthi.
tika-vin01t1:986_3: Te hi aparāparaṃ kadāci lokaṃ anupatanti,
tika-vin01t1:986_15: Lābhe pana āgate alābho āgatoyeva hotīti lābho ca alābho ca vutto.
tika-vin01t1:986_17: Tathā ca lohite sati tadupaghātavasena pubbo viya lābhādīsu anurodhe sati alābhādīsu virodho laddhāvasaro eva hoti.
tika-vin01t1:987_0: Nava sattāvāsāti heṭṭhā vuttasattaviññāṇaṭṭhitiyo eva asaññasattacatutthāruppehi saddhiṃ “nava sattāvāsā”ti vuccanti.
tika-vin01t1:987_3: Te hi sattanikāyā tappariyāpannānaṃ sattānaṃ tāya eva tappariyāpannatāya ādhāro viya vattabbataṃ arahanti
tika-vin01t1:988_0: Dasāyatanānīti arūpasabhāvaṃ manāyatanaṃ rūpārūpādimissakaṃ dhammāyatanañca ṭhapetvā kevalaṃ rūpadhammānaṃyeva vasena cakkhāyatanādayo pañca,
tika-vin01t1:989_1: Āyatanato āyānaṃ vā tananato āyatassa ca nayanato āyatanāni.
tika-vin01t1:989_2: Cakkhurūpādīsu hi taṃtaṃdvārārammaṇā cittacetasikā dhammā sena sena anubhavanādinā kiccena āyatanti uṭṭhahanti ghaṭanti vāyamanti,
tika-vin01t1:989_3: te ca pana āyabhūte dhamme etāni tanonti vitthārenti,
tika-vin01t1:989_4: idañca anamatagge saṃsāre pavattaṃ ativiya āyataṃ saṃsāradukkhaṃ yāva na nivattati,
tika-vin01t1:989_7: Api ca nivāsaṭṭhānaṭṭhena ākaraṭṭhena samosaraṇaṭṭhena sañjātidesaṭṭhena kāraṇaṭṭhena ca āyatanāni.
tika-vin01t1:989_8: Tathā hi loke “issarāyatanaṃ vāsudevāyatana”ntiādīsu nivāsaṭṭhānaṃ āyatananti vuccati.
tika-vin01t1:989_13: “Tatra tatreva sakkhibhabbataṃ pāpuṇāti sati satiāyatane”tiādīsu kāraṇaṃ āyatananti vuccati.
tika-vin01t1:989_14: Cakkhuādīsu ca te te cittacetasikā dhammā nivasanti tadāyattavuttitāyāti cakkhādayo tesaṃ nivāsaṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:989_15: Cakkhādīsu ca te ākiṇṇā tannissitattā tadārammaṇattā cāti cakkhādayova nesaṃ ākaro.
tika-vin01t1:989_16: Tattha tattha vatthudvārārammaṇavasena samosaraṇato cakkhādayova nesaṃ samosaraṇaṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:989_17: Tannissayārammaṇabhāvena tattheva uppattito cakkhādayova nesaṃ sañjātideso.
tika-vin01t1:989_18: Cakkhādīnaṃ abhāve abhāvato cakkhādayova nesaṃ kāraṇanti yathāvuttenatthena cakkhu ca taṃ āyatanañcāti cakkhāyatanaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:990_0: Imāneva pana dvādasāyatanāni cakkhuviññāṇādichaviññāṇehi saddhiṃ aṭṭhārasa vidahanādito “dhātuyo”ti vuccanti.
tika-vin01t1:990_1: Tathā hi cakkhādīsu ekeko dhammo yathāsambhavaṃ vidahati, dhīyate, vidhānaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:990_4: Lokiyā hi dhātuyo kāraṇabhāvena vavatthitāva hutvā suvaṇṇarajatādidhātuyo viya suvaṇṇarajatādiṃ,
tika-vin01t1:990_6: bhārahārehi ca bhāro viya sattehi dhīyanti dhārīyanti,
tika-vin01t1:990_8: Etāhi ca kāraṇabhūtāhi saṃsāradukkhaṃ sattehi anuvidhīyati,
tika-vin01t1:990_11: Api ca yathā titthiyānaṃ attā nāma sabhāvato natthi,
tika-vin01t1:990_13: etā pana attano sabhāvaṃ dhārentīti dhātuyo.
tika-vin01t1:990_14: Yathā ca loke vicittā haritālamanosilādayo selāvayavā “dhātuyo”ti vuccanti,
tika-vin01t1:990_17: Yathā vā sarīrasaṅkhātassa samudāyassa avayavabhūtesu rasasoṇitādīsu aññamaññavisabhāgalakkhaṇaparicchinnesu dhātusamaññā,
tika-vin01t1:990_18: evametesupi pañcakkhandhasaṅkhātassa attabhāvassa avayavesu dhātusamaññā veditabbā.
tika-vin01t1:990_21: Tathā hi bhagavā “chadhāturo ayaṃ bhikkhu puriso”tiādīsu jīvasaññāsamūhananatthaṃ dhātudesanamakāsi.
tika-vin01t1:991_2: yaṃ dukkhaṃ tadanattā”ti vacanato dukkhānattatā ca pakāsitā hontīti tīṇipi sāmaññalakkhaṇāni gahitāni.
tika-vin01t1:991_6: tāni ca atthato pathavīādayoti aviseseneva salakkhaṇato saṅkhārā gahitā.
tika-vin01t1:991_7: Taggahaṇeneva ye te savisesā kusalādayo hetuādayo ca,
tika-vin01t1:991_8: tepi gahitā eva hontīti āha “iti ayaṃ saṅkhāralokopi sabbathā vidito”ti.
tika-vin01t1:992_0: Evaṃ saṅkhāralokassa sabbathā viditabhāvaṃ dassetvā idāni sattalokassapi sabbathā viditabhāvaṃ dassento “yasmā panesā”tiādimāha.
tika-vin01t1:992_1: Tattha āsayaṃ jānātīti āgamma cittaṃ seti etthāti āsayo migāsayo viya.
tika-vin01t1:992_2: Yathā migo gocarāya gantvā paccāgantvā tattheva vanagahane sayatīti so tassa āsayo,
tika-vin01t1:992_3: evaṃ aññathā pavattitvāpi cittaṃ āgamma yattha seti,
tika-vin01t1:995_0: Tattha sabbadiṭṭhīnaṃ sassatucchedadiṭṭhīhi saṅgahitattā sabbepi diṭṭhigatikā sattā imā eva dve diṭṭhiyo sannissitā.
tika-vin01t1:995_1: Yathāha “dvayanissito khvāyaṃ kaccāna loko yebhuyyena atthitañceva natthitañcā”ti.
tika-vin01t1:995_5: vivaṭṭanissitānaṃ pana suddhasattānaṃ anulomikā khanti yathābhūtañāṇanti duvidho āsayo.
tika-vin01t1:995_7: yathābhūtañāṇaṃ pana maggañāṇa”nti sammohavinodaniyā vibhaṅgaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:995_9: jānanto ca tesaṃ diṭṭhigatānaṃ tesañca ñāṇānaṃ appavattikkhaṇepi jānāti.
tika-vin01t1:996_0: “Kāmaṃ sevantaññeva jānāti ‘ayaṃ puggalo kāmagaruko kāmāsayo kāmādhimutto’ti,
tika-vin01t1:996_1: kāmaṃ sevantaññeva jānāti ‘ayaṃ puggalo nekkhammagaruko nekkhammāsayo nekkhammādhimutto”’tiādi.
tika-vin01t1:997_0: Anusayaṃ jānātīti anu anu sayantīti anusayā,
tika-vin01t1:997_3: Appahīnā hi kilesā kāraṇalābhe sati uppajjanti.
tika-vin01t1:997_6: atītā paccuppannā ca taṃsabhāvattā tathā vuccanti.
tika-vin01t1:997_7: Na hi dhammānaṃ kālabhedena sabhāvabhedo atthi,
tika-vin01t1:997_8: taṃ sattavidhaṃ anusayaṃ tassa tassa sattassa santāne paroparabhāvena pavattamānaṃ jānāti.
tika-vin01t1:998_6: Taṃ caritaṃ sabhāvato saṃkilesato vodānato samuṭṭhānato phalato nissandatoti evamādinā pakārena jānāti.
tika-vin01t1:999_4: Sace hi ācariyupajjhāyā na sīlavanto honti,
tika-vin01t1:999_12: Tipiṭakacūḷābhayatthero kira nāgadīpe cetiyavandanāya pañcahi bhikkhusatehi saddhiṃ gacchanto ekasmiṃ
tika-vin01t1:999_13: gāme manussehi nimantito therena ca saddhiṃ eko asāruppabhikkhu atthi,
tika-vin01t1:999_15: bhikkhusaṅghesu gāmaṃ osarantesu te ubho janā kiñcāpi āgantukena nevāsiko,
tika-vin01t1:999_17: evaṃ santepi ekato hutvā hasitvā hasitvā kathayamānā aṭṭhaṃsu.
tika-vin01t1:999_18: Thero disvā “sammāsambuddhena jānitvā dhātusaṃyuttaṃ kathita”nti āha.
tika-vin01t1:999_19: Evamayaṃ hīnādhimuttikādīnaṃ aññamaññopasevanādiniyāmikā ajjhāsayadhātu ajjhāsayabhāvo adhimuttīti vuccati,
tika-vin01t1:999_26: Adhimuttiyā pana tikkhamudubhāvādiko indriyānaṃ tikkhamudubhāvādinā veditabbo.
tika-vin01t1:1000_0: Apparajakkheti paññāmaye akkhimhi appaṃ parittaṃ rāgadosamoharajaṃ etesanti apparajakkhā,
tika-vin01t1:1001_5: Yesaṃ vā āsayādayo ākārā koṭṭhāsā sundarā,
tika-vin01t1:1001_8: Suviññāpayeti sammattaniyāmaṃ viññāpetuṃ sukare saddhe paññavante ca,
tika-vin01t1:1001_13: Bhabbe abhabbeti ettha ye ariyamaggappaṭivedhassa anucchavikā upanissayasampannā kammāvaraṇakilesāvaraṇavipākāvaraṇarahitā,
tika-vin01t1:1001_16: Tasmāti yasmā bhagavā aparimāṇe satte āsayādito anavasesetvā jānāti,
tika-vin01t1:1001_17: tasmā assa bhagavato sattalokopi sabbathā vidito.
tika-vin01t1:1002_0: Nanu ca sattesu pamāṇādipi jānitabbo atthīti? Atthi,
tika-vin01t1:1002_1: tassa pana jānanaṃ na nibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāyāti idha na gahitaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1003_0: “Atha kho bhagavā parittaṃ nakhasikhāyaṃ paṃsuṃ āropetvā bhikkhū āmantesi –
tika-vin01t1:1003_3: katamaṃ nu kho bahutaraṃ yo vāyaṃ mayā paritto nakhasikhāyaṃ paṃsu āropito,
tika-vin01t1:1004_0: Evaṃ sattalokassapi sabbathā viditabhāvaṃ dassetvā idāni okāsalokassapi tatheva viditabhāvaṃ dassento āha “yathā ca sattaloko”tiādi.
tika-vin01t1:1004_3: Sā hi nemimaṇḍalasadisena cakkavāḷapabbatena samantato parikkhittattā “cakkavāḷa”nti vuccati.
tika-vin01t1:1004_13: Tiṇṇaṃ tiṇṇañhi pattānaṃ antarāḷasadise tiṇṇaṃ tiṇṇaṃ lokadhātūnaṃ antareyeva pathavī natthi lokantaranirayabhāvato,
tika-vin01t1:1004_14: cakkavāḷapabbatānaṃ pana cakkavāḷapabbatantarehi sambaddhaṭṭhāne pathavī ekābaddhāva,
tika-vin01t1:1004_15: vivaṭṭakāle saṇṭhahamānāpi pathavī yathāsaṇṭhitapathaviyā ekābaddhāva saṇṭhahati.
tika-vin01t1:1005_0: Saṇṭhitīti heṭṭhā uparito cāti sabbaso ṭhiti.
tika-vin01t1:1005_4: Accuggato tāvadevāti tattakameva caturāsīti yojanasatasahassāniyeva uggato.
tika-vin01t1:1007_5: tasmā tassa pabhāya ajjhottharantiyā pācīnadisāya samuddodakaṃ khīraṃ viya paññāyati.
tika-vin01t1:1007_7: tasmā dakkhiṇadisāya samuddodakaṃ yebhuyyena nīlavaṇṇaṃ hutvā paññāyati,
tika-vin01t1:1007_12: Tathā hi pubbadakkhiṇapassehi nikkhantā rajatamaṇirasmiyo ekato hutvā mahāsamuddapiṭṭhena gantvā cakkavāḷapabbataṃ āhacca tiṭṭhanti,
tika-vin01t1:1007_15: uttarapācīnapassehi nikkhantā suvaṇṇarajatarasmiyo ekato hutvā mahāsamuddapiṭṭhena gantvā cakkavāḷapabbataṃ āhacca tiṭṭhanti,
tika-vin01t1:1007_16: tāsaṃ rasmīnaṃ antaresu cattāro mahāsamuddā honti.
tika-vin01t1:1008_0: Tatoti sinerussa heṭṭhā upari ca vuttappamāṇato.
tika-vin01t1:1008_3: dvācattālīsa yojanasahassāni samudde ajjhogāḷho tattakameva upari uggato yugandharapabbato,
tika-vin01t1:1008_4: ekavīsati yojanasahassāni mahāsamudde ajjhogāḷho tattakameva ca upari uggato īsadharo pabbatoti iminā
tika-vin01t1:1008_7: evaṃ yāva sinerupādamūlāti heṭṭhā sineruppamāṇato upaḍḍhappamāṇopi yugandharapabbato pathaviyaṃ suppatiṭṭhito,
tika-vin01t1:1008_13: Tattha kira udakaṃ sukhumaṃ morapattamattampi pakkhittaṃ patiṭṭhātuṃ na sakkoti sīdateva,
tika-vin01t1:1008_15: Te pana vitthārato yathākkamaṃ sineruādīnaṃ accuggamasamānapaamāṇāti vadanti.
tika-vin01t1:1009_0: Sinerussa samantatoti parikkhipanavasena sinerussa samantato ṭhitā.
tika-vin01t1:1009_3: Evaṃ taṃ taṃ parikkhipitvā ṭhitā “sinerussa samantato”ti vuttā.
tika-vin01t1:1009_4: Katthaci pana “sineruṃ parikkhipitvā assakaṇṇo nāma pabbato patiṭṭhito,
tika-vin01t1:1009_5: taṃ parikkhipitvā vinatako nāma pabbato”ti evaṃ aññoyeva anukkamo āgato.
tika-vin01t1:1012_0: Disvānāmantayī sūtaṃ, ime ke nāma pabbatā”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1020_4: Ubhinnampi pana tesaṃ antare ekopi sīdantaramahāsamuddo.
tika-vin01t1:1020_20: Ete sīdantaramahāsamudde satta pabbatā anupaṭipāṭiyā samuggatā sopānasadisā hutvā ṭhitā”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1021_1: himavā pañca pabbatoti himavā pabbato pañca yojanasatāni ucco,
tika-vin01t1:1021_3: Tattha himavāti himapātasamaye himayuttatāya himaṃ assa atthīti himavā,
tika-vin01t1:1021_6: Selo hi sandhisaṅkhātehi pabbehi sahitattā “pabbato”ti vuccati,
tika-vin01t1:1021_7: pasavanādivasena jalassa sārabhūtānaṃ bhesajjādīnaṃ vatthūnañca giraṇato “girī”ti ca vuccati.
tika-vin01t1:1021_9: tīṇi āyatavitthatoti yojanānaṃ tīṇi sahassāni āyāmato ca vitthārato cāti attho,
tika-vin01t1:1021_10: āyāmato ca vitthārato ca tīṇi yojanasahassānīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t1:1022_4: ayaṃ himavā nāma pabbato samantato sandamānapañcasatanadīvicitto,
tika-vin01t1:1022_5: yattha āyāmavitthārena ceva gambhīratāya ca paṇṇāsa paṇṇāsa yojanā diyaḍḍhayojanasataparimaṇḍalā anotattadaho
tika-vin01t1:1022_6: kaṇṇamuṇḍadaho rathakāradaho chaddantadaho kuṇāladaho mandākinīdaho sīhappapātadahoti satta mahāsarā
tika-vin01t1:1022_8: Tesu anotatto sudassanakūṭaṃ citrakūṭaṃ kāḷakūṭaṃ gandhamādanakūṭaṃ kelāsakūṭanti imehi pañcahi pabbatehi parikkhitto.
tika-vin01t1:1022_9: Tattha sudassanakūṭaṃ sovaṇṇamayaṃ dviyojanasatubbedhaṃ antovaṅkaṃ kākamukhasaṇṭhānaṃ tameva saraṃ paṭicchādetvā ṭhitaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1022_12: Gandhamādanakūṭaṃ sānumayaṃ abbhantare muggavaṇṇaṃ kāḷānusāriyādimūlagandho candanādisāragandho saralādipheggugandho
tika-vin01t1:1022_14: jātiphalādiphalagandho sabbathā gandhabhāvato gandhagandhoti imehi dasahi gandhehi ussannaṃ nānappakāraosadhasañchannaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1023_0: Tattheva nandamūlakaṃ nāma pabbhāraṃ paccekabuddhānaṃ vasanokāso.
tika-vin01t1:1023_2: Tattha maṇiguhādvāre mañjūsako nāma rukkho yojanaṃ ubbedhena,
tika-vin01t1:1023_4: so yattakāni udake vā thale vā pupphāni,
tika-vin01t1:1023_14: Yesu paccekabuddhuppādadivase uposathadivase ca sabbapaccekabuddhā sannipatitvā nisīdanti,
tika-vin01t1:1023_17: Tato sace tasmiṃ kāle aññepi paccekabuddhā saṃvijjanti,
tika-vin01t1:1023_20: Tato saṅghatthero adhunāgataṃ paccekabuddhaṃ sabbesaṃ anumodanatthāya “kathamadhigata”nti kammaṭṭhānaṃ pucchati,
tika-vin01t1:1023_22: Evamidaṃ gandhamādanakūṭaṃ paccekabuddhānaṃ āvāsaṭṭhānaṃ hotīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1024_1: Sabbāni cetāni citrakūṭādīni sudassanena samānubbedhasaṇṭhānāni tameva saraṃ paṭicchādetvā ṭhitāni.
tika-vin01t1:1024_3: āyāmato pana ubbedhato viya dviyojanasatānevāti vadanti.
tika-vin01t1:1024_4: Tāni sabbāni devānubhāvena nāgānubhāvena ca ṭhassanti,
tika-vin01t1:1024_7: candimasūriyā dakkhiṇena vā uttarena vā gacchantā pabbatantarena tattha obhāsaṃ karonti,
tika-vin01t1:1024_12: yesu buddhapaccekabuddhakhīṇāsavā ca iddhimanto ca isayo nhāyanti,
tika-vin01t1:1025_0: Tassa catūsu passesu sīhamukhaṃ hatthimukhaṃ assamukhaṃ usabhamukhanti cattāri mukhāni honti,
tika-vin01t1:1025_4: Puratthimadisato nikkhantanadī anotattaṃ tikkhattuṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā itarā tisso nadiyo anupagamma pācīnahimavanteneva
tika-vin01t1:1025_6: Pacchimadisato ca uttaradisato ca nikkhantanadiyopi tatheva padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pacchimahimavanteneva uttarahimavanteneva
tika-vin01t1:1025_8: Dakkhiṇadisato nikkhantanadī pana taṃ tikkhattuṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā dakkhiṇena ujukaṃ pāsāṇapiṭṭheneva
tika-vin01t1:1025_9: saṭṭhi yojanāni gantvā pabbataṃ paharitvā vuṭṭhāya parikkhepena tigāvutappamāṇā udakadhārā hutvā ākāsena
tika-vin01t1:1025_10: saṭṭhi yojanāni gantvā tiyaggaḷe nāma pāsāṇe patitā,
tika-vin01t1:1025_12: Tattha paññāsayojanappamāṇā tiyaggaḷā nāma mahāpokkharaṇī jātā,
tika-vin01t1:1025_13: mahāpokkharaṇiyā kūlaṃ bhinditvā pāsāṇaṃ pavisitvā saṭṭhi yojanāni gatā,
tika-vin01t1:1025_14: tato ghanapathaviṃ bhinditvā umaṅgena saṭṭhi yojanāni gantvā viñjhaṃ nāma tiracchānapabbataṃ paharitvā
tika-vin01t1:1025_16: Sā tikkhattuṃ anotattaṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā gataṭṭhāne “āvaṭṭagaṅgā”ti vuccati,
tika-vin01t1:1025_20: kūlaṃ bhinditvā pāsāṇaṃ pavisitvā saṭṭhi yojanāni gataṭṭhāne “bahalagaṅgā”ti,
tika-vin01t1:1025_22: Viñjhaṃ nāma tiracchānapabbataṃ paharitvā pañcadhārā hutvā pavattaṭṭhāne pana gaṅgā yamunā aciravatī sarabhū mahīti pañcadhā saṅkhyaṃ gatā.
tika-vin01t1:1026_0: Chaddantadahassa pana majjhe dvādasayojanappamāṇe ṭhāne sevālo vā paṇakaṃ vā natthi,
tika-vin01t1:1026_2: tadanantaraṃ yojanavitthataṃ suddhakallahāravanaṃ taṃ udakaṃ parikkhipitvā ṭhitaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1026_3: tadanantaraṃ yojanavitthatameva suddhanīluppalavanaṃ taṃ parikkhipitvā ṭhitaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1026_5: imesaṃ pana sattannaṃ vanānaṃ anantaraṃ sabbesampi kallahārādīnaṃ vasena vomissakavanaṃ yojanavitthatameva tāni parikkhipitvā ṭhitaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1026_6: tadanantaraṃ nāgānaṃ kaṭippamāṇe udake yojanavitthatameva rattasālivanaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1026_7: tadanantaraṃ udakapariyante nīlapītalohitodātasurabhisukhumakusumasamākiṇṇaṃ khuddakagacchavananti imāni dasa vanāni yojanayojanavitthatāneva.
tika-vin01t1:1026_19: veṇuvanaṃ pana parikkhipitvā satta pabbatā ṭhitā,
tika-vin01t1:1026_20: tesaṃ bāhirantato paṭṭhāya paṭhamo cūḷakāḷapabbato nāma,
tika-vin01t1:1026_27: So ubbedhato sattayojaniko chaddantadahaṃ parikkhipitvā pattassa mukhavaṭṭi viya ṭhito.
tika-vin01t1:1026_29: tato nikkhantena obhāsena chaddantadaho samuggatabālasūriyo viya hoti.
tika-vin01t1:1026_30: Bāhirimapabbatesu pana eko ubbedhato cha yojanāni,
tika-vin01t1:1026_32: eko cattāri, eko tīṇi, eko dve,
tika-vin01t1:1027_0: Evaṃ sattapabbataparikkhittassa pana tassa dahassa pubbuttarakaṇṇe udakavātappaharaṇokāse mahānigrodharukkho,
tika-vin01t1:1027_5: Iti so mūlato paṭṭhāya ubbedhena terasayojaniko sākhānaṃ orimantato yāva pārimantā dvādasayojaniko aṭṭhahi
tika-vin01t1:1027_6: pārohasahassehi paṭimaṇḍito muṇḍamaṇipabbato viya vilāsamāno tiṭṭhati.
tika-vin01t1:1027_7: Chaddantadahassa pana pacchimadisābhāge suvaṇṇapabbate dvādasayojanikā kañcanaguhā.
tika-vin01t1:1027_8: Chaddanto nāgarājā vassāratte aṭṭhasahassanāgaparivuto kañcanaguhāyaṃ vasati,
tika-vin01t1:1027_9: gimhakāle udakavātaṃ sampaṭicchamāno mahānigrodhamūle pārohantare tiṭṭhati.
tika-vin01t1:1028_0: Mandākiniyā pana majjhe pañcavīsatiyojanamatte ṭhāne sevālo vā paṇakaṃ vā natthi,
tika-vin01t1:1028_2: tato paraṃ pana nāgānaṃ kaṭippamāṇe udake aḍḍhayojanavitthataṃ setapadumavanaṃ taṃ udakaṃ parikkhipitvā ṭhitaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1028_5: Tassa ekekasmiṃ pabbantare āḷhakappamāṇaṃ khīraṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t1:1028_6: Padumānaṃ pupphasamaye vāto reṇuvaṭṭiṃ uṭṭhāpetvā paduminīpattesu ṭhapeti,
tika-vin01t1:1028_8: tato ādiccapākena paccitvā pakkaayoghaṭikā viya pokkharamadhu tiṭṭhati,
tika-vin01t1:1028_23: kapiṭṭhavananti saṅkhepato tasmiṃ dahe khāditabbayuttakaṃ phalaṃ nāma natthīti na vattabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1028_24: Iti imasmiṃ himavati vijjamānakasattamahāsarappabhutīnaṃ pamāṇasaṇṭhānādibhedaṃ sabbameva visesaṃ bhagavā
tika-vin01t1:1029_4: Rukkho hi na gacchatīti nagoti vuccati.
tika-vin01t1:1029_6: Paññāsayojanakkhandhasākhāyāmāti ubbedhato paññāsayojanappamāṇakkhandhāyāmā ubbedhato samantato ca paññāsayojanasākhāyāmā ca.
tika-vin01t1:1029_9: Jamburukkhassa hi mūlato paṭṭhāya yāva sākhāviṭapā,
tika-vin01t1:1029_11: tato parampi ujukaṃ uggatasākhā paṇṇāsa yojanāni,
tika-vin01t1:1029_12: samantato ca ekekā sākhā paṇṇāsa paṇṇāsa yojanāni vaḍḍhitāni.
tika-vin01t1:1029_13: Tāsu pana mahantā mahantā nadiyo sandanti,
tika-vin01t1:1029_14: tāsaṃ nadīnaṃ ubhayatīre jambupakkānaṃ patitaṭṭhāne suvaṇṇaṅkurā uṭṭhahanti,
tika-vin01t1:1029_15: te nadījalena vuyhamānā anupubbena mahāsamuddaṃ pavisanti,
tika-vin01t1:1029_16: tatoyeva jambunadiyaṃ nibbattattā “jambunada”nti taṃ suvaṇṇaṃ vuccati.
tika-vin01t1:1032_0: Kadambo kapparukkho ca, sirīsena bhavati sattama”nti. ;
tika-vin01t1:1033_0: Ettha sirīsena bhavati sattamanti ettha sirīsenāti paccatte karaṇavacanaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1034_2: lokadhātumayaṃ ṭhitoti heṭṭhā vuttaṃ sabbampi taṃ parikkhipitvā cakkavāḷasiluccayo patiṭṭhito,
tika-vin01t1:1034_3: ayaṃ ekā lokadhātu nāmāti attho. Ma-
tika-vin01t1:1034_5: “Taṃ sabbaṃ lokadhātuṃ parikkhipitvā ayaṃ cakkavāḷasiluccayo ṭhito”ti evampettha sambandhaṃ vadanti,
tika-vin01t1:1035_1: Candamaṇḍalaṃ ekūnapaññāsayojananti ujukaṃ āyāmato vitthārato ubbedhato ca ekūnapaññāsayojanaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1035_3: Sūriyamaṇḍalaṃ paññāsayojananti etthāpi candamaṇḍale vuttanayeneva ujukaṃ paññāsayojananti veditabbaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1036_3: Candassa heṭṭhimantato sūriyassa uparimantaṃ yojanasataṃ hoti,
tika-vin01t1:1036_6: anto ca bahi ca sītalameva hoti.
tika-vin01t1:1036_11: So hi amāvāsiyaṃ sūriyena saddhiṃ gacchanto divase divase thokaṃ thokaṃ ohīyanto puṇṇamāsiyaṃ upaḍḍhamaggato ohīyati,
tika-vin01t1:1036_13: Tathā hesa ekasmiṃ māse kadāci dakkhiṇato,
tika-vin01t1:1036_16: cando dhenu viya vacchaṃ taṃ taṃ nakkhattaṃ upasaṅkamati,
tika-vin01t1:1036_17: nakkhattāni pana attano gamanaṭṭhānaṃ na vijahanti,
tika-vin01t1:1036_23: taṃ dandhaṃ chahi chahi māsehi ijjhanato.
tika-vin01t1:1037_0: Sūriyo kāḷapakkhauposathe candena saheva gantvā tato paraṃ pāṭipadadivase yojanānaṃ satasahassaṃ candamaṇḍalaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1037_1: ohāya gacchati attano sīghagāmitāya tassa ca dandhagāmitāya,
tika-vin01t1:1037_3: Tato parampi pakkhassa dutiyāya yojanānaṃ satasahassaṃ candamaṇḍalaṃ ohāya gacchati.
tika-vin01t1:1037_4: Evaṃ divase divase yāva sukkapakkhauposathadivasā satasahassaṃ satasahassaṃ ohāya gacchati,
tika-vin01t1:1037_5: atha cando anukkamena vaḍḍhitvā uposathadivase paripuṇṇo hoti.
tika-vin01t1:1037_6: Anukkamena vaḍḍhanañcettha uparibhāgato patitasūriyālokatāya heṭṭhato pavattāya sūriyassa dūrabhāvena
tika-vin01t1:1037_7: divase divase anukkamena parihāyamānāya attano chāyāya vasena anukkamena caṇḍamaṇḍalappadesassa vaḍḍhamānassa
tika-vin01t1:1037_9: tasmā anukkamena vaḍḍhitvā viya uposathadivase puṇṇamāyaṃ paripuṇṇamaṇḍalo hutvā dissati.
tika-vin01t1:1037_10: Atha sūriyo pāṭipadadivase yojanānaṃ satasahassaṃ dhāvitvā puna candamaṇḍalaṃ gaṇhāti candassa dandhagatitāya attano ca sīghagatitāya,
tika-vin01t1:1037_11: tathā dutiyāya satasahassanti evaṃ yāva uposathadivasā satasahassaṃ satasahassaṃ dhāvitvā gaṇhāti.
tika-vin01t1:1037_12: Atha cando anukkamena hāyitvā kāḷapakkhauposathadivase sabbaso na paññāyati,
tika-vin01t1:1037_13: anukkamena hāyamānatā cettha anukkamena vaḍḍhamānatāya vuttanayena veditabbā.
tika-vin01t1:1037_14: Tattha pana chāyāya hāyamānatāya maṇḍalaṃ vaḍḍhamānaṃ viya dissati,
tika-vin01t1:1037_15: idha ca chāyāya vaḍḍhamānatāya maṇḍalaṃ hāyamānaṃ viya dissati,
tika-vin01t1:1037_16: tasmā anukkamena hāyitvā viya uposathadivase sabbaso na paññāyati.
tika-vin01t1:1037_17: Candaṃ heṭṭhā katvā sūriyo upari hoti,
tika-vin01t1:1037_18: mahatiyā pātiyā khuddakabhājanaṃ viya candamaṇḍalaṃ pidhīyati,
tika-vin01t1:1037_19: majjhanhike gehacchāyā viya candassa chāyā na paññāyati.
tika-vin01t1:1037_20: So chāyāya apaññāyamānāya dūre ṭhitānaṃ divā padīpo viya sayampi na paññāyati.
tika-vin01t1:1038_0: Imesaṃ pana ajavīthi nāgavīthi govīthīti tisso gamanavīthiyo honti.
tika-vin01t1:1038_4: Tathā ca yāya vīthiyā sūriye gacchante vassavalāhakadevaputtā sūriyābhitāpasantattā attano vimānato na nikkhamanti,
tika-vin01t1:1038_6: tadā kira sūriyavimānaṃ pakatimaggato adho otaritvā vicarati,
tika-vin01t1:1038_7: tassa oruyha caraṇeneva candavimānampi adho oruyha carati taggatikattā,
tika-vin01t1:1038_8: tasmā sā vīthi udakābhāvena ajānurūpatāya “ajavīthī”ti samaññā gatā.
tika-vin01t1:1038_9: Yāya pana vīthiyā sūriye gacchante vassavalāhakadevaputtā sūriyābhitāpābhāvato abhiṇhaṃ attano vimānato
tika-vin01t1:1038_10: bahi nikkhamitvā kīḷāpasutā hutvā ito cito ca vicaranti,
tika-vin01t1:1038_11: tadā kira sūriyavimānaṃ pakatimaggato uddhaṃ āruhitvā vicarati,
tika-vin01t1:1038_12: tassa uddhaṃ āruyha caraṇeneva candavimānampi uddhaṃ āruyha carati taggatikattā,
tika-vin01t1:1038_13: taggatikatā ca samānagati nāma vātamaṇḍalena vimānassa phellitabbattā,
tika-vin01t1:1038_14: tasmā sā vīthi udakabahubhāvena nāgānurūpatāya “nāgavīthī”ti samaññā gatā.
tika-vin01t1:1038_15: Yadā sūriyo uddhaṃ anārohanto adho ca anotaranto pakatimaggeneva gacchati,
tika-vin01t1:1038_16: tadā vassavalāhakā yathākālaṃ yathāruciñca vimānato nikkhamitvā sukhena vicaranti,
tika-vin01t1:1038_17: tena kālena kālaṃ vassanato loke utusamatā hoti,
tika-vin01t1:1038_18: tāya utusamatāya hetubhūtāya sā candimasūriyānaṃ gati gavānurūpatāya “govīthī”ti samaññā gatā.
tika-vin01t1:1038_19: Tasmā yaṃ kālaṃ candimasūriyā ajavīthiṃ āruhanti,
tika-vin01t1:1039_1: tesaṃ adhammikatāya uparājasenāpatippabhutayo sabbe devā brahmāno ca adhammikā honti,
tika-vin01t1:1039_2: tadā tesaṃ adhammikatāya visamaṃ candimasūriyā parivattanti.
tika-vin01t1:1039_4: pāpakammassa balena visamaṃ vāyantena vāyunā phelliyamānā candimasūriyā sineruṃ parikkhipantā visamaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1039_10: vimānesu khobhitesu devatānaṃ kīḷanatthāya cittāni na namanti,
tika-vin01t1:1039_11: cittesu anamantesu sītuṇhabhedo utu yathākālena na sampajjati,
tika-vin01t1:1039_12: tasmiṃ asampajjante na sammā devo vassati,
tika-vin01t1:1039_17: Vassantopi vappakāle aṅkurakāle nāḷakāle pupphakāle khīraggahaṇādikālesu yathā yathā sassānaṃ upakāro na hoti,
tika-vin01t1:1039_18: tathā tathā vassati ca vigacchati ca.
tika-vin01t1:1039_20: ekabhājane pakkhittataṇḍulesupi ekasmiṃ padese bhattaṃ uttaṇḍulaṃ hoti,
tika-vin01t1:1039_27: Tena sattā bahvābādhā ceva honti appāyukā ca.
tika-vin01t1:1040_0: Dhammikānaṃ pana rājūnaṃ kāle vuttavipariyāyena candimasūriyā samaṃ parivattanti,
tika-vin01t1:1040_3: candimasūriyā cha māse sineruto bahi nikkhamanti,
tika-vin01t1:1040_5: Tathā hi sinerusamīpena taṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā gacchantā cha māse tato gamanavīthito bahi attano tiriyaṃ gamanena cakkavāḷābhimukhā nikkhamanti.
tika-vin01t1:1040_6: Evaṃ cha māse khaṇe khaṇe sineruto apasakkanavasena tato nikkhamitvā cakkavāḷasamīpaṃ pattā.
tika-vin01t1:1040_7: Tatopi cha māse khaṇe khaṇe apasakkanavasena nikkhamitvā sinerusamīpaṃ pāpuṇantā anto vicaranti.
tika-vin01t1:1040_9: tato dve māse nikkhamitvā bahi caranti.
tika-vin01t1:1040_11: tato cakkavāḷābhimukhā gantvā tayo māse cakkavāḷasamīpena vicaritvā puna nikkhamitvā citramāse majjhena
tika-vin01t1:1040_12: gantvā tato pare dve māse sineruabhimukhā pakkhanditvā puna āsāḷhe sinerusamīpena caranti.
tika-vin01t1:1040_13: Ettha ca sinerussa cakkavāḷassa ca yaṃ ṭhānaṃ vemajjhaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1040_14: tassa sinerussa ca yaṃ ṭhānaṃ vemajjhaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1040_18: Yadā pana sinerussa cakkavāḷassa ujukaṃ vemajjhena gacchanti,
tika-vin01t1:1041_0: Evaṃ vicarantā ca ekappahārena tīsupi dīpesu ālokaṃ karonti.
tika-vin01t1:1041_1: Ekekāya disāya nava nava yojanasatasahassāni andhakāraṃ vidhamitvā ālokaṃ dassenti. Kathaṃ?
tika-vin01t1:1041_2: Imasmiñhi dīpe sūriyuggamanakālo pubbavidehe majjhanhiko hoti,
tika-vin01t1:1041_14: Imasmiñhi dīpe ṭhitamajjhanhikavelāyaṃ pubbavidehavāsīnaṃ atthaṅgamanavasena upaḍḍhaṃ sūriyamaṇḍalaṃ paññāyati,
tika-vin01t1:1041_17: Iti imināva pakārena tīsu dīpesu ekappahāreneva candimasūriyā ālokaṃ dassentīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1042_0: Ito aññathā pana dvīsu eva dīpesu ekappahāreneva ālokaṃ dassenti.
tika-vin01t1:1042_1: Yasmiñhi dīpe atthaṅgamanavasena upaḍḍhaṃ sūriyamaṇḍalaṃ paññāyati,
tika-vin01t1:1042_5: Ekekāya disāya nava nava yojanasatasahassāni andhakāravidhamanampi imināva nayena daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1042_6: Imasmiñhi dīpe ṭhitamajjhanhikavelāyaṃ pubbavidehavāsīnaṃ atthaṅgamanavasena upaḍḍhaṃ sūriyamaṇḍalaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1042_7: paññāyatīti pubbavidehe navayojanasatasahassappamāṇe ṭhāne andhakāraṃ vidhamitvā ālokaṃ dasseti,
tika-vin01t1:1042_8: tathā aparagoyāne uggamanavasena tatthāpi upaḍḍhasseva paññāyamānattā.
tika-vin01t1:1042_9: Pubbavidehānaṃ pana atthaṅgamite na paññāyatīti dvīsu dīpesu sabbattha andhakāraṃ vidhamitvā ālokaṃ dasseti
tika-vin01t1:1043_0: Pātubhavantā ca candimasūriyā ekatova loke pātubhavanti,
tika-vin01t1:1043_2: Paṭhamakappikānañhi sattānaṃ sayaṃpabhāya antarahitāya andhakāro ahosi.
tika-vin01t1:1043_5: Tato mahājanassa sūrabhāvaṃ janayamānaṃ sūriyamaṇḍalaṃ uṭṭhahi,
tika-vin01t1:1043_7: Tasmiṃ divasaṃ ālokaṃ katvā atthaṅgamite puna andhakāro ahosi.
tika-vin01t1:1043_10: Atha nesaṃ chandaṃ ñatvā viya candamaṇḍalaṃ uṭṭhahi,
tika-vin01t1:1043_12: Evaṃ candimasūriyesu pātubhūtesu nakkhattāni tārakarūpāni pātubhavanti,
tika-vin01t1:1043_15: Candimasūriyānaṃ pana pātubhūtadivaseyeva sinerucakkavāḷahimavantapabbatā cattāro ca dīpā pātubhavanti,
tika-vin01t1:1043_16: te ca kho apubbaṃ acarimaṃ phagguṇapuṇṇamadivaseyeva pātubhavantīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1044_0: Yasmā cettha “ekaṃ cakkavāḷaṃ āyāmato ca vitthārato ca yojanānaṃ dvādasa satasahassāni tīṇi sahassāni
tika-vin01t1:1044_1: cattāri satāni paññāsañca yojanānī”ti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1044_2: tasmā vuttappamāṇato imassa cakkavāḷassa sinerupatiṭṭhitokāse caturāsīti yojanasahassāni parato yāva
tika-vin01t1:1051_0: Majjhato yāva merumhā, cakkavāḷā ca pabbatā;
tika-vin01t1:1062_0: Gacchanto ca panevaṃ so, oruyhoruyha heṭṭhato.
tika-vin01t1:1066_0: Tasmā so parito yāti, tattakaṃva dine dine.
tika-vin01t1:1073_0: Gāvutāni duve cāpi, dvīhi māsehi gacchati;
tika-vin01t1:1075_0: Gacchati chahi māsehi, timāsehi ca majjhimaṃ;
tika-vin01t1:1085_0: Tāvatiṃsabhavanaṃ dasasahassayojananti ettha tettiṃsa sahapuññakārino ettha nibbattāti taṃsahacaritaṭṭhānaṃ tettiṃsaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1085_4: Tathā hi maghena māṇavena saddhiṃ macalagāmake kālaṃ katvā tattha uppanne tettiṃsa devaputte upādāya assa devalokassa ayaṃ paṇṇatti jātāti vadanti.
tika-vin01t1:1085_5: Atha vā yasmā sesacakkavāḷesupi cha kāmāvacaradevalokā atthi.
tika-vin01t1:1085_8: Dasasahassayojananti idaṃ pana sakkapuraṃ sandhāya vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1085_9: Tathā hi tāvatiṃsakāyikā devā atthi pabbataṭṭhakā,
tika-vin01t1:1085_13: Ekadevalokepi hi devānaṃ paramparā cakkavāḷapabbataṃ appattā nāma natthi.
tika-vin01t1:1085_14: Idaṃ pana tāvatiṃsabhavanaṃ sinerussa uparimatale dasasahassayojanike ṭhāne patiṭṭhitanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1085_17: Taṃ kho pana nagaraṃ dvārasahassayuttaṃ ahosi ārāmapokkharaṇīpaṭimaṇḍitaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1086_1: dhajehi paṭimaṇḍito sattaratanamayo sattayojanasatubbedho sakkassa vejayanto nāma pāsādo.
tika-vin01t1:1088_0: Sakkassa pana erāvaṇo nāma hatthī diyaḍḍhayojanasatiko,
tika-vin01t1:1088_3: tasmā so uyyānakīḷāya nikkhamanakāle attabhāvaṃ vijahitvā diyaḍḍhayojanasatiko erāvaṇo nāma hatthī hoti.
tika-vin01t1:1088_5: sabbesaṃ majjhe sakkassa atthāya sudassanaṃ nāma tiṃsayojanikaṃ kumbhaṃ māpeti.
tika-vin01t1:1088_7: Tattha antarantarā sattaratanamayā yojanubbedhā dhajā uṭṭhahanti.
tika-vin01t1:1088_9: yassa mandavāteritassa pañcaṅgikatūriyasaddasadiso dibbagītasaddo viya ravo niccharati.
tika-vin01t1:1088_10: Maṇḍapamajjhe sakkassa yojaniko maṇipallaṅko paññatto hoti,
tika-vin01t1:1088_12: Tettiṃsāya kumbhānaṃ ekekasmiṃ kumbhe satta satta dante māpeti,
tika-vin01t1:1088_14: Ekekasmiñcettha dante satta satta pokkharaṇiyo honti,
tika-vin01t1:1088_16: ekekasmiṃ gacche satta satta pupphāni honti,
tika-vin01t1:1088_18: ekekasmiṃ patte satta satta devadhītaro naccanti.
tika-vin01t1:1088_19: Evaṃ samantā paṇṇāsayojanaṭṭhāne hatthidantesuyeva naccanaṭasamajjo hoti.
tika-vin01t1:1089_0: Nandā nāma pana pokkharaṇī paññāsayojanā. “Pañcasatayojanikā”tipi vadanti.
tika-vin01t1:1090_4: Sakko panettha accharāsaṅghaparivuto saṭṭhiyojanikaṃ suvaṇṇamahāvīthiṃ otaritvā nakkhattaṃ kīḷanto nandanavanādīsu vicarati.
tika-vin01t1:1091_0: Pāricchattako pana koviḷāro samantā tiyojanasataparimaṇḍalo pañcadasayojanapariṇāhakkhandho yojanasatubbedho.
tika-vin01t1:1091_1: Tassa mūle saṭṭhiyojanāyāmā paññāsayojanavitthārā pañcadasayojanubbedhā jayasumanapupphakavaṇṇā paṇḍukambalasilā,
tika-vin01t1:1091_2: yassā mudutāya sakkassa nisīdato upaḍḍhakāyo anupavisati,
tika-vin01t1:1092_0: Sudhammā nāma devasabhā āyāmato ca vitthārato ca tiyojanasatikā,
tika-vin01t1:1092_8: sattaratanamayā gopānasiyo ca pakkhapāsā ca mukhavaṭṭi ca,
tika-vin01t1:1093_2: pāricchattake pupphamāne ekaṃ vassaṃ upaṭṭhānaṃ gacchanti.
tika-vin01t1:1093_3: Te tassa paṇḍupalāsādibhāvato paṭṭhāya attamanā honti. Yathāha –
tika-vin01t1:1094_2: samaye devānaṃ tāvatiṃsānaṃ pāricchattako koviḷāro paṇḍupalāso hoti, attamanā,
tika-vin01t1:1094_4: devā tāvatiṃsā tasmiṃ samaye honti ‘paṇḍupalāso dāni pāricchattako koviḷāro,
tika-vin01t1:1095_0: Sabbapāliphullassa pana pāricchattakassa koviḷārassa samantā pañca yojanasatāni ābhā pharati,
tika-vin01t1:1095_2: Pupphite pāricchattake ārohaṇakiccaṃ vā aṅkusaṃ gahetvā nāmanakiccaṃ vā pupphāharaṇatthaṃ caṅkoṭakakiccaṃ vā natthi.
tika-vin01t1:1095_13: Aññesaṃ devatānaṃ pana pupphakaṇṇikāva āsanaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t1:1095_15: Tato pupphehi reṇuvaṭṭi uggantvā upari kaṇṇikaṃ āhacca nipatamānā devatānaṃ tigāvutappamāṇaṃ attabhāvaṃ lākhāparikammasajjitaṃ viya karoti,
tika-vin01t1:1095_16: tesaṃ sā kīḷā catūhi māsehi pariyosānaṃ gacchati.
tika-vin01t1:1095_17: Iti imāhi sampattīhi samannāgataṃ tāvatiṃsabhavanaṃ bhagavā sabbathā avedīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1096_0: Tathā asurabhavananti ettha devā viya na suranti na īsaranti na virocantīti asurā.
tika-vin01t1:1096_3: Sakko kira macalagāmake magho nāma māṇavo hutvā tettiṃsa purise gahetvā kalyāṇakammaṃ karonto satta vattapadāni
tika-vin01t1:1096_4: pūretvā tattha kālakato devaloke nibbatti saddhiṃ parisāya.
tika-vin01t1:1096_6: sakkāraṃ nesaṃ karomā”ti vatvā dibbapadumāni upanāmesuṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1096_9: atha nevāsikā “āgantukadevaputtānaṃ sakkāraṃ karomā”ti gandhapānaṃ sajjayiṃsu.
tika-vin01t1:1096_10: Sakko sakaparisāya saññaṃ adāsi “mārisā mā gandhapānaṃ pivittha,
tika-vin01t1:1096_13: Nevāsikadevatā suvaṇṇasarakehi upanītaṃ gandhapānaṃ yāvadatthaṃ pivitvā mattā tattha tattha suvaṇṇapathaviyaṃ patitvā sayiṃsu.
tika-vin01t1:1096_15: haratha dhutte”ti te pādesu gāhāpetvā sinerupāde khipāpesi.
tika-vin01t1:1096_16: Sakkassa puññatejena tadanuvattakāpi sabbe tattheva patiṃsu.
tika-vin01t1:1096_17: Atha nesaṃ kammapaccayautusamuṭṭhānaṃ sinerussa heṭṭhimatale dasayojanasahassaṃ asurabhavanaṃ nibbatti
tika-vin01t1:1096_19: Sakko tesaṃ nivattitvā anāgamanatthāya ārakkhaṃ ṭhapesi.
tika-vin01t1:1098_0: Uragakaroṭipayassa ca hārī, madanayutā caturo ca mahatthā”ti. ;
tika-vin01t1:1099_0: Tattha dvinnaṃ ayujjhapurānanti dvinnaṃ devāsuranagarānaṃ antarāti attho.
tika-vin01t1:1099_1: Dve kira nagarāni yuddhena gahetuṃ asakkuṇeyyatāya ayujjhapurāni nāma jātāni.
tika-vin01t1:1099_3: atha devehi palāyitvā devanagaraṃ pavisitvā dvāre pihite asurānaṃ satasahassampi kiñci kātuṃ na sakkoti.
tika-vin01t1:1099_5: atha asurehi palāyitvā asuranagaraṃ pavisitvā dvāre pihite sakkānaṃ satasahassampi kiñci kātuṃ na sakkoti.
tika-vin01t1:1099_6: Iti imāni dve nagarāni ayujjhapurāni nāma.
tika-vin01t1:1099_7: Tesaṃ antarā etesu uragādīsu pañcasu ṭhānesu sakkena ārakkhā ṭhapitā.
tika-vin01t1:1099_11: Sinerussa kira samantato bahalato puthulato ca pañcayojanasahassaparimāṇāni cattāri paribhaṇḍāni tāvatiṃsabhavanassa
tika-vin01t1:1099_12: ārakkhāya nāgehi garuḷehi kumbhaṇḍehi yakkhehi ca adhiṭṭhitāni.
tika-vin01t1:1099_14: etāniyeva ca sinerussa ālindāni mekhalāni ca vuccanti.
tika-vin01t1:1099_25: Caturo ca mahatthāti cattāro mahārājāno vuttā.
tika-vin01t1:1099_26: Te hi sinerussa tasmiṃ tasmiṃ passe yugandharādīsu pañcasataparittadīpaparivāre mahādīpe ca sāsitabbassa
tika-vin01t1:1100_1: Tasmā antarā attānaṃ ajānitvā pāṭaliyā pupphitāya “nayidaṃ devanagaraṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1100_6: gacchāma tena saddhiṃ yujjhissāmā”ti hatthiassarathe āruyha suvaṇṇarajatamaṇiphalakāni gahetvā yuddhasajjā
tika-vin01t1:1100_7: hutvā asurabheriyo vādentā mahāsamudde udakaṃ dvidhā bhinditvā uṭṭhahanti.
tika-vin01t1:1100_8: Te deve vuṭṭhe vammikamakkhikā vammikaṃ viya sineruṃ abhiruhituṃ ārabhanti.
tika-vin01t1:1100_9: Atha nesaṃ paṭhamaṃ nāgehi saddhiṃ yuddhaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t1:1100_10: Tasmiṃ kho pana yuddhe na kassaci chavi vā cammaṃ vā chijjati,
tika-vin01t1:1100_12: kevalaṃ kumārakānaṃ dārumeṇḍakayuddhaṃ viya aññamaññaṃ santāsanamattameva hoti.
tika-vin01t1:1100_13: Koṭisatāpi koṭisahassāpi nāgā tehi saddhiṃ yujjhitvā asurapuraṃyeva pavesetvā nivattanti.
tika-vin01t1:1100_15: atha nāgā osakkitvā dutiye ālinde supaṇṇehi saddhiṃ ekato hutvā yujjhanti.
tika-vin01t1:1100_17: Yadā pana tāni pañcapi ṭhānāni asurā maddanti,
tika-vin01t1:1100_18: tadā ekato sampiṇḍitānipi tāni pañca balāni osakkanti.
tika-vin01t1:1100_19: Atha cattāro mahārājāno gantvā sakkassa pavattiṃ ārocenti.
tika-vin01t1:1100_20: Sakko tesaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā diyaḍḍhayojanasatikaṃ vejayantarathaṃ āruyha sayaṃ vā nikkhamati,
tika-vin01t1:1100_22: Ekasmiṃ pana divase evaṃ nikkhamitvā asure yuddhena abbhuggantvā samudde pakkhipitvā catūsu dvāresu attanā sadisā paṭimā māpetvā ṭhapeti,
tika-vin01t1:1100_23: tasmā asurā nāgādayo jinitvā āgatāpi indapaṭimā disvā “sakko nikkhanto”ti palāyanti.
tika-vin01t1:1100_27: Taṃ pana āyāmato ca vitthārato ca dasasahassayojananti dassetuṃ “tathā asurabhavana”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1101_2: avīcimahānirayo jambudīpo ca tathā dasasahassayojanamevāti attho.
tika-vin01t1:1101_3: Ettha ca avīcimahānirayassa abbhantaraṃ āyāmena ca vitthārena ca yojanasataṃ hoti,
tika-vin01t1:1101_4: lohapathavī lohachadanaṃ ekekā ca bhitti navanavayojanikā hoti.
tika-vin01t1:1101_5: Puratthimāya bhittiyā acci uṭṭhahitvā pacchimaṃ bhittiṃ gahetvā taṃ vinivijjhitvā parato yojanasataṃ gacchati.
tika-vin01t1:1101_7: Iti jālapariyantavasena āyāmavitthārato aṭṭhārasayojanādhikāni tīṇi yojanasatāni honti,
tika-vin01t1:1101_9: Samantā pana ussadehi saddhiṃ dasayojanasahassaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t1:1101_12: tattha ca aggijālānaṃ vā sattānaṃ vā dukkhassa vā antaraṃ natthi,
tika-vin01t1:1101_14: Tassa hi puratthimabhittito jālā uṭṭhahitvā saṃsibbamānayojanasataṃ gantvā bhittiṃ vinivijjhitvā parato yojanasataṃ gacchati.
tika-vin01t1:1101_17: Abbhantare panassa yojanasatike ṭhāne nāḷiyaṃ koṭṭetvā pūritatipupiṭṭhaṃ viya sattā nirantarā,
tika-vin01t1:1101_20: gacchantānaṃ ṭhitānaṃ nisinnānaṃ nipannānañca paccamānānaṃ anto natthi,
tika-vin01t1:1101_21: gacchantā ṭhite vā nisinne vā nipanne vā na bādhenti.
tika-vin01t1:1101_23: Kāyadvāre pana cha upekkhāsahagatāni cittāni uppajjanti,
tika-vin01t1:1101_25: Evaṃ santepi yathā jivhāgge cha madhubindūni ṭhapetvā ekasmiṃ tambalohabindumhi ṭhapite anudahanabalavatāya tadeva paññāyati,
tika-vin01t1:1101_28: itarāni abbohārikānīti evaṃ dukkhassa nirantaratāya avīcīti vuccati.
tika-vin01t1:1102_0: Jambudīpo pana āyāmato ca vitthārato ca dasasahassayojanaparimāṇo.
tika-vin01t1:1102_1: Tattha ca catusahassayojanappamāṇo padeso tadupabhogīsattānaṃ puññakkhayā udakena ajjhotthaṭo “samuddo”ti saṅkhyaṃ gato.
tika-vin01t1:1103_0: Aparagoyānaṃ sattasahassayojanantiādīsu āyāmato ca vitthārato ca pamāṇaṃ dassitanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1103_2: channavutiyā paṭṭanakoṭisatasahassehi chapaṇṇāsaratanāgārehi navanavutiyā doṇamukhasatasahassehi tikkhattuṃ tesaṭṭhiyā nagarasahassehi ca samannāgato.
tika-vin01t1:1103_3: Jambudīpe kira ādito tesaṭṭhimattāni nagarasahassāni uppannāni,
tika-vin01t1:1103_7: tato paraṃ asīti sahassāni ca nava sahassāni ca honti.
tika-vin01t1:1103_8: Doṇamukhanti ca mahānagarassa āyuppattiṭṭhānabhūtaṃ padhānagharaṃ vuccati.
tika-vin01t1:1104_0: Api cettha uttarakurukānaṃ puññānubhāvasiddho ayampi viseso veditabbo.
tika-vin01t1:1104_1: Tattha kira tesu tesu padesesu ghananicitapattasañchannasākhāpasākhā kūṭāgārupamā manoramā rukkhā tesaṃ manussānaṃ nivesanakiccaṃ sādhenti.
tika-vin01t1:1104_3: aññepi tattha rukkhā sujātā sabbadāpi pupphitaggā tiṭṭhanti.
tika-vin01t1:1104_4: Jalāsayāpi vikasitapadumapuṇḍarīkasogandhikādipupphasañchannā sabbakālaṃ paramasugandhā samantato pavāyantā tiṭṭhanti.
tika-vin01t1:1105_0: Sarīrampi tesaṃ atidīghatādidosarahitaṃ ārohapariṇāhasampannaṃ jarāya anabhibhūtattā valitapalitādidosavirahitaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1105_2: Anuṭṭhānaphalūpajīvitāya na ca tesaṃ kasivaṇijjādivasena āhārapariyeṭṭhivasena dukkhaṃ atthi,
tika-vin01t1:1105_5: Yathā nāmettha gimhānaṃ pacchime māse paccūsavelāyaṃ samasītuṇho utu hoti,
tika-vin01t1:1105_6: evameva sabbakālaṃ tattha samasītuṇhova utu hoti,
tika-vin01t1:1105_7: na ca nesaṃ koci upaghāto vihesā vā uppajjati.
tika-vin01t1:1106_0: Akaṭṭhapākimameva sāliṃ akaṇaṃ athusaṃ suddhaṃ sugandhaṃ taṇḍulaphalaṃ niddhūmaṅgārena agginā pacitvā paribhuñjanti.
tika-vin01t1:1106_2: atha te tayo pāsāṇe ṭhapetvā tattha ukkhaliṃ āropenti,
tika-vin01t1:1106_4: añño sūpo vā byañjano vā na hoti,
tika-vin01t1:1106_6: Taṃ pana bhuñjantānaṃ nesaṃ kuṭṭhaṃ gaṇḍo kilāso soso kāso apamāro jaroti evamādiko na koci rogo uppajjati.
tika-vin01t1:1106_9: buddhapaccekabuddhādayopi mahiddhikā tattha gantvā piṇḍapātaṃ gaṇhanti.
tika-vin01t1:1106_10: Na ca te khujjā vā vāmanā vā kāṇā vā kuṇī vā khañjā vā pakkhahatā vā vikalaṅgā vā vikalindriyā vā honti.
tika-vin01t1:1107_0: Itthiyopi tattha nātidīghā nātirassā nātikisā nātithūlā nātikāḷikā nāccodātā sobhaggappattarūpā honti.
tika-vin01t1:1107_1: Tathā hi dīghaṅgulī tambanakhā alambathanā tanumajjhā puṇṇacandamukhī visālakkhī mudugattā sahibhorū
tika-vin01t1:1107_2: odātadantā gambhīranābhī tanujaṅghā dīghanīlavellitakesī puthulasussoṇī nātilomā nālomā subhagā utusukhasamphassā
tika-vin01t1:1108_3: Sattāhikameva ca tattha itthipurisā kāmaratiyā viharanti,
tika-vin01t1:1108_5: na tattha idha viya gabbhokkantimūlakaṃ gabbhapariharaṇamūlakaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vijāyanamūlakaṃ vā dukkhaṃ hoti,
tika-vin01t1:1108_6: rattakañcukato kañcanapaṭimā viya dārakā mātukucchito amakkhitā eva semhādinā sukheneva nikkhamanti,
tika-vin01t1:1108_8: Mātā pana puttaṃ vā dhītaraṃ vā vijāyitvā tesaṃ vicaraṇakappadese ṭhapetvā anapekkhā yathāruci gacchati.
tika-vin01t1:1108_9: Tesaṃ tattha sayitānaṃ ye passanti purisā vā itthiyo vā,
tika-vin01t1:1108_13: Evaṃ pana vaḍḍhantā katipayadivaseyeva laddhabalā hutvā dārikā itthiyo upagacchanti,
tika-vin01t1:1109_0: Kapparukkhato eva ca tesaṃ tattha vatthābharaṇāni nipphajjanti.
tika-vin01t1:1109_1: Nānāvirāgavaṇṇavicittāni hi vatthāni sukhumāni mudusukhasamphassāni tattha tattha kapparukkhesu olambantāni tiṭṭhanti.
tika-vin01t1:1109_5: Tattha ca bahū phalarukkhā kumbhamattāni phalāni phalanti,
tika-vin01t1:1109_6: madhurarasāni yāni paribhuñjitvā te sattāhampi khuppipāsāhi na bādhīyanti.
tika-vin01t1:1110_0: Najjopi tattha suvisuddhajalā supatitthā ramaṇīyā akaddamā vālukatalā nātisītā nātiuṇhā surabhigandhīhi
tika-vin01t1:1110_1: jalajapupphehi sañchannā sabbakālaṃ surabhī vāyantiyo sandanti,
tika-vin01t1:1110_5: Nahāyitukāmā ca nadītitthe ekajjhaṃ vatthābharaṇāni ṭhapetvā nadiṃ otaritvā nahāyitvā uttiṇṇā uttiṇṇā
tika-vin01t1:1110_9: Tato eva na tesaṃ koci viggaho vā vivādo vā,
tika-vin01t1:1110_10: sattāhikā eva ca nesaṃ kāmaratikīḷā hoti,
tika-vin01t1:1111_0: Mate ca satte na rodanti na socanti,
tika-vin01t1:1111_2: Tāvadeva ca tathārūpā sakuṇā upagantvā mataṃ dīpantaraṃ nenti,
tika-vin01t1:1111_3: tasmā susānaṃ vā asuciṭṭhānaṃ vā tattha natthi,
tika-vin01t1:1111_4: na ca tato matā nirayaṃ vā tiracchānayoniṃ vā pettivisayaṃ vā upapajjanti.
tika-vin01t1:1111_5: “Dhammatāsiddhassa pañcasīlassa ānubhāvena te devaloke nibbattantī”ti vadanti.
tika-vin01t1:1111_7: sabbametaṃ nesaṃ pañcasīlaṃ viya dhammatāsiddhamevāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1112_1: Lokantarikanirayāti lokānaṃ lokadhātūnaṃ antaro vivaro lokantaro,
tika-vin01t1:1112_3: Tiṇṇañhi sakaṭacakkānaṃ pattānaṃ vā aññamaññaṃ āsannabhāvena ṭhapitānaṃ antarasadisesu tiṇṇaṃ tiṇṇaṃ cakkavāḷānaṃ antaresu ekeko lokantarikanirayo.
tika-vin01t1:1112_4: So pana parimāṇato aṭṭhayojanasahassappamāṇo hoti niccavivaṭo heṭṭhā upari ca kenaci na pihito.
tika-vin01t1:1112_5: Yathā hi heṭṭhā udakassa pidhāyikā pathavī natthīti asaṃvutā lokantarikanirayā,
tika-vin01t1:1112_6: evaṃ uparipi cakkavāḷesu viya devavimānānaṃ abhāvato asaṃvutā apihitā cakkhuviññāṇuppattinivāraṇasamatthena ca andhakārena samannāgatā.
tika-vin01t1:1112_7: Tattha kira cakkhuviññāṇaṃ na jāyati ālokassa abhāvato.
tika-vin01t1:1112_8: Tīsu dīpesu ekappahārena ālokakaraṇasamatthāpi candimasūriyā tattha ālokaṃ na dassenti.
tika-vin01t1:1112_9: Te hi yugandharasamappamāṇe ākāsappadese vicaraṇato cakkavāḷapabbatassa vemajjhena vicaranti,
tika-vin01t1:1112_11: tasmā te tattha ālokaṃ na dassentīti cakkhuviññāṇaṃ nuppajjati.
tika-vin01t1:1112_12: Yadā pana sabbaññubodhisattassa paṭisandhiggahaṇādīsu obhāso uppajjati,
tika-vin01t1:1112_14: “Aññepi kira bho santi sattā idhūpapannā”ti taṃ divasaṃ aññamaññaṃ passanti.
tika-vin01t1:1112_15: Ayaṃ pana obhāso ekaṃ yāgupānamattampi na tiṭṭhati,
tika-vin01t1:1112_16: accharāsaṅghāṭamattameva vijjobhāso viya niccharitvā “kiṃ ida”nti bhaṇantānaṃyeva antaradhāyati.
tika-vin01t1:1113_0: Kiṃ pana kammaṃ katvā tattha sattā nibbattantīti?
tika-vin01t1:1113_1: Bhāriyaṃ dāruṇaṃ garukaṃ mātāpitūnaṃ dhammikasamaṇabrāhmaṇānañca upari aparādhaṃ aññañca divase divase
tika-vin01t1:1113_2: pāṇavadhādiṃ sāhasikakammaṃ katvā uppajjanti tambapaṇṇidīpe abhayacoranāgacorādayo viya.
tika-vin01t1:1113_5: Te rukkhe vagguliyo viya nakhehi cakkavāḷapāde lagganti,
tika-vin01t1:1113_7: atha “bhakkho no laddho”ti maññamānā khādanatthaṃ gaṇhituṃ upakkamantā viparivattitvā lokasandhārake udake patanti,
tika-vin01t1:1113_8: vāte paharantepi madhukaphalāni viya chijjitvā udake patanti,
tika-vin01t1:1113_9: patitamattāva accantakhāre udake piṭṭhapiṇḍaṃ viya vilīyanti atisītalabhāvato ātapasantāpābhāvena.
tika-vin01t1:1113_11: Na hi taṃ kappasaṇṭhahanaudakaṃ sampattikaramahāmeghavuṭṭhaṃ pathavīsandhārakaṃ kappavināsakaudakaṃ viya khāraṃ bhavituṃ arahati.
tika-vin01t1:1113_13: tesaṃ vā pāpakammabalena petānaṃ pakatiudakassa pubbakheḷabhāvāpatti viya tassa udakassa tadā khārabhāvappatti
tika-vin01t1:1113_14: hotīti vuttaṃ “accantakhāre udake piṭṭhapiṇḍaṃ viya vilīyantī”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1114_2: Tāni ca bhagavā anantena buddhañāṇena avedi “ananto ākāso,
tika-vin01t1:1114_5: Tividhampi hi anantaṃ buddhañāṇena paricchindati sayampi anantattā.
tika-vin01t1:1114_13: Anantatā cassa anantañeyyappaṭivijjhaneneva veditabbā tattha appaṭihatacārattā.
tika-vin01t1:1114_14: Idāni yathāvuttamatthaṃ nigamento āha “evamassa okāsalokopi sabbathā vidito”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1115_1: tasmā vivaṭṭādayopi ādito pabhuti evaṃ veditabbā –
tika-vin01t1:1115_2: saṃvaṭṭo saṃvaṭṭaṭṭhāyī vivaṭṭo vivaṭṭaṭṭhāyīti kappassa cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni.
tika-vin01t1:1115_13: Tattha tayo saṃvaṭṭā tejosaṃvaṭṭo āposaṃvaṭṭo vāyosaṃvaṭṭoti.
tika-vin01t1:1116_0: Vitthārato pana tīsupi saṃvaṭṭakālesu ekaṃ buddhakkhettaṃ vinassati.
tika-vin01t1:1116_1: Buddhakkhettaṃ nāma tividhaṃ hoti jātikkhettaṃ āṇākkhettaṃ visayakkhettañca.
tika-vin01t1:1116_4: Yattake hi ṭhāne tathāgatassa paṭisandhiñāṇādiñāṇānubhāvo puññaphalasamuttejito saraseneva paṭivijambhati,
tika-vin01t1:1116_5: taṃ sabbampi buddhaṅkurassa nibbattanakkhettaṃ nāmāti buddhakkhettanti vuccati.
tika-vin01t1:1116_7: yattha ratanasuttaṃ khandhaparittaṃ dhajaggaparittaṃ āṭānāṭiyaparittaṃ moraparittanti imesaṃ parittānaṃ ānubhāvo vattati.
tika-vin01t1:1116_8: Iddhimā hi cetovasippatto āṇākkhettapariyāpanne yattha katthaci cakkavāḷe ṭhatvā attano atthāya parittaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1116_9: katvā tattheva aññaṃ cakkavāḷaṃ gatopi kataparitto eva hoti.
tika-vin01t1:1116_10: Ekacakkavāḷe ṭhatvā sabbasattānaṃ atthāya paritte kate āṇākkhette sabbasattānampi abhisambhuṇāteva parittānubhāvo
tika-vin01t1:1116_14: Anantāparimāṇesu hi cakkavāḷesu yaṃ yaṃ tathāgato ākaṅkhati,
tika-vin01t1:1116_16: Evametesu tīsu buddhakkhettesu ekaṃ āṇākkhettaṃ vinassati,
tika-vin01t1:1116_17: tasmiṃ pana vinassante jātikkhettaṃ vinaṭṭhameva hoti.
tika-vin01t1:1117_1: āditova kappavināsakamahāmegho uṭṭhahitvā koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷe ekaṃ mahāvassaṃ vassati,
tika-vin01t1:1117_3: sassesu pana gokhāyitamattesu jātesu gadrabharavaṃ ravanto ekabindumpi na vassati,
tika-vin01t1:1117_7: samayo yaṃ bahūni vassāni bahūni vassasatāni bahūni vassasahassāni bahūni vassasatasahassāni devo na vassatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1117_8: Vassūpajīvinopi sattā kālaṃ katvā parittābhādibrahmaloke nibbattanti,
tika-vin01t1:1117_10: Evaṃ dīghe addhāne vītivatte tattha tattha udakaṃ parikkhayaṃ gacchati,
tika-vin01t1:1117_11: athānupubbena macchakacchapāpi kālaṃ katvā brahmaloke nibbattanti nerayikasattāpi.
tika-vin01t1:1118_0: Jhānaṃ pana vinā natthi brahmaloke nibbatti,
tika-vin01t1:1118_5: Tadā hi “vassasatasahassassa accayena kappavuṭṭhānaṃ bhavissatī”ti lokabyūhā nāma kāmāvacaradevā muttasirā
tika-vin01t1:1118_6: vikiṇṇakesā rudammukhā assūni hatthehi puñchamānā rattavatthanivatthā ativiya virūpavesadhārino hutvā
tika-vin01t1:1118_7: manussapathe vicarantā evaṃ ārocenti “mārisā mārisā ito vassasatasahassassa accayena kappavuṭṭhānaṃ bhavissati,
tika-vin01t1:1118_10: ayañca mahāpathavī sineru ca pabbatarājā ḍayhissanti vinassissanti,
tika-vin01t1:1118_17: Te pana devā lokaṃ byūhenti sampiṇḍentīti “lokabyūhā”ti vuccanti.
tika-vin01t1:1118_18: Te kira disvā manussā yattha katthaci ṭhitāpi nisinnāpi saṃvegajātā sambhamappattāva hutvā tesaṃ āsanne ṭhāne sannipatanti.
tika-vin01t1:1119_4: Tesaṃ pana vacanaṃ sutvā yebhuyyena manussā ca bhummadevatā ca saṃvegajātā aññamaññaṃ muducittā hutvā mettādīni puññāni karitvā devaloke nibbattanti.
tika-vin01t1:1119_5: Tattha dibbasudhābhojanaṃ bhuñjitvā tato vāyokasiṇe parikammaṃ katvā jhānaṃ paṭilabhanti.
tika-vin01t1:1119_6: Devānaṃ kira sukhasamphassavātaggahaṇapaacayena vāyokasiṇe jhānāni sukheneva ijjhanti.
tika-vin01t1:1119_7: Tadaññe pana āpāyikā sattā aparāpariyavedanīyena kammena devaloke nibbattanti.
tika-vin01t1:1119_8: Aparāpariyavedanīyakammarahito hi saṃsāre saṃsaranto nāma satto natthi.
tika-vin01t1:1119_10: Evaṃ devaloke paṭiladdhajjhānavasena sabbepi brahmaloke nibbattanti.
tika-vin01t1:1120_0: Keci pana “apāyasattā saṃvaṭṭamānalokadhātūhi aññesu lokadhātūsupi nibbattanti.
tika-vin01t1:1120_1: Na hi sabbe apāyasattā tadā rūpārūpabhavesu uppajjantīti sakkā viññātuṃ apāyesu dīghāyukānaṃ devalokūpapattiyā asambhavato.
tika-vin01t1:1120_2: Niyatamicchādiṭṭhiko pana vinassamānepi kappe nirayato na muccatiyeva,
tika-vin01t1:1120_3: tasmā so tattha anibbattitvā piṭṭhicakkavāḷe nibbattati.
tika-vin01t1:1120_4: Niyatamicchādiṭṭhiyā hi samannāgatassa bhavato vuṭṭhānaṃ nāma natthi.
tika-vin01t1:1120_5: Tāya hi samannāgatassa neva saggo atthi, na maggo,
tika-vin01t1:1120_6: tasmā so saṃvaṭṭamānacakkavāḷato aññattha niraye nibbattitvā paccati.
tika-vin01t1:1120_7: Kiṃ pana piṭṭhicakkavāḷaṃ na jhāyatīti? Jhāyati.
tika-vin01t1:1120_8: Tasmiṃ jhāyamānepi esa ākāse ekasmiṃ padese paccatī”ti vadanti.
tika-vin01t1:1121_0: Vassūpacchedato pana uddhaṃ dīghassa addhuno accayena dutiyo sūriyo pātubhavati,
tika-vin01t1:1121_6: Yathā ca kappavuṭṭhānakālato pubbe uppannasūriyavimāne sūriyadevaputto hoti,
tika-vin01t1:1121_9: evaṃ sūriyadevaputtopi jhānaṃ nibbattetvā brahmalokaṃ upapajjati.
tika-vin01t1:1121_10: Sūriyamaṇḍalaṃ pana pabhassaratarañceva tejavantatarañca hutvā pavattati.
tika-vin01t1:1121_12: Tattha pakatisūriye vattamāne ākāse valāhakāpi dhūmasikhāpi vattanti,
tika-vin01t1:1121_13: kappavināsakasūriye vattamāne vigatadhūmavalāhakaṃ ādāsamaṇḍalaṃ viya nimmalaṃ nabhaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t1:1121_14: Ṭhapetvā pañca mahānadiyo sesakunnadiādīsu udakaṃ sussati.
tika-vin01t1:1122_0: Tatopi dīghassa addhuno accayena tatiyo sūriyo pātubhavati, yassa pātubhāvā mahānadiyopi sussanti.
tika-vin01t1:1123_0: Tatopi dīghassa addhuno accayena catuttho sūriyo pātubhavati,
tika-vin01t1:1123_1: yassa pātubhāvā himavati mahānadīnaṃ pabhavā sīhappapātadaho mandākinīdaho kaṇṇamuṇḍadaho rathakāradaho
tika-vin01t1:1123_2: anotattadaho chaddantadaho kuṇāladahoti ime satta mahāsarā sussanti.
tika-vin01t1:1124_0: Tatopi dīghassa addhuno accayena pañcamo sūriyo pātubhavati,
tika-vin01t1:1124_1: yassa pātubhāvā anupubbena mahāsamudde aṅgulipabbatemanamattampi udakaṃ na saṇṭhāti.
tika-vin01t1:1125_0: Tatopi dīghassa addhuno accayena chaṭṭho sūriyo pātubhavati,
tika-vin01t1:1125_1: yassa pātubhāvā sakalacakkavāḷaṃ ekadhūmaṃ hoti pariyādinnasinehaṃ dhūmena.
tika-vin01t1:1125_2: Yāya hi āpodhātuyā tattha tattha pathavīdhātu ābandhattā sampiṇḍitā hutvā tiṭṭhati,
tika-vin01t1:1126_0: Tatopi dīghassa addhuno accayena sattamo sūriyo pātubhavati,
tika-vin01t1:1126_1: yassa pātubhāvā sakalacakkavāḷaṃ ekajālaṃ hoti saddhiṃ koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷehi,
tika-vin01t1:1126_6: tattha tayopi brahmaloke jhāpetvā ābhassare āhacca tiṭṭhati.
tika-vin01t1:1126_9: Sabbasaṅkhāraparikkhayā pana sappitelajjhāpanaggisikhā viya chārikampi anavasesetvā nibbāyati.
tika-vin01t1:1126_10: Heṭṭhāākāsena saha upariākāso eko hoti mahandhakāro.
tika-vin01t1:1127_0: Evaṃ ekamasaṅkhyeyyaṃ ekaṅgaṇaṃ hutvā ṭhite lokasannivāse lokassa saṇṭhānatthāya devo vassituṃ ārabhati,
tika-vin01t1:1127_2: Tato kaṇamattā taṇḍulamattā muggamāsabadaraāmalakaeḷālukakumbhaṇḍaalābumattā udakadhārā hutvā anukkamena
tika-vin01t1:1127_4: yojanasatayojanasahassamattā hutvā koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷagabbhantaraṃ yāva avinaṭṭhabrahmalokā pūretvā antaradhāyati.
tika-vin01t1:1127_5: Taṃ udakaṃ heṭṭhā ca tiriyañca vāto samuṭṭhahitvā ghanaṃ karoti parivaṭumaṃ paduminīpatte udakabindusadisaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1128_0: Kathaṃ tāvamahantaṃ udakarāsiṃ ghanaṃ karotīti ce?
tika-vin01t1:1128_3: Taṃ evaṃ vātena sampiṇḍiyamānaṃ ghanaṃ kariyamānaṃ parikkhayamānaṃ anupubbena heṭṭhā otarati.
tika-vin01t1:1128_6: Cātumahārājikatāvatiṃsabhavanāni pana pathavīsambandhatāya na tāva pātubhavanti.
tika-vin01t1:1128_8: te taṃ pihitadvāre dhammakaraṇe ṭhitaudakamiva nirussāsaṃ katvā rumbhanti.
tika-vin01t1:1128_9: Madhurodakaṃ parikkhayaṃ gacchamānaṃ upari rasapathaviṃ samuṭṭhāpeti,
tika-vin01t1:1128_11: Sā vaṇṇasampannā ceva hoti gandharasasampannā ca nirudakapāyāsassa upari paṭalaṃ viya.
tika-vin01t1:1128_12: Ettha pana mahābodhipallaṅkaṭṭhānaṃ vinassamāne loke pacchā vinassati,
tika-vin01t1:1129_0: Tadā ca ābhassarabrahmaloke paṭhamatarābhinibbattā sattā āyukkhayā vā puññakkhayā vā tato cavitvā opapātikā hutvā idhūpapajjanti,
tika-vin01t1:1129_2: te taṃ rasapathaviṃ sāyitvā taṇhābhibhūtā āluppakārakaṃ paribhuñjituṃ upakkamanti.
tika-vin01t1:1129_6: Tato tesaṃ bhayaṃ nāsetvā sūrabhāvaṃ janayantaṃ paripuṇṇapaññāsayojanaṃ sūriyamaṇḍalaṃ pātubhavati.
tika-vin01t1:1129_7: Te taṃ disvā “ālokaṃ paṭilabhimhā”ti haṭṭhatuṭṭhā hutvā “amhākaṃ bhītānaṃ bhayaṃ nāsetvā sūrabhāvaṃ janayanto uṭṭhito,
tika-vin01t1:1129_8: tasmā sūriyo hotū”ti sūriyotvevassa nāmaṃ karonti.
tika-vin01t1:1130_0: Atha sūriye divasaṃ ālokaṃ katvā atthaṅgate “yampi ālokaṃ labhimha,
tika-vin01t1:1130_1: sopi no naṭṭho”ti puna bhītā honti.
tika-vin01t1:1130_4: Tesaṃ cittaṃ ñatvā viya ekūnapaññāsayojanaṃ candamaṇḍalaṃ pātubhavati.
tika-vin01t1:1130_5: Te taṃ disvā bhiyyoso mattāya haṭṭhatuṭṭhā hutvā “amhākaṃ chandaṃ ñatvā viya uṭṭhito,
tika-vin01t1:1130_6: tasmā cando hotū”ti candotvevassa nāmaṃ karonti.
tika-vin01t1:1131_0: Evaṃ candimasūriyesu pātubhūtesu nakkhattāni tārakarūpāni pātubhavanti,
tika-vin01t1:1131_3: candimasūriyānaṃ pātubhūtadivaseyeva sinerucakkavāḷahimavantapabbatā dīpasamuddā ca pātubhavanti.
tika-vin01t1:1131_4: Te ca kho apubbaṃ acarimaṃ phagguṇapuṇṇamadivaseyeva pātubhavanti. Kathaṃ?
tika-vin01t1:1131_5: Yathā nāma kaṅgubhatte paccamāne ekappahāreneva pubbuḷakā uṭṭhahanti,
tika-vin01t1:1132_0: Atha tesaṃ sattānaṃ rasapathaviṃ paribhuñjantānaṃ kammena ekacce vaṇṇavanto honti,
tika-vin01t1:1132_5: Atha nesaṃ teneva nayena sopi antaradhāyati,
tika-vin01t1:1132_8: akaṭṭhapāko sāli pātubhavati akaṇo athuso sugandho taṇḍulaphalo.
tika-vin01t1:1132_10: Te sāliṃ bhājane ṭhapetvā pāsāṇapiṭṭhiyaṃ ṭhapenti,
tika-vin01t1:1132_13: na tassa sūpena vā byañjanena vā karaṇīyaṃ atthi,
tika-vin01t1:1132_16: Tesaṃ taṃ oḷārikaṃ āhāraṃ āharayataṃ tato pabhuti muttakarīsaṃ sañjāyati.
tika-vin01t1:1132_17: Tathā hi rasapathavī bhūmipappaṭako padālatāti ime tāva paribhuttā sudhāhāro viya khudaṃ vinodetvā rasaharaṇīhi
tika-vin01t1:1132_21: Odano pana paribhutto rasaṃ vaḍḍhentopi vatthuno oḷārikabhāveneva nissandaṃ vissajjento passāvaṃ karīsañca uppādeti.
tika-vin01t1:1133_3: Purimattabhāvesu hi pavattaupacārajjhānānubhāvena yāva sattasantānesu kāmarāgo vikkhambhanavegena samito,
tika-vin01t1:1133_5: Yadā panassa vicchinnatāya bahalakāmarāgo laddhāvasaro ahosi,
tika-vin01t1:1133_6: tadā tadupanissayāni tāni sattānaṃ attabhāvesu sañjāyiṃsu,
tika-vin01t1:1133_11: Te asaddhammapaṭisevanapaccayā viññūhi garahiyamānā viheṭhiyamānā tassa asaddhammassa paṭicchādanahetu agārāni karonti.
tika-vin01t1:1133_12: Te agāraṃ ajjhāvasamānā anukkamena aññatarassa alasajātikassa sattassa diṭṭhānugatiṃ āpajjantā sannidhiṃ karonti.
tika-vin01t1:1133_13: Tato pabhuti kaṇopi thusopi taṇḍulaṃ pariyonandhanti,
tika-vin01t1:1134_0: Te sannipatitvā anutthunanti “pāpakā vata bho dhammā sattesu pātubhūtā,
tika-vin01t1:1134_4: athaññataro satto aññassa bhāgaṃ adinnaṃ ādiyati,
tika-vin01t1:1134_5: taṃ dvikkhattuṃ paribhāsetvā tatiyavāre pāṇileḍḍudaṇḍehi paharanti.
tika-vin01t1:1134_6: Te evaṃ adinnādāne kalahamusāvādadaṇḍādānesu uppannesu ca sannipatitvā cintayanti “yannūna mayaṃ ekaṃ sattaṃ sammanneyyāma,
tika-vin01t1:1134_11: Evaṃ katasanniṭṭhānesu pana sattesu imasmiṃ tāva kappe ayameva bhagavā bodhisattabhūto tena samayena
tika-vin01t1:1134_12: tesu sattesu abhirūpataro ca dassanīyataro ca mahesakkhataro ca buddhisampanno paṭibalo niggahapaggahaṃ kātuṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1134_16: dhammena samena paresaṃ rañjetīti rājāti tīhi nāmehi paññāyittha.
tika-vin01t1:1134_18: bodhisattova tattha ādipurisoti evaṃ bodhisattaṃ ādiṃ katvā khattiyamaṇḍale saṇṭhite anupubbena brāhmaṇādayopi vaṇṇā saṇṭhahiṃsu.
