tika-vin01t1:1135_11: Imāni cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni eko mahākappo hoti.
tika-vin01t1:1135_12: Evaṃ tāva agginā vināso ca saṇṭhahanañca veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1136_0: Yasmiṃ pana samaye kappo udakena nassati,
tika-vin01t1:1136_1: āditova kappavināsakamahāmegho vuṭṭhahitvāti pubbe vuttanayeneva vitthāretabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1136_5: So ādito sukhumaṃ sukhumaṃ vassanto anukkamena mahādhārāhi koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷānaṃ pūrento vassati.
tika-vin01t1:1136_8: Pathaviyā heṭṭhimantato pabhuti yāva dutiyajjhānabhūmiṃ udakaṃ gaṇhāti.
tika-vin01t1:1136_9: Tena hi khārudakena phuṭṭhaphuṭṭhā pathavīpabbatādayo udake pakkhittaloṇasakkharā viya vilīyanteva,
tika-vin01t1:1136_10: tasmā pathavīsandhārakaudakena saddhiṃ ekūdakameva taṃ hotīti keci.
tika-vin01t1:1136_11: Apare pana “pathavīsandhārakaudakaṃ taṃ sandhārakavāyukkhandhañca anavasesato vināsetvā sabbattha sayameva eko ghanabhūto tiṭṭhatī”ti vadanti,
tika-vin01t1:1136_13: Upari pana chapi brahmaloke vilīyāpetvā subhakiṇhe āhacca tiṭṭhati,
tika-vin01t1:1136_16: udakānugataṃ pana sabbaṃ saṅkhāragataṃ abhibhavitvā sahasā vūpasammati,
tika-vin01t1:1136_18: Heṭṭhāākāsena saha upariākāso eko hoti mahandhakāroti sabbaṃ vuttasadisaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1136_19: Kevalaṃ panidha ābhassarabrahmalokaṃ ādiṃ katvā loko pātubhavati.
tika-vin01t1:1136_29: Imāni cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni eko mahākappo hoti.
tika-vin01t1:1136_30: Evaṃ udakena vināso ca saṇṭhahanañca veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1137_1: āditova kappavināsakamahāmegho vuṭṭhahitvāti pubbe vuttanayeneva vitthāretabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1137_6: tato saṇharajaṃ sukhumavālikaṃ thūlavālikaṃ sakkharapāsāṇādayoti yāvakūṭāgāramatte pāsāṇe visamaṭṭhāne ṭhitamahārukkhe ca uṭṭhāpeti.
tika-vin01t1:1137_7: Te pathavito nabhamuggatā na puna patanti,
tika-vin01t1:1137_9: Athānukkamena heṭṭhā mahāpathaviyā vāto samuṭṭhahitvā pathaviṃ parivattetvā uddhaṃ mūlaṃ katvā ākāse khipati.
tika-vin01t1:1137_11: pabhijjitvā vātavegukkhittā ākāseyeva cuṇṇavicuṇṇā hutvā abhāvaṃ gacchanti.
tika-vin01t1:1137_12: Cakkavāḷapabbatampi sinerupabbatampi vāto ukkhipitvā ākāse khipati.
tika-vin01t1:1137_13: Te aññamaññaṃ abhihantvā cuṇṇavicuṇṇā hutvā vinassanti.
tika-vin01t1:1137_14: Etenevūpāyena bhūmaṭṭhakavimānāni ca ākāsaṭṭhakavimānāni ca vināsento chakāmāvacaradevaloke vināsetvā koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷāni vināseti.
tika-vin01t1:1137_17: sinerū sinerūhi aññamaññaṃ samāgantvā cuṇṇavicuṇṇā hutvā vinassanti.
tika-vin01t1:1137_19: navapi brahmaloke vināsetvā vehapphale āhacca tiṭṭhati.
tika-vin01t1:1137_20: Evaṃ pathavīsandhārakaudakena taṃsandhārakavātena ca saddhiṃ sabbasaṅkhāragataṃ vināsetvā sayampi vinassati avaṭṭhānassa kāraṇābhāvato.
tika-vin01t1:1137_21: Heṭṭhāākāsena saha upariākāso eko hoti mahandhakāroti sabbaṃ vuttasadisaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1137_22: Idha pana subhakiṇhabrahmalokaṃ ādiṃ katvā loko pātubhavati.
tika-vin01t1:1137_28: Evaṃ vātena vināso ca saṇṭhahanañca veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1138_1: Yadipi hi saṅkhārānaṃ ahetuko sarasanirodho vināsakābhāvato,
tika-vin01t1:1138_3: Yathā taṃ sattanikāyesūti bhājanalokassapi sahetukena vināsena bhavitabbaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1138_6: Yathā hi tattha nibbattanakasattānaṃ puññabalena paṭhamaṃ loko vivaṭṭati,
tika-vin01t1:1138_8: tasmā akusalamūlesu ussannesu evaṃ loko vinassati.
tika-vin01t1:1138_9: Yathā hi rāgadosamohānaṃ adhikabhāvena yathākkamaṃ rogantarakappo satthantarakappo dubbhikkhantarakappoti
tika-vin01t1:1138_10: ime tividhā antarakappā vivaṭṭaṭṭhāyimhi asaṅkhyeyyakappe jāyanti.
tika-vin01t1:1138_11: Evamete yathāvuttā tayo saṃvaṭṭā rāgādīnaṃ adhikabhāveneva honti.
tika-vin01t1:1139_2: Dose hi ussannatare adhikatarena dosena viya tikkhatarena khārudakena vināso yuttoti.
tika-vin01t1:1139_9: Evaṃ vinassantopi ca nirantarameva satta vāre agginā nassati,
tika-vin01t1:1139_12: aṭṭhame udakenāti evaṃ aṭṭhame aṭṭhame vāre vinassanto sattakkhattuṃ udakena vinassitvā puna satta vāre agginā nassati.
tika-vin01t1:1139_14: Etthantare udakena nassanavāraṃ sampattampi paṭibāhitvā laddhokāso vāto paripuṇṇacatusaṭṭhikappāyuke subhakiṇhe viddhaṃsento lokaṃ vināseti.
tika-vin01t1:1139_15: Ettha pana rāgo sattānaṃ bahulaṃ pavattatīti aggivasena bahuso lokavināso veditabbo.
tika-vin01t1:1139_16: Iti evaṃ imehi kāraṇehi vinassitvā saṇṭhahantaṃ saṇṭhahitvā ṭhitañca okāsalokaṃ bhagavā yāthāvato avedīti
tika-vin01t1:1140_0: Yaṃ pana heṭṭhā vuttaṃ “sabbathā viditalokattā lokavidū”ti,
tika-vin01t1:1140_1: idāni taṃ nigamento āha “evaṃ sabbathā viditalokattā lokavidū”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1140_4: parimāṇasaṇṭhānādippabhedato okāsalokassāti evaṃ sabbappakārena viditalokattāti attho.
tika-vin01t1:1141_0: Idāni anuttaroti padassa atthaṃ saṃvaṇṇento āha “attano pana guṇehī”tiādi.
tika-vin01t1:1141_6: Sadevake hi loke sadisakappopi nāma koci tathāgatassa natthi,
tika-vin01t1:1141_10: Abhibhavatīti sīlasampadāya upanissayabhūtānaṃ hirottappamettākaruṇānaṃ visesapaccayānaṃ saddhāsativīriyapaññānañca
tika-vin01t1:1141_11: ukkaṃsappattiyā samudāgamato paṭṭhāya na aññasādhāraṇo savāsanapaṭipakkhassa pahīnattā ukkaṃsapāramippatto
tika-vin01t1:1141_13: tena bhagavā sadevakaṃ lokaṃ aññadatthu abhibhuyya pavattati,
tika-vin01t1:1142_0: Yadi evaṃ kathaṃ tena sadevakaṃ lokaṃ abhibhavatīti?
tika-vin01t1:1142_2: Tampi hi visayato pavattito pavattiākārato ca uttaritarameva.
tika-vin01t1:1142_3: Tañhi anaññasādhāraṇaṃ satthu vimuttiguṇaṃ ārabbha pavattati,
tika-vin01t1:1142_4: pavattamānañca atakkāvacaraṃ paramagambhīraṃ saṇhaṃ sukhumaṃ sātisayaṃ paṭipakkhadhammānaṃ suppahīnattā suṭṭhu pākaṭaṃ vibhūtataraṃ katvā pavattati,
tika-vin01t1:1142_5: sammadeva ca vasībhāvassa pāpakattā bhavaṅgaparivāsassa ca atiparittakattā lahu lahu pavattatīti.
tika-vin01t1:1143_0: Evaṃ sīlādiguṇehi bhagavato uttaritarassa abhāvaṃ dassetvā idāni sadisassapi abhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “sīlaguṇenapi asamo”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1143_1: Tattha asamoti ekasmiṃ kāle natthi etassa sīlādiguṇena samo sadisoti asamo.
tika-vin01t1:1144_0: Na kho panāhaṃ bhikkhave samanupassāmītiādīsu mama samantacakkhunā hatthatale āmalakaṃ viya sabbaṃ lokaṃ passantopi tattha sadevake…pe…
tika-vin01t1:1144_1: pajāya attano attato sīlasampannataraṃ sampannatarasīlaṃ kañcipi puggalaṃ na kho pana passāmi tādisassa abhāvatoti adhippāyo.
tika-vin01t1:1146_2: sattā apadā vā dvipadā vā catuppadā vā bahuppadā vā rūpino vā arūpino vā saññino vā asaññino vā nevasaññīnāsaññino vā,
tika-vin01t1:1146_3: tathāgato tesaṃ aggamakkhāyati arahaṃ sammāsambuddho. Ye,
tika-vin01t1:1146_7: Agge kho pana pasannānaṃ aggo vipāko hotī”ti –
tika-vin01t1:1148_2: sadevamanussāya tathāgato abhibhū anabhibhūto aññadatthu daso vasavattī,
tika-vin01t1:1153_0: Mutto mocayataṃ aggo, tiṇṇo tārayataṃ varo.
tika-vin01t1:1159_2: Purisā ca te dammā cāti purisadammā.
tika-vin01t1:1159_9: Taṃ pana kāyasamādīhi yojanaṃ yathārahaṃ tadaṅgavinayādīsu patiṭṭhāpanaṃ hotīti āha “vinetīti vuttaṃ hotī”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1159_10: Adantāti idaṃ sabbena sabbaṃ damataṃ anupagatā purisadammāti vuttāti katvā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1159_11: Ye pana vippakatadammabhāvā sabbathā dametabbataṃ nātivattā,
tika-vin01t1:1159_15: paṭhamajjhānalābhino dutiyajjhānantiādinā tassa tassa uparūpari visesaṃ ācikkhanto ekadesena dantepi sameti.
tika-vin01t1:1159_16: Teneva vuttaṃ visuddhimagge “api ca so bhagavā visuddhasīlādīnaṃ paṭhamajjhānādīni sotāpannādīnañca uttarimaggappaṭipadaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1159_18: Atha vā sabbena sabbaṃ adantā ekadesena dantā ca idha adantaggahaṇeneva saṅgahitāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1160_0: Tiracchānapurisātiādīsu uddhaṃ anuggantvā tiriyaṃ añcitā gatā vaḍḍhitāti tiracchānā,
tika-vin01t1:1160_1: devamanussādayo viya uddhaṃ dīghaṃ ahutvā tiriyaṃ dīghāti attho.
tika-vin01t1:1161_2: ṭhānehi jambudīpakā manussā uttarakuruke ca manusse adhiggaṇhanti deve ca tāvatiṃse.
tika-vin01t1:1162_0: Tathā hi buddhā bhagavanto paccekabuddhā aggasāvakā mahāsāvakā cakkavattino aññe ca mahānubhāvā sattā tattheva uppajjanti.
tika-vin01t1:1162_1: Tehi samānarūpāditāya pana saddhiṃ parittadīpavāsīhi itaramahādīpavāsinopi manussātveva paññāyiṃsūti eke.
tika-vin01t1:1162_3: lobhādīhi ca alobhādīhi ca sahitassa manassa ussannatāya manussā.
tika-vin01t1:1162_5: tesu visesato lobhādayo alobhādayo ca ussannā,
tika-vin01t1:1162_8: tasmā lobhādīhi alobhādīhi ca sahitassa manassa ussannatāya parittadīpavāsīhi saddhiṃ catumahādīpavāsino sattavisesā manussāti vuccanti.
tika-vin01t1:1162_10: Manu nāma paṭhamakappiko lokamariyādāya ādibhūto hitāhitavidhāyako sattānaṃ pituṭṭhāniyo,
tika-vin01t1:1162_12: paccakkhato paramparāya ca tassa ovādānusāsaniyaṃ ṭhitā tassa puttasadisatāya manussā mānusāti ca vuccanti.
tika-vin01t1:1162_13: Tato eva hi te māṇavā “manujā”ti ca voharīyanti,
tika-vin01t1:1162_14: manussā ca te purisā cāti manussapurisā.
tika-vin01t1:1163_9: aggisikhadhūmasikhā sīhaḷadīpavāsino nibbisā katā dosavisassa vinodanena.
tika-vin01t1:1163_15: Etesaṃ pana damanaṃ tattha tattha vuttanayeneva sakkā viññātunti atippapañcabhāvato idha na vuccati.
tika-vin01t1:1163_16: Idañcettha suttaṃ vitthāretabbanti idaṃ kesīsuttaṃ “vinītā vicitrehi vinayanūpāyehī”ti etasmiṃ atthe
tika-vin01t1:1163_17: vitthāretabbaṃ yathārahaṃ saṇhādīhi upāyehi vinayanassa dīpanato.
tika-vin01t1:1164_4: ekapadabhāvena ca anaññasādhāraṇo satthu purisadammasārathibhāvo dassito hoti.
tika-vin01t1:1164_7: Tā hi aññamaññaṃ sambandhāpi asaṃkiṇṇabhāvena dissanti apadissanti,
tika-vin01t1:1164_11: Ekaṃyeva disaṃ dhāvatīti attano kāyaṃ aparivattantoti adhippāyo,
tika-vin01t1:1164_12: satthārā pana damitā purisadammā ekiriyāpatheneva aṭṭha disā dhāvanti.
tika-vin01t1:1164_14: Aṭṭha disāti ca nidassanamattametaṃ lokiyehi agatapubbaṃ nirodhasamāpattidisaṃ amatadisañca pakkhandanato.
tika-vin01t1:1165_3: Kammakilesavasena samparetabbato sammā gantabbato samparāyo, paraloko.
tika-vin01t1:1165_9: tesu tesu atthesu yo yo puggalo yaṃ yaṃ arahati,
tika-vin01t1:1165_11: Anusāsatīti vineti tasmiṃ tasmiṃ atthe patiṭṭhāpeti.
tika-vin01t1:1165_14: Hitupadesādivasena paripāletabbo sāsitabbo so etassa atthīti satthā satthavāho niruttinayena.
tika-vin01t1:1165_15: So viya bhagavāti āha “satthā viyāti satthā,
tika-vin01t1:1166_0: Idāni tamatthaṃ niddesapāḷinayena dassetuṃ “yathā satthavāho”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1166_4: Ruḷhīvasena pana itaropi araññappadeso tathā vuccati.
tika-vin01t1:1166_10: Atha vā uttāretīti khemantabhūmiṃ upanento tāreti.
tika-vin01t1:1166_13: hatthena pariggahetvā tāreti viya tāretīti attho.
tika-vin01t1:1166_14: Sabbampetaṃ tāraṇuttāraṇādi khemaṭṭhāne ṭhapanamevāti āha “khemantabhūmiṃ sampāpetī”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1166_16: Mahāgahanatāya mahānatthatāya dunnittharatāya ca jātiyeva kantāro jātikantāro,
tika-vin01t1:1167_10: Sare nimittaṃ aggahesīti “dhammo eso vuccatī”ti dhammasaññāya sare nimittaṃ gaṇhi,
tika-vin01t1:1167_12: Sannirumbhitvā aṭṭhāsīti tassa sīse daṇḍassa ṭhapitabhāvaṃ apassanto tattha daṇḍaṃ uppīḷetvā aṭṭhāsi.
tika-vin01t1:1167_13: Maṇḍūkopi daṇḍe ṭhapitepi uppīḷitepi dhammagatena pasādena vissaramakarontova kālamakāsi.
tika-vin01t1:1167_17: Tasmā attano purimabhavassa diṭṭhattā āha “are ahampi nāma idha nibbatto”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1167_18: Bhagavato pāde sirasā vandīti kataññutāsaṃvaḍḍhitena pemagāravabahumānena vandi.
tika-vin01t1:1168_0: Jānantova pucchīti mahājanassa kammaphalaṃ buddhānubhāvañca paccakkhaṃ kātukāmo bhagavā “ko me vandatī”ti gāthāya pucchi.
tika-vin01t1:1168_6: Yasasāti iminā edisena yasena ca parivārena ca.
tika-vin01t1:1168_10: Sabbā obhāsayaṃ disāti sabbā dasapi disā pabhāsento,
tika-vin01t1:1168_11: cando viya sūriyo viya ca ekobhāsaṃ ekālokaṃ karontoti attho.
tika-vin01t1:1169_0: Evaṃ pana bhagavatā pucchito devaputto attānaṃ pavedento “maṇḍūkohaṃ pure āsi”nti gāthamāha.
tika-vin01t1:1169_3: Udake maṇḍūkoti tena uddhumāyikādikassa thale maṇḍūkassa nivattanaṃ kataṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t1:1169_8: Udakacārīpi hi koci kacchapādi avārigocaropi hotīti “vārigocaro”ti visesetvā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1169_9: Tava dhammaṃ suṇantassāti brahmassarena karavīkarutamañjunā desentassa tava dhammaṃ “dhammo eso vuccatī”ti sare nimittaggāhavasena suṇantassa.
tika-vin01t1:1169_11: Avadhī vacchapālakoti vacche rakkhanto gopālakadārako mama samīpaṃ āgantvā daṇḍamolubbha tiṭṭhanto mama sīse daṇḍaṃ sannirumbhitvā maṃ māresīti attho.
tika-vin01t1:1170_0: Sitaṃ katvāti “tathā parittatarenapi puññānubhāvena evaṃ ativiya uḷārā lokiyalokuttarasampattiyo labbhantī”ti
tika-vin01t1:1170_1: pītisomanassajāto bhāsurataradhavaḷavipphurantadasanakhakiraṇāvaḷīhi bhiyyoso mattāya taṃ padesaṃ obhāsento
tika-vin01t1:1172_0: Ānubhāvañca me passa, vaṇṇaṃ passa jutiñca me.
tika-vin01t1:1173_0: “Ye ca te dīghamaddhānaṃ, dhammaṃ assosuṃ gotama;
tika-vin01t1:1174_0: Pattā te acalaṭṭhānaṃ, yattha gantvā na socare”ti. –
tika-vin01t1:1176_0: Yaṃ pana kiñcīti ettha yanti aniyamitavacanaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1176_3: Tasmā yaṃ kiñcīti ñeyyassa anavasesapariyādānaṃ kataṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t1:1176_5: Tena “sammāsambuddho”ti iminā saṅkhepato vitthārato ca satthu catusaccābhisambodho vutto.
tika-vin01t1:1176_6: Buddhoti pana iminā tadaññassapi ñeyyassa avabodho.
tika-vin01t1:1176_10: Vimokkhantikañāṇavasenāti ettha sabbaso paṭipakkhehi vimuccatīti vimokkho,
tika-vin01t1:1176_14: tasmiṃ laddhe laddhabbato tattha bhavaṃ vimokkhantikaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1178_21: vimokkhantikametaṃ buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ bodhiyā mūle saha sabbaññutaññāṇassa paṭilābhā sacchikā paññatti yadidaṃ buddho”ti –
tika-vin01t1:1179_1: Yasmā cettha tassā paṭisambhidāpāḷiyā bhedo natthi,
tika-vin01t1:1179_2: tasmā dvīsu ekenapi atthasiddhīti dassanatthaṃ “paṭisambhidānayo vā”ti aniyamattho vāsaddo vutto.
tika-vin01t1:1180_5: Sabbaññutāya buddhoti sabbadhammabujjhanasamatthāya buddhiyā buddhoti attho.
tika-vin01t1:1180_6: Sabbadassāvitāya buddhoti sabbadhammabodhanasamatthāya buddhiyā buddhoti attho.
tika-vin01t1:1180_7: Anaññaneyyatāya buddhoti aññena abodhito sayameva buddhattā buddhoti attho.
tika-vin01t1:1180_8: Visavitāya buddhoti nānāguṇavisavanato padumamiva vikasanaṭṭhena buddhoti attho.
tika-vin01t1:1180_9: Khīṇāsavasaṅkhātena buddhoti evamādīhi chahi padehi cittasaṅkocakaradhammappahānena niddākkhayavibuddho
tika-vin01t1:1180_10: puriso viya sabbakilesaniddākkhayavibuddhattā buddhoti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t1:1180_11: Tattha saṅkhā saṅkhātanti atthato ekattā saṅkhātenāti vacanassa koṭṭhāsenāti attho.
tika-vin01t1:1180_13: Savāsanānaṃ sabbakilesānaṃ pahīnattā ekantavacaneneva visesetvā “ekantavītarāgo”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1180_15: Ekāyanamaggaṃ gatoti buddhoti gamanatthānaṃ buddhiatthatā viya buddhiatthānampi gamanatthatā labbhatīti
tika-vin01t1:1180_17: Eko anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddhoti buddhoti na parehi buddhattā buddho,
tika-vin01t1:1180_18: atha kho sayameva anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddhattā buddhoti attho.
tika-vin01t1:1180_19: Abuddhivihatattā buddhipaṭilābhā buddhoti buddhi buddhaṃ bodhoti anatthantaraṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1180_22: Tato paraṃ buddhoti netaṃ nāmantiādi atthānugatāyaṃ paññattīti bodhanatthaṃ vuttanti evamettha imināpi kāraṇena bhagavā buddhoti veditabbo.
tika-vin01t1:1181_0: Idāni bhagavāti imassa atthaṃ dassento āha “bhagavāti idaṃ panassā”tiādi.
tika-vin01t1:1181_2: Guṇavisiṭṭhasattuttamagarugāravādhivacananti sabbehi sīlādiguṇehi visiṭṭhassa tato eva sabbasattehi uttamassa
tika-vin01t1:1181_5: niravasesahitasukhavidhānatapparāya niratisayāya payogasampattiyā sadevamanussāya pajāya accantupakāritāya
tika-vin01t1:1181_6: ca aparimāṇāsu lokadhātūsu aparimāṇānaṃ sattānaṃ uttamaṃ gāravaṭṭhānanti.
tika-vin01t1:1182_0: Bhagavāti vacanaṃ seṭṭhanti seṭṭhavācakaṃ vacanaṃ seṭṭhaguṇasahacaraṇato “seṭṭha”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1183_0: Guṇavisesahetukaṃ “bhagavā”ti idaṃ bhagavato nāmanti saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ vitthārato vibhajitukāmo
tika-vin01t1:1183_2: Tattha āvatthikanti avatthāya viditaṃ taṃ taṃ avatthaṃ upādāya paññattaṃ voharitaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1183_3: Tathā liṅgikaṃ tena tena liṅgena voharitaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1183_7: Idāni āvatthikādīni nāmāni sarūpato dassento āha “tattha vaccho dammo balibaddo”tiādi.
tika-vin01t1:1183_9: saddena bālo yuvā vuḍḍhoti evamādiṃ saṅgaṇhāti,
tika-vin01t1:1183_13: Nemittikanti vuttamatthaṃ byatirekavasena patiṭṭhāpetuṃ “na mahāmāyāyā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1183_14: Vimokkhantikanti iminā pana idaṃ nāmaṃ ariyāya jātiyā jātakkhaṇeyeva jātanti dasseti.
tika-vin01t1:1183_16: atha kasmā aññehi khīṇāsavehi asādhāraṇanti āha “saha sabbaññutaññāṇassa paṭilābhā”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1183_17: Buddhānañhi arahattaphalaṃ nipphajjamānaṃ sabbaññutaññāṇādīhi sabbehi buddhaguṇehi saddhiṃyeva nipphajjati.
tika-vin01t1:1183_19: Sacchikā paññattīti sabbadhammānaṃ sacchikiriyāya nimittā paññatti.
tika-vin01t1:1183_20: Atha vā sacchikā paññattīti paccakkhasiddhā paññatti.
tika-vin01t1:1183_23: taṃguṇā viya sāpi sacchikatā eva nāma hoti,
tika-vin01t1:1184_3: Maggaphalādiariyadhammaratanaṃ araññavanapatthāni pantāni senāsanāni appasaddādiguṇayuttāni bhaji sevi sīlenāti bhajī,
tika-vin01t1:1184_5: Bhāgīti cīvarapiṇḍapātādīnaṃ catunnaṃ paccayānañceva atthadhammavimuttirasassa ca adhisīlādīnañca bhāgīti attho.
tika-vin01t1:1184_7: Akāsi bhagganti rāgādipāpadhammaṃ bhaggaṃ akāsīti bhagavāti attho.
tika-vin01t1:1186_11: bhaji vā bhagavā araññavanapatthāni pantāni senāsanāni appasaddāni appanigghosāni vijanavātāni manussarāhasseyyakāni paṭisallānasāruppānīti bhagavā.
tika-vin01t1:1186_13: Bhāgī vā bhagavā attharasassa dhammarasassa vimuttirasassa adhisīlassa adhicittassa adhipaññāyāti bhagavā.
tika-vin01t1:1186_14: Bhāgī vā bhagavā catunnaṃ jhānānaṃ catunnaṃ appamaññānaṃ catunnaṃ arūpasamāpattīnanti bhagavā.
tika-vin01t1:1186_15: Bhāgī vā bhagavā aṭṭhannaṃ vimokkhānaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ abhibhāyatanānaṃ navannaṃ anupubbavihārasamāpattīnanti bhagavā.
tika-vin01t1:1186_16: Bhāgī vā bhagavā dasannaṃ saññābhāvanānaṃ dasannaṃ kasiṇasamāpattīnaṃ ānāpānassatisamādhissa asubhasamāpattiyāti bhagavā.
tika-vin01t1:1186_17: Bhāgī vā bhagavā catunnaṃ satipaṭṭhānānaṃ catunnaṃ sammappadhānānaṃ catunnaṃ iddhipādānaṃ pañcannaṃ indriyānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1186_18: pañcannaṃ balānaṃ sattannaṃ bojjhaṅgānaṃ ariyassa aṭṭhaṅgikassa maggassāti bhagavā.
tika-vin01t1:1186_19: Bhāgī vā bhagavā dasannaṃ tathāgatabalānaṃ catunnaṃ vesārajjānaṃ catunnaṃ paṭisambhidānaṃ channaṃ abhiññānaṃ channaṃ buddhadhammānanti bhagavā.
tika-vin01t1:1187_0: Ettha ca “gāravādhivacana”ntiādīni yadipi gāthāyaṃ āgatapadānukkamena na niddiṭṭhāni,
tika-vin01t1:1187_1: yathārahaṃ pana tesaṃ sabbesampi niddesabhāvena veditabbāni.
tika-vin01t1:1187_10: Vimuttāyatanasīse hi ṭhatvā dhammaṃ kathentassa suṇantassa ca tadatthaṃ ārabbha uppajjanakapītisomanassaṃ attharaso.
tika-vin01t1:1187_16: Channaṃ buddhadhammānanti cha asādhāraṇañāṇāni sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1188_0: Yadipi “bhāgyavā”tiādīhi padehi vuccamāno attho “bhagī bhajī”ti niddesagāthāya saṅgahito eva,
tika-vin01t1:1188_1: tathāpi padasiddhiatthavibhāgaatthayojanādisahito saṃvaṇṇanānayo tato aññākāroti vuttaṃ “ayaṃ pana aparo nayo”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1188_3: tena vaṇṇavikāro vaṇṇalopo dhātuatthena niyojanañcāti imaṃ tividhaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-vin01t1:1188_12: itarampi vā vivaṭṭupanissayaṃ pariyāyato lokuttarasukhanibbattakaṃ siyā.
tika-vin01t1:1189_0: Idāni bhagavāti imassa atthaṃ vibhajitvā dassento āha “yasmā panā”tiādi.
tika-vin01t1:1189_6: “Akkocchi maṃ avadhi ma”ntiādinā punappunaṃ kujjhanavasena cittapariyonandhano upanāho.
tika-vin01t1:1189_14: Agāriyopi hi kenaci anukampakena daliddo samāno ucce ṭhāne ṭhapito aparena samayena “kiṃ tayā mayhaṃ kata”nti tassa sukatakaraṇaṃ vināseti.
tika-vin01t1:1189_15: Anagāriyopi sāmaṇerakālato pabhuti ācariyena vā upajjhāyena vā catūhi paccayehi uddesaparipucchādīhi
tika-vin01t1:1189_16: ca anuggahetvā dhammakathānayappakaraṇakosallādīni sikkhāpito aparena samayena rājarājamahāmattādīhi
tika-vin01t1:1189_17: sakkato garukato ācariyupajjhāyesu acittīkato caramāno “ayaṃ amhehi daharakāle evaṃ anuggahito saṃvaḍḍhito ca,
tika-vin01t1:1189_18: atha ca panidāni nissineho jāto”ti vuccamāno “kiṃ mayhaṃ tumhehi kata”nti tesaṃ sukatakaraṇaṃ vināseti,
tika-vin01t1:1189_19: tasseso pubbakāritālakkhaṇassa guṇassa vināsano udakapuñchaniyā viya sarīrānugataṃ udakaṃ nipuñchanto makkho.
tika-vin01t1:1189_20: Tathā hi so paresaṃ guṇānaṃ makkhanaṭṭhena “makkho”ti vuccati.
tika-vin01t1:1189_22: parassa guṇe dassetvā attano guṇehi same karotīti attho.
tika-vin01t1:1189_23: So pana bahussutepi puggale ajjhottharitvā “īdisassa ca bahussutassa aniyatā gati,
tika-vin01t1:1189_24: tava vā mama vā ko viseso”ti,
tika-vin01t1:1189_25: rattaññū cirapabbajite puggale ajjhottharitvā “tvampi imasmiṃ sāsane pabbajito,
tika-vin01t1:1190_1: Attano sampattiyā nigūhanaṃ parehi sādhāraṇabhāvaṃ asahamānaṃ macchariyaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1190_4: Tathā hi sā attano vijjamānadosapaṭicchādanato cakkhumohanamāyā viyāti “māyā”ti vuccati.
tika-vin01t1:1190_7: Kerāṭiko hi puggalo āyanamaccho viya hoti.
tika-vin01t1:1190_11: evameva kerāṭiko puggalo yaṃ yaṃ suttantikaṃ vā ābhidhammikaṃ vā upasaṅkamati,
tika-vin01t1:1190_12: taṃ taṃ evaṃ vadati “ahaṃ tumhākaṃ antevāsī,
tika-vin01t1:1191_0: Sabbaso maddavābhāvena vātabharitabhastasadisassa thaddhabhāvassa anonamitadaṇḍasadisatāya paggahitasiraanivātavuttikāyassa ca kārako thambho.
tika-vin01t1:1191_2: So duvidhena labbhati akusalavasena ceva kusalavasena ca.
tika-vin01t1:1191_3: Tattha agāriyassa parena kataṃ alaṅkārādiṃ disvā taddiguṇataddiguṇakaraṇena uppajjamāno,
tika-vin01t1:1191_4: anagāriyassa ca yattakaṃ yattakaṃ paro pariyāpuṇāti vā katheti vā,
tika-vin01t1:1191_6: Tena hi samannāgato puggalo taddiguṇaṃ taddiguṇaṃ karoti.
tika-vin01t1:1191_7: Agāriyo samāno ekenekasmiṃ gharavatthusmiṃ sajjite aparo dve vatthūni sajjeti,
tika-vin01t1:1191_11: Anagāriyo samāno ekenekasmiṃ nikāye gahite “nāhaṃ etassa heṭṭhā bhavissāmī”ti aparo dve gaṇhāti,
tika-vin01t1:1191_17: Agāriyassa pana paraṃ ekaṃ salākabhattaṃ dentaṃ disvā attano dve vā tīṇi vā dātukāmatāya uppajjamāno,
tika-vin01t1:1191_18: anagāriyassa ca parena ekanikāye gahite mānaṃ anissāya kevalaṃ taṃ disvā attano ālasiyaṃ abhibhuyya dve nikāye gahetukāmatāya uppajjamāno kusalo.
tika-vin01t1:1191_19: Kusalapakkhavasena hi ekasmiṃ ekaṃ salākabhattaṃ dente dve,
tika-vin01t1:1191_21: Bhikkhunāpi parena ekasmiṃ nikāye gahite “dve nikāye gahetvā sajjhāyantassa me phāsu hotī”ti vivaṭṭapakkhe ṭhatvā taduttari gaṇhituṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin01t1:1192_0: Jātiādīni nissāya seyyassa “seyyohamasmī”tiādinā unnativasena paggaṇhanavasena pavatto māno.
tika-vin01t1:1192_2: Pubbe kenaci attānaṃ sadisaṃ katvā pacchā tato adhikato dahato uppajjamānako atimānoti veditabbo.
tika-vin01t1:1192_5: So pana jātimado gottamado ārogyamado yobbanamado jīvitamado lābhamado sakkāramado garukāramado purekkhāramado
tika-vin01t1:1192_6: parivāramado bhogamado vaṇṇamado sutamado paṭibhānamado rattaññumado piṇḍapātikamado anavaññattimado
tika-vin01t1:1192_7: iriyāpathamado iddhimado yasamado sīlamado jhānamado sippamado ārohamado pariṇāhamado saṇṭhānamado pāripūrimadoti
tika-vin01t1:1193_0: Tattha jātiṃ nissāya uppanno majjanākārappavatto māno jātimado,
tika-vin01t1:1193_6: Gottaṃ nissāya uppanno majjanākārappavatto māno gottamado,
tika-vin01t1:1193_12: Vessopi suddopi attano attano kulagottaṃ nissāya mānaṃ karoti.
tika-vin01t1:1193_15: kaṇḍuvanamattampi mayhaṃ byādhi nāma natthī”ti majjanavasena uppanno māno ārogyamado nāma.
tika-vin01t1:1193_18: ahaṃ pana paṭhamavaye ṭhito”ti majjanavasena uppanno māno yobbanamado.
tika-vin01t1:1193_24: sukhaṃ jīvissāmī”ti majjanavasena uppanno māno jīvitamado nāma.
tika-vin01t1:1193_27: mayhaṃ pana lābhassa pamāṇaṃ natthī”ti majjanavasena uppanno māno lābhamado nāma.
tika-vin01t1:1194_0: “Avasesā sattā yaṃ vā taṃ vā labhanti,
tika-vin01t1:1194_1: ahaṃ pana sukataṃ paṇītaṃ cīvarādipaccayaṃ labhāmī”ti majjanavasena uppanno māno sakkāramado nāma.
tika-vin01t1:1194_2: “Avasesabhikkhūnaṃ pādapiṭṭhiyaṃ akkamitvā gacchantā manussā ‘ayaṃ samaṇo’tipi na vandanti,
tika-vin01t1:1194_4: pāsāṇacchattaṃ viya garukaṃ katvā aggikkhandhaṃ viya ca durāsadaṃ katvā maññantī”ti majjanavasena uppanno māno garukāramado nāma.
tika-vin01t1:1194_6: bhikkhācāraṃ gacchantāpi āgacchantāpi mameva purato katvā parivāretvā gacchantī”ti majjanavasena uppanno māno purekkhāramado nāma.
tika-vin01t1:1194_7: Agāriyassa tāva mahāparivārassa “purisasatampi purisasahassampi maṃ parivāretī”ti,
tika-vin01t1:1194_10: ahaṃ mahāparivāro ceva suciparivāro cā”ti majjanavasena uppanno māno parivāramado nāma.
tika-vin01t1:1194_12: mayhaṃ pana nidhānagatasseva dhanassa pamāṇaṃ natthī”ti majjanavasena uppanno māno bhogamado nāma.
tika-vin01t1:1194_15: mayhaṃ pana kittisaddo devamanussesu pākaṭo ‘itipi thero bahussuto,
tika-vin01t1:1194_18: evaṃ sarīravaṇṇaṃ guṇavaṇṇañca paṭicca majjanavasena uppanno māno vaṇṇamado nāma.
tika-vin01t1:1195_1: ahaṃ pana bahussuto”ti majjanavasena uppanno māno sutamado nāma.
tika-vin01t1:1195_3: mayhaṃ pana paṭibhānassa pamāṇaṃ natthī”ti majjanavasena uppanno māno paṭibhānamado nāma.
tika-vin01t1:1195_4: “Ahaṃ rattaññū asukaṃ buddhavaṃsaṃ rājavaṃsaṃ janapadavaṃsaṃ gāmavaṃsaṃ rattindivaparicchedaṃ nakkhattamuhuttayogaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1195_5: jānāmī”ti majjanavasena uppanno māno rattaññumado nāma.
tika-vin01t1:1195_7: ahaṃ pana jātipiṇḍapātiko”ti majjanavasena uppanno māno piṇḍapātikamado nāma.
tika-vin01t1:1195_9: ahaṃ pana anavaññāto”ti majjanavasena uppanno māno anavaññattimado nāma.
tika-vin01t1:1195_11: mayhaṃ pana pāsādiko”ti majjanavasena uppanno māno iriyāpathamado nāma.
tika-vin01t1:1195_13: ahaṃ pana mahiddhiko mahānubhāvo”ti vā “ahaṃ yaṃ yaṃ kammaṃ karomi,
tika-vin01t1:1195_14: taṃ taṃ ijjhatī”ti vā majjanavasena uppanno māno iddhimado nāma.
tika-vin01t1:1196_1: Agārikopi hi ekacco aṭṭhārasasu seṇīsu ekissā jeṭṭhako hoti,
tika-vin01t1:1196_6: ahaṃ jeṭṭhako”ti majjanavasena uppanno māno yasamado nāma.
tika-vin01t1:1196_8: ahaṃ pana sīlavā”ti majjanavasena uppanno māno sīlamado nāma.
tika-vin01t1:1196_9: “Avasesānaṃ sattānaṃ kukkuṭassa udakapānamattepi kāle cittekaggatā natthi,
tika-vin01t1:1196_10: ahaṃ pana upacārappanānaṃ lābhī”ti majjanavasena uppanno māno jhānamado nāma.
tika-vin01t1:1196_12: ahaṃ sippavā”ti majjanavasena uppanno māno sippamado nāma.
tika-vin01t1:1196_14: ahaṃ dīgho”ti majjanavasena uppanno māno ārohamado nāma.
tika-vin01t1:1196_15: “Avasesā sattā rassā vā honti dīghā vā,
tika-vin01t1:1196_16: ahaṃ nigrodhaparimaṇḍalo”ti majjanavasena uppanno māno pariṇāhamado nāma.
tika-vin01t1:1196_18: mayhaṃ pana manāpaṃ pāsādika”nti majjanavasena uppanno māno saṇṭhānamado nāma.
tika-vin01t1:1196_20: mayhaṃ pana sarīre kesaggamattampi vajjaṃ natthī”ti majjanavasena uppanno māno pāripūrimado nāma.
tika-vin01t1:1196_21: Evamayaṃ sabbopi jātiādiṃ nissāya majjanākāravasappavatto māno idha “mado”ti vutto.
tika-vin01t1:1196_23: pañcasu kāmaguṇesu satiyā aniggaṇhitvā cittassa vossajjanaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1197_0: Lobhādayo ca puna tividhākusalamūlanti tikavasena gahitā.
tika-vin01t1:1197_11: moho visama”nti evaṃ vuttā rāgādayo “kāyavisamaṃ vacīvisamaṃ manovisama”nti evamāgatā kāyaduccaritādayo ca tividhavisamāni.
tika-vin01t1:1197_12: Tāni pana yasmā rāgādīsu ceva kāyaduccaritādīsu ca sattā pakkhalanti,
tika-vin01t1:1197_15: “Kāmasaññā byāpādasaññā vihiṃsāsaññā”ti evamāgatā kāmādipaṭisaṃyuttā saññā tividhasaññā.
tika-vin01t1:1198_2: Tattha aniccādīni vatthūni niccantiādinā nayena viparītato esantīti vipariyesā.
tika-vin01t1:1198_6: anattani attāti saññāvipariyeso cittavipariyeso diṭṭhivipariyeso”ti evamāgatā dvādasa vipallāsā catunnaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1198_8: Ettha pana cittakiccassa dubbalaṭṭhāne diṭṭhivirahitāya akusalasaññāya sakakiccassa balavakāle saññāvipallāso veditabbo,
tika-vin01t1:1198_14: Ajātabuddhidārakassa kahāpaṇadassanaṃ viya saññā ārammaṇassa upaṭṭhānākāramattagahaṇato.
tika-vin01t1:1198_15: Gāmikapurisassa kahāpaṇadassanaṃ viya cittaṃ lakkhaṇappaṭivedhassapi sampādanato.
tika-vin01t1:1198_16: Kammārassa mahāsaṇḍāsena ayogahaṇaṃ viya diṭṭhi abhinivesaparāmasanato.
tika-vin01t1:1198_18: aniccānattesu niccantiādivasappavattā cattāro saññācittavipallāsāti ime aṭṭha vipallāsā sotāpattimaggena pahīyanti.
tika-vin01t1:1198_19: Asubhe subhanti saññācittavipallāsā sakadāgāmimaggena tanukā honti,
tika-vin01t1:1198_21: Dukkhe sukhanti saññācittavipallāsā arahattamaggena pahīyantīti veditabbā.
tika-vin01t1:1199_0: “Kāmāsavo bhavāsavo diṭṭhāsavo avijjāsavo”ti evamāgatā kāmataṇhādayo cattāro āsavanti cakkhuādito sandanti pavattantīti āsavā.
tika-vin01t1:1199_2: kāmāsavādayo eva pana vaṇato yūsaṃ viya paggharaṇakaasucibhāvena sandanti,
tika-vin01t1:1199_6: okāsato yāva bhavaggaṃ savanti gacchanti ārammaṇakaraṇavasena pavattantīti āsavā,
tika-vin01t1:1199_7: ete dhamme etañca okāsaṃ antokaritvā pavattantīti attho.
tika-vin01t1:1199_10: Tattha mariyādaṃ kiriyaṃ bahikatvā pavattati yathā “āpāṭaliputtaṃ vuṭṭho devo”ti,
tika-vin01t1:1199_11: abhividhi pana kiriyaṃ byāpetvā pavattati yathā “ābhavaggaṃ bhagavato yaso pavattatī”ti,
tika-vin01t1:1199_14: tasmā te dhamme tañca okāsaṃ antokaritvā ārammaṇakaraṇavasena savantīti “āsavā”ti vuccanti.
tika-vin01t1:1199_23: Aññesu pana yathāvutte dhamme okāsañca ārammaṇaṃ katvā pavattamānesu mānādīsu ca vijjamānesu attattaniyādiggāhavasena
tika-vin01t1:1199_25: na aññesanti dvīsupi atthavikappesu etesuyeva āsavasaddo niruḷhoti daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin01t1:1199_26: Āyataṃ vā saṃsāradukkhaṃ savanti pasavantītipi āsavā.
tika-vin01t1:1199_27: Na hi taṃ kiñci saṃsāradukkhaṃ atthi,
tika-vin01t1:1200_0: “Abhijjhā kāyagantho byāpādo kāyagantho sīlabbataparāmāso kāyagantho idaṃsaccābhiniveso kāyagantho”ti
tika-vin01t1:1200_2: taṃ cutipaṭisandhivasena vaṭṭasmiṃ ganthenti ghaṭentīti ganthā.
tika-vin01t1:1200_3: “Kāmogho bhavogho diṭṭhogho avijjogho”ti evamāgatā cattāro kāmataṇhādayo yassa saṃvijjanti,
tika-vin01t1:1200_5: Teyeva “kāmayogo bhavayogo diṭṭhiyogo avijjāyogo”ti evamāgatā vaṭṭasmiṃ yojentīti yogā.
tika-vin01t1:1200_10: itibhavābhavahetu vā bhikkhuno taṇhā uppajjamānā uppajjatī”ti evamāgatā cattāro taṇhuppādā.
tika-vin01t1:1200_11: Tattha itibhavābhavahetūti ettha itīti nidassane nipāto,
tika-vin01t1:1201_2: sabrahmacārīsu kupito hoti anattamano āhatacitto khilajāto”ti evamāgatāni pañca cetokhilāni,
tika-vin01t1:1201_3: ceto khilayati thaddhabhāvaṃ āpajjati etehīti cetokhilāni.
tika-vin01t1:1201_9: yāvadatthaṃ udarāvadehakaṃ bhuñjitvā seyyasukhaṃ passasukhaṃ middhasukhaṃ anuyutto viharati,
tika-vin01t1:1201_10: aññataraṃ devanikāyaṃ paṇidhāya brahmacariyaṃ caratī”ti āgatā pañca cittaṃ bandhitvā muṭṭhiyaṃ katvā viya gaṇhantīti cetovinibandhā.
tika-vin01t1:1201_11: Ete hi taṇhāppavattibhāvato kusalappavattiyā avasarāppadānavasena cittaṃ bandhaṃ viya samorodhetvā gaṇhanti.
tika-vin01t1:1201_12: Saddatthato pana ceto virūpaṃ nibandhīyati saṃyamīyati etehīti cetovinibandhā.
tika-vin01t1:1201_13: Kāmacchandādīni pañca kusaladhamme nīvārenti āvarantīti nīvaraṇāni.
tika-vin01t1:1202_0: Cha vivādamūlātiādīsu kodho makkho issā sāṭheyyaṃ pāpicchatā sandiṭṭhiparāmāsoti imāni cha vivādamūlāni.
tika-vin01t1:1202_2: sandiṭṭhiparāmāsī vā sandiṭṭhiparāmasitāya kalahaṃ viggahaṃ vivādaṃ āpajjati,
tika-vin01t1:1203_9: dhammā sambhavantī”ti evamāgatā pariyesanādayo nava taṇhāmūlakā.
tika-vin01t1:1203_16: Lābhaṃ labhitvā hi iṭṭhāniṭṭhaṃ sundarāsundarañca vitakkeneva vinicchinati “ettakaṃ me rūpārammaṇatthāya bhavissati,
tika-vin01t1:1203_23: Chandarāgoti evaṃ akusalavitakkena vitakkite vatthusmiṃ dubbalarāgo ca balavarāgo ca uppajjati.
tika-vin01t1:1203_28: Tenevassa porāṇā evaṃ vacanatthaṃ vadanti “idaṃ acchariyaṃ mayhameva hotu,
tika-vin01t1:1203_29: mā aññassa acchariyaṃ hotūti pavattattā macchariyanti vuccatī”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1204_1: Cattāro sassatavādā cattāro ekaccasassatavādā cattāro antānantikā cattāro amarāvikkhepikā dve adhiccasamuppannikā
tika-vin01t1:1204_2: soḷasa saññīvādā aṭṭha asaññīvādā aṭṭha nevasaññīnāsaññīvādā satta ucchedavādā pañca paramadiṭṭhadhammanibbānavādāti
tika-vin01t1:1204_7: sā kāmarāgabhāvena rūpaṃ assādentī pavattamānā kāmataṇhā,
tika-vin01t1:1204_8: sassatadiṭṭhisahagatarāgabhāvena “rūpaṃ niccaṃ dhuvaṃ sassata”nti evaṃ assādentī pavattamānā bhavataṇhā,
tika-vin01t1:1204_9: ucchedadiṭṭhisahagatarāgabhāvena “rūpaṃ ucchijjati vinassati pecca na bhavatī”ti evaṃ assādentī pavattamānā vibhavataṇhāti evaṃ tividhā hoti.
tika-vin01t1:1204_11: evaṃ saddataṇhādayopīti etāni aṭṭhārasa taṇhāvicaritāni honti,
tika-vin01t1:1204_20: Sabbadarathapariḷāhakilesasatasahassānīti sabbāni sattānaṃ darathapariḷāhakarāni kilesānaṃ anekāni satasahassāni.
tika-vin01t1:1204_21: Ārammaṇādivibhāgato hi pavattiākāravibhāgato ca anantappabhedā kilesā.
tika-vin01t1:1205_0: Saṅkhepato vātiādīsu sampati āyatiñca sattānaṃ anatthāvahattā māraṇaṭṭhena vibādhanaṭṭhena kilesāva māroti kilesamāro.
tika-vin01t1:1205_5: Saṃkilesanimittaṃ hutvā guṇamāraṇaṭṭhena devaputtova māroti devaputtamāro.
tika-vin01t1:1205_6: Sattānaṃ jīvitassa jīvitaparikkhārānañca jānikaraṇena mahābādharūpattā maccu eva māroti maccumāro.
tika-vin01t1:1206_0: Satapuññajalakkhaṇadharassāti aneka sata puñña nibbattamahā purisalakkhaṇadharassa.
tika-vin01t1:1206_1: Ettha hi “kevalaṃ satamattena puññakammena ekekalakkhaṇaṃ nibbatta”nti imamatthaṃ na rocayiṃsu aṭṭhakathācariyā
tika-vin01t1:1206_4: tehi sabbehi paccekaṃ satakkhattuṃ katāni dānādīni puññakammāni yattakāni,
tika-vin01t1:1206_5: tato ekekaṃ puññakammaṃ mahāsattena sataguṇaṃ kataṃ satanti adhippetanti imamatthaṃ rocayiṃsu.
tika-vin01t1:1206_8: na saṅkhyāvisesavacanoti daṭṭhabbo “satagghaṃ sataṃ devamanussā”tiādīsu viya.
tika-vin01t1:1206_9: Rūpakāyasampatti dīpitā hoti itarāsaṃ phalasampadānaṃ mūlabhāvato adhiṭṭhānabhāvato ca.
tika-vin01t1:1206_11: Tattha pahānasampadāpubbakattā ñāṇasampadādīnaṃ dhammakāyasampatti dīpitā hotīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1206_12: Lokiyasarikkhakānaṃ bahumatabhāvoti ettha bhāgyavantatāya lokiyānaṃ bahumatabhāvo,
tika-vin01t1:1206_14: Evaṃ ito paresupi yathākkamaṃ yojanā veditabbā.
tika-vin01t1:1207_1: pahīnadosaṃ dosavinayāya dhammaṃ desetīti pabbajitā tāpasaparibbājakādayo abhigacchantīti āha “gahaṭṭhapabbajitehi abhigamanīyatā”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1207_2: Abhigatānañca tesaṃ kāyacittadukkhāpanayane paṭibalabhāvo āmisadānadhammadānehi upakārasabbhāvato rūpakāyaṃ tassa pasādacakkhunā,
tika-vin01t1:1207_3: dhammakāyaṃ paññācakkhunā disvā dukkhadvayassa paṭippassambhanatoti veditabbo.
tika-vin01t1:1207_6: Lokiyalokuttarasukhehi ca saṃyojanasamatthatā dīpitā hotīti “pubbe āmisadānadhammadānehi mayā ayaṃ lokaggabhāvo adhigato,
tika-vin01t1:1207_7: tasmā tumhehipi evameva paṭipajjitabba”nti evaṃ sammāpaṭipattiyaṃ niyojanena abhigatānaṃ lokiyalokuttarasukhehi saṃyojanasamatthatā ca dīpitā hoti.
tika-vin01t1:1208_0: Sakacitte issariyaṃ nāma attano cittassa vasībhāvāpādanaṃyeva,
tika-vin01t1:1208_2: adhiṭṭhāniddhiādiko iddhividhopi cittissariyameva cittabhāvanāya vasībhāvappattiyā ijjhanato.
tika-vin01t1:1208_4: saddena mahimā patti pākammaṃ īsitā vasitā yatthakāmāvasāyitāti ime chapi saṅgahitā.
tika-vin01t1:1208_6: Ākāse padasā gamanādīnaṃ arahabhāvena lahubhāvo laghimā.
tika-vin01t1:1208_12: Ākāsena vā gacchato aññaṃ vā kiñci karoto yattha katthaci vosānappatti yatthakāmāvasāyitā.
tika-vin01t1:1208_15: Taṃ pana bhagavato iddhividhantogadhaṃ anaññasādhāraṇañcāti āha “sabbakāraparipūraṃ atthī”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1209_0: Kesañci yaso padesavutti ayathābhūtaguṇasannissayattā aparisuddho ca hoti,
tika-vin01t1:1209_2: Tattha idha adhigatasatthuguṇānaṃ āruppe uppannānaṃ “itipi so bhagavā”tiādinā bhagavato yaso pākaṭo hotīti āha “lokattayabyāpako”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1209_7: Yaṃ yaṃ etena icchitaṃ patthitanti “tiṇṇo tāreyya”ntiādinā yaṃ yaṃ etena lokanāthena manovacīpaṇidhānavasena icchitaṃ kāyapaṇidhānavasena patthitaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1209_9: Sammāvāyāmasaṅkhāto payattoti vīriyapāramibhāvappatto ariyamaggapariyāpanno ca sammāvāyāmasaṅkhāto ussāho.
tika-vin01t1:1210_2: saddena na kevalaṃ vibhaṅgapāḷiyaṃ āgatā satipaṭṭhānādayova saṅgahitā,
tika-vin01t1:1210_3: atha kho saṅgahādayo samayavimuttādayo ṭhapanādayo tikapaṭṭhānādayo ca saṅgahitāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1210_4: Pīḷanasaṅkhatasantāpavipariṇāmaṭṭhena vā dukkhamariyasaccantiādīsu pīḷanaṭṭho taṃsamaṅgino sattassa hiṃsanaṃ avipphārikatākaraṇaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1210_5: Saṅkhataṭṭho samecca saṅgamma sambhūya paccayehi katabhāvo.
tika-vin01t1:1210_7: Vipariṇāmaṭṭho jarāya maraṇena cāti dvidhā vipariṇāmetabbatā.
tika-vin01t1:1210_9: Nidānaṭṭho “idaṃ taṃ dukkha”nti nidassentassa viya samuṭṭhāpanaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1210_12: Nirodhassa nissaraṇaṭṭho sabbūpadhīnaṃ paṭinissaggasabhāvattā tato vinissaṭatā,
tika-vin01t1:1210_23: Satipi hi jhānādīnaṃ ārammaṇādhipatibhāve “jhānādhipatino dhammā”ti evamādiṃ avatvā “maggādhipatino dhammā”icceva vuttaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1211_6: Upadhīti cettha cattāro upadhī kāmupadhi khandhupadhi kilesupadhi abhisaṅkhārupadhīti.
tika-vin01t1:1211_7: Kāmāpi hi “yaṃ pañca kāmaguṇe paṭicca uppajjati sukhaṃ somanassaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1211_8: ayaṃ kāmānaṃ assādo”ti evaṃ vuttassa sukhassa adhiṭṭhānabhāvato upadhīyati ettha sukhanti iminā vacanatthena “upadhī”ti vuccanti,
tika-vin01t1:1211_12: Imehi pana catūhi upadhīhi vivittatāya nibbānaṃ “upadhiviveko”ti vuccati.
tika-vin01t1:1212_0: Suññatākārena nibbānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā pavatto ariyamaggo suññatavimokkho.
tika-vin01t1:1212_1: So hi suññatāya dhātuyā uppannattā suññato,
tika-vin01t1:1212_3: Eteneva nayena appaṇihitākārena nibbānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā pavatto appaṇihitavimokkho.
tika-vin01t1:1212_4: Animittākārena nibbānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā pavatto animittavimokkho.
tika-vin01t1:1212_5: Atha vā suññatānupassanāsaṅkhātāya anattānupassanāya vasena paṭiladdho ariyamaggo āgamanavasena “suññatavimokkho”ti vuccati.
tika-vin01t1:1212_6: Tathā appaṇihitānupassanāsaṅkhātāya dukkhānupassanāya vasena paṭiladdho appaṇihitavimokkho.
tika-vin01t1:1215_2: Vantanti ariyamaggamukhena uggiritaṃ puna apaccāgamanavasena chaḍḍitaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1215_3: Bhagavāti vuccati niruttinayenāti dassento āha “yathā loke”tiādi.
tika-vin01t1:1215_4: Yathā loke niruttinayena ekekapadato ekekamakkharaṃ gahetvā “mekhalā”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1217_0: Bhāgavā bhatavā bhāge, bhage ca vani bhattavā;
tika-vin01t1:1218_0: Bhage vami tathā bhāge, vamīti bhagavā jino.
tika-vin01t1:1219_2: te anaññasādhāraṇā niratisayā tathāgatassa atthi upalabbhanti.
tika-vin01t1:1219_3: Tathā hissa sīlaṃ samādhi paññā vimutti vimuttiñāṇadassanaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1219_84: tathā anantāsu lokadhātūsu anantānaṃ sattānaṃ āsayādivibhāvanañāṇāni cāti evamādayo anantāparimāṇabhedā
tika-vin01t1:1219_85: anaññasādhāraṇā niratisayā guṇabhāgā guṇakoṭṭhāsā saṃvijjanti upalabbhanti,
tika-vin01t1:1219_86: tasmā yathāvuttavibhāgā guṇabhāgā assa atthīti bhāgavāti vattabbe ākārassa rassattaṃ katvā “bhagavā”ti vutto.
tika-vin01t1:1222_1: Ye te sabbalokahitāya ussukkamāpannehi manussattādike aṭṭha dhamme samodhānetvā sammāsambodhiyā katamahābhinīhārehi
tika-vin01t1:1222_3: dasa pāramiyo dasa upapāramiyo dasa paramatthapāramiyoti samatiṃsa pāramiyo,
tika-vin01t1:1222_12: buddhatthacariyāti evamādayo saṅkhepato vā puññasambhārañāṇasambhārā buddhakarā dhammā,
tika-vin01t1:1222_13: te mahābhinīhārato paṭṭhāya kappānaṃ satasahassādhikāni cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni yathā hānabhāgiyā saṃkilesabhāgiyā ṭhitibhāgiyā vā na honti,
tika-vin01t1:1222_15: evaṃ sakkaccaṃ nirantaraṃ anavasesato bhatā sambhatā assa atthīti bhatavāti bhagavā niruttinayena ta-
tika-vin01t1:1222_18: Atha vā bhatavāti teyeva yathāvutte buddhakare dhamme vuttanayena bhari sambhari,
tika-vin01t1:1224_0: Sambhāre bhatavā nātho, tasmāpi bhagavā mato.
tika-vin01t1:1225_2: te anavasesato lokahitatthaṃ attano ca diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāratthaṃ niccakappaṃ vani bhaji sevi bahulamakāsīti bhāge vanīti bhagavā.
tika-vin01t1:1225_3: Atha vā abhiññeyyadhammesu kusalādīsu khandhādīsu ca ye te pariññeyyādivasena saṅkhepato vā catubbidhā abhisamayabhāgā,
tika-vin01t1:1225_11: “cakkhussa nirodhagāminī paṭipadā”tiādinā “cattāro satipaṭṭhānā”tiādinā ca anekabhedā bhāvetabbabhāgā ca dhammā vuttā,
tika-vin01t1:1225_12: te sabbe vani bhaji yathārahaṃ gocarabhāvanāsevanānaṃ vasena sevi.
tika-vin01t1:1225_14: Atha vā ye ime sīlādayo dhammakkhandhā sāvakehi sādhāraṇā guṇakoṭṭhāsā guṇabhāgā,
tika-vin01t1:1225_15: kinti nu kho te vineyyasantānesu patiṭṭhapeyyanti mahākaruṇāya vani abhipatthayi,
tika-vin01t1:1227_0: Bhaji patthayi sattānaṃ, hitāya bhagavā tato.
tika-vin01t1:1228_1: Samāsato tāva katapuññehi payogasampannehi yathāvibhavaṃ bhajīyantīti bhagā,
tika-vin01t1:1228_3: Tattha lokiye tāva tathāgato sambodhito pubbe bodhisattabhūto paramukkaṃsagate vani bhaji sevi,
tika-vin01t1:1228_4: yattha patiṭṭhāya niravasesato buddhakaradhamme samannānento buddhadhamme paripācesi.
tika-vin01t1:1228_5: Buddhabhūto pana te niravajjasukhūpasaṃhite anaññasādhāraṇe lokuttarepi vani bhaji sevi.
tika-vin01t1:1228_7: ca anekavihite anaññasādhāraṇe bhage vani bhaji sevi.
tika-vin01t1:1229_0: Yā tā sampattiyo loke, yā ca lokuttarā puthu;
tika-vin01t1:1230_0: Sabbā tā bhaji sambuddho, tasmāpi bhagavā mato.
tika-vin01t1:1231_1: Bhattā daḷhabhattikā assa bahū atthīti bhattavā.
tika-vin01t1:1231_4: pajāya accantupakāritāya dvattiṃsa mahāpurisalakkhaṇāsīti anubyañjana byāmappabhādi anaññasādhāraṇavisesapaṭimaṇḍitarūpakāyatāya
tika-vin01t1:1231_5: yathābhuccaguṇādhigatena “itipi so bhagavā”tiādinayappavattena lokattayabyāpinā suvipulena suvisuddhena
tika-vin01t1:1231_6: ca thutighosena samannāgatattā ukkaṃsapāramippattāsu appicchatāsantuṭṭhitāādīsu suppatiṭṭhitabhāvato
tika-vin01t1:1231_10: dhammappamāṇo dhammappasannoti evaṃ catuppamāṇike lokasannivāse sabbathāpi pasādāvahabhāvena samantapāsādikattā
tika-vin01t1:1231_12: Ye cassa ovāde patiṭṭhitā aveccappasādena samannāgatā honti,
tika-vin01t1:1231_13: kenaci asaṃhāriyā tesaṃ sambhatti samaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā mārena vā brahmunā vāti.
tika-vin01t1:1231_14: Tathā hi te attano jīvitapaaccāgepi tattha pasādaṃ na pariccajanti tassa vā āṇaṃ daḷhabhattibhāvato.
tika-vin01t1:1234_6: taṃ mama sāvakā jīvitahetupi nātikkamantī”ti ca.
tika-vin01t1:1235_0: Evaṃ bhattavāti bhagavā niruttinayena ekassa ta-
tika-vin01t1:1237_0: Sambhattā bahavo satthu, bhagavā tena vuccati.
tika-vin01t1:1238_1: Yasmā tathāgato bodhisattabhūtopi purimāsu jātīsu pāramiyo pūrento bhagasaṅkhātaṃ siriṃ issariyaṃ yasañca vami uggiri,
tika-vin01t1:1238_3: Tathā hissa somanassakumārakāle hatthipālakumārakāle ayogharapaṇḍitakāle mūgapakkhapaṇḍitakāle cūḷasutasomakāleti
tika-vin01t1:1238_4: evamādīsu nekkhammapāramīpūraṇavasena devarajjasadisāya rajjasiriyā pariccattattabhāvānaṃ pamāṇaṃ natthi,
tika-vin01t1:1238_5: carimattabhāvepi hatthagataṃ cakkavattisiriṃ devalokādhipaccasaasaṃ catudīpissariyaṃ cakkavattisampattisannissayaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1238_6: sattaratanasamujjalaṃ yasañca tiṇāyapi amaññamāno nirapekkho pahāya abhinikkhamitvā sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddho,
tika-vin01t1:1238_7: tasmā ime siriādike bhage vamīti bhagavā.
tika-vin01t1:1238_11: tepi bhagavā vami taṃnivāsisattāvāsasamatikkamanato tappaṭibaddhachandarāgappahānena pajahīti.
tika-vin01t1:1241_4: te ca bhagavā sabbaṃ papañcaṃ sabbaṃ yogaṃ sabbaṃ ganthaṃ sabbaṃ saṃyojanaṃ samucchinditvā amatadhātuṃ samadhigacchanto vami uggiri,
tika-vin01t1:1241_6: Tathā hesa sabbatthakameva pathaviṃ āpaṃ tejaṃ vāyaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1241_7: cakkhuṃ sotaṃ ghānaṃ jivhaṃ kāyaṃ manaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1241_8: rūpe sadde gandhe rase phoṭṭhabbe dhamme,
tika-vin01t1:1241_24: dhammavicārantiādinā anupadadhammavibhāgavasenapi sabbeva dhammakoṭṭhāse anavasesato vami uggiri,
tika-vin01t1:1241_28: taṃ tathāgato puna paccāgamissatīti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjatī”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1241_30: Atha vā bhāge vamīti sabbepi kusalākusale sāvajjānavajje hīnapaṇīte kaṇhasukkasappaṭibhāge dhamme ariyamaggañāṇamukhena vami uggiri,
tika-vin01t1:1243_0: Kaṇhā sukkā yato vantā, tatopi bhagavā mato.
tika-vin01t1:1245_0: “Bhāgavā bhatavā bhāge, bhage ca vani bhattavā;
tika-vin01t1:1246_0: Bhage vami tathā bhāge, vamīti bhagavā jino”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1247_0: Ettha ca yasmā saṅkhepato attahitasampattiparahitapaṭipattivasena duvidhā buddhaguṇā,
tika-vin01t1:1247_1: tāsu attahitasampatti pahānasampadāñāṇasampadābhedato duvidhā ānubhāvasampadādīnaṃ tadavinābhāvena tadantogadhattā.
tika-vin01t1:1247_6: tasmā tesampi vibhāvanavasena pāḷiyaṃ “araha”ntiādīnaṃ padānaṃ gahaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1248_0: Tattha arahanti iminā padena pahānasampadāvasena bhagavato attahitasampatti vibhāvitā,
tika-vin01t1:1248_1: sammāsambuddho lokavidūti ca imehi padehi ñāṇasampadāvasena.
tika-vin01t1:1248_4: atthi pana viseso “sammāsambuddho”ti iminā sabbaññutaññāṇānubhāvo vibhāvito,
tika-vin01t1:1248_6: Vijjācaraṇasampannoti iminā sabbāpi bhagavato attahitasampatti vibhāvitā.
tika-vin01t1:1248_7: Sugatoti pana iminā samudāgamato paṭṭhāya bhagavato attahitasampatti parahitapaṭipatti ca vibhāvitā.
tika-vin01t1:1248_8: Anuttaro purisadammasārathi satthā devamanussānanti imehi padehi bhagavato parahitapaṭipatti vibhāvitā.
tika-vin01t1:1248_9: Buddhoti iminā bhagavato attahitasampatti parahitapaṭipatti ca vibhāvitā.
tika-vin01t1:1248_10: Evañca katvā “sammāsambuddho”ti vatvā “buddho”ti vacanaṃ samatthitaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t1:1248_13: Bhagavāti ca imināpi samudāgamato paṭṭhāya bhagavato sabbā attahitasampatti parahitapaṭipatti ca vibhāvitā.
tika-vin01t1:1249_2: Tattha arahaṃ sammāsambuddho vijjācaraṇasampanno lokavidūti imehi padehi phalasampattivasena buddhaguṇā vibhāvitā.
tika-vin01t1:1249_3: Anuttaro purisadammasārathi satthā devamanussānanti imehi sattupakāravasena buddhaguṇā pakāsitā.
tika-vin01t1:1249_4: Buddhoti iminā phalavasena sattupakāravasena ca buddhaguṇā vibhāvitā.
tika-vin01t1:1249_5: Sugato bhagavāti pana imehi padehi hetuphalasattupakāravasena buddhaguṇā vibhāvitāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1250_0: So imaṃ lokantiādīsu so bhagavāti yo “araha”ntiādinā kittitaguṇo,
tika-vin01t1:1250_2: Imaṃ lokanti nayidaṃ mahājanassa sammukhāmattaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1250_3: atha kho anavasesaṃ pariyādāyāti dassetuṃ “sadevaka”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1250_6: Sadevakavacanena pañcakāmāvacaradevaggahaṇaṃ pārisesañāyenāti veditabbaṃ itaresaṃ padantarehi saṅgahitattā.
tika-vin01t1:1250_7: Sadevakanti ca avayavena viggaho samudāyo samāsattho.
tika-vin01t1:1250_9: Tattha hi so jāto taṃnivāsī ca.
tika-vin01t1:1250_12: samaṇabrāhmaṇaggahaṇanti nidassanamattametaṃ apaccatthikānaṃ asamitābāhitapāpānañca samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ sassamaṇabrāhmaṇīvacanena gahitattā.
tika-vin01t1:1250_13: Kāmaṃ “sadevaka”ntiādivisesanānaṃ vasena sattavisayo lokasaddoti viññāyati tulyayogavisayattā tesaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1250_14: “salomako sapakkhako”tiādīsu pana atulyayogepi ayaṃ samāso labbhatīti byabhicāradassanato pajāgahaṇanti āha “pajāvacanena sattalokaggahaṇa”nti.
tika-vin01t1:1250_20: Dvīhīti sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiṃ sadevamanussanti imehi dvīhi padehi.
tika-vin01t1:1251_0: Arūpī sattā attano āneñjavihārena viharantā dibbantīti devāti imaṃ nibbacanaṃ labhantīti āha “sadevakaggahaṇena arūpāvacaraloko gahito”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1251_2: Chakāmāvacaradevalokassa savisesaṃ mārassa vase vattanato āha “samārakaggahaṇena chakāmāvacaradevaloko”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1251_6: Itarā pana catasso parisā samārakaggahaṇena gahitā evāti.
tika-vin01t1:1252_1: “Sassamaṇabrāhmaṇi”nti iminā samaṇaparisā brāhmaṇaparisā ca gahitā honti,
tika-vin01t1:1252_3: “paja”nti iminā pana imāyeva catasso parisā vuttā,
tika-vin01t1:1252_5: kathaṃ pana sammutidevehi saha manussaloko gahito?
tika-vin01t1:1252_9: Ito pana aññesaṃ manussasattānaṃ abhāvato “paja”nti iminā catūhi pakārehi ṭhitā eteyeva manussasattā vuttāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1252_10: Evaṃ vikappadvayepi pajāggahaṇena catuparisādivasena ṭhitānaṃ manussānaṃyeva gahitattā idāni “paja”nti
tika-vin01t1:1252_11: iminā avasesasatte saṅgahetvā dassetukāmo āha “avasesasabbasattaloko vā”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1252_13: Etthāpi catuparisavasena sammutidevehi vā saha avasesasabbasattaloko vāti yojetabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1252_15: catudhā ṭhitamanussasahito vā avasesanāgasupaṇṇanerayikādisattaloko gahitoti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t1:1253_0: Ettāvatā bhāgaso lokaṃ gahetvā yojanaṃ dassetvā idāni tena tena visesena abhāgaso lokaṃ gahetvā yojanaṃ dassetuṃ “apicetthā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1253_3: tatthāpi arūpino dūrasamussāritakilesadukkhatāya santapaṇītaāneñjavihārasamaṅgitāya ativiya dīghāyukatāyāti evamādīhi visesehi ativiya ukkaṭṭhā.
tika-vin01t1:1253_4: Brahmā mahānubhāvoti dasasahassiyaṃ mahābrahmuno vasena vadati.
tika-vin01t1:1253_12: Evaṃ sabbepi tibhavūpage satte devamārabrahmasahitatāsaṅkhātehi tīhi pakārehi “sadevaka”ntiādīsu tīsu
tika-vin01t1:1253_13: padesu pakkhipitvā puna dvīhi padehi pariyādiyanto “sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiṃ pajaṃ sadevamanussa”nti āha.
tika-vin01t1:1253_14: Evaṃ pañcahipi padehi sadevakattādinā tena tena pakārena tedhātukameva pariyādinnanti.
tika-vin01t1:1254_1: abhijānitvāti ayamettha atthoti āha “abhiññāya adhikena ñāṇena ñatvā”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1254_3: Sabbattha appaṭihatañāṇacāratāya hi sabbapaccakkhā buddhā bhagavanto.
tika-vin01t1:1254_5: Tena vīthimissāpi kadāci bhagavato dhammadesanā hotīti hitvāpīti pisaddaggahaṇaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1254_6: Bhagavā hi dhammaṃ desento yasmiṃ khaṇe parisā sādhukāraṃ vā deti,
tika-vin01t1:1254_8: taṃ khaṇaṃ pubbabhāgena paricchinditvā phalasamāpattiṃ samāpajjati,
tika-vin01t1:1254_9: yathāparicchedañca samāpattito vuṭṭhāya ṭhitaṭṭhānato paṭṭhāya dhammaṃ deseti.
tika-vin01t1:1254_10: Appaṃ vā bahuṃ vā desentoti ugghaṭitaññussa vasena appaṃ vā,
tika-vin01t1:1254_11: vipañcitaññussa neyyassa vā vasena bahuṃ vā desento.
tika-vin01t1:1254_12: Ādikalyāṇādippakārameva desetīti ādimhipi kalyāṇaṃ bhaddakaṃ anavajjameva katvā deseti.
tika-vin01t1:1254_13: Majjhepi pariyosānepi kalyāṇaṃ bhaddakaṃ anavajjameva katvā desetīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t1:1254_14: Dhammassa hi kalyāṇatā niyyānikatāya niyyānikatā ca sabbaso anavajjabhāvena.
tika-vin01t1:1255_2: Kiñcāpi avayavavinimutto samudāyo nāma paramatthato koci natthi,
tika-vin01t1:1255_3: yesu pana avayavesu samudāyarūpena apekkhitesu gāthāti samaññā,
tika-vin01t1:1255_4: taṃ tato bhinnaṃ viya katvā saṃsāmivohāraṃ āropetvā dassento “paṭhamapādena ādikalyāṇā”tiādimāha.
tika-vin01t1:1255_5: Ekānusandhikanti idaṃ nātibahuvibhāgaṃ yathānusandhinā ekānusandhikaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1255_6: Itarassa pana teneva desetabbadhammavibhāgena ādimajjhapariyosānabhāgā labbhantīti.
tika-vin01t1:1255_10: Saṅgītikārakehi ṭhapitānipi hi nidānanigamanāni dassetvā tīṇi piṭakāni satthu desanāya anuvidhānato tadantogadhāneva.
tika-vin01t1:1256_0: Evaṃ suttantapiṭakavasena dhammassa ādikalyāṇāditaṃ dassetvā idāni tīṇi piṭakāni ekajjhaṃ gahetvā taṃ dassetuṃ “sakalopī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1259_5: tassā ca sīlaṃ samādhi ca mūlanti āha “sīlasamādhīhi vā ādikalyāṇo”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1259_6: Paññā pana anubodhapaavedhavasena duvidhāti tadubhayampi gaṇhanto “vipassanāmaggehi majjhekalyāṇo”ti āha.
tika-vin01t1:1259_8: tato paraṃ kattabbaṃ natthīti dassento āha “phalanibbānehi pariyosānakalyāṇo”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1259_10: itarena itaraṃ tadubhayañca sāsanasampattiyā osānanti āha “phalanibbānehi pariyosānakalyāṇo”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1260_0: Buddhasubodhitāya vā ādikalyāṇoti buddhassa subodhitā sammāsambuddhatā,
tika-vin01t1:1260_5: tāya pariyosānakalyāṇo tāya sāsanassa loke suppatiṭṭhitabhāvato.
tika-vin01t1:1260_9: So pana abhisambodhi paccekabodhi sāvakabodhīti tividho ito aññathā nibbānādhigamassa abhāvato.
tika-vin01t1:1260_10: Tattha sabbaguṇehi aggabhāvato itarabodhidvayamūlatāya ca paṭhamāya bodhiyā ādikalyāṇatā,
tika-vin01t1:1260_12: tadubhayatāya vā vosānatāya ca sāsanadhammassa tatiyāya pariyosānakalyāṇatā vuttā.
tika-vin01t1:1261_1: Nīvaraṇavikkhambhanatoti vimuttāyatanasīse ṭhatvā saddhammaṃ suṇantassa nīvaraṇānaṃ vikkhambhanasabbhāvato.
tika-vin01t1:1262_3: tathā tathā so tattha labhati atthavedaṃ labhati dhammaveda”nti.
tika-vin01t1:1263_3: pañcassa nīvaraṇāni tasmiṃ samaye pahīnāni hontī”ti –
tika-vin01t1:1264_2: Vuttampi cetaṃ “so vivicceva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ pītisukha”ntiādi, tathā –
tika-vin01t1:1267_0: Amānusī ratī hoti, sammā dhammaṃ vipassato”ti ca. ;
tika-vin01t1:1268_3: Tādibhāvāvahanatoti chaḷaṅgupekkhāvasena iṭṭhādīsu tādibhāvassa lokadhammehi anupalepassa āvahanato.
tika-vin01t1:1268_11: Kiccasuddhiyā pariyosānakalyāṇoti suppaṭipattisaṅkhātakiccassa suddhiyā pariyosānakalyāṇo suppaṭipattipariyosānattā sāsanadhammassa.
tika-vin01t1:1269_0: Sāsanabrahmacariyantiādīsu avisesena tisso sikkhā sakalo ca tantidhammo sāsanabrahmacariyaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1269_10: Itaraṃ pana tantidhammasaṅkhātaṃ sāsanabrahmacariyaṃ yathāvuttenatthena sātthaṃ sabyañjanañca.
tika-vin01t1:1269_15: na so sātthaṃ deseti niyyānatthavirahato tassā desanāya.
tika-vin01t1:1269_16: Bhagavā pana tathārūpaṃ desanaṃ pahāya catusatipaṭṭhānādinissitaṃ desanaṃ deseti,
tika-vin01t1:1269_18: Yassa pana desanā sithiladhanitādibhedesu byañjanesu ekappakāreneva dvippakāreneva vā byañjanena yuttatāya ekabyañjanādiyuttā vā damiḷabhāsā viya,
tika-vin01t1:1269_19: vivaṭakaraṇatāya oṭṭhe aphusāpetvā uccāretabbato sabbaniroṭṭhabyañjanā vā kirātabhāsā viya,
tika-vin01t1:1269_20: sabbattheva vissajjanīyayuttatāya sabbavissaṭṭhabyañjanā vā yavanabhāsā viya,
tika-vin01t1:1269_21: sabbattheva sānusāratāya sabbaniggahītabyañjanā vā pādasikādi milakkhubhāsā viya,
tika-vin01t1:1269_22: tassa byañjanapāripūriyā abhāvato abyañjanā nāma desanā hoti.
tika-vin01t1:1269_23: Sabbāpi hi esā byañjanekadesavaseneva pavattiyā aparipuṇṇabyañjanāti katvā “abyañjanā”ti vuccati.
tika-vin01t1:1271_0: Sambandhaṃ vavatthitaṃ vimuttaṃ, dasadhā byañjanabuddhiyā pabhedo”ti. –
tika-vin01t1:1272_0: Evaṃ vuttaṃ dasavidhaṃ byañjanaṃ amakkhetvā paripuṇṇabyañjanameva katvā dhammaṃ deseti,
tika-vin01t1:1273_0: Idāni “sātthaṃ sabyañjana”nti ettha nettinayenapi atthaṃ dassetuṃ “saṅkāsanaṃ…pe…
tika-vin01t1:1273_2: Tattha yadipi nettiyaṃ “byañjanamukhena byañjanatthaggahaṇaṃ hotīti akkharaṃ pada”ntiādinā byañjanapadāni paṭhamaṃ uddiṭṭhāni,
tika-vin01t1:1273_3: idha pana pāḷiyaṃ “sātthaṃ sabyañjana”nti āgatattā atthapadāniyeva paṭhamaṃ dassetuṃ “saṅkāsanapakāsanā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1273_5: Kāsananti ca kāsīyati dīpīyati vibhāvīyatīti attho.
tika-vin01t1:1273_6: “Maññamāno kho bhikkhu baddho mārassa amaññamāno mutto”tiādīsu viya saṅkhepena dīpanaṃ saṅkāsanaṃ nāma.
tika-vin01t1:1273_11: āditta”nti evamādīsu pacchā kathitabbamatthaṃ paṭhamaṃ vacanena dīpanaṃ pakāsanaṃ nāma.
tika-vin01t1:1273_15: Tikkhindriyo hi saṅkhepato paṭhamañca vuttamatthaṃ paṭipajjati.
tika-vin01t1:1273_16: Saṃkhittassa vitthāravacanaṃ sakiṃ vuttassa puna vacanañca vivaraṇavibhajanāni,
tika-vin01t1:1273_17: yathā “kusalā dhammā”ti saṅkhepato sakiṃyeva ca vuttassa atthassa “katame dhammā kusalā?
tika-vin01t1:1273_18: Yasmiṃ samaye kāmāvacaraṃ kusalaṃ citta”ntiādinā vitthārato vivaraṇavasena vibhajanavasena ca puna vacanaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1273_20: Vivaṭassa vitthāratarābhidhānaṃ vibhattassa ca pakārehi ñāpanaṃ vineyyānaṃ cittaparitosanaṃ uttānīkaraṇapaññāpanāni,
tika-vin01t1:1273_21: yathā “phasso hotī”tiādinā vivaṭavibhattassa atthassa “katamo tasmiṃ samaye phasso hoti?
tika-vin01t1:1273_22: Yo tasmiṃ samaye phasso phusanā saṃphusanā”tiādinā uttānīkiriyā paññāpanā ca.
tika-vin01t1:1274_2: āditta”nti evaṃ paṭhamaṃ dīpitamatthaṃ puna pākaṭaṃ katvā dīpanena “kiñca,
tika-vin01t1:1274_6: rūpā ādittā”ti evamādinā saṃkhittassa vitthārābhidhānena sakiṃ vuttassa punapi abhidhānena vitthāretvā desanaṃ vivaraṇaṃ nāma.
tika-vin01t1:1274_8: Yasmiṃ samaye kāmāvacaraṃ kusalaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ hotī”ti niddesavasena vivarite kusale dhamme “tasmiṃ
tika-vin01t1:1274_9: samaye phasso hoti vedanā hotī”ti vibhāgakaraṇaṃ vibhajanaṃ nāma.
tika-vin01t1:1274_10: Vivaṭassa vitthārābhidhānena vibhattassa ca upamābhidhānena uttāniṃ karotīti vivaraṇena vivaritatthassa “katamo tasmiṃ samaye phasso hoti?
tika-vin01t1:1274_11: Yo tasmiṃ samaye phasso phusanā saṃphusanā”ti ativivaritvā kathanaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1274_15: evameva khvāyaṃ bhikkhave phassāhāro daṭṭhabboti vadāmī”ti evamādiupamākathanañca uttānīkaraṇaṃ nāma.
tika-vin01t1:1274_16: Dhammaṃ suṇantānaṃ dhammadesanena vicittena anekavidhena somanassassa uppādanaṃ atikhiṇabuddhīnaṃ anekavidhena
tika-vin01t1:1274_17: ñāṇatikhiṇakaraṇañca paññatti nāma sotūnaṃ cittatosanena cittanisānena ca paññāpanaṃ paññattīti katvā.
tika-vin01t1:1274_18: Atthapadasamāyogato sātthanti pariyattiatthassa saṅkāsanādiatthapadarūpattā yathāvuttachaatthapadasamāyogato sātthaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1274_20: Atthoyeva hi byañjanapadehi saṅkāsīyati pakāsīyati vivarīyati vibhajīyati uttānī karīyati paññāpīyati.
tika-vin01t1:1275_0: Akkharapadabyañjanākāraniruttiniddesasampattiyāti ettha “saṭṭhi vassasahassānī”ti evamādīsu sa- kāra du- kāra so-
tika-vin01t1:1275_1: kārādi viya uccāraṇavelāya apariyosite pade vaṇṇo akkharaṃ pariyāyavasena akkharaṇato avevacanato.
tika-vin01t1:1275_3: Yathā hi padaṃ savevacanatāya atthavasena pariyāyaṃ carantaṃ sañcarantaṃ viya hoti,
tika-vin01t1:1275_5: Ekakkharaṃ vā padaṃ akkharaṃ “mā evaṃ kira ta”ntiādīsu mā-
tika-vin01t1:1275_7: Keci pana “tīsu dvāresu parisuddhapayogabhāvena visuddhakaraṇaṭṭhānānaṃ cittena pavattitadesanāvācāhi
tika-vin01t1:1275_9: Taṃ pārāyanikabrāhmaṇānaṃ manasā pucchitapañhānaṃ vasena bhagavatā ratanaghare nisīditvā sammasitapaṭṭhānamahāpakaraṇavasena ca gahetabba”nti vadanti.
tika-vin01t1:1275_12: Taṃ nāmapadaṃ ākhyātapadaṃ upasaggapadaṃ nipātapadanti catubbidhaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1275_13: Tattha phasso vedanā cittanti evamādikaṃ dabbapadhānaṃ nāmapadaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1275_16: Phusati vedayati vijānātīti evamādikaṃ kiriyāpadhānaṃ ākhyātapadaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1275_23: Kiriyāya dabbassa ca sarūpavisesappakāsanahetubhūtaṃ evanti evamādikaṃ nipātapadaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1275_25: mā evaṃ manasākatthā”tiādīsu hi kiriyāvisesadīpanato kiriyāvisesassa jotako evaṃsaddo,
tika-vin01t1:1275_27: Saṅkhepato vuttaṃ padābhihitaṃ atthaṃ byañjetīti byañjanaṃ, vākyaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1275_30: bhikkhu chandasamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgataṃ iddhipādaṃ bhāveti, vīriya, citta,
tika-vin01t1:1275_31: vīmaṃsasamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgataṃ iddhipādaṃ bhāvetī”tiādinā pākaṭaṃ karotīti vākyameva byañjanaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1275_33: Saākhyātaṃ sanipātaṃ sakārakaṃ savisesanaṃ vākyanti hi vadanti.
tika-vin01t1:1275_34: Nanu ca padenapi attho byañjīyatīti padampi byañjananti āpajjatīti? Taṃ na.
tika-vin01t1:1275_35: Padamattasavanepi hi adhikārādivasena labbhamānehi padantarehi anusandhānaṃ katvāva atthasampaṭipatti hotīti vākyameva atthaṃ byañjayatīti.
tika-vin01t1:1276_2: Yo chando chandikatā kattukamyatā”ti evamādīsu kathitasseva vākyassa anekavidhena vibhāgakaraṇaṃ ākāro nāma.
tika-vin01t1:1276_5: vedayatīti vedanā”ti nīharitvā vitthāravacanaṃ nirutti nāma.
tika-vin01t1:1276_8: kilese vā mārento gacchatīti maggo”tiādinā nibbacanavitthāro niravasesadesanattā niddeso.
tika-vin01t1:1276_9: Atha vā vedayatīti vedanāti nibbacanaladdhapadesu sukhadukkhaadukkhamasukhāsu sukhayatīti sukhā,
tika-vin01t1:1276_11: neva dukkhayati na sukhayatīti adukkhamasukhāti atthavitthāro niravasesena kathitattā niddeso nāma.
tika-vin01t1:1276_12: Etesaṃ akkharādīnaṃ byañjanapadānaṃ sampattiyā sampannatāya sabyañjanaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1277_0: Evaṃ panassa atthapadasamāyogo byañjanapadasampatti ca veditabbā.
tika-vin01t1:1277_8: gahitena ca padena padatthāvabodho gahitapubbasaṅketassa hotīti bhagavā akkharehi saṅkāseti.
tika-vin01t1:1277_9: Yasmā pana akkharehi saṃkhittena dīpiyamāno attho padapariyosāne vākyassa apariyositattā padena paṭhamaṃ pakāsito dīpito hoti,
tika-vin01t1:1277_11: Vākyapariyosāne pana so attho vivarito vivaṭo kato hotīti byañjanehi vivarati.
tika-vin01t1:1277_12: Yasmā ca pakārehi vākyabhede kate tadattho vibhatto nāma hoti,
tika-vin01t1:1277_14: Tathā vākyāvayavānaṃ paccekaṃ nibbacanavibhāge kate so attho pākaṭo hotīti niruttīhi uttāniṃ karoti.
tika-vin01t1:1277_15: Katanibbacanehi pana vākyāvayavehi vitthāravasena niravasesato desitehi veneyyānaṃ cittaparitosanaṃ buddhinisānañca kataṃ hotīti niddesehi paññapeti.
tika-vin01t1:1277_16: Apica bhagavā akkharehi ugghaṭetvā padehi vineti ugghaṭitaññuṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1277_25: Evaṃ tīsu kālesu tidhā desito dosattayavidhamano guṇattayāvaho tividhavineyyavinayanoti evampi tividhakalyāṇoyaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1278_6: Tattha bhagavā akkharehi ca padehi ca ugghaṭeti,
tika-vin01t1:1278_12: Soyaṃ dhammavinayo ugghaṭiyanto ugghaṭitaññuṃ puggalaṃ vineti,
tika-vin01t1:1279_3: Desanā nāma manasā vavatthāpitāya tantiyā desanā.
tika-vin01t1:1279_4: Te panete atthādayo yasmā sasādīhi viya mahāsamuddo mandabuddhīhi dukkhogāhā alabbhaneyyapatiṭṭhā ca,
tika-vin01t1:1279_15: Tesaṃ tesaṃ vā dhammānaṃ paṭivijjhitabbo lakkhaṇasaṅkhāto aviparītasabhāvo.
tika-vin01t1:1279_16: Tepi cete atthādayo yasmā anupacitakusalasambhārehi duppaññehi sasādīhi viya mahāsamuddo dukkhogāhā alabbhaneyyapatiṭṭhā ca,
tika-vin01t1:1279_18: Tesu paṭivedhassapi atthasannissitattā vuttaṃ “atthagambhīratāpaṭivedhagambhīratāhi sāttha”nti atthaguṇadīpanato.
tika-vin01t1:1279_19: Tāsaṃ dhammadesanānaṃ byañjanasannissitattā vuttaṃ “dhammagambhīratādesanāgambhīratāhi sabyañjana”nti tāsaṃ byañjanasampattidīpanato.
tika-vin01t1:1279_21: atthadhammaniruttipaṭisambhidāsu pabhedagataṃ ñāṇaṃ paṭibhānapaṭisambhidāti imissāpi paṭisambhidāya atthavisayattā
tika-vin01t1:1279_25: Tattha pabhedagatāni ñāṇāni dhammaniruttipaṭisambhidāti āha “dhammaniruttipaṭisambhidāvisayato sabyañjana”nti asati byañjanasampattiyā tadabhāvato.
tika-vin01t1:1280_4: Atthasampannanti phalena hetuno anumānaṃ nadīpūrena viya upari vuṭṭhipavattiyā.
tika-vin01t1:1280_14: Atha vā paṇḍitavedanīyato sātthanti paññāpadaṭṭhānatāya atthasampannataṃ āha,
tika-vin01t1:1280_15: tato parikkhakajanappasādakaṃ saddheyyato sabyañjananti saddhāpadaṭṭhānatāya byañjanasampannataṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1280_17: Gambhīrādhippāyato sātthanti adhippāyato agādhāpāratāya atthasampannaṃ aññathā tadabhāvato.
tika-vin01t1:1280_18: Uttānapadato sabyañjananti subodhasaddakatāya byañjanasampannaṃ paramagambhīrassapi atthassa vineyyānaṃ suviññeyyabhāvāpādanato.
tika-vin01t1:1280_20: byañjanasampattiyā sabyañjananti sabbapaṭhamaṃ vuttasseva atthadvayassa papañcoti daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin01t1:1280_22: Tathā hettha vikappassa samuccayassa vā aggahaṇaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1280_23: Upanetabbassa abhāvatoti pakkhipitabbassa vodānatthassa avuttassa abhāvato.
tika-vin01t1:1281_0: Brahmacariyaṃ pakāsetīti ettha pana ayaṃ brahmacariya-
tika-vin01t1:1281_1: saddo dāne veyyāvacce pañcasikkhāpadasīle appamaññāsu methunaviratiyaṃ sadārasantose vīriye uposathaṅgesu ariyamagge sāsaneti imesu atthesu dissati.
tika-vin01t1:1296_0: Kena te brahmacariyena, puññaṃ pāṇimhi ijjhati.
tika-vin01t1:1298_0: Tena me brahmacariyena, puññaṃ pāṇimhi ijjhatī”ti. –
tika-vin01t1:1299_1: “Evaṃ kho taṃ bhikkhave tittiriyaṃ nāma brahmacariyaṃ ahosī”ti imasmiṃ tittirajātake pañcasikkhāpadasīlaṃ “brahmacariya”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1299_2: “Taṃ kho pana me pañcasikha brahmacariyaṃ neva nibbidāya na virāgāya na nirodhāya yāvadeva brahmalokūpapattiyā”ti
tika-vin01t1:1299_5: mayamettha brahmacārī bhavissāmā”ti imasmiṃ sallekhasutte methunavirati “brahmacariya”nti vuttā.
tika-vin01t1:1303_0: Tasmā hi amhaṃ daharā na mīyare”ti. –
tika-vin01t1:1304_4: tapassī sudaṃ homī”ti lomahaṃsanasutte vīriyaṃ “brahmacariya”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1307_0: Evaṃ nimijātake attadamanavasena kato aṭṭhaṅgiko uposatho “brahmacariya”nti vutto.
tika-vin01t1:1307_4: ayameva ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo”ti mahāgovindasuttasmiṃyeva ariyamaggo “brahmacariya”nti vutto.
tika-vin01t1:1307_5: “Tayidaṃ brahmacariyaṃ iddhañceva phītañca vitthārikaṃ bāhujaññaṃ puthubhūtaṃ yāvadeva manussehi suppakāsita”nti
tika-vin01t1:1308_5: bhikkhave”ti ca ādinā tattha tattha hetupamaggahaṇena hetudāharaṇehi yuttato.
tika-vin01t1:1308_6: Saddhāpaṭilābhenāti “te taṃ dhammaṃ sutvā tathāgate saddhaṃ paṭilabhantī”tiādinā vuttasaddhāpaṭilābhena.
tika-vin01t1:1308_9: Adhigamabyattitoti saccappaṭivedhena adhigamaveyyattiyasabbhāvato sātthaṃ kapilamatādi viya tucchaṃ niratthakaṃ ahutvā atthasampannanti katvā.
tika-vin01t1:1308_11: Āgamabyattitoti durakkhātadhammesu paricayaṃ karontassa viya sammohaṃ ajanetvā bāhusaccaveyyattiyasabbhāvato sabyañjanaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1308_19: yo “imaṃ dhammadesanaṃ nissāya lābhaṃ vā sakkāraṃ vā labhissāmī”ti deseti,
tika-vin01t1:1308_21: Bhagavā pana lokāmisanirapekkho hitapharaṇena mettābhāvanāya muduhadayo ullumpanasabhāvasaṇṭhitena cittena deseti,
tika-vin01t1:1309_0: Sādhūti ayaṃ saddo “sādhu me bhante bhagavā saṃkhittena dhammaṃ desetū”tiādīsu āyācane dissati.
tika-vin01t1:1309_1: “Sādhu bhanteti kho so bhikkhu bhagavato bhāsitaṃ abhinanditvā anumoditvā”tiādīsu sampaṭicchane.
tika-vin01t1:1309_3: “Tena hi brāhmaṇa sādhukaṃ suṇohī”tiādīsu daḷhīkamme āṇattiyañca dissati.
tika-vin01t1:1312_1: Idhāpi sundareyeva daṭṭhabboti āha “sādhu kho panāti sundaraṃ kho panā”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1312_3: Bhaddakatā ca passantassa hitasukhāvahabhāvenāti āha “atthāvahaṃ sukhāvaha”nti.
tika-vin01t1:1312_8: tehi catuppamāṇikassa lokassa sabbakālepi accantāya pasādanīyo tesaṃ yathābhūtasabhāvattāti dassento “yathārūpo”tiādimāha.
tika-vin01t1:1312_10: arahatanti iminā dhammappamāṇānaṃ lūkhappamāṇānañca sattānaṃ bhagavato pasādāvahataṃ dasseti,
tika-vin01t1:1312_11: taṃdassanena ca itaresampi rūpappamāṇaghosappamāṇānaṃ pasādāvahatā dassitā hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ tadavinābhāvato.
tika-vin01t1:1312_12: Brahmacariyaṃ pakāsetīti kittisaddo abbhuggatoti evamettha sambandhoti āha “dassanamattampi sādhu hotīti evamajjhāsayaṃ katvā”tiādi.
tika-vin01t1:1312_13: Tattha dassanamattampi sādhu hotīti ettha kosiyasakuṇavatthu kathetabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1313_1: Yena vā kāraṇenāti hetumhi idaṃ karaṇavacanaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1313_4: tasmā nānappakāraguṇavisesādhigamatthā idha upasaṅkamanakiriyāti “annena vasatī”tiādīsu viya hetuatthamevetaṃ karaṇavacanaṃ yuttaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1313_5: na karaṇatthaṃ tassa ayujjamānattāti vuttaṃ “yena vā kāraṇenā”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1313_9: Sampattakāmatāya hi kiñci ṭhānaṃ gacchanto taṃtaṃpadesātikkamanena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamantoti vattabbataṃ labhati.
tika-vin01t1:1313_13: Tatoti yaṃ ṭhānaṃ patto upasaṅkamīti vutto,
tika-vin01t1:1313_15: Āsannataraṃ ṭhānanti pañhaṃ vā pucchituṃ dhammaṃ vā sotuṃ sakkuṇeyyaṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1314_0: Yathā khamanīyādīni pucchantoti yathā bhagavā “kacci te brāhmaṇa khamanīyaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1314_1: kacci yāpanīya”ntiādinā khamanīyādīni pucchanto tena brāhmaṇena saddhiṃ samappavattamodo ahosi.
tika-vin01t1:1314_2: Pubbabhāsitāya tadanukaraṇena evaṃ sopi brāhmaṇo bhagavatā saddhiṃ samappavattamodo ahosīti yojanā.
tika-vin01t1:1314_3: Taṃ pana samappavattamodataṃ upamāya dassetuṃ “sītodakaṃ viyā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1314_6: Khamanīyanti “idaṃ catucakkaṃ navadvāraṃ sarīrayantaṃ dukkhabahulatāya sabhāvato dussahaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1314_8: Yāpanīyanti paccayāyattavuttikaṃ cirappabandhasaṅkhātāya yāpanāya kacci yāpetuṃ sakkuṇeyyaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1314_13: Sukhavihārasambhavena kacci phāsuvihāro atthīti tattha tattha kaccisaddaṃ yojetvā attho veditabbo.
tika-vin01t1:1314_18: Sammoditabbato sammodanīyanti idaṃ pana atthaṃ dassento “sammodituṃ yuttabhāvato”ti āha.
tika-vin01t1:1315_1: taṃ pana avakaṃsato ubhinnaṃ pasāritahatthāsaṅghaṭṭanena daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1315_14: Kittako pana soti āha “dve tayo rājaparivaṭṭe”ti,
tika-vin01t1:1315_16: “Addhagate”ti vatvā kathaṃ vayogahaṇaṃ osānavayāpekkhanti āha “pacchimavayaṃ anuppatte”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1315_17: Pacchimo tatiyabhāgoti sattasaṭṭhito paṭṭhāya pacchimavayo koṭṭhāso.
tika-vin01t1:1316_0: Dutiye atthavikappe jiṇṇeti nāyaṃ jiṇṇatā vayomattena,
tika-vin01t1:1316_1: atha kho kulaparivaṭṭena purāṇatāyāti āha “jiṇṇeti porāṇe”tiādi.
tika-vin01t1:1316_3: “Vayoanuppatte”ti iminā jātivuḍḍhiyā vakkhamānattā guṇavuḍḍhiyā tato sātisayattā ca “vuḍḍheti sīlācārādiguṇavuḍḍhiyutte”ti āha.
tika-vin01t1:1316_4: Tathā jātimahallakatāyapi teneva vakkhamānattā mahallaketi padena vibhavamahattatā yojitā.
tika-vin01t1:1316_5: Maggapaṭipanneti brāhmaṇānaṃ paṭipattividhiṃ upagate taṃ avokkamma caraṇato.
tika-vin01t1:1317_0: Paccuṭṭhānaṃ nāma āsanā vuṭṭhānanti āha “nāsanā vuṭṭhahatī”ti,
tika-vin01t1:1317_3: vayoanuppatteti upayogavacanaṃ āsanā vuṭṭhānakiriyāpekkhaṃ na hoti,
tika-vin01t1:1317_5: vayoanuppatte disvāti ajjhāhāraṃ katvā attho veditabbo.
tika-vin01t1:1317_7: tasmā na paccuṭṭhetīti uṭṭhāya paccuggamanaṃ na karotīti attho veditabbo.
tika-vin01t1:1317_9: Vuttañhetaṃ “ācariyaṃ pana dūratova disvā paccuṭṭhāya paccuggamanakaraṇaṃ paccuṭṭhānaṃ nāmā”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1317_10: Nāsanā vuṭṭhātīti iminā pana paccuggamanābhāvassa upalakkhaṇamattaṃ dassitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1317_12: na abhivādeti vāti na abhivādetabbanti sallakkhetīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t1:1318_0: Taṃ aññāṇanti “ayaṃ mama abhivādanādīni kātuṃ araharūpo na hotī”ti ajānanavasena pavattaṃ aññāṇaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1318_2: kiṃ nu kho ahaṃ samaṇaṃ vā brāhmaṇaṃ vā sakkareyyaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1318_9: Sattapadavītihārena gantvā sakalaṃ dasasahassilokadhātuṃ olokesinti idaṃ “dhammatā esā,
tika-vin01t1:1318_11: sampatijāto bodhisatto samehi pādehi patiṭṭhahitvā uttarābhimukho sattapadavītihārena gacchati,
tika-vin01t1:1318_12: setamhi chatte anudhāriyamāne sabbā disā viloketi,
tika-vin01t1:1318_13: āsabhiñca vācaṃ bhāsatī”ti evaṃ pāḷiyaṃ sattapadavītihārūpariṭṭhitassa viya sabbadisānuvilokanassa kathitattā vuttaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1318_16: Mahāsatto hi manussānaṃ hatthato muccitvā puratthimadisaṃ olokesi,
tika-vin01t1:1318_18: Tattha devamanussā gandhamālādīhi pūjayamānā “mahāpurisa idha tumhehi sadisopi natthi,
tika-vin01t1:1318_20: Evaṃ catasso disā catasso anudisā heṭṭhā uparīti dasapi disā anuviloketvā attano sadisaṃ adisvā “ayaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1318_22: Olokesinti mama puññānubhāvena lokavivaraṇapāṭihāriye jāte paññāyamānaṃ dasasahassilokadhātuṃ maṃsacakkhunāva olokesinti attho.
tika-vin01t1:1319_5: Atthato pana pacchimāni dve purimasseva vevacanānīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1319_10: Mayhaṃ abhivādanādiraho puggaloti mayhaṃ abhivādanādikiriyāya araho anucchaviko puggalo.
tika-vin01t1:1320_3: mādisā vā arasarūpā”ti vutte brāhmaṇo thaddho bhaveyya.
tika-vin01t1:1320_5: Ayañhi pariyāyasaddo desanāvārakāraṇesu vattatīti ettha pariyāyeti desetabbamatthaṃ avagameti bodhetīti pariyāyo, desanā.
tika-vin01t1:1320_9: kāraṇanti evaṃ pariyāyasaddassa desanāvārakāraṇesu pavatti veditabbā.
tika-vin01t1:1320_19: Rūpādiparibhogena uppannataṇhāyuttasomanassavedanā rūpato nibbattitvā hadayatappanato ambarasādayo viya “rūparasā”ti vuccanti.
tika-vin01t1:1320_22: Anukkhipantoti attukkaṃsanavasena kathite brāhmaṇassa asappāyabhāvato attānaṃ anukkhipanto anukkaṃsento.
tika-vin01t1:1321_0: Etasmiṃ panatthe karaṇe sāmivacananti “jahitā”ti etasmiṃ atthe.
tika-vin01t1:1321_4: “Tālavatthuvatthukatā”ti vattabbe “oṭṭhamukho”tiādīsu viya majjhepadalopaṃ katvā akārañca dīghaṃ katvā
tika-vin01t1:1321_5: “tālāvatthukatā”ti vuttanti āha “tālavatthu viya nesaṃ vatthu katanti tālāvatthukatā”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1321_7: Yathā ārāmassa vatthubhūtapubbo padeso ārāmassa abhāve “ārāmavatthū”ti vuccati,
tika-vin01t1:1321_8: evaṃ tālassa patiṭṭhitokāso samūlaṃ uddharite tāle padesamatte ṭhite tālassa vatthubhūtapubbattā “tālavatthū”ti vuccati.
tika-vin01t1:1321_10: Kathaṃ pana tālavatthu viya nesaṃ vatthu katanti āha “yathā hī”tiādi.
tika-vin01t1:1321_12: vuttaṃ “tesaṃ pubbe uppannapubbabhāvena vatthumatte cittasantāne kate”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1321_15: Tālāvatthukatāti vuccantīti tālavatthu viya attano vatthussa katattā rūparasādayo “tālāvatthukatā”ti vuccanti.
tika-vin01t1:1321_16: Etena pahīnakilesānaṃ puna uppattiyā abhāvo dassito.
tika-vin01t1:1322_1: Matthakacchinno tālo pattaphalādīnaṃ avatthubhūto tālāvatthūti āha “matthakacchinnatālo viya katā”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1322_2: Etena “tālāvatthu viya katāti tālāvatthukatā”ti ayaṃ viggaho dassito.
tika-vin01t1:1322_3: Ettha pana avatthubhūto tālo viya katāti avatthutālākatāti vattabbe visesanassa padassa paranipātaṃ katvā “tālāvatthukatā”ti vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1322_5: rūparasādivacanena vipākadhammadhammā hutvā pubbe uppannā kusalākusaladhammā gahitā,
tika-vin01t1:1322_6: te uppannāpi matthakasadisānaṃ taṇhāvijjānaṃ maggasatthena chinnattā āyatiṃ tālapattasadise vipākakkhandhe nibbattetuṃ asamatthā jātā,
tika-vin01t1:1322_7: tasmā tālāvatthu viya katāti tālāvatthukatā rūparasādayoti.
tika-vin01t1:1322_8: Imasmiñhi atthe “abhinandantāna”nti iminā padena kusalasomanassampi saṅgahitanti vadanti.
tika-vin01t1:1323_2: saddena samānatthoti āha “yathā nesaṃ pacchābhāvo na hotī”tiādi.
tika-vin01t1:1323_3: Anuabhāvaṃ gatāti pacchā anuppattidhammatāvasena abhāvaṃ gatā vināsamupagatā,
tika-vin01t1:1323_5: “Imā anacchariyā gāthāyo paṭibhaṃsū”ti ettha anacchariyasaddaṃ udāharaṇavasena dassento āha “yathā anuacchariyā anacchariyā”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1323_6: Tattha anuacchariyāti savanakāle uparūpari vimhayakarāti attho.
tika-vin01t1:1324_1: so pariyāyo na hotīti yaṃ vandanādisāmaggirasābhāvasaṅkhātaṃ kāraṇaṃ arasarūpatāya vadesi,
tika-vin01t1:1324_4: Nanu ca brāhmaṇo yaṃ vandanādisāmaggirasābhāvasaṅkhātaṃ pariyāyaṃ sandhāya “arasarūpo bhavaṃ gotamo”ti āha,
tika-vin01t1:1324_5: so pariyāyo natthīti vutte vandanādīni bhagavā karotīti āpajjatīti imaṃ aniṭṭhappasaṅgaṃ dassento āha “kasmā pana bhagavā evamāhā”tiādi.
tika-vin01t1:1325_2: Sandhāya bhāsitamattanti yaṃ sandhāya brāhmaṇo “nibbhogo bhavaṃ gotamo”tiādimāha,
tika-vin01t1:1325_3: bhagavā ca yaṃ sandhāya nibbhogatādiṃ attani anujānāti,
tika-vin01t1:1326_5: kāyadvāre bāhullavuttito kāyato pavattaṃ duccaritanti kāyaduccaritaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1326_7: Pāṇātipātaadinnādānamicchācāracetanā veditabbāti ettha pāṇoti paramatthato jīvitindriyaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1326_10: Rūpajīvitindriye hi vikopite itarampi taṃsambandhatāya vinassati.
tika-vin01t1:1326_13: Saraseneva patanasabhāvassa antarā eva atīva pātanaṃ atipāto,
tika-vin01t1:1326_14: saṇikaṃ patituṃ adatvā sīghaṃ pātananti attho.
tika-vin01t1:1326_15: Atikkamma vā satthādīhi abhibhavitvā pātanaṃ atipāto,
tika-vin01t1:1326_18: Atthato pana pāṇe pāṇasaññino parassa jīvitindriyupacchedakapayogasamuṭṭhāpikā kāyavacīdvārānamaññatarappavattā vadhakacetanā.
tika-vin01t1:1326_19: Yāya hi cetanāya vattamānassa jīvitindriyassa nissayabhūtesu mahābhūtesu upakkamakaraṇahetukamahābhūtapaccayā uppajjanakamahābhūtā nuppajjissanti,
tika-vin01t1:1326_21: Laddhupakkamāni hi bhūtāni itarabhūtāni viya na visadānīti samānajātiyānaṃ kāraṇāni na honti.
tika-vin01t1:1327_1: khaṇe khaṇe nirujjhanasabhāvesu saṅkhāresu ko hantā,
tika-vin01t1:1327_7: so acetanatāya kaṭṭhakaliṅgarūpamoti na tattha chedanādinā pāṇātipāto labbhati yathā matasarīre.
tika-vin01t1:1327_8: Payogopi pāṇātipātassa paharaṇappahārādi atītesu vā saṅkhāresu bhaveyya anāgatesu vā paccuppannesu vā,
tika-vin01t1:1327_9: tattha na tāva atītānāgatesu sambhavati tesaṃ abhāvato,
tika-vin01t1:1327_10: paccuppannesu ca saṅkhārānaṃ khaṇikattā saraseneva nirujjhanasabhāvatāya vināsābhimukhesu nippayojano payogo siyā,
tika-vin01t1:1327_11: vināsassa ca kāraṇarahitattā na paharaṇappahārādippayogahetukaṃ maraṇaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1327_12: nirīhakatāya ca saṅkhārānaṃ kassa so payogo,
tika-vin01t1:1328_5: Vadhappayogāvisayabhāvepi tassa pañcavokārabhave rūpasantānādhīnavuttitāya rūpasantāne parena payojitajīvitindriyupacchedakapayogavasena
tika-vin01t1:1328_6: tannibbattivinibandhakavisadisarūpuppattiyā vihate vicchedo hotīti na pāṇātipātassa asambhavo,
tika-vin01t1:1328_9: Paccuppannesu saṅkhāresu katapayogavasena tadanantaraṃ uppajjanārahassa saṅkhārakalāpassa tathā anuppattito
tika-vin01t1:1328_10: khaṇikānaṃ saṅkhārānaṃ khaṇikamaraṇassa idha maraṇabhāvena anadhippetattā santatimaraṇassa ca yathāvuttanayena
tika-vin01t1:1328_12: na ca katturahito pāṇātipātapayogo nirīhakesupi saṅkhāresu sannihitatāmattena upakārakesu attano attano
tika-vin01t1:1328_15: Na ca kevalassa vadhādhippāyasahabhuno cittacetasikakalāpassa pāṇātipāto icchitabbo santānavasena avaṭṭhitasseva paṭijānanato.
tika-vin01t1:1328_16: Santānavasena vattamānānañca padīpādīnaṃ atthakiriyā dissatīti attheva pāṇātipātena kammabaddho.
tika-vin01t1:1329_0: So ca pāṇātipāto guṇavirahitesu tiracchānagatādīsu pāṇesu khuddake pāṇe appasāvajjo,
tika-vin01t1:1329_6: Sarīraguṇānaṃ pana samabhāve satipi kilesānaṃ upakkamānañca mudutāya appasāvajjo,
tika-vin01t1:1330_5: Atthato pana parapariggahe parapariggahitasaññino tadādāyakaupakkamasamuṭṭhāpikā kāyavacīdvārānamaññataradvārappavattā theyyacetanā.
tika-vin01t1:1330_9: Vatthusamatte sati guṇādhikānaṃ santake vatthusmiṃ mahāsāvajjaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1330_10: taṃtaṃguṇādhikaṃ upādāya tato tato hīnaguṇassa santake vatthusmiṃ appasāvajjaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1331_2: So pana lakkhaṇato asaddhammādhippāyena kāyadvārappavattā agamanīyaṭṭhānavītikkamacetanā.
tika-vin01t1:1331_3: So panesa micchācāro sīlādiguṇavirahite agamanīyaṭṭhāne appasāvajjo,
tika-vin01t1:1332_0: Vacīdvāre bāhullavuttito vācato pavattaṃ duccaritanti vacīduccaritaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1332_4: atathaṃ vatthuṃ tathato paraṃ viññāpetukāmassa tathāviññattisamuṭṭhāpikā cetanā.
tika-vin01t1:1332_8: Apica gahaṭṭhānaṃ attano santakaṃ adātukāmatāya natthīti ādinayappavatto appasāvajjo,
tika-vin01t1:1332_10: Pabbajitānaṃ appakampi telaṃ vā sappiṃ vā labhitvā hasādhippāyena “ajja gāme telaṃ nadī maññe sandatī”ti pūraṇakathānayena pavatto appasāvajjo,
tika-vin01t1:1332_11: adiṭṭhaṃyeva pana diṭṭhantiādinā nayena vadantānaṃ mahāsāvajjo.
tika-vin01t1:1332_18: So kāyena vā kāyapaṭibaddhena vā vācāya vā paravisaṃvādakakiriyākaraṇe daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin01t1:1332_19: Tāya ce kiriyāya paro tamatthaṃ jānāti,
tika-vin01t1:1332_21: Yasmā pana yathā kāyakāyapaṭibaddhavācāhi paraṃ visaṃvādeti,
tika-vin01t1:1332_24: “ayaṃ attho evaṃ veditabbo”ti kuṭṭādīsu likhitvā ṭhapentopi,
tika-vin01t1:1333_1: samagge satte avayavabhūte vagge bhinne karotīti attho.
tika-vin01t1:1333_3: Yāya hi vācāya yassa taṃ vācaṃ bhāsati,
tika-vin01t1:1333_7: Lakkhaṇato pana saṃkiliṭṭhacittassa paresaṃ vā bhedāya attano piyakamyatāya vā kāyavacīpayogasamuṭṭhāpikā
tika-vin01t1:1333_8: cetanā pisuṇavācā pisuṇaṃ vadati etāyāti katvā.
tika-vin01t1:1333_14: “iti ime nānā bhavissanti vinā bhavissantī”ti bhedapurekkhāratā vā “iti ahaṃ piyo bhavissāmi vissāsiko”ti piyakamyatā vā,
tika-vin01t1:1334_1: Yāya hi vācāya attānampi parampi pharusaṃ sinehābhāvena lūkhaṃ karoti,
tika-vin01t1:1334_3: Atha vā sayampi pharusā domanassasamuṭṭhitattā sabhāvenapi kakkasā neva kaṇṇasukhā na hadayasukhāti pharusavācā.
tika-vin01t1:1334_4: Ettha pana paresaṃ mammacchedanavasena pavattiyā ekantaniṭṭhuratāya sabhāvena kāraṇavohārena ca vācāya pharusasaddappavatti daṭṭhabbā.
tika-vin01t1:1334_8: eko kira dārako mātu vacanaṃ anādiyitvā araññaṃ gacchati,
tika-vin01t1:1334_9: taṃ mātā nivattetuṃ asakkontī “caṇḍā taṃ mahiṃsī anubandhatū”ti akkosi.
tika-vin01t1:1334_16: Evaṃ mammacchedakopi payogo cittasaṇhatāya pharusavācā na hoti.
tika-vin01t1:1334_17: Mātāpitaro hi kadāci puttake evampi vadanti “corā vo khaṇḍākhaṇḍikaṃ karontū”ti,
tika-vin01t1:1334_18: uppalapattampi ca nesaṃ upari patantaṃ na icchanti.
tika-vin01t1:1334_19: Ācariyupajjhāyā ca kadāci nissitake evaṃ vadanti “kiṃ ime ahirikā anottappino caranti,
tika-vin01t1:1334_24: Na hi mārāpetukāmassa “imaṃ sukhaṃ sayāpethā”ti vacanaṃ apharusavācā hoti,
tika-vin01t1:1335_0: Saṃ sukhaṃ hitañca phalati visarati vināsetīti samphaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1335_9: Pare pana taṃ kathaṃ agaṇhante kammapathabhedo natthi,
tika-vin01t1:1336_0: Abhijjhābyāpādamicchādiṭṭhiyoti ettha parasampattiṃ abhimukhaṃ jhāyatīti abhijjhā,
tika-vin01t1:1336_2: Sā pana “aho vata idaṃ mamassā”ti evaṃ parabhaṇḍābhijjhāyanalakkhaṇā.
tika-vin01t1:1336_7: Parabhaṇḍavatthuke hi lobhe uppannepi na tāva kammapathabhedo hoti,
tika-vin01t1:1336_8: yāva “aho vata idaṃ mamassā”ti attano na pariṇāmeti.
tika-vin01t1:1337_2: So pharusavācā viya appasāvajjo mahāsāvajjo ca.
tika-vin01t1:1337_6: Parasattavatthuke hi kodhe uppannepi na tāva kammapathabhedo hoti,
tika-vin01t1:1337_7: yāva “aho vatāyaṃ ucchijjeyya vinasseyyā”ti tassa vināsanaṃ na cinteti.
tika-vin01t1:1339_0: “Anekavihitānaṃ pāpakānaṃ akusalānaṃ dhammāna”nti sāmaññavacanepi pārisesañāyato vuttāvasesā akusalā dhammā gahetabbāti āha “ṭhapetvā te dhamme”tiādi.
tika-vin01t1:1340_1: Ayaṃ lokatantīti ayaṃ vuḍḍhānaṃ abhivādanādikiriyālakkhaṇā lokappaveṇī.
tika-vin01t1:1340_2: Anāgāmibrahmānaṃ alaṅkārādīsu anāgāmibhikkhūnañca cīvarādīsu nikantivasena rāguppatti hotīti anāgāmimaggena
tika-vin01t1:1340_4: Rūpādīsu pañcasu kāmaguṇesu vatthukāmakoṭṭhāsesu uppajjamāno rāgo “pañcakāmaguṇikarāgo”ti veditabbo.
tika-vin01t1:1340_5: Koṭṭhāsavacano hettha guṇasaddo “vayoguṇā anupubbaṃ jahantī”tiādīsu viya.
tika-vin01t1:1341_2: kathaṃ nāma aññesaṃ abhivādanādiṃ kareyya”nti jigucchati viya jigucchatīti vā sallakkhemi.
tika-vin01t1:1341_4: Akusale dhamme jigucchamāno tesaṃ samaṅgībhāvampi jigucchatīti vuttaṃ “akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ samāpattī”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1342_6: Vinayaṃ vā arahatīti ettha vinayanaṃ vinayo,
tika-vin01t1:1342_9: Nanu ca paṭhamaṃ vuttesu dvīsupi atthavikappesu sakatthe arahatthe ca bhaddhitapaccayo saddalakkhaṇato dissati,
tika-vin01t1:1342_10: na pana “vinayāya dhammaṃ desetī”ti imasmiṃ atthe,
