tika-vin01t1:1342_11: tasmā kathamettha taddhitapaccayoti āha “vicitrā hi taddhitavuttī”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1342_13: Tathā hi yasmiṃ yasmiṃ atthe taddhitappayogo lokassa,
tika-vin01t1:1342_14: tattha tattha taddhitavutti lokato siddhāti vicitrā taddhitavutti.
tika-vin01t1:1342_16: evaṃ vinayāya dhammaṃ desetīti venayikoti vuccatīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin01t1:1343_2: Byañjanāni avicāretvāti tissadattādisaddesu viya “imasmiṃ atthe ayaṃ nāma paccayo”ti evaṃ byañjanaṃ vicāraṃ akatvā,
tika-vin01t1:1344_1: Devalokagabbhasampattiyāti vatvā ṭhapetvā bhummadeve sesesu devesu gabbhaggahaṇassa abhāvato paṭisandhiyevettha
tika-vin01t1:1344_2: gabbhasampattīti veditabbāti vuttamevatthaṃ vivaritvā dassento āha “devalokapaṭisandhipaṭilābhāya saṃvattatī”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1344_4: Mātukucchismiṃ paṭisandhiggahaṇe dosaṃ dassentoti mātito aparisuddhabhāvaṃ dassento,
tika-vin01t1:1344_5: akkositukāmassa dāsiyā puttoti dāsikucchismiṃ nibbattabhāve dosaṃ dassetvā akkosanaṃ viya bhagavato mātukucchismiṃ
tika-vin01t1:1344_6: paṭisandhiggahaṇe dosaṃ dassetvā akkosantopi evamāhāti adhippāyo.
tika-vin01t1:1344_9: Hīno vā gabbho assāti apagabbhoti imassa viggahassa ekena pariyāyena adhippāyaṃ dassento āha “devalokagabbhaparibāhirattā
tika-vin01t1:1344_13: tasmā hīno vā gabbho assāti apagabbhoti adhippāyo.
tika-vin01t1:1345_1: dassentoti heṭṭhā vuttanayassa anurūpaṃ katvā adhippāyaṃ dassento āha “hīno vāssa mātukucchismiṃ gabbhavāso ahosīti adhippāyo”ti. Gabbha-
tika-vin01t1:1345_2: saddo atthi mātukucchipariyāyo “gabbhe vasati māṇavo”tiādīsu viya.
tika-vin01t1:1345_3: Atthi mātukucchismiṃ nibbattasattapariyāyo “antamaso gabbhapātanaṃ upādāyā”tiādīsu viya.
tika-vin01t1:1345_4: Tattha mātukucchipariyāyaṃ gahetvā atthaṃ dassento āha “anāgate gabbhaseyyā”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1345_9: Ettha ca yadipi “apagabbho”ti imassa anurūpato gabbhaseyyā eva vattabbā,
tika-vin01t1:1345_10: pasaṅgato pana labbhamānaṃ sabbampi vattuṃ vaṭṭatīti punabbhavābhinibbattipi vuttāti veditabbā.
tika-vin01t1:1346_0: Idāni sattapariyāyassa gabbhasaddassa vasena viggahanānattaṃ dassento āha “apicā”tiādi.
tika-vin01t1:1346_1: Imasmiṃ pana vikappe gabbhaseyyā punabbhavābhinibbattīti ubhayampi gabbhaseyyavaseneva vuttantipi vadanti.
tika-vin01t1:1346_2: Nanu ca “āyatiṃ gabbhaseyyā pahīnā”ti vuttattā gabbhassa seyyā eva pahīnā,
tika-vin01t1:1346_3: na pana gabbhoti āpajjatīti āha “yathā cā”tiādi.
tika-vin01t1:1346_4: Atha “abhinibbattī”ti ettakameva avatvā punabbhavaggahaṇaṃ kimatthanti āha “abhinibbatti ca nāmā”tiādi.
tika-vin01t1:1346_5: Apunabbhavabhūtāti khaṇe khaṇe uppajjamānānaṃ dhammānaṃ abhinibbatti.
tika-vin01t1:1347_1: Dhammadhātunti ettha dhamme anavasese dhāreti yāthāvato upadhāretīti dhammadhātu,
tika-vin01t1:1347_7: Desanāvilāsappatto hotīti rucivasena parivattetvā desetuṃ samatthatā desanāvilāso,
tika-vin01t1:1347_10: Tādiguṇalakkhaṇameva puna upamāya vibhāvetvā dassento āha “pathavīsamacittata”nti.
tika-vin01t1:1347_13: evaṃ iṭṭhāniṭṭhesu lābhālābhādīsu anurodhavirodhappahānato avikampitacittatāya pathavīsamacittatanti attho.
tika-vin01t1:1347_14: Akuppadhammatanti ettha “akuppadhammo nāma phalasamāpattī”ti tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1347_15: “Paresu pana akkosantesupi attano pathavīsamacittatālakkhaṇaṃ akujjhanasabhāvatanti evamettha attho gahetabbo”ti amhākaṃ khanti.
tika-vin01t1:1347_18: Brāhmaṇassa vuḍḍhatāya āsannavuttimaraṇanti sambhāvanavasena “ajja maritvā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1347_19: Mahantena kho pana ussāhenāti “sādhu kho pana tathārūpānaṃ arahataṃ dassanaṃ hotī”ti evaṃ sañjātamahussāhena.
tika-vin01t1:1348_6: Evañhi loke siliṭṭhavacanaṃ hotīti evaṃ ekameva gaṇanaṃ avatvā aparāya gaṇanāya saddhiṃ vacanaṃ loke
tika-vin01t1:1348_7: siliṭṭhavacanaṃ hoti yathā “dve vā tīṇi vā udakaphusitānī”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1348_8: Sammā adhisayitānīti pādādīhi attanā nesaṃ kiñci upaghātaṃ akarontiyā bahivātādiparissayaparihāratthaṃ sammadeva upari sayitāni.
tika-vin01t1:1348_10: Utuṃ gaṇhāpentiyāti tesaṃ allasinehapariyādānatthaṃ attano kāyusmāvasena utuṃ gaṇhāpentiyā.
tika-vin01t1:1348_12: Sammā paribhāvitānīti sammadeva sabbaso kukkuṭavāsanāya vāsitāni.
tika-vin01t1:1349_0: Ettha ca sammā parisedanaṃ kukkuṭagandhaparibhāvanañca sammā adhisayananipphattiyā ānubhāvanipphāditanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1349_2: Na hi sammā adhisayanato visuṃ sammā parisedanassa sammā paribhāvanassa ca karaṇaṃ atthi,
tika-vin01t1:1349_3: tena pana saddhiṃyeva itaresaṃ dvinnampi ijjhanato vuttaṃ “evaṃ tīhi pakārehi tāni aṇḍāni paripāliyamānānī”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1349_6: Kapālassa tanukattāti ettha yathā kapālassa tanutā ālokassa anto paññāyamānassa kāraṇaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1349_7: tathā kapālassa tanutāya nakhasikhāmukhatuṇḍakānaṃ kharatāya ca allasinehapariyādānaṃ kāraṇavacananti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1349_9: Na hi kukkuṭānaṃ pakkhato añño hattho nāma atthi.
tika-vin01t1:1350_0: So jeṭṭho iti assa vacanīyoti yo paṭhamataraṃ aṇḍakosato nikkhanto kukkuṭapotako,
tika-vin01t1:1350_4: Tibhūmakapariyāpannāpi sattā avijjākosassa anto paviṭṭhā tattha tattha appahīnāya avijjāya veṭhitattāti āha “avijjākosassa anto paviṭṭhesu sattesū”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1350_9: tasmā sammā aviparītenākārena sayameva cattāri saccāni bujjhati paṭivijjhatīti sammāsambodhīti maggo vuccati.
tika-vin01t1:1350_13: saddo sundaravacanoti āha “atha vā pasatthaṃ sundarañca bodhi”nti.
tika-vin01t1:1350_14: Bodhisaddassa anekatthataṃ dassetvā idhādhippetamatthaṃ niddhāretvā dassetukāmo āha “bodhīti rukkhopi maggopī”tiādi.
tika-vin01t1:1350_17: bujjhanti vā tena ariyāti maggo bodhi.
tika-vin01t1:1350_18: Sabbadhamme sabbākārato bujjhati paṭivijjhatīti sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ bodhi.
tika-vin01t1:1350_20: Antarā ca bodhinti dutiyamudāharaṇaṃ vināpi rukkhasaddena bodhisaddassa rukkhe pavattidassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1351_0: Tisso vijjāti upanissayavato saheva arahattaphalena tisso vijjā deti.
tika-vin01t1:1351_1: Nanu cettha tīsu vijjāsu āsavakkhayañāṇassa maggapariyāpannattā kathametaṃ yujjati “maggo tisso vijjā detī”ti?
tika-vin01t1:1351_3: Satipi āsavakkhayañāṇassa maggapariyāpannabhāve aṭṭhaṅgike magge sati maggañāṇena saddhiṃ tisso vijjā
tika-vin01t1:1351_4: paripuṇṇā hontīti “maggo tisso vijjā detī”ti vuccati.
tika-vin01t1:1351_7: Paccekabodhiñāṇanti etthāpi imināva nayena attho veditabbo.
tika-vin01t1:1351_11: Paṭivedhopi na dūre ṭhitassa lakkhaṇappaṭivedho viyāti āha “pattomhī”ti,
tika-vin01t1:1352_2: Yathā kukkuṭiyā aṇḍesu tividhakiriyākaraṇaṃ kukkuṭacchāpakānaṃ aṇḍakosato nikkhamanassa mūlakāraṇaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1352_3: evaṃ bodhisattabhūtassa bhagavato tividhānupassanākaraṇaṃ avijjaṇḍakosato nikkhamanassa mūlakāraṇanti āha “yathā hi tassā kukkuṭiyā…pe…
tika-vin01t1:1352_5: “Santāne”ti vuttattā aṇḍasadisatā santānassa bahi nikkhantakukkuṭacchāpakasadisatā buddhaguṇānaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1352_6: buddhaguṇāti ca atthato buddhoyeva “tathāgatassa kho etaṃ, vāseṭṭha,
tika-vin01t1:1352_11: Tikkhakharavippasannasūrabhāvoti ettha pariggayhamānesu saṅkhāresu vipassanāñāṇassa samādhindriyavasena sukhānuppaveso tikkhatā,
tika-vin01t1:1352_13: Tikkhopi hi ekacco saro lakkhaṃ patvā kuṇṭho hoti,
tika-vin01t1:1352_15: Satipi kharabhāve sukhumappavattivasena kilesasamudācārasaṅkhobharahitatāya saddhindriyavasena pasannabhāvo,
tika-vin01t1:1352_16: satipi ca pasannabhāve antarā anosakkitvā kilesapaccatthikānaṃ suṭṭhu abhibhavanato vīriyindriyavasena sūrabhāvo veditabbo.
tika-vin01t1:1352_19: tadā ca sā maggañāṇagabbhaṃ dhārentī viya hotīti āha “gabbhaggahaṇakālo”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1352_20: Gabbhaṃ gaṇhāpetvāti saṅkhārupekkhāya anantaraṃ sikhāppattaanulomavipassanāvasena maggavijāyanatthaṃ gabbhaṃ gaṇhāpetvā.
tika-vin01t1:1353_0: Idāni “āraddhaṃ kho pana me brāhmaṇa vīriya”ntiādikāya desanāya anusandhiṃ dassento āha “evaṃ bhagavā”tiādi.
tika-vin01t1:1353_1: Tattha pubbabhāgato pabhutīti bhāvanāya pubbabhāgiyavīriyārambhādito paṭṭhāya.
tika-vin01t1:1353_2: Cittamevamuppannanti evaṃ upari vakkhamānaparivitakkavasena cittamuppannanti attho.
tika-vin01t1:1353_11: sā ettha maṇḍā pasannā jātāti so padeso “bodhimaṇḍo”ti paññāto.
tika-vin01t1:1353_12: Caturaṅgasamannāgatanti “kāmaṃ taco ca nhāru ca aṭṭhi ca avasissatu,
tika-vin01t1:1353_13: sarīre upasussatu maṃsalohita”nti evaṃ vuttacaturaṅgasamannāgataṃ vīriyaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1353_14: Tattha tacoti ekaṃ aṅgaṃ nhāru ekaṃ aṅgaṃ aṭṭhi ekaṃ aṅgaṃ maṃsalohitaṃ ekaṃ aṅganti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1353_15: Taco ekaṃ aṅganti ca tace nirapekkhabhāvo ekaṃ aṅganti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1353_16: Padhānaṃ anuyuñjantassa hi tace palujjamānepi taṃnimittaṃ avosānāpajjanaṃ tassa vīriyassa ekaṃ aṅgaṃ ekaṃ kāraṇaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1353_18: Paggahitanti ārambhaṃ sithilaṃ akatvā daḷhaparakkamasaṅkhātussāhanabhāvena gahitaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1354_1: Upaṭṭhitāti ogāhanasaṅkhātena apilāpabhāvena ārammaṇaṃ upagantvā ṭhitā.
tika-vin01t1:1354_3: Sammosassa viddhaṃsanavasena pavattiyā na sammuṭṭhāti asammuṭṭhā.
tika-vin01t1:1354_6: tathāpi yasmā kāyapassaddhi uppajjamānā cittapassaddhiyā saheva uppajjati, na vinā,
tika-vin01t1:1354_8: Kāyapassaddhiyā ubhayesampi kāyānaṃ passambhanāvahattā vuttaṃ “rūpakāyopi passaddhoyeva hotī”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1354_9: So ca khoti so ca kho kāyo.
tika-vin01t1:1354_11: Nāmakāye hi vigatadarathe rūpakāyopi vūpasantadarathapariḷāho hoti.
tika-vin01t1:1354_12: Sammā āhitanti nānārammaṇesu vidhāvanasaṅkhātaṃ vikkhepaṃ vicchinditvā ekasmiṃyeva ārammaṇe avikkhittabhāvāpādanena sammadeva āhitaṃ ṭhapitaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1354_15: sā sati ekaggatāya na hotīti āha “ekaggaṃ acalaṃ nipphandana”nti.
tika-vin01t1:1355_0: Nanu ca saddhāpaññānampi kiccasiddhi jhānassa pubbapaṭipadāya icchitabbāti?
tika-vin01t1:1355_2: sā pana nānantarikabhāvena avuttasiddhāti na gahitā.
tika-vin01t1:1355_4: paññāpariggahe ca nesaṃ asati ñāyārambhādibhāvo na siyā,
tika-vin01t1:1355_5: tathā asallīnāsammosatādayo vīriyādīnanti asallīnatādiggahaṇenevettha paññākiccasiddhi gahitāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1355_6: Jhānabhāvanāyaṃ vā samādhikiccaṃ adhikaṃ icchitabbanti dassetuṃ samādhipariyosānāva jhānassa pubbapaṭipadā kathitāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1357_0: Idāni “vivicceva kāmehī”tiādinayappavattāya pāḷiyā jhānavibhaṅge vuttampi atthaṃ aṭṭhakathānayeneva saṃvaṇṇetukāmo
tika-vin01t1:1357_1: vibhaṅgapāḷiyaṃ vuttanayena avacane kāraṇaṃ dassetuṃ “kiñcāpi tattha katame kāmā”tiādimāha.
tika-vin01t1:1357_2: Tattha patthanākārena pavatto dubbalo lobho chandanaṭṭhena chando,
tika-vin01t1:1357_7: Tattha nimittasaṅkappanā nāma avayave samodhānetvā “itthī puriso”tiādinā ekajjhaṃ katvā uparūpari kilesuppattiyā nimittassa kappanā.
tika-vin01t1:1357_9: pādā sobhanā”ti evaṃ anubyañjanavasena vibhajitvā kappanāti.
tika-vin01t1:1357_10: Kilesānañhi anu anu byañjanato paribyañjanato paribyattivasena uppattiyā paccayabhāvato anubyañjanaṃ hatthapādādiavayavā vuccanti.
tika-vin01t1:1357_13: Svāyaṃ pabhedo ekasseva lobhassa pavattiākāravasena avatthābhedavasena ca veditabbo yathā “vaccho dammo balībaddo”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1358_5: Vivicceva kāmehīti ettha viviccāti iminā vivecanaṃ jhānakkhaṇe kāmānaṃ abhāvamattaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1358_6: Viviccevāti pana iminā ekaṃsato kāmānaṃ vivecetabbatādīpanena tappaṭipakkhatā jhānassa kāmavivekappahānassa
tika-vin01t1:1358_7: ca jhānādhigamūpāyatā dassitā hotīti imamatthaṃ dassetuṃ “paṭhamajjhāna”ntiādiṃ vatvā tamevatthaṃ pākaṭataraṃ
tika-vin01t1:1358_9: Andhakāre sati padīpo viyāti etena yathā padīpābhāvena rattiyaṃ andhakārābhibhavo,
tika-vin01t1:1359_1: na kho pana evaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ “kāmehi evā”ti avadhāraṇassa akatattā.
tika-vin01t1:1359_7: Kathaṃ pana samāne vikkhambhane kāmānamevetaṃ nissaraṇaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1359_8: na byāpādādīnanti codanaṃ yuttito āgamato ca sādhetuṃ “kāmadhātū”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1359_15: Vipākena cettha kāmadhātusamatikkamo attano pavattikkhaṇe kāmarāgapaṭipakkhatā ca veditabbā.
tika-vin01t1:1359_16: Evamattano pavattiyā vipākappavattiyā ca kāmarāgato kāmadhātuto ca vinivattasabhāvattā idaṃ jhānaṃ visesato kāmānameva nissaraṇaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1360_0: Kāmañcettha tamatthaṃ dīpetuṃ purimapadeyeva avadhāraṇaṃ gahitaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1360_1: uttarapadepi pana taṃ gahetabbameva tathā atthasambhavatoti dassetuṃ “uttarapadepī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1360_7: Tayo eva idha daṭṭhabbāti tayo eva idha jhānakathāyaṃ daṭṭhabbā samucchedavivekādīnaṃ asambhavato.
tika-vin01t1:1360_9: Tattha hi “uddānato dve kāmā vatthukāmā kilesakāmā cā”ti uddisitvā tattha “katame vatthukāmā manāpiyā rūpā…pe…
tika-vin01t1:1360_14: Evañhi satīti evaṃ ubhayesampi kāmānaṃ saṅgahe sati.
tika-vin01t1:1360_15: Vatthukāmehipīti vatthukāmehi viviccevātipi attho yujjatīti evaṃ yujjamānatthantarasamuccayattho pi- saddo,
tika-vin01t1:1360_17: Imasmiṃ atthe kilesakāmehi vivekassa dutiyapadena vuttattā.
tika-vin01t1:1360_19: Kāyaviveko vutto hotīti puttadārādipariggahavivekadīpanato kāyaviveko vutto hoti.
tika-vin01t1:1361_1: Etthāti “vivicceva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehī”ti etasmiṃ padadvaye.
tika-vin01t1:1361_5: sabbathā kilesakāmehi viveko vuttoti āha “dutiyena kilesakāmehi vivekavacanato”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1361_10: Lolabhāvo nāma tattha tattha rūpādīsu taṇhuppādo,
tika-vin01t1:1361_17: Kāmaguṇādhigamahetu pāṇātipātādiasuddhappayogo hotīti tabbivekena payogasuddhi vibhāvitā.
tika-vin01t1:1361_19: Āsayaposananti ca jhānabhāvanāya paccayabhūtā pubbayogādivasena siddhā ajjhāsayasampadā,
tika-vin01t1:1362_4: Jhānapaṭipakkhatoti jhānassa paṭipakkhabhāvato taṃhetu taṃnimittaṃ visuṃ vutto,
tika-vin01t1:1362_12: Tattha paccanīkapaṭipakkhabhāvadassanatoti upari vuccamānajhānaṅgānaṃ ujuvipaccanīkavasena paṭipakkhabhāvadassanatoti atthaṃ vadanti.
tika-vin01t1:1362_15: Samādhi kāmacchandassa paṭipakkhoti rāgapaṇidhiyā ujuvipaccanīkabhāvato nānārammaṇehi palobhitassa paribbhamantassa
tika-vin01t1:1362_17: Pīti byāpādassāti pāmojjena samānayogakkhemattā byāpādassa pīti paṭipakkhā.
tika-vin01t1:1362_18: Vitakko thinamiddhassāti yoniso saṅkappanavasena savipphārappavattito vitakko thinamiddhassa paṭipakkho.
tika-vin01t1:1362_19: Sukhaṃ uddhaccakukkuccassāti sukhaṃ vūpasantasītalasabhāvattā avūpasamānutāpasabhāvassa uddhaccakukkuccassa paṭipakkhaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1362_20: Vicāro vicikicchāyāti vicāro ārammaṇe anumajjanavasena paññāpatirūpasabhāvattā vicikicchāya paṭipakkho.
tika-vin01t1:1363_2: mohādhikehi thinamiddhādīhi vivekavacanena paṭicchādanavasena dukkhādipubbantādibhedavisayassa mohassa vikkhambhanaviveko vutto.
tika-vin01t1:1363_4: tena sabhāvena sabbākusalappahāyakaṃ hontampi kāmarāgādivikkhambhanasabhāvameva hoti taṃsabhāvattāti
tika-vin01t1:1363_5: avisesetvā nīvaraṇākusalamūlādīnaṃ vikkhambhanaviveko vutto hotīti āha.
tika-vin01t1:1364_0: Yathāpaccayaṃ pavattamānānaṃ sabhāvadhammānaṃ natthi kāci vasavattitāti vasavattibhāvanivāraṇatthaṃ “vitakkanaṃ vitakko”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1364_2: sā ca vitakkassa attano paccayehi pavattimattamevāti bhāvaniddeso vasavattibhāvanivāraṇāya hoti.
tika-vin01t1:1364_3: Tayidaṃ vitakkanaṃ “īdisamida”nti ārammaṇaparikappananti āha “ūhananti vuttaṃ hotī”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1364_4: Yasmā cittaṃ vitakkabalena ārammaṇaṃ abhiniruḷhaṃ viya hoti,
tika-vin01t1:1364_6: Yathā hi koci rājavallabhaṃ ñātiṃ vā mittaṃ vā nissāya rājagehaṃ ārohati anupavisati,
tika-vin01t1:1364_7: evaṃ vitakkaṃ nissāya cittaṃ ārammaṇaṃ ārohati.
tika-vin01t1:1364_8: Yadi evaṃ kathaṃ avitakkaṃ cittaṃ ārammaṇaṃ ārohatīti?
tika-vin01t1:1364_10: Yathā hi so puriso paricayena tena vināpi nirāsaṅko rājagehaṃ pavisati,
tika-vin01t1:1364_11: evaṃ paricayena vitakkena vināpi avitakkaṃ cittaṃ ārammaṇaṃ ārohati.
tika-vin01t1:1364_13: Vitakkassa hi santāne abhiṇhaṃ pavattassa vasena cittassa ārammaṇābhiruhanaṃ ciraparicitaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1364_14: tena taṃ kadāci vitakkena vināpi tattha pavattateva.
tika-vin01t1:1364_15: Yathā taṃ ñāṇasahitaṃ hutvā sammasanavasena ciraparicitaṃ kadāci ñāṇarahitampi sammasanavasena pavattati,
tika-vin01t1:1364_16: yathā vā kilesasahitaṃ hutvā pavattaṃ sabbaso kilesarahitampi paricayena kilesavāsanāvasena pavattati,
tika-vin01t1:1365_4: pathavī pathavī”ti ākoṭentassa viya pavatti āhananaṃ pariyāhanananti ca veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1365_6: taṃ tassa gahaṇayogyaṃ karonto vitakko ākoṭento viya hoti.
tika-vin01t1:1365_7: Yadi evaṃ nāgasenattherena “ākoṭanalakkhaṇo vitakko. Yathā, mahārāja,
tika-vin01t1:1365_8: bherī ākoṭitā atha pacchā anuravati anusaddāyati,
tika-vin01t1:1365_13: evaṃ vicāro daṭṭhabbo”ti ākoṭanalakkhaṇatā vitakkassa kasmā vuttā?
tika-vin01t1:1365_15: Therena hi kiccasannissitaṃ katvā lakkhaṇaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1365_16: Dhammānañhi sabhāvavinimuttā kāci kiriyā nāma natthi tathā gahetabbākāro ca.
tika-vin01t1:1365_17: Bodhaneyyajanānurodhena pana paramatthato ekībhāvopi sabhāvadhammo pariyāyavacanehi viya samāropitarūpehi bahūhi pakārehi pakāsīyati.
tika-vin01t1:1365_19: Ānayanapaccupaṭṭhānoti ettha ānayanaṃ citte ārammaṇassa upanayanaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1366_1: Svāyaṃ viseso santānamhi labbhamāno eva santāne pākaṭo hotīti daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin01t1:1366_5: Tathā hi “vicāro parimajjanahattho viya sañcaraṇahattho viyā”ti ca vutto.
tika-vin01t1:1366_8: Anuppabandhanaṃ ārammaṇe cittassa avicchinnassa viya pavatti.
tika-vin01t1:1366_15: evaṃ ārammaṇābhimukhaniropanaṭṭhena vitakko cetaso paṭhamābhinipāto viya hotīti āha “ghaṇṭābhighātasaddo viyā”tiādi.
tika-vin01t1:1366_16: Vipphāravāti ettha vipphāro nāma vitakkassa thinamiddhapaṭipakkho ārammaṇe anolīnatā asaṅkoco,
tika-vin01t1:1366_17: so pana abhiniropanabhāvena calanaṃ viya hotīti adhippāyenāha “paripphandanabhāvo cittassā”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1366_18: Paribbhamanaṃ viyāti ettha parissayābhāvavīmaṃsanatthaṃ paribbhamananti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1367_0: “Ākāse gacchato mahāsakuṇassa ubhohi pakkhehi vātaṃ gahetvā pakkhe sannisīdāpetvā gamanaṃ viya ārammaṇe cetaso abhiniropanabhāvena pavatto vitakko,
tika-vin01t1:1367_1: vātaggahaṇatthaṃ pakkhe phandāpayamānassa gamanaṃ viya anumajjanabhāvena pavatto vicāro”ti –
tika-vin01t1:1368_2: Tathā hi upacāre vā appanāyaṃ vā santānena pavattiyaṃ vitakko niccalo hutvā ārammaṇaṃ anupavisitvā viya pavattati,
tika-vin01t1:1368_4: Yathā hi apubbārammaṇe paṭhamābhinipātabhūto vitakko vipphāravā hoti,
tika-vin01t1:1368_5: na tathā ekasmiṃyeva ārammaṇe nirantaraṃ anuppabandhavasena pavattiyaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1368_7: Paṭhamadutiyajjhānesu pākaṭo hotīti vitakkassa viseso abhiniropanākāro oḷārikattā paṭhamajjhāne pākaṭo hoti,
tika-vin01t1:1368_8: tadabhāvato pañcakanaye dutiyajjhāne vicārassa viseso anumajjanākāro pākaṭo hoti.
tika-vin01t1:1369_1: malaggahitaṃ kaṃsabhājanaṃ ekena hatthena daḷhaṃ gahetvā itarena hatthena cuṇṇatelaeḷakalomādikatacumbaṭakena
tika-vin01t1:1369_4: Tathā kumbhakārassa daṇḍappahārena cakkaṃ bhamayitvā bhājanaṃ karontassa piṇḍassa uppīḷanahattho viya vitakko,
tika-vin01t1:1369_5: tasseva ito cito ca sañcaraṇahattho viya vicāro.
tika-vin01t1:1369_6: Tathā kaṃsabhājanādīsu kiñci maṇḍalaṃ vaṭṭalekhaṃ karontassa majjhe sannirumbhitvā ṭhitakaṇṭako viya abhiniropano vitakko,
tika-vin01t1:1369_7: bahi paribbhamanakaṇṭako viya anumajjano vicāroti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1370_0: Yathā pupphaphalasākhādiavayavavinimutto avijjamānopi rukkho “sapuppho saphalo”ti voharīyati,
tika-vin01t1:1370_1: evaṃ vitakkādiaṅgavinimuttaṃ avijjamānampi jhānaṃ “savitakkaṃ savicāra”nti voharīyatīti dassetuṃ “rukkho viyā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1370_2: Vibhaṅge panātiādīsu jhānabhāvanāya puggalavasena desetabbattā “idha bhikkhu vivicceva kāmehī”tiādinā puggalādhiṭṭhānena jhānāni uddiṭṭhānīti.
tika-vin01t1:1370_4: attho pana tatrāpi vibhaṅgepi yathā idha “iminā ca vitakkenā”tiādinā dhammavasena vutto,
tika-vin01t1:1370_7: Atha vā jhānasamaṅgino vitakkavicārasamaṅgitādassanena jhānasseva savitakkasavicāratā vuttāti āha “attho pana tatrāpi evameva daṭṭhabbo”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1371_3: Vivekasaddassa kattusādhanataṃ kammasādhanataṃ vā sandhāyāha “tasmiṃ vā viveke”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1371_4: “Vivitto”ti hi iminā nīvaraṇehi vinābhūto tehi vivecitoti ca sādhanadvayampi saṅgahitamevāti.
tika-vin01t1:1371_12: Svāyaṃ kattuniddeso pariyāyaladdho dhammato aññassa kattunivattanattho,
tika-vin01t1:1371_13: nippariyāyena pana bhāvasādhanameva labbhatīti “sukhanaṃ sukha”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1371_15: sampayuttadhamme vā attani sādayatīti sātaṃ da-
tika-vin01t1:1371_21: dukkhaṃ viya avissajjetvā adukkhamasukhā viya anajjhupekkhitvā anu anu gaṇhanaṃ upakāritā vā anuggaho.
tika-vin01t1:1371_27: tattha sukhanti vitakkassa viya vicārena pītiyā sukhena accantasaṃyogamāha.
tika-vin01t1:1371_29: tattha na niyamato pītīti vicārassa viya vitakkena,
tika-vin01t1:1372_3: Vanacchāyappavesanaudakaparibhogesu viya sukhanti yathā hi puriso mahākantāramaggaṃ paṭipanno ghammapareto
tika-vin01t1:1372_4: tasito pipāsito paṭipathe purisaṃ disvā “kattha pānīyaṃ atthī”ti puccheyya,
tika-vin01t1:1372_7: so tassa kathaṃ sutvāva haṭṭhapahaṭṭho bhaveyya,
tika-vin01t1:1372_8: tato gacchanto bhūmiyaṃ patitāni uppaladalanāḷapattādīni disvā suṭṭhutaraṃ haṭṭhapahaṭṭho hutvā gacchanto allavatthe allakese purise passeyya,
tika-vin01t1:1372_13: so bhiyyo bhiyyo haṭṭhapahaṭṭho hutvā jātassaraṃ otaritvā yathāruci nhatvā ca pivitvā ca passaddhadaratho
tika-vin01t1:1372_14: bhisamuḷālapokkharādīni khāditvā nīluppalādīni piḷandhitvā mandālavamūlāni khandhe khipitvā uttaritvā
tika-vin01t1:1372_15: sāṭakaṃ nivāsetvā udakasāṭakaṃ ātape katvā sītacchāyāya mandamande vāte paharante nipannova “aho sukhaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1372_18: Tassa hi purisassa jātassaravanasaṇḍasavanato paṭṭhāya yāva udakadassanā haṭṭhapahaṭṭhakālo viya pubbabhāgārammaṇe haṭṭhapahaṭṭhākārā pīti,
tika-vin01t1:1372_19: nhāyitvā ca pivitvā ca sītacchāyāya mandamande vāte paharante “aho sukhaṃ aho sukha”nti vadanto nipannakālo
tika-vin01t1:1373_0: Tasmiṃ tasmiṃ samayeti iṭṭhārammaṇassa paṭilābhasamaye paṭiladdhassa rasānubhavanasamaye vanacchāyādīnaṃ savanadassanasamaye paribhogasamaye ca.
tika-vin01t1:1373_2: Vivekajaṃ pītisukhanti ettha purimasmiṃ atthe vivekajanti jhānaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1373_4: asmiṃ vā jhāneti ettha akāro daṭṭhabbo yathā arisasoti.
tika-vin01t1:1373_6: vivekajaṃpītisukhanti ca aññapadatthasamāso paccattaniddesassa ca alopo kato,
tika-vin01t1:1373_7: lope vā sati “vivekajapītisukha”nti pāṭhoti ayaṃ viseso.
tika-vin01t1:1374_3: gaṇanānupubbatāmattaṃ vā paṭhamanti idaṃ vacananti attho.
tika-vin01t1:1374_4: Paṭhamaṃ samāpajjatīti paṭhamanti idaṃ pana na ekantalakkhaṇaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1374_5: Ciṇṇavasībhāvo hi aṭṭhasamāpattilābhī ādito paṭṭhāya matthakaṃ pāpentopi samāpajjituṃ sakkoti,
tika-vin01t1:1374_6: matthakato paṭṭhāya ādiṃ pāpentopi samāpajjituṃ sakkoti,
tika-vin01t1:1374_8: Evaṃ pubbuppattiyaṭṭhena pana paṭhamaṃ uppannantipi paṭhamaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1374_17: Kasiṇārammaṇūpanijjhāyanatoti pathavīkasiṇādino attano ārammaṇassa rūpaṃ viya cakkhunā upanijjhāyanato.
tika-vin01t1:1374_18: Lakkhaṇūpanijjhāyanatoti yathāsambhavaṃ aniccādilakkhaṇattayassa nibbānadhātuyā tathalakkhaṇassa ca upanijjhāyanato.
tika-vin01t1:1374_20: Niccādivipallāsappahānena maggo asammohato aniccādilakkhaṇāni upanijjhāyatīti lakkhaṇūpanijjhānanti āha “vipassanāya upanijjhāyanakicca”ntiādi.
tika-vin01t1:1374_21: Tathalakkhaṇanti avināsadhammassa nibbānassa anaññathābhāvato aviparītasabhāvo tathalakkhaṇaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1375_1: Añño apadesāraho hotīti dhanato parijanato ca añño dhanavā parijanavā ca puriso saha dhanena vattati
tika-vin01t1:1375_2: parijanena cāti sadhano saparijanoti apadesaṃ arahatīti apadesāraho hoti,
tika-vin01t1:1375_4: Senaṅgesu eva senāsammutīti rathādisenaṅgavinimuttāya senāya abhāvepi rathehi pattīhi ca saha vattanato
tika-vin01t1:1375_5: sarathā sapatti senāti rathādisenaṅgesuyeva senāvohāroti attho.
tika-vin01t1:1375_6: Kasmā panettha jhānapāṭhe aggahitā cittekaggatā gahitāti anuyogaṃ sandhāyāha “avuttattā”tiādi.
tika-vin01t1:1375_7: Evaṃ vuttāyevāti evaṃ sarūpato vibhaṅge vuttāyeva.
tika-vin01t1:1375_8: Sacittekaggatanti idha avuttepīti “sacittekaggata”nti evaṃ sarūpato imasmiṃ jhānapāṭhe avuttepīti attho,
tika-vin01t1:1375_13: taṃ dhammaṃ dīpetuṃ tassa pakāsanādhippāyena “savitakkaṃ savicāra”ntiādinā uddeso kato,
tika-vin01t1:1375_14: so eva adhippāyo tena bhagavatā vibhaṅge “cittassekaggatā”ti niddisantena pakāsito,
tika-vin01t1:1375_15: tasmā sā jhānapāṭhe aggahitāti na cintetabbanti.
tika-vin01t1:1376_1: saṃsaddā “upalabbhatī”tiādīsu viya niratthakāti dassetuṃ “upagantvā”tiādiṃ vatvā puna tesaṃ sātthakabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “upasampādayitvā”tiādi vuttaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1376_2: tasmā upasampajjāti ettha patvā sādhetvāti vā attho.
tika-vin01t1:1379_2: tañca vitakkavicārānaṃ atikkamo atthato dutiyajjhānakkhaṇe anuppādoti āha “samatikkamā”tiādi.
tika-vin01t1:1379_9: Na hi kadāci paṭhamajjhānaṃ vitakkavicārarahitaṃ atthi.
tika-vin01t1:1379_11: evampi nattheva vūpasamo sabbena sabbaṃ tesaṃ tattha abhāvatoti imaṃ anuyogaṃ sandhāyāha “tattha kiñcāpī”tiādi.
tika-vin01t1:1379_12: Yasmā diṭṭhādīnavassa taṃtaṃjhānakkhaṇe anuppattidhammatāpādanaṃ vūpasamanaṃ adhippetaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1379_13: vitakkādayo eva ca jhānaṅgabhūtā tathā karīyanti,
tika-vin01t1:1379_16: Yasmā pana vitakkādīnaṃ viya taṃsampayuttadhammānampi “etena etaṃ oḷārika”nti ādīnavadassanaṃ sutte āgataṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1379_17: tasmā avisesena vitakkādīnaṃ taṃsahagatānañca vūpasamādike vattabbe vitakkādīnaṃyeva vūpasamo vuccamāno
tika-vin01t1:1379_18: adhikavacanaṃ aññamatthaṃ bodhetīti katvā kañci visesaṃ dīpetīti dassento “oḷārikassa panā”tiādimāha.
tika-vin01t1:1379_22: na sabhāvato anoḷārikānaṃ phassādīnaṃ samatikkamāti ayamattho “vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamā”ti etena dīpito,
tika-vin01t1:1379_27: tesaṃ ekadesabhūtaṃ vitakkavicārasamatikkamavacanaṃ avayavena samudāyopalakkhaṇanayena taṃ dīpakaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1379_28: Visuṃ visuṃ ṭhitepi hi vitakkavicārasamatikkamavacanādike paheyyaṅganiddesatāsāmaññena cittena samūhato
tika-vin01t1:1379_30: Atha vā vitakkavicāravūpasamavacaneneva taṃsamatikkamā dutiyādiadhigamadīpakena pītivirāgādivacanānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1379_31: pītiādisamatikkamā tatiyādiadhigamadīpakatā dīpitā hotīti tassa taṃdīpakatā vuttā.
tika-vin01t1:1379_32: Evañhi avayavena samudāyopalakkhaṇaṃ vinā vitakkavicāravūpasamavacanena pītivirāgādivacanānaṃ savisaye samānabyāpāratā dassitā hoti.
tika-vin01t1:1380_1: na ajjhattajjhattādīti dassento āha “ajjhattanti niyakajjhattaṃ adhippeta”nti.
tika-vin01t1:1381_0: Nīlavaṇṇayogato nīlavatthaṃ viyāti nīlayogato vatthaṃ nīlaṃ viyāti adhippāyo.
tika-vin01t1:1381_5: “Yāva na pare ekagate karomī”tiādīsu seṭṭhavacanopi ekasaddo loke dissatīti āha “seṭṭhopi hi loke ekoti vuccatī”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1381_6: “Ekākīhi khuddakehi jita”ntiādīsu asahāyatthopi ekasaddo diṭṭhoti āha “eko asahāyo hutvā”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1381_7: Saddhādayopi kāmaṃ sampayuttadhammānaṃ sādhāraṇato ca asādhāraṇato ca paccayā hontiyeva,
tika-vin01t1:1381_8: samādhi pana jhānakkhaṇe sampayuttadhammānaṃ avikkhepalakkhaṇe indaṭṭhakaraṇena sātisayaṃ paccayo hotīti dassento “sampayuttadhamme…pe…
tika-vin01t1:1382_0: “Sampasādanaṃ cetaso ekodibhāva”nti visesanadvayaṃ jhānassa atisayavacanicchāvasena gahitaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1382_2: na tathā paṭhamajjhāneti imaṃ visesaṃ dassetuṃ “nanu cā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1382_3: Ārammaṇe āhananapariyāhananavasena anumajjanaanuyujjanavasena ca pavattamānā dhammā satipi nīvaraṇappahānena
tika-vin01t1:1382_4: kilesakālussiyāpagame sampayuttānaṃ kiñci khobhaṃ karontā viya tehi ca te na sannisinnā hontīti vuttaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1382_9: Samādhipi na suṭṭhu pākaṭoti satipi indriyasamatte vīriyasamatāya ca teneva khotena sampasādābhāvena
tika-vin01t1:1382_10: ca bahale viya jale maccho samādhipi na suṭṭhu pākaṭo.
tika-vin01t1:1382_12: Evaṃ vuttenāti yassā saddhāya vasena sampasādanaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1382_13: yassā ca cittekaggatāya vasena ekodibhāvanti ca jhānaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1382_14: tāsaṃ eva “saddahanā”tiādinā pavattiākāravisesavibhāvanavasena vuttena tena vibhaṅgapāṭhena.
tika-vin01t1:1382_17: Ekodiṃ bhāvetīti ekodibhāvanti jhānaṃ vutta”nti evaṃ pavattā ayaṃ atthavaṇṇanā.
tika-vin01t1:1382_19: evaṃ veditabbāti kathaṃ panāyaṃ atthavaṇṇanā tena vibhaṅgapāṭhena saddhiṃ saṃsandati sameti,
tika-vin01t1:1382_20: nanu jhānavibhaṅge “sampasādana”nti padaṃ uddharitvā “yā saddhā saddahanā”tiādinā saddhāyeva vuttā,
tika-vin01t1:1382_21: “cetaso ekodibhāva”nti ca padaṃ uddharitvā “yā cittassa ṭhiti saṇṭhiti avaṭṭhitī”tiādinā samādhisseva niddeso kato,
tika-vin01t1:1382_22: aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “sampasādanaṃ ekodibhāva”nti jhānameva vuttanti aṭṭhakathāya vibhaṅgapāṭhena saddhiṃ virodho āpajjatīti?
tika-vin01t1:1382_23: Nāpajjati vibhaṅgepi imināva adhippāyena niddesassa katattā.
tika-vin01t1:1382_24: Tathā hi yena sampasādanena yogā jhānaṃ “sampasādana”nti vuccati,
tika-vin01t1:1382_25: tasmiṃ “yā saddhā saddahanā”tiādinā dassite sampasādanaṃ jhānanti samānādhikaraṇaniddeseneva taṃyogā jhāne taṃsaddappavatti dassitā hoti.
tika-vin01t1:1382_26: “Ekodibhāva”nti ca padaṃ uddharitvā ekodimhi dassite ekodibhāvaṃ jhānanti samānādhikaraṇaniddeseneva
tika-vin01t1:1382_27: jhānassa ekodivaḍḍhanatā vuttāva hotīti iminā adhippāyena byañjanavicāraṃ akatvā dhammamattameva niddiṭṭhanti
tika-vin01t1:1383_0: Yaṃ pana vuttaṃ ṭīkākārehi ācariyadhammapālattherādīhi “yadi ekodīti samādhissa gahaṇaṃ adhippetaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1383_1: tadā ‘ekodibhāva’nti padaṃ uddharitvā samādhissa niddeso na kattabbo siyā.
tika-vin01t1:1383_2: Tasmā ekodibhāvasaddo eva samādhimhi pavatto sampasādanasaddo viya jhāne pavattatīti yutta”nti,
tika-vin01t1:1383_4: Tasmā so aṭṭhakathānirapekkho visuṃyeveko atthavikappoti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1383_6: vitakkavicārehi anajjhāruḷhattā ekaṃ udetīti ekodīti tathāvidhasamādhiyuttaṃ jhānacittameva gahetvā ekodissa
tika-vin01t1:1383_7: bhāvo ekodibhāvoti samādhissa gahaṇaṃ sakkā vattunti.
tika-vin01t1:1383_8: Yo panāyaṃ tesamabhiniveso “ekodīti samādhissa gahaṇe sati ‘ekodibhāva’nti padaṃ uddharitvā samādhissa niddeso na kattabbo siyā”ti,
tika-vin01t1:1383_10: Aññatthapi hi byañjanavicāraṃ akatvā atthamattasseva bāhullena vibhaṅge niddeso dissati.
tika-vin01t1:1384_6: Sositāti pavattisaṅkhātassa santānassa abhāvena sosaṃ sukkhabhāvaṃ gatā.
tika-vin01t1:1385_0: Ayamatthoti bhāvanāya pahīnattā vitakkavicārānaṃ abhāvasaṅkhāto attho.
tika-vin01t1:1385_1: Codakena vuttamatthaṃ sampaṭicchitvā pariharituṃ “evametaṃ siddhovāyamattho”ti vatvā “na paneta”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1385_4: Na kilesakālussiyassāti upacārakkhaṇe viya nīvaraṇasaṅkhātassa kilesasaṅkhobhassa vūpasamā na sampasādananti attho.
tika-vin01t1:1385_5: Nanu ca “purimaṃ vatvāpi vattabbamevā”ti idaṃ kasmā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1385_6: Tathā hi dutiyajjhānādiadhigamūpāyadīpakena ajjhattaṃ sampasādanatāya cetaso ekodibhāvatāya ca hetudīpakena
tika-vin01t1:1385_10: Na hi vitakkavicāravūpasamavacanena vitakkavicārānaṃ appavatti vuttā hoti.
tika-vin01t1:1385_12: Oḷārikaṅgamukhena hi taṃtaṃjhānanikantiyā vikkhambhanaṃ vitakkavicāravūpasamavacanādīhi pakāsitaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1385_15: tesu maggesu pahīnataṇhesu ca phalesu saṅkhārappavatti hoti,
tika-vin01t1:1385_16: evamidhāpi vikkhambhitavitakkavicārataṇhassa dutiyajjhānassa vitakkavicārasampayogo purimena na nivārito
tika-vin01t1:1385_17: siyāti tannivāraṇatthaṃ āvajjitukāmatādiatikkamo ca tesaṃ vūpasamoti dassanatthañca “avitakkaṃ avicāra”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1385_18: Paṭhamajjhānaṃ dutiyajjhānassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo hotīti āha “paṭhamajjhānasamādhito”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1386_3: Yaṃ pana vibhaṅge “jhānanti sampasādo pīti sukhaṃ cittassekaggatā”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1386_4: taṃ saparikkhāraṃ jhānaṃ dassetuṃ pariyāyena vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1386_5: Rathassa paṇḍukambalaṃ viya hi sampasādo jhānassa parikkhāro,
tika-vin01t1:1386_7: Nippariyāyato pana upanijjhānalakkhaṇappattānaṃ aṅgānaṃ vasena tivaṅgikamevetaṃ hotīti āha “sampasādanaṃ pana ṭhapetvā”tiādi.
tika-vin01t1:1389_1: Taṃ pana virajjanaṃ nibbindanamukhena hīḷanaṃ vā tappaṭibaddharāgappahānaṃ vāti dassetuṃ “tassā pītiyā jigucchanaṃ vā samatikkamo vā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1389_2: Ubhinnamantarāti pītiyā virāgāti imesaṃ dvinnaṃ padānaṃ antarā,
tika-vin01t1:1389_6: Dutiyajjhānassa hi paṭilābhaṃ vinā tatiyajjhānassa adhigamo na hotīti vitakkavicārānaṃ vūpasamo tatiyajjhānādhigamassa upāyo.
tika-vin01t1:1390_0: Upapattitoti samavāhitabhāvena patirūpato jhānupekkhāpi samavāhitameva antonītaṃ katvā pavattatīti āha “samaṃ passatī”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1390_5: tasmā kathamayaṃ tatiyajjhānasamaṅgī upekkhāya samannāgatattā “upekkhako”ti vuccatīti ce?
tika-vin01t1:1390_7: atha kho aññāpi upekkhā vijjantīti dassento āha “upekkhā pana dasavidhā hotī”tiādi.
tika-vin01t1:1390_10: bhikkhu cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā neva sumano hoti na dummano,
tika-vin01t1:1390_11: upekkhako viharati sato sampajāno”ti evamāgatā khīṇāsavassa chasu dvāresu iṭṭhāniṭṭhachaḷārammaṇāpāthe
tika-vin01t1:1391_0: Yā pana “upekkhāsahagatena cetasā ekaṃ disaṃ pharitvā viharatī”ti evamāgatā sattesu majjhattākārabhūtā upekkhā,
tika-vin01t1:1392_0: Yā “upekkhāsambojjhaṅgaṃ bhāveti vivekanissita”nti evamāgatā sahajātadhammānaṃ majjhattākārabhūtā upekkhā,
tika-vin01t1:1393_0: Yā pana “kālena kālaṃ upekkhānimittaṃ manasi karotī”ti evamāgatā anaccāraddhanātisithilavīriyasaṅkhātā upekkhā,
tika-vin01t1:1396_1: Paṭhamajjhānapaṭilābhatthāya nīvaraṇe paṭisaṅkhā santiṭṭhanā paññā saṅkhārupekkhāsu ñāṇaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1396_2: dutiyajjhānapaṭilābhatthāya vitakkavicāre paṭisaṅkhā santiṭṭhanā paññā saṅkhārupekkhāsu ñāṇaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1396_3: tatiyajjhānapaṭilābhatthāya pītiṃ paṭisaṅkhā santiṭṭhanā paññā saṅkhārupekkhāsu ñāṇaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1396_4: catutthajjhānapaṭilābhatthāya sukhadukkhe paṭisaṅkhā santiṭṭhanā paññā saṅkhārupekkhāsu ñāṇaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1396_5: ākāsānañcāyatanasamāpattipaṭilābhatthāya rūpasaññaṃ paṭighasaññaṃ nānattasaññaṃ paṭisaṅkhā santiṭṭhanā paññā saṅkhārupekkhāsu ñāṇaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1396_6: viññāṇañcāyatanasamāpattipaṭilābhatthāya ākāsānañcāyatanasaññaṃ paṭisaṅkhā santiṭṭhanā paññā saṅkhārupekkhāsu ñāṇaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1396_7: ākiñcaññāyatanasamāpattipaṭilābhatthāya viññāṇañcāyatanasaññaṃ paṭisaṅkhā santiṭṭhanā paññā saṅkhārupekkhāsu ñāṇaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1396_8: nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasamāpattipaṭilābhatthāya ākiñcaññāyatanasaññaṃ paṭisaṅkhā santiṭṭhanā paññā saṅkhārupekkhāsu ñāṇaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1397_1: Sotāpattimaggapaṭilābhatthāya uppādaṃ pavattaṃ nimittaṃ āyūhanaṃ paṭisandhiṃ gatiṃ nibbattiṃ upapattiṃ
tika-vin01t1:1397_2: jātiṃ jaraṃ byādhiṃ maraṇaṃ sokaṃ paridevaṃ upāyāsaṃ paṭisaṅkhā santiṭṭhanā paññā saṅkhārupekkhāsu ñāṇaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1397_3: sotāpattiphalasamāpattatthāya uppādaṃ pavattaṃ nimittaṃ āyūhanaṃ paṭisandhiṃ paṭisaṅkhā santiṭṭhanā paññā saṅkhārupekkhāsu ñāṇaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1397_8: arahattamaggapaṭilābhatthāya uppādaṃ pavattaṃ nimittaṃ āyūhanaṃ paṭisandhiṃ gatiṃ nibbattiṃ upapattiṃ
tika-vin01t1:1397_9: jātiṃ jaraṃ byādhiṃ maraṇaṃ sokaṃ paridevaṃ upāyāsaṃ paṭisaṅkhā santiṭṭhanā paññā saṅkhārupekkhāsu ñāṇaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1397_12: animittavihārasamaāpattatthāya uppādaṃ pavattaṃ nimittaṃ āyūhanaṃ paṭisandhiṃ paṭisaṅkhā santiṭṭhanā paññā saṅkhārupekkhāsu ñāṇaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1398_0: Evamāgatā nīvaraṇādipaṭisaṅkhāsantiṭṭhanākārabhūtā upekkhā, ayaṃ saṅkhārupekkhā nāma.
tika-vin01t1:1399_0: Tattha nīvaraṇe paṭisaṅkhāti pañca nīvaraṇāni pahātabbabhāvena paṭisaṅkhāya,
tika-vin01t1:1399_2: Santiṭṭhanāti nīvaraṇānaṃ pahānābhimukhībhūtattā tesaṃ pahānepi abyāpārabhāvūpagamanena majjhattatāya santiṭṭhanā.
tika-vin01t1:1399_3: Saṅkhārupekkhāsūti nīvaraṇappahāne byāpārākaraṇena nīvaraṇasaṅkhātānaṃ saṅkhārānaṃ upekkhanāsūti attho.
tika-vin01t1:1399_5: Tattha uppādanti purimakammapaccayā khandhānaṃ idha uppattimāha.
tika-vin01t1:1399_7: Nimittanti sabbampi tebhūmakaṃ saṅkhāragataṃ nimittabhāvena upaṭṭhānato.
tika-vin01t1:1399_10: Gatinti yāya gatiyā sā paṭisandhi hoti.
tika-vin01t1:1400_0: Ettha ca uppādādayo pañceva saṅkhārupekkhāñāṇassa visayavasena vuttā,
tika-vin01t1:1400_2: Nibbatti jātīti idañhi dvayaṃ uppādassa ceva paṭisandhiyā ca vevacanaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1400_3: Gati upapatti cāti idaṃ dvayaṃ pavattassa,
tika-vin01t1:1400_5: Nanu cettha catūsu maggavāresu “uppāda”ntiādīni pañca mūlapadāni,
tika-vin01t1:1400_7: chasu pana phalasamāpattivāresu pañca mūlapadāneva vuttāni,
tika-vin01t1:1400_9: Saṅkhārupekkhāya tikkhabhāve sati kilesappahānasamatthassa maggassa sabbhāvato tassā tikkhabhāvadassanatthaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1400_10: vevacanapadehi saha daḷhaṃ katvā mūlapadāni vuttāni,
tika-vin01t1:1400_11: phalassa nirussāhabhāvena santasabhāvattā maggāyattattā ca mandabhūtāpi saṅkhārupekkhā phalassa paccayo
tika-vin01t1:1401_0: Tattha “sotāpattimaggapaṭilābhatthāyā”tiādīsu catūsu maggavāresu suññatānimittappaṇihitamaggānaṃ aññataro vutto.
tika-vin01t1:1401_1: “Sotāpattiphalasamāpattatthāyā”tiādīsu catūsu phalavāresu pana appaṇihitaphalasamāpatti veditabbā. Kasmā?
tika-vin01t1:1401_2: Suññatavihārasamāpattatthāya animittavihārasamāpattatthāyāti itarāsaṃ dvinnaṃ phalasamāpattīnaṃ visuṃ vuttattā.
tika-vin01t1:1401_10: samathasaṅkhārupekkhā pana appanāvīthiyā āsannapubbabhāge balappattaṃ bhāvanāmayañāṇaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1402_0: Yā pana “yasmiṃ samaye kāmāvacaraṃ kusalaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ hoti upekkhāsahagata”nti evamāgatā adukkhamasukhasaññitā upekkhā,
tika-vin01t1:1403_2: upekkhaṃ paṭilabhatī”ti evamāgatā vicinane majjhattabhūtā upekkhā,
tika-vin01t1:1404_2: Upekkhaṃ paṭilabhatīti diṭṭhasovattikattayassa sappassa lakkhaṇavicinane viya diṭṭhalakkhaṇattayassa
tika-vin01t1:1405_0: Yā pana chandādīsu yevāpanakesu āgatā sahajātānaṃ samappavattihetubhūtā upekkhā,
tika-vin01t1:1406_0: Yā “upekkhako ca viharatī”ti evamāgatā aggasukhepi tasmiṃ apakkhapātajananī upekkhā,
tika-vin01t1:1407_0: Yā pana “upekkhāsatipārisuddhiṃ catutthaṃ jhāna”nti evamāgatā sabbapaccanīkaparisuddhā paccanīkavūpasamanepi abyāpārabhūtā upekkhā,
tika-vin01t1:1408_0: Tattha chaḷaṅgupekkhā ca brahmavihārupekkhā ca bojjhaṅgupekkhā ca tatramajjhattupekkhā ca jhānupekkhā
tika-vin01t1:1408_1: ca pārisuddhupekkhā ca atthato ekā tatramajjhattupekkhāva hoti.
tika-vin01t1:1408_2: Tena tena avatthābhedena panassā ayaṃ bhedo ekassapi sato sattassa kumārayuvatherasenāpatirājādivasena bhedo viya.
tika-vin01t1:1408_9: Paññā eva hi sā kiccavasena dvidhā bhinnā.
tika-vin01t1:1408_10: Yathā hi purisassa sāyaṃ gehaṃ paviṭṭhaṃ sappaṃ ajapadadaṇḍaṃ gahetvā pariyesamānassa taṃ thusakoṭṭhake nipannaṃ disvā “sappo nu kho,
tika-vin01t1:1408_13: evameva yā āraddhavipassakassa vipassanāñāṇena lakkhaṇattaye diṭṭhe saṅkhārānaṃ aniccabhāvādivicinane majjhattatā uppajjati,
tika-vin01t1:1408_15: Yathā pana tassa purisassa ajapadena daṇḍena gāḷhaṃ sappaṃ gahetvā “kintāhaṃ imaṃ sappaṃ aviheṭhento
tika-vin01t1:1408_16: attānañca iminā aḍaṃsāpento muñceyya”nti muñcanākārameva pariyesato gahaṇe majjhattatā hoti,
tika-vin01t1:1408_17: evameva yā lakkhaṇattayassa diṭṭhattā āditte viya tayo bhave passato saṅkhāraggahaṇe majjhattatā,
tika-vin01t1:1408_19: Iti vipassanupekkhāya siddhāya saṅkhārupekkhāpi siddhāva hoti.
tika-vin01t1:1408_20: Iminā panesā vicinanagahaṇesu majjhattasaṅkhātena kiccena dvidhā bhinnā.
tika-vin01t1:1408_21: Vīriyupekkhā pana vedanupekkhā ca aññamaññañca avasesāhi ca atthato bhinnā evāti.
tika-vin01t1:1409_0: Imāsaṃ pana dasannampi upekkhānaṃ bhūmipuggalādivasena vibhāgo tattha tattha vuttanayeneva veditabboti dassento āha “evamayaṃ dasavidhāpī”tiādi.
tika-vin01t1:1409_11: tasmā ekakkhaṇe tāsu ekāya sati na itarā,
tika-vin01t1:1409_13: vedanāvīriyupekkhānaṃ ekakkhaṇe siyā uppattīti evaṃ ekakkhaṇavasena.
tika-vin01t1:1409_17: vedanupekkhā pana siyā akusalāpīti evaṃ kusalattikavasena.
tika-vin01t1:1409_18: Dasapetā saṅkhepato cattārova dhammā vīriyavedanātatramajjhattatāñāṇavasenāti evaṃ saṅkhepavasena.
tika-vin01t1:1410_0: Idāni idhādhippetāya jhānupekkhāya lakkhaṇādiṃ niddhāretvā dassento āha “lakkhaṇādito panā”tiādi.
tika-vin01t1:1410_1: Tattha anābhogarasāti paṇītasukhepi tasmiṃ avanatipaṭipakkhakiccāti attho.
tika-vin01t1:1410_2: Abyāpārapaccupaṭṭhānāti satipi sukhapāramippattiyaṃ tasmiṃ sukhe abyāvaṭā hutvā paccupatiṭṭhati,
tika-vin01t1:1410_3: sampayuttānaṃ vā tattha abyāpāraṃ paccupaṭṭhapetīti attho.
tika-vin01t1:1410_4: Sampayuttadhammānaṃ khobhaṃ uppilavañca āvahantehi vitakkādīhi abhibhūtattā aparibyattaṃ tattha tatramajjhattatāya kiccaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1411_0: Idāni sato ca sampajānoti ettha “vuccatī”ti ajjhāharitabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1411_13: imaṃ pana uparimajjhānaṃ upādāya “oḷārikattā pana tesaṃ jhānāna”nti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1411_16: Bhūmiyaṃ viya purisassāti purisassa bhūmiyaṃ gati viyāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t1:1411_17: Gati sukhā hotīti tesu jhānesu gati sukhā hoti.
tika-vin01t1:1411_18: Abyattaṃ tattha satisampajaññakiccanti “idaṃ nāma dukkaraṃ karīyatī”ti vattabbassa abhāvato vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1411_19: Oḷārikaṅgappahānena pana sukhumattāti ayamattho kāmaṃ dutiyajjhānepi sambhavati,
tika-vin01t1:1411_20: tathāpi yebhuyyena avippayogībhāvena vattamānesu pītisukhesu pītisaṅkhātassa oḷārikaṅgassa pahānena sukhumatāya
tika-vin01t1:1411_24: Punadeva pītiṃ upagaccheyyāti hānabhāgiyaṃ jhānaṃ siyā,
tika-vin01t1:1411_27: Idañca atimadhuraṃ sukhanti tatiyajjhāne sukhaṃ sandhāyāha,
tika-vin01t1:1411_28: atimadhuratā cassa pahāsodagyasabhāvāya pītiyā abhāveneva veditabbā.
tika-vin01t1:1412_0: Sukhañca kāyena paṭisaṃvedesinti ettha kathamābhogena vinā sukhapaṭisaṃvedanāti āha “kiñcāpī”tiādi.
tika-vin01t1:1412_2: tasmā etamatthaṃ dassento “sukhañca kāyena paṭisaṃvedesi”nti āhāti yojetabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1412_7: Yaṃ vā tanti yaṃ vā taṃ yathāvuttaṃ nāmakāyasampayuttaṃ sukhaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1412_8: Taṃsamuṭṭhānenāti tato samuṭṭhitena atipaṇītena rūpena assa jhānasamaṅgino rūpakāyo yasmā phuṭo,
tika-vin01t1:1412_12: Yathā hi udakena phuṭṭhasarīrassa tādise phoṭṭhabbe phuṭṭhe sukhaṃ uppajjati,
tika-vin01t1:1412_15: Sukhaṃ paṭisaṃvedeyyāti cittasamuṭṭhitarūpehi avasesatisamuṭṭhitarūpasaṅghaṭṭanena uppannakāyaviññāṇena kāyikaṃ sukhaṃ paṭisaṃvedeyya.
tika-vin01t1:1413_7: Edisesu ṭhānesu satiggahaṇeneva sampajaññampi gahitaṃ hotīti idha pāḷiyaṃ satiyā eva gahitattā evaṃ upaṭṭhitassatitāya satimā icceva vuttaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1413_10: Jhānakkhaṇe nippariyāyato cetasikasukhameva labbhatīti “sukhaṃ nāmakāyena paṭisaṃvedetī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1413_11: Tatiyanti gaṇanānupubbato tatiyantiādi heṭṭhā vuttanayānusārena veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1416_0: “Pubbevā”ti vuttattā “kadā pana nesaṃ pahānaṃ hotī”ti codanaṃ samuṭṭhāpetvā āha “catunnaṃ jhānānaṃ upacārakkhaṇe”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1416_2: Pahānakkamena avuttānanti ettha pahānakkamo nāma pahāyakadhammānaṃ uppattipaṭipāṭi.
tika-vin01t1:1416_3: Tena pana vuccamāne “dukkhaṃ domanassaṃ sukhaṃ somanassa”nti vattabbaṃ siyā,
tika-vin01t1:1416_5: Uddesakkamenāti “sukhindriyaṃ dukkhindriyaṃ somanassindriyaṃ domanassindriya”nti evaṃ pavattauddesakkamena.
tika-vin01t1:1417_0: Atha kasmā jhānesveva nirodho vuttoti sambandho.
tika-vin01t1:1417_1: Kattha cuppannaṃ dukkhindriyanti attano paccayehi uppannaṃ avikkhambhitaṃ dukkhindriyaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1417_2: Kattha ca aparisesaṃ nirujjhatīti nirodhaṭṭhānaṃ nirodhakāraṇaṃ pucchati.
tika-vin01t1:1417_3: Tena katthāti pucchāya etthāti vissajjanepi hetumhi bhummavacanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1417_4: Jhānānubhāvanimittañhi anuppajjantaṃ dukkhindriyaṃ aparisesaṃ nirujjhatīti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1417_12: Pītipharaṇenāti pītiyā pharaṇarasattā pītisamuṭṭhānānaṃ vā paṇītarūpānaṃ kāyassa byāpanato vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1417_14: Paṇītarūpaphuṭṭhasarīrassa sukhokkantakāyattā kuto dukkhuppatti visamāsanupatāpādināti āha “paṭipakkhena avihatattā”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1417_18: Pahīnassapi domanassindriyassāti idañca “siyā uppattī”ti iminā sambandhitabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1417_21: “Tassa mayhaṃ aticiraṃ vitakkayato vicārayato kāyopi kilami,
tika-vin01t1:1417_22: cittampi ūhaññī”ti vacanato kāyacittakhedānaṃ vitakkavicārapaccayatā veditabbā.
tika-vin01t1:1417_24: Tatthassa siyā uppattīti tattha dutiyajjhānūpacāre assa pahīnassapi domanassindriyassa uppatti bhaveyya.
tika-vin01t1:1418_0: Ettha ca yadeke vadanti “tatthassa siyā uppattīti vadantena jhānalābhīnampi domanassuppatti atthīti dassitaṃ hoti,
tika-vin01t1:1418_1: tena ca anīvaraṇasabhāvo lobho viya dosopi atthīti dīpeti.
tika-vin01t1:1418_2: Na hi dosena vinā domanassaṃ pavattati,
tika-vin01t1:1418_4: Yasmā tattha parihīnajjhānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā pavattamānaṃ domanassaṃ dassitaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1418_5: aparihīnajjhānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā uppajjamānassa domanassassa asambhavato jhānalābhīnaṃ sabbaso domanassaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1418_6: nuppajjatīti ca na sakkā vattuṃ aṭṭhasamāpattilābhino api tassa uppannattā,
tika-vin01t1:1418_7: na heva kho so parihīnajjhāno ahosī”ti,
tika-vin01t1:1418_12: Tathā hi āruppe kāmacchandanīvaraṇaṃ paṭicca thinamiddhanīvaraṇaṃ uddhaccanīvaraṇaṃ avijjānīvaraṇantiādīsu byāpādakukkuccanīvaraṇāni anuddhaṭāni,
tika-vin01t1:1418_13: na cettha anīvaraṇatāpariyāyo kāmacchandādīnampi anīvaraṇānaṃyeva nīvaraṇasadisatāya nīvaraṇapariyāyassa vuttattā.
tika-vin01t1:1418_14: Yaṃ pana vuttaṃ “aṭṭhasamāpattilābhino api tassa uppannattā”ti,
tika-vin01t1:1418_15: tampi akāraṇaṃ uppajjamānena ca domanassena jhānato parihāyanato.
tika-vin01t1:1418_16: Lahukena pana paccayena parihīnaṃ tādisā naṃ appakasireneva paṭipākatikaṃ karontīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1418_17: “Tatthassa siyā uppattī”ti idaṃ pana parikappanavacanaṃ upacārakkhaṇe domanassassa appahīnabhāvadassanatthaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1418_21: Pahīnampi somanassindriyaṃ pīti viya na dūreti katvā “āsannattā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1418_22: Nānāvajjanūpacāre pahīnampi pahānaṅgaṃ paṭipakkhena avihatattā antarantarā uppajjeyya vāti imamatthaṃ dassento “appanāppattāyā”tiādimāha.
tika-vin01t1:1418_23: Tādisāya āsevanāya icchitabbattā yathā maggavīthito pubbe dve tayo javanavārā sadisānupassanāva pavattanti,
tika-vin01t1:1418_24: evamidhāpi appanāvārato pubbe dve tayo javanavārā upekkhāsahagatāva pavattantīti vadanti.
tika-vin01t1:1419_2: Sukhumāti sukhadukkhāni viya anoḷārikattā avibhūtatāya sukhumā,
tika-vin01t1:1419_6: Sakkā hoti esā gāhayitunti aññāpohananayena sakkā gāhayitunti adhippāyo.
tika-vin01t1:1419_7: Adukkhamasukhāya cetovimuttiyāti idameva catutthaṃ jhānaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1419_11: Pahīnāti vuttāti “pañcannaṃ orambhāgiyānaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ parikkhayā”ti vuttattā.
tika-vin01t1:1419_13: Sukhaṃ somanassassa paccayoti vasanagandhālepanapupphābharaṇasamālepanādinibbattaṃ kāyikasukhaṃ somanassassa paccayo.
tika-vin01t1:1419_16: rāgānusayo anusetī”ti vacanato āha “somanassaṃ rāgassa paccayo”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1419_19: vedanāya paṭighānusayo anusetī”ti vacanato vuttaṃ “domanassaṃ dosassa paccayo”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1420_6: Paṭipakkhabhūtanti idaṃ idha tatiyavedanāya dukkhādīnaṃ samatikkamavasena pattabbattā vuttaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1420_11: Avibhūtapaccupaṭṭhānāti sukhadukkhāni viya na vibhūtākārā piṭṭhipāsāṇe migagatamaggo viya tehi anumātabbāvibhūtākāropaṭṭhānā.
tika-vin01t1:1420_14: Upekkhāsatipārisuddhinti purimapade uttarapadalopenetaṃ samāsapadanti āha “upekkhāya janitasatipārisuddhi”nti.
tika-vin01t1:1420_15: Sabbapaccanīkadhammaparisuddhāya paccanīkasamanepi abyāvaṭāya pārisuddhupekkhāya vattamānāya catutthajjhāne
tika-vin01t1:1420_16: sati sampahaṃsanapaññā viya suparisuddhā suvisadā ca hotīti āha “satiyā pārisuddhi,
tika-vin01t1:1420_19: kathaṃ satiyeva pārisuddhāti vuttāti āha “na kevala”ntiādi.
tika-vin01t1:1421_0: Evamapi kasmā idheva sati “upekkhāsatipārisuddhī”ti vuttāti anuyogaṃ sandhāya “tattha kiñcāpī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1421_1: Tattha heṭṭhā tīsu jhānesu vijjamānāyapi tatramajjhattatāya paccanīkābhibhavanato sahāyapaccayavekallato ca apārisuddhi,
tika-vin01t1:1421_2: tathā taṃsampayuttānaṃ tadabhāvato idha pārisuddhīti imamatthaṃ upamāvasena dassetuṃ “yathā panā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1421_4: Atikkhatāya candalekhā viya rattipi sommasabhāvā sabhāgāya rattiyameva ca candalekhā samujjalatīti sā
tika-vin01t1:1421_5: tassā saṅgayhatīti dassento “sommabhāvena ca attano upakārakattena vā sabhāgāya rattiyā”ti āha.
tika-vin01t1:1424_1: Rūpavirāgabhāvanāvasena pavattaṃ catubbidhampi arūpajjhānaṃ catutthajjhānasaṅgahamevāti āha “cattāri jhānānī”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1424_2: Yuttaṃ tāva cittekaggatā bhavokkamanatthatā viya vipassanāpādakatāpi catunnaṃ jhānānaṃ sādhāraṇāti tesaṃ vasena “cattāri jhānānī”ti vacanaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1424_3: abhiññāpādakatā pana nirodhapādakatā ca catutthasseva jhānassa āveṇikā,
tika-vin01t1:1424_4: sā kathaṃ catunnaṃ jhānānaṃ sādhāraṇā vuttāti?
tika-vin01t1:1424_8: Evañca katvā payojananiddese aṭṭhasamāpattiggahaṇaṃ samatthitaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t1:1424_15: Sattāhaṃ nirodhasamāpattiyā samāpajjanato āha “sattāhaṃ acittakā hutvā”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1424_18: tañca yebhuyyena āhārūpajīvīnaṃ sattānaṃ upādinnakappavattassa ekadivasaṃ bhuttāhārassa sattāhameva yāpanato.
tika-vin01t1:1425_6: tattha kā panāyaṃ nirodhasamāpatti nāmāti yā anupubbanirodhavasena cittacetasikānaṃ dhammānaṃ appavatti.
tika-vin01t1:1425_8: ke na samāpajjantīti sabbepi puthujjanasotāpannasakadāgāmino sukkhavipassakā ca anāgāmiarahanto na samāpajjanti,
tika-vin01t1:1425_9: aṭṭhasamāpattilābhino pana anāgāmino khīṇāsavā ca samāpajjanti.
tika-vin01t1:1425_14: Kasmā samāpajjantīti saṅkhārānaṃ pavattibhede ukkaṇṭhitvā “diṭṭhadhamme acittakā hutvā nirodhaṃ nibbānaṃ patvā sukhaṃ viharissāmā”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1425_15: Kathañcassā samāpajjanaṃ hotīti samathavipassanāvasena ussakkitvā katapubbakiccassa nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ nirodhayato evamassā samāpajjanaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t1:1425_20: Yo pana ubhayavaseneva ussakkitvā nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ nirodheti,
tika-vin01t1:1426_1: idha bhikkhu nirodhaṃ samāpajjitukāmo paṭhamajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya tattha saṅkhāre aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati.
tika-vin01t1:1426_2: Vipassanā ca panesā tividhā saṅkhārapariggaṇhanakavipassanā phalasamāpattivipassanā nirodhasamāpattivipassanāti.
tika-vin01t1:1426_3: Tattha saṅkhārapariggaṇhanakavipassanā mandā vā tikkhā vā maggassa padaṭṭhānaṃ hotiyeva.
tika-vin01t1:1426_6: tasmā esa nātimandāya nātitikkhāya vipassanāya te saṅkhāre vipassati.
tika-vin01t1:1426_8: tato viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya tattha saṅkhāre tatheva vipassati.
tika-vin01t1:1426_9: Atha ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya catubbidhaṃ pubbakiccaṃ karoti nānābaddhaavikopanaṃ saṅghapatimānanaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1427_0: Tattha nānābaddhaavikopananti yaṃ iminā bhikkhunā saddhiṃ ekābaddhaṃ na hoti,
tika-vin01t1:1427_1: nānābaddhaṃ hutvā ṭhitaṃ pattacīvaraṃ vā mañcapīṭhaṃ vā nivāsagehaṃ vā aññaṃ vā pana yaṃ kiñci parikkhārajātaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1427_5: Tatridaṃ adhiṭṭhānavidhānaṃ “idañcidañca imasmiṃ sattāhabbhantare mā agginā jhāyatu,
tika-vin01t1:1427_10: Evaṃ adhiṭṭhite taṃ sattāhaṃ tassa na koci parissayo hoti,
tika-vin01t1:1427_13: Yaṃ pana ekābaddhaṃ hoti nivāsanapārupanaṃ vā nisinnāsanaṃ vā,
tika-vin01t1:1428_3: Ettha ca patimānanaṃ etassa na pubbakiccaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1428_5: Tasmā evaṃ āvajjitabbaṃ “sace mayi sattāhaṃ nirodhaṃ samāpajjitvā nisinne saṅgho apalokanakammādīsu kiñcideva kammaṃ kattukāmo hoti,
tika-vin01t1:1428_6: yāva maṃ koci bhikkhu āgantvā na pakkosati,
tika-vin01t1:1428_8: Evaṃ katvā samāpanno hi tasmiṃ samaye vuṭṭhahatiyeva.
tika-vin01t1:1428_10: saṅgho ce sannipatitvā taṃ apassanto “asuko bhikkhu kuhi”nti pucchitvā “nirodhaṃ samāpanno”ti vutte kañci bhikkhuṃ peseti “taṃ pakkosāhī”ti,
tika-vin01t1:1428_11: athassa tena bhikkhunā savanūpacāre ṭhatvā “saṅgho taṃ āvuso patimānetī”ti vuttamatteyeva vuṭṭhānaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t1:1428_12: Evaṃ garukā hi saṅghassa āṇā nāma,
tika-vin01t1:1428_13: tasmā taṃ āvajjitvā yathā paṭhamameva vuṭṭhāti,
tika-vin01t1:1430_2: “attano āyusaṅkhārā sattāhaṃ pavattissanti na pavattissantī”ti āvajjitvāva samāpajjitabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1430_3: Sace hi sattāhabbhantare nirujjhanake āyusaṅkhāre anāvajjitvāva samāpajjati,
tika-vin01t1:1430_4: tassa nirodhasamāpatti maraṇaṃ paṭibāhituṃ na sakkoti,
tika-vin01t1:1430_5: antonirodhe maraṇassa natthitāya antarāva samāpattito vuṭṭhāti,
tika-vin01t1:1430_9: So evaṃ ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya idaṃ pubbakiccaṃ katvā nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ samāpajjati,
tika-vin01t1:1430_10: athekaṃ vā dve vā cittavāre atikkamitvā acittako hoti,
tika-vin01t1:1430_12: Kasmā panassa dvinnaṃ cittānaṃ upari cittāni na pavattantīti?
tika-vin01t1:1430_14: Idañhi imassa bhikkhuno dve samathavipassanādhamme yuganaddhe katvā aṭṭhasamāpattiārohanaṃ anupubbanirodhassa payogo,
tika-vin01t1:1430_15: na nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasamāpattiyāti nirodhassa payogattā dvinnaṃ cittānaṃ upari cittāni na pavattantīti.
tika-vin01t1:1431_0: Yasmā bodhisattena bodhimaṇḍupasaṅkamanato pubbepi carimabhave catutthajjhānaṃ nibbattitapubbaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1431_6: Buddhānañhi paṭhamārambhe eva pādakajjhānena payojanaṃ ahosi,
tika-vin01t1:1431_8: Abhisambodhisamadhigamato paṭṭhāya hi sabbaṃ ñāṇasamādhikiccaṃ ākaṅkhāmattapaṭibaddhamevāti.
tika-vin01t1:1431_10: Sabbalokiyalokuttaraguṇadāyakanti ettha vipassanābhiññāpādakattā eva catutthassa jhānassa bhagavato sabbalokiyalokuttaraguṇadāyakatā veditabbā.
tika-vin01t1:1431_12: tadadhigamasamakālameva ca bhagavato sabbe buddhaguṇā hatthagatā ahesuṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1432_0: “Catutthaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja vihāsi”nti vatvā “so”ti vuttattā āha “so aha”nti.
tika-vin01t1:1432_2: saddo heṭṭhā jhānattayādhigamapaṭipāṭisiddhassa catutthajjhānasamādhānassa nidassanatthoti āha “evanti catutthajjhānakkamanidassanameta”nti.
tika-vin01t1:1432_8: Tattha iminā kamenāti iminā paṭhamajjhānādhigamādinā kamena.
tika-vin01t1:1432_9: Yadipi “eva”nti idaṃ āgamanasamādhinā saddhiṃ catutthajjhānasamādhānaṃ dīpeti,
tika-vin01t1:1432_10: satipārisuddhisamādhi eva pana iddhiyā adhiṭṭhānabhāvato padhānanti āha “catutthajjhānasamādhinā samāhite”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1432_12: catutthajjhānaṃ taṃsampayuttā ca dhammā suparisuddhā suvisadā ca honti,
tika-vin01t1:1432_13: satisīsena pana tattha desanā katāti āha “upekkhāsatipārisuddhibhāvena parisuddhe”ti,
tika-vin01t1:1432_15: Parisuddhiyā eva paccayavisesena pavattiviseso pariyodātatā sudhantasuvaṇṇassa nighaṃsanena pabhassaratā viyāti āha “parisuddhattāyeva pariyodāte,
tika-vin01t1:1433_0: Sukhādīnaṃ paccayānaṃ ghātenāti sukhasomanassānaṃ dukkhadomanassānañca yathākkamaṃ rāgadosapaccayānaṃ vikkhambhanena.
tika-vin01t1:1433_6: evaṃ upagantvā kilesanaṭṭhena upakkilesāti āha “anaṅgaṇattā eva ca vigatupakkilese”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1433_11: āvajjanādinā pañcadhā cuddasavidhena vā paridamanena vasaṃ vattituṃ upagateti attho.
tika-vin01t1:1433_12: Vase vattamānañhi cittaṃ mudūti vuccatīti vase vattamānaṃ cittaṃ paguṇabhāvāpattiyā suparimadditaṃ viya
tika-vin01t1:1433_13: cammaṃ suparikammakatā viya ca lākhā mudūti vuccati.
tika-vin01t1:1434_9: sabbaññutaññāṇena olokentopi aññaṃ ekadhammampi na samanupassāmi,
tika-vin01t1:1434_10: yaṃ vasībhāvāpādanena bhāvitaṃ tathā punappunaṃ karaṇena bahulīkataṃ evaṃ savisesamudubhāvappattiyā mudu
tika-vin01t1:1434_11: kammakkhamatāya kammaniyañca hoti yathā idaṃ cittanti.
tika-vin01t1:1434_12: Idaṃ cittanti ca attano tesañca paccakkhatāya evamāha.
tika-vin01t1:1435_1: evaṃ subhāvitaṃ cittaṃ tattha avaṭṭhitaṃ idha “ṭhitaṃ āneñjappatta”nti ca vuttanti āha “etesu parisuddhabhāvādīsu ṭhitattā ṭhite,
tika-vin01t1:1435_4: evaṃ vasībhāvappattipi mudukammaññatāhi lakkhīyatīti “mudukammaññabhāvena vā attano vase ṭhitattā ṭhite”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1435_6: evaṃ phalenapi kāraṇaṃ niddhārīyatīti niccalabhāvena avaṭṭhānaṃ āneñjappattiyā ca sampayuttadhammesu
tika-vin01t1:1435_7: thirabhāvena paṭipakkhehi akammaniyatāya ca sambhavataṃ saddhādibalānaṃ ānubhāvena hotīti āha “saddhādīhi
tika-vin01t1:1436_0: Idāni saṅkhepato vuttamevatthaṃ vivarituṃ “saddhāpariggahitaṃ hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1436_1: Tattha saddhāpariggahitanti evaṃ subhāvitaṃ vasībhāvappattaṃ cittaṃ ekaṃsena abhiññāsacchikaraṇīyānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1436_2: dhammānaṃ abhiññāsacchikiriyāya saṃvattatīti evaṃ pavattāya saddhāya pariggahitaṃ yathāvuttasaddhābalena
tika-vin01t1:1436_5: Na iñjatīti na calati na kampati,
tika-vin01t1:1436_10: Satipariggahitanti yathāvutte bhāvanābahulīkāre asammosādikāya kusalānañca dhammānaṃ gatiyo samanvesamānāya satiyā upatthambhitaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1436_12: Paññāpariggahitanti tassā eva bhāvanāya upakārānupakāradhammānaṃ pajānanalakkhaṇāya paññāya upatthambhitaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1436_14: Obhāsabhūtena hi yathāvuttasamādhānasaṃvaddhitena ñāṇena saṃkilesapakkhaṃ yāthāvato passanto tato utrāsanto ottappanto taṃ abhibhavati,
tika-vin01t1:1436_18: Aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgatanti catutthajjhānasamādhinā samāhitatā parisuddhatā pariyodātatā anaṅgaṇatā vigatupakkilesatā
tika-vin01t1:1436_19: mudubhāvo kammaniyatā āneñjappattiyā ṭhitatāti imehi aṭṭhahi aṅgehi samannāgataṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1436_20: Atha vā samāhitassa cittassa imāni aṅgānīti “samāhite”ti imaṃ aṅgabhāvena aggahetvā ṭhitiāneñjappattiyo
tika-vin01t1:1436_21: visuṃ gahetvā yathāvuttehi aṭṭhahi aṅgehi samannāgatanti attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin01t1:1437_2: tathāpi na tathā te tehi dūrībhūtā,
tika-vin01t1:1437_4: tasmā cetaso malīnabhāvasaṅkhobhauppilābhāvakarehi nīvaraṇādīhi suṭṭhu vimuttiyā tassa parisuddhipariyodātatā ca vuttāti āha “nīvaraṇa…pe…
tika-vin01t1:1438_2: Icchāvacarānanti icchāya avacarānaṃ icchāvasena otiṇṇānaṃ ‘aho vata mameva satthā paṭipucchitvā bhikkhūnaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1438_6: Abhijjhā cettha paṭhamajjhānena avikkhambhaneyyā mānādayo ca tadekaṭṭhā daṭṭhabbā jhānapaṭilābhapaccayānanti anuvattamānattā.
tika-vin01t1:1438_8: Kathaṃ pana paṭhamajjhānena avikkhambhaneyyā idha vigacchantīti?
tika-vin01t1:1438_9: ‘Sabbe kusalā dhammā sabbākusalānaṃ paṭipakkhā’ti sallekhapaṭipattivasena evaṃ vuttaṃ jhānassa aparāmaṭṭhabhāvadassanato.
tika-vin01t1:1438_10: Ye panettha ‘icchāvacarānaṃ abhijjhādīna’nti imehi padehi kopaappaccayakāmarāgabyāpādādayo gahitāti adhippāyena
tika-vin01t1:1438_12: taṃ tesaṃ matimattaṃ tathā pāṭhasseva abhāvato,
tika-vin01t1:1438_13: jhānapaṭilābhapaccanīkā ca nīvaraṇā ceva tadekaṭṭhā ca,
tika-vin01t1:1438_14: tesaṃ dūrībhāvaṃ vatvā puna tesaṃyeva abhāvavigamacodanāya ayujjamānattā.
tika-vin01t1:1438_15: Nanu ca anaṅgaṇasuttavatthasuttesu ayamattho labbhati oḷārikānaṃyeva pāpadhammānaṃ tattha adhippetattāti.
tika-vin01t1:1438_17: idha pana adhigatacatutthajjhānassa vasena vuttattā sukhumāyeva te gahitā,
tika-vin01t1:1439_0: Avassañcetamevaṃ sampaṭicchitabbaṃ adhigatajjhānānampi kesañci icchāvacarānaṃ pavattisabbhāvatoti.
tika-vin01t1:1439_1: Teneva ācariyadhammapālattherena “jhānapaṭilābhapaccayāna”nti pāṭhaṃ gahetvā “jhānapaṭilābhapaccanīkāna”nti ayaṃ pāṭho paṭikkhitto.
tika-vin01t1:1439_2: Mahāgaṇṭhipade visuddhimaggassa sīhaḷagaṇṭhipadepi ca “jhānapaṭilābhapaccayāna”nti imasseva pāṭhassa attho vutto,
tika-vin01t1:1439_5: Tena “icchāvacarānanti icchāya avacarānaṃ icchāvasena otiṇṇānaṃ pavattānaṃ nānappakārānaṃ kopaappaccayānanti
tika-vin01t1:1439_7: tatoyeva ca visuddhimagge ayaṃ pāṭho sabbena sabbaṃ na dassitoti.
tika-vin01t1:1440_1: Bhāvanāpāripūriyāti ito paraṃ kattabbassa abhāvavasena abhinīhārakkhamabhāvanāya paripuṇṇattā.
tika-vin01t1:1440_2: Paṇītabhāvūpagamanenāti tato eva padhānabhāvaṃ nītatāya uttamaṭṭhena atittikaraṭṭhena ca paṇītabhāvassa upagamanena.
tika-vin01t1:1441_1: tassa vā anussaraṇaṃ pubbenivāsānussati taṃnissayādipaccayabhūtaṃ paṭicca uppajjanato.
tika-vin01t1:1441_2: Pubbenivāsānussatimhi yaṃ ñāṇaṃ tadatthāyāti saṅkhepena vuttamatthaṃ vivaranto pubbenivāsaṃ tāva dassetvā
tika-vin01t1:1441_4: Tattha “pubbe”ti idaṃ padaṃ “ekampi jāti”ntiādivacanato atītabhavavisayaṃ idhādhippetanti āha “atītajātīsū”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1441_8: tathābhūtā ca te anu anu bhūtā jātā pavattā,
tika-vin01t1:1441_9: tattha uppajjitvā vigatā ca hontīti āha “nivutthāti ajjhāvutthā anubhūtā attano santāne uppajjitvā niruddhā”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1441_10: Evaṃ sasantatipariyāpannadhammavasena nivāsasaddassa atthaṃ vatvā idāni avisesena vattuṃ “nivutthadhammā
tika-vin01t1:1441_11: vā nivutthā”ti vatvā taṃ vivarituṃ “gocaranivāsenā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1441_12: Gocarabhūtāpi hi gocarāsevanāya āsevitā ārammaṇakaraṇavasena anubhūtā nivutthā nāma honti.
tika-vin01t1:1441_13: Te pana duvidhā saparaviññāṇagocaratāyāti ubhayepi te dassetuṃ “attano”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1441_14: Tattha “attano viññāṇena viññātā”ti vatvā “paricchinnā”ti vacanaṃ ye te gocaranivāsena nivutthadhammā,
tika-vin01t1:1441_16: atha kho yathā pubbe nāmagottavaṇṇaliṅgāhārādīhi visesehi paricchedakārikāya paññāya paricchijja gahitā,
tika-vin01t1:1441_17: tathevetaṃ ñāṇaṃ paricchijja gaṇhātīti imassa atthassa dīpanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1441_20: atha kho paresaṃ viññāṇena viññātāpīti attho.
tika-vin01t1:1441_23: Tassa ca gahaṇe payojanaṃ vuttanayeneva vattabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1442_0: Te ca kho yasmā atītāsu eva jātīsu aññehi viññātā paricchinnā,
tika-vin01t1:1442_3: tesaṃ tadā vattamānasantānānusārena tesampi atīte pavatti viññāyatīti sikhāppattaṃ pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa
tika-vin01t1:1442_8: Chinnavaṭumakā pana sabbeva anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbutā chinnasaṃsāramaggattā,
tika-vin01t1:1442_9: tesaṃ anussaraṇaṃ nāma tesaṃ paṭipattiyā anussaraṇaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1442_10: Sā pana paṭipatti saṅkhepato chaḷārammaṇaggahaṇalakkhaṇāti tāni idha paraviññāṇaviññātaggahaṇena gahitāni.
tika-vin01t1:1442_11: Tasmā purimāsu jātīsu attano viññāṇena aviññātānaṃ parinibbutānaṃ sabbesampi buddhapaccekabuddhasāvakānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1442_13: saddena panettha purimāsu jātīsu attano viññāṇena aviññātānaṃ aparinibbutānampi vattamānakkhandhapaṭipāṭiyā
tika-vin01t1:1442_16: Na hi atīte buddhā bhagavanto evaṃ vipassiṃsu,
tika-vin01t1:1442_19: evaṃ veneyye vinesunti ettha sabbathā aññesaṃ ñāṇassa gati atthīti.
tika-vin01t1:1442_20: Ye pana purimāsu jātīsu attanova viññāṇena viññātā,
tika-vin01t1:1442_24: Abhinīharinti cittaṃ jhānārammaṇato apanetvā pubbenivāsābhimukhaṃ pesesiṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1443_0: Pāḷiyaṃ “abhininnāmesi”nti uttamapurisappayogattā “so”ti ettha ahaṃsaddo ānetvā vuccamāno tadattho pākaṭo hotīti “so aha”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1443_7: Nivāsanti antogadhabhedasāmaññavacanametanti te bhede byāpanicchāvasena saṅgahetvā dassento “tattha tattha nivutthasantāna”nti āha.
tika-vin01t1:1443_12: dīpetīti āha “citte abhininnāmitamatte eva sarāmīti dassetī”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1443_13: Parikammaṃ vattabbaṃ siyāti “pubbenivāsaṃ anussaritukāmena ādikammikena bhikkhunā pacchābhattaṃ piṇḍapātapaṭikkantena
tika-vin01t1:1443_14: rahogatena paṭisallīnena paṭipāṭiyā cattāri jhānāni samāpajjitvā abhiññāpādakacatutthajjhānato vuṭṭhāya
tika-vin01t1:1443_15: sabbapacchimā nisajjā āvajjitabbā”ti evamādinā pubbenivāsañāṇassa parikammabhūtaṃ pubbakaraṇaṃ vattabbaṃ bhaveyya.
tika-vin01t1:1444_2: So hi ekakammanibbatto ādānanikkhepaparicchinno antogadhadhammappabhedo khandhappabandho idha “jātī”ti adhippeto jāyatīti jātīti katvā.
tika-vin01t1:1444_12: sabbāneva sahattanā”ti ādīsu kālassapi khayo vuccati,
tika-vin01t1:1445_5: Ekaṃ buddhakkhettanti idha yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1445_6: taṃ niyametvā dassetuṃ “buddhakkhettaṃ nāma tividha”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1445_7: Yattake ṭhāne tathāgatassa paṭisandhiñāṇādiñāṇānubhāvo puññaphalasamuttejito saraseneva parijambhati,
tika-vin01t1:1445_8: taṃ sabbampi buddhaṅkurassa nibbattanakkhettaṃ nāmāti āha “jātikkhettaṃ dasasahassacakkavāḷapariyanta”nti.
tika-vin01t1:1445_9: Ānubhāvo pavattatīti idha iddhimā cetovasippatto āṇākkhettapariyāpanne yattha katthaci cakkavāḷe ṭhatvā
tika-vin01t1:1445_10: attano atthāya parittaṃ katvā tattheva aññaṃ cakkavāḷaṃ gatopi kataparitto eva hotīti katvā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1445_11: Atha vā tattha ekasmiṃ cakkavāḷe ṭhatvā sabbasattānaṃ atthāya paritte kate āṇākkhette sabbasattānaṃ abhisambhuṇātveva
tika-vin01t1:1445_12: parittānubhāvo tattha devatāhi parittānaṃ sampaṭicchitabbatoti vuttaṃ “ānubhāvo pavattatī”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1445_13: Yaṃ yāvatā vā pana ākaṅkheyyāti vuttanti yaṃ visayakkhettaṃ sandhāya ekasmiṃyeva khaṇe sarena abhiviññāpanaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1445_14: attano rūpadassanañca paṭijānantena bhagavatā “yāvatā vā pana ākaṅkheyyā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1445_17: taṃ taṃ anussaratīti ākaṅkhamattapaṭibaddhavuttitāya buddhañāṇassa yaṃ yaṃ anussarituṃ icchati,
tika-vin01t1:1445_19: Ekaṃ āṇākkhettaṃ vinassatīti iminā tiriyato saṃvaṭṭamānaparicchedo vutto.
tika-vin01t1:1445_21: Tassa vināso ca saṇṭhahanañca visuddhimagge vuttanti amhehipi heṭṭhā “lokavidū”ti imassa atthasaṃvaṇṇanādhikāre pasaṅgato vuttattā idha na vuccati.
tika-vin01t1:1446_0: Evaṃ pasaṅgena saṃvaṭṭādike pakāsetvā idāni yathādhigataṃ tesaṃ anussaraṇākāraṃ dassetuṃ “ye panete saṃvaṭṭavivaṭṭā vuttā”tiādimāha.
tika-vin01t1:1446_1: Tattha etesūti niddhāraṇe bhummaṃ saṃvaṭṭavivaṭṭakappasamudāyato anekesaṃ saṃvaṭṭakappādīnaṃ niddhāriyamānattā.
tika-vin01t1:1446_4: Tena ca aniyamatthena itarāsaṃ asaṅkhyeyyānampi saṅgaho siddhoti.
tika-vin01t1:1446_5: Atha vā amumhi saṃvaṭṭakappeti idaṃ saṃvaṭṭakappassa ādito pāḷiyaṃ gahitattā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1446_6: Tatthāpi hi imassa katipayakālaṃ bhavādīsu saṃsaraṇaṃ upalabbhatīti.
tika-vin01t1:1446_7: Saṃvaṭṭakappe vā vattamāne yesu bhavādīsu imassa upapatti ahosi,
tika-vin01t1:1446_9: Bhave vātiādīsu kāmādibhave vā aṇḍajādiyoniyā vā devādigatiyā vā nānattakāyanānattasaññīādiviññāṇaṭṭhitiyā vā sattāvāse vā khattiyādisattanikāye vā.
tika-vin01t1:1446_10: Yasmā idaṃ bhagavato vasena pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇaṃ āgataṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1446_11: tasmā tasseva nāmādivasena atthaṃ yojetvā dassento āha “evaṃnāmoti vessantaro vā jotipālo vā”tiādi.
tika-vin01t1:1447_0: Heṭṭhā sāmaññato vuttamevatthaṃ vibhajitvā dassetukāmo “atha vā”tiādimāha.
tika-vin01t1:1447_4: Anupubbena ārohantassa yāvadicchakaṃ anussaraṇanti ettha ārohantassāti paṭilomato ñāṇena pubbenivāsaṃ ārohantassa.
tika-vin01t1:1447_5: Paṭinivattantassāti pubbenivāsaṃ anussaraṇavasena yāvadicchakaṃ gantvā paccāgacchantassa.
tika-vin01t1:1447_15: Mahābodhisattānaṃ santānassa pariyosānāvatthāyaṃ devalokūpapattijanakaṃ nāma akusalena kammunā anupaddutameva
tika-vin01t1:1447_17: Mahāpuññānampi pana devaputtānaṃ pubbanimittuppattikālādīsu aniṭṭhārammaṇasamāyogo hotiyevāti “kadāci
tika-vin01t1:1447_18: dukkhadukkhassapi sambhavo natthī”ti na sakkā vattuṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1448_3: Uddisīyatīti disvāva aviññeyyattā “ayaṃ ko nāmo”ti pucchite “tisso gotamo”ti nāmagottena uddisīyati.
tika-vin01t1:1448_9: Nāmagottaṃ uddesoti uddisīyati satto etenāti uddeso nāmagottaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1448_10: Itare ākārāti ākarīyati disvāva satto viññāyati etehīti itare vaṇṇādayo ākārā.
tika-vin01t1:1448_11: “No ca kho avisesenā”ti saṅkhepato vuttamevatthaṃ vitthārena dassento āha “titthiyā hī”tiādi.
tika-vin01t1:1448_14: Yasmā titthiyānaṃ brahmajālādīsu cattālīsāya eva saṃvaṭṭavivaṭṭānaṃ anussaraṇaṃ āgataṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1448_15: tasmā “na tato para”nti vatvā tattha kāraṇaṃ vadanto “dubbalapaññattā”tiādimāha.
tika-vin01t1:1448_17: Tatoyeva ca balavapaññattā ṭhapetvā aggasāvakamahāsāvake itare pakatisāvakā kappasatampi kappasahassampi anussarantiyevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1448_18: Teneva vuttaṃ visuddhimagge “pakatisāvakā kappasatampi kappasahassampi anussarantiyeva balavapaññattā”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1448_19: Ettako hi tesaṃ abhinīhāroti kappānaṃ satasahassampi tadadhikaṃ ekaṃ dve ca asaṅkhyeyyānīti kālavasena
tika-vin01t1:1448_22: Yadi bodhisambhārasambharaṇakālaparicchinno tesaṃ tesaṃ ariyānaṃ abhiññāñāṇavibhavo,
tika-vin01t1:1448_23: evaṃ sante buddhānampissa paricchedatā āpannāti āha “buddhānaṃ pana paricchedo natthī”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1448_25: tāvatakaṃ ñāṇa”nti vacanato sabbaññutaññāṇassa viya buddhānaṃ abhiññāñāṇānampi savisaye paricchedo nāma natthīti tattha yaṃ yaṃ ñātuṃ icchanti,
tika-vin01t1:1448_27: Atha vā satipi kālaparicchede kāraṇūpāyakosallapariggahādinā sātisayattā mahābodhisambhārānaṃ paññāpāramitāya
tika-vin01t1:1448_29: kuto taṃnibbattānaṃ abhiññāñāṇānanti āha “buddhānaṃ pana paricchedo natthī”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1448_30: Atīte “ettakānaṃ kappānaṃ asaṅkhyeyyānī”ti evaṃ kālaparicchedo natthi anāgate anāgataṃsañāṇassa viya.
tika-vin01t1:1449_0: Evaṃ pañcannaṃ janānaṃ pubbenivāsānussaraṇaṃ kālavibhāgato dassetvā idāni ārammaṇaggahaṇavasenassa pavattivisesaṃ dassento “titthiyā cā”tiādimāha.
tika-vin01t1:1449_1: Khandhapaṭipāṭimeva sarantīti ettha khandhapaṭipāṭi khandhānaṃ anukkamo,
tika-vin01t1:1449_2: sā ca kho cutito paṭṭhāya uppaṭipāṭivasena.
tika-vin01t1:1449_5: Tattha cutipaṭisandhivasenāti attano parassa vā tasmiṃ tasmiṃ attabhāve cutiṃ disvā antarā kiñci anāmasitvā paṭisandhiyā eva gahaṇavasena.
tika-vin01t1:1449_6: Yathā pana andhā yaṭṭhiṃ amuñcitvā gacchanti,
tika-vin01t1:1449_7: evaṃ te khandhapaṭipāṭiṃ amuñcitvāva sarantīti āha “tesañhi andhānaṃ viya icchitappadesokkamanaṃ natthī”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1449_8: Sāvakāti pakatisāvakāpi mahāsāvakāpi aggasāvakāpi sāmaññato vuttā.
tika-vin01t1:1449_13: Ekassa attabhāvassa cutiṃ disvā paṭisandhiṃ passanti,
tika-vin01t1:1449_14: puna aparassa cutiṃ disvā paṭisandhinti evaṃ cutipaṭisandhivasenapi saṅkamantā gacchanti.
tika-vin01t1:1449_15: Yathā nāma saradasamaye ṭhitamajjhanhikavelāyaṃ caturatanike gehe cakkhumato purisassa rūpagataṃ supākaṭameva hotīti lokasiddhametaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1449_16: Siyā pana tassa sukhumataratirokuṭṭādibhedassa rūpagatassa agocaratā,
tika-vin01t1:1449_17: na tveva buddhānaṃ ñātuṃ icchitassa ñeyyassa agocaratā,
tika-vin01t1:1449_18: atha kho taṃ ñāṇālokena obhāsitaṃ hatthatale āmalakaṃ viya supākaṭaṃ suvibhūtameva hoti,
tika-vin01t1:1450_1: Yaṃ yaṃ ṭhānaṃ ākaṅkhantīti yasmiṃ kappe yasmiṃ bhave yaṃ yaṃ ṭhānaṃ jānituṃ icchanti.
tika-vin01t1:1450_2: Taṃ sabbaṃ sarantiyevāti ñātuṃ icchitaṃ taṃ sabbaṃ sarantiyeva,
tika-vin01t1:1450_6: Tesañhi anekāsu kappakoṭīsu heṭṭhā vā upari vā yaṃ yaṃ ṭhānaṃ icchanti,
tika-vin01t1:1450_11: evaṃ anekāpi kappakoṭiyo peyyālapāḷiṃ viya saṅkhipitvā yaṃ yaṃ icchanti,
tika-vin01t1:1450_12: tattha tattheva ñāṇena okkamantā sīhokkantavasena gacchanti.
tika-vin01t1:1450_13: Evaṃ gacchantānañca tesaṃ ñāṇaṃ yathā nāma katavālavedhiparicayassa sarabhaṅgasadisassa dhanuggahassa
tika-vin01t1:1450_14: khitto saro antarantarā rukkhalatādīsu asajjamāno lakkheyeva patati na sajjati na virajjhati,
tika-vin01t1:1450_15: evaṃ antarantarāsu jātīsu na sajjati na virajjhati,
tika-vin01t1:1451_0: Atītabhave khandhā tappaṭibaddhanāmagottāni ca sabbaṃ pubbenivāsantveva saṅgahitānīti āha “kiṃ viditaṃ karoti?
tika-vin01t1:1451_2: Moho paṭicchādakaṭṭhena tamo viya tamoti āha “sveva moho”tiādi.
tika-vin01t1:1451_7: Avijjā vihatāti etena vijānanaṭṭhena vijjāti ayampi attho dīpitoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Kasmā?
tika-vin01t1:1451_8: Yasmā vijjā uppannāti etena vijjāpaṭipakkhā avijjā,
tika-vin01t1:1451_9: paṭipakkhatā cassā pahātabbabhāvena vijjāya ca pahāyakabhāvenāti dasseti.
tika-vin01t1:1451_10: Esa nayo itarasmimpi padadvayeti iminā tamo vihato vinaṭṭho. Kasmā?
tika-vin01t1:1451_12: Kilesānaṃ ātāpanaparitāpanaṭṭhena vīriyaṃ ātāpoti āha “vīriyātāpena ātāpino”ti,
tika-vin01t1:1451_15: Yathā appamattassa ātāpino pahitattassa viharatoti aññassapi kassaci mādisassāti adhippāyo.
tika-vin01t1:1454_7: Dibbacakkhuñāṇeneva hi sattānaṃ cuti ca upapatti ca ñāyati.
tika-vin01t1:1454_8: Parikammaṃ vattabbaṃ siyāti “dibbacakkhuñāṇaṃ uppādetukāmena ādikammikena kulaputtena kasiṇārammaṇaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1454_9: abhiññāpādakajjhānaṃ sabbākārena abhinīhārakkhamaṃ katvā tejokasiṇaṃ odātakasiṇaṃ ālokakasiṇanti imesu
tika-vin01t1:1454_11: upacārajjhānagocaraṃ katvā vaḍḍhetvā ṭhapetabba”ntiādinā dibbacakkhuñāṇassa parikammaṃ vattabbaṃ bhaveyya.
tika-vin01t1:1455_4: Dibbasadisattāti ca hīnūpamādassanaṃ devatānaṃ dibbacakkhutopi imassa mahānubhāvattā.
tika-vin01t1:1455_11: Pittādīhi anupaddutattā kammassa ca uḷāratāya upakkilesavimutti veditabbā.
tika-vin01t1:1455_12: Upakkilesadosarahitañhi kammaṃ tiṇādidosarahitaṃ viya sassaṃ uḷāraphalaṃ anupakkiliṭṭhaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t1:1455_13: Kāraṇūpacārena cassa phalaṃ tathā voharīyati yathā “sukkaṃ sukkavipāka”nti.
tika-vin01t1:1455_17: Vīriyabhāvanābalanibbattanti vīriyārambhavaseneva ijjhanato sabbāpi kusalabhāvanā vīriyabhāvanā,
tika-vin01t1:1455_21: Tādisamevāti upakkilesavimuttatāya dūrepi sukhumassapi ārammaṇassa sampaṭicchanasamatthatāya ca taṃsadisameva.
tika-vin01t1:1456_0: Dibbavihāravasena paṭiladdhattāti dibbavihārasaṅkhātānaṃ catunnaṃ jhānānaṃ vasena paṭiladdhattā.
tika-vin01t1:1456_2: Dibbavihārasannissitattāti aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgamena ukkaṃsagataṃ pādakajjhānasaṅkhātaṃ dibbavihāraṃ sannissāya pavattattā,
tika-vin01t1:1456_3: dibbavihārapariyāpannaṃ vā attanā sampayuttaṃ rūpāvacaracatutthajjhānaṃ nissāya paccayabhūtaṃ sannissitattāti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin01t1:1456_4: Ālokapariggahena mahājutikattāpi dibbanti kasiṇālokānuggahena pattabbattā sayaṃ ñāṇālokapharaṇabhāvena ca mahājutikabhāvatopi dibbanti attho.
tika-vin01t1:1456_9: Taṃ sabbanti “heṭṭhā vuttaṃ atthapañcakamapekkhitvā vutta”nti vadanti.
tika-vin01t1:1456_10: Keci pana “jutigatiatthesupi saddavidū divusaddaṃ icchantīti mahājutikattā mahāgatikattāti idameva dvayaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1456_11: tasmā ‘saddasatthānusārena veditabba’nti idaṃ dibbati jotayatīti dibbaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1456_12: dibbati gacchati asajjamānaṃ pavattatīti dibbanti imamatthaṃ dassetuṃ vutta”nti vadanti.
tika-vin01t1:1457_0: “Dibbacakkhulābhāya yogino parikammakaraṇaṃ tappaṭipakkhābhibhavassa atthato tassa vijayicchā nāma hoti,
tika-vin01t1:1457_1: dibbacakkhulābhī ca iddhimā devatānaṃ vacanagahaṇakkhamanadhammadānavasena mahāmoggallānattherādayo viya
tika-vin01t1:1457_2: dānaggahaṇalakkhaṇe vohāre ca pavatteyyāti evaṃ vihāravijayicchāvohārajutigatisaṅkhātānaṃ atthānaṃ vasena
tika-vin01t1:1457_3: imassa abhiññāñāṇassa dibbacakkhubhāvasiddhito saddavidū ca tesu eva atthesu divusaddaṃ icchantīti ‘taṃ
tika-vin01t1:1459_2: Yathā maṃsacakkhu viññāṇādhiṭṭhitaṃ samavisamaṃ ācikkhantaṃ viya pavattati,
tika-vin01t1:1459_4: Idaṃ pana sayameva tato sātisayaṃ cakkhukiccakārīti āha “cakkhukiccakaraṇena cakkhumivātipi cakkhū”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1459_5: Diṭṭhivisuddhihetuttāti saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ vivarituṃ “yo hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1459_6: Ucchedadiṭṭhiṃ gaṇhātīti parato uppattiyā adassanato “etthe vāyaṃ satto ucchinno,
tika-vin01t1:1459_8: Navasattapātubhāvadiṭṭhiṃ gaṇhātīti jhānalābhī adhiccasamuppanniko viya gaṇhāti.
tika-vin01t1:1459_9: Yathā hi so asaññasattā cavitvā idhūpapanno pabbajito samāno abhiññālābhī hutvā pubbenivāsaṃ anussaranto
tika-vin01t1:1459_10: idhūpapattimeva disvā tato paraṃ asaññabhave uppattiṃ anussaritumasakkonto “ahaṃ adhiccasamuppanno pubbe nāhosiṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1459_13: evamayampi upapātamattameva disvā cutiṃ apassanto navasattapātubhāvadiṭṭhiṃ gaṇhāti.
tika-vin01t1:1460_0: Idāni aññathāpi visuddhikāraṇaṃ dassento āha “ekādasaupakkilesavirahato vā”tiādi.
tika-vin01t1:1460_2: Tattha hi anuruddho nandiyo kimiloti ime tayo kulaputte āmantetvā dhammaṃ dassentena “anuruddhā tumhe kiṃ imehi na āluḷissanti,
tika-vin01t1:1460_3: ahampi imehi upādāya ekādasahi upakkilesehi āluḷitapubbo”ti dassetuṃ –
tika-vin01t1:1461_0: “Ahampi sudaṃ anuruddhā pubbeva sambodhā anabhisambuddho bodhisattova samāno obhāsañceva sañjānāmi dassanañca rūpānaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1461_1: so kho pana me obhāso na cirasseva antaradhāyati dassanañca rūpānaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1461_2: Tassa mayhaṃ anuruddhā etadahosi ‘ko nu kho hetu,
tika-vin01t1:1461_4: yena me obhāso antaradhāyati dassanañca rūpāna’nti.
tika-vin01t1:1461_5: Tassa mayhaṃ anuruddhā etadahosi ‘vicikicchā kho me udapādi,
tika-vin01t1:1461_7: samādhimhi cute obhāso antaradhāyati dassanañca rūpānaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1461_9: yathā me puna na vicikicchā uppajjissatī’ti.
tika-vin01t1:1462_0: “So kho ahaṃ anuruddhā appamatto ātāpī pahitatto viharanto obhāsañceva sañjānāmi dassanañca rūpānaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1462_1: so kho pana me obhāso na cirasseva antaradhāyati dassanañca rūpānaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1462_2: Tassa mayhaṃ anuruddhā etadahosi ‘ko nu kho hetu,
tika-vin01t1:1462_4: yena me obhāso antaradhāyati dassanañca rūpāna’nti.
tika-vin01t1:1462_5: Tassa mayhaṃ anuruddhā etadahosi ‘amanasikāro kho me udapādi,
tika-vin01t1:1462_7: samādhimhi cute obhāso antaradhāyati dassanañca rūpānaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1462_9: yathā me puna na vicikicchā uppajjissati na amanasikāro”’ti –
tika-vin01t1:1463_0: Ādinā desanaṃ ārabhitvā idaṃ vuttaṃ “so kho ahaṃ anuruddhā vicikicchā cittassa upakkilesoti iti viditvā”tiādi.
tika-vin01t1:1464_0: Tattha vicikicchāti mahāsattassa ālokaṃ vaḍḍhetvā dibbacakkhunā nānāvidhāni rūpāni passantassa “idaṃ nu kho ki”nti uppannā vicikicchā.
tika-vin01t1:1464_3: tasmā idāni kiñci na manasi karissāmīti tuṇhī bhavati,
tika-vin01t1:1464_6: Tathābhūtassa hi savipphārikamanasikārassa abhāvato thinamiddhaṃ uppajjati.
tika-vin01t1:1464_7: Chambhitattanti thinamiddhaṃ vinodetvā yathāraddhamanasikāravasena himavantābhimukhaṃ ālokaṃ vaḍḍhetvā
tika-vin01t1:1464_9: Uppilanti “mayā diṭṭhabhayaṃ pakatiyā cakkhuviññāṇena olokiyamānaṃ na passati,
tika-vin01t1:1464_10: adiṭṭhe parikappitasadise kiṃnāma bhaya”nti bhayassa vinodanavasena cintentassa attano paccavekkhaṇākosallaṃ nissāya uppannaṃ uppilāvitattaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1464_12: “Mayā thinamiddhaṃ chambhitattānaṃ vūpasamanatthaṃ gāḷhaṃ vīriyaṃ paggahitaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1464_13: tena me uppilasaṅkhātā cittasamādhidūsitā gehassitā balavapīti uppannā”ti vīriyaṃ sithilaṃ karontassa
tika-vin01t1:1465_0: Accāraddhavīriyanti “mama vīriyaṃ sithilaṃ karoto duṭṭhullaṃ uppanna”nti puna vīriyaṃ paggaṇhato uppannaṃ accāraddhavīriyaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1465_1: Atilīnavīriyanti “mama vīriyaṃ paggaṇhato evaṃ jāta”nti puna vīriyaṃ sithilayato uppannaṃ atilīnavīriyaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1465_2: Abhijappāti devalokābhimukhaṃ ālokaṃ vaḍḍhetvā devasaṅghaṃ passato uppannā taṇhā.
tika-vin01t1:1465_3: “Evaṃ me hotū”ti hi abhinivisanavasena jappatīti abhijappā, taṇhā.
tika-vin01t1:1465_4: Nānattasaññāti “mayhaṃ ekajātikaṃ rūpaṃ manasikarontassa abhijappā uppannā,
tika-vin01t1:1465_5: nānāvidhaṃ rūpaṃ manasikāraṃ karissāmī”ti kālena devalokābhimukhaṃ kālena manussalokābhimukhaṃ vaḍḍhetvā
tika-vin01t1:1465_8: Atinijjhāyitattanti “mayhaṃ nānāvidhāni rūpāni manasikarontassa nānattasaññā udapādi,
tika-vin01t1:1465_9: iṭṭhaṃ vā aniṭṭhaṃ vā ekajātikameva rūpaṃ manasi karissāmī”ti tathā manasikaroto uppannaṃ rūpānaṃ atinijjhāyitattaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1465_10: ativiya uttari katvā nijjhānaṃ pekkhanaṃ atinijjhāyitattaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1465_12: Na ca rūpāni passāmīti parikammobhāsamanasikārappasutatāya dibbacakkhunā rūpāni na passāmi.
tika-vin01t1:1465_13: Rūpāni hi kho passāmīti tena parikammobhāsena pharitvā ṭhitaṭṭhāne dibbacakkhuno visayabhūtāni rūpagatāni passāmi.
tika-vin01t1:1467_0: “Kevalampi rattiṃ kevalampi divaṃ kevalampi rattindivaṃ tassa mayhaṃ anuruddhā etadahosi ‘ko nu kho hetu,
tika-vin01t1:1467_5: na ca obhāsaṃ sañjānāmi kevalampi rattiṃ kevalampi divaṃ kevalampi rattindiva’nti.
tika-vin01t1:1467_6: Tassa mayhaṃ anuruddhā etadahosi ‘yasmiñhi kho ahaṃ samaye rūpanimittaṃ amanasikaritvā obhāsanimittaṃ manasi karomi.
tika-vin01t1:1467_9: Yasmiṃ panāhaṃ samaye obhāsanimittaṃ amanasikaritvā rūpanimittaṃ manasi karomi.
tika-vin01t1:1467_10: Rūpāni hi kho tasmiṃ samaye passāmi,
tika-vin01t1:1467_11: na ca obhāsaṃ sañjānāmi kevalampi rattiṃ kevalampi divaṃ kevalampi rattindiva”nti –
tika-vin01t1:1469_2: Tadaññassa pana dibbatirokuṭṭasukhumādibhedassa rūpassa dassanato atikkantamānusakaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1469_3: Evarūpaṃ tañca manussūpacāraṃ atikkantaṃ nāma hotīti āha “manussūpacāraṃ atikkamitvā rūpadassanenā”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1469_6: Evaṃ visayamukhena dassetvā idāni visayimukhena dassetuṃ “mānusakaṃ vā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1469_8: Dibbena cakkhunāti dibbacakkhuñāṇenapi daṭṭhuṃ na sakkā khaṇassa atiittaratāya atisukhumatāya kesañci rūpassa,
tika-vin01t1:1469_11: na ca āvajjanaparikammehi vinā mahaggatassa pavatti atthi,
tika-vin01t1:1469_12: nāpi uppajjamānameva rūpaṃ ārammaṇapaccayo bhavituṃ sakkoti,
tika-vin01t1:1469_14: tasmā cutūpapātakkhaṇe rūpaṃ dibbacakkhunā daṭṭhuṃ na sakkāti suvuttametaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1470_3: Sattagahaṇassa vā kāraṇabhāvato vohāravasena vuttantipi vadanti.
tika-vin01t1:1470_6: Mohūpanissayaṃ nāma kammaṃ nihīnaṃ nihīnaphalaṃ hotīti āha “mohanissandayuttattā”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1470_7: Mohūpanissayatā ca kusalakammassa pubbabhāge mohappavattibahulatāya veditabbā.
tika-vin01t1:1470_8: Tāya pana mohappavattiyā saṃkiliṭṭhaṃ kusalakammaṃ nihīnameva jātiādiṃ nipphādetīti nihīnajātiādayo mohassa
tika-vin01t1:1470_14: Amohanissandayuttattāti ettha amoho sampayuttavasena pubbabhāgavasena ca pavatto kathito,
tika-vin01t1:1470_17: ahīḷite anohīḷite anuññāte anavaññāte cittīkateti attho.
tika-vin01t1:1471_2: Sā panāyaṃ suvaṇṇadubbaṇṇatā yathākkamaṃ kammassa adosadosūpanissayatāya hotīti āha “adosanissandayuttattā”tiādi.
tika-vin01t1:1471_3: Adosūpanissayatā ca kammassa mettādīhi paribhāvitasantānappavattiyā veditabbā.
tika-vin01t1:1471_5: Saṇṭhānavacanopi hi vaṇṇasaddo hoti “mahantaṃ hatthivaṇṇaṃ abhinimminitvā”tiādīsu viya.
tika-vin01t1:1471_6: Paṭhamaṃ vutto pana attho vaṇṇavaseneva vutto.
tika-vin01t1:1471_9: Alobhajjhāsayā sattā vadaññū vigatamaccherā alobhūpanissayena kammunā sugatā samiddhā hontīti āha “alobhanissandayuttattā vā aḍḍhe mahaddhane”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1471_11: Lobhajjhāsayā sattā luddhā maccharino lobhūpanissayena kammunā duggatā durūpā hontīti āha “lobhanissandayuttattā vā dalidde appannapāne”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1471_20: passāmī”ti imehi “cavamāne”tiādīhi ca dibbacakkhukiccaṃ vuttanti attho.
