tika-vin01t1:1471_21: Iminā pana padenāti “yathākammūpage satte pajānāmī”ti iminā vākyena.
tika-vin01t1:1471_22: Pajjati ñāyati attho imināti hi padaṃ vākyaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1472_0: Mahantaṃ dukkhamanubhavamāneti ettha dibbacakkhuñāṇena rūpaṃ disvā tesaṃ dukkhānubhavanaṃ kāmāvacaracitteneva jānātīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1472_1: Soti nerayikasatte paccakkhato disvā ṭhito dibbacakkhuñāṇalābhī.
tika-vin01t1:1472_2: Evaṃ manasi karotīti tesaṃ nerayikānaṃ nirayasaṃvattanikassa kammassa ñātukāmatāvasena pādakajjhānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1472_5: Evaṃ pana parikammaṃ katvā pādakajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhitassa taṃ kammaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā āvajjanaṃ uppajjati,
tika-vin01t1:1472_6: tasmiṃ niruddhe cattāri pañca vā javanāni javanti.
tika-vin01t1:1472_7: Yesaṃ purimāni tīṇi cattāri vā parikammaupacārānulomagotrabhunāmakāni kāmāvacarāni,
tika-vin01t1:1472_8: catutthaṃ pañcamaṃ vā appanācittaṃ rūpāvacaraṃ catutthajjhānikaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1472_9: tattha yaṃ tena appanācittena saddhiṃ uppannaṃ ñāṇaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1472_11: “Visuṃ parikammaṃ natthī”ti idaṃ pana dibbacakkhuñāṇena vinā yathākammūpagañāṇassa visuṃ parikammaṃ natthīti adhippāyena vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1472_13: aññathā yathākammūpagañāṇassa mahaggatabhāvo eva na siyā.
tika-vin01t1:1472_16: Ākaṅkhamāno hi dibbacakkhulābhī aññagatikesupi evaṃ paṭipajjatiyeva.
tika-vin01t1:1473_0: Yathā cimassāti yathā ca imassa yathākammūpagañāṇassa visuṃ parikammaṃ natthi,
tika-vin01t1:1473_4: yathā dibbacakkhulābhī nirayādiabhimukhaṃ ālokaṃ vaḍḍhetvā nerayikādike satte disvā tehi pubbe āyūhitaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1473_5: nirayasaṃvattaniyādikaṃ kammaṃ tādisena samādānena tajjena ca manasikārena parikkhate citte yāthāvato jānāti,
tika-vin01t1:1473_6: evaṃ yassa yassa sattassa samanantaraṃ anāgataṃ attabhāvaṃ ñātukāmo,
tika-vin01t1:1473_7: taṃ taṃ odissa ālokaṃ vaḍḍhetvā tena tena atīte etarahi vā āyūhitaṃ tassa nibbattakaṃ kammaṃ yathākammūpagañāṇena
tika-vin01t1:1473_8: disvā tena tena nibbattetabbaṃ anāgataṃ attabhāvaṃ ñātukāmo tādisena samādānena tajjena ca manasikārena
tika-vin01t1:1473_12: Yasmā etaṃ dvayaṃ dibbacakkhuñāṇe sati eva sijjhati, nāsati.
tika-vin01t1:1474_1: kāyato vā uppannaṃ duccaritanti kāyena duṭṭhu caritaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1474_2: kāyato vā uppannaṃ kilesapūtikattā duṭṭhu caritaṃ kāyaduccaritanti evaṃ yathākkamaṃ yojetabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1474_6: asati āhārupacchede vipākārahasabhāvassa avigacchanato so tena sahitoyevāti vattabboti āha “samannāgatāti samaṅgībhūtā”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1474_7: Anatthakāmā hutvāti etena mātāpitaro viya puttānaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1474_8: ācariyupajjhāyā viya ca nissitakānaṃ atthakāmā hutvā garahakā upavādakā na hontīti dasseti.
tika-vin01t1:1474_13: guṇāti panettha jhānādivisesā uttarimanussadhammā adhippetāti sīlaparidhaṃsanaṃ visuṃ gahitaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1474_22: “Ariyoti pana ajānato aduṭṭhacittasseva tattha ariyaguṇabhāvaṃ pavedentassa guṇaparidhaṃsanaṃ na hotīti tassa ariyūpavādo natthī”ti vadanti.
tika-vin01t1:1475_5: lokasamudācāramattaṃ vā na jānātīti adhippāyena vuttattā guṇaparidhaṃsanena garahatīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1475_6: Amhākaṃ lajjitabbakaṃ akāsīti “samaṇena nāma evaṃ kata”nti vutte mayaṃ sīsaṃ ukkhipituṃ na sakkomāti adhippāyo.
tika-vin01t1:1475_7: Jānanto eva thero “atthi te āvuso imasmiṃ sāsane patiṭṭhā”ti pucchi.
tika-vin01t1:1475_8: Itaropi saccābhisamayo sāsane patiṭṭhāti āha “sotāpanno aha”nti.
tika-vin01t1:1475_9: Thero taṃ karuṇāyamāno “khīṇāsavo tayā upavadito”ti attānaṃ āvi akāsi.
tika-vin01t1:1475_10: Tenassa taṃ pākatikaṃ ahosīti tena assa taṃ kammaṃ maggāvaraṇaṃ nāhosīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin01t1:1475_11: Pubbeva pana sotāpannattā apāyagāmīnaṃ suppahīnabhāvato saggāvaraṇamassa kātumasamatthameva taṃ kammaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1475_12: Attanā vuḍḍhataro hotīti ettha “ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā khamāpetabbo”ti visuddhimagge vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1475_14: sesaariyā vā tassa atthakāmā hutvā āyatiṃ saṃvaraṇatthāya na khamāpeyyunti āha “sace so nakkhamatī”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1476_1: sayaṃ vā gantvā saddhivihārike vā pesetvā khamāpetabbo.
tika-vin01t1:1476_5: tesaṃ santikaṃ gantvā sace navakatarā honti,
tika-vin01t1:1476_10: khamatu me so āyasmā’ti vatvā khamāpetabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1478_3: ekassa paṇḍitassa bhikkhuno santikaṃ gantvā ‘ahaṃ, bhante,
tika-vin01t1:1478_5: taṃ me anussarato anussarato vippaṭisāro hoti,
tika-vin01t1:1478_10: Tenapi ariyassa gatadisābhimukhena añjaliṃ paggahetvā ‘khamatū’ti vattabba”nti.
tika-vin01t1:1479_1: Pākatikameva hotīti evaṃ kate attano cittaṃ pasīdatīti taṃ kammaṃ saggāvaraṇaṃ maggāvaraṇañca na hotīti adhippāyoti keci vadanti.
tika-vin01t1:1480_1: mahākaruṇādhivāse mahāsatte ariyūpavādakammaabhisapasaṅkhātaṃ pharusavacanaṃ saṃyuttaṃ mahāsattassa khettavisesabhāvato
tika-vin01t1:1480_2: tassa ca ajjhāsayapharusatāya diṭṭhadhammavedanīyaṃ hutvā sace so mahāsattaṃ na khamāpeti,
tika-vin01t1:1480_4: Khamāpite pana mahāsatte payogasampattiyā vipākassa paṭibāhitattā avipākadhammataṃ āpajji ahosikammabhāvato.
tika-vin01t1:1481_0: Ācariyadhammapālattherena vuttattā evaṃ khamāpite taṃ kammaṃ payogasampattiyā vipākassa paṭibāhitattā
tika-vin01t1:1481_1: ahosikammabhāvena avipākadhammataṃ āpannanti neva saggāvaraṇaṃ na mokkhāvaraṇañca hotīti evamettha attho
tika-vin01t1:1482_4: hetuatthaṃ vā antogadhaṃ katvā micchādiṭṭhivasena pare kammesu samādāpakā micchādiṭṭhikammasamādānā.
tika-vin01t1:1482_10: Atha vā aggamaggapariyāpannā eva sīlādayo veditabbā.
tika-vin01t1:1482_11: Aggamaggaṭṭhassa hi diṭṭheva dhamme ekaṃsikā aññārādhanā,
tika-vin01t1:1482_19: Yathā hi maggānantaraṃ avirajjhitvāva phalaṃ nibbattaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1482_20: evametaṃ imassapi puggalassa cutianantaraṃ avirajjhitvāva niraye paṭisandhi hotīti dasseti.
tika-vin01t1:1482_21: Sakalasmiñhi buddhavacane na imāya upamāya gāḷhataraṃ katvā vuttaupamā atthi.
tika-vin01t1:1482_22: Taṃ vācaṃ appahāyātiādīsu ariyūpavādaṃ sandhāya “puna evarūpiṃ vācaṃ na vakkhāmī”ti vadanto vācaṃ pajahati nāma,
tika-vin01t1:1482_23: “puna evarūpaṃ cittaṃ na uppādessāmī”ti cintento cittaṃ pajahati nāma,
tika-vin01t1:1482_24: “puna evarūpiṃ diṭṭhiṃ na gaṇhissāmī”ti pajahanto diṭṭhiṃ pajahati nāma.
tika-vin01t1:1482_25: Tathā akaronto neva pajahati na paṭinissajjati.
tika-vin01t1:1482_26: Yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ nirayeti yathā nirayapālehi āharitvā niraye ṭhapito,
tika-vin01t1:1482_30: nirayūpago ariyūpavādī tadādāyakassa avijahanato seyyathāpi micchādiṭṭhīti.
tika-vin01t1:1482_31: Ettha ca “taṃ vācaṃ appahāyā”ti evamādivacanena tadādāyakassa appahāneneva ariyūpavādo antarāyiko anatthāvahova,
tika-vin01t1:1482_32: pahānena pana accayaṃ desetvā khamāpanena na antarāyiko anatthāvaho yathā taṃ vuṭṭhitā desitā ca āpattīti dasseti.
tika-vin01t1:1483_3: ayañceva kāyo bahiddhā ca nāmarūpa”nti ca evamādīsu viya idha kāya-
tika-vin01t1:1483_5: Avītarāgassa maraṇato paraṃ nāma bhavantarūpādānamevāti āha “paraṃ maraṇāti tadanantaraṃ abhinibbattakkhandhaggahaṇe”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1483_7: tassa upacchedeneva kāyo bhijjatīti āha “kāyassa bhedāti jīvitindriyassa upacchedā”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1483_13: Vivasāti kammassa vase vattanato attano vase vattituṃ na sakkontīti vigato vaso etesanti vivasā,
tika-vin01t1:1484_7: sobhanaṃ vā caritaṃ anavajjattāti sucarita”ntiādinā kāyaduccaritenātiādīnaṃ padānaṃ vuttassa atthassa vipariyāyena.
tika-vin01t1:1484_8: “Ito bho sugatiṃ gacchā”ti vacanato manussagatipi sugatiyevāti āha “sugatiggahaṇena manussagatipi saṅgayhatī”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1487_5: Sā “ṭhapetvā nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ avasesarūpārūpajjhānānaṃ aññatarato vuṭṭhāyā”tiādinā anekadhā arūpamukhavasena
tika-vin01t1:1487_6: catudhātuvavatthāne vuttānaṃ tesaṃ tesaṃ dhātupariggahamukhānaṃ aññataramukhavasena anekadhāva visuddhimagge
tika-vin01t1:1487_8: Mahābodhisattānaṃ pana catuvīsatikoṭisatasahassamukhena pabhedagamanato nānānayaṃ sabbaññutaññāṇasannissayassa
tika-vin01t1:1487_9: ariyamaggañāṇassa adhiṭṭhānabhūtaṃ pubbabhāgañāṇagabbhaṃ gaṇhāpentaṃ paripākaṃ gacchantaṃ paramagambhīraṃ
tika-vin01t1:1487_12: Yassa ca pavattivibhāgena catuvīsatikoṭisatasahassapabhedassa pādakabhāvena samāpajjiyamānā catuvīsatikoṭisatasahassasaṅkhyā
tika-vin01t1:1487_14: svāyaṃ buddhānaṃ vipassanācāro paramatthamañjusāyaṃ visuddhimaggavaṇṇanāyaṃ uddesato dassito,
tika-vin01t1:1488_2: Āsavānaṃ khaye ñāṇaṃ āsavakkhayañāṇanti dassento “tatra cetaṃ ñāṇa”nti vatvā khayeti ca ādhāre bhummaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1488_4: Idaṃ dukkhanti dukkhassa ariyasaccassa tadā paccakkhato gahitabhāvadassanaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1488_9: Asammohapaṭivedhoti ca yathā tasmiṃ ñāṇe pavatte pacchā dukkhassa sarūpādiparicchede sammoho na hoti,
tika-vin01t1:1488_13: Yaṃ ṭhānaṃ patvāti yaṃ nibbānaṃ maggassa ārammaṇapaccayaṭṭhena kāraṇabhūtaṃ āgamma.
tika-vin01t1:1488_14: Tadubhayavato hi puggalassa patti tadubhayassa pattīti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1488_17: Te vā na pavattanti etthāti appavatti, nibbānaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1489_8: Idaṃ dukkhanti yathābhūtaṃ abbhaññāsintiādinā missakamaggo idha kathitoti “saha vipassanāya koṭippattaṃ maggaṃ kathetī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1489_9: Ettha ca saccappaṭivedhassa tadā atītakālikattā “yathābhūtaṃ abbhaññāsi”nti vatvāpi abhisamayakāle tassa
tika-vin01t1:1489_10: paccuppannataṃ upādāya “evaṃ jānato evaṃ passato”ti vattamānakālena niddeso kato.
tika-vin01t1:1489_11: So ca kāmaṃ maggakkhaṇato paraṃ yāvajjatanā atītakāliko eva,
tika-vin01t1:1489_12: sabbapaṭhamaṃ panassa atītakālikattaṃ phalakkhaṇeneva veditabbanti āha “vimuccitthāti iminā phalakkhaṇaṃ dassetī”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1489_14: Jānanahetu dassanahetu kāmāsavāpi cittaṃ vimuccitthāti yojanā.
tika-vin01t1:1489_15: Bhavāsavaggahaṇeneva cettha bhavarāgassa viya bhavadiṭṭhiyāpi samavarodhoti diṭṭhāsavassapi saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin01t1:1490_0: Yasmā pahīnakilesapaccavekkhaṇena vijjamānassapi kammassa āyatiṃ appaṭisandhikabhāvato “khīṇā jātī”ti jānāti,
tika-vin01t1:1490_1: yasmā ca maggapaccavekkhaṇādīhi vusitaṃ brahmacariyantiādiṃ pajānāti,
tika-vin01t1:1490_2: tasmā vuttaṃ “khīṇā jātīti ādīhi tassa bhūmi”nti.
tika-vin01t1:1490_6: taṃ pakāsetvā parihāraṃ vattukāmo āha “na tāvassā”tiādi.
tika-vin01t1:1490_7: Na tāvassa atītā jāti khīṇāti maggabhāvanāya na khīṇāti adhippāyo.
tika-vin01t1:1490_9: Na anāgatā assa jāti khīṇāti yojanā.
tika-vin01t1:1490_10: Na anāgatāti ca anāgatattasāmaññaṃ gahetvā lesena vadati.
tika-vin01t1:1490_17: “Yā panā”ti hi ādinā maggabhāvanāya anāgatajātiyā eva hetuvināsanadvārena khīṇabhāvo pakāsīyati.
tika-vin01t1:1490_18: Ekacatupañcavokārabhavesūti bhavattayaggahaṇaṃ vuttanayena anavasesato jātiyā khīṇabhāvadassanatthaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1491_0: Brahmacariyavāso nāma idha maggabrahmacariyassa nibbattanamevāti āha “niṭṭhita”nti.
tika-vin01t1:1491_1: Sammādiṭṭhiyā catūsu saccesu pariññādikiccasādhanavasena pavattamānāya sammāsaṅkappādīnampi dukkhasacce pariññābhisamayānuguṇā pavatti,
tika-vin01t1:1491_2: itarasaccesu ca nesaṃ pahānābhisamayādivasena pavatti pākaṭā eva.
tika-vin01t1:1491_7: Te pana pakārā ariyamaggabyāpārabhūtā pariññādayo idhādhippetāti āha “evaṃsoḷasakiccabhāvāyā”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1491_8: Te hi maggaṃ paccavekkhato maggānubhāvena pākaṭā hutvā upaṭṭhahanti,
tika-vin01t1:1491_15: itthattāya itthambhāvato imasmā evaṃpakārā idāni vattamānakkhandhasantānā aparaṃ anāgatakkhandhasantānaṃ mayhaṃ natthi,
tika-vin01t1:1491_16: ime pana carimattabhāvasaṅkhātā pañcakkhandhā pariññātā appatiṭṭhā tiṭṭhanti chinnamūlakā rukkhā viya.
tika-vin01t1:1491_20: āhāre atthi rāgo atthi nandī atthi taṇhā,
tika-vin01t1:1491_22: Te pana pañcakkhandhā carimakaviññāṇanirodhena anupādāno viya jātavedo nibbāyissantīti abbhaññāsinti.
tika-vin01t1:1492_0: Paccavekkhaṇañāṇapariggahitanti na paṭhamadutiyañāṇadvayādhigamaṃ viya kevalanti adhippāyo.
tika-vin01t1:1493_0: Tikkhattuṃ jātoti iminā pana idaṃ dasseti “ahaṃ, brāhmaṇa,
tika-vin01t1:1493_1: paṭhamavijjāya jātoyeva purejātassa sahajātassa vā abhāvato sabbesaṃ vuḍḍho mahallako,
tika-vin01t1:1493_2: kimaṅgaṃ pana tīhi vijjāhi tikkhattuṃ jātoti.
tika-vin01t1:1493_3: Pubbenivāsañāṇena atītaṃsañāṇanti atītārammaṇasabhāgatāya tabbhāvībhāvato ca pubbenivāsañāṇena atītaṃsañāṇaṃ pakāsetvāti yojetabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1493_5: Dibbacakkhuñāṇassa paccuppannārammaṇattā yathākammūpagañāṇassa anāgataṃsañāṇassa ca dibbacakkhuvaseneva
tika-vin01t1:1493_6: ijjhanato dibbacakkhuno paribhaṇḍañāṇattā dibbacakkhumhiyeva ca ṭhitassa cetopariyañāṇasiddhito vuttaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1496_3: Dhīsaddassa yogato hi sāmiatthe etaṃ upayogavacanaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1496_8: tādiso ca sundaro bhaddako nāma hotīti āha “sundare dissatī”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1496_17: Sabbā obhāsayaṃ disāti dasapi disā pabhāsento cando viya sūriyo viya ca ekobhāsaṃ ekālokaṃ karontoti gāthāya attho.
tika-vin01t1:1497_1: abhikkantaṃ bho gotamāti vacanadvayassa “sādhu sādhu bho gotamā”ti āmeḍitavasena atthaṃ dassetvā tassa visayaṃ niddhārento āha “bhaye kodhe”tiādi.
tika-vin01t1:1498_3: Taṃ pana bhagavato vacanaṃ dhammassa desanāti katvā vuttaṃ “yadidaṃ bhoto gotamassa dhammadesanā”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1498_10: tesu padhānabhūtā guṇā dassetabbāti te padhānabhūte guṇe tāva dassetuṃ “saddhājananato paññājananato”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1498_26: vimaddakkhamatāya hitajjhāsayappavattitāya ca vīmaṃsiyamānahitatoti evamattho veditabbo.
tika-vin01t1:1499_3: Hatthe gahetvāti “puratthābhimukho uttarābhimukho vā gacchā”tiādīni avatvā hatthe gahetvā “nissandehaṃ esa maggo,
tika-vin01t1:1499_6: Nikkujjitaṃ ukkujjeyyāti ādheyyassa anādhārabhūtaṃ bhājanaṃ ādhārabhāvāpādanavasena ukkujjeyya.
tika-vin01t1:1499_7: Heṭṭhāmukhajātatāya saddhammavimukhaṃ adhomukhaṭhapitatāya asaddhamme patiṭṭhitanti evaṃ padadvayaṃ yathārahaṃ yojetabbaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1499_10: micchādiṭṭhi pana savisesaṃ paṭicchādikā satte micchābhinivesanenāti āha “micchādiṭṭhigahanapaṭicchanna”nti.
tika-vin01t1:1499_15: Sabbo apāyagāmimaggo kummaggo kucchito maggoti katvā,
tika-vin01t1:1499_16: sammādiṭṭhiādīnaṃ ujupaṭipakkhatāya micchādiṭṭhiādayo aṭṭha micchattadhammā micchāmaggo.
tika-vin01t1:1499_17: Teneva hi tadubhayapaṭipakkhataṃ sandhāya “saggamokkhamaggaṃ ācikkhantenā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1499_21: etehi vā yathāvuttehi arasarūpatādīnaṃ attani aññathā paṭipādanapariyāyehi attano dibbavihāravibhāvanapariyāyehi
tika-vin01t1:1502_3: Ettha hi nāyaṃ gamisaddo nīsaddādayo viya dvikammako,
tika-vin01t1:1502_4: tasmā yathā ajaṃ gāmaṃ netīti vuccati,
tika-vin01t1:1502_5: evaṃ “gotamaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmī”ti vattuṃ na sakkā,
tika-vin01t1:1502_11: Parāyaṇabhāvo ca anatthanisedhanena atthasampaṭipādanena ca hotīti āha “aghassa tātā hitassa ca vidhātā”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1502_15: Saraṇanti gamanañcettha tadadhippāyena bhajanaṃ tathā jānanaṃ vāti dassento “iti iminā adhippāyenā”tiādimāha.
tika-vin01t1:1502_16: Tattha gacchāmītiādīsu purimassa purimassa pacchimaṃ pacchimaṃ atthavacanaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1502_19: payirupāsanaṃ vattappaṭivattakaraṇena upaṭṭhānanti evaṃ sabbathāpi anaññasaraṇataṃyeva dīpeti.
tika-vin01t1:1502_20: Gacchāmīti padassa kathaṃ bujjhāmīti ayamattho labbhatīti āha “yesaṃ hī”tiādi.
tika-vin01t1:1503_0: Adhigatamagge sacchikatanirodheti padadvayenapi phalaṭṭhā eva dassitā,
tika-vin01t1:1503_1: na maggaṭṭhāti te dassento “yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjamāne cā”ti āha.
tika-vin01t1:1503_2: Nanu ca kalyāṇaputhujjanopi yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjatīti vuccatīti?
tika-vin01t1:1503_4: nippariyāyena pana maggaṭṭhā eva tathā vattabbā,
tika-vin01t1:1503_6: Tathā hi te eva “apāyesu apatamāne dhāretī”ti vuttā.
tika-vin01t1:1503_17: nibbānaṃ tassa tadatthasiddhihetutāyāti ubhayameva nippariyāyena dhammoti vutto.
tika-vin01t1:1503_19: tathāpi ariyaphalānaṃ “yasmā tāya saddhāya avūpasantāyā”tiādivacanato maggena samucchinnānaṃ kilesānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1503_21: Pariyattidhammassa pana niyyānadhammasamadhigamahetutāyāti iminā pariyāyena vuttanayena dhammabhāvo labbhati eva,
tika-vin01t1:1504_0: Rāgavirāgoti maggo kathitoti kāmarāgo bhavarāgoti evamādibhedo sabbopi rāgo virajjati pahīyati etenāti rāgavirāgoti maggo kathito.
tika-vin01t1:1504_1: Anejamasokanti phalanti ejāsaṅkhātāya taṇhāya antonijjhānalakkhaṇassa sokassa ca taduppattiyaṃ sabbaso parikkhīṇattā anejamasokanti phalaṃ kathitaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1504_9: Diṭṭhisīlasaṅghātenāti “yāyaṃ diṭṭhi ariyā niyyānikā niyyāti takkarassa sammā dukkhakkhayāya,
tika-vin01t1:1504_10: tathārūpāya diṭṭhiyā diṭṭhisāmaññagato viharatī”ti evaṃ vuttāya diṭṭhiyā “yāni tāni sīlāni akhaṇḍāni
tika-vin01t1:1504_11: acchiddāni asabalāni akammāsāni bhujissāni viññuppasatthāni aparāmaṭṭhāni samādhisaṃvattanikāni,
tika-vin01t1:1504_12: tathārūpehi sīlehi sīlasāmaññagato viharatī”ti evaṃ vuttānaṃ sīlānañca saṃhatabhāvena,
tika-vin01t1:1504_16: Ariyapuggalā hi yattha katthaci dūre ṭhitāpi attano guṇasāmaggiyā saṃhatā eva.
tika-vin01t1:1504_17: Aṭṭha ca puggalā dhammadasā teti purisayugaḷavasena cattāropi puggalavasena aṭṭheva ariyadhammassa paccakkhadassāvitāya dhammadasā.
tika-vin01t1:1504_18: Tīṇi vatthūni saraṇanti gamanena tikkhattuṃ gamanena ca tīṇi saraṇagamanāni.
tika-vin01t1:1507_0: Saraṇagamanassa visayappabhedaphalasaṃkilesabhedānaṃ viya kattu ca vibhāvanā tattha kosallāya hotīti “saraṇagamanesu kosallatthaṃ saraṇaṃ…pe…
tika-vin01t1:1507_1: veditabbo”ti vuttaṃ tena vinā saraṇagamanasseva asambhavato.
tika-vin01t1:1507_2: Tattha saraṇanti padatthato tāva hiṃsatīti saraṇaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1507_3: Hiṃsatthassa hi sarasaddassa vasenetaṃ padaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1507_4: tasmā saraṇagatānaṃ teneva saraṇagamanena vaṭṭabhayaṃ cittutrāsaṃ kāyikaṃ dukkhaṃ duggatipariyāpannaṃ sabbampi dukkhaṃ hanati,
tika-vin01t1:1507_9: viharathā”tiādinā atthe niyojanena ahitā ca nivattanena “pāṇātipātassa kho pana pāpako vipāko,
tika-vin01t1:1507_10: pāpakaṃ abhisamparāya”ntiādinā ādīnavadassanādimukhena anatthato nivattanena sattānaṃ bhayaṃ hiṃsati,
tika-vin01t1:1507_11: hitāhitesu appavattipavattihetukaṃ byasanaṃ apavattikaraṇena vināseti buddho.
tika-vin01t1:1507_12: Bhavakantārauttaraṇena maggasaṅkhāto dhammo sattānaṃ bhayaṃ hiṃsati,
tika-vin01t1:1507_14: Appakānampi dānavasena pūjāvasena ca upanītānaṃ sakkārānaṃ vipulaphalapaṭilābhakaraṇena sattānaṃ bhayaṃ hiṃsati saṅgho anuttaradakkhiṇeyyabhāvato,
tika-vin01t1:1507_15: tasmā imināpi vibhajitvā vuttapariyāyena ratanattayaṃ saraṇaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1507_19: vihatakileso tadeva ratanattayaṃ saraṇaṃ parāyaṇaṃ gati tāṇaṃ leṇanti evaṃ pavattiyā tapparāyaṇatākārappavatto
tika-vin01t1:1507_20: cittuppādo saraṇagamanaṃ saraṇanti gacchati etenāti katvā.
tika-vin01t1:1507_21: Tena yathāvuttacittuppādena samannāgato satto saraṇanti gacchati,
tika-vin01t1:1507_22: vuttappakārena cittuppādena “etāni me tīṇi ratanāni saraṇaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1507_23: etāni parāyaṇa”nti evaṃ upeti bhajati sevati payirupāsati,
tika-vin01t1:1508_0: Saraṇagamanappabhede pana duvidhaṃ saraṇagamanaṃ lokuttaraṃ lokiyañca.
tika-vin01t1:1508_1: Tattha lokuttaraṃ diṭṭhasaccānaṃ maggakkhaṇe saraṇagamanupakkilesasamucchedanena ārammaṇato nibbānārammaṇaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1508_10: na lokiyaṃ viya paṭipāṭiyā asammohapaṭivedhena paṭividdhattā.
tika-vin01t1:1508_11: Ye pana vadanti “na saraṇagamanaṃ nibbānārammaṇaṃ hutvā pavattati,
tika-vin01t1:1508_12: maggassa adhigatattā pana adhigatameva hoti ekaccānaṃ tevijjādīnaṃ lokiyavijjādayo viyā”ti,
tika-vin01t1:1508_16: Lokiyaṃ pana saraṇagamanaṃ puthujjanānaṃ saraṇagamanupakkilesavikkhambhanena ārammaṇato buddhādiguṇārammaṇaṃ hutvā ijjhati.
tika-vin01t1:1508_17: Taṃ atthato buddhādīsu vatthūsu “sammāsambuddho bhagavā”tiādinā saddhāpaṭilābho yathāvuttasaddhāpubbaṅgamā ca sammādiṭṭhi,
tika-vin01t1:1508_19: Ettha ca “saddhāpaṭilābho”ti iminā mātādīhi ussāhitadārakādīnaṃ viya ñāṇavippayuttasaraṇagamanaṃ dassitanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1508_20: “Sammādiṭṭhī”ti iminā pana ñāṇasampayuttaṃ saraṇagamanaṃ dassitaṃ buddhasubuddhataṃ dhammasudhammataṃ
tika-vin01t1:1509_0: Tayidaṃ lokiyasaraṇagamanaṃ catudhā pavattati attasanniyyātanena tapparāyaṇatāya sissabhāvūpagamanena paṇipātenāti.
tika-vin01t1:1509_1: Tattha attasanniyyātanaṃ nāma “ajja ādiṃ katvā ahaṃ attānaṃ buddhassa niyyātemi,
tika-vin01t1:1509_3: saṅghassā”ti evaṃ buddhādīnaṃyeva saṃsāradukkhanittharaṇatthaṃ attano attabhāvassa pariccajanaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1509_4: Tapparāyaṇatā nāma “ajja ādiṃ katvā ahaṃ buddhaparāyaṇo dhammaparāyaṇo saṅghaparāyaṇoti maṃ dhārethā”ti evaṃ tapparāyaṇabhāvo.
tika-vin01t1:1509_5: Sissabhāvūpagamanaṃ nāma “ajja ādiṃ katvā ‘ahaṃ buddhassa antevāsiko,
tika-vin01t1:1509_8: Paṇipāto nāma “ajja ādiṃ katvā ‘ahaṃ abhivādanaṃ paccuṭṭhānaṃ añjalikammaṃ sāmīcikammaṃ buddhādīnaṃyeva
tika-vin01t1:1509_9: tiṇṇaṃ vatthūnaṃ karomī’ti maṃ dhārethā”ti evaṃ buddhādīsu paramanipaccakāro.
tika-vin01t1:1509_10: Imesañhi catunnaṃ ākārānaṃ aññatarampi karontena gahitaṃyeva hoti saraṇagamanaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1510_6: buddho me saraṇaṃ leṇaṃ tāṇa”nti evampi attasanniyyātanaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1510_12: bhagavantameva passāmī”ti evaṃ mahākassapattherassa saraṇagamanaṃ viya sissabhāvūpagamanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1511_0: “So ahaṃ vicarissāmi, gāmā gāmaṃ purā puraṃ;
tika-vin01t1:1513_0: “Te mayaṃ vicarissāma, gāmā gāmaṃ nagā nagaṃ…pe… sudhammata”nti. –
tika-vin01t1:1514_0: Evampi āḷavakasātāgirahemavatādīnaṃ saraṇagamanaṃ viya tapparāyaṇatā veditabbā.
tika-vin01t1:1514_3: Maggenāgatasaraṇagamanehipi “sohaṃ vicarissāmi gāmā gāma”ntiādinā tehi tapparāyaṇatākārassa paveditattā tathā vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1514_4: Atha kho brahmāyu brāhmaṇo uṭṭhāyāsanā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā bhagavato pādesu sirasā nipatitvā bhagavato pādāni mukhena ca paricumbati,
tika-vin01t1:1515_5: tasmā yo sākiyo vā koliyo vā “buddho amhākaṃ ñātako”ti vandati,
tika-vin01t1:1515_7: Yo vā “samaṇo gotamo rājapūjito mahānubhāvo avandiyamāno anatthampi kareyyā”ti bhayena vandati,
tika-vin01t1:1515_9: Yopi bodhisattakāle bhagavato santike kiñci uggahitaṃ saramāno buddhakāle vā –
tika-vin01t1:1518_0: Evarūpiṃ diṭṭhadhammikaṃ anusāsaniṃ uggahetvā “ācariyo me”ti vandati,
tika-vin01t1:1518_2: samparāyikaṃ pana niyyānikaṃ vā anusāsaniṃ paccāsīsanto dakkhiṇeyyapaṇipātameva karoti.
tika-vin01t1:1519_0: Evaṃ gahitasaraṇassa ca upāsakassa vā upāsikāya vā aññatitthiyesu pabbajitampi ñātiṃ “ñātako me aya”nti vandatopi saraṇagamanaṃ na bhijjati,
tika-vin01t1:1519_3: So hi raṭṭhapūjitattā avandiyamāno anatthampi kareyyāti.
tika-vin01t1:1519_4: Tathā yaṃ kiñci sippasikkhāpakaṃ titthiyampi “ācariyo me aya”nti vandatopi na bhijjati.
tika-vin01t1:1522_0: Ettha ca lokuttarassa saraṇagamanassa cattāri sāmaññaphalāni vipākaphalaṃ ariyamaggasseva lokuttarasaraṇagamananti adhippetattā.
tika-vin01t1:1523_0: “Yo ca buddhañca dhammañca, saṅghañca saraṇaṃ gato;
tika-vin01t1:1529_0: Apica niccato anupagamanādivasena petassa ānisaṃsaphalaṃ veditabbaṃ. Vuttañhetaṃ –
tika-vin01t1:1530_3: yaṃ diṭṭhisampanno puggalo kañci saṅkhāraṃ niccato upagaccheyya,
tika-vin01t1:1531_0: Lokiyassa pana saraṇagamanassa bhavasampadāpi bhogasampadāpi phalameva. Vuttañhetaṃ –
tika-vin01t1:1537_0: “Atha kho sakko devānamindo asītiyā devatāsahassehi saddhiṃ yenāyasmā mahāmoggallāno tenupasaṅkami…pe…
tika-vin01t1:1537_1: ekamantaṃ ṭhitaṃ kho sakkaṃ devānamindaṃ āyasmā mahāmoggallāno etadavoca ‘sādhu kho,
tika-vin01t1:1537_6: evamidhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjanti.
tika-vin01t1:1537_7: Te aññe deve dasahi ṭhānehi adhigaṇhanti dibbena āyunā dibbena vaṇṇena sukhena yasena ādhipateyyena dibbehi
tika-vin01t1:1539_1: Tathā hi velāmasutte “karīsassa catutthabhāgappamāṇānaṃ caturāsītisahassasaṅkhyānaṃ suvaṇṇapātirūpiyapātikaṃsapātīnaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1539_2: yathākkamaṃ rūpiyasuvaṇṇahiraññapūrānaṃ sabbālaṅkārapaṭimaṇḍitānaṃ caturāsītiyā hatthisahassānaṃ caturāsītiyā
tika-vin01t1:1539_3: assasahassānaṃ caturāsītiyā rathasahassānaṃ caturāsītiyā dhenusahassānaṃ caturāsītiyā kaññāsahassānaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1539_4: caturāsītiyā pallaṅkasahassānaṃ caturāsītiyā vatthakoṭisahassānaṃ aparimāṇassa ca khajjabhojjādibhedassa
tika-vin01t1:1539_5: āhārassa pariccajanavasena sattamāsādhikāni satta saṃvaccharāni nirantaraṃ pavattavelāmamahādānato ekassa
tika-vin01t1:1539_7: tato sataṃ sotāpannānaṃ dinnadānato ekassa sakadāgāmino,
tika-vin01t1:1544_0: Tattha ca lokiyasaraṇagamanaṃ tīsu vatthūsu aññāṇasaṃsayamicchāñāṇādīhi saṃkilissati,
tika-vin01t1:1544_4: Ettha ca aññāṇaṃ nāma vatthuttayassa guṇānaṃ ajānanaṃ tattha sammoho.
tika-vin01t1:1544_7: Micchāñāṇaṃ nāma tassa guṇānaṃ aguṇabhāvaparikappanena viparītaggāhoti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1544_9: Lokiyassa ca saraṇagamanassa duvidho bhedo sāvajjo anavajjo ca.
tika-vin01t1:1544_13: Lokiyañhi saraṇagamanaṃ sikkhāpadasamādānaṃ viya aggahitakālaparicchedakaṃ jīvitapariyantameva hoti,
tika-vin01t1:1544_17: Bhavantarepi hi ariyasāvako aññaṃ satthāraṃ na uddisatīti.
tika-vin01t1:1544_18: Evaṃ saraṇagamanassa saṃkileso ca bhedo ca veditabbo.
tika-vin01t1:1545_3: taṃ pana saṃkilesaggahaṇena atthato dīpitaṃ hotīti na gahitaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1545_5: tesaṃ sabbena sabbaṃ anuppādanena uppannānañca pahānena vodānaṃ hotīti.
tika-vin01t1:1545_7: Imassa pana yathāvuttapapañcassa idha avacane kāraṇaṃ dassento āha “so pana idha vuccamāno”tiādi.
tika-vin01t1:1548_4: Tena kena pavattinimittena upāsakasaddo tasmiṃ puggale niruḷhoti dasseti.
tika-vin01t1:1548_7: Kimassa sīlanti kīdisaṃ assa upāsakassa sīlaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1548_8: kittakena sīlenāyaṃ sīlasampanno nāma hotīti attho.
tika-vin01t1:1548_10: So pana micchājīvassa parivajjanena hotīti sopi vibhajīyati.
tika-vin01t1:1548_11: Kā vipattīti kassa sīlassa ājīvassa vā vipatti.
tika-vin01t1:1548_12: Anantarassa hi vidhi vā paṭisedho vā.
tika-vin01t1:1549_0: Idaṃ pakiṇṇakaṃ veditabbanti kathaṃ veditabbaṃ? Vuccate –
tika-vin01t1:1549_1: ko upāsakoti khattiyādīsu yo koci tisaraṇaṃ gato gahaṭṭho.
tika-vin01t1:1550_1: Teneva saraṇagamanena tattha ca sakkaccakiriyāya ādaragāravabahumānādiyogena payirupāsanatoti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t1:1550_2: So hi buddhaṃ upāsatīti upāsako. Dhammaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1551_1: Veramaṇiyoti cettha veraṃ vuccati pāṇātipātādīsu dussīlyaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1551_2: tassa mananato hananato vināsanato veramaṇiyo pañca viratiyo viratippadhānattā tassa sīlassa.
tika-vin01t1:1552_0: Ko ājīvoti pañca micchāvaṇijjā pahāya dhammena samena jīvitakappanaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1552_5: Satthavaṇijjā sattavaṇijjā maṃsavaṇijjā majjavaṇijjā visavaṇijjā. Imā kho,
tika-vin01t1:1553_0: Ettha ca satthavaṇijjāti āvudhabhaṇḍaṃ katvā vā kāretvā vā yathākataṃ vā paṭilabhitvā tassa vikkayo.
tika-vin01t1:1553_2: Maṃsavaṇijjāti sūnakārādayo viya migasūkarādike posetvā maṃsaṃ sampādetvā vikkayo.
tika-vin01t1:1553_3: Majjavaṇijjāti yaṃ kiñci majjaṃ yojetvā tassa vikkayo.
tika-vin01t1:1553_4: Visavaṇijjāti visaṃ yojetvā saṅgahetvā vā tassa vikkayo.
tika-vin01t1:1554_0: Kā vipattīti yā tasseva sīlassa ca ājīvassa ca vipatti bhedo kopo pakopo ca,
tika-vin01t1:1554_2: Apica yāya esa caṇḍālo ceva hoti malañca paṭikuṭṭho ca,
tika-vin01t1:1554_4: Te ca atthato assaddhiyādayo pañca dhammā honti. Yathāha –
tika-vin01t1:1555_2: dhammehi samannāgato upāsako upāsakacaṇḍālo ca hoti upāsakamalañca upāsakapaṭikuṭṭho ca.
tika-vin01t1:1556_1: Buddhādīsu kammakammaphalesu ca saddhāvipariyāyo assaddhiyaṃ micchādhimokkho,
tika-vin01t1:1556_4: “Iminā diṭṭhādinā idaṃ nāma maṅgalaṃ hotī”ti evaṃ bālajanaparikappitakotūhalasaṅkhātena diṭṭhasutamutamaṅgalena samannāgato kotūhalamaṅgaliko.
tika-vin01t1:1556_9: Pubbakāraṃ karotīti dānamānanādikaṃ kusalakiriyaṃ paṭhamataraṃ karoti.
tika-vin01t1:1556_10: Ettha ca dakkhiṇeyyapaayesanapubbakāre ekaṃ katvā pañca dhammā veditabbā.
tika-vin01t1:1557_0: Kā sampattīti sāva tassa sīlasampadā ca ājīvasampadā ca sampatti,
tika-vin01t1:1557_1: ye cassa ratanabhāvādikarā saddhādayo pañca dhammā. Yathāha –
tika-vin01t1:1558_2: dhammehi samannāgato upāsako upāsakaratanañca hoti upāsakapadumañca upāsakapuṇḍarīko ca.
tika-vin01t1:1559_0: Ettha ca catunnampi parisānaṃ ratijananaṭṭhena upāsakova ratanaṃ upāsakaratanaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1559_5: Imassa pana pakiṇṇakassa idha vitthāretvā avacane kāraṇaṃ dassento āha “taṃ atibhāriyakaraṇato”tiādi.
tika-vin01t1:1560_3: “imasmiṃ gabbhe vasantānaṃ idaṃ panasaphalaṃ pāpuṇātī”tiādinā taṃtaṃvasanaṭṭhānakoṭṭhāsenāti attho.
tika-vin01t1:1560_5: Pāṇehi upetanti iminā tassa saraṇagamanassa āpāṇakoṭikataṃ dassento “yāva me jīvitaṃ pavattatī”tiādīni
tika-vin01t1:1560_6: vatvā puna jīvitenapahaṃ vatthuttayaṃ paṭipūjento saraṇagamanañca rakkhāmīti uppannaṃ tassa brāhmaṇassa
tika-vin01t1:1560_8: Pāṇehi upetanti hi yāva me pāṇā dharanti,
tika-vin01t1:1560_10: upento na vācāmattena na ekavāraṃ cittuppādanamattena,
tika-vin01t1:1560_11: atha kho pāṇānaṃ pariccajanavasena yāvajīvaṃ upetanti evamettha attho veditabbo.
tika-vin01t1:1561_1: taṃ pana sādiyanaṃ manasā sampaṭiggaho hotīti āha “sampaṭicchatū”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1561_11: uppannaṃ ruciṃ abbhantareyeva dhāretvā vacībhedena apakāsetvāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t1:1562_0: Kathaṃ pana verañjo brāhmaṇo bhagavato adhivāsanaṃ aññāsi.
tika-vin01t1:1562_1: Na hi tena sakkā bhagavato cittappavatti paccakkhato viññātuṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1562_2: tasmā “bhagavato adhivāsanaṃ viditvā”ti kasmā vuttanti ce?
tika-vin01t1:1562_3: Kiñcāpi tena na sakkā cittappavatti paccakkhato viññātuṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1562_4: tathāpi ākārasallakkhaṇakusalatāya anvayabyatirekavasena anumānato aññāsīti dassento āha “sace me samaṇo gotamo”tiādi.
tika-vin01t1:1562_7: Dasanakhasamodhānasamujjalanti dvīsu hatthesu dasannaṃ nakhānaṃ samodhānena ekībhāvena samujjalantaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1565_3: yadā kiñcideva datvā bahuṃ pubbaṇṇāparaṇṇaṃ gaṇhanti,
tika-vin01t1:1565_7: Dvidhā pavattaṃ īhitaṃ etthāti dvīhitikāti majjhapadalopībāhiratthasamāsoyamīti dassento āha “dvidhā pavattaīhitikā”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1565_8: Īhanaṃ īhitanti īhitasaddoyaṃ bhāvasādhanoti āha “īhitaṃ nāma iriyā”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1565_13: Kathaṃ panettha īhitassa dvidhā pavattīti āha “lacchāma nu kho”tiādi.
tika-vin01t1:1565_14: Tattha lacchāma nu khoti idaṃ duggatānaṃ vasena vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1565_16: noti idaṃ pana issarānaṃ vasena vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1565_22: Dukkhaṃ vā īhitaṃ ettha na sakkā koci payogo sukhena kātunti duhitikā,
tika-vin01t1:1566_1: sadde vā ukārassa vakāraṃ katvā dvīhitikāti ayaṃ niddesoti āha “atha vā”tiādi.
tika-vin01t1:1566_3: Tena setaṭṭikā nāma ekā rogajātīti dasseti.
tika-vin01t1:1566_5: Eko kira pāṇako nāḷamajjhagataṃ gaṇṭhiṃ vijjhati,
tika-vin01t1:1566_6: yena viddhattā nikkhantampi sālisīsaṃ khīraṃ gahetuṃ na sakkoti.
tika-vin01t1:1567_8: Sampajjatīti ca iminā “salākāvuttā”ti etthāyaṃ vuttasaddo nipphattiatthoti dasseti.
tika-vin01t1:1567_17: Nasukarā uñchena paggahena yāpetunti paggayhatīti paggaho, patto.
tika-vin01t1:1567_19: pattaṃ gahetvā bhikkhācariyāya yāpetuṃ na sakkāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t1:1568_1: uttarāpatho vā nivāso etesanti uttarāpathakāti vattabbe niruttinayena “uttarāhakā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1568_4: Keci pana “uttaraṃ visiṭṭhaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ āharantīti uttarāhakā,
tika-vin01t1:1568_5: uttaraṃ vā adhikaṃ agghaṃ nentīti uttarāhakā”tiādinā aññena pakārena atthaṃ vaṇṇayanti.
tika-vin01t1:1568_10: Assamaṇḍalikāyoti paññāyiṃsūti parimaṇḍalākārena katattā assamaṇḍalikāyoti pākaṭā ahesuṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1568_11: Evaṃ katānañca assasālānaṃ bahuttā bahuvacananiddeso kato.
tika-vin01t1:1568_12: Dasannaṃ dasannaṃ assānaṃ vasanokāso ekekā assamaṇḍalikātipi vadanti.
tika-vin01t1:1568_13: Addhānakkhamā na hontīti dīghakālaṃ pavattetuṃ khamā na honti,
tika-vin01t1:1569_1: uttarā disā patirūpadesoti adhippāyenāha “na hi te”tiādi.
tika-vin01t1:1569_7: Pubbaṇhasamayanti idaṃ bhummatthe upayogavacananti āha “pubbaṇhasamayeti attho”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1569_8: Accantasaṃyoge vā idaṃ upayogavacananti dassetuṃ yathā accantasaṃyogattho sambhavati,
tika-vin01t1:1569_9: tathā atthaṃ dassento āha “pubbaṇhe vā samaya”ntiādi.
tika-vin01t1:1569_10: Evanti evaṃ pacchā vuttanayena atthe vuccamāne.
tika-vin01t1:1569_11: Nanu ca vihāre nisīdantāpi antaravāsakaṃ nivāsetvāva nisīdanti,
tika-vin01t1:1569_13: Vihāranivāsanaparivattanañca vihāre nisinnakāle nivatthampi puna gāmappavesanasamaye cāletvā ito cito
tika-vin01t1:1569_15: Tenevāha “na hi te tato pubbe anivatthā ahesu”nti.
tika-vin01t1:1569_18: atha kho yena kenaci ākārena dhāraṇamevāti dassento yathāsambhavamatthayojanaṃ karoti “pattaṃ hatthehī”tiādinā.
tika-vin01t1:1570_1: Udukkhale koṭṭetvā koṭṭetvā paribhuñjantīti ettha kasmā pana te bhikkhū sayameva evaṃ katvā paribhuñjanti,
tika-vin01t1:1570_2: kimevaṃ laddhaṃ kappiyakārakehi yāguṃ vā bhattaṃ vā pacāpetvā sayaṃ vā pacitvā paribhuñjituṃ na vaṭṭatīti
tika-vin01t1:1570_4: Kappiyākappiyabhāvaṃ anapekkhitvā bhikkhūnaṃ evaṃ kātuṃ sāruppaṃ na hotīti vatvā puna akappiyabhāvampi dassento āha “na ca vaṭṭatī”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1570_6: Sakaṃ sakaṃ paṭivīsanti attano attano koṭṭhāsaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1570_12: “Na tato paṭṭhāyā”ti vacanato tato pubbe bhagavato piṇḍāya caraṇampi dassitanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1571_3: Kadā pana thero upaṭṭhākaṭṭhānaṃ laddhoti? Vuccate –
tika-vin01t1:1571_4: ekadā kira bhagavā nāgasamālattherena saddhiṃ addhānamaggappaṭipanno dvedhāpathaṃ patto.
tika-vin01t1:1571_5: Thero maggā ukkamma “bhagavā ahaṃ iminā maggena gacchāmī”ti āha.
tika-vin01t1:1571_9: ahaṃ iminā gacchāmī”ti vatvā pattacīvaraṃ chamāyaṃ ṭhapetuṃ āraddho.
tika-vin01t1:1571_10: Atha bhagavā “āhara bhikkhū”ti vatvā pattacīvaraṃ gahetvā gato.
tika-vin01t1:1571_11: Tassapi bhikkhuno itarena maggena gacchato corā pattacīvarañceva hariṃsu,
tika-vin01t1:1571_14: na añño”ti cintetvā lohitena gaḷantena bhagavato santikaṃ āgami.
tika-vin01t1:1571_15: “Kimidaṃ bhikkhū”ti ca vutte taṃ pavattiṃ ārocesi.
tika-vin01t1:1571_17: etaṃ kāraṇaṃyeva te nivārayimhā”ti vatvā samassāsesi.
tika-vin01t1:1572_0: Ekadā pana bhagavā meghiyattherena saddhiṃ pācīnavaṃsamigadāye jantugāmaṃ agamāsi.
tika-vin01t1:1572_1: Tatrāpi meghiyo jantugāme piṇḍāya caritvā nadītīre pāsādikaṃ ambavanaṃ disvā “bhagavā tumhākaṃ pattacīvaraṃ gaṇhatha,
tika-vin01t1:1572_2: ahaṃ etasmiṃ ambavane samaṇadhammaṃ karomī”ti vatvā bhagavatā tikkhattuṃ nivāriyamānopi gantvā akusalavitakkehi
tika-vin01t1:1572_4: Tampi bhagavā “idameva te kāraṇaṃ sallakkhayitvā nivārayimhā”ti vatvā anupubbena sāvatthiṃ agamāsi.
tika-vin01t1:1572_5: Tattha gandhakuṭipariveṇe paññattavarabuddhāsane nisinno bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto bhikkhū āmantesi –
tika-vin01t1:1572_8: ekacce bhikkhū ‘iminā maggena gacchāmā’ti vutte aññena gacchanti,
tika-vin01t1:1572_12: Athāyasmā sāriputto uṭṭhāya bhagavantaṃ vanditvā “ahaṃ, bhante,
tika-vin01t1:1572_13: tumheyeva patthayamāno satasahassakappādhikaṃ asaṅkhyeyyaṃ pāramiyo pūresiṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1572_14: nanu mādiso mahāpañño upaṭṭhāko nāma vaṭṭati,
tika-vin01t1:1572_21: na me tayā upaṭṭhākakiccaṃ atthī”ti paṭikkhipi.
tika-vin01t1:1572_22: Etenevupāyena mahāmoggallānaṃ ādiṃ katvā asītimahāsāvakā uṭṭhahiṃsu.
tika-vin01t1:1573_4: Yācitvā laddhaṭṭhānaṃ nāma āvuso kīdisaṃ hoti,
tika-vin01t1:1573_15: Thero uṭṭhahitvā cattāro paṭikkhepe ca catasso ca āyācanāti aṭṭha vare yāci.
tika-vin01t1:1574_2: attanā laddhaṃ paṇītaṃ cīvaraṃ na dassati,
tika-vin01t1:1574_6: evāhaṃ bhagavantaṃ upaṭṭhahissāmī”ti vatvā “kaṃ panettha, ānanda,
tika-vin01t1:1574_9: bhavissanti vattāro ‘ānando dasabalena laddhaṃ paṇītaṃ cīvaraṃ paribhuñjati,
tika-vin01t1:1575_3: sacāhaṃ tiroraṭṭhā tirojanapadā bhagavantaṃ daṭṭhuṃ āgataparisaṃ āgatakkhaṇe eva bhagavantaṃ dassetuṃ lacchāmi,
tika-vin01t1:1575_6: tathā yaṃ bhagavā mayhaṃ parammukhaṃ dhammaṃ deseti,
tika-vin01t1:1575_8: evāhaṃ bhagavantaṃ upaṭṭhahissāmī”ti vatvā “kaṃ panettha, ānanda,
tika-vin01t1:1575_10: saddhā kulaputtā bhagavato okāsaṃ alabhantā maṃ evaṃ vadanti ‘sveva,
tika-vin01t1:1575_12: bhagavatā saddhiṃ amhākaṃ ghare bhikkhaṃ gaṇheyyāthā’ti.
tika-vin01t1:1575_14: icchitakkhaṇeyeva parisaṃ dassetuṃ kaṅkhañca vinodetuṃ okāsaṃ na lacchāmi,
tika-vin01t1:1575_19: gāthā idaṃ suttaṃ idaṃ jātakaṃ kattha desita’nti.
tika-vin01t1:1575_23: kasmā tvaṃ chāyā viya bhagavantaṃ na vijahanto dīgharattaṃ ciraṃ vicarī’ti.
tika-vin01t1:1575_24: Tenāhaṃ parammukhā desitassapi dhammassa puna kathanaṃ icchāmī”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1575_27: Evaṃ ime aṭṭha vare gahetvā nibaddhupaṭṭhāko ahosi.
tika-vin01t1:1576_0: Tasseva ṭhānantarassa atthāya kappasatasahassaṃ pūritānaṃ pāramīnaṃ phalaṃ pāpuṇi,
tika-vin01t1:1576_1: pāpuṇitvā ca upaṭṭhākānaṃ aggo hutvā bhagavantaṃ upaṭṭhahi.
tika-vin01t1:1576_2: Thero hi upaṭṭhākaṭṭhānaṃ laddhakālato paṭṭhāya bhagavantaṃ duvidhena udakena tividhena dantakaṭṭhena
tika-vin01t1:1576_3: pādaparikammena piṭṭhiparikammena gandhakuṭipariveṇasammajjanenāti evamādīhi kiccehi upaṭṭhahanto “imāya
tika-vin01t1:1576_4: nāma velāya satthu idaṃ nāma laddhuṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-vin01t1:1576_5: idaṃ nāma kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti cintetvā taṃ taṃ nipphādento mahatiṃ daṇḍadīpikaṃ gahetvā ekarattiṃ gandhakuṭipariveṇaṃ nava vāre anupariyāyati.
tika-vin01t1:1576_7: bhagavati pakkosante paṭivacanaṃ dātuṃ nāhaṃ sakkuṇeyya”nti.
tika-vin01t1:1576_8: Tasmā sabbarattiṃ daṇḍadīpikaṃ hatthena na muñcati,
tika-vin01t1:1576_9: evametassa nibaddhupaṭṭhākaṭṭhānassa aladdhabhāvaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “no ca kho upaṭṭhākaṭṭhānaṃ laddhā”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1576_10: Nibaddhupaṭṭhāko nāma natthīti niyatupaṭṭhāko nāma natthi.
tika-vin01t1:1576_11: Aniyatupaṭṭhākā pana bhagavato paṭhamabodhiyaṃ bahū ahesuṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1576_13: Ñāti ca so pasatthatamaguṇayogato seṭṭho cāti ñātiseṭṭho.
tika-vin01t1:1576_14: Evarūpesu ṭhānesu ayameva patirūpoti āpadāsu āmisassa abhisaṅkharitvā dānaṃ nāma ñātakeneva kātuṃ yuttataranti adhippāyo.
tika-vin01t1:1577_4: tampi māro āvaṭṭeyyāti phussassa bhagavato kāle katupacitassa akusalakammassa tadā laddhokāsavasena upaṭṭhitattā.
tika-vin01t1:1579_0: Yavaṃ khādatha bhuñjatha, mā ca bhuñjatha sālayo.
tika-vin01t1:1582_2: Āvaṭṭitapariyosāne āgamiṃsūti mārena āvaṭṭetvā gate pacchā āgamiṃsu.
tika-vin01t1:1582_5: Nibaddhadānassāti “ettakaṃ kālaṃ bhagavato dassāmā”ti niccabhattavasena paricchinditvā ṭhapitadānassa.
tika-vin01t1:1582_6: Appitavatthassāti “idaṃ buddhassa catupaccayaparibhogattha”nti vihāraṃ netvā dinnavatthuno.
tika-vin01t1:1582_10: Ettha ca anubyañjanānaṃ byāmappabhāya ca nippabhākaraṇaṃ antarāyoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1583_0: Assosi kho bhagavā udukkhalasaddanti kiṃ sayameva uppannaṃ udukkhalasaddaṃ assosīti ceti āha “patthapatthapulakaṃ koṭṭentāna”ntiādi.
tika-vin01t1:1583_5: tasseva tena ghāto kato nāma hotīti āha “maggeneva tādisassa vacanassa ghāto samucchedoti vuttaṃ hotī”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1583_6: Sāmiatthe vā bhummavacananti maññamāno evamāhāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1583_7: Vacanassa ca samugghāto tammūlakilesānaṃ samugghātenāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1584_0: Ākaroti attano anurūpatāya samariyādaṃ saparicchedaṃ phalaṃ nipphattetīti ākāro kāraṇanti āha “ākārehīti kāraṇehī”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1584_2: Tāya pucchāya vītikkamaṃ pākaṭaṃ katvāti “saccaṃ kira tvaṃ bhikkhū”tiādipucchāya tena bhikkhunā katavītikkamaṃ pakāsetvā,
tika-vin01t1:1585_0: Natthi kiñci vattabbanti pubbe vuttanayattā na kiñci ettha apubbaṃ vattabbamatthīti dasseti.
tika-vin01t1:1585_2: Sādhu sādhūti idaṃ pasaṃsāyaṃ āmeḍitavacananti āha “āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ sampahaṃsento”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1585_4: Ekaṃ gahetvāti dhammaṃ vā desessāmāti evaṃ vuttakāraṇaṃ gahetvā.
tika-vin01t1:1585_5: Evaṃdubbhikkheti evaṃ dukkhena labhitabbā bhikkhā etthāti evaṃdubbhikkhe kāle, dese vā.
tika-vin01t1:1585_8: Ettakameva alaṃ yāpetunti uttari patthanābhāvato pana “iminā ca sallekhenā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1585_9: Dubbhikkhaṃ vijitanti ettha hi bhikkhānaṃ abhāvo dubbhikkhaṃ “nimmakkhika”ntiādīsu viya.
tika-vin01t1:1585_10: Bhikkhābhāvoyeva hi taṃnimittacittavighātānaṃ abhāvato bhikkhūhi vijito vase vattito.
tika-vin01t1:1585_11: Lobho vijitoti āmisahetu ratticchedavassacchedasamuṭṭhāpako loluppādopi tesaṃ nāhosīti āmisalolatāsaṅkhāto lobho vijito.
tika-vin01t1:1585_12: Icchācāro vijitoti “āmisahetu aññamaññassa uttarimanussadhammappakāsanavasena guṇavaṇijjaṃ katvā jīvikaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1585_13: kappessāmā”ti evaṃ pavattaicchācārassa abhāvato yathāvutto icchācāro vijito.
tika-vin01t1:1585_15: Punappunānusocanavasena pana cittapīḷāpi nāhosīti dassanatthaṃ “vighāto vā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1586_0: Ratticchedo vāti sattāhakaraṇīyavasena gantvā bahi aruṇuṭṭhāpanavasena ratticchedo vā na kato sattāhakiccavasenapi katthaci agatattā.
tika-vin01t1:1586_2: tatoyeva ca vassūpanāyikakkhandhakavaṇṇanāyaṃ “ayaṃ panettha pāḷimuttakaratticchedavinicchayo”ti vatvā
tika-vin01t1:1586_3: “dhammassavanatthāya animantitena gantuṃ na vaṭṭatī”tiādinā sattāhakaraṇīyameva vibhattaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1586_4: Mahāaṭṭhakathāyampi vuttaṃ “sattāhakiccena gantvā ekabhikkhunāpi ratticchedo vā na kato”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1586_5: Evañca katvā ratticchedo nāma sattāhakaraṇīyavasena hoti,
tika-vin01t1:1586_7: Ettha ca paccayavekallasaṅkhāte vassacchedakāraṇe sati ratticchedassapi vuttattā yattha vassacchedakāraṇaṃ labbhati,
tika-vin01t1:1586_8: tattha sattāhakiccena gantumpi vaṭṭatīti siddhanti cūḷagaṇṭhipade majjhimagaṇṭhipade ca vuttaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1587_0: “Tena kho pana samayena aññatarasmiṃ āvāse vassūpagatānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ gāmo corehi vuṭṭhāsi.
tika-vin01t1:1588_1: tattha piṇḍāya caritvā vihārameva āgantvā vasitabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1588_5: tattheva sabhāgaṭṭhāne vasitabba”nti iminā aṭṭhakathāvacanenapi saṃsandanato.
tika-vin01t1:1588_6: Tathā hi gāme vuṭṭhite bhikkhāya abhāvato vassacchedepi anāpattiṃ vadantena bhagavatā “anujānāmi,
tika-vin01t1:1588_8: yena gāmo tena gantu”nti vuttattā bhikkhāya abhāvo vassacchedakāraṇaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1588_10: sattāhavārena aruṇo uṭṭhāpetabbo”ti idaṃ aṭṭhakathāvacanaṃ vassacchedakāraṇe sati sattāhakiccena gantumpi vaṭṭatīti imamatthaṃ sādheti.
tika-vin01t1:1590_1: sattāhakaraṇīyena gantvā ratticchedo vā vassacchedo vā ekabhikkhunāpi na katoti vuttaṃ kira mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1590_2: tasmā vassacchedassa kāraṇe sati sattāhakiccaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti eke.
tika-vin01t1:1591_0: Taṃ pana sayaṃ sammūḷhassa paresaṃ mohuppādanamattaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1591_1: Na hi vinayadharānaṃ anicchāya kāraṇaṃ dissati aṭṭhakathāya virujjhanato yuttiabhāvato ca.
tika-vin01t1:1591_3: tasmiṃ sati vinā vassacchedaṃ sattāhakiccena gantuṃ na vaṭṭatīti kā nāma yutti.
tika-vin01t1:1591_4: “Pacchimikāya tattha vassaṃ upagacchāmā”ti idaṃ tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ anurūpaparivitakkanapaadīpanaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1591_6: Tathā hi dubbhikkhatāya vassacchedakaraṇasabbhāvato purimikāya tāva vassacchedepi anāpatti.
tika-vin01t1:1591_7: Pacchimikāyaṃ anupagantukāmatāya gamanepi natthi doso pacchimikāya vassūpanāyikadivasassa asampattabhāvato.
tika-vin01t1:1592_0: Na kismiñci maññantīti kismiñci guṇe sambhāvanavasena na maññanti.
tika-vin01t1:1592_2: “Pacchā sīlaṃ adhiṭṭhaheyyāmā”ti vuttanayena kucchipaṭijaggane sati tathāpavattaicchācārassa aparisuddhabhāvato
tika-vin01t1:1592_3: ājīvasuddhiyā ca abhāvato puna vāyamitvā saṃvare patiṭṭhātabbanti āha “pacchā sīlaṃ adhiṭṭhaheyyāmā”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1593_1: Sālitaṇḍulehi sampāditaṃ maṃsena upasittaṃ odanaṃ sālimaṃsodanaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1593_3: lāmakaṃ nihīnaṃ katvā maññissatīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t1:1593_5: Heṭṭhā katvā nihīnaṃ katvā ñātaṃ oññātaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1593_8: Imāya paṭipattiyāti verañjāyaṃ pūritāya sudukkarāya paṭipattiyā.
tika-vin01t1:1593_9: Tumhe nissāyāti tumhākaṃ imaṃ appicchapaṭipadaṃ nissāya.
tika-vin01t1:1593_11: Tumhākaṃ antare nisīditvāti tumhākaṃ majjhe nisīditvā,
tika-vin01t1:1593_15: na pana hīḷetvā maññanaṃ. Tumhehi, ānanda,
tika-vin01t1:1593_16: sappurisehi vijitaṃ sālimaṃsodanaṃ pacchimā janatā atimaññissatīti evamettha pāḷiṃ yojetvā atthaṃ vaṇṇayanti.
tika-vin01t1:1593_19: teneva tussitvā sālimaṃsodanapatthanāya chinnattā ca tumhehi vijitaṃ abhibhūtaṃ sālimaṃsodanaṃ pacchimā
tika-vin01t1:1593_20: janatā tattha patthanaṃ chindituṃ asamatthatāya atimaññissatīti.
tika-vin01t1:1596_1: Āyasmāti vā devānaṃpiyāti vā bhadrabhavanti vā piyasamudācāro esoti āha “āyasmāti piyavacanameta”nti.
tika-vin01t1:1596_2: Viññujātikā hi paraṃ piyena samudācarantā “bhava”nti vā “devānaṃpiyā”ti vā “āyasmā”ti vā samudācaranti,
tika-vin01t1:1596_7: na cūḷamoggallānassa atthitāyāti āha “mahā ca so guṇamahantatāyā”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1596_8: Pappaṭakojanti pathavīsandhārakaṃ udakaṃ āhacca ṭhite mahāpathaviyā heṭṭhimatale samuṭṭhitaṃ udakoghena
tika-vin01t1:1596_10: Na me taṃ assa patirūpanti taṃ anāpucchā karaṇaṃ na me anucchavikaṃ bhaveyyāti attho.
tika-vin01t1:1596_11: Anāpucchā karontena ca yathā bhagavā icchiticchitaṃ kiñci anāpucchā karoti,
tika-vin01t1:1596_12: evamahampīti bhagavatā samānaṃ katvā attānaṃ mānena kataṃ viya bhavissatīti āha “yugaggāho viya bhagavatā saddhiṃ kato bhaveyyā”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1596_13: Parena hi saddhiṃ attānaṃ yugaṃ yugaḷaṃ samānaṃ katvā gāho,
tika-vin01t1:1596_14: tassa mama vā ko visesoti gahaṇaṃ yugaggāho.
tika-vin01t1:1597_1: Sā panettha rasasampatti adhippetā sāmaññajotanāya visese avaṭṭhānato.
tika-vin01t1:1599_0: Paṭivedemi te brahme, na ne vāretumussahe”ti. –
tika-vin01t1:1600_1: Paripuṇṇampi hi samantato pannaṃ pattanti sampannanti vuccati.
tika-vin01t1:1600_2: “Iminā pātimokkhasaṃvarena upeto hoti samupeto upagato samupagato sampanno samannāgato”ti idaṃ samaṅgīsampannaṃ nāma.
tika-vin01t1:1600_3: Samaṅgīpi hi sammadeva panno gato upagatoti sampannoti vuccati.
tika-vin01t1:1600_4: “Tatrassa rukkho sampannaphalo ca upapannaphalo cā”ti idaṃ madhurasampannaṃ nāma.
tika-vin01t1:1600_12: Makkhikāsaddena cettha makkhikaṇḍakampi sāmaññato gahitanti vadanti.
tika-vin01t1:1600_13: Teneva tīsupi gaṇṭhipadesu vuttaṃ “nimmakkhikanti imassevatthaṃ pakāsetuṃ nimmakkhikaṇḍakanti vuttaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1600_14: makkhikāhi tāsaṃ aṇḍakehi ca virahitanti attho”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1600_15: Ayaṃ panettha amhākaṃ khanti “makkhikānaṃ aṇḍāni makkhikaṇḍāni,
tika-vin01t1:1601_4: udāhu na ayanti iminā nimmitapathaviyā pakatipathaviyā ca sandissamānattā “esā nu kho amhākaṃ pathavī,
tika-vin01t1:1601_8: Na vā esa vipallāsoti pubbapakkhaṃ nidasseti.
tika-vin01t1:1601_9: Kasmā panesa vipallāso na hotīti āha “acinteyyo hi iddhimato iddhivisayo”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1601_10: Iddhibaleneva tesaṃ sattānaṃ tādiso vipallāso na bhavissatīti adhippāyo.
tika-vin01t1:1601_11: Idāni aññathā vipallāsappaṭilābhaṃ dassento āha “evaṃ panā”tiādi.
tika-vin01t1:1602_0: Nanu ca uttarakuruṃ piṇḍāya gamanaṃ paṭisedhetvā vipallāsampi sattā paṭilabheyyunti kāraṇaṃ na vuttaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1602_3: tathāpi “vipallāsampi sattā paṭilabheyyu”nti pubbe adhikatattā teneva kāraṇena piṇḍāya uttarakurugamanampi bhagavatā paṭisiddhanti viññāyati,
tika-vin01t1:1602_4: tasmā tadeva kāraṇaṃ idhāpi gahetabbanti dassento āha “pubbe vuttanayeneva gahetabba”nti.
tika-vin01t1:1602_5: Vipallāsampi sattā paṭilabheyyunti idaṃ idha avuttampi ānetvā sambandhitabbanti adhippāyo.
tika-vin01t1:1602_7: “Evaṃ pana vipallāsaṃ paṭilabheyyu”ntiādinā pacchā vuttameva atthavikappaṃ sandhāya vadati.
tika-vin01t1:1602_8: Yaṃ pana tattha vuttaṃ “te guṇe nibbattetvā dubbhikkhakāle pathaviṃ parivattetvā pappaṭakojaṃ paribhuñjiṃsū”ti,
tika-vin01t1:1602_9: taṃ apanetvā te guṇe nibbattetvā dubbhikkhakāle uttarakuruṃ gantvā piṇḍāya caritvā paribhuñjiṃsūti evamettha yojanā kātabbā.
tika-vin01t1:1602_10: Ekena padavītihārenāti ettha padassa vītiharaṇaṃ nikkhipanaṃ padavītihāro,
tika-vin01t1:1602_13: Ekena padavītihārena atikkamitabbaṭṭhānañca samagamanena dvinnaṃ padānaṃ antare muṭṭhiratanamattaṃ, tasmā.
tika-vin01t1:1602_14: Mātikāmattaṃ adhiṭṭhahitvāti muṭṭhiratanappamāṇaṃ mātikāmattaṃ adhiṭṭhāyāti attho.
tika-vin01t1:1605_2: Thero hi paññattasikkhāpadāni ṭhapetvā idāni paññapetabbasikkhāpadāni pātimokkhuddesañca sandhāya “etassa bhagavā kālo,
tika-vin01t1:1606_2: yena pubbe appatarāni ceva sikkhāpadāni ahesuṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1606_3: bahutarā ca bhikkhū aññāya saṇṭhahiṃsu. Ko pana, bhante, hetu,
tika-vin01t1:1606_5: yena etarahi bahutarāni ceva sikkhāpadāni honti,
tika-vin01t1:1606_6: appatarā ca bhikkhū aññāya saṇṭhahantīti. Evametaṃ, bhaddāli, hoti,
tika-vin01t1:1606_7: sattesu hāyamānesu saddhamme antaradhāyamāne bahutarāni ceva sikkhāpadāni honti,
tika-vin01t1:1606_8: appatarā ca bhikkhū aññāya saṇṭhahantīti. Na tāva, bhaddāli,
tika-vin01t1:1606_10: yāva na idhekacce āsavaṭṭhānīyā dhammā saṅghe pātubhavantī”ti –
tika-vin01t1:1607_0: Imasmiṃ bhaddālisutte viya ekaccesu paññattesupi tato paraṃ paññapetabbāni sandhāya “na tāva,
tika-vin01t1:1607_3: Idheva ca aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “sāmampi pacanaṃ samaṇasāruppaṃ na hoti,
tika-vin01t1:1607_4: na ca vaṭṭatī”ti vacanaṃ “ratticchedo vā vassacchedo vā na kato”ti vacanañca pubbe paññattasikkhāpadānaṃ sabbhāve pamāṇanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1607_5: Sesasikkhāpadānañceva pātimokkhuddesassa ca therassa āyācanena paññattattā “mūlato pabhuti nidānaṃ dassetu”nti āha.
tika-vin01t1:1607_8: Paṭisallīnassāti nānārammaṇacārato cittassa nivattiyā paṭi sammadeva nilīnassa tattha avisaṭacittassa.
tika-vin01t1:1608_0: Etaṃ na sakkotīti etaṃ vinicchinituṃ na sakkoti.
tika-vin01t1:1608_1: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttanayaṃ dassetvā idāni theravādaṃ dassento āha “mahāpadumatthero panā”tiādi.
tika-vin01t1:1608_2: Aṭṭhakathāyampi “na sakkotī”ti idaṃ yasmā jānamānopi sammadeva paricchindituṃ na sakkoti,
tika-vin01t1:1608_4: Soḷasavidhāya paññāya matthakaṃ pattassāti majjhimanikāye anupadasuttantadesanāya –
tika-vin01t1:1610_2: arahattamaggapaññāti imāsaṃ soḷasappabhedānaṃ paññānaṃ sāvakavisaye ukkaṭṭhakoṭippattassa.
tika-vin01t1:1611_0: Kasmā panettha bhagavā vipassīādīnaṃ sattannaṃyeva buddhānaṃ brahmacariyassa ciraṭṭhitikāciraṭṭhitikabhāvaṃ kathesi,
tika-vin01t1:1611_3: Yesaṃ sammāsambuddhānaṃ paṭivedhasāsanaṃ ekaṃsato nicchayena ajjāpi dharati,
tika-vin01t1:1611_5: te eva kittento vipassīādīnaṃyeva bhagavantānaṃ brahmacariyassa ciraṭṭhitikāciraṭṭhitikabhāvaṃ idha kathesi.
tika-vin01t1:1611_6: Tesaṃyeva hi sāvakā tadā ceva etarahi ca suddhāvāsabhūmiyaṃ ṭhitā,
tika-vin01t1:1611_8: Siddhatthatissaphussānaṃ kira buddhānaṃ sāvakā suddhāvāsesu uppannā uppattisamanantarameva imasmiṃ sāsane
tika-vin01t1:1611_9: upakādayo viya arahattaṃ adhigantvā na cirasseva parinibbāyiṃsu,
tika-vin01t1:1611_10: na tattha tattha sāvakā yāvatāyukaṃ aṭṭhaṃsūti vadanti.
tika-vin01t1:1611_11: Apubbācarimaniyamo pana aparāparaṃ saṃsaraṇakasattāvāsavasena ekissā lokadhātuyā icchitoti na tenetaṃ virujjhatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1612_2: sādhāraṇo paccayoti evamādivibhāgena idha payojanaṃ natthi,
tika-vin01t1:1612_3: vipassīādīnaṃ pana brahmacariyassa aciraṭṭhitikatāya ciraṭṭhitikatāya ca kāraṇapucchāparattā codanāyāti
tika-vin01t1:1612_5: Hinoti tena phalanti hetūti karaṇasādhanoyaṃ hetusaddoti āha “tena tassa phala”ntiādi.
tika-vin01t1:1612_6: Kattusādhanopi hetusaddo no na yujjati hinoti phalassa hetubhāvaṃ upagacchatīti hetūti.
tika-vin01t1:1612_7: Taṃ paṭicca eti pavattatīti taṃ kāraṇaṃ paṭicca tassa phalaṃ eti pavattati nibbattatīti attho.
tika-vin01t1:1613_2: Sā pana nirussāhatā na ālasiyavasenāti āha “na ālasiyakilāsuno”ti,
tika-vin01t1:1613_5: Ālasiyaṃ vāti iminā thinamiddhavasappavattānaṃ akusalānaṃ abhāvamāha.
tika-vin01t1:1613_6: Osannavīriyatā vāti iminā pana “ālasiyābhāvepi antamaso annabhāranesādānampi sakkaccaṃyeva dhammaṃ desetī”ti
tika-vin01t1:1613_7: vacanato yassa kassacipi dhammadesanāya nirussāhatā natthīti dīpeti sabbesaṃ samakeneva ussāhena dhammadesanāya
tika-vin01t1:1613_17: Vipassissa bhagavato kāle asīti vassasahassāni āyuppamāṇaṃ sikhissa sattati vassasahassāni,
tika-vin01t1:1613_18: vessabhussa saṭṭhivassasahassāni āyuppamāṇanti āha “tesaṃ kira kāle dīghāyukā sattā”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1614_1: “Imasmiṃ vītikkame ayaṃ nāma āpattī”ti evaṃ āpattivasena apaññapetvā “pāṇātipātaṃ pahāya pāṇātipātā paṭivirato
tika-vin01t1:1614_2: hotī”tiādinā dhammadesanāvasena ovādasikkhāpadānaṃyeva paññattattā vuttaṃ “sattāpattikkhandhavasena āṇāsikkhāpadaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1614_4: Channaṃ channaṃ vassānaṃ accayenāti pāṭhaseso daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin01t1:1614_5: Atha vā channaṃ channaṃ vassānaṃ osānadivasaṃ apekkhitvā “sakiṃ saki”nti vuttattā tadapekkhamidaṃ sāmivacanaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1614_6: Sakalajambudīpe sabbopi bhikkhusaṅgho ekasmiṃyeva ṭhāne uposathaṃ akāsīti sambandho.
tika-vin01t1:1614_8: Isipatanaṃ tena samayena khemaṃ nāma uyyānaṃ hoti,
tika-vin01t1:1614_9: migānaṃ pana abhayavāsatthāya dinnattā migadāyoti vuccati.
tika-vin01t1:1615_0: Abbokiṇṇāni dasapi vīsatipi bhikkhusahassāni vasantīti visabhāgapuggalehi asaṃsaṭṭhāni dasapi vīsatipi bhikkhūnaṃ sahassāni vasanti.
tika-vin01t1:1615_4: Tā kira devatā ekamhi vasse nikkhante tattha tattha gantvā ārocenti “nikkhantaṃ kho, mārisā,
tika-vin01t1:1615_7: pañcannaṃ vassānaṃ accayena bandhumatī rājadhānī upasaṅkamitabbā pātimokkhuddesāyā”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1615_8: Tathā dvīsu vassesu nikkhantesu “nikkhantāni kho, mārisā,
tika-vin01t1:1615_11: catunnaṃ vassānaṃ accayena bandhumatī rājadhānī upasaṅkamitabbā pātimokkhuddesāyā”ti ārocenti.
tika-vin01t1:1615_12: Imināva nayena tīsu catūsu pañcasu vassesu atikkantesu ārocenti.
tika-vin01t1:1615_15: Te kira bhikkhūti ye devatānubhāvena gacchanti,
tika-vin01t1:1615_20: Gatāva hontīti devatānubhāvena gatā eva honti.
tika-vin01t1:1615_21: Teti attano attano ānubhāvena devatānubhāvena ca gatā sabbepi.
tika-vin01t1:1616_0: Khantī paramantiādīsu parūpavādaṃ parāpakāraṃ sītuṇhādibhedañca guṇoparodhaṃ khamati sahati adhivāsetīti khanti.
tika-vin01t1:1616_1: Sā pana sīlādīnaṃ paṭipakkhadhamme savisesaṃ tapati santapati vidhamatīti paramaṃ uttamaṃ tapo.
tika-vin01t1:1616_5: tasmā evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo “titikkhāsaṅkhātā adhivāsanakhanti nāma uttamaṃ tapo”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1616_6: Nibbānaṃ paramaṃ vadanti buddhāti bhavena bhavantaraṃ vināti bhavanikantibhāvena saṃsibbati,
tika-vin01t1:1616_7: sataṇhasseva vā āyatiṃ punabbhavabhāvato phalena saddhiṃ kammaṃ vināti saṃsibbatīti vānanti saṅkhyaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1616_8: gatāya taṇhāya nikkhantaṃ nibbānaṃ tattha tassā sabbaso abhāvato.
tika-vin01t1:1616_9: Taṃ nibbānaṃ pana santapaṇītanipuṇasivakhemādinā sabbākārena paramanti vadanti buddhā.
tika-vin01t1:1617_0: Na hi pabbajito parūpaghātīti yo adhivāsanakhantirahitattā paraṃ upaghāteti bādhati vihiṃsati,
tika-vin01t1:1617_1: so pabbajito nāma na hoti pabbājetabbadhammassa apabbājanato.
tika-vin01t1:1617_3: “Na hi pabbajito”ti etassa hi “na samaṇo hotī”ti vevacanaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1617_6: Sīlañhi uttamaṭṭhena “para”nti vuccati parasaddassa seṭṭhavācakattā “puggalaparoparaññū”tiādīsu viya.
tika-vin01t1:1617_7: Yo ca samaṇo paraṃ yaṃ kañci sattaṃ viheṭhayanto parūpaghātī hoti attano sīlavināsako,
tika-vin01t1:1617_8: so pabbajito nāma na hotīti attho.
tika-vin01t1:1617_9: Atha vā yo adhivāsanakhantiyā abhāvā parūpaghātī hoti,
tika-vin01t1:1617_16: Yopi naheva kho upaghāteti na māreti,
tika-vin01t1:1617_18: sopi paraṃ viheṭhayanto samaṇo na hoti.
tika-vin01t1:1618_0: Apica bhagavā bhikkhūnaṃ pātimokkhaṃ uddisanto pātimokkhakathāya ca sīlappadhānattā sīlassa ca visesato
tika-vin01t1:1618_1: doso paṭipakkhoti tassa niggaṇhanavidhiṃ dassetuṃ ādito “khantī paramaṃ tapo”ti āha.
tika-vin01t1:1618_4: tadubhayenapi uppannaṃ aratiṃ uppannaṃ ratiṃ abhibhuyya viharatīti ayamattho dassito.
tika-vin01t1:1618_5: Taṇhāvānassa vūpasamanato nibbānaṃ paramaṃ vadanti buddhā.
tika-vin01t1:1618_10: Evaṃ kāraṇamukhena anvayato pātimokkhaṃ dassetvā idāni byatirekato taṃ dassetuṃ “na hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1618_11: Tena yathā sattānaṃ jīvitā voropanaṃ paraṃ pāṇileḍḍudaṇḍādīhi viheṭhanañca “parūpaghāto paraṃ viheṭhana”nti vuccati,
tika-vin01t1:1618_12: evaṃ tesaṃ sāpateyyāvaharaṇaṃ parāmasanaṃ visaṃvādanaṃ aññamaññabhedanaṃ pharusavacanena mammaghaṭṭanaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1618_13: niratthakavippalāpo parasantakābhijjhānaṃ ucchedacintanaṃ micchābhinivesanañca upaghāto paraviheṭhanañca
tika-vin01t1:1618_14: hotīti yassa kassaci akusalassa kammapathassa kammassa ca karaṇena pabbajito samaṇo ca na hotīti dasseti.
tika-vin01t1:1619_0: Dutiyagāthāya sabbapāpassāti sabbākusalassa sabbassapi dvādasākusalassa sabbacittuppādasaṅgahitassa sāvajjadhammassa.
tika-vin01t1:1619_2: Karaṇañhi nāma tassa attano santāne uppādananti tappaṭikkhepato akaraṇaṃ anuppādanaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1619_4: “Kusalassā”ti hi idaṃ “etaṃ buddhāna sāsana”nti vakkhamānattā ariyamaggadhamme tesañca sambhārabhūte tebhūmikakusale dhamme bodheti.
tika-vin01t1:1619_6: Taṃ pana atthato tassa kusalassa samadhigamo paṭilābho.
tika-vin01t1:1619_7: Sacittapariyodapananti attano cittassa jotanaṃ cittassa pabhassarabhāvakaraṇaṃ sabbaso parisodhanaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1619_9: Ettha ca yasmā aggamaggasamaṅgino cittaṃ sabbaso pariyodapīyati nāma,
tika-vin01t1:1619_10: aggaphalakkhaṇe pana pariyodapitaṃ hoti puna pariyodapetabbatāya abhāvato,
tika-vin01t1:1619_11: tasmā pariniṭṭhitapariyodapanataṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “taṃ pana arahattena hotī”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1619_12: Iti sīlasaṃvarena sabbapāpaṃ pahāya lokiyalokuttarāhi samathavipassanāhi kusalaṃ sampādetvā arahattaphalena
tika-vin01t1:1619_13: cittaṃ pariyodapetabbanti etaṃ buddhānaṃ sāsanaṃ ovādo anusiṭṭhi.
tika-vin01t1:1620_1: Anupaghātoti kāyena manasā ca kassaci upaghātākaraṇaṃ manasāpi paresaṃ anatthacintanādivasena upaghātakaraṇassa vajjetabbattā.
tika-vin01t1:1620_2: Pātimokkheti yaṃ taṃ paatimokkhaṃ atipamokkhaṃ uttamaṃ sīlaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1620_9: Pantañca sayanāsananti janasaṅghaṭṭavirahitaṃ nijjanasambādhaṃ vivittaṃ senāsanañca.
tika-vin01t1:1620_10: Ettha dvīhiyeva paccayehi catupaccayasantoso dīpitoti veditabbo paccayasantosasāmaññena itaradvayassapi lakkhaṇahāranayena jotitabhāvato.
tika-vin01t1:1620_11: Adhicitte ca āyogoti vipassanāpādakaṃ aṭṭhasamāpatticittaṃ adhicittaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1620_15: Etaṃ buddhāna sāsananti etaṃ parassa anupavadanaṃ anupaghātanaṃ pātimokkhe saṃvaro paṭiggahaṇaparibhogesu
tika-vin01t1:1620_16: mattaññutā vivittasenāsanasevanaṃ adhicittānuyogo ca buddhānaṃ sāsanaṃ ovādo anusiṭṭhi.
tika-vin01t1:1621_0: Imā pana sabbabuddhānaṃ pātimokkhuddesagāthā hontīti veditabbā.
tika-vin01t1:1621_2: Yāva sāsanapariyantāti dharamānakabuddhānaṃ anusāsanapariyantaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1621_9: Tañca heṭṭhā aṭṭhakathāyameva “bhagavato hi paṭhamabodhiyaṃ vīsativassantare nibaddhupaṭṭhāko nāma natthī”ti
tika-vin01t1:1621_11: Ācariyadhammapālattherena pana “pañcacattālīsāya vassesu ādito pannarasa vassāni paṭhamabodhī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1621_12: Evañca sati majjhe pannarasa vassāni majjhimabodhi,
tika-vin01t1:1621_13: ante pannarasa vassāni pacchimabodhīti tiṇṇaṃ bodhīnaṃ samappamāṇatā siyāti tampi yuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1621_15: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana pannarasavassappamāṇāya paṭhamabodhiyā vīsativassesuyeva antogadhattā “paṭhamabodhiyaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1622_0: Nanu ca kānici sikkhāpadāni paññapetvāpi na tāva āṇāpātimokkhaṃ anuññātaṃ pacchā therassa āyācanena anuññātattā,
tika-vin01t1:1622_1: tasmā kathametaṃ vuttaṃ “sikkhāpadapaññattikālato pana pabhuti āṇāpātimokkhameva uddisīyatī”ti,
tika-vin01t1:1622_2: yadipi kānici sikkhāpadāni paññapetvāva āṇāpātimokkhaṃ na anuññātaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1622_4: kintu paññatteyevāti imamatthaṃ dassetuṃ “sikkhāpadapaññattikālato pana pabhutī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1622_5: Pubbārāmeti sāvatthiyā pācīnadisābhāge katattā evaṃladdhavohāre mahāvihāre.
tika-vin01t1:1622_6: Migāramātupāsādeti migāraseṭṭhino mātuṭṭhāniyattā migāramātāti saṅkhyaṃ gatāya visākhāmahāupāsikāya kārite pāsāde.
tika-vin01t1:1623_1: Sammukhasāvakānaṃ santike pabbajitāti sabbantimānaṃ subhaddasadisānaṃ sammukhasāvakānaṃ santike pabbajite sandhāya vadati.
tika-vin01t1:1623_3: Uccanīcauḷāruḷārabhogādikulavasena vāti uccanīcakulavasena uḷāruḷārabhogādikulavasena vāti yojetabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1623_4: Tattha khattiyabrāhmaṇavasena vā khattiyabrāhmaṇagahapatikānaṃ vasena vā uccakulatā veditabbā,
tika-vin01t1:1624_0: Brahmacariyaṃ rakkhantīti vuttamevatthaṃ pakāsetvā dassento āha “ciraṃ pariyattidhammaṃ pariharantī”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1624_2: attano attano kulānugataganthaṃ viya na nāseyyuṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1624_8: Satipi tesaṃ nānājaccādibhāve sikkhāpadapaññattiyā eva sāsanassa cirappavattīti dassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1624_10: Yasmā buddhā attano parinibbānato uddhampi vinetabbasattasambhave sati sikkhāpadaṃ paññapenti,
tika-vin01t1:1624_13: Yathā kāyavacīdvārasaṅkhātaṃ viññattiṃ samuṭṭhāpetvā pavattamānampi cittaṃ tassāyeva viññattiyā vasena
tika-vin01t1:1625_1: mā evaṃ vitakkayitthāti ettha evanti yathānusiṭṭhāya anusāsaniyā vidhivasena paṭisedhanavasena ca pavattitākāraparāmasanaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1625_2: sā ca sammāvitakkānaṃ micchāvitakkānañca pavattiākāradassanavasena pavattati atthaānisaṃsassa ādīnavassa ca vibhāvanatthaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1625_6: Tattha nekkhammaṃ vuccati lobhato nikkhantattā alobho,
tika-vin01t1:1625_10: upanissayato sampayogato ārammaṇakaraṇato ca nekkhammena paṭisaṃyutto vitakko nekkhammavitakko,
tika-vin01t1:1625_14: taṃ jhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā uppannamaggaphalakāle lokuttaro.
tika-vin01t1:1625_16: kañcipi na byāpādenti etenāti vā abyāpādo, mettā.
tika-vin01t1:1625_20: taṃ jhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā uppannamaggaphalakāle lokuttaro.
tika-vin01t1:1625_22: na vihiṃsanti vā etāya satteti avihiṃsā, karuṇā.
tika-vin01t1:1625_26: taṃ jhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā uppannamaggaphalakāle lokuttaro.
tika-vin01t1:1626_0: Nanu ca alobhādosāmohānaṃ aññamaññāvirahato nesaṃ vasena uppajjanakānaṃ imesaṃ nekkhammavitakkādīnaṃ aññamaññaṃ asaṅkarato vavatthānaṃ na hotīti?
tika-vin01t1:1626_2: Yadā hi alobho padhāno hoti niyamitapariṇatasamudācārādivasena,
tika-vin01t1:1626_4: Tathā hi yadā alobhappadhāno nekkhammagaruko cittuppādo hoti,
tika-vin01t1:1626_6: Taṃsampayuttassa pana adosalakkhaṇassa abyāpādassa vasena yo tasseva abyāpādavitakkabhāvo sambhaveyya,
tika-vin01t1:1626_7: sati ca abyāpādavitakkabhāve kassacipi aviheṭhanajātikatāya avihiṃsāvitakkabhāvo ca sambhaveyya.
tika-vin01t1:1626_8: Te itare dve tasseva nekkhammavitakkassa anugāmino sarūpato adissanato tasmiṃ sati honti,
tika-vin01t1:1627_3: Ettha hi dve kāmā vatthukāmo ca kilesakāmo ca.
tika-vin01t1:1627_4: Tattha vatthukāmapakkhe ārammaṇavasena kāmehi paṭisaṃyutto vitakko kāmavitakko,
tika-vin01t1:1627_5: kilesakāmapakkhe pana sampayogavasena kāmena paṭisaṃyuttoti yojetabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1627_9: Kāmavitakko hi piye manāpe satte vā saṅkhāre vā vitakkentassa uppajjati,
tika-vin01t1:1627_10: byāpādavitakko appiye amanāpe satte vā saṅkhāre vā kujjhitvā olokanakālato paṭṭhāya yāva vināsanā uppajjati,
tika-vin01t1:1627_13: “ime sattā haññantu vā ucchijjantu vā vinassantu vā mā vā ahesu”nti cintanakāle pana sattesu uppajjati.
tika-vin01t1:1627_14: Atha kasmā vuttaṃ “saṅkhāro dukkhāpetabbo nāma natthī”ti,
tika-vin01t1:1627_18: te pana indriyabaddhā saviññāṇakatāya dukkhaṃ paṭisaṃvedenti,
tika-vin01t1:1627_19: tasmā te vihiṃsāvitakkassa visayā icchitā sattasaññitā.
tika-vin01t1:1627_20: Ye pana na dukkhaṃ paṭisaṃvedenti vuttalakkhaṇāyogato,
tika-vin01t1:1628_0: Anupādāya āsavehi cittāni vimucciṃsūti ettha āsavehīti katthuatthe karaṇaniddeso,
tika-vin01t1:1628_3: tasmā āsavehi kattubhūtehi anupādāya ārammaṇavasena aggahetvā cittāni vimuccitānīti evamettha attho gahetabboti āha “tesañhi cittānī”tiādi.
tika-vin01t1:1628_4: Yehi āsavehīti etthāpi kattuatthe eva karaṇaniddeso.
tika-vin01t1:1628_6: Na te tāni gahetvā vimucciṃsūti te āsavā tāni cittāni ārammaṇavasena na gahetvā vimucciṃsu vimocesuṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1628_9: Anuppādanirodhena nirujjhamānāti āyatiṃ anuppattisaṅkhātena nirodhena nirujjhamānā āsavā.
tika-vin01t1:1628_10: Aggahetvā vimucciṃsūti ārammaṇakaraṇavasena aggahetvā cittāni vimocesuṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1628_13: Tenāha “yaṃ vuttaṃ aññatarasmiṃ bhiṃsanake vanasaṇḍeti, tatrā”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1628_14: Katanti bhāvasādhanavāci idaṃ padanti āha “bhiṃsanakatasmiṃ hoti,
tika-vin01t1:1629_0: Idāni aññathāpi atthayojanaṃ dassento āha “atha vā”tiādi.
tika-vin01t1:1629_4: kārassa lopaṃ katvā “bhiṃsanakata”nti vuttanti dassento āha “bhiṃsanakatasminti bhiṃsanakabhāveti attho”tiādi.
tika-vin01t1:1630_3: Tasmiṃ kāle vijjamānānaṃ dvinnaṃ purisānaṃ āyuparicchedaṃ sakalameva gahetvā “satasahassaṃ…pe…
tika-vin01t1:1630_5: Dveyeva purisayugānīti ettha purisānaṃ yugappavattikālo purisayugaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1630_10: Parinibbute pana bhagavati ekameva purisayugaṃ asītiyeva vassasahassāni brahmacariyaṃ aṭṭhāsīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1631_3: Gabbhaṃ gaṇhāpentassāti sabbaññutaññāṇassa vijāyanatthaṃ ñāṇagabbhaṃ gaṇhāpentassa.
tika-vin01t1:1632_9: Yaṃ vuttanti “sikkhāpadaṃ paññapeyyā”ti iminā yaṃ sikkhāpadapaññapanaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1632_11: Tattha tassā sikkhāpadapaññattiyāti tassaṃ yāciyamānasikkhāpadapaññattiyanti attho.
tika-vin01t1:1633_0: Āsavaṭṭhānīyāti ettha adhikaraṇe anīyasaddoti āha “āsavā tiṭṭhanti etesū”tiādi.
tika-vin01t1:1633_2: ke ca dhammā tadadhikaraṇabhūtāti āha “yesu diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikā”tiādi.
tika-vin01t1:1633_5: Te āsavanti tena tena paccayavasena pavattantīti āsavā.
tika-vin01t1:1633_8: Asati āsavaṭṭhānīye dhamme sikkhāpadapaññattiyaṃ ko doso,
tika-vin01t1:1634_7: Ghāsacchādanaparamatāya santuṭṭhāti ghāsacchādane paramatāya uttamatāya santuṭṭhā,
tika-vin01t1:1634_8: ghāsacchādanapariyesane sallekhavasena paramatāya ukkaṭṭhabhāve saṇṭhitāti attho.
tika-vin01t1:1634_9: Ghāsacchādanameva vā paramaṃ paramā koṭi etesaṃ na tato paraṃ kiñci asāmisajātaṃ pariyesanti paccāsīsanti cāti ghāsacchādanaparamā,
tika-vin01t1:1634_12: Tesu nāma koti yathāvuttaguṇavisiṭṭhesu tesu bhikkhūsu ko nāma.
tika-vin01t1:1634_13: Lokāmisabhūtanti lokapariyāpannaṃ hutvā kilesehi āmasitabbattā lokāmisabhūtaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1634_21: Akusaloti tikicchituṃ yuttakālassa aparijānanato akusalo acheko.
tika-vin01t1:1634_27: Lohitakkhayañca maṃ pāpetīti vibhattivipariṇāmaṃ katvā yojetabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1636_1: Sāsane ekacce āsavaṭṭhānīyā dhammā na uppajjantīti yasmā senāsanāni pahonti,
tika-vin01t1:1636_2: tasmā āvāsamacchariyādihetukā sāsane ekacce āsavaṭṭhānīyā dhammā na uppajjanti.
tika-vin01t1:1636_3: Iminā nayenāti etena padasodhammasikkhāpadādīnaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-vin01t1:1637_1: tassa aggaṃ mahattaṃ paṇītatā bahubhāvo vā.
tika-vin01t1:1637_5: Rasena rasaṃ saṃsanditvāti sabhāvena sabhāvaṃ saṃsanditvā,
tika-vin01t1:1637_6: anuññātapaccattharaṇādīsu sukhasamphassasāmaññato upādinnaphassarasepi anavajjasaññitāya anupādinnaphassarasena upādinnaphassarasaṃ saṃsanditvā,
tika-vin01t1:1637_8: Uddhammaṃ ubbinayaṃ satthusāsanaṃ dīpentīti “tathāhaṃ bhagavatā dhammaṃ desitaṃ ājānāmī”tiādinā satthusāsanaṃ uddhammaṃ ubbinayaṃ katvā dīpenti.
tika-vin01t1:1638_3: Kathaṃ pana dussīlānaṃ corabhāvoti āha “te hi assamaṇāva hutvā”tiādi.
tika-vin01t1:1638_6: Sāroti vuccantīti sāsanabrahmacariyassa sārabhūtattā sīlādayo guṇā “sāro”ti vuccanti.
tika-vin01t1:1639_4: Paṭipakkhadhammānaṃ anavasesato savanato pellanato soto ariyamaggoti āha “sototi ca maggassetaṃ adhivacana”nti.
tika-vin01t1:1639_5: Sotāpannoti tena samannāgatassa puggalassāti iminā maggasamaṅgī sotāpannoti vatvā tamevatthaṃ udāharaṇena
tika-vin01t1:1639_6: sādhetvā idāni idhādhippetapuggalaṃ niddhāretvā dassento āha “idha panā”tiādi.
tika-vin01t1:1639_7: Idha āpannasaddo “phalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno”tiādīsu viya vattamānakālikoti āha “maggena phalassa nāmaṃ dinna”nti.
tika-vin01t1:1639_8: Maggena hi attanā sadisassa aṭṭhaṅgikassa vā sattaṅgikassa vā phalassa sototi nāmaṃ dinnaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1640_4: Atha vā dhammoti apāyesu khipanako sakkāyadiṭṭhiādiko akusaladhammo.
tika-vin01t1:1640_5: Yassa pana so akusaladhammo natthi sabbaso pahīnattā,
tika-vin01t1:1640_6: so yasmā apāyesu attānaṃ vinipātanasabhāvo na hoti,
tika-vin01t1:1640_7: tasmā vuttaṃ “na attānaṃ apāyesu vinipātanasabhāvoti vuttaṃ hotī”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1640_12: Niyatoti vā heṭṭhimantato sattamabhavato upari anuppajjanadhammatāya niyato.
tika-vin01t1:1640_16: So ca idha paṭhamamaggassa adhigatattā avasiṭṭho eva adhigantabbabhāvena icchitabboti.
tika-vin01t1:1643_12: Pakkamantiyevāti avadhāraṇena no na pakkamantīti dasseti.
tika-vin01t1:1643_13: “Janapadacārikaṃ pakkamantī”ti ettha ṭhatvā bhagavato cārikāpakkamanavidhiṃ dassento āha “janapadacārikaṃ carantā cā”tiādi.
tika-vin01t1:1643_14: Cārikā ca nāmesā duvidhā turitacārikā ceva aturitacārikā ca.
tika-vin01t1:1643_15: Tattha dūrepi bodhaneyyapuggalaṃ disvā tassa bodhanatthāya sahasā gamanaṃ turitacārikā nāma,
tika-vin01t1:1643_17: Bhagavā hi mahākassapattheraṃ paccuggacchanto muhuttena tigāvutamagamāsi,
tika-vin01t1:1643_23: dhammasenāpatino saddhivihārikassa vanavāsītissasāmaṇerassa tigāvutādhikaṃ vīsayojanasataṃ agamāsi,
tika-vin01t1:1643_25: Yaṃ pana gāmanigamanagarapaṭipāṭiyā devasikaṃ yojanaaḍḍhayojanavasena piṇḍapātacariyādīhi lokaṃ anuggaṇhantassa gamanaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1643_27: Imaṃ pana cārikaṃ caranto bhagavā mahāmaṇḍalaṃ majjhimamaṇḍalaṃ antimamaṇḍalanti imesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ maṇḍalānaṃ aññatarasmiṃ carati.
tika-vin01t1:1644_3: Imesaṃ pana maṇḍalānaṃ kiṃ pamāṇanti āha “tattha mahāmaṇḍalaṃ navayojanasatika”ntiādi.
tika-vin01t1:1644_6: Yasmā nikkhantakālato paṭṭhāya gatagataṭṭhānassa catūsu passesu samantato yojanasataṃ ekakolāhalaṃ hoti,
tika-vin01t1:1644_8: itaresu dvīsu maṇḍalesu sakkāro mahāmaṇḍalaṃ osarati,
tika-vin01t1:1644_9: tattha buddhā bhagavanto tesu tesu gāmanigamesu ekāhaṃ dvīhaṃ vasantā mahājanaṃ āmisapaṭiggahena anuggaṇhanti,
tika-vin01t1:1644_12: Samathavipassanā taruṇā hontīti ettha taruṇā vipassanāti saṅkhāraparicchedane ñāṇaṃ kaṅkhāvitaraṇe ñāṇaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1644_13: sammasane ñāṇaṃ maggāmagge ñāṇanti catunnaṃ ñāṇānaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1644_15: “Sace pana antovasse bhikkhūnaṃ samathavipassanā taruṇā hontī”ti idaṃ nidassanamattanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1644_16: Aññenapi majjhimamaṇḍale veneyyānaṃ ñāṇaparipākādikāraṇena majjhimamaṇḍale cārikaṃ caritukāmā cātumāsaṃ vasitvāva nikkhamanti.
tika-vin01t1:1645_2: Idañcetarahi pavattavohāravasena kattikamāsassa aparapakkhapāṭipadadivasaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1645_6: Māgasiramāsampi tattheva vasitvā phussamāsassa paṭhamadivaseti idampi nidassanamattanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1645_8: tesaṃ indriyaparipākaṃ āgamayamānā aparampi ekamāsaṃ vā dviticatumāsaṃ vā tatthevavasitvā mahābhikkhusaṅghaparivārā
tika-vin01t1:1645_9: nikkhamitvā purimanayeneva lokaṃ anuggaṇhantā sattahi vā chahi vā pañcahi vā catūhi vā māsehi cārikaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1645_11: Veneyyavasenevāti avadhāraṇena na cīvarādihetu carantīti dasseti.
tika-vin01t1:1645_12: Tathā hi imesu tīsu maṇḍalesu yattha katthaci cārikaṃ carantā na cīvarādihetu caranti,
tika-vin01t1:1645_15: mayi pana cārikaṃ carante mahājano tathāgatadassanaṃ labhissati,
tika-vin01t1:1645_20: taṃ nesaṃ bhavissati dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāyā”ti evaṃ lokānukampāya cārikaṃ caranti.
tika-vin01t1:1646_0: Apica catūhi kāraṇehi buddhā bhagavanto cārikaṃ caranti jaṅghavihāravasena sarīraphāsukatthāya,
tika-vin01t1:1646_4: Aparehipi catūhi kāraṇehi buddhā bhagavanto cārikaṃ caranti buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchissantīti vā, dhammaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1646_6: mahatā dhammavassena catasso parisā santappessāmāti vā.
tika-vin01t1:1646_7: Aparehipi pañcahi kāraṇehi buddhā bhagavanto cārikaṃ caranti pāṇātipātā viramissantīti vā,
tika-vin01t1:1646_11: Aparehipi aṭṭhahi kāraṇehi buddhā bhagavanto cārikaṃ caranti paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ paṭilabhissantīti vā,
tika-vin01t1:1646_14: Aparehipi aṭṭhahi kāraṇehi buddhā bhagavanto cārikaṃ caranti sotāpattimaggaṃ adhigamissantīti vā,
tika-vin01t1:1647_0: Pupphāni ocinantā viya carantīti iminā yathā mālākāro bahuṃ pupphagacchaṃ disvā tattha cirampi ṭhatvā
tika-vin01t1:1647_1: pupphāni ocinitvā pupphasuññaṃ gacchaṃ disvā tattha papañcaṃ akatvā taṃ pahāya aññattha gantvā pupphāni
tika-vin01t1:1647_3: evameva buddhāpi yattha gāmanigamādīsu vineyyasattā bahū honti,
tika-vin01t1:1647_4: tattha cirampi vasantā te vinetvā vineyyasuññagāmādīsu papañcaṃ akatvā taṃ pahāya aññattha bahuvineyyakesu gāmādīsu vasantā vicarantīti dasseti.
tika-vin01t1:1647_5: Tatoyeva ca atikhuddakepi antimamaṇḍale upanissayavantānaṃ bahubhāvato tāva bahumpi kālaṃ sattamāsapariyantaṃ cārikaṃ caranti.
tika-vin01t1:1648_1: sukhakāraṇatāya ca sukhanti āha “santaṃ sukhaṃ nibbānamārammaṇaṃ katvā”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1648_4: manussā pana imasmiṃyeva cakkavāḷe bodhaneyyā honti.
tika-vin01t1:1648_5: Bodhaneyyasattasamavalokananti paṭhamaṃ mahākaruṇāya pharitvā pacchā sabbaññutaññāṇajālaṃ pattharitvā
tika-vin01t1:1648_7: Buddhā kira mahākaruṇāsamāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā tato vuṭṭhāya “ye sattā bhabbā paripākañāṇā ajjayeva mayā vinetabbā,
tika-vin01t1:1648_8: te mayhaṃ ñāṇassa upaṭṭhahantū”ti cittaṃ adhiṭṭhāya samannāharanti.
tika-vin01t1:1648_9: Tesaṃ saha samannāhārā eko vā dve vā bahū vā tadā vinayūpagā veneyyā sabbaññutaññāṇassa āpāthamāgacchanti,
tika-vin01t1:1648_11: Evaṃ āpāthamāgatānaṃ pana nesaṃ upanissayaṃ pubbacariyaṃ pubbahetuṃ sampativattamānañca paṭipattiṃ olokenti.
tika-vin01t1:1648_12: Veneyyasattapariggaṇhanatthañhi samannāhāre kate paṭhamaṃ nesaṃ veneyyabhāveneva upaṭṭhānaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t1:1648_13: Atha “kiṃ nu kho bhavissatī”ti saraṇagamanādivasena kañci nipphattiṃ vīmaṃsamānā pubbupanissayāni olokenti.
tika-vin01t1:1649_3: Buddhakāle kira ekekasmiṃ saṃvacchare dve vāre bhikkhū sannipatanti upakaṭṭhavassūpanāyikakāle ca pavāraṇākāle ca.
tika-vin01t1:1649_4: Upakaṭṭhāya vassūpanāyikāya dasapi vīsampi tiṃsampi cattālīsampi paññāsampi bhikkhū vaggavaggā hutvā kammaṭṭhānatthāya āgacchanti.
tika-vin01t1:1649_10: Satthā tesaṃ cariyavasena rāgacaritassa asubhakammaṭṭhānaṃ deti,
tika-vin01t1:1649_12: mohacaritassa “uddeso paripucchā kālena dhammassavanaṃ kālena dhammasākacchā idaṃ tuyhaṃ sappāya”nti ācikkhati.
tika-vin01t1:1649_14: kammaṭṭhānabhāvanāya pana bhājanabhūtaṃ kātuṃ sammohavigamāya paṭhamaṃ uddesaparipucchādhammassavanadhammasākacchāsu niyojeti.
tika-vin01t1:1649_16: Saddhācaritassa visesato purimā cha anussatiyo sappāyā,
tika-vin01t1:1649_17: tāsaṃ pana anuyuñjane ayaṃ pubbabhāgapaṭipattīti dassetuṃ pasādanīyasuttantena buddhasubodhitaṃ dhammasudhammataṃ saṅghasuppaṭipattiñca pakāseti.
tika-vin01t1:1649_18: Ñāṇacaritassa pana maraṇassati upasamānussati catudhātuvavatthānaṃ āhārepaṭikūlasaññā visesato sappāyā,
tika-vin01t1:1649_19: tesaṃ upakāradhammadassanatthaṃ aniccatādipaṭisaṃyutte gambhīre suttante katheti.
tika-vin01t1:1649_20: Te kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā sace sappāyaṃ hoti,
tika-vin01t1:1649_24: Tepi tattha vasantā temāsikaṃ paṭipadaṃ gahetvā ghaṭentā vāyamantā sotāpannāpi honti sakadāgāminopi anāgāminopi arahantopi.
tika-vin01t1:1649_25: Tato vutthavassā pavāretvā satthu santikaṃ gantvā “bhagavā ahaṃ tumhākaṃ santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā sotāpattiphalaṃ patto…pe…
tika-vin01t1:1650_1: saddo “āgacchā”ti iminā samānatthoti āha “āyāmāti āgaccha yāmā”ti,
tika-vin01t1:1650_4: na pana tadā satthu santike vasantānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ abhāvato.
tika-vin01t1:1650_5: Pañcasataparimāṇo hi tadā bhagavato santike bhikkhusaṅgho.
tika-vin01t1:1650_8: “Atha kho bhagavā āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ āmantesī”ti vuttattā “bhagavato paccassosī”ti idha bhagavatoti sāmivacanaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1650_9: āmantanavacanameva sambandhīantaraṃ apekkhatīti iminā adhippāyena “bhagavato vacanaṃ paṭiassosī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1650_10: Bhagavatoti pana idaṃ patissavasambandhena sampadānavacanaṃ yathā “devadattassa paṭissuṇotī”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1651_0: Tassa pāṭihāriyassa āgantukavasena katattā vuttaṃ “nagaradvārato paṭṭhāyā”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1651_4: tasmā suvaṇṇajaladhārā viya suvaṇṇavaṇṇāhi rasmīhīti attho.
tika-vin01t1:1652_0: Brāhmaṇa tayā nimantitā vassaṃvutthā amhāti pāḷiyaṃ sambandho veditabbo.
tika-vin01t1:1652_4: Vinā vā liṅgavipallāsenettha attho daṭṭhabboti āha “atha vā”tiādi.
tika-vin01t1:1652_15: Taṃ kutettha labbhāti ettha tanti taṃ kāraṇaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1652_18: Dutiye pana atthavikappe tanti deyyadhammassa parāmasanaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1652_22: Dutiye pana atthavikappe yanti yaṃ deyyadhammanti attho.
tika-vin01t1:1653_0: Alaṃ gharāvāsapalibodhacintāyāti saññāpetvāti brāhmaṇa netaṃ gharāvāsapalibodhena kataṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1653_4: Tassa tadā tādisassa vivaṭṭasannissitassa ñāṇaparipākassa abhāvato kevalaṃ abbhantarasannissito eva attho
tika-vin01t1:1653_10: Samuttejetvāti sammadeva uparūpari nivesetvā puññakiriyāya tikkhavisadabhāvaṃ āpādetvā.
tika-vin01t1:1653_11: Taṃ pana atthato tassa ussāhajananaṃ hotīti āha “saussāhaṃ katvā”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1653_12: Evaṃ puññakiriyāya saussāhato evarūpaguṇasamaṅgitā ca niyamato diṭṭhadhammikādiatthasampādananti evaṃ
tika-vin01t1:1653_13: saussāhatāya aññehi ca tasmiṃ vijjamānaguṇehi sampahaṃsetvā sammadeva haṭṭhatuṭṭhabhāvaṃ āpādetvā.
tika-vin01t1:1654_3: Yadi evaṃ kasmā bhagavā tassa tathā dhammaratanavassaṃ vassīti? Vuccate –
tika-vin01t1:1654_5: āyatiṃ pana nibbānādhigamatthāya vāsanābhāgiyā ca sabbā purimapacchimadhammakathā ahosīti daṭṭhabbā.
tika-vin01t1:1654_6: Na hi bhagavato niratthakā dhammadesanā atthi.
tika-vin01t1:1655_7: Dātuṃ upanītabhikkhāya paṭikkhepo nāma hatthasaññāya mukhavikārena vacībhedena vā hotīti āha “hatthasaññāyā”tiādi.
tika-vin01t1:1655_8: Onītapattapāṇinti ettha onīto pattato pāṇi etassāti onītapattapāṇīti bhinnādhikaraṇavisayoyaṃ saddo bāhiratthasamāsoti āha “pattato onītapāṇi”ntiādi.
tika-vin01t1:1655_10: tassattho onittaṃ nānābhūtaṃ vinābhūtaṃ āmisāpanayanena vā sucikataṃ pattaṃ pāṇito assāti onittapattapāṇi,
tika-vin01t1:1655_12: hatthe ca pattañca dhovitvā ekamante pattaṃ nikkhipitvā nisinnanti attho.
tika-vin01t1:1655_13: Pattuṇṇapaṭṭapaṭe cāti pattuṇṇapaṭe ca paṭṭapaṭe ca.
tika-vin01t1:1656_1: Saputtadāraṃ vanditvā nisinnanti puttadārehi saddhiṃ vanditvā nisinnaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1656_3: “Temāsaṃ sotabbadhammaṃ ajjeva suṇissāmī”ti nisinnassa taṃ ajjhāsayaṃ pūretvā desitattā vuttaṃ “paripuṇṇasaṅkappaṃ kurumāno”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1657_0: Buddhānaṃ anabhiratiparitassitā nāma natthīti āha “yathājjhāsayaṃ yathārucitaṃ vāsaṃ vasitvā”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1657_4: Assādavasena ca katthaci vasantassa assādavatthuvigamanena siyā tassa tattha anabhirati,
tika-vin01t1:1657_7: tasmā abhirativasena katthaci vasitvā tadabhāvato aññattha gamanaṃ nāma buddhānaṃ natthi,
tika-vin01t1:1657_8: vineyyavinayanatthaṃ pana katthaci vasitvā tasmiṃ siddhe vineyyavinayatthameva tato aññattha gacchanti,
tika-vin01t1:1657_10: Soreyyādīni anupagammāti mahāmaṇḍalacārikāya vīthibhūtāni soreyyanagarādīni anupagantvā.
tika-vin01t1:1657_13: Tadavasarīti ettha tanti karaṇatthe upayogavacananti āha “tena avasari tadavasarī”ti.
tika-vin01t1:1659_0: Samantapāsādikāyāti samantato sabbaso pasādaṃ janetīti samantapāsādikā,
tika-vin01t1:1659_2: Tatridaṃ samantapāsādikāya samantapāsādikattasminti ettha tatrāti purimavacanāpekkhaṃ,
tika-vin01t1:1659_6: tatra yā sā samantapāsādikāti saṃvaṇṇanā vuttā,
tika-vin01t1:1659_7: tassā samantapāsādikāya saṃvaṇṇanāya samantapāsādikattasmiṃ samantapāsādikabhāve sabbaso pasādajanakatte idaṃ hoti.
tika-vin01t1:1660_5: Parasamayavivajjanatoti “sakāya paṭiññāya mettiyaṃ bhikkhuniṃ nāsethā”tiādīsu micchāpaṭipannānaṃ paresaṃ laddhinirākaraṇato,
tika-vin01t1:1661_1: saddasatthānusārena vā nibbacanaṃ dassetvā padanipphattidassanaṃ byañjanaparisodhanaṃ.
tika-vin01t1:1661_8: Tasmā ayaṃ saṃvaṇṇanā samantapāsādikātveva pavattāti yojetabbaṃ.
